GE09ram_02_u:0: kasyacit tv atha kālasya rājā daśarathaḥ sutam
GE09ram_02_u:4: tvāṃ netum āgato vīra yudhājin mātulas tava // Ram_2,1.2
GE09ram_02_u:10: mātṝṃś cāpi naraśreṣṭhaḥ śatrughnasahito yayau // Ram_2,1.4
GE09ram_02_u:13: svapuraṃ prāviśad vīraḥ pitā tasya tutoṣa ha // Ram_2,1.5
GE09ram_02_u:15: sa tatra nyavasad bhrātrā saha satkārasatkṛtaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:18: tatrāpi nivasantau tau tarpyamāṇau ca kāmataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:19: bhrātarau smaratāṃ vīrau vṛddhaṃ daśarathaṃ nṛpam // Ram_2,1.7
GE09ram_02_u:21: rājāpi tau mahātejāḥ sasmāra proṣitau sutau
GE09ram_02_u:24: sarva eva tu tasyeṣṭāś catvāraḥ puruṣarṣabhāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:25: svaśarīrād vinirvṛttāś catvāra iva bāhavaḥ // Ram_2,1.9
GE09ram_02_u:27: teṣām api mahātejā rāmo ratikaraḥ pituḥ
GE09ram_02_u:28: svayambhūr iva bhūtānāṃ babhūva guṇavattaraḥ // Ram_2,1.10
GE09ram_02_u:30: gate ca bharate rāmo lakṣmaṇaś ca mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:34: cakāra rāmo dharmātmā priyāṇi ca hitāni ca // Ram_2,1.12
GE09ram_02_u:39: evaṃ daśarathaḥ prīto brāhmaṇā naigamās tathā
GE09ram_02_u:42: sa hi nityaṃ praśāntātmā mṛdupūrvaṃ ca bhāṣate
GE09ram_02_u:46: na smaraty apakārāṇāṃ śatam apy ātmavattayā // Ram_2,1.16
GE09ram_02_u:49: kathayann āsta vai nityam astrayogyāntareṣv api // Ram_2,1.17
GE09ram_02_u:52: vṛddhair abhivinītaś ca dvijair dharmārthadarśibhiḥ // Ram_2,1.18
GE09ram_02_u:61: śraiṣṭhyaṃ śāstrasamūheṣu prāpto vyāmiśrakeṣv api // Ram_2,1.21
GE09ram_02_u:63: arthadharmau ca saṃgṛhya sukhatantro na cālasaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:70: apradhṛṣyaś ca saṃgrāme kruddhair api surāsuraiḥ // Ram_2,1.24
GE09ram_02_u:72: anasūyo jitakrodho na dṛpto na ca matsarī
GE09ram_02_u:73: na cāvamantā bhūtānāṃ na ca kālavaśānugaḥ // Ram_2,1.25
GE09ram_02_u:75: evaṃ śreṣṭhair guṇair yuktaḥ prajānāṃ pārthivātmajaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:77: buddhyā bṛhaspates tulyo vīryeṇāpi śacīpateḥ // Ram_2,1.26
GE09ram_02_u:80: guṇair viruruce rāmo dīptaḥ sūrya ivāṃśubhiḥ // Ram_2,1.27
GE09ram_02_u:85: etais tu bahubhir yuktaṃ guṇair anupamaiḥ sutam
GE09ram_02_u:86: dṛṣṭvā daśaratho rājā cakre cintāṃ paraṃtapaḥ // Ram_2,1.29
GE09ram_02_u:88: eṣā hy asya parā prītir hṛdi samparivartate
GE09ram_02_u:89: kadā nāma sutaṃ drakṣyāmy abhiṣiktam ahaṃ priyam // Ram_2,1.30
GE09ram_02_u:92: mattaḥ priyataro loke parjanya iva vṛṣṭimān // Ram_2,1.31
GE09ram_02_u:95: mahīdharasamo dhṛtyāṃ mattaś ca guṇavattaraḥ // Ram_2,1.32
GE09ram_02_u:97: mahīm aham imāṃ kṛtsnām adhitiṣṭhantam ātmajam
GE09ram_02_u:98: anena vayasā dṛṣṭvā yathā svargam avāpnuyām // Ram_2,1.33
GE09ram_02_u:100: taṃ samīkṣya mahārājo yuktaṃ samuditair guṇaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:101: niścitya sacivaiḥ sārdhaṃ yuvarājam amanyata // Ram_2,1.34
GE09ram_02_u:107: rājānam evābhimukhā niṣedur niyatā nṛpāḥ // Ram_2,1.36
GE09ram_02_u:109: sa labdhamānair vinayānvitair nṛpaiḥ purālayair jānapadaiś ca mānavaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:110: upopaviṣṭair nṛpatir vṛto babhau sahasracakṣur bhagavān ivāmaraiḥ // Ram_2,1.37
GE09ram_02_u:113: hitam uddharṣaṇaṃ cedam uvācāpratimaṃ vacaḥ // Ram_2,2.1
GE09ram_02_u:116: svareṇa mahatā rājā jīmūta iva nādayan // Ram_2,2.2
GE09ram_02_u:119: śreyasā yoktukāmo 'smi sukhārham akhilaṃ jagat // Ram_2,2.3
GE09ram_02_u:122: prajā nityam atandreṇa yathāśakty abhirakṣatā // Ram_2,2.4
GE09ram_02_u:124: idaṃ śarīraṃ kṛtsnasya lokasya caratā hitam
GE09ram_02_u:125: pāṇḍur asyātapatrasya chāyāyāṃ jaritaṃ mayā // Ram_2,2.5
GE09ram_02_u:131: pariśrānto 'smi lokasya gurvīṃ dharmadhuraṃ vahan // Ram_2,2.7
GE09ram_02_u:133: so 'haṃ viśramam icchāmi putraṃ kṛtvā prajāhite
GE09ram_02_u:134: saṃnikṛṣṭān imān sarvān anumānya dvijarṣabhān // Ram_2,2.8
GE09ram_02_u:136: anujāto hi me sarvair guṇair jyeṣṭho mamātmajaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:139: taṃ candram iva puṣyeṇa yuktaṃ dharmabhṛtāṃ varam
GE09ram_02_u:142: anurūpaḥ sa vo nātho lakṣmīvāṃl lakṣmaṇāgrajaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:143: trailokyam api nāthena yena syān nāthavattaram // Ram_2,2.11
GE09ram_02_u:145: anena śreyasā sadyaḥ saṃyojyāham imāṃ mahīm
GE09ram_02_u:146: gatakleśo bhaviṣyāmi sute tasmin niveśya vai // Ram_2,2.12
GE09ram_02_u:148: iti bruvantaṃ muditāḥ pratyanandan nṛpā nṛpam
GE09ram_02_u:149: vṛṣṭimantaṃ mahāmeghaṃ nardantam iva barhiṇaḥ // Ram_2,2.13
GE09ram_02_u:152: ūcuś ca manasā jñātvā vṛddhaṃ daśarathaṃ nṛpam // Ram_2,2.14
GE09ram_02_u:155: sa rāmaṃ yuvarājānam abhiṣiñcasva pārthivam // Ram_2,2.15
GE09ram_02_u:157: iti tadvacanaṃ śrutvā rājā teṣāṃ manaḥpriyam
GE09ram_02_u:158: ajānann iva jijñāsur idaṃ vacanam abravīt // Ram_2,2.16
GE09ram_02_u:160: kathaṃ nu mayi dharmeṇa pṛthivīm anuśāsati
GE09ram_02_u:161: bhavanto draṣṭum icchanti yuvarājaṃ mamātmajam // Ram_2,2.17
GE09ram_02_u:163: te tam ūcur mahātmānaṃ paurajānapadaiḥ saha
GE09ram_02_u:164: bahavo nṛpa kalyāṇā guṇāḥ putrasya santi te // Ram_2,2.18
GE09ram_02_u:167: ikṣvākubhyo hi sarvebhyo 'py atirakto viśāmpate // Ram_2,2.19
GE09ram_02_u:170: dharmajñaḥ satyasaṃdhaś ca śīlavān anasūyakaḥ // Ram_2,2.20
GE09ram_02_u:173: mṛduś ca sthiracittaś ca sadā bhavyo 'nasūyakaḥ // Ram_2,2.21
GE09ram_02_u:175: priyavādī ca bhūtānāṃ satyavādī ca rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:178: tenāsyehātulā kīrtir yaśas tejaś ca vardhate
GE09ram_02_u:181: yadā vrajati saṃgrāmaṃ grāmārthe nagarasya vā
GE09ram_02_u:184: saṃgrāmāt punar āgamya kuñjareṇa rathena vā
GE09ram_02_u:185: paurān svajanavan nityaṃ kuśalaṃ paripṛcchati // Ram_2,2.25
GE09ram_02_u:188: nikhilenānupūrvyā ca pitā putrān ivaurasān // Ram_2,2.26
GE09ram_02_u:190: śuśrūṣante ca vaḥ śiṣyāḥ kaccit karmasu daṃśitāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:191: iti naḥ puruṣavyāghraḥ sadā rāmo 'bhibhāṣate // Ram_2,2.27
GE09ram_02_u:194: utsaveṣu ca sarveṣu piteva parituṣyati // Ram_2,2.28
GE09ram_02_u:197: vatsaḥ śreyasi jātas te diṣṭyāsau tava rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:198: diṣṭyā putraguṇair yukto mārīca iva kaśyapaḥ // Ram_2,2.29
GE09ram_02_u:200: balam ārogyam āyuś ca rāmasya viditātmanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:201: āśaṃsate janaḥ sarvo rāṣṭre puravare tathā // Ram_2,2.30
GE09ram_02_u:203: abhyantaraś ca bāhyaś ca paurajānapado janaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:204: striyo vṛddhās taruṇyaś ca sāyamprātaḥ samāhitāḥ // Ram_2,2.31
GE09ram_02_u:207: teṣām āyācitaṃ deva tvatprasādāt samṛdhyatām // Ram_2,2.32
GE09ram_02_u:212: taṃ devadevopamam ātmajaṃ te sarvasya lokasya hite niviṣṭam
GE09ram_02_u:213: hitāya naḥ kṣipram udārajuṣṭaṃ mudābhiṣektuṃ varada tvam arhasi // Ram_2,2.34
GE09ram_02_u:216: pratigṛhyābravīd rājā tebhyaḥ priyahitaṃ vacaḥ // Ram_2,3.1
GE09ram_02_u:219: yan me jyeṣṭhaṃ priyaṃ putraṃ yauvarājyastham icchatha // Ram_2,3.2
GE09ram_02_u:221: iti pratyarcya tān rājā brāhmaṇān idam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:222: vasiṣṭhaṃ vāmadevaṃ ca teṣām evopaśṛṇvatām // Ram_2,3.3
GE09ram_02_u:224: caitraḥ śrīmān ayaṃ māsaḥ puṇyaḥ puṣpitakānanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:227: kṛtam ity eva cābrūtām abhigamya jagatpatim
GE09ram_02_u:230: tataḥ sumantraṃ dyutimān rājā vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:231: rāmaḥ kṛtātmā bhavatā śīghram ānīyatām iti // Ram_2,3.6
GE09ram_02_u:234: rāmaṃ tatrānayāṃcakre rathena rathināṃ varam // Ram_2,3.7
GE09ram_02_u:236: atha tatra samāsīnās tadā daśarathaṃ nṛpam
GE09ram_02_u:237: prācyodīcyāḥ pratīcyāś ca dākṣiṇātyāś ca bhūmipāḥ // Ram_2,3.8
GE09ram_02_u:239: mlecchāś cāryāś ca ye cānye vanaśailāntavāsinaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:240: upāsāṃcakrire sarve taṃ devā iva vāsavam // Ram_2,3.9
GE09ram_02_u:242: teṣāṃ madhye sa rājarṣir marutām iva vāsavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:252: na tatarpa samāyāntaṃ paśyamāno narādhipaḥ // Ram_2,3.13
GE09ram_02_u:255: pituḥ samīpaṃ gacchantaṃ prāñjaliḥ pṛṣṭhato 'nvagāt // Ram_2,3.14
GE09ram_02_u:258: āruroha nṛpaṃ draṣṭuṃ saha sūtena rāghavaḥ // Ram_2,3.15
GE09ram_02_u:260: sa prāñjalir abhipretya praṇataḥ pitur antike
GE09ram_02_u:261: nāma svaṃ śrāvayan rāmo vavande caraṇau pituḥ // Ram_2,3.16
GE09ram_02_u:263: taṃ dṛṣṭvā praṇataṃ pārśve kṛtāñjalipuṭaṃ nṛpaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:264: gṛhyāñjalau samākṛṣya sasvaje priyam ātmajam // Ram_2,3.17
GE09ram_02_u:267: dideśa rājā ruciraṃ rāmāya paramāsanam // Ram_2,3.18
GE09ram_02_u:270: svayeva prabhayā merum udaye vimalo raviḥ // Ram_2,3.19
GE09ram_02_u:275: taṃ paśyamāno nṛpatis tutoṣa priyam ātmajam
GE09ram_02_u:278: sa taṃ sasmitam ābhāṣya putraṃ putravatāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:279: uvācedaṃ vaco rājā devendram iva kaśyapaḥ // Ram_2,3.22
GE09ram_02_u:281: jyeṣṭhāyām asi me patnyāṃ sadṛśyāṃ sadṛśaḥ sutaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:282: utpannas tvaṃ guṇaśreṣṭho mama rāmātmajaḥ priyaḥ // Ram_2,3.23
GE09ram_02_u:284: tvayā yataḥ prajāś cemāḥ svaguṇair anurañjitāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:285: tasmāt tvaṃ puṣyayogena yauvarājyam avāpnuhi // Ram_2,3.24
GE09ram_02_u:287: kāmatas tvaṃ prakṛtyaiva vinīto guṇavān asi
GE09ram_02_u:288: guṇavaty api tu snehāt putra vakṣyāmi te hitam // Ram_2,3.25
GE09ram_02_u:290: bhūyo vinayam āsthāya bhava nityaṃ jitendriyaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:298: tasmāt putra tvam ātmānaṃ niyamyaiva samācara // Ram_2,3.28
GE09ram_02_u:300: tac chrutvā suhṛdas tasya rāmasya priyakāriṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:301: tvaritāḥ śīghram abhyetya kausalyāyai nyavedayan // Ram_2,3.29
GE09ram_02_u:303: sā hiraṇyaṃ ca gāś caiva ratnāni vividhāni ca
GE09ram_02_u:307: yayau svaṃ dyutimad veśma janaughaiḥ pratipūjitaḥ // Ram_2,3.31
GE09ram_02_u:309: te cāpi paurā nṛpater vacas tac chrutvā tadā lābham iveṣṭam āpya
GE09ram_02_u:310: narendram āmantrya gṛhāṇi gatvā devān samānarcur atīva hṛṣṭāḥ // Ram_2,3.32
GE09ram_02_u:312: gateṣv atha nṛpo bhūyaḥ paureṣu saha mantribhiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:313: mantrayitvā tataś cakre niścayajñaḥ sa niścayam // Ram_2,4.1
GE09ram_02_u:315: śva eva puṣyo bhavitā śvo 'bhiṣecyas tu me sutaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:316: rāmo rājīvatāmrākṣo yauvarājya iti prabhuḥ // Ram_2,4.2
GE09ram_02_u:319: sūtam ājñāpayāmāsa rāmaṃ punar ihānaya // Ram_2,4.3
GE09ram_02_u:321: pratigṛhya sa tadvākyaṃ sūtaḥ punar upāyayau
GE09ram_02_u:322: rāmasya bhavanaṃ śīghraṃ rāmam ānayituṃ punaḥ // Ram_2,4.4
GE09ram_02_u:325: śrutvaiva cāpi rāmas taṃ prāptaṃ śaṅkānvito 'bhavat // Ram_2,4.5
GE09ram_02_u:327: praveśya cainaṃ tvaritaṃ rāmo vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:328: yad āgamanakṛtyaṃ te bhūyas tad brūhy aśeṣataḥ // Ram_2,4.6
GE09ram_02_u:330: tam uvāca tataḥ sūto rājā tvāṃ draṣṭum icchati
GE09ram_02_u:331: śrutvā pramāṇam atra tvaṃ gamanāyetarāya vā // Ram_2,4.7
GE09ram_02_u:334: prayayau rājabhavanaṃ punar draṣṭuṃ nareśvaram // Ram_2,4.8
GE09ram_02_u:336: taṃ śrutvā samanuprāptaṃ rāmaṃ daśaratho nṛpaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:337: praveśayāmāsa gṛhaṃ vivikṣuḥ priyam uttamam // Ram_2,4.9
GE09ram_02_u:339: praviśann eva ca śrīmān rāghavo bhavanaṃ pituḥ
GE09ram_02_u:340: dadarśa pitaraṃ dūrāt praṇipatya kṛtāñjaliḥ // Ram_2,4.10
GE09ram_02_u:343: pradiśya cāsmai ruciram āsanaṃ punar abravīt // Ram_2,4.11
GE09ram_02_u:345: rāma vṛddho 'smi dīrghāyur bhuktā bhogā mayepsitāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:348: jātam iṣṭam apatyaṃ me tvam adyānupamaṃ bhuvi
GE09ram_02_u:349: dattam iṣṭam adhītaṃ ca mayā puruṣasattama // Ram_2,4.13
GE09ram_02_u:351: anubhūtāni ceṣṭāni mayā vīra sukhāni ca
GE09ram_02_u:355: ato yat tvām ahaṃ brūyāṃ tan me tvaṃ kartum arhasi // Ram_2,4.15
GE09ram_02_u:357: adya prakṛtayaḥ sarvās tvām icchanti narādhipam
GE09ram_02_u:358: atas tvāṃ yuvarājānam abhiṣekṣyāmi putraka // Ram_2,4.16
GE09ram_02_u:360: api cādyāśubhān rāma svapnān paśyāmi dāruṇān
GE09ram_02_u:361: sanirghātā maholkāś ca patantīha mahāsvanāḥ // Ram_2,4.17
GE09ram_02_u:363: avaṣṭabdhaṃ ca me rāma nakṣatraṃ dāruṇair grahaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:367: rājā vā mṛtyum āpnoti ghorāṃ vāpadam ṛcchati // Ram_2,4.19
GE09ram_02_u:369: tad yāvad eva me ceto na vimuhyati rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:370: tāvad evābhiṣiñcasva calā hi prāṇināṃ matiḥ // Ram_2,4.20
GE09ram_02_u:372: adya candro 'bhyupagataḥ puṣyāt pūrvaṃ punar vasum
GE09ram_02_u:373: śvaḥ puṣyayogaṃ niyataṃ vakṣyante daivacintakāḥ // Ram_2,4.21
GE09ram_02_u:376: śvas tvāham abhiṣekṣyāmi yauvarājye paraṃtapa // Ram_2,4.22
GE09ram_02_u:381: suhṛdaś cāpramattās tvāṃ rakṣantv adya samantataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:382: bhavanti bahuvighnāni kāryāṇy evaṃvidhāni hi // Ram_2,4.24
GE09ram_02_u:384: viproṣitaś ca bharato yāvad eva purād itaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:385: tāvad evābhiṣekas te prāptakālo mato mama // Ram_2,4.25
GE09ram_02_u:387: kāmaṃ khalu satāṃ vṛtte bhrātā te bharataḥ sthitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:390: kiṃ tu cittaṃ manuṣyāṇām anityam iti me matiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:391: satāṃ ca dharmanityānāṃ kṛtaśobhi ca rāghava // Ram_2,4.27
GE09ram_02_u:394: vrajeti rāmaḥ pitaram abhivādyābhyayād gṛham // Ram_2,4.28
GE09ram_02_u:397: tasmin kṣaṇe vinirgatya mātur antaḥpuraṃ yayau // Ram_2,4.29
GE09ram_02_u:399: tatra tāṃ pravaṇām eva mātaraṃ kṣaumavāsinīm
GE09ram_02_u:400: vāgyatāṃ devatāgāre dadarśa yācatīṃ śriyam // Ram_2,4.30
GE09ram_02_u:402: prāg eva cāgatā tatra sumitrā lakṣmaṇas tathā
GE09ram_02_u:403: sītā cānāyitā śrutvā priyaṃ rāmābhiṣecanam // Ram_2,4.31
GE09ram_02_u:405: tasmin kāle hi kausalyā tasthāv āmīlitekṣaṇā
GE09ram_02_u:412: uvāca vacanaṃ rāmo harṣayaṃs tām idaṃ tadā // Ram_2,4.34
GE09ram_02_u:415: bhavitā śvo 'bhiṣeko me yathā me śāsanaṃ pituḥ // Ram_2,4.35
GE09ram_02_u:418: evam ṛtvigupādhyāyaiḥ saha mām uktavān pitā // Ram_2,4.36
GE09ram_02_u:420: yāni yāny atra yogyāni śvobhāviny abhiṣecane
GE09ram_02_u:421: tāni me maṅgalāny adya vaidehyāś caiva kāraya // Ram_2,4.37
GE09ram_02_u:424: harṣabāṣpakalaṃ vākyam idaṃ rāmam abhāṣata // Ram_2,4.38
GE09ram_02_u:426: vatsa rāma ciraṃ jīva hatās te paripanthinaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:427: jñātīn me tvaṃ śriyā yuktaḥ sumitrāyāś ca nandaya // Ram_2,4.39
GE09ram_02_u:429: kalyāṇe bata nakṣatre mayi jāto 'si putraka
GE09ram_02_u:430: yena tvayā daśaratho guṇair ārādhitaḥ pitā // Ram_2,4.40
GE09ram_02_u:432: amoghaṃ bata me kṣāntaṃ puruṣe puṣkarekṣaṇe
GE09ram_02_u:433: yeyam ikṣvākurājyaśrīḥ putra tvāṃ saṃśrayiṣyati // Ram_2,4.41
GE09ram_02_u:435: ity evam ukto mātredaṃ rāmo bhrātaram abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:436: prāñjaliṃ prahvam āsīnam abhivīkṣya smayann iva // Ram_2,4.42
GE09ram_02_u:438: lakṣmaṇemāṃ mayā sārdhaṃ praśādhi tvaṃ vasuṃdharām
GE09ram_02_u:439: dvitīyaṃ me 'ntarātmānaṃ tvām iyaṃ śrīr upasthitā // Ram_2,4.43
GE09ram_02_u:441: saumitre bhuṅkṣva bhogāṃs tvam iṣṭān rājyaphalāni ca
GE09ram_02_u:442: jīvitaṃ ca hi rājyaṃ ca tvadartham abhikāmaye // Ram_2,4.44
GE09ram_02_u:444: ity uktvā lakṣmaṇaṃ rāmo mātarāv abhivādya ca
GE09ram_02_u:445: abhyanujñāpya sītāṃ ca jagāma svaṃ niveśanam // Ram_2,4.45
GE09ram_02_u:448: purohitaṃ samāhūya vasiṣṭham idam abravīt // Ram_2,5.1
GE09ram_02_u:453: tatheti ca sa rājānam uktvā vedavidāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:454: svayaṃ vasiṣṭho bhagavān yayau rāmaniveśanam // Ram_2,5.3
GE09ram_02_u:457: tisraḥ kakṣyā rathenaiva viveśa munisattamaḥ // Ram_2,5.4
GE09ram_02_u:459: tam āgatam ṛṣiṃ rāmas tvarann iva sasaṃbhramaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:460: mānayiṣyan sa mānārhaṃ niścakrāma niveśanāt // Ram_2,5.5
GE09ram_02_u:465: sa cainaṃ praśritaṃ dṛṣṭvā sambhāṣyābhiprasādya ca
GE09ram_02_u:466: priyārhaṃ harṣayan rāmam ity uvāca purohitaḥ // Ram_2,5.7
GE09ram_02_u:468: prasannas te pitā rāma yauvarājyam avāpsyasi
GE09ram_02_u:469: upavāsaṃ bhavān adya karotu saha sītayā // Ram_2,5.8
GE09ram_02_u:471: prātas tvām abhiṣektā hi yauvarājye narādhipaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:472: pitā daśarathaḥ prītyā yayātiṃ nahuṣo yathā // Ram_2,5.9
GE09ram_02_u:474: ity uktvā sa tadā rāmam upavāsaṃ yatavratam
GE09ram_02_u:475: mantravat kārayāmāsa vaidehyā sahitaṃ muniḥ // Ram_2,5.10
GE09ram_02_u:477: tato yathāvad rāmeṇa sa rājño gurur arcitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:480: suhṛdbhis tatra rāmo 'pi tān anujñāpya sarvaśaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:481: sabhājito viveśātha tān anujñāpya sarvaśaḥ // Ram_2,5.12
GE09ram_02_u:487: nirgatya dadṛśe mārgaṃ vasiṣṭho janasaṃvṛtam // Ram_2,5.14
GE09ram_02_u:499: rāmābhiṣekam ākāṅkṣann ākāṅkṣann udayaṃ raveḥ // Ram_2,5.18
GE09ram_02_u:502: utsuko 'bhūj jano draṣṭuṃ tam ayodhyāmahotsavam // Ram_2,5.19
GE09ram_02_u:505: vyūhann iva janaughaṃ taṃ śanai rājakulaṃ yayau // Ram_2,5.20
GE09ram_02_u:510: tam āgatam abhiprekṣya hitvā rājāsanaṃ nṛpaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:511: papraccha sa ca tasmai tat kṛtam ity abhyavedayat // Ram_2,5.22
GE09ram_02_u:513: guruṇā tv abhyanujñāto manujaughaṃ visṛjya tam
GE09ram_02_u:514: viveśāntaḥpuraṃ rājā siṃho giriguhām iva // Ram_2,5.23
GE09ram_02_u:517: vidīpayaṃś cāru viveśa pārthivaḥ śaśīva tārāgaṇasaṃkulaṃ nabhaḥ // Ram_2,5.24
GE09ram_02_u:520: saha patnyā viśālākṣyā nārāyaṇam upāgamat // Ram_2,6.1
GE09ram_02_u:522: pragṛhya śirasā pātrīṃ haviṣo vidhivat tadā
GE09ram_02_u:525: śeṣaṃ ca haviṣas tasya prāśyāśāsyātmanaḥ priyam
GE09ram_02_u:526: dhyāyan nārāyaṇaṃ devaṃ svāstīrṇe kuśasaṃstare // Ram_2,6.3
GE09ram_02_u:529: śrīmaty āyatane viṣṇoḥ śiśye naravarātmajaḥ // Ram_2,6.4
GE09ram_02_u:535: pūrvāṃ saṃdhyām upāsīno jajāpa yatamānasaḥ // Ram_2,6.6
GE09ram_02_u:543: kṛtopavāsaṃ tu tadā vaidehyā saha rāghavam
GE09ram_02_u:544: ayodhyānilayaḥ śrutvā sarvaḥ pramudito janaḥ // Ram_2,6.9
GE09ram_02_u:547: prabhātāṃ rajanīṃ dṛṣṭvā cakre śobhāṃ parāṃ punaḥ // Ram_2,6.10
GE09ram_02_u:550: catuṣpatheṣu rathyāsu caityeṣv aṭṭālakeṣu ca // Ram_2,6.11
GE09ram_02_u:553: kuṭumbināṃ samṛddheṣu śrīmatsu bhavaneṣu ca // Ram_2,6.12
GE09ram_02_u:555: sabhāsu caiva sarvāsu vṛkṣeṣv ālakṣiteṣu ca
GE09ram_02_u:556: dhvajāḥ samucchritāś citrāḥ patākāś cābhavaṃs tadā // Ram_2,6.13
GE09ram_02_u:559: manaḥkarṇasukhā vācaḥ śuśruvuś ca tatas tataḥ // Ram_2,6.14
GE09ram_02_u:561: rāmābhiṣekayuktāś ca kathāś cakrur mitho janāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:562: rāmābhiṣeke samprāpte catvareṣu gṛheṣu ca // Ram_2,6.15
GE09ram_02_u:565: rāmābhiṣekasaṃyuktāś cakrur eva mithaḥ kathāḥ // Ram_2,6.16
GE09ram_02_u:568: rājamārgaḥ kṛtaḥ śrīmān paurai rāmābhiṣecane // Ram_2,6.17
GE09ram_02_u:571: dīpavṛkṣāṃs tathā cakrur anu rathyāsu sarvaśaḥ // Ram_2,6.18
GE09ram_02_u:576: sametya saṃghaśaḥ sarve catvareṣu sabhāsu ca
GE09ram_02_u:577: kathayanto mithas tatra praśaśaṃsur janādhipam // Ram_2,6.20
GE09ram_02_u:580: jñātvā yo vṛddham ātmānaṃ rāmaṃ rājye 'hbiṣekṣyati // Ram_2,6.21
GE09ram_02_u:582: sarve hy anugṛhītāḥ sma yan no rāmo mahīpatiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:586: yathā ca bhrātṛṣu snigdhas tathāsmāsv api rāghavaḥ // Ram_2,6.23
GE09ram_02_u:592: digbhyo 'pi śrutavṛttāntāḥ prāptā jānapadā janāḥ // Ram_2,6.25
GE09ram_02_u:594: te tu digbhyaḥ purīṃ prāptā draṣṭuṃ rāmābhiṣecanam
GE09ram_02_u:595: rāmasya pūrayāmāsuḥ purīṃ jānapadā janāḥ // Ram_2,6.26
GE09ram_02_u:597: janaughais tair visarpadbhiḥ śuśruve tatra nisvanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:600: tatas tad indrakṣayasaṃnibhaṃ puraṃ didṛkṣubhir jānapadair upāgataiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:601: samantataḥ sasvanam ākulaṃ babhau samudrayādobhir ivārṇavodakam // Ram_2,6.28
GE09ram_02_u:603: jñātidāsī yato jātā kaikeyyās tu sahoṣitā
GE09ram_02_u:607: ayodhyāṃ mantharā tasmāt prāsādād anvavaikṣata // Ram_2,7.2
GE09ram_02_u:610: siktāṃ candanatoyaiś ca śiraḥsnātajanair vṛtām // Ram_2,7.3
GE09ram_02_u:612: avidūre sthitāṃ dṛṣṭvā dhātrīṃ papraccha mantharā
GE09ram_02_u:615: rāmamātā dhanaṃ kiṃ nu janebhyaḥ samprayacchati
GE09ram_02_u:616: atimātraṃ praharṣo 'yaṃ kiṃ janasya ca śaṃsa me
GE09ram_02_u:617: kārayiṣyati kiṃ vāpi samprahṛṣṭo mahīpatiḥ // Ram_2,7.5
GE09ram_02_u:620: ācacakṣe 'tha kubjāyai bhūyasīṃ rāghave śriyam // Ram_2,7.6
GE09ram_02_u:625: dhātryās tu vacanaṃ śrutvā kubjā kṣipram amarṣitā
GE09ram_02_u:629: śayānām etya kaikeyīm idaṃ vacanam abravīt // Ram_2,7.9
GE09ram_02_u:631: uttiṣṭha mūḍhe kiṃ śeṣe bhayaṃ tvām abhivartate
GE09ram_02_u:632: upaplutamahaughena kim ātmānaṃ na budhyase // Ram_2,7.10
GE09ram_02_u:635: calaṃ hi tava saubhāgyaṃ nadyāḥ srota ivoṣṇage // Ram_2,7.11
GE09ram_02_u:637: evam uktā tu kaikeyī ruṣṭayā paruṣaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:638: kubjayā pāpadarśinyā viṣādam agamat param // Ram_2,7.12
GE09ram_02_u:640: kaikeyī tv abravīt kubjāṃ kaccit kṣemaṃ na manthare
GE09ram_02_u:641: viṣaṇṇavadanāṃ hi tvāṃ lakṣaye bhṛśaduḥkhitām // Ram_2,7.13
GE09ram_02_u:643: mantharā tu vacaḥ śrutvā kaikeyyā madhurākṣaram
GE09ram_02_u:646: sā viṣaṇṇatarā bhūtvā kubjā tasyā hitaiṣiṇī
GE09ram_02_u:647: viṣādayantī provāca bhedayantī ca rāghavam // Ram_2,7.15
GE09ram_02_u:655: tava duḥkhena kaikeyi mama duḥkhaṃ mahad bhavet
GE09ram_02_u:656: tvadvṛddhau mama vṛddhiś ca bhaved atra na saṃśayaḥ // Ram_2,7.18
GE09ram_02_u:659: ugratvaṃ rājadharmāṇāṃ kathaṃ devi na budhyase // Ram_2,7.19
GE09ram_02_u:661: dharmavādī śaṭho bhartā ślakṣṇavādī ca dāruṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:662: śuddhabhāve na jānīṣe tenaivam atisaṃdhitā // Ram_2,7.20
GE09ram_02_u:665: arthenaivādya te bhartā kausalyāṃ yojayiṣyati // Ram_2,7.21
GE09ram_02_u:667: apavāhya sa duṣṭātmā bharataṃ tava bandhuṣu
GE09ram_02_u:668: kālyaṃ sthāpayitā rāmaṃ rājye nihatakaṇṭake // Ram_2,7.22
GE09ram_02_u:671: āśīviṣa ivāṅkena bāle paridhṛtas tvayā // Ram_2,7.23
GE09ram_02_u:673: yathā hi kuryāt sarpo vā śatrur vā pratyupekṣitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:674: rājñā daśarathenādya saputrā tvaṃ tathā kṛtā // Ram_2,7.24
GE09ram_02_u:677: rāmaṃ sthāpayatā rājye sānubandhā hatā hy asi // Ram_2,7.25
GE09ram_02_u:679: sā prāptakālaṃ kaikeyi kṣipraṃ kuru hitaṃ tava
GE09ram_02_u:680: trāyasva putram ātmānaṃ māṃ ca vismayadarśane // Ram_2,7.26
GE09ram_02_u:682: mantharāyā vacaḥ śrutvā śayanāt sa śubhānanā
GE09ram_02_u:683: evam ābharaṇaṃ tasyai kubjāyai pradadau śubham // Ram_2,7.27
GE09ram_02_u:685: dattvā tv ābharaṇaṃ tasyai kubjāyai pramadottamā
GE09ram_02_u:686: kaikeyī mantharāṃ hṛṣṭā punar evābravīd idam // Ram_2,7.28
GE09ram_02_u:688: idaṃ tu manthare mahyam ākhyāsi paramaṃ priyam
GE09ram_02_u:689: etan me priyam ākhyātuḥ kiṃ vā bhūyaḥ karomi te // Ram_2,7.29
GE09ram_02_u:691: rāme vā bharate vāhaṃ viśeṣaṃ nopalakṣaye
GE09ram_02_u:692: tasmāt tuṣṭāsmi yad rājā rāmaṃ rājye 'bhiṣekṣyati // Ram_2,7.30
GE09ram_02_u:694: na me paraṃ kiṃcid itas tvayā punaḥ priyaṃ priyārhe suvacaṃ vaco varam
GE09ram_02_u:695: tathā hy avocas tvam ataḥ priyottaraṃ varaṃ paraṃ te pradadāmi taṃ vṛṇu // Ram_2,7.31
GE09ram_02_u:697: mantharā tv abhyasūyyainām utsṛjyābharaṇaṃ ca tat
GE09ram_02_u:700: harṣaṃ kim idam asthāne kṛtavaty asi bāliśe
GE09ram_02_u:704: yauvarājyena mahatā śvaḥ puṣyeṇa dvijottamaiḥ // Ram_2,8.3
GE09ram_02_u:706: prāptāṃ sumahatīṃ prītiṃ pratītāṃ tāṃ hatadviṣam
GE09ram_02_u:707: upasthāsyasi kausalyāṃ dāsīva tvaṃ kṛtāñjaliḥ // Ram_2,8.4
GE09ram_02_u:709: hṛṣṭāḥ khalu bhaviṣyanti rāmasya paramāḥ striyaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:710: aprahṛṣṭā bhaviṣyanti snuṣās te bharatakṣaye // Ram_2,8.5
GE09ram_02_u:712: tāṃ dṛṣṭvā paramaprītāṃ bruvantīṃ mantharāṃ tataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:713: rāmasyaiva guṇān devī kaikeyī praśaśaṃsa ha // Ram_2,8.6
GE09ram_02_u:715: dharmajño gurubhir dāntaḥ kṛtajñaḥ satyavāk śuciḥ
GE09ram_02_u:716: rāmo rājñaḥ suto jyeṣṭho yauvarājyam ato 'rhati // Ram_2,8.7
GE09ram_02_u:718: bhrātṝn bhṛtyāṃś ca dīrghāyuḥ pitṛvat pālayiṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:719: saṃtapyase kathaṃ kubje śrutvā rāmābhiṣecanam // Ram_2,8.8
GE09ram_02_u:721: bharataś cāpi rāmasya dhruvaṃ varṣaśatāt param
GE09ram_02_u:724: sā tvam abhyudaye prāpte vartamāne ca manthare
GE09ram_02_u:726: kausalyāto 'tiriktaṃ ca sa tu śuśrūṣate hi mām // Ram_2,8.10
GE09ram_02_u:729: dīrgham uṣṇaṃ viniḥśvasya kaikeyīm idam abravīt // Ram_2,8.11
GE09ram_02_u:734: bhavitā rāghavo rājā rāghavasya ca yaḥ sutaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:735: rājavaṃśāt tu bharataḥ kaikeyi parihāsyate // Ram_2,8.13
GE09ram_02_u:737: na hi rājñaḥ sutāḥ sarve rājye tiṣṭhanti bhāmini
GE09ram_02_u:738: sthāpyamāneṣu sarveṣu sumahān anayo bhavet // Ram_2,8.14
GE09ram_02_u:740: tasmāj jyeṣṭhe hi kaikeyi rājyatantrāṇi pārthivāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:741: sthāpayanty anavadyāṅgi guṇavatsv itareṣv api // Ram_2,8.15
GE09ram_02_u:744: anāthavat sukhebhyaś ca rājavaṃśāc ca vatsale // Ram_2,8.16
GE09ram_02_u:746: sāhaṃ tvadarthe samprāptā tvaṃ tu māṃ nāvabudhyase
GE09ram_02_u:747: sapatnivṛddhau yā me tvaṃ pradeyaṃ dātum icchasi // Ram_2,8.17
GE09ram_02_u:749: dhruvaṃ tu bharataṃ rāmaḥ prāpya rājyam akaṇṭakam
GE09ram_02_u:750: deśāntaraṃ nāyayitvā lokāntaram athāpi vā // Ram_2,8.18
GE09ram_02_u:752: bāla eva hi mātulyaṃ bharato nāyitas tvayā
GE09ram_02_u:753: saṃnikarṣāc ca sauhārdaṃ jāyate sthāvareṣv api // Ram_2,8.19
GE09ram_02_u:755: goptā hi rāmaṃ saumitrir lakṣmaṇaṃ cāpi rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:756: aśvinor iva saubhrātraṃ tayor lokeṣu viśrutam // Ram_2,8.20
GE09ram_02_u:758: tasmān na lakṣmaṇe rāmaḥ pāpaṃ kiṃcit kariṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:759: rāmas tu bharate pāpaṃ kuryād iti na saṃśayaḥ // Ram_2,8.21
GE09ram_02_u:761: tasmād rājagṛhād eva vanaṃ gacchatu te sutaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:762: etaddhi rocate mahyaṃ bhṛśaṃ cāpi hitaṃ tava // Ram_2,8.22
GE09ram_02_u:764: evaṃ te jñātipakṣasya śreyaś caiva bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:765: yadi ced bharato dharmāt pitryaṃ rājyam avāpsyati // Ram_2,8.23
GE09ram_02_u:767: sa te sukhocito bālo rāmasya sahajo ripuḥ
GE09ram_02_u:768: samṛddhārthasya naṣṭārtho jīviṣyati kathaṃ vaśe // Ram_2,8.24
GE09ram_02_u:771: pracchādyamānaṃ rāmeṇa bharataṃ trātum arhasi // Ram_2,8.25
GE09ram_02_u:774: rāmamātā sapatnī te kathaṃ vairaṃ na yātayet // Ram_2,8.26
GE09ram_02_u:776: yadā hi rāmaḥ pṛthivīm avāpsyati dhruvaṃ pranaṣṭo bharato bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:777: ato hi saṃcintaya rājyam ātmaje parasya cādyaiva vivāsakāraṇam // Ram_2,8.27
GE09ram_02_u:779: evam uktā tu kaikeyī krodhena jvalitānanā
GE09ram_02_u:780: dīrgham uṣṇaṃ viniḥśvasya mantharām idam abravīt // Ram_2,9.1
GE09ram_02_u:782: adya rāmam itaḥ kṣipraṃ vanaṃ prasthāpayāmy aham
GE09ram_02_u:785: idaṃ tv idānīṃ saṃpaśya kenopāyena manthare
GE09ram_02_u:786: bharataḥ prāpnuyād rājyaṃ na tu rāmaḥ kathaṃcana // Ram_2,9.3
GE09ram_02_u:788: evam uktā tayā devyā mantharā pāpadarśinī
GE09ram_02_u:789: rāmārtham upahiṃsantī kaikeyīm idam abravīt // Ram_2,9.4
GE09ram_02_u:791: hantedānīṃ pravakṣyāmi kaikeyi śrūyatāṃ ca me
GE09ram_02_u:792: yathā te bharato rājyaṃ putraḥ prāpsyati kevalam // Ram_2,9.5
GE09ram_02_u:794: śrutvaivaṃ vacanaṃ tasyā mantharāyās tu kaikayī
GE09ram_02_u:795: kiṃcid utthāya śayanāt svāstīrṇād idam abravīt // Ram_2,9.6
GE09ram_02_u:798: bharataḥ prāpnuyād rājyaṃ na tu rāmaḥ kathaṃcana // Ram_2,9.7
GE09ram_02_u:800: evam uktā tayā devyā mantharā pāpadarśinī
GE09ram_02_u:801: rāmārtham upahiṃsantī kubjā vacanam abravīt // Ram_2,9.8
GE09ram_02_u:803: tava devāsure yuddhe saha rājarṣibhiḥ patiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:804: agacchat tvām upādāya devarājasya sāhyakṛt // Ram_2,9.9
GE09ram_02_u:806: diśam āsthāya kaikeyi dakṣiṇāṃ daṇḍakān prati
GE09ram_02_u:807: vaijayantam iti khyātaṃ puraṃ yatra timidhvajaḥ // Ram_2,9.10
GE09ram_02_u:809: sa śambara iti khyātaḥ śatamāyo mahāsuraḥ
GE09ram_02_u:810: dadau śakrasya saṃgrāmaṃ devasaṃghair anirjitaḥ // Ram_2,9.11
GE09ram_02_u:812: tasmin mahati saṃgrāme rājā daśarathas tadā
GE09ram_02_u:813: apavāhya tvayā devi saṃgrāmān naṣṭacetanaḥ // Ram_2,9.12
GE09ram_02_u:815: tatrāpi vikṣataḥ śastraiḥ patis te rakṣitas tvayā
GE09ram_02_u:816: tuṣṭena tena dattau te dvau varau śubhadarśane // Ram_2,9.13
GE09ram_02_u:818: sa tvayoktaḥ patir devi yadeccheyaṃ tadā varau
GE09ram_02_u:819: gṛhṇīyām iti tat tena tathety uktaṃ mahātmanā
GE09ram_02_u:820: anabhijñā hy ahaṃ devi tvayaiva kathitaṃ purā // Ram_2,9.14
GE09ram_02_u:823: pravrājanaṃ ca rāmasya tvaṃ varṣāṇi caturdaśa // Ram_2,9.15
GE09ram_02_u:827: mā smainaṃ pratyudīkṣethā mā cainam abhibhāṣathāḥ // Ram_2,9.16
GE09ram_02_u:829: dayitā tvaṃ sadā bhartur atra me nāsti saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:830: tvatkṛte ca mahārājo viśed api hutāśanam // Ram_2,9.17
GE09ram_02_u:832: na tvāṃ krodhayituṃ śakto na kruddhāṃ pratyudīkṣitum
GE09ram_02_u:833: tava priyārthaṃ rājā hi prāṇān api parityajet // Ram_2,9.18
GE09ram_02_u:835: na hy atikramituṃ śaktas tava vākyaṃ mahīpatiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:839: dadyād daśaratho rājā mā sma teṣu manaḥ kṛthāḥ // Ram_2,9.20
GE09ram_02_u:841: yau tau devāsure yuddhe varau daśaratho 'dadāt
GE09ram_02_u:842: tau smāraya mahābhāge so 'rtho mā tvām atikramet // Ram_2,9.21
GE09ram_02_u:844: yadā tu te varaṃ dadyāt svayam utthāpya rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:845: vyavasthāpya mahārājaṃ tvam imaṃ vṛṇuyā varam // Ram_2,9.22
GE09ram_02_u:847: rāmaṃ pravrājayāraṇye nava varṣāṇi pañca ca
GE09ram_02_u:848: bharataḥ kriyatāṃ rājā pṛthivyāṃ pārthivarṣabhaḥ // Ram_2,9.23
GE09ram_02_u:851: bharataś ca hatāmitras tava rājā bhaviṣyati // Ram_2,9.24
GE09ram_02_u:853: yena kālena rāmaś ca vanāt pratyāgamiṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:854: tena kālena putras te kṛtamūlo bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:855: saṃgṛhītamanuṣyaś ca suhṛdbhiḥ sārdham ātmavān // Ram_2,9.25
GE09ram_02_u:857: prāptakālaṃ tu te manye rājānaṃ vītasādhvasā
GE09ram_02_u:860: anartham artharūpeṇa grāhitā sā tatas tayā
GE09ram_02_u:861: hṛṣṭā pratītā kaikeyī mantharām idam abravīt // Ram_2,9.27
GE09ram_02_u:864: pṛthivyām asi kubjānām uttamā buddhiniścaye // Ram_2,9.28
GE09ram_02_u:866: tvam eva tu mamārtheṣu nityayuktā hitaiṣiṇī
GE09ram_02_u:867: nāhaṃ samavabudhyeyaṃ kubje rājñaś cikīrṣitam // Ram_2,9.29
GE09ram_02_u:870: tvaṃ padmam iva vātena saṃnatā priyadarśanā // Ram_2,9.30
GE09ram_02_u:872: uras te 'bhiniviṣṭaṃ vai yāvat skandhāt samunnatam
GE09ram_02_u:873: adhastāc codaraṃ śāntaṃ sunābham iva lajjitam // Ram_2,9.31
GE09ram_02_u:876: jaṅghe bhṛśam upanyaste pādau cāpy āyatāv ubhau // Ram_2,9.32
GE09ram_02_u:879: agrato mama gacchantī rājahaṃsīva rājase // Ram_2,9.33
GE09ram_02_u:881: tavedaṃ sthagu yad dīrghaṃ rathaghoṇam ivāyatam
GE09ram_02_u:882: matayaḥ kṣatravidyāś ca māyāś cātra vasanti te // Ram_2,9.34
GE09ram_02_u:884: atra te pratimokṣyāmi mālāṃ kubje hiraṇmayīm
GE09ram_02_u:885: abhiṣikte ca bharate rāghave ca vanaṃ gate // Ram_2,9.35
GE09ram_02_u:888: labdhārthā ca pratītā ca lepayiṣyāmi te sthagu // Ram_2,9.36
GE09ram_02_u:890: mukhe ca tilakaṃ citraṃ jātarūpamayaṃ śubham
GE09ram_02_u:891: kārayiṣyāmi te kubje śubhāny ābharaṇāni ca // Ram_2,9.37
GE09ram_02_u:895: gamiṣyasi gatiṃ mukhyāṃ garvayantī dviṣajjanam // Ram_2,9.38
GE09ram_02_u:898: pādau paricariṣyanti yathaiva tvaṃ sadā mama // Ram_2,9.39
GE09ram_02_u:900: iti praśasyamānā sā kaikeyīm idam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:901: śayānāṃ śayane śubhre vedyām agniśikhām iva // Ram_2,9.40
GE09ram_02_u:904: uttiṣṭha kuru kalyāṇaṃ rājānam anudarśaya // Ram_2,9.41
GE09ram_02_u:906: tathā protsāhitā devī gatvā mantharayā saha
GE09ram_02_u:910: avamucya varārhāṇi śubhāny ābharaṇāni ca // Ram_2,9.43
GE09ram_02_u:912: tato hemopamā tatra kubjā vākyavaśaṃ gatā
GE09ram_02_u:913: saṃviśya bhūmau kaikeyī mantharām idam abravīt // Ram_2,9.44
GE09ram_02_u:915: iha vā māṃ mṛtāṃ kubje nṛpāyāvedayiṣyasi
GE09ram_02_u:916: vanaṃ tu rāghave prāpte bharataḥ prāpsyati kṣitim // Ram_2,9.45
GE09ram_02_u:918: athaitad uktvā vacanaṃ sudāruṇaṃ nidhāya sarvābharaṇāni bhāminī
GE09ram_02_u:919: asaṃvṛtām āstaraṇena medinīṃ tadādhiśiśye patiteva kiṃnarī // Ram_2,9.46
GE09ram_02_u:922: narendrapatnī vimanā babhūva sā tamovṛtā dyaur iva magnatārakā // Ram_2,9.47
GE09ram_02_u:925: priyārhāṃ priyam ākhyātuṃ viveśāntaḥpuraṃ vaśī // Ram_2,10.1
GE09ram_02_u:927: tāṃ tatra patitāṃ bhūmau śayānām atathocitām
GE09ram_02_u:928: pratapta iva duḥkhena so 'paśyaj jagatīpatiḥ // Ram_2,10.2
GE09ram_02_u:930: sa vṛddhas taruṇīṃ bhāryāṃ prāṇebhyo 'pi garīyasīm
GE09ram_02_u:933: kareṇum iva digdhena viddhāṃ mṛgayuṇā vane
GE09ram_02_u:934: mahāgaja ivāraṇye snehāt parimamarśa tām // Ram_2,10.4
GE09ram_02_u:937: kāmī kamalapattrākṣīm uvāca vanitām idam // Ram_2,10.5
GE09ram_02_u:939: na te 'ham abhijānāmi krodham ātmani saṃśritam
GE09ram_02_u:940: devi kenābhiyuktāsi kena vāsi vimānitā // Ram_2,10.6
GE09ram_02_u:942: yad idaṃ mama duḥkhāya śeṣe kalyāṇi pāṃsuṣu
GE09ram_02_u:943: bhūmau śeṣe kimarthaṃ tvaṃ mayi kalyāṇacetasi
GE09ram_02_u:946: santi me kuśalā vaidyā abhituṣṭāś ca sarvaśaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:947: sukhitāṃ tvāṃ kariṣyanti vyādhim ācakṣva bhāmini // Ram_2,10.8
GE09ram_02_u:949: kasya vā te priyaṃ kāryaṃ kena vā vipriyaṃ kṛtam
GE09ram_02_u:950: kaḥ priyaṃ labhatām adya ko vā sumahad apriyam // Ram_2,10.9
GE09ram_02_u:952: avadhyo vadhyatāṃ ko vā vadhyaḥ ko vā vimucyatām
GE09ram_02_u:953: daridraḥ ko bhavatv āḍhyo dravyavān vāpy akiñcanaḥ // Ram_2,10.10
GE09ram_02_u:955: ahaṃ caiva madīyāś ca sarve tava vaśānugāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:956: na te kaṃcid abhiprāyaṃ vyāhantum aham utsahe // Ram_2,10.11
GE09ram_02_u:959: yāvad āvartate cakraṃ tāvatī me vasuṃdharā // Ram_2,10.12
GE09ram_02_u:961: tathoktā sā samāśvastā vaktukāmā tad apriyam
GE09ram_02_u:964: nāsmi viprakṛtā deva kenacin na vimānitā
GE09ram_02_u:965: abhiprāyas tu me kaścit tam icchāmi tvayā kṛtam // Ram_2,10.14
GE09ram_02_u:967: pratijñāṃ pratijānīṣva yadi tvaṃ kartum icchasi
GE09ram_02_u:968: atha tad vyāhariṣyāmi yad abhiprārthitaṃ mayā // Ram_2,10.15
GE09ram_02_u:970: evam uktas tayā rājā priyayā strīvaśaṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:971: tām uvāca mahātejāḥ kaikeyīm īṣadutsmitaḥ // Ram_2,10.16
GE09ram_02_u:973: avalipte na jānāsi tvattaḥ priyataro mama
GE09ram_02_u:974: manujo manujavyāghrād rāmād anyo na vidyate // Ram_2,10.17
GE09ram_02_u:976: bhadre hṛdayam apy etad anumṛśyoddharasva me
GE09ram_02_u:977: etat samīkṣya kaikeyi brūhi yat sādhu manyase // Ram_2,10.18
GE09ram_02_u:979: balam ātmani paśyantī na māṃ śaṅkitum arhasi
GE09ram_02_u:980: kariṣyāmi tava prītiṃ sukṛtenāpi te śape // Ram_2,10.19
GE09ram_02_u:982: tena vākyena saṃhṛṣṭā tam abhiprāyam ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:985: yathākrameṇa śapasi varaṃ mama dadāsi ca
GE09ram_02_u:986: tac chṛṇvantu trayastriṃśad devāḥ sendrapurogamāḥ // Ram_2,10.21
GE09ram_02_u:988: candrādityau nabhaś caiva grahā rātryahanī diśaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:989: jagac ca pṛthivī caiva sagandharvā sarākṣasā // Ram_2,10.22
GE09ram_02_u:992: yāni cānyāni bhūtāni jānīyur bhāṣitaṃ tava // Ram_2,10.23
GE09ram_02_u:995: varaṃ mama dadāty eṣa tan me śṛṇvantu devatāḥ // Ram_2,10.24
GE09ram_02_u:998: tataḥ param uvācedaṃ varadaṃ kāmamohitam // Ram_2,10.25
GE09ram_02_u:1000: varau yau me tvayā deva tadā dattau mahīpate
GE09ram_02_u:1001: tau tāvad aham adyaiva vakṣyāmi śṛṇu me vacaḥ // Ram_2,10.26
GE09ram_02_u:1006: nava pañca ca varṣāṇi daṇḍakāraṇyam āśritaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1010: adya caiva hi paśyeyaṃ prayāntaṃ rāghavaṃ vane // Ram_2,10.29
GE09ram_02_u:1012: tataḥ śrutvā mahārāja kaikeyyā dāruṇaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1013: vyathito vilavaś caiva vyāghrīṃ dṛṣṭvā yathā mṛgaḥ // Ram_2,10.30
GE09ram_02_u:1016: aho dhig iti sāmarṣo vācam uktvā narādhipaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1019: cireṇa tu nṛpaḥ saṃjñāṃ pratilabhya suduḥkhitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1020: kaikeyīm abravīt kruddhaḥ pradahann iva cakṣuṣā // Ram_2,10.32
GE09ram_02_u:1023: kiṃ kṛtaṃ tava rāmeṇa pāpe pāpaṃ mayāpi vā // Ram_2,10.33
GE09ram_02_u:1025: sadā te jananītulyāṃ vṛttiṃ vahati rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1026: tasyaiva tvam anarthāya kiṃnimittam ihodyatā // Ram_2,10.34
GE09ram_02_u:1029: avijñānān nṛpasutā vyālī tīkṣṇaviṣā yathā // Ram_2,10.35
GE09ram_02_u:1032: aparādhaṃ kam uddiśya tyakṣyāmīṣṭam ahaṃ sutam // Ram_2,10.36
GE09ram_02_u:1034: kausalyāṃ vā sumitrāṃ vā tyajeyam api vā śriyam
GE09ram_02_u:1035: jīvitaṃ vātmano rāmaṃ na tv eva pitṛvatsalam // Ram_2,10.37
GE09ram_02_u:1037: parā bhavati me prītir dṛṣṭvā tanayam agrajam
GE09ram_02_u:1038: apaśyatas tu me rāmaṃ naṣṭā bhavati cetanā // Ram_2,10.38
GE09ram_02_u:1040: tiṣṭhel loko vinā sūryaṃ sasyaṃ vā salilaṃ vinā
GE09ram_02_u:1041: na tu rāmaṃ vinā dehe tiṣṭhet tu mama jīvitam // Ram_2,10.39
GE09ram_02_u:1043: tad alaṃ tyajyatām eṣa niścayaḥ pāpaniścaye
GE09ram_02_u:1044: api te caraṇau mūrdhnā spṛśāmy eṣa prasīda me // Ram_2,10.40
GE09ram_02_u:1046: sa bhūmipālo vilapann anāthavat striyā gṛhīto hṛdaye 'timātrayā
GE09ram_02_u:1047: papāta devyāś caraṇau prasāritāv ubhāv asaṃspṛśya yathāturas tathā // Ram_2,10.41
GE09ram_02_u:1050: yayātim iva puṇyānte devalokāt paricyutam // Ram_2,11.1
GE09ram_02_u:1053: punar ākārayāmāsa tam eva varam aṅganā // Ram_2,11.2
GE09ram_02_u:1056: mama cemaṃ varaṃ kasmād vidhārayitum icchasi // Ram_2,11.3
GE09ram_02_u:1058: evam uktas tu kaikeyyā rājā daśarathas tadā
GE09ram_02_u:1059: pratyuvāca tataḥ kruddho muhūrtaṃ vihvalann iva // Ram_2,11.4
GE09ram_02_u:1061: mṛte mayi gate rāme vanaṃ manujapuṃgave
GE09ram_02_u:1062: hantānārye mamāmitre rāmaḥ pravrājito vanam // Ram_2,11.5
GE09ram_02_u:1064: yadi satyaṃ bravīmy etat tad asatyaṃ bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:1065: akīrtir atulā loke dhruvaṃ paribhavaś ca me // Ram_2,11.6
GE09ram_02_u:1068: astam abhyagamat sūryo rajanī cābhyavartata // Ram_2,11.7
GE09ram_02_u:1071: rājño vilapamānasya na vyabhāsata śarvarī // Ram_2,11.8
GE09ram_02_u:1077: atha vā gamyatāṃ śīghraṃ nāham icchāmi nirghṛṇām
GE09ram_02_u:1078: nṛśaṃsāṃ kaikeyīṃ draṣṭuṃ yat kṛte vyasanaṃ mahat // Ram_2,11.10
GE09ram_02_u:1080: evam uktvā tato rājā kaikeyīṃ saṃyatāñjaliḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1081: prasādayāmāsa punaḥ kaikeyīṃ cedam abravīt // Ram_2,11.11
GE09ram_02_u:1084: prasādaḥ kriyatāṃ devi bhadre rājño viśeṣataḥ // Ram_2,11.12
GE09ram_02_u:1087: kuru sādhu prasādaṃ me bāle sahṛdayā hy asi // Ram_2,11.13
GE09ram_02_u:1090: śrutvā vicitraṃ karuṇaṃ vilāpaṃ bhartur nṛśaṃsā na cakāra vākyam // Ram_2,11.14
GE09ram_02_u:1092: tataḥ sa rājā punar eva mūrchitaḥ priyām atuṣṭāṃ pratikūlabhāṣiṇīm
GE09ram_02_u:1093: samīkṣya putrasya vivāsanaṃ prati kṣitau visaṃjño nipapāta duḥkhitaḥ // Ram_2,11.15
GE09ram_02_u:1096: viveṣṭamānam udīkṣya saikṣvākam idam abravīt // Ram_2,12.1
GE09ram_02_u:1098: pāpaṃ kṛtveva kim idaṃ mama saṃśrutya saṃśravam
GE09ram_02_u:1099: śeṣe kṣititale sannaḥ sthityāṃ sthātuṃ tvam arhasi // Ram_2,12.2
GE09ram_02_u:1101: āhuḥ satyaṃ hi paramaṃ dharmaṃ dharmavido janāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1102: satyam āśritya hi mayā tvaṃ ca dharmaṃ pracoditaḥ // Ram_2,12.3
GE09ram_02_u:1104: saṃśrutya śaibyaḥ śyenāya svāṃ tanuṃ jagatīpatiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1105: pradāya pakṣiṇo rājañ jagāma gatim uttamām // Ram_2,12.4
GE09ram_02_u:1107: tathā hy alarkas tejasvī brāhmaṇe vedapārage
GE09ram_02_u:1108: yācamāne svake netre uddhṛtyāvimanā dadau // Ram_2,12.5
GE09ram_02_u:1110: saritāṃ tu patiḥ svalpāṃ maryādāṃ satyam anvitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1111: satyānurodhāt samaye velāṃ svāṃ nātivartate // Ram_2,12.6
GE09ram_02_u:1113: samayaṃ ca mamāryemaṃ yadi tvaṃ na kariṣyasi
GE09ram_02_u:1114: agratas te parityaktā parityakṣyāmi jīvitam // Ram_2,12.7
GE09ram_02_u:1117: nāśakat pāśam unmoktuṃ balir indrakṛtaṃ yathā // Ram_2,12.8
GE09ram_02_u:1120: sa dhuryo vai parispandan yugacakrāntaraṃ yathā // Ram_2,12.9
GE09ram_02_u:1122: vihvalābhyāṃ ca netrābhyām apaśyann iva bhūmipaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1123: kṛcchrād dhairyeṇa saṃstabhya kaikeyīm idam abravīt // Ram_2,12.10
GE09ram_02_u:1125: yas te mantrakṛtaḥ pāṇir agnau pāpe mayā dhṛtaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1126: taṃ tyajāmi svajaṃ caiva tava putraṃ saha tvayā // Ram_2,12.11
GE09ram_02_u:1129: uvāca paruṣaṃ vākyaṃ vākyajñā roṣamūrchitā // Ram_2,12.12
GE09ram_02_u:1131: kim idaṃ bhāṣase rājan vākyaṃ gararujopamam
GE09ram_02_u:1132: ānāyayitum akliṣṭaṃ putraṃ rāmam ihārhasi // Ram_2,12.13
GE09ram_02_u:1134: sthāpya rājye mama sutaṃ kṛtvā rāmaṃ vanecaram
GE09ram_02_u:1135: niḥsapatnāṃ ca māṃ kṛtvā kṛtakṛtyo bhaviṣyasi // Ram_2,12.14
GE09ram_02_u:1137: sa nunna iva tīkṣṇeṇa pratodena hayottamaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1138: rājā pracodito 'bhīkṣṇaṃ kaikeyīm idam abravīt // Ram_2,12.15
GE09ram_02_u:1140: dharmabandhena baddho 'smi naṣṭā ca mama cetanā
GE09ram_02_u:1141: jyeṣṭhaṃ putraṃ priyaṃ rāmaṃ draṣṭum icchāmi dhārmikam // Ram_2,12.16
GE09ram_02_u:1143: iti rājño vacaḥ śrutvā kaikeyī tadanantaram
GE09ram_02_u:1144: svayam evābravīt sūtaṃ gaccha tvaṃ rāmam ānaya // Ram_2,12.17
GE09ram_02_u:1146: tataḥ sa rājā taṃ sūtaṃ sannaharṣaḥ sutaṃ prati
GE09ram_02_u:1149: sumantraḥ karuṇaṃ śrutvā dṛṣṭvā dīnaṃ ca pārthivam
GE09ram_02_u:1150: pragṛhītāñjaliḥ kiṃcit tasmād deśād apākraman // Ram_2,12.19
GE09ram_02_u:1152: yadā vaktuṃ svayaṃ dainyān na śaśāka mahīpatiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1153: tadā sumantraṃ mantrajñā kaikeyī pratyuvāca ha // Ram_2,12.20
GE09ram_02_u:1155: sumantra rāmaṃ drakṣyāmi śīghram ānaya sundaram
GE09ram_02_u:1156: sa manyamānaḥ kalyāṇaṃ hṛdayena nananda ca // Ram_2,12.21
GE09ram_02_u:1161: iti sūto matiṃ kṛtvā harṣeṇa mahatā punaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1164: tataḥ purastāt sahasā vinirgato mahīpatīn dvāragatān vilokayan
GE09ram_02_u:1165: dadarśa paurān vividhān mahādhanān upasthitān dvāram upetya viṣṭhitān // Ram_2,12.24
GE09ram_02_u:1167: te tu tāṃ rajanīm uṣya brāhmaṇā vedapāragāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1170: amātyā balamukhyāś ca mukhyā ye nigamasya ca
GE09ram_02_u:1177: rāmaś ca samyagāstīrṇo bhāsvatā vyāghracarmaṇā // Ram_2,13.4
GE09ram_02_u:1180: yāś cānyāḥ saritaḥ puṇyā hradāḥ kūpāḥ sarāṃsi ca // Ram_2,13.5
GE09ram_02_u:1183: tābhyaś caivāhṛtaṃ toyaṃ samudrebhyaś ca sarvaśaḥ // Ram_2,13.6
GE09ram_02_u:1185: kṣaudraṃ dadhighṛtaṃ lājā darbhāḥ sumanasaḥ payaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1190: sajjaṃ tiṣṭhati rāmasya vālavyajanam uttamam // Ram_2,13.8
GE09ram_02_u:1195: pāṇḍuraś ca vṛṣaḥ sajjaḥ pāṇḍurāśvaś ca susthitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1196: prasrutaś ca gajaḥ śrīmān aupavāhyaḥ pratīkṣate // Ram_2,13.10
GE09ram_02_u:1199: vāditrāṇi ca sarvāṇi bandinaś ca tathāpare // Ram_2,13.11
GE09ram_02_u:1205: apaśyanto 'bruvan ko nu rājño naḥ prativedayet // Ram_2,13.13
GE09ram_02_u:1207: na paśyāmaś ca rājānam uditaś ca divākaraḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1208: yauvarājyābhiṣekaś ca sajjo rāmasya dhīmataḥ // Ram_2,13.14
GE09ram_02_u:1211: abravīt tān idaṃ sarvān sumantro rājasatkṛtaḥ // Ram_2,13.15
GE09ram_02_u:1213: ayaṃ pṛcchāmi vacanāt sukham āyuṣmatām aham
GE09ram_02_u:1219: gatā bhagavatī rātrir ahaḥ śivam upasthitam
GE09ram_02_u:1220: budhyasva nṛpaśārdūla kuru kāryam anantaram // Ram_2,13.18
GE09ram_02_u:1222: brāhmaṇā balamukhyāś ca naigamāś cāgatā nṛpa
GE09ram_02_u:1225: stuvantaṃ taṃ tadā sūtaṃ sumantraṃ mantrakovidam
GE09ram_02_u:1226: pratibudhya tato rājā idaṃ vacanam abravīt // Ram_2,13.20
GE09ram_02_u:1228: na caiva saṃprasupto 'ham ānayed āśu rāghavam
GE09ram_02_u:1229: iti rājā daśarathaḥ sūtaṃ tatrānvaśāt punaḥ // Ram_2,13.21
GE09ram_02_u:1231: sa rājavacanaṃ śrutvā śirasā pratipūjya tam
GE09ram_02_u:1232: nirjagāma nṛpāvāsān manyamānaḥ priyaṃ mahat // Ram_2,13.22
GE09ram_02_u:1235: sa sūtas tatra śuśrāva rāmādhikaraṇāḥ kathāḥ // Ram_2,13.23
GE09ram_02_u:1246: sa vājiyuktena rathena sārathir narākulaṃ rājakulaṃ vilokayan
GE09ram_02_u:1247: tataḥ samāsādya mahādhanaṃ mahat prahṛṣṭaromā sa babhūva sārathiḥ // Ram_2,13.27
GE09ram_02_u:1250: avāryamāṇaḥ praviveśa sārathiḥ prabhūtaratnaṃ makaro yathārṇavam // Ram_2,13.28
GE09ram_02_u:1253: praviviktāṃ tataḥ kakṣyām āsasāda purāṇavit // Ram_2,14.1
GE09ram_02_u:1259: dadarśa viṣṭhitān dvāri stryadhyakṣān susamāhitān // Ram_2,14.3
GE09ram_02_u:1268: dadarśa sūtaḥ paryaṅke sauvarṇe sottaracchade // Ram_2,14.6
GE09ram_02_u:1274: upetaṃ sītayā bhūyaś citrayā śaśinaṃ yathā // Ram_2,14.8
GE09ram_02_u:1277: vavande varadaṃ bandī niyamajño vinītavat // Ram_2,14.9
GE09ram_02_u:1282: kausalyā suprabhā deva pitā tvāṃ draṣṭum icchati
GE09ram_02_u:1283: mahiṣyā saha kaikeyyā gamyatāṃ tatra māciram // Ram_2,14.11
GE09ram_02_u:1285: evam uktas tu saṃhṛṣṭo narasiṃho mahādyutiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1286: tataḥ saṃmānayāmāsa sītām idam uvāca ha // Ram_2,14.12
GE09ram_02_u:1288: devi devaś ca devī ca samāgamya madantare
GE09ram_02_u:1294: yādṛśī pariṣat tatra tādṛśo dūta āgataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1295: dhruvam adyaiva māṃ rājā yauvarājye 'bhiṣekṣyati // Ram_2,14.15
GE09ram_02_u:1297: hanta śīghram ito gatvā drakṣyāmi ca mahīpatim
GE09ram_02_u:1298: saha tvaṃ parivāreṇa sukham āsva ramasva ca // Ram_2,14.16
GE09ram_02_u:1303: sa sarvān arthino dṛṣṭvā sametya pratinandya ca
GE09ram_02_u:1310: prayayau tūrṇam āsthāya rāghavo jvalitaḥ śriyā // Ram_2,14.20
GE09ram_02_u:1313: niketān niryayau śrīmān mahābhrād iva candramāḥ // Ram_2,14.21
GE09ram_02_u:1316: jugopa bhrātaraṃ bhrātā ratham āsthāya pṛṣṭhataḥ // Ram_2,14.22
GE09ram_02_u:1321: sa rāghavas tatra kathāpralāpaṃ śuśrāva lokasya samāgatasya
GE09ram_02_u:1322: ātmādhikārā vividhāś ca vācaḥ prahṛṣṭarūpasya pure janasya // Ram_2,14.24
GE09ram_02_u:1324: eṣa śriyaṃ gacchati rāghavo 'dya rājaprasādād vipulāṅgam iṣyan
GE09ram_02_u:1325: ete vayaṃ sarvasamṛddhakāmā yeṣām ayaṃ no bhavitā praśāstā
GE09ram_02_u:1326: lābho janasyāsya yad eṣa sarvaṃ prapatsyate rāṣṭram idaṃ cirāya // Ram_2,14.25
GE09ram_02_u:1328: sa ghoṣavadbhiś ca hayaiḥ sanāgaiḥ puraḥsaraiḥ svastikasūtamāgadhaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1329: mahīyamānaḥ pravaraiś ca vādakair abhiṣṭuto vaiśravaṇo yathā yayau // Ram_2,14.26
GE09ram_02_u:1332: prabhūtaratnaṃ bahupaṇyasaṃcayaṃ dadarśa rāmo ruciraṃ mahāpatham // Ram_2,14.27
GE09ram_02_u:1341: saṃvṛtaṃ vividhaiḥ paṇyair bhakṣyair uccāvacair api // Ram_2,15.3
GE09ram_02_u:1344: yathārhaṃ cāpi sampūjya sarvān eva narān yayau // Ram_2,15.4
GE09ram_02_u:1349: yathā sma lālitāḥ pitrā yathā pūrvaiḥ pitāmahaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1350: tataḥ sukhataraṃ sarve rāme vatsyāma rājani // Ram_2,15.6
GE09ram_02_u:1352: alam adya hi bhuktena paramārthair alaṃ ca naḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1353: yathā paśyāma niryāntaṃ rāmaṃ rājye pratiṣṭhitam // Ram_2,15.7
GE09ram_02_u:1355: ato hi na priyataraṃ nānyat kiṃcid bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:1358: etāś cānyāś ca suhṛdām udāsīnaḥ kathāḥ śubhāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1359: ātmasaṃpūjanīḥ śṛṇvan yayau rāmo mahāpatham // Ram_2,15.9
GE09ram_02_u:1361: na hi tasmān manaḥ kaścic cakṣuṣī vā narottamāt
GE09ram_02_u:1362: naraḥ śaknoty apākraṣṭum atikrānte 'pi rāghave // Ram_2,15.10
GE09ram_02_u:1364: sarveṣāṃ sa hi dharmātmā varṇānāṃ kurute dayām
GE09ram_02_u:1365: caturṇāṃ hi vayaḥsthānāṃ tena te tam anuvratāḥ // Ram_2,15.11
GE09ram_02_u:1368: rājaputraḥ pitur veśma praviveśa śriyā jvalan // Ram_2,15.12
GE09ram_02_u:1371: saṃnivartya janaṃ sarvaṃ śuddhāntaḥpuram abhyagāt // Ram_2,15.13
GE09ram_02_u:1373: tataḥ praviṣṭe pitur antikaṃ tadā janaḥ sa sarvo mudito nṛpātmaje
GE09ram_02_u:1374: pratīkṣate tasya punaḥ sma nirgamaṃ yathodayaṃ candramasaḥ saritpatiḥ // Ram_2,15.14
GE09ram_02_u:1376: sa dadarśāsane rāmo niṣaṇṇaṃ pitaraṃ śubhe
GE09ram_02_u:1379: sa pituś caraṇau pūrvam abhivādya vinītavat
GE09ram_02_u:1380: tato vavande caraṇau kaikeyyāḥ susamāhitaḥ // Ram_2,16.2
GE09ram_02_u:1383: śaśāka nṛpatir dīno nekṣituṃ nābhibhāṣitum // Ram_2,16.3
GE09ram_02_u:1385: tad apūrvaṃ narapater dṛṣṭvā rūpaṃ bhayāvaham
GE09ram_02_u:1386: rāmo 'pi bhayam āpannaḥ padā spṛṣṭveva pannagam // Ram_2,16.4
GE09ram_02_u:1392: upaplutam ivādityam uktānṛtam ṛṣiṃ yathā // Ram_2,16.6
GE09ram_02_u:1394: acintyakalpaṃ hi pitus taṃ śokam upadhārayan
GE09ram_02_u:1395: babhūva saṃrabdhataraḥ samudra iva parvaṇi // Ram_2,16.7
GE09ram_02_u:1397: cintayāmāsa ca tadā rāmaḥ pitṛhite rataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1398: kiṃsvid adyaiva nṛpatir na māṃ pratyabhinandati // Ram_2,16.8
GE09ram_02_u:1400: anyadā māṃ pitā dṛṣṭvā kupito 'pi prasīdati
GE09ram_02_u:1401: tasya mām adya samprekṣya kimāyāsaḥ pravartate // Ram_2,16.9
GE09ram_02_u:1404: kaikeyīm abhivādyaiva rāmo vacanam abravīt // Ram_2,16.10
GE09ram_02_u:1406: kaccin mayā nāparādham ajñānād yena me pitā
GE09ram_02_u:1407: kupitas tan mamācakṣva tvaṃ caivainaṃ prasādaya // Ram_2,16.11
GE09ram_02_u:1409: vivarṇavadano dīno na hi mām abhibhāṣate
GE09ram_02_u:1410: śārīro mānaso vāpi kaccid enaṃ na bādhate
GE09ram_02_u:1411: saṃtāpo vābhitāpo vā durlabhaṃ hi sadā sukham // Ram_2,16.12
GE09ram_02_u:1413: kaccin na kiṃcid bharate kumāre priyadarśane
GE09ram_02_u:1414: śatrughne vā mahāsattve mātṝṇāṃ vā mamāśubham // Ram_2,16.13
GE09ram_02_u:1416: atoṣayan mahārājam akurvan vā pitur vacaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1417: muhūrtam api neccheyaṃ jīvituṃ kupite nṛpe // Ram_2,16.14
GE09ram_02_u:1420: kathaṃ tasmin na varteta pratyakṣe sati daivate // Ram_2,16.15
GE09ram_02_u:1422: kaccit te paruṣaṃ kiṃcid abhimānāt pitā mama
GE09ram_02_u:1423: ukto bhavatyā kopena yatrāsya lulitaṃ manaḥ // Ram_2,16.16
GE09ram_02_u:1425: etad ācakṣva me devi tattvena paripṛcchataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1428: ahaṃ hi vacanād rājñaḥ pateyam api pāvake
GE09ram_02_u:1429: bhakṣayeyaṃ viṣaṃ tīkṣṇaṃ majjeyam api cārṇave
GE09ram_02_u:1430: niyukto guruṇā pitrā nṛpeṇa ca hitena ca // Ram_2,16.18
GE09ram_02_u:1432: tad brūhi vacanaṃ devi rājño yad abhikāṅkṣitam
GE09ram_02_u:1433: kariṣye pratijāne ca rāmo dvir nābhibhāṣate // Ram_2,16.19
GE09ram_02_u:1436: uvāca rāmaṃ kaikeyī vacanaṃ bhṛśadāruṇam // Ram_2,16.20
GE09ram_02_u:1438: purā devāsure yuddhe pitrā te mama rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:1439: rakṣitena varau dattau saśalyena mahāraṇe // Ram_2,16.21
GE09ram_02_u:1442: gamanaṃ daṇḍakāraṇye tava cādyaiva rāghava // Ram_2,16.22
GE09ram_02_u:1444: yadi satyapratijñaṃ tvaṃ pitaraṃ kartum icchasi
GE09ram_02_u:1445: ātmānaṃ ca naraśreṣṭha mama vākyam idaṃ śṛṇu // Ram_2,16.23
GE09ram_02_u:1447: sa nideśe pitus tiṣṭha yathā tena pratiśrutam
GE09ram_02_u:1448: tvayāraṇyaṃ praveṣṭavyaṃ nava varṣāṇi pañca ca // Ram_2,16.24
GE09ram_02_u:1450: sapta sapta ca varṣāṇi daṇḍakāraṇyam āśritaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1451: abhiṣekam imaṃ tyaktvā jaṭācīradharo vasa // Ram_2,16.25
GE09ram_02_u:1457: śrutvā na vivyathe rāmaḥ kaikeyīṃ cedam abravīt // Ram_2,16.27
GE09ram_02_u:1459: evam astu gamiṣyāmi vanaṃ vastum ahaṃ tv ataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1462: idaṃ tu jñātum icchāmi kimarthaṃ māṃ mahīpatiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1465: manyur na ca tvayā kāryo devi brūhi tavāgrataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1466: yāsyāmi bhava suprītā vanaṃ cīrajaṭādharaḥ // Ram_2,16.30
GE09ram_02_u:1468: hitena guruṇā pitrā kṛtajñena nṛpeṇa ca
GE09ram_02_u:1469: niyujyamāno viśrabdhaṃ kiṃ na kuryād ahaṃ priyam // Ram_2,16.31
GE09ram_02_u:1471: alīkaṃ mānasaṃ tv ekaṃ hṛdayaṃ dahatīva me
GE09ram_02_u:1472: svayaṃ yan nāha māṃ rājā bharatasyābhiṣecanam // Ram_2,16.32
GE09ram_02_u:1474: ahaṃ hi sītāṃ rājyaṃ ca prāṇān iṣṭān dhanāni ca
GE09ram_02_u:1475: hṛṣṭo bhrātre svayaṃ dadyāṃ bharatāyāpracoditaḥ // Ram_2,16.33
GE09ram_02_u:1477: kiṃ punar manujendreṇa svayaṃ pitrā pracoditaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1478: tava ca priyakāmārthaṃ pratijñām anupālayan // Ram_2,16.34
GE09ram_02_u:1480: tad āśvāsaya hīmaṃ tvaṃ kiṃ nv idaṃ yan mahīpatiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1487: avicārya pitur vākyaṃ samāvastuṃ caturdaśa // Ram_2,16.37
GE09ram_02_u:1489: sā hṛṣṭā tasya tadvākyaṃ śrutvā rāmasya kaikeyī
GE09ram_02_u:1490: prasthānaṃ śraddadhānā hi tvarayāmāsa rāghavam // Ram_2,16.38
GE09ram_02_u:1492: evaṃ bhavatu yāsyanti dūtāḥ śīghrajavair hayaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1495: tava tv ahaṃ kṣamaṃ manye notsukasya vilambanam
GE09ram_02_u:1496: rāma tasmād itaḥ śīghraṃ vanaṃ tvaṃ gantum arhasi // Ram_2,16.40
GE09ram_02_u:1498: vrīḍānvitaḥ svayaṃ yac ca nṛpas tvāṃ nābhibhāṣate
GE09ram_02_u:1499: naitat kiṃcin naraśreṣṭha manyur eṣo 'panīyatām // Ram_2,16.41
GE09ram_02_u:1501: yāvat tvaṃ na vanaṃ yātaḥ purād asmād abhitvaran
GE09ram_02_u:1502: pitā tāvan na te rāma snāsyate bhokṣyate 'pi vā // Ram_2,16.42
GE09ram_02_u:1504: dhik kaṣṭam iti niḥśvasya rājā śokapariplutaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1505: mūrchito nyapatat tasmin paryaṅke hemabhūṣite // Ram_2,16.43
GE09ram_02_u:1508: kaśayevāhato vājī vanaṃ gantuṃ kṛtatvaraḥ // Ram_2,16.44
GE09ram_02_u:1511: śrutvā gatavyatho rāmaḥ kaikeyīṃ vākyam abravīt // Ram_2,16.45
GE09ram_02_u:1513: nāham arthaparo devi lokam āvastum utsahe
GE09ram_02_u:1514: viddhi mām ṛṣibhis tulyaṃ kevalaṃ dharmam āsthitam // Ram_2,16.46
GE09ram_02_u:1516: yad atrabhavataḥ kiṃcic chakyaṃ kartuṃ priyaṃ mayā
GE09ram_02_u:1517: prāṇān api parityajya sarvathā kṛtam eva tat // Ram_2,16.47
GE09ram_02_u:1519: na hy ato dharmacaraṇaṃ kiṃcid asti mahattaram
GE09ram_02_u:1520: yathā pitari śuśrūṣā tasya vā vacanakriyā // Ram_2,16.48
GE09ram_02_u:1523: vane vatsyāmi vijane varṣāṇīha caturdaśa // Ram_2,16.49
GE09ram_02_u:1525: na nūnaṃ mayi kaikeyi kiṃcid āśaṃsase guṇam
GE09ram_02_u:1526: yad rājānam avocas tvaṃ mameśvaratarā satī // Ram_2,16.50
GE09ram_02_u:1528: yāvan mātaram āpṛcche sītāṃ cānunayāmy aham
GE09ram_02_u:1529: tato 'dyaiva gamiṣyāmi daṇḍakānāṃ mahad vanam // Ram_2,16.51
GE09ram_02_u:1531: bharataḥ pālayed rājyaṃ śuśrūṣec ca pitur yathā
GE09ram_02_u:1532: tathā bhavatyā kartavyaṃ sa hi dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ // Ram_2,16.52
GE09ram_02_u:1534: sa rāmasya vacaḥ śrutvā bhṛśaṃ duḥkhahataḥ pitā
GE09ram_02_u:1535: śokād aśaknuvan bāṣpaṃ praruroda mahāsvanam // Ram_2,16.53
GE09ram_02_u:1537: vanditvā caraṇau rāmo visaṃjñasya pitus tadā
GE09ram_02_u:1538: kaikeyyāś cāpy anāryāyā niṣpapāta mahādyutiḥ // Ram_2,16.54
GE09ram_02_u:1540: sa rāmaḥ pitaraṃ kṛtvā kaikeyīṃ ca pradakṣiṇam
GE09ram_02_u:1541: niṣkramyāntaḥpurāt tasmāt svaṃ dadarśa suhṛjjanam // Ram_2,16.55
GE09ram_02_u:1547: śanair jagāma sāpekṣo dṛṣṭiṃ tatrāvicālayan // Ram_2,16.57
GE09ram_02_u:1550: lokakāntasya kāntatvaṃ śītaraśmer iva kṣapā // Ram_2,16.58
GE09ram_02_u:1552: na vanaṃ gantukāmasya tyajataś ca vasuṃdharām
GE09ram_02_u:1555: dhārayan manasā duḥkham indriyāṇi nigṛhya ca
GE09ram_02_u:1558: praviśya veśmātibhṛśaṃ mudānvitaṃ samīkṣya tāṃ cārthavipattim āgatām
GE09ram_02_u:1559: na caiva rāmo 'tra jagāma vikriyāṃ suhṛjjanasyātmavipattiśaṅkayā // Ram_2,16.61
GE09ram_02_u:1561: rāmas tu bhṛśam āyasto niḥśvasann iva kuñjaraḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1562: jagāma sahito bhrātrā mātur antaḥpuraṃ vaśī // Ram_2,17.1
GE09ram_02_u:1565: upaviṣṭaṃ gṛhadvāri tiṣṭhataś cāparān bahūn // Ram_2,17.2
GE09ram_02_u:1567: praviśya prathamāṃ kakṣyāṃ dvitīyāyāṃ dadarśa saḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1570: praṇamya rāmas tān vṛddhāṃs tṛtīyāyāṃ dadarśa saḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1571: striyo vṛddhāś ca bālāś ca dvārarakṣaṇatatparāḥ // Ram_2,17.4
GE09ram_02_u:1573: vardhayitvā prahṛṣṭās tāḥ praviśya ca gṛhaṃ striyaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1574: nyavedayanta tvaritā rāmamātuḥ priyaṃ tadā // Ram_2,17.5
GE09ram_02_u:1576: kausalyāpi tadā devī rātriṃ sthitvā samāhitā
GE09ram_02_u:1577: prabhāte tv akarot pūjāṃ viṣṇoḥ putrahitaiṣiṇī // Ram_2,17.6
GE09ram_02_u:1580: agniṃ juhoti sma tadā mantravat kṛtamaṅgalā // Ram_2,17.7
GE09ram_02_u:1582: praviśya ca tadā rāmo mātur antaḥpuraṃ śubham
GE09ram_02_u:1583: dadarśa mātaraṃ tatra hāvayantīṃ hutāśanam // Ram_2,17.8
GE09ram_02_u:1586: abhicakrāma saṃhṛṣṭā kiśoraṃ vaḍabā yathā // Ram_2,17.9
GE09ram_02_u:1588: tam uvāca durādharṣaṃ rāghavaṃ sutam ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1589: kausalyā putravātsalyād idaṃ priyahitaṃ vacaḥ // Ram_2,17.10
GE09ram_02_u:1592: prāpnuhy āyuś ca kīrtiṃ ca dharmaṃ copahitaṃ kule // Ram_2,17.11
GE09ram_02_u:1595: adyaiva hi tvāṃ dharmātmā yauvarājye 'bhiṣekṣyati // Ram_2,17.12
GE09ram_02_u:1598: sa svabhāvavinītaś ca gauravāc ca tadānataḥ // Ram_2,17.13
GE09ram_02_u:1600: devi nūnaṃ na jānīṣe mahad bhayam upasthitam
GE09ram_02_u:1601: idaṃ tava ca duḥkhāya vaidehyā lakṣmaṇasya ca // Ram_2,17.14
GE09ram_02_u:1603: caturdaśa hi varṣāṇi vatsyāmi vijane vane
GE09ram_02_u:1604: madhumūlaphalair jīvan hitvā munivad āmiṣam // Ram_2,17.15
GE09ram_02_u:1607: māṃ punar daṇḍakāraṇyaṃ vivāsayati tāpasam // Ram_2,17.16
GE09ram_02_u:1609: tām aduḥkhocitāṃ dṛṣṭvā patitāṃ kadalīm iva
GE09ram_02_u:1618: yadi putra na jāyethā mama śokāya rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:1619: na sma duḥkham ato bhūyaḥ paśyeyam aham aprajā // Ram_2,17.20
GE09ram_02_u:1621: eka eva hi vandhyāyāḥ śoko bhavati mānavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1622: aprajāsmīti saṃtāpo na hy anyaḥ putra vidyate // Ram_2,17.21
GE09ram_02_u:1624: na dṛṣṭapūrvaṃ kalyāṇaṃ sukhaṃ vā patipauruṣe
GE09ram_02_u:1625: api putre vipaśyeyam iti rāmāsthitaṃ mayā // Ram_2,17.22
GE09ram_02_u:1628: ahaṃ śroṣye sapatnīnām avarāṇāṃ varā satī
GE09ram_02_u:1629: ato duḥkhataraṃ kiṃ nu pramadānāṃ bhaviṣyati // Ram_2,17.23
GE09ram_02_u:1631: tvayi saṃnihite 'py evam aham āsaṃ nirākṛtā
GE09ram_02_u:1632: kiṃ punaḥ proṣite tāta dhruvaṃ maraṇam eva me // Ram_2,17.24
GE09ram_02_u:1634: yo hi māṃ sevate kaścid atha vāpy anuvartate
GE09ram_02_u:1635: kaikeyyāḥ putram anvīkṣya sa jano nābhibhāṣate // Ram_2,17.25
GE09ram_02_u:1637: daśa sapta ca varṣāṇi tava jātasya rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:1640: upavāsaiś ca yogaiś ca bahubhiś ca pariśramaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1641: duḥkhaṃ saṃvardhito moghaṃ tvaṃ hi durgatayā mayā // Ram_2,17.27
GE09ram_02_u:1643: sthiraṃ tu hṛdayaṃ manye mamedaṃ yan na dīryate
GE09ram_02_u:1644: prāvṛṣīva mahānadyāḥ spṛṣṭaṃ kūlaṃ navāmbhasā // Ram_2,17.28
GE09ram_02_u:1646: mamaiva nūnaṃ maraṇaṃ na vidyate na cāvakāśo 'sti yamakṣaye mama
GE09ram_02_u:1647: yad antako 'dyaiva na māṃ jihīrṣati prasahya siṃho rudatīṃ mṛgīm iva // Ram_2,17.29
GE09ram_02_u:1649: sthiraṃ hi nūnaṃ hṛdayaṃ mamāyasaṃ na bhidyate yad bhuvi nāvadīryate
GE09ram_02_u:1650: anena duḥkhena ca deham arpitaṃ dhruvaṃ hy akāle maraṇaṃ na vidyate // Ram_2,17.30
GE09ram_02_u:1652: idaṃ tu duḥkhaṃ yad anarthakāni me vratāni dānāni ca saṃyamāś ca hi
GE09ram_02_u:1653: tapaś ca taptaṃ yad apatyakāraṇāt suniṣphalaṃ bījam ivoptam ūṣare // Ram_2,17.31
GE09ram_02_u:1655: yadi hy akāle maraṇaṃ svayecchayā labheta kaścid guruduḥkhakarśitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1656: gatāham adyaiva paretasaṃsadaṃ vinā tvayā dhenur ivātmajena vai // Ram_2,17.32
GE09ram_02_u:1658: bhṛśam asukham amarṣitā tadā bahu vilalāpa samīkṣya rāghavam
GE09ram_02_u:1659: vyasanam upaniśāmya sā mahat sutam iva baddham avekṣya kiṃnarī // Ram_2,17.33
GE09ram_02_u:1661: tathā tu vilapantīṃ tāṃ kausalyāṃ rāmamātaram
GE09ram_02_u:1662: uvāca lakṣmaṇo dīnas tat kālasadṛśaṃ vacaḥ // Ram_2,18.1
GE09ram_02_u:1664: na rocate mamāpy etad ārye yad rāghavo vanam
GE09ram_02_u:1665: tyaktvā rājyaśriyaṃ gacchet striyā vākyavaśaṃ gataḥ // Ram_2,18.2
GE09ram_02_u:1667: viparītaś ca vṛddhaś ca viṣayaiś ca pradharṣitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1668: nṛpaḥ kim iva na brūyāc codyamānaḥ samanmathaḥ // Ram_2,18.3
GE09ram_02_u:1671: yena nirvāsyate rāṣṭrād vanavāsāya rāghavaḥ // Ram_2,18.4
GE09ram_02_u:1673: na taṃ paśyāmy ahaṃ loke parokṣam api yo naraḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1674: amitro 'pi nirasto 'pi yo 'sya doṣam udāharet // Ram_2,18.5
GE09ram_02_u:1676: devakalpam ṛjuṃ dāntaṃ ripūṇām api vatsalam
GE09ram_02_u:1677: avekṣamāṇaḥ ko dharmaṃ tyajet putram akāraṇāt // Ram_2,18.6
GE09ram_02_u:1679: tad idaṃ vacanaṃ rājñaḥ punar bālyam upeyuṣaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1680: putraḥ ko hṛdaye kuryād rājavṛttam anusmaran // Ram_2,18.7
GE09ram_02_u:1682: yāvad eva na jānāti kaścid artham imaṃ naraḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1683: tāvad eva mayā sārdham ātmasthaṃ kuru śāsanam // Ram_2,18.8
GE09ram_02_u:1685: mayā pārśve sadhanuṣā tava guptasya rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:1686: kaḥ samartho 'dhikaṃ kartuṃ kṛtāntasyeva tiṣṭhataḥ // Ram_2,18.9
GE09ram_02_u:1689: kariṣyāmi śarais tīkṣṇair yadi sthāsyati vipriye // Ram_2,18.10
GE09ram_02_u:1691: bharatasyātha pakṣyo vā yo vāsya hitam icchati
GE09ram_02_u:1692: sarvān etān vadhiṣyāmi mṛdur hi paribhūyate // Ram_2,18.11
GE09ram_02_u:1694: tvayā caiva mayā caiva kṛtvā vairam anuttamam
GE09ram_02_u:1695: kasya śaktiḥ śriyaṃ dātuṃ bharatāyāriśāsana // Ram_2,18.12
GE09ram_02_u:1698: satyena dhanuṣā caiva datteneṣṭena te śape // Ram_2,18.13
GE09ram_02_u:1700: dīptam agnim araṇyaṃ vā yadi rāmaḥ pravekṣyate
GE09ram_02_u:1701: praviṣṭaṃ tatra māṃ devi tvaṃ pūrvam avadhāraya // Ram_2,18.14
GE09ram_02_u:1703: harāmi vīryād duḥkhaṃ te tamaḥ sūrya ivoditaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1704: devī paśyatu me vīryaṃ rāghavaś caiva paśyatu // Ram_2,18.15
GE09ram_02_u:1706: etat tu vacanaṃ śrutvā lakṣmaṇasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1707: uvāca rāmaṃ kausalyā rudantī śokalālasā // Ram_2,18.16
GE09ram_02_u:1709: bhrātus te vadataḥ putra lakṣmaṇasya śrutaṃ tvayā
GE09ram_02_u:1710: yad atrānantaraṃ tat tvaṃ kuruṣva yadi rocate // Ram_2,18.17
GE09ram_02_u:1712: na cādharmyaṃ vacaḥ śrutvā sapatnyā mama bhāṣitam
GE09ram_02_u:1713: vihāya śokasaṃtaptāṃ gantum arhasi mām itaḥ // Ram_2,18.18
GE09ram_02_u:1715: dharmajña yadi dharmiṣṭho dharmaṃ caritum icchasi
GE09ram_02_u:1716: śuśrūṣa mām ihasthas tvaṃ cara dharmam anuttamam // Ram_2,18.19
GE09ram_02_u:1718: śuśrūṣur jananīṃ putra svagṛhe niyato vasan
GE09ram_02_u:1719: pareṇa tapasā yuktaḥ kāśyapas tridivaṃ gataḥ // Ram_2,18.20
GE09ram_02_u:1721: yathaiva rājā pūjyas te gauraveṇa tathā hy aham
GE09ram_02_u:1722: tvāṃ nāham anujānāmi na gantavyam ito vanam // Ram_2,18.21
GE09ram_02_u:1724: tvadviyogān na me kāryaṃ jīvitena sukhena vā
GE09ram_02_u:1725: tvayā saha mama śreyas tṛṇānām api bhakṣaṇam // Ram_2,18.22
GE09ram_02_u:1727: yadi tvaṃ yāsyasi vanaṃ tyaktvā māṃ śokalālasām
GE09ram_02_u:1728: ahaṃ prāyam ihāsiṣye na hi śakṣyāmi jīvitum // Ram_2,18.23
GE09ram_02_u:1730: tatas tvaṃ prāpsyase putra nirayaṃ lokaviśrutam
GE09ram_02_u:1731: brahmahatyām ivādharmāt samudraḥ saritāṃ patiḥ // Ram_2,18.24
GE09ram_02_u:1733: vilapantīṃ tathā dīnāṃ kausalyāṃ jananīṃ tataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1734: uvāca rāmo dharmātmā vacanaṃ dharmasaṃhitam // Ram_2,18.25
GE09ram_02_u:1736: nāsti śaktiḥ pitur vākyaṃ samatikramituṃ mama
GE09ram_02_u:1737: prasādaye tvāṃ śirasā gantum icchāmy ahaṃ vanam // Ram_2,18.26
GE09ram_02_u:1739: ṛṣiṇā ca pitur vākyaṃ kurvatā vratacāriṇā
GE09ram_02_u:1740: gaur hatā jānatā dharmaṃ kaṇḍunāpi vipaścitā // Ram_2,18.27
GE09ram_02_u:1742: asmākaṃ ca kule pūrvaṃ sagarasyājñayā pituḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1743: khanadbhiḥ sāgarair bhūtim avāptaḥ sumahān vadhaḥ // Ram_2,18.28
GE09ram_02_u:1748: na khalv etan mayaikena kriyate pitṛśāsanam
GE09ram_02_u:1749: pūrvair ayam abhipreto gato mārgo 'nugamyate // Ram_2,18.30
GE09ram_02_u:1751: tad etat tu mayā kāryaṃ kriyate bhuvi nānyathā
GE09ram_02_u:1752: pitur hi vacanaṃ kurvan na kaścin nāma hīyate // Ram_2,18.31
GE09ram_02_u:1754: tām evam uktvā jananīṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ punar abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:1755: tava lakṣmaṇa jānāmi mayi sneham anuttamam
GE09ram_02_u:1756: abhiprāyam avijñāya satyasya ca śamasya ca // Ram_2,18.32
GE09ram_02_u:1758: dharmo hi paramo loke dharme satyaṃ pratiṣṭhitam
GE09ram_02_u:1759: dharmasaṃśritam etac ca pitur vacanam uttamam // Ram_2,18.33
GE09ram_02_u:1761: saṃśrutya ca pitur vākyaṃ mātur vā brāhmaṇasya vā
GE09ram_02_u:1762: na kartavyaṃ vṛthā vīra dharmam āśritya tiṣṭhatā // Ram_2,18.34
GE09ram_02_u:1764: so 'haṃ na śakṣyāmi pitur niyogam ativartitum
GE09ram_02_u:1765: pitur hi vacanād vīra kaikeyyāhaṃ pracoditaḥ // Ram_2,18.35
GE09ram_02_u:1768: dharmam āśraya mā taikṣṇyaṃ madbuddhir anugamyatām // Ram_2,18.36
GE09ram_02_u:1770: tam evam uktvā sauhārdād bhrātaraṃ lakṣmaṇāgrajaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1771: uvāca bhūyaḥ kausalyāṃ prāñjaliḥ śirasānataḥ // Ram_2,18.37
GE09ram_02_u:1773: anumanyasva māṃ devi gamiṣyantam ito vanam
GE09ram_02_u:1774: śāpitāsi mama prāṇaiḥ kuru svastyayanāni me
GE09ram_02_u:1775: tīrṇapratijñaś ca vanāt punar eṣyāmy ahaṃ purīm // Ram_2,18.38
GE09ram_02_u:1777: yaśo hy ahaṃ kevalarājyakāraṇān na pṛṣṭhataḥ kartum alaṃ mahodayam
GE09ram_02_u:1778: adīrghakāle na tu devi jīvite vṛṇe 'varām adya mahīm adharmataḥ // Ram_2,18.39
GE09ram_02_u:1780: prasādayan naravṛṣabhaḥ sa mātaraṃ parākramāj jigamiṣur eva daṇḍakān
GE09ram_02_u:1781: athānujaṃ bhṛśam anuśāsya darśanaṃ cakāra tāṃ hṛdi jananīṃ pradakṣiṇam // Ram_2,18.40
GE09ram_02_u:1783: atha taṃ vyathayā dīnaṃ saviśeṣam amarṣitam
GE09ram_02_u:1786: āsādya rāmaḥ saumitriṃ suhṛdaṃ bhrātaraṃ priyam
GE09ram_02_u:1787: uvācedaṃ sa dhairyeṇa dhārayan sattvam ātmavān // Ram_2,19.2
GE09ram_02_u:1793: mātā naḥ sā yathā na syāt saviśaṅkā tathā kuru // Ram_2,19.4
GE09ram_02_u:1795: tasyāḥ śaṅkāmayaṃ duḥkhaṃ muhūrtam api notsahe
GE09ram_02_u:1799: mātṝṇāṃ vā pitur vāhaṃ kṛtam alpaṃ ca vipriyam // Ram_2,19.6
GE09ram_02_u:1802: paralokabhayād bhīto nirbhayo 'stu pitā mama // Ram_2,19.7
GE09ram_02_u:1804: tasyāpi hi bhaved asmin karmaṇy apratisaṃhṛte
GE09ram_02_u:1805: satyaṃ neti manastāpas tasya tāpas tapec ca mām // Ram_2,19.8
GE09ram_02_u:1808: anvag evāham icchāmi vanaṃ gantum itaḥ punaḥ // Ram_2,19.9
GE09ram_02_u:1811: sutaṃ bharatam avyagram abhiṣecayitā tataḥ // Ram_2,19.10
GE09ram_02_u:1814: gate 'raṇyaṃ ca kaikeyyā bhaviṣyati manaḥsukham // Ram_2,19.11
GE09ram_02_u:1816: buddhiḥ praṇītā yeneyaṃ manaś ca susamāhitam
GE09ram_02_u:1817: tat tu nārhāmi saṃkleṣṭuṃ pravrajiṣyāmi māciram // Ram_2,19.12
GE09ram_02_u:1819: kṛtāntas tv eva saumitre draṣṭavyo matpravāsane
GE09ram_02_u:1820: rājyasya ca vitīrṇasya punar eva nivartane // Ram_2,19.13
GE09ram_02_u:1822: kaikeyyāḥ pratipattir hi kathaṃ syān mama pīḍane
GE09ram_02_u:1823: yadi bhāvo na daivo 'yaṃ kṛtāntavihito bhavet // Ram_2,19.14
GE09ram_02_u:1825: jānāsi hi yathā saumya na mātṛṣu mamāntaram
GE09ram_02_u:1826: bhūtapūrvaṃ viśeṣo vā tasyā mayi sute 'pi vā // Ram_2,19.15
GE09ram_02_u:1829: ugrair vākyair ahaṃ tasyā nānyad daivāt samarthaye // Ram_2,19.16
GE09ram_02_u:1832: brūyāt sā prākṛteva strī matpīḍāṃ bhartṛsaṃnidhau // Ram_2,19.17
GE09ram_02_u:1834: yad acintyaṃ tu tad daivaṃ bhūteṣv api na hanyate
GE09ram_02_u:1835: vyaktaṃ mayi ca tasyāṃ ca patito hi viparyayaḥ // Ram_2,19.18
GE09ram_02_u:1837: kaścid daivena saumitre yoddhum utsahate pumān
GE09ram_02_u:1838: yasya na grahaṇaṃ kiṃcit karmaṇo 'nyatra dṛśyate // Ram_2,19.19
GE09ram_02_u:1841: yasya kiṃcit tathā bhūtaṃ nanu daivasya karma tat // Ram_2,19.20
GE09ram_02_u:1843: vyāhate 'py abhiṣeke me paritāpo na vidyate
GE09ram_02_u:1844: tasmād aparitāpaḥ saṃs tvam apy anuvidhāya mām
GE09ram_02_u:1847: na lakṣmaṇāsmin mama rājyavighne mātā yavīyasy atiśaṅkanīyā
GE09ram_02_u:1848: daivābhipannā hi vadanty aniṣṭaṃ jānāsi daivaṃ ca tathā prabhāvam // Ram_2,19.22
GE09ram_02_u:1850: iti bruvati rāme tu lakṣmaṇo 'dhaḥśirā muhuḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1851: śrutvā madhyaṃ jagāmeva manasā duḥkhaharṣayoḥ // Ram_2,20.1
GE09ram_02_u:1853: tadā tu baddhvā bhrukuṭīṃ bhruvor madhye nararṣabhaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1854: niśaśvāsa mahāsarpo bilastha iva roṣitaḥ // Ram_2,20.2
GE09ram_02_u:1857: babhau kruddhasya siṃhasya mukhasya sadṛśaṃ mukham // Ram_2,20.3
GE09ram_02_u:1859: agrahas taṃ vidhunvaṃs tu hastī hastam ivātmanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1860: tiryag ūrdhvaṃ śarīre ca pātayitvā śirodharām // Ram_2,20.4
GE09ram_02_u:1862: agrākṣṇā vīkṣamāṇas tu tiryag bhrātaram abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:1863: asthāne sambhramo yasya jāto vai sumahān ayam // Ram_2,20.5
GE09ram_02_u:1866: kathaṃ hy etad asambhrāntas tvadvidho vaktum arhati // Ram_2,20.6
GE09ram_02_u:1869: kiṃ nāma kṛpaṇaṃ daivam aśaktam abhiśaṃsasi // Ram_2,20.7
GE09ram_02_u:1871: pāpayos tu kathaṃ nāma tayoḥ śaṅkā na vidyate
GE09ram_02_u:1872: santi dharmopadhāḥ ślakṣṇā dharmātman kiṃ na budhyase // Ram_2,20.8
GE09ram_02_u:1875: yeneyam āgatā dvaidhaṃ tava buddhir mahīpate
GE09ram_02_u:1876: sa hi dharmo mama dveṣyaḥ prasaṅgād yasya muhyasi // Ram_2,20.9
GE09ram_02_u:1878: yady api pratipattis te daivī cāpi tayor matam
GE09ram_02_u:1879: tathāpy upekṣaṇīyaṃ te na me tad api rocate // Ram_2,20.10
GE09ram_02_u:1881: viklavo vīryahīno yaḥ sa daivam anuvartate
GE09ram_02_u:1882: vīrāḥ saṃbhāvitātmāno na daivaṃ paryupāsate // Ram_2,20.11
GE09ram_02_u:1885: na daivena vipannārthaḥ puruṣaḥ so 'vasīdati // Ram_2,20.12
GE09ram_02_u:1887: drakṣyanti tv adya daivasya pauruṣaṃ puruṣasya ca
GE09ram_02_u:1888: daivamānuṣayor adya vyaktā vyaktir bhaviṣyati // Ram_2,20.13
GE09ram_02_u:1890: adya matpauruṣahataṃ daivaṃ drakṣyanti vai janāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1891: yad daivād āhataṃ te 'dya dṛṣṭaṃ rājyābhiṣecanam // Ram_2,20.14
GE09ram_02_u:1894: pradhāvitam ahaṃ daivaṃ pauruṣeṇa nivartaye // Ram_2,20.15
GE09ram_02_u:1897: na ca kṛtsnās trayo lokā vihanyuḥ kiṃ punaḥ pitā // Ram_2,20.16
GE09ram_02_u:1899: yair vivāsas tavāraṇye mitho rājan samarthitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1900: araṇye te vivatsyanti caturdaśa samās tathā // Ram_2,20.17
GE09ram_02_u:1902: ahaṃ tadāśāṃ chetsyāmi pitus tasyāś ca yā tava
GE09ram_02_u:1905: madbalena viruddhāya na syād daivabalaṃ tathā
GE09ram_02_u:1906: prabhaviṣyati duḥkhāya yathograṃ pauruṣaṃ mama // Ram_2,20.19
GE09ram_02_u:1909: āryaputrāḥ kariṣyanti vanavāsaṃ gate tvayi // Ram_2,20.20
GE09ram_02_u:1912: prajā nikṣipya putreṣu putravat paripālane // Ram_2,20.21
GE09ram_02_u:1915: naivam icchasi dharmātman rājyaṃ rāma tvam ātmani // Ram_2,20.22
GE09ram_02_u:1917: pratijāne ca te vīra mā bhūvaṃ vīralokabhāk
GE09ram_02_u:1918: rājyaṃ ca tava rakṣeyam ahaṃ veleva sāgaram // Ram_2,20.23
GE09ram_02_u:1920: maṅgalair abhiṣiñcasva tatra tvaṃ vyāpṛto bhava
GE09ram_02_u:1921: aham eko mahīpālān alaṃ vārayituṃ balāt // Ram_2,20.24
GE09ram_02_u:1923: na śobhārthāv imau bāhū na dhanur bhūṣaṇāya me
GE09ram_02_u:1927: na cāhaṃ kāmaye 'tyarthaṃ yaḥ syāc chatrur mato mama // Ram_2,20.26
GE09ram_02_u:1930: pragṛhītena vai śatruṃ vajriṇaṃ vā na kalpaye // Ram_2,20.27
GE09ram_02_u:1936: patiṣyanti dvipā bhūmau meghā iva savidyutaḥ // Ram_2,20.29
GE09ram_02_u:1939: kathaṃ puruṣamānī syāt puruṣāṇāṃ mayi sthite // Ram_2,20.30
GE09ram_02_u:1941: bahubhiś caikam atyasyann ekena ca bahūñ janān
GE09ram_02_u:1945: rājñaś cāprabhutāṃ kartuṃ prabhutvaṃ ca tava prabho // Ram_2,20.32
GE09ram_02_u:1948: vasūnāṃ ca vimokṣasya suhṛdāṃ pālanasya ca // Ram_2,20.33
GE09ram_02_u:1950: anurūpāv imau bāhū rāma karma kariṣyataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1953: bravīhi ko 'dyaiva mayā viyujyatāṃ tavāsuhṛt prāṇayaśaḥ suhṛjjanaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1954: yathā taveyaṃ vasudhā vaśe bhavet tathaiva māṃ śādhi tavāsmi kiṃkaraḥ // Ram_2,20.35
GE09ram_02_u:1956: vimṛjya bāṣpaṃ parisāntvya cāsakṛt sa lakṣmaṇaṃ rāghavavaṃśavardhanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1957: uvāca pitrye vacane vyavasthitaṃ nibodha mām eṣa hi saumya satpathaḥ // Ram_2,20.36
GE09ram_02_u:1959: taṃ samīkṣya tv avahitaṃ pitur nirdeśapālane
GE09ram_02_u:1960: kausalyā bāṣpasaṃruddhā vaco dharmiṣṭham abravīt // Ram_2,21.1
GE09ram_02_u:1963: mayi jāto daśarathāt katham uñchena vartayet // Ram_2,21.2
GE09ram_02_u:1965: yasya bhṛtyāś ca dāsāś ca mṛṣṭāny annāni bhuñjate
GE09ram_02_u:1966: kathaṃ sa bhokṣyate nātho vane mūlaphalāny ayam // Ram_2,21.3
GE09ram_02_u:1968: ka etacchraddadhecchrutvā kasya vā na bhaved bhayam
GE09ram_02_u:1969: guṇavān dayito rājño rāghavo yad vivāsyate // Ram_2,21.4
GE09ram_02_u:1971: tvayā vihīnām iha māṃ śokāgnir atulo mahān
GE09ram_02_u:1972: pradhakṣyati yathā kakṣaṃ citrabhānur himātyaye // Ram_2,21.5
GE09ram_02_u:1974: kathaṃ hi dhenuḥ svaṃ vatsaṃ gacchantaṃ nānugacchati
GE09ram_02_u:1975: ahaṃ tvānugamiṣyāmi yatra putra gamiṣyasi // Ram_2,21.6
GE09ram_02_u:1977: tathā nigaditaṃ mātrā tad vākyaṃ puruṣarṣabhaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1978: śrutvā rāmo 'bravīd vākyaṃ mātaraṃ bhṛśaduḥkhitām // Ram_2,21.7
GE09ram_02_u:1980: kaikeyyā vañcito rājā mayi cāraṇyam āśrite
GE09ram_02_u:1981: bhavatyā ca parityakto na nūnaṃ vartayiṣyati // Ram_2,21.8
GE09ram_02_u:1983: bhartuḥ kila parityāgo nṛśaṃsaḥ kevalaṃ striyāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1984: sa bhavatyā na kartavyo manasāpi vigarhitaḥ // Ram_2,21.9
GE09ram_02_u:1986: yāvaj jīvati kākutsthaḥ pitā me jagatīpatiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1987: śuśrūṣā kriyatāṃ tāvat sa hi dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ // Ram_2,21.10
GE09ram_02_u:1989: evam uktā tu rāmeṇa kausalyā śubhadarśanā
GE09ram_02_u:1990: tathety uvāca suprītā rāmam akliṣṭakāriṇam // Ram_2,21.11
GE09ram_02_u:1992: evam uktas tu vacanaṃ rāmo dharmabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1993: bhūyas tām abravīd vākyaṃ mātaraṃ bhṛśaduḥkhitām // Ram_2,21.12
GE09ram_02_u:1995: mayā caiva bhavatyā ca kartavyaṃ vacanaṃ pituḥ
GE09ram_02_u:1996: rājā bhartā guruḥ śreṣṭhaḥ sarveṣām īśvaraḥ prabhuḥ // Ram_2,21.13
GE09ram_02_u:1998: imāni tu mahāraṇye vihṛtya nava pañca ca
GE09ram_02_u:1999: varṣāṇi paramaprītaḥ sthāsyāmi vacane tava // Ram_2,21.14
GE09ram_02_u:2001: evam uktā priyaṃ putraṃ bāṣpapūrṇānanā tadā
GE09ram_02_u:2002: uvāca paramārtā tu kausalyā putravatsalā // Ram_2,21.15
GE09ram_02_u:2004: āsāṃ rāma sapatnīnāṃ vastuṃ madhye na me kṣamam
GE09ram_02_u:2005: naya mām api kākutstha vanaṃ vanyāṃ mṛgīṃ yathā
GE09ram_02_u:2006: yadi te gamane buddhiḥ kṛtā pitur apekṣayā // Ram_2,21.16
GE09ram_02_u:2008: tāṃ tathā rudatīṃ rāmo rudan vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:2009: jīvantyā hi striyā bhartā daivataṃ prabhur eva ca
GE09ram_02_u:2010: bhavatyā mama caivādya rājā prabhavati prabhuḥ // Ram_2,21.17
GE09ram_02_u:2013: bhavatīm anuvarteta sa hi dharmarataḥ sadā // Ram_2,21.18
GE09ram_02_u:2015: yathā mayi tu niṣkrānte putraśokena pārthivaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2016: śramaṃ nāvāpnuyāt kiṃcid apramattā tathā kuru // Ram_2,21.19
GE09ram_02_u:2019: bhartāraṃ nānuvarteta sā ca pāpagatir bhavet // Ram_2,21.20
GE09ram_02_u:2021: śuśrūṣām eva kurvīta bhartuḥ priyahite ratā
GE09ram_02_u:2022: eṣa dharmaḥ purā dṛṣṭo loke vede śrutaḥ smṛtaḥ // Ram_2,21.21
GE09ram_02_u:2024: pūjyās te matkṛte devi brāhmaṇāś caiva suvratāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2027: prāpsyase paramaṃ kāmaṃ mayi pratyāgate sati
GE09ram_02_u:2028: yadi dharmabhṛtāṃ śreṣṭho dhārayiṣyati jīvitam // Ram_2,21.23
GE09ram_02_u:2032: gaccha putra tvam ekāgro bhadraṃ te 'stu sadā vibho // Ram_2,21.24
GE09ram_02_u:2034: tathā hi rāmaṃ vanavāsaniścitaṃ samīkṣya devī parameṇa cetasā
GE09ram_02_u:2035: uvāca rāmaṃ śubhalakṣaṇaṃ vaco babhūva ca svastyayanābhikāṅkṣiṇī // Ram_2,21.25
GE09ram_02_u:2037: sāpanīya tam āyāsam upaspṛśya jalaṃ śuci
GE09ram_02_u:2038: cakāra mātā rāmasya maṅgalāni manasvinī // Ram_2,22.1
GE09ram_02_u:2040: svasti sādhyāś ca viśve ca marutaś ca maharṣayaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2041: svasti dhātā vidhātā ca svasti pūṣā bhago 'ryamā // Ram_2,22.2
GE09ram_02_u:2043: ṛtavaś caiva pakṣāś ca māsāḥ saṃvatsarāḥ kṣapāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2044: dināni ca muhūrtāś ca svasti kurvantu te sadā // Ram_2,22.3
GE09ram_02_u:2046: smṛtir dhṛtiś ca dharmaś ca pāntu tvāṃ putra sarvataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2047: skandaś ca bhagavān devaḥ somaś ca sabṛhaspatiḥ // Ram_2,22.4
GE09ram_02_u:2049: saptarṣayo nāradaś ca te tvāṃ rakṣantu sarvataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2050: nakṣatrāṇi ca sarvāṇi grahāś ca sahadevatāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2053: plavagā vṛścikā daṃśā maśakāś caiva kānane
GE09ram_02_u:2054: sarīsṛpāś ca kīṭāś ca mā bhūvan gahane tava // Ram_2,22.6
GE09ram_02_u:2056: mahādvipāś ca siṃhāś ca vyāghrā ṛkṣāś ca daṃṣṭriṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2057: mahiṣāḥ śṛṅgiṇo raudrā na te druhyantu putraka // Ram_2,22.7
GE09ram_02_u:2060: mā ca tvāṃ hiṃsiṣuḥ putra mayā sampūjitās tv iha // Ram_2,22.8
GE09ram_02_u:2062: āgamās te śivāḥ santu sidhyantu ca parākramāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2063: sarvasampattayo rāma svastimān gaccha putraka // Ram_2,22.9
GE09ram_02_u:2065: svasti te 'stv āntarikṣebhyaḥ pārthivebhyaḥ punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2066: sarvebhyaś caiva devebhyo ye ca te paripanthinaḥ // Ram_2,22.10
GE09ram_02_u:2069: ye ca śeṣāḥ surās te tvāṃ rakṣantu vanavāsinam // Ram_2,22.11
GE09ram_02_u:2071: iti mālyaiḥ suragaṇān gandhaiś cāpi yaśasvinī
GE09ram_02_u:2075: vṛtranāśe samabhavat tat te bhavatu maṅgalam // Ram_2,22.13
GE09ram_02_u:2078: amṛtaṃ prārthayānasya tat te bhavatu maṅgalam // Ram_2,22.14
GE09ram_02_u:2081: cakāra rakṣāṃ kausalyā mantrair abhijajāpa ca // Ram_2,22.15
GE09ram_02_u:2084: avadat putra siddhārtho gaccha rāma yathāsukham // Ram_2,22.16
GE09ram_02_u:2087: paśyāmi tvāṃ sukhaṃ vatsa susthitaṃ rājaveśmani // Ram_2,22.17
GE09ram_02_u:2090: abhiprayātasya vanaṃ cirāya te hitāni kāṅkṣantu diśaś ca rāghava // Ram_2,22.18
GE09ram_02_u:2092: itīva cāśrupratipūrṇalocanā samāpya ca svastyayanaṃ yathāvidhi
GE09ram_02_u:2093: pradakṣiṇaṃ caiva cakāra rāghavaṃ punaḥ punaś cāpi nipīḍya sasvaje // Ram_2,22.19
GE09ram_02_u:2095: tathā tu devyā sa kṛtapradakṣiṇo nipīḍya mātuś caraṇau punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2096: jagāma sītānilayaṃ mahāyaśāḥ sa rāghavaḥ prajvalitaḥ svayā śriyā // Ram_2,22.20
GE09ram_02_u:2098: abhivādya tu kausalyāṃ rāmaḥ samprasthito vanam
GE09ram_02_u:2099: kṛtasvastyayano mātrā dharmiṣṭhe vartmani sthitaḥ // Ram_2,23.1
GE09ram_02_u:2104: vaidehī cāpi tat sarvaṃ na śuśrāva tapasvinī
GE09ram_02_u:2105: tad eva hṛdi tasyāś ca yauvarājyābhiṣecanam // Ram_2,23.3
GE09ram_02_u:2107: devakāryaṃ sma sā kṛtvā kṛtajñā hṛṣṭacetanā
GE09ram_02_u:2113: atha sītā samutpatya vepamānā ca taṃ patim
GE09ram_02_u:2117: āha duḥkhābhisaṃtaptā kim idānīm idaṃ prabho // Ram_2,23.7
GE09ram_02_u:2119: adya bārhaspataḥ śrīmān yuktaḥ puṣyo na rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:2120: procyate brāhmaṇaiḥ prājñaiḥ kena tvam asi durmanāḥ // Ram_2,23.8
GE09ram_02_u:2128: vāgmino bandinaś cāpi prahṛṣṭās tvāṃ nararṣabha
GE09ram_02_u:2129: stuvanto nādya dṛśyante maṅgalaiḥ sūtamāgadhāḥ // Ram_2,23.11
GE09ram_02_u:2131: na te kṣaudraṃ ca dadhi ca brāhmaṇā vedapāragāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2132: mūrdhni mūrdhāvasiktasya dadhati sma vidhānataḥ // Ram_2,23.12
GE09ram_02_u:2134: na tvāṃ prakṛtayaḥ sarvā śreṇīmukhyāś ca bhūṣitāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2138: mukhyaḥ puṣyaratho yuktaḥ kiṃ na gacchati te 'grataḥ // Ram_2,23.14
GE09ram_02_u:2140: na hastī cāgrataḥ śrīmāṃs tava lakṣaṇapūjitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2143: na ca kāñcanacitraṃ te paśyāmi priyadarśana
GE09ram_02_u:2146: abhiṣeko yadā sajjaḥ kim idānīm idaṃ tava
GE09ram_02_u:2147: apūrvo mukhavarṇaś ca na praharṣaś ca lakṣyate // Ram_2,23.17
GE09ram_02_u:2150: sīte tatrabhavāṃs tātaḥ pravrājayati māṃ vanam // Ram_2,23.18
GE09ram_02_u:2153: śṛṇu jānaki yenedaṃ krameṇābhyāgataṃ mama // Ram_2,23.19
GE09ram_02_u:2156: kaikeyyai prītamanasā purā dattau mahāvarau // Ram_2,23.20
GE09ram_02_u:2159: pracoditaḥ sa samayo dharmeṇa pratinirjitaḥ // Ram_2,23.21
GE09ram_02_u:2161: caturdaśa hi varṣāṇi vastavyaṃ daṇḍake mayā
GE09ram_02_u:2162: pitrā me bharataś cāpi yauvarājye niyojitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2163: so 'haṃ tvām āgato draṣṭuṃ prasthito vijanaṃ vanam // Ram_2,23.22
GE09ram_02_u:2165: bharatasya samīpe te nāhaṃ kathyaḥ kadācana
GE09ram_02_u:2166: ṛddhiyuktā hi puruṣā na sahante parastavam
GE09ram_02_u:2167: tasmān na te guṇāḥ kathyā bharatasyāgrato mama // Ram_2,23.23
GE09ram_02_u:2169: nāpi tvaṃ tena bhartavyā viśeṣeṇa kadācana
GE09ram_02_u:2170: anukūlatayā śakyaṃ samīpe tasya vartitum // Ram_2,23.24
GE09ram_02_u:2172: ahaṃ cāpi pratijñāṃ tāṃ guroḥ samanupālayan
GE09ram_02_u:2173: vanam adyaiva yāsyāmi sthirā bhava manasvini // Ram_2,23.25
GE09ram_02_u:2175: yāte ca mayi kalyāṇi vanaṃ muniniṣevitam
GE09ram_02_u:2178: kālyam utthāya devānāṃ kṛtvā pūjāṃ yathāvidhi
GE09ram_02_u:2179: vanditavyo daśarathaḥ pitā mama nareśvaraḥ // Ram_2,23.27
GE09ram_02_u:2181: mātā ca mama kausalyā vṛddhā saṃtāpakarśitā
GE09ram_02_u:2182: dharmam evāgrataḥ kṛtvā tvattaḥ sammānam arhati // Ram_2,23.28
GE09ram_02_u:2184: vanditavyāś ca te nityaṃ yāḥ śeṣā mama mātaraḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2185: snehapraṇayasambhogaiḥ samā hi mama mātaraḥ // Ram_2,23.29
GE09ram_02_u:2188: tvayā lakṣmaṇaśatrughnau prāṇaiḥ priyatarau mama // Ram_2,23.30
GE09ram_02_u:2190: vipriyaṃ na ca kartavyaṃ bharatasya kadācana
GE09ram_02_u:2191: sa hi rājā prabhuś caiva deśasya ca kulasya ca // Ram_2,23.31
GE09ram_02_u:2196: aurasān api putrān hi tyajanty ahitakāriṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2197: samarthān sampragṛhṇanti janān api narādhipāḥ // Ram_2,23.33
GE09ram_02_u:2199: ahaṃ gamiṣyāmi mahāvanaṃ priye tvayā hi vastavyam ihaiva bhāmini
GE09ram_02_u:2200: yathā vyalīkaṃ kuruṣe na kasyacit tathā tvayā kāryam idaṃ vaco mama // Ram_2,23.34
GE09ram_02_u:2202: evam uktā tu vaidehī priyārhā priyavādinī
GE09ram_02_u:2203: praṇayād eva saṃkruddhā bhartāram idam abravīt // Ram_2,24.1
GE09ram_02_u:2205: āryaputra pitā mātā bhrātā putras tathā snuṣā
GE09ram_02_u:2206: svāni puṇyāni bhuñjānāḥ svaṃ svaṃ bhāgyam upāsate // Ram_2,24.2
GE09ram_02_u:2208: bhartur bhāgyaṃ tu bhāryaikā prāpnoti puruṣarṣabha
GE09ram_02_u:2209: ataś caivāham ādiṣṭā vane vastavyam ity api // Ram_2,24.3
GE09ram_02_u:2211: na pitā nātmajo nātmā na mātā na sakhījanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2212: iha pretya ca nārīṇāṃ patir eko gatiḥ sadā // Ram_2,24.4
GE09ram_02_u:2214: yadi tvaṃ prasthito durgaṃ vanam adyaiva rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:2215: agratas te gamiṣyāmi mṛdnantī kuśakaṇṭakān // Ram_2,24.5
GE09ram_02_u:2218: naya māṃ vīra viśrabdhaḥ pāpaṃ mayi na vidyate // Ram_2,24.6
GE09ram_02_u:2223: anuśiṣṭāsmi mātrā ca pitrā ca vividhāśrayam
GE09ram_02_u:2224: nāsmi samprati vaktavyā vartitavyaṃ yathā mayā // Ram_2,24.8
GE09ram_02_u:2226: sukhaṃ vane nivatsyāmi yathaiva bhavane pituḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2227: acintayantī trīṃl lokāṃś cintayantī pativratam // Ram_2,24.9
GE09ram_02_u:2230: saha raṃsye tvayā vīra vaneṣu madhugandhiṣu // Ram_2,24.10
GE09ram_02_u:2232: tvaṃ hi kartuṃ vane śakto rāma samparipālanam
GE09ram_02_u:2233: anyasyāpi janasyeha kiṃ punar mama mānada // Ram_2,24.11
GE09ram_02_u:2236: na te duḥkhaṃ kariṣyāmi nivasantī saha tvayā // Ram_2,24.12
GE09ram_02_u:2238: icchāmi saritaḥ śailān palvalāni vanāni ca
GE09ram_02_u:2239: draṣṭuṃ sarvatra nirbhītā tvayā nāthena dhīmatā // Ram_2,24.13
GE09ram_02_u:2242: iccheyaṃ sukhinī draṣṭuṃ tvayā vīreṇa saṃgatā // Ram_2,24.14
GE09ram_02_u:2245: evaṃ varṣasahasrāṇāṃ śataṃ vāhaṃ tvayā saha // Ram_2,24.15
GE09ram_02_u:2247: svarge 'pi ca vinā vāso bhavitā yadi rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:2248: tvayā mama naravyāghra nāhaṃ tam api rocaye // Ram_2,24.16
GE09ram_02_u:2250: ahaṃ gamiṣyāmi vanaṃ sudurgamaṃ mṛgāyutaṃ vānaravāraṇair yutam
GE09ram_02_u:2251: vane nivatsyāmi yathā pitur gṛhe tavaiva pādāv upagṛhya saṃmatā // Ram_2,24.17
GE09ram_02_u:2253: ananyabhāvām anuraktacetasaṃ tvayā viyuktāṃ maraṇāya niścitām
GE09ram_02_u:2254: nayasva māṃ sādhu kuruṣva yācanāṃ na te mayāto gurutā bhaviṣyati // Ram_2,24.18
GE09ram_02_u:2256: tathā bruvāṇām api dharmavatsalo na ca sma sītāṃ nṛvaro ninīṣati
GE09ram_02_u:2257: uvāca caināṃ bahu saṃnivartane vane nivāsasya ca duḥkhitāṃ prati // Ram_2,24.19
GE09ram_02_u:2259: sa evaṃ bruvatīṃ sītāṃ dharmajño dharmavatsalaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2260: nivartanārthe dharmātmā vākyam etad uvāca ha // Ram_2,25.1
GE09ram_02_u:2262: sīte mahākulīnāsi dharme ca niratā sadā
GE09ram_02_u:2263: ihācara svadharmaṃ tvaṃ mā yathā manasaḥ sukham // Ram_2,25.2
GE09ram_02_u:2265: sīte yathā tvāṃ vakṣyāmi tathā kāryaṃ tvayābale
GE09ram_02_u:2266: vane doṣā hi bahavo vadatas tān nibodha me // Ram_2,25.3
GE09ram_02_u:2269: bahudoṣaṃ hi kāntāraṃ vanam ity abhidhīyate // Ram_2,25.4
GE09ram_02_u:2272: sadā sukhaṃ na jānāmi duḥkham eva sadā vanam // Ram_2,25.5
GE09ram_02_u:2275: siṃhānāṃ ninadā duḥkhāḥ śrotuṃ duḥkham ato vanam // Ram_2,25.6
GE09ram_02_u:2278: rātriṣu śramakhinnena tasmād duḥkhataraṃ vanam // Ram_2,25.7
GE09ram_02_u:2283: atīva vātas timiraṃ bubhukṣā cātra nityaśaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2284: bhayāni ca mahānty atra tato duḥkhataraṃ vanam // Ram_2,25.9
