GE09ram_02_u:2286: sarīsṛpāś ca bahavo bahurūpāś ca bhāmini
GE09ram_02_u:2287: caranti pṛthivīṃ darpād ato duḥkhataraṃ vanam // Ram_2,25.10
GE09ram_02_u:2290: tiṣṭhanty āvṛtya panthānam ato duḥkhataraṃ vanam // Ram_2,25.11
GE09ram_02_u:2292: pataṃgā vṛścikāḥ kīṭā daṃśāś ca maśakaiḥ saha
GE09ram_02_u:2293: bādhante nityam abale sarvaṃ duḥkham ato vanam // Ram_2,25.12
GE09ram_02_u:2295: drumāḥ kaṇṭakinaś caiva kuśakāśāś ca bhāmini
GE09ram_02_u:2296: vane vyākulaśākhāgrās tena duḥkhataraṃ vanam // Ram_2,25.13
GE09ram_02_u:2298: tad alaṃ te vanaṃ gatvā kṣamaṃ na hi vanaṃ tava
GE09ram_02_u:2299: vimṛśann iha paśyāmi bahudoṣataraṃ vanam // Ram_2,25.14
GE09ram_02_u:2301: vanaṃ tu netuṃ na kṛtā matis tadā babhūva rāmeṇa yadā mahātmanā
GE09ram_02_u:2302: na tasya sītā vacanaṃ cakāra tat tato 'bravīd rāmam idaṃ suduḥkhitā // Ram_2,25.15
GE09ram_02_u:2304: etat tu vacanaṃ śrutvā sītā rāmasya duḥkhitā
GE09ram_02_u:2305: prasaktāśrumukhī mandam idaṃ vacanam abravīt // Ram_2,26.1
GE09ram_02_u:2307: ye tvayā kīrtitā doṣā vane vastavyatāṃ prati
GE09ram_02_u:2308: guṇān ity eva tān viddhi tava snehapuraskṛtān // Ram_2,26.2
GE09ram_02_u:2310: tvayā ca saha gantavyaṃ mayā gurujanājñayā
GE09ram_02_u:2311: tvadviyogena me rāma tyaktavyam iha jīvitam // Ram_2,26.3
GE09ram_02_u:2313: na ca māṃ tvatsamīpasthām api śaknoti rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:2314: surāṇām īśvaraḥ śakraḥ pradharṣayitum ojasā // Ram_2,26.4
GE09ram_02_u:2316: patihīnā tu yā nārī na sā śakṣyati jīvitum
GE09ram_02_u:2317: kāmam evaṃvidhaṃ rāma tvayā mama vidarśitam // Ram_2,26.5
GE09ram_02_u:2319: atha cāpi mahāprājña brāhmaṇānāṃ mayā śrutam
GE09ram_02_u:2320: purā pitṛgṛhe satyaṃ vastavyaṃ kila me vane // Ram_2,26.6
GE09ram_02_u:2325: ādeśo vanavāsasya prāptavyaḥ sa mayā kila
GE09ram_02_u:2326: sā tvayā saha tatrāhaṃ yāsyāmi priya nānyathā // Ram_2,26.8
GE09ram_02_u:2329: kālaś cāyaṃ samutpannaḥ satyavāg bhavatu dvijaḥ // Ram_2,26.9
GE09ram_02_u:2331: vanavāse hi jānāmi duḥkhāni bahudhā kila
GE09ram_02_u:2332: prāpyante niyataṃ vīra puruṣair akṛtātmabhiḥ // Ram_2,26.10
GE09ram_02_u:2334: kanyayā ca pitur gehe vanavāsaḥ śruto mayā
GE09ram_02_u:2335: bhikṣiṇyāḥ sādhuvṛttāyā mama mātur ihāgrataḥ // Ram_2,26.11
GE09ram_02_u:2337: prasāditaś ca vai pūrvaṃ tvaṃ vai bahuvidhaṃ prabho
GE09ram_02_u:2338: gamanaṃ vanavāsasya kāṅkṣitaṃ hi saha tvayā // Ram_2,26.12
GE09ram_02_u:2340: kṛtakṣaṇāhaṃ bhadraṃ te gamanaṃ prati rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:2341: vanavāsasya śūrasya caryā hi mama rocate // Ram_2,26.13
GE09ram_02_u:2344: bhartāram anugacchantī bhartā hi mama daivatam // Ram_2,26.14
GE09ram_02_u:2346: pretyabhāve 'pi kalyāṇaḥ saṃgamo me saha tvayā
GE09ram_02_u:2347: śrutir hi śrūyate puṇyā brāhmaṇānāṃ yaśasvinām // Ram_2,26.15
GE09ram_02_u:2349: iha loke ca pitṛbhir yā strī yasya mahāmate
GE09ram_02_u:2350: adbhir dattā svadharmeṇa pretyabhāve 'pi tasya sā // Ram_2,26.16
GE09ram_02_u:2352: evam asmāt svakāṃ nārīṃ suvṛttāṃ hi pativratām
GE09ram_02_u:2353: nābhirocayase netuṃ tvaṃ māṃ keneha hetunā // Ram_2,26.17
GE09ram_02_u:2355: bhaktāṃ pativratāṃ dīnāṃ māṃ samāṃ sukhaduḥkhayoḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2358: yadi māṃ duḥkhitām evaṃ vanaṃ netuṃ na cecchasi
GE09ram_02_u:2359: viṣam agniṃ jalaṃ vāham āsthāsye mṛtyukāraṇāt // Ram_2,26.19
GE09ram_02_u:2361: evaṃ bahuvidhaṃ taṃ sā yācate gamanaṃ prati
GE09ram_02_u:2362: nānumene mahābāhus tāṃ netuṃ vijanaṃ vanam // Ram_2,26.20
GE09ram_02_u:2364: evam uktā tu sā cintāṃ maithilī samupāgatā
GE09ram_02_u:2365: snāpayantīva gām uṣṇair aśrubhir nayanacyutaiḥ // Ram_2,26.21
GE09ram_02_u:2367: cintayantīṃ tathā tāṃ tu nivartayitum ātmavān
GE09ram_02_u:2368: krodhāviṣṭāṃ tu vaidehīṃ kākutstho bahv asāntvayat // Ram_2,26.22
GE09ram_02_u:2374: praṇayāc cābhimānāc ca paricikṣepa rāghavam // Ram_2,27.2
GE09ram_02_u:2376: kiṃ tvāmanyata vaidehaḥ pitā me mithilādhipaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2377: rāma jāmātaraṃ prāpya striyaṃ puruṣavigraham // Ram_2,27.3
GE09ram_02_u:2380: tejo nāsti paraṃ rāme tapatīva divākare // Ram_2,27.4
GE09ram_02_u:2382: kiṃ hi kṛtvā viṣaṇṇas tvaṃ kuto vā bhayam asti te
GE09ram_02_u:2383: yat parityaktukāmas tvaṃ mām ananyaparāyaṇām // Ram_2,27.5
GE09ram_02_u:2386: sāvitrīm iva māṃ viddhi tvam ātmavaśavartinīm // Ram_2,27.6
GE09ram_02_u:2388: na tv ahaṃ manasāpy anyaṃ draṣṭāsmi tvadṛte 'nagha
GE09ram_02_u:2389: tvayā rāghava gaccheyaṃ yathānyā kulapāṃsanī // Ram_2,27.7
GE09ram_02_u:2391: svayaṃ tu bhāryāṃ kaumārīṃ ciram adhyuṣitāṃ satīm
GE09ram_02_u:2392: śailūṣa iva māṃ rāma parebhyo dātum icchasi // Ram_2,27.8
GE09ram_02_u:2394: sa mām anādāya vanaṃ na tvaṃ prasthātum arhasi
GE09ram_02_u:2395: tapo vā yadi vāraṇyaṃ svargo vā syāt saha tvayā // Ram_2,27.9
GE09ram_02_u:2397: na ca me bhavitā tatra kaścit pathi pariśramaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2398: pṛṣṭhatas tava gacchantyā vihāraśayaneṣv api // Ram_2,27.10
GE09ram_02_u:2401: tūlājinasamasparśā mārge mama saha tvayā // Ram_2,27.11
GE09ram_02_u:2404: rajo ramaṇa tan manye parārdhyam iva candanam // Ram_2,27.12
GE09ram_02_u:2407: kuthāstaraṇatalpeṣu kiṃ syāt sukhataraṃ tataḥ // Ram_2,27.13
GE09ram_02_u:2409: pattraṃ mūlaṃ phalaṃ yat tvam alpaṃ vā yadi vā bahu
GE09ram_02_u:2410: dāsyasi svayam āhṛtya tan me 'mṛtarasopamam // Ram_2,27.14
GE09ram_02_u:2412: na mātur na pitus tatra smariṣyāmi na veśmanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2413: ārtavāny upabhuñjānā puṣpāṇi ca phalāni ca // Ram_2,27.15
GE09ram_02_u:2415: na ca tatra gataḥ kiṃcid draṣṭum arhasi vipriyam
GE09ram_02_u:2416: matkṛte na ca te śoko na bhaviṣyāmi durbharā // Ram_2,27.16
GE09ram_02_u:2418: yas tvayā saha sa svargo nirayo yas tvayā vinā
GE09ram_02_u:2419: iti jānan parāṃ prītiṃ gaccha rāma mayā saha // Ram_2,27.17
GE09ram_02_u:2421: atha mām evam avyagrāṃ vanaṃ naiva nayiṣyasi
GE09ram_02_u:2422: viṣam adyaiva pāsyāmi mā viśaṃ dviṣatāṃ vaśam // Ram_2,27.18
GE09ram_02_u:2424: paścād api hi duḥkhena mama naivāsti jīvitam
GE09ram_02_u:2425: ujjhitāyās tvayā nātha tadaiva maraṇaṃ varam // Ram_2,27.19
GE09ram_02_u:2427: idaṃ hi sahituṃ śokaṃ muhūrtam api notsahe
GE09ram_02_u:2428: kiṃ punar daśavarṣāṇi trīṇi caikaṃ ca duḥkhitā // Ram_2,27.20
GE09ram_02_u:2430: iti sā śokasaṃtaptā vilapya karuṇaṃ bahu
GE09ram_02_u:2431: cukrośa patim āyastā bhṛśam āliṅgya sasvaram // Ram_2,27.21
GE09ram_02_u:2433: sā viddhā bahubhir vākyair digdhair iva gajāṅganā
GE09ram_02_u:2439: tāṃ pariṣvajya bāhubhyāṃ visaṃjñām iva duḥkhitām
GE09ram_02_u:2440: uvāca vacanaṃ rāmaḥ pariviśvāsayaṃs tadā // Ram_2,27.24
GE09ram_02_u:2442: na devi tava duḥkhena svargam apy abhirocaye
GE09ram_02_u:2443: na hi me 'sti bhayaṃ kiṃcit svayambhor iva sarvataḥ // Ram_2,27.25
GE09ram_02_u:2446: vāsaṃ na rocaye 'raṇye śaktimān api rakṣaṇe // Ram_2,27.26
GE09ram_02_u:2448: yat sṛṣṭāsi mayā sārdhaṃ vanavāsāya maithili
GE09ram_02_u:2449: na vihātuṃ mayā śakyā kīrtir ātmavatā yathā // Ram_2,27.27
GE09ram_02_u:2451: dharmas tu gajanāsoru sadbhir ācaritaḥ purā
GE09ram_02_u:2452: taṃ cāham anuvarte 'dya yathā sūryaṃ suvarcalā // Ram_2,27.28
GE09ram_02_u:2454: eṣa dharmas tu suśroṇi pitur mātuś ca vaśyatā
GE09ram_02_u:2455: ataś cājñāṃ vyatikramya nāhaṃ jīvitum utsahe // Ram_2,27.29
GE09ram_02_u:2457: sa māṃ pitā yathā śāsti satyadharmapathe sthitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2458: tathā vartitum icchāmi sa hi dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2459: anugacchasva māṃ bhīru sahadharmacarī bhava // Ram_2,27.30
GE09ram_02_u:2461: brāhmaṇebhyaś ca ratnāni bhikṣukebhyaś ca bhojanam
GE09ram_02_u:2462: dehi cāśaṃsamānebhyaḥ saṃtvarasva ca māciram // Ram_2,27.31
GE09ram_02_u:2464: anukūlaṃ tu sā bhartur jñātvā gamanam ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2465: kṣipraṃ pramuditā devī dātum evopacakrame // Ram_2,27.32
GE09ram_02_u:2467: tataḥ prahṛṣṭā paripūrṇamānasā yaśasvinī bhartur avekṣya bhāṣitam
GE09ram_02_u:2468: dhanāni ratnāni ca dātum aṅganā pracakrame dharmabhṛtāṃ manasvinī // Ram_2,27.33
GE09ram_02_u:2471: sthitaṃ prāggāminaṃ vīraṃ yācamānaṃ kṛtāñjalim // Ram_2,28.1
GE09ram_02_u:2473: mayādya saha saumitre tvayi gacchati tad vanam
GE09ram_02_u:2474: ko bhariṣyati kausalyāṃ sumitrāṃ vā yaśasvinīm // Ram_2,28.2
GE09ram_02_u:2476: abhivarṣati kāmair yaḥ parjanyaḥ pṛthivīm iva
GE09ram_02_u:2479: sā hi rājyam idaṃ prāpya nṛpasyāśvapateḥ sutā
GE09ram_02_u:2480: duḥkhitānāṃ sapatnīnāṃ na kariṣyati śobhanam // Ram_2,28.4
GE09ram_02_u:2482: evam uktas tu rāmeṇa lakṣmaṇaḥ ślakṣṇayā girā
GE09ram_02_u:2483: pratyuvāca tadā rāmaṃ vākyajño vākyakovidam // Ram_2,28.5
GE09ram_02_u:2486: kausalyāṃ ca sumitrāṃ ca prayato nātra saṃśayaḥ // Ram_2,28.6
GE09ram_02_u:2488: kausalyā bibhṛyād āryā sahasram api madvidhān
GE09ram_02_u:2489: yasyāḥ sahasraṃ grāmāṇāṃ samprāptam upajīvanam // Ram_2,28.7
GE09ram_02_u:2492: agratas te gamiṣyāmi panthānam anudarśayan // Ram_2,28.8
GE09ram_02_u:2494: āhariṣyāmi te nityaṃ mūlāni ca phalāni ca
GE09ram_02_u:2495: vanyāni yāni cānyāni svāhārāṇi tapasvinām // Ram_2,28.9
GE09ram_02_u:2497: bhavāṃs tu saha vaidehyā girisānuṣu raṃsyate
GE09ram_02_u:2498: ahaṃ sarvaṃ kariṣyāmi jāgrataḥ svapataś ca te // Ram_2,28.10
GE09ram_02_u:2500: rāmas tv anena vākyena suprītaḥ pratyuvāca tam
GE09ram_02_u:2501: vrajāpṛcchasva saumitre sarvam eva suhṛjjanam // Ram_2,28.11
GE09ram_02_u:2503: ye ca rājño dadau divye mahātmā varuṇaḥ svayam
GE09ram_02_u:2510: sa tvam āyudham ādāya kṣipram āvraja lakṣmaṇa // Ram_2,28.14
GE09ram_02_u:2516: rāmāya darśayāmāsa saumitriḥ sarvam āyudham // Ram_2,28.16
GE09ram_02_u:2518: tam uvācātmavān rāmaḥ prītyā lakṣmaṇam āgatam
GE09ram_02_u:2519: kāle tvam āgataḥ saumya kāṅkṣite mama lakṣmaṇa // Ram_2,28.17
GE09ram_02_u:2521: ahaṃ pradātum icchāmi yad idaṃ māmakaṃ dhanam
GE09ram_02_u:2522: brāhmaṇebhyas tapasvibhyas tvayā saha paraṃtapa // Ram_2,28.18
GE09ram_02_u:2525: teṣām api ca me bhūyaḥ sarveṣāṃ copajīvinām // Ram_2,28.19
GE09ram_02_u:2527: vasiṣṭhaputraṃ tu suyajñam āryaṃ tvam ānayāśu pravaraṃ dvijānām
GE09ram_02_u:2528: abhiprayāsyāmi vanaṃ samastān abhyarcya śiṣṭān aparān dvijātīn // Ram_2,28.20
GE09ram_02_u:2530: tataḥ śāsanam ājñāya bhrātuḥ śubhataraṃ priyam
GE09ram_02_u:2531: gatvā sa praviveśāśu suyajñasya niveśanam // Ram_2,29.1
GE09ram_02_u:2534: sakhe 'bhyāgaccha paśya tvaṃ veśma duṣkarakāriṇaḥ // Ram_2,29.2
GE09ram_02_u:2536: tataḥ saṃdhyām upāsyāśu gatvā saumitriṇā saha
GE09ram_02_u:2537: juṣṭaṃ tat prāviśal lakṣmyā ramyaṃ rāmaniveśanam // Ram_2,29.3
GE09ram_02_u:2539: tam āgataṃ vedavidaṃ prāñjaliḥ sītayā saha
GE09ram_02_u:2543: sahemasūtrair maṇibhiḥ keyūrair valayair api // Ram_2,29.5
GE09ram_02_u:2545: anyaiś ca ratnair bahubhiḥ kākutsthaḥ pratyapūjayat
GE09ram_02_u:2546: suyajñaṃ sa tadovāca rāmaḥ sītāpracoditaḥ // Ram_2,29.6
GE09ram_02_u:2548: hāraṃ ca hemasūtraṃ ca bhāryāyai saumya hāraya
GE09ram_02_u:2549: raśanāṃ cādhunā sītā dātum icchati te sakhe // Ram_2,29.7
GE09ram_02_u:2552: tam apīcchati vaidehī pratiṣṭhāpayituṃ tvayi // Ram_2,29.8
GE09ram_02_u:2554: nāgaḥ śatruṃjayo nāma mātulo yaṃ dadau mama
GE09ram_02_u:2555: taṃ te gajasahasreṇa dadāmi dvijapuṃgava // Ram_2,29.9
GE09ram_02_u:2557: ity uktaḥ sa hi rāmeṇa suyajñaḥ pratigṛhya tat
GE09ram_02_u:2560: atha bhrātaram avyagraṃ priyaṃ rāmaḥ priyaṃvadaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2561: saumitriṃ tam uvācedaṃ brahmeva tridaśeśvaram // Ram_2,29.11
GE09ram_02_u:2563: agastyaṃ kauśikaṃ caiva tāv ubhau brāhmaṇottamau
GE09ram_02_u:2564: arcayāhūya saumitre ratnaiḥ sasyam ivāmbubhiḥ // Ram_2,29.12
GE09ram_02_u:2566: kausalyāṃ ca ya āśīrbhir bhaktaḥ paryupatiṣṭhati
GE09ram_02_u:2567: ācāryas taittirīyāṇām abhirūpaś ca vedavit // Ram_2,29.13
GE09ram_02_u:2569: tasya yānaṃ ca dāsīś ca saumitre saṃpradāpaya
GE09ram_02_u:2570: kauśeyāni ca vastrāṇi yāvat tuṣyati sa dvijaḥ // Ram_2,29.14
GE09ram_02_u:2573: toṣayainaṃ mahārhaiś ca ratnair vastrair dhanais tathā // Ram_2,29.15
GE09ram_02_u:2575: śālivāhasahasraṃ ca dve śate bhadrakāṃs tathā
GE09ram_02_u:2576: vyañjanārthaṃ ca saumitre gosahasram upākuru // Ram_2,29.16
GE09ram_02_u:2578: tataḥ sa puruṣavyāghras tad dhanaṃ lakṣmaṇaḥ svayam
GE09ram_02_u:2579: yathoktaṃ brāhmaṇendrāṇām adadād dhanado yathā // Ram_2,29.17
GE09ram_02_u:2584: lakṣmaṇasya ca yad veśma gṛhaṃ ca yad idaṃ mama
GE09ram_02_u:2585: aśūnyaṃ kāryam ekaikaṃ yāvadāgamanaṃ mama // Ram_2,29.19
GE09ram_02_u:2587: ity uktvā duḥkhitaṃ sarvaṃ janaṃ tam upajīvinam
GE09ram_02_u:2589: tato 'sya dhanam ājahruḥ sarvam evopajīvinaḥ // Ram_2,29.20
GE09ram_02_u:2591: tataḥ sa puruṣavyāghras tad dhanaṃ sahalakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2594: tatrāsīt piṅgalo gārgyas trijaṭo nāma vai dvijaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2595: ā pañcamāyāḥ kakṣyāyā nainaṃ kaścid avārayat // Ram_2,29.22
GE09ram_02_u:2597: sa rājaputram āsādya trijaṭo vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:2599: uñchavṛttir vane nityaṃ pratyavekṣasva mām iti // Ram_2,29.23
GE09ram_02_u:2602: gavāṃ sahasram apy ekaṃ na tu viśrāṇitaṃ mayā
GE09ram_02_u:2603: parikṣipasi daṇḍena yāvat tāvad avāpsyasi // Ram_2,29.24
GE09ram_02_u:2605: sa śāṭīṃ tvaritaḥ kaṭyāṃ saṃbhrāntaḥ pariveṣṭya tām
GE09ram_02_u:2606: āvidhya daṇḍaṃ cikṣepa sarvaprāṇena vegitaḥ // Ram_2,29.25
GE09ram_02_u:2608: uvāca ca tato rāmas taṃ gārgyam abhisāntvayan
GE09ram_02_u:2609: manyur na khalu kartavyaḥ parihāso hy ayaṃ mama // Ram_2,29.26
GE09ram_02_u:2611: tataḥ sabhāryas trijaṭo mahāmunir gavām anīkaṃ pratigṛhya moditaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2612: yaśobalaprītisukhopabṛṃhiṇīs tad āśiṣaḥ pratyavadan mahātmanaḥ // Ram_2,29.27
GE09ram_02_u:2614: dattvā tu saha vaidehyā brāhmaṇebhyo dhanaṃ bahu
GE09ram_02_u:2615: jagmatuḥ pitaraṃ draṣṭuṃ sītayā saha rāghavau // Ram_2,30.1
GE09ram_02_u:2621: adhiruhya janaḥ śrīmān udāsīno vyalokayat // Ram_2,30.3
GE09ram_02_u:2623: na hi rathyāḥ sma śakyante gantuṃ bahujanākulāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2624: āruhya tasmāt prāsādān dīnāḥ paśyanti rāghavam // Ram_2,30.4
GE09ram_02_u:2626: padātiṃ varjitacchattraṃ rāmaṃ dṛṣṭvā tadā janāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2629: yaṃ yāntam anuyāti sma caturaṅgabalaṃ mahat
GE09ram_02_u:2630: tam ekaṃ sītayā sārdham anuyāti sma lakṣmaṇaḥ // Ram_2,30.6
GE09ram_02_u:2632: aiśvaryasya rasajñaḥ san kāmināṃ caiva kāmadaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2633: necchaty evānṛtaṃ kartuṃ pitaraṃ dharmagauravāt // Ram_2,30.7
GE09ram_02_u:2635: yā na śakyā purā draṣṭuṃ bhūtair ākāśagair api
GE09ram_02_u:2636: tām adya sītāṃ paśyanti rājamārgagatā janāḥ // Ram_2,30.8
GE09ram_02_u:2639: varṣam uṣṇaṃ ca śītaṃ ca neṣyaty āśu vivarṇatām // Ram_2,30.9
GE09ram_02_u:2641: adya nūnaṃ daśarathaḥ sattvam āviśya bhāṣate
GE09ram_02_u:2642: na hi rājā priyaṃ putraṃ vivāsayitum arhati // Ram_2,30.10
GE09ram_02_u:2645: kiṃ punar yasya loko 'yaṃ jito vṛttena kevalam // Ram_2,30.11
GE09ram_02_u:2647: ānṛśaṃsyam anukrośaḥ śrutaṃ śīlaṃ damaḥ śamaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2648: rāghavaṃ śobhayanty ete ṣaḍguṇāḥ puruṣottamam // Ram_2,30.12
GE09ram_02_u:2653: pīḍayā pīḍitaṃ sarvaṃ jagad asya jagatpateḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2656: te lakṣmaṇa iva kṣipraṃ sapatnyaḥ sahabāndhavāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2657: gacchantam anugacchāmo yena gacchati rāghavaḥ // Ram_2,30.15
GE09ram_02_u:2659: udyānāni parityajya kṣetrāṇi ca gṛhāṇi ca
GE09ram_02_u:2668: vanaṃ nagaram evāstu yena gacchati rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2669: asmābhiś ca parityaktaṃ puraṃ saṃpadyatāṃ vanam // Ram_2,30.19
GE09ram_02_u:2672: asmattyaktaṃ prapadyantāṃ sevyamānaṃ tyajantu ca // Ram_2,30.20
GE09ram_02_u:2675: śuśrāva rāmaḥ śrutvā ca na vicakre 'sya mānasam // Ram_2,30.21
GE09ram_02_u:2678: jagāma rāmaḥ pitaraṃ didṛkṣuḥ pitur nideśaṃ vidhivac cikīrṣuḥ // Ram_2,30.22
GE09ram_02_u:2680: tat pūrvam aikṣvākasuto mahātmā rāmo gamiṣyan vanam ārtarūpam
GE09ram_02_u:2681: vyatiṣṭhata prekṣya tadā sumantraṃ pitur mahātmā pratihāraṇārtham // Ram_2,30.23
GE09ram_02_u:2683: pitur nideśena tu dharmavatsalo vanapraveśe kṛtabuddhiniścayaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2684: sa rāghavaḥ prekṣya sumantram abravīn nivedayasvāgamanaṃ nṛpāya me // Ram_2,30.24
GE09ram_02_u:2687: praviśya nṛpatiṃ sūto niḥśvasantaṃ dadarśa ha // Ram_2,31.1
GE09ram_02_u:2690: rāmam evānuśocantaṃ sūtaḥ prāñjalir āsadat // Ram_2,31.2
GE09ram_02_u:2692: ayaṃ sa puruṣavyāghra dvāri tiṣṭhati te sutaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2693: brāhmaṇebhyo dhanaṃ dattvā sarvaṃ caivopajīvinām // Ram_2,31.3
GE09ram_02_u:2695: sa tvā paśyatu bhadraṃ te rāmaḥ satyaparākramaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2696: sarvān suhṛda āpṛcchya tvām idānīṃ didṛkṣate // Ram_2,31.4
GE09ram_02_u:2699: vṛtaṃ rājaguṇaiḥ sarvair ādityam iva raśmibhiḥ // Ram_2,31.5
GE09ram_02_u:2702: ākāśa iva niṣpaṅko narendraḥ pratyuvāca tam // Ram_2,31.6
GE09ram_02_u:2704: sumantrānaya me dārān ye kecid iha māmakāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2705: dāraiḥ parivṛtaḥ sarvair draṣṭum icchāmi rāghavam // Ram_2,31.7
GE09ram_02_u:2707: so 'ntaḥpuram atītyaiva striyas tā vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:2708: āryo hvayati vo rājā gamyatāṃ tatra māciram // Ram_2,31.8
GE09ram_02_u:2710: evam uktāḥ striyaḥ sarvāḥ sumantreṇa nṛpājñayā
GE09ram_02_u:2711: pracakramus tad bhavanaṃ bhartur ājñāya śāsanam // Ram_2,31.9
GE09ram_02_u:2714: kausalyāṃ parivāryātha śanair jagmur dhṛtavratāḥ // Ram_2,31.10
GE09ram_02_u:2717: uvāca rājā taṃ sūtaṃ sumantrānaya me sutam // Ram_2,31.11
GE09ram_02_u:2719: sa sūto rāmam ādāya lakṣmaṇaṃ maithilīṃ tadā
GE09ram_02_u:2722: sa rājā putram āyāntaṃ dṛṣṭvā dūrāt kṛtāñjalim
GE09ram_02_u:2726: tam asaṃprāpya duḥkhārtaḥ papāta bhuvi mūrchitaḥ // Ram_2,31.14
GE09ram_02_u:2728: taṃ rāmo 'bhyapatat kṣipraṃ lakṣmaṇaś ca mahārathaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2729: visaṃjñam iva duḥkhena saśokaṃ nṛpatiṃ tadā // Ram_2,31.15
GE09ram_02_u:2732: hā hā rāmeti sahasā bhūṣaṇadhvanimūrchitaḥ // Ram_2,31.16
GE09ram_02_u:2734: taṃ pariṣvajya bāhubhyāṃ tāv ubhau rāmalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_02_u:2735: paryaṅke sītayā sārdhaṃ rudantaḥ samaveśayan // Ram_2,31.17
GE09ram_02_u:2740: āpṛcche tvāṃ mahārāja sarveṣām īśvaro 'si naḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2741: prasthitaṃ daṇḍakāraṇyaṃ paśya tvaṃ kuśalena mām // Ram_2,31.19
GE09ram_02_u:2743: lakṣmaṇaṃ cānujānīhi sītā cānveti māṃ vanam
GE09ram_02_u:2744: kāraṇair bahubhis tathyair vāryamāṇau na cecchataḥ // Ram_2,31.20
GE09ram_02_u:2746: anujānīhi sarvān naḥ śokam utsṛjya mānada
GE09ram_02_u:2747: lakṣmaṇaṃ māṃ ca sītāṃ ca prajāpatir iva prajāḥ // Ram_2,31.21
GE09ram_02_u:2750: uvāca rājā samprekṣya vanavāsāya rāghavam // Ram_2,31.22
GE09ram_02_u:2753: ayodhyāyās tvam evādya bhava rājā nigṛhya mām // Ram_2,31.23
GE09ram_02_u:2755: evam ukto nṛpatinā rāmo dharmabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2759: ahaṃ tv araṇye vatsyāmi na me kāryaṃ tvayānṛtam // Ram_2,31.25
GE09ram_02_u:2764: adya tv idānīṃ rajanīṃ putra mā gaccha sarvathā
GE09ram_02_u:2765: mātaraṃ māṃ ca saṃpaśyan vasemām adya śarvarīm
GE09ram_02_u:2766: tarpitaḥ sarvakāmais tvaṃ śvaḥkāle sādhayiṣyasi // Ram_2,31.27
GE09ram_02_u:2768: atha rāmas tathā śrutvā pitur ārtasya bhāṣitam
GE09ram_02_u:2769: lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā dīno vacanam abravīt // Ram_2,31.28
GE09ram_02_u:2771: prāpsyāmi yān adya guṇān ko me śvastān pradāsyati
GE09ram_02_u:2772: apakramaṇam evātaḥ sarvakāmair ahaṃ vṛṇe // Ram_2,31.29
GE09ram_02_u:2775: mayā visṛṣṭā vasudhā bharatāya pradīyatām // Ram_2,31.30
GE09ram_02_u:2777: apagacchatu te duḥkhaṃ mā bhūr bāṣpapariplutaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2778: na hi kṣubhyati durdharṣaḥ samudraḥ saritāṃ patiḥ // Ram_2,31.31
GE09ram_02_u:2780: naivāhaṃ rājyam icchāmi na sukhaṃ na ca maithilīm
GE09ram_02_u:2781: tvām ahaṃ satyam icchāmi nānṛtaṃ puruṣarṣabha // Ram_2,31.32
GE09ram_02_u:2783: puraṃ ca rāṣṭraṃ ca mahī ca kevalā mayā nisṛṣṭā bharatāya dīyatām
GE09ram_02_u:2784: ahaṃ nideśaṃ bhavato 'nupālayan vanaṃ gamiṣyāmi cirāya sevitum // Ram_2,31.33
GE09ram_02_u:2786: mayā nisṛṣṭāṃ bharato mahīm imāṃ saśailakhaṇḍāṃ sapurāṃ sakānanām
GE09ram_02_u:2787: śivāṃ susīmām anuśāstu kevalaṃ tvayā yad uktaṃ nṛpate yathāstu tat // Ram_2,31.34
GE09ram_02_u:2789: na me tathā pārthiva dhīyate mano mahatsu kāmeṣu na cātmanaḥ priye
GE09ram_02_u:2790: yathā nideśe tava śiṣṭasaṃmate vyapaitu duḥkhaṃ tava matkṛte 'nagha // Ram_2,31.35
GE09ram_02_u:2792: tad adya naivānagha rājyam avyayaṃ na sarvakāmān na sukhaṃ na maithilīm
GE09ram_02_u:2793: na jīvitaṃ tvām anṛtena yojayan vṛṇīya satyaṃ vratam astu te tathā // Ram_2,31.36
GE09ram_02_u:2795: phalāni mūlāni ca bhakṣayan vane girīṃś ca paśyan saritaḥ sarāṃsi ca
GE09ram_02_u:2796: vanaṃ praviśyaiva vicitrapādapaṃ sukhī bhaviṣyāmi tavāstu nirvṛtiḥ // Ram_2,31.37
GE09ram_02_u:2799: sabāṣpam atiniḥśvasya jagādedaṃ punaḥ punaḥ // Ram_2,32.1
GE09ram_02_u:2807: ye cainam upajīvanti ramate yaiś ca vīryataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2808: teṣāṃ bahuvidhaṃ dattvā tān apy atra niyojaya // Ram_2,32.4
GE09ram_02_u:2810: nighnan mṛgān kuñjarāṃś ca pibaṃś cāraṇyakaṃ madhu
GE09ram_02_u:2811: nadīś ca vividhāḥ paśyan na rājyaṃ saṃsmariṣyati // Ram_2,32.5
GE09ram_02_u:2813: dhānyakośaś ca yaḥ kaścid dhanakośaś ca māmakaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2814: tau rāmam anugacchetāṃ vasantaṃ nirjane vane // Ram_2,32.6
GE09ram_02_u:2817: ṛṣibhiś ca samāgamya pravatsyati sukhaṃ vane // Ram_2,32.7
GE09ram_02_u:2820: sarvakāmaiḥ punaḥ śrīmān rāmaḥ saṃsādhyatām iti // Ram_2,32.8
GE09ram_02_u:2822: evaṃ bruvati kākutsthe kaikeyyā bhayam āgatam
GE09ram_02_u:2823: mukhaṃ cāpy agamacchoṣaṃ svaraś cāpi nyarudhyata // Ram_2,32.9
GE09ram_02_u:2825: sā viṣaṇṇā ca saṃtrastā kaikeyī vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:2826: rājyaṃ gatajanaṃ sādho pītamaṇḍāṃ surām iva
GE09ram_02_u:2831: vahantaṃ kiṃ tudasi māṃ niyujya dhuri māhite // Ram_2,32.11
GE09ram_02_u:2833: kaikeyī dviguṇaṃ kruddhā rājānam idam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:2834: tavaiva vaṃśe sagaro jyeṣṭhaṃ putram upārudhat
GE09ram_02_u:2835: asamañja iti khyātaṃ tathāyaṃ gantum arhati // Ram_2,32.12
GE09ram_02_u:2837: evam ukto dhig ity eva rājā daśaratho 'bravīt
GE09ram_02_u:2838: vrīḍitaś ca janaḥ sarvaḥ sā ca tan nāvabudhyata // Ram_2,32.13
GE09ram_02_u:2840: tatra vṛddho mahāmātraḥ siddhārtho nāma nāmataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2841: śucir bahumato rājñaḥ kaikeyīm idam abravīt // Ram_2,32.14
GE09ram_02_u:2843: asamañjo gṛhītvā tu krīḍitaḥ pathi dārakān
GE09ram_02_u:2844: sarayvāḥ prakṣipann apsu ramate tena durmatiḥ // Ram_2,32.15
GE09ram_02_u:2846: taṃ dṛṣṭvā nāgarāḥ sarve kruddhā rājānam abruvan
GE09ram_02_u:2847: asamañjaṃ vṛṇīṣvaikam asmān vā rāṣṭravardhana // Ram_2,32.16
GE09ram_02_u:2849: tān uvāca tato rājā kiṃnimittam idaṃ bhayam
GE09ram_02_u:2850: tāś cāpi rājñā saṃpṛṣṭā vākyaṃ prakṛtayo 'bruvan // Ram_2,32.17
GE09ram_02_u:2852: krīḍitas tv eṣa naḥ putrān bālān udbhrāntacetanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2853: sarayvāṃ prakṣipan maurkhyād atulāṃ prītim aśnute // Ram_2,32.18
GE09ram_02_u:2855: sa tāsāṃ vacanaṃ śrutvā prakṛtīnāṃ narādhipa
GE09ram_02_u:2856: taṃ tatyājāhitaṃ putraṃ tāsāṃ priyacikīrṣayā // Ram_2,32.19
GE09ram_02_u:2858: ity evam atyajad rājā sagaro vai sudhārmikaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2859: rāmaḥ kim akarot pāpaṃ yenaivam uparudhyate // Ram_2,32.20
GE09ram_02_u:2862: śokopahatayā vācā kaikeyīm idam abravīt // Ram_2,32.21
GE09ram_02_u:2864: anuvrajiṣyāmy aham adya rāmaṃ rājyaṃ parityajya sukhaṃ dhanaṃ ca
GE09ram_02_u:2865: sahaiva rājñā bharatena ca tvaṃ yathā sukhaṃ bhuṅkṣva cirāya rājyam // Ram_2,32.22
GE09ram_02_u:2868: anvabhāṣata vākyaṃ tu vinayajño vinītavat // Ram_2,33.1
GE09ram_02_u:2870: tyaktabhogasya me rājan vane vanyena jīvataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2871: kiṃ kāryam anuyātreṇa tyaktasaṅgasya sarvataḥ // Ram_2,33.2
GE09ram_02_u:2873: yo hi dattvā dvipaśreṣṭhaṃ kakṣyāyāṃ kurute manaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2874: rajjusnehena kiṃ tasya tyajataḥ kuñjarottamam // Ram_2,33.3
GE09ram_02_u:2876: tathā mama satāṃ śreṣṭha kiṃ dhvajinyā jagatpate
GE09ram_02_u:2877: sarvāṇy evānujānāmi cīrāṇy evānayantu me // Ram_2,33.4
GE09ram_02_u:2880: caturdaśa vane vāsaṃ varṣāṇi vasato mama // Ram_2,33.5
GE09ram_02_u:2882: atha cīrāṇi kaikeyī svayam āhṛtya rāghavam
GE09ram_02_u:2885: sa cīre puruṣavyāghraḥ kaikeyyāḥ pratigṛhya te
GE09ram_02_u:2886: sūkṣmavastram avakṣipya munivastrāṇy avasta ha // Ram_2,33.7
GE09ram_02_u:2888: lakṣmaṇaś cāpi tatraiva vihāya vasane śubhe
GE09ram_02_u:2889: tāpasāc chādane caiva jagrāha pitur agrataḥ // Ram_2,33.8
GE09ram_02_u:2892: samīkṣya cīraṃ saṃtrastā pṛṣatī vāgurām iva // Ram_2,33.9
GE09ram_02_u:2896: kathaṃ nu cīraṃ badhnanti munayo vanavāsinaḥ // Ram_2,33.10
GE09ram_02_u:2898: kṛtvā kaṇṭhe ca sā cīram ekam ādāya pāṇinā
GE09ram_02_u:2899: tasthau hy akuśalā tatra vrīḍitā janakātmajā // Ram_2,33.11
GE09ram_02_u:2901: tasyās tat kṣipram āgamya rāmo dharmabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2902: cīraṃ babandha sītāyāḥ kauśeyasyopari svayam // Ram_2,33.12
GE09ram_02_u:2905: pracukrośa janaḥ sarvo dhik tvāṃ daśarathaṃ tv iti // Ram_2,33.13
GE09ram_02_u:2907: sa niḥśvasyoṣṇam aikṣvākas tāṃ bhāryām idam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:2908: kaikeyi kuśacīreṇa na sītā gantum arhati // Ram_2,33.14
GE09ram_02_u:2910: nanu paryāptam etat te pāpe rāmavivāsanam
GE09ram_02_u:2911: kim ebhiḥ kṛpaṇair bhūyaḥ pātakair api te kṛtaiḥ // Ram_2,33.15
GE09ram_02_u:2913: evaṃ bruvantaṃ pitaraṃ rāmaḥ samprasthito vanam
GE09ram_02_u:2914: avākśirasam āsīnam idaṃ vacanam abravīt // Ram_2,33.16
GE09ram_02_u:2916: iyaṃ dhārmika kausalyā mama mātā yaśasvinī
GE09ram_02_u:2917: vṛddhā cākṣudraśīlā ca na ca tvāṃ devagarhite // Ram_2,33.17
GE09ram_02_u:2922: imāṃ mahendropamajātagarbhiṇīṃ tathā vidhātuṃ jananīṃ mamārhasi
GE09ram_02_u:2923: yathā vanasthe mayi śokakarśitā na jīvitaṃ nyasya yamakṣayaṃ vrajet // Ram_2,33.19
GE09ram_02_u:2925: rāmasya tu vacaḥ śrutvā muniveṣadharaṃ ca tam
GE09ram_02_u:2926: samīkṣya saha bhāryābhī rājā vigatacetanaḥ // Ram_2,34.1
GE09ram_02_u:2929: na cainam abhisamprekṣya pratyabhāṣata durmanāḥ // Ram_2,34.2
GE09ram_02_u:2931: sa muhūrtam ivāsaṃjño duḥkhitaś ca mahīpatiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2934: manye khalu mayā pūrvaṃ vivatsā bahavaḥ kṛtāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2935: prāṇino hiṃsitā vāpi tasmād idam upasthitam // Ram_2,34.4
GE09ram_02_u:2937: na tv evānāgate kāle dehāc cyavati jīvitam
GE09ram_02_u:2938: kaikeyyā kliśyamānasya mṛtyur mama na vidyate // Ram_2,34.5
GE09ram_02_u:2941: vihāya vasane sūkṣme tāpasācchādam ātmajam // Ram_2,34.6
GE09ram_02_u:2943: ekasyāḥ khalu kaikeyyāḥ kṛte 'yaṃ kliśyate janaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2944: svārthe prayatamānāyāḥ saṃśritya nikṛtiṃ tv imām // Ram_2,34.7
GE09ram_02_u:2946: evam uktvā tu vacanaṃ bāṣpeṇa pihitendriyaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2947: rāmeti sakṛd evoktvā vyāhartuṃ na śaśāka ha // Ram_2,34.8
GE09ram_02_u:2949: saṃjñāṃ tu pratilabhyaiva muhūrtāt sa mahīpatiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2950: netrābhyām aśrupūrṇābhyāṃ sumantram idam abravīt // Ram_2,34.9
GE09ram_02_u:2952: aupavāhyaṃ rathaṃ yuktvā tvam āyāhi hayottamaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2953: prāpayainaṃ mahābhāgam ito janapadāt param // Ram_2,34.10
GE09ram_02_u:2955: evaṃ manye guṇavatāṃ guṇānāṃ phalam ucyate
GE09ram_02_u:2956: pitrā mātrā ca yat sādhur vīro nirvāsyate vanam // Ram_2,34.11
GE09ram_02_u:2959: yojayitvāyayau tatra ratham aśvair alaṃkṛtam // Ram_2,34.12
GE09ram_02_u:2965: uvāca deśakālajño niścitaṃ sarvataḥ śuci // Ram_2,34.14
GE09ram_02_u:2967: vāsāṃsi ca mahārhāṇi bhūṣaṇāni varāṇi ca
GE09ram_02_u:2968: varṣāṇy etāni saṃkhyāya vaidehyāḥ kṣipram ānaya // Ram_2,34.15
GE09ram_02_u:2970: narendreṇaivam uktas tu gatvā kośagṛhaṃ tataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2971: prāyacchat sarvam āhṛtya sītāyai kṣipram eva tat // Ram_2,34.16
GE09ram_02_u:2973: sā sujātā sujātāni vaidehī prasthitā vanam
GE09ram_02_u:2974: bhūṣayāmāsa gātrāṇi tair vicitrair vibhūṣaṇaiḥ // Ram_2,34.17
GE09ram_02_u:2977: udyato 'ṃśumataḥ kāle khaṃ prabheva vivasvataḥ // Ram_2,34.18
GE09ram_02_u:2979: tāṃ bhujābhyāṃ pariṣvajya śvaśrūr vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:2980: anācarantīṃ kṛpaṇaṃ mūrdhny upāghrāya maithilīm // Ram_2,34.19
GE09ram_02_u:2985: sa tvayā nāvamantavyaḥ putraḥ pravrājito mama
GE09ram_02_u:2986: tava daivatam astv eṣa nirdhanaḥ sadhano 'pi vā // Ram_2,34.21
GE09ram_02_u:2989: kṛtāñjalir uvācedaṃ śvaśrūm abhimukhe sthitā // Ram_2,34.22
GE09ram_02_u:2991: kariṣye sarvam evāham āryā yad anuśāsti mām
GE09ram_02_u:2992: abhijñāsmi yathā bhartur vartitavyaṃ śrutaṃ ca me // Ram_2,34.23
GE09ram_02_u:2995: dharmād vicalituṃ nāham alaṃ candrād iva prabhā // Ram_2,34.24
GE09ram_02_u:2997: nātantrī vādyate vīṇā nācakro vartate rathaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:2998: nāpatiḥ sukham edhate yā syād api śatātmajā // Ram_2,34.25
GE09ram_02_u:3000: mitaṃ dadāti hi pitā mitaṃ mātā mitaṃ sutaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3001: amitasya hi dātāraṃ bhartāraṃ kā na pūjayet // Ram_2,34.26
GE09ram_02_u:3004: ārye kim avamanyeyaṃ strīṇāṃ bhartā hi daivatam // Ram_2,34.27
GE09ram_02_u:3010: rāmaḥ paramadharmajño mātaraṃ vākyam abravīt // Ram_2,34.29
GE09ram_02_u:3012: amba mā duḥkhitā bhūs tvaṃ paśya tvaṃ pitaraṃ mama
GE09ram_02_u:3013: kṣayo hi vanavāsasya kṣipram eva bhaviṣyati // Ram_2,34.30
GE09ram_02_u:3015: suptāyās te gamiṣyanti navavarṣāṇi pañca ca
GE09ram_02_u:3016: sā samagram iha prāptaṃ māṃ drakṣyasi suhṛdvṛtam // Ram_2,34.31
GE09ram_02_u:3018: etāvad abhinītārtham uktvā sa jananīṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3019: trayaḥ śataśatārdhā hi dadarśāvekṣya mātaraḥ // Ram_2,34.32
GE09ram_02_u:3021: tāś cāpi sa tathaivārtā mātṝn daśarathātmajaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3022: dharmayuktam idaṃ vākyaṃ nijagāda kṛtāñjaliḥ // Ram_2,34.33
GE09ram_02_u:3024: saṃvāsāt paruṣaṃ kiṃcid ajñānād vāpi yat kṛtam
GE09ram_02_u:3025: tan me samanujānīta sarvāś cāmantrayāmi vaḥ // Ram_2,34.34
GE09ram_02_u:3027: jajñe 'tha tāsāṃ saṃnādaḥ krauñcīnām iva niḥsvanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3028: mānavendrasya bhāryāṇām evaṃ vadati rāghave // Ram_2,34.35
GE09ram_02_u:3031: vilapitaparidevanākulaṃ vyasanagataṃ tad abhūt suduḥkhitam // Ram_2,34.36
GE09ram_02_u:3033: atha rāmaś ca sītā ca lakṣmaṇaś ca kṛtāñjaliḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3034: upasaṃgṛhya rājānaṃ cakrur dīnāḥ pradakṣiṇam // Ram_2,35.1
GE09ram_02_u:3036: taṃ cāpi samanujñāpya dharmajñaḥ sītayā saha
GE09ram_02_u:3040: atha mātuḥ sumitrāyā jagrāha caraṇau punaḥ // Ram_2,35.3
GE09ram_02_u:3042: taṃ vandamānaṃ rudatī mātā saumitrim abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:3043: hitakāmā mahābāhuṃ mūrdhny upāghrāya lakṣmaṇam // Ram_2,35.4
GE09ram_02_u:3046: rāme pramādaṃ mā kārṣīḥ putra bhrātari gacchati // Ram_2,35.5
GE09ram_02_u:3048: vyasanī vā samṛddho vā gatir eṣa tavānagha
GE09ram_02_u:3049: eṣa loke satāṃ dharmo yaj jyeṣṭhavaśago bhavet // Ram_2,35.6
GE09ram_02_u:3051: idaṃ hi vṛttam ucitaṃ kulasyāsya sanātanam
GE09ram_02_u:3052: dānaṃ dīkṣā ca yajñeṣu tanutyāgo mṛdheṣu ca // Ram_2,35.7
GE09ram_02_u:3054: rāmaṃ daśarathaṃ viddhi māṃ viddhi janakātmajām
GE09ram_02_u:3055: ayodhyām aṭavīṃ viddhi gaccha tāta yathāsukham // Ram_2,35.8
GE09ram_02_u:3057: tataḥ sumantraḥ kākutsthaṃ prāñjalir vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:3058: vinīto vinayajñaś ca mātalir vāsavaṃ yathā // Ram_2,35.9
GE09ram_02_u:3060: ratham āroha bhadraṃ te rājaputra mahāyaśaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3061: kṣipraṃ tvāṃ prāpayiṣyāmi yatra māṃ rāma vakṣyasi // Ram_2,35.10
GE09ram_02_u:3063: caturdaśa hi varṣāṇi vastavyāni vane tvayā
GE09ram_02_u:3064: tāny upakramitavyāni yāni devyāsi coditaḥ // Ram_2,35.11
GE09ram_02_u:3066: taṃ rathaṃ sūryasaṃkāśaṃ sītā hṛṣṭena cetasā
GE09ram_02_u:3070: rathopasthe pratinyasya sacarmakaṭhinaṃ ca tat // Ram_2,35.13
GE09ram_02_u:3073: sumantraḥ saṃmatān aśvān vāyuvegasamāñ jave // Ram_2,35.14
GE09ram_02_u:3076: babhūva nagare mūrchā balamūrchā janasya ca // Ram_2,35.15
GE09ram_02_u:3082: rāmam evābhidudrāva gharmārtaḥ salilaṃ yathā // Ram_2,35.17
GE09ram_02_u:3085: bāṣpapūrṇamukhāḥ sarve tam ūcur bhṛśaduḥkhitāḥ // Ram_2,35.18
GE09ram_02_u:3087: saṃyaccha vājināṃ raśmīn sūta yāhi śanaiḥ śanaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3088: mukhaṃ drakṣyāmi rāmasya durdarśaṃ no bhaviṣyati // Ram_2,35.19
GE09ram_02_u:3091: yad devagarbhapratime vanaṃ yāti na bhidyate // Ram_2,35.20
GE09ram_02_u:3094: na jahāti ratā dharme merum arkaprabhā yathā // Ram_2,35.21
GE09ram_02_u:3097: bhrātaraṃ devasaṃkāśaṃ yas tvaṃ paricariṣyasi // Ram_2,35.22
GE09ram_02_u:3099: mahaty eṣā hi te siddhir eṣa cābhyudayo mahān
GE09ram_02_u:3100: eṣa svargasya mārgaś ca yad enam anugacchasi
GE09ram_02_u:3101: evaṃ vadantas te soḍhuṃ na śekur bāṣpam āgatam // Ram_2,35.23
GE09ram_02_u:3103: atha rājā vṛtaḥ strībhir dīnābhir dīnacetanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3104: nirjagāma priyaṃ putraṃ drakṣyāmīti bruvan gṛhāt // Ram_2,35.24
GE09ram_02_u:3107: yathā nādaḥ kareṇūnāṃ baddhe mahati kuñjare // Ram_2,35.25
GE09ram_02_u:3109: pitā ca rājā kākutsthaḥ śrīmān sannas tadā babhau
GE09ram_02_u:3110: paripūrṇaḥ śaśī kāle graheṇopapluto yathā // Ram_2,35.26
GE09ram_02_u:3113: narāṇāṃ prekṣya rājānaṃ sīdantaṃ bhṛśaduḥkhitam // Ram_2,35.27
GE09ram_02_u:3115: hā rāmeti janāḥ kecid rāmamāteti cāpare
GE09ram_02_u:3116: antaḥpuraṃ samṛddhaṃ ca krośantaṃ paryadevayan // Ram_2,35.28
GE09ram_02_u:3123: dṛṣṭvā saṃcodayāmāsa śīghraṃ yāhīti sārathim // Ram_2,35.30
GE09ram_02_u:3125: na hi tat puruṣavyāghro duḥkhadaṃ darśanaṃ pituḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3126: mātuś ca sahituṃ śaktas totrārdita iva dvipaḥ // Ram_2,35.31
GE09ram_02_u:3128: tathā rudantīṃ kausalyāṃ rathaṃ tam anudhāvatīm
GE09ram_02_u:3129: krośantīṃ rāma rāmeti hā sīte lakṣmaṇeti ca
GE09ram_02_u:3130: asakṛt praikṣata tadā nṛtyantīm iva mātaram // Ram_2,35.32
GE09ram_02_u:3132: tiṣṭheti rājā cukrośa yāhi yāhīti rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3133: sumantrasya babhūvātmā cakrayor iva cāntarā // Ram_2,35.33
GE09ram_02_u:3136: ciraṃ duḥkhasya pāpiṣṭham iti rāmas tam abravīt // Ram_2,35.34
GE09ram_02_u:3138: rāmasya sa vacaḥ kurvann anujñāpya ca taṃ janam
GE09ram_02_u:3139: vrajato 'pi hayāñ śīghraṃ codayāmāsa sārathiḥ // Ram_2,35.35
GE09ram_02_u:3141: nyavartata jano rājño rāmaṃ kṛtvā pradakṣiṇam
GE09ram_02_u:3142: manasāpy aśruvegaiś ca na nyavartata mānuṣam // Ram_2,35.36
GE09ram_02_u:3144: yam icchet punar āyāntaṃ nainaṃ dūram anuvrajet
GE09ram_02_u:3145: ity amātyā mahārājam ūcur daśarathaṃ vacaḥ // Ram_2,35.37
GE09ram_02_u:3148: niśamya rājā kṛpaṇaḥ sabhāryo vyavasthitas taṃ sutam īkṣamāṇaḥ // Ram_2,35.38
GE09ram_02_u:3151: ārtaśabdo hi saṃjajñe strīṇām antaḥpure mahān // Ram_2,36.1
GE09ram_02_u:3154: yo gatiḥ śaraṇaṃ cāsīt sa nāthaḥ kva nu gacchati // Ram_2,36.2
GE09ram_02_u:3157: kruddhān prasādayan sarvān samaduḥkhaḥ kva gacchati // Ram_2,36.3
GE09ram_02_u:3160: tathā yo vartate 'smāsu mahātmā kva nu gacchati // Ram_2,36.4
GE09ram_02_u:3163: paritrātā janasyāsya jagataḥ kva nu gacchati // Ram_2,36.5
GE09ram_02_u:3166: dharmyaṃ satyavrataṃ rāmaṃ vanavāse pravatsyati // Ram_2,36.6
GE09ram_02_u:3168: iti sarvā mahiṣyas tā vivatsā iva dhenavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3169: ruruduś caiva duḥkhārtāḥ sasvaraṃ ca vicukruśuḥ // Ram_2,36.7
GE09ram_02_u:3171: sa tam antaḥpure ghoram ārtaśabdaṃ mahīpatiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3175: vyasṛjan kavalān nāgā gāvo vatsān na pāyayan // Ram_2,36.9
GE09ram_02_u:3178: dāruṇāḥ somam abhyetya grahāḥ sarve vyavasthitāḥ // Ram_2,36.10
GE09ram_02_u:3181: viśākhāś ca sadhūmāś ca nabhasi pracakāśire // Ram_2,36.11
GE09ram_02_u:3183: akasmān nāgaraḥ sarvo jano dainyam upāgamat
GE09ram_02_u:3184: āhāre vā vihāre vā na kaścid akaron manaḥ // Ram_2,36.12
GE09ram_02_u:3187: na hṛṣṭo lakṣyate kaścit sarvaḥ śokaparāyaṇaḥ // Ram_2,36.13
GE09ram_02_u:3189: na vāti pavanaḥ śīto na śaśī saumyadarśanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3190: na sūryas tapate lokaṃ sarvaṃ paryākulaṃ jagat // Ram_2,36.14
GE09ram_02_u:3192: anarthinaḥ sutāḥ strīṇāṃ bhartāro bhrātaras tathā
GE09ram_02_u:3193: sarve sarvaṃ parityajya rāmam evānvacintayan // Ram_2,36.15
GE09ram_02_u:3195: ye tu rāmasya suhṛdaḥ sarve te mūḍhacetasaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3196: śokabhāreṇa cākrāntāḥ śayanaṃ na jahus tadā // Ram_2,36.16
GE09ram_02_u:3198: tatas tv ayodhyā rahitā mahātmanā puraṃdareṇeva mahī saparvatā
GE09ram_02_u:3199: cacāla ghoraṃ bhayabhārapīḍitā sanāgayodhāśvagaṇā nanāda ca // Ram_2,36.17
GE09ram_02_u:3201: yāvat tu niryatas tasya rajorūpam adṛśyata
GE09ram_02_u:3204: yāvad rājā priyaṃ putraṃ paśyaty atyantadhārmikam
GE09ram_02_u:3207: na paśyati rajo 'py asya yadā rāmasya bhūmipaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3208: tadārtaś ca viṣaṇṇaś ca papāta dharaṇītale // Ram_2,37.3
GE09ram_02_u:3210: tasya dakṣiṇam anvagāt kausalyā bāhum aṅganā
GE09ram_02_u:3211: vāmaṃ cāsyānvagāt pārśvaṃ kaikeyī bharatapriyā // Ram_2,37.4
GE09ram_02_u:3213: tāṃ nayena ca sampanno dharmeṇa vinayena ca
GE09ram_02_u:3214: uvāca rājā kaikeyīṃ samīkṣya vyathitendriyaḥ // Ram_2,37.5
GE09ram_02_u:3216: kaikeyi mā mamāṅgāni sprākṣīs tvaṃ duṣṭacāriṇī
GE09ram_02_u:3217: na hi tvāṃ draṣṭum icchāmi na bhāryā na ca bāndhavī // Ram_2,37.6
GE09ram_02_u:3219: ye ca tvām upajīvanti nāhaṃ teṣāṃ na te mama
GE09ram_02_u:3220: kevalārthaparāṃ hi tvāṃ tyaktadharmāṃ tyajāmy aham // Ram_2,37.7
GE09ram_02_u:3222: agṛhṇāṃ yac ca te pāṇim agniṃ paryaṇayaṃ ca yat
GE09ram_02_u:3223: anujānāmi tat sarvam asmiṃl loke paratra ca // Ram_2,37.8
GE09ram_02_u:3225: bharataś cet pratītaḥ syād rājyaṃ prāpyedam avyayam
GE09ram_02_u:3226: yan me sa dadyāt pitrarthaṃ mā mā tad dattam āgamat // Ram_2,37.9
GE09ram_02_u:3229: nyavartata tadā devī kausalyā śokakarśitā // Ram_2,37.10
GE09ram_02_u:3231: hatveva brāhmaṇaṃ kāmāt spṛṣṭvāgnim iva pāṇinā
GE09ram_02_u:3232: anvatapyata dharmātmā putraṃ saṃcintya tāpasam // Ram_2,37.11
GE09ram_02_u:3235: rājño nātibabhau rūpaṃ grastasyāṃśumato yathā // Ram_2,37.12
GE09ram_02_u:3237: vilalāpa ca duḥkhārtaḥ priyaṃ putram anusmaran
GE09ram_02_u:3238: nagarāntam anuprāptaṃ buddhvā putram athābravīt // Ram_2,37.13
GE09ram_02_u:3240: vāhanānāṃ ca mukhyānāṃ vahatāṃ taṃ mamātmajam
GE09ram_02_u:3241: padāni pathi dṛśyante sa mahātmā na dṛśyate // Ram_2,37.14
GE09ram_02_u:3243: sa nūnaṃ kvacid evādya vṛkṣamūlam upāśritaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3244: kāṣṭhaṃ vā yadi vāśmānam upadhāya śayiṣyate // Ram_2,37.15
GE09ram_02_u:3250: rāmam utthāya gacchantaṃ lokanātham anāthavat // Ram_2,37.17
GE09ram_02_u:3252: sakāmā bhava kaikeyi vidhavā rājyam āvasa
GE09ram_02_u:3253: na hi taṃ puruṣavyāghraṃ vinā jīvitum utsahe // Ram_2,37.18
GE09ram_02_u:3261: tām avekṣya purīṃ sarvāṃ rāmam evānucintayan
GE09ram_02_u:3262: vilapan prāviśad rājā gṛhaṃ sūrya ivāmbudam // Ram_2,37.21
GE09ram_02_u:3265: rāmeṇa rahitaṃ veśma vaidehyā lakṣmaṇena ca // Ram_2,37.22
GE09ram_02_u:3267: kausalyāyā gṛhaṃ śīghraṃ rāmamātur nayantu mām
GE09ram_02_u:3268: iti bruvantaṃ rājānam anayan dvāradarśinaḥ // Ram_2,37.23
GE09ram_02_u:3271: adhiruhyāpi śayanaṃ babhūva lulitaṃ manaḥ // Ram_2,37.24
GE09ram_02_u:3273: tac ca dṛṣṭvā mahārājo bhujam udyamya vīryavān
GE09ram_02_u:3274: uccaiḥ svareṇa cukrośa hā rāghava jahāsi mām // Ram_2,37.25
GE09ram_02_u:3276: sukhitā bata taṃ kālaṃ jīviṣyanti narottamāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3277: pariṣvajanto ye rāmaṃ drakṣyanti punar āgatam // Ram_2,37.26
GE09ram_02_u:3279: na tvāṃ paśyāmi kausalye sādhu māṃ pāṇinā spṛśa
GE09ram_02_u:3280: rāmaṃ me 'nugatā dṛṣṭir adyāpi na nivartate // Ram_2,37.27
GE09ram_02_u:3282: taṃ rāmam evānuvicintayantaṃ samīkṣya devī śayane narendram
GE09ram_02_u:3283: upopaviśyādhikam ārtarūpā viniḥśvasantī vilalāpa kṛcchram // Ram_2,37.28
GE09ram_02_u:3285: tataḥ samīkṣya śayane sannaṃ śokena pārthivam
GE09ram_02_u:3286: kausalyā putraśokārtā tam uvāca mahīpatim // Ram_2,38.1
GE09ram_02_u:3289: vicariṣyati kaikeyī nirmukteva hi pannagī // Ram_2,38.2
GE09ram_02_u:3292: trāsayiṣyati māṃ bhūyo duṣṭāhir iva veśmani // Ram_2,38.3
GE09ram_02_u:3294: atha sma nagare rāmaś caran bhaikṣaṃ gṛhe vaset
GE09ram_02_u:3295: kāmakāro varaṃ dātum api dāsaṃ mamātmajam // Ram_2,38.4
GE09ram_02_u:3297: pātayitvā tu kaikeyyā rāmaṃ sthānād yatheṣṭataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3301: vanam āviśate nūnaṃ sabhāryaḥ sahalakṣmaṇaḥ // Ram_2,38.6
GE09ram_02_u:3304: tyaktānāṃ vanavāsāya kā nv avasthā bhaviṣyati // Ram_2,38.7
GE09ram_02_u:3307: kathaṃ vatsyanti kṛpaṇāḥ phalamūlaiḥ kṛtāśanāḥ // Ram_2,38.8
GE09ram_02_u:3309: apīdānīṃ sa kālaḥ syān mama śokakṣayaḥ śivaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3310: sabhāryaṃ yat saha bhrātrā paśyeyam iha rāghavam // Ram_2,38.9
GE09ram_02_u:3316: nandiṣyati purī hṛṣṭā samudra iva parvaṇi // Ram_2,38.11
GE09ram_02_u:3319: puraskṛtya rathe sītāṃ vṛṣabho govadhūm iva // Ram_2,38.12
GE09ram_02_u:3324: kadā sumanasaḥ kanyā dvijātīnāṃ phalāni ca
GE09ram_02_u:3325: pradiśantyaḥ purīṃ hṛṣṭāḥ kariṣyanti pradakṣiṇam // Ram_2,38.14
GE09ram_02_u:3328: abhyupaiṣyati dharmajñas trivarṣa iva māṃ lalan // Ram_2,38.15
GE09ram_02_u:3330: niḥsaṃśayaṃ mayā manye purā vīra kadaryayā
GE09ram_02_u:3331: pātu kāmeṣu vatseṣu mātṝṇāṃ śātitāḥ stanāḥ // Ram_2,38.16
GE09ram_02_u:3333: sāhaṃ gaur iva siṃhena vivatsā vatsalā kṛtā
GE09ram_02_u:3334: kaikeyyā puruṣavyāghra bālavatseva gaur balāt // Ram_2,38.17
GE09ram_02_u:3336: na hi tāvad guṇair juṣṭaṃ sarvaśāstraviśāradam
GE09ram_02_u:3337: ekaputrā vinā putram ahaṃ jīvitum utsahe // Ram_2,38.18
GE09ram_02_u:3339: na hi me jīvite kiṃcit sāmarthyam iha kalpyate
GE09ram_02_u:3340: apaśyantyāḥ priyaṃ putraṃ mahābāhuṃ mahābalam // Ram_2,38.19
GE09ram_02_u:3342: ayaṃ hi māṃ dīpayate samutthitas tanūjaśokaprabhavo hutāśanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3343: mahīm imāṃ raśmibhir uttamaprabho yathā nidāghe bhagavān divākaraḥ // Ram_2,38.20
GE09ram_02_u:3345: vilapantīṃ tathā tāṃ tu kausalyāṃ pramadottamām
GE09ram_02_u:3346: idaṃ dharme sthitā dharmyaṃ sumitrā vākyam abravīt // Ram_2,39.1
GE09ram_02_u:3348: tavārye sadguṇair yuktaḥ putraḥ sa puruṣottamaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3349: kiṃ te vilapitenaivaṃ kṛpaṇaṃ ruditena vā // Ram_2,39.2
GE09ram_02_u:3351: yas tavārye gataḥ putras tyaktvā rājyaṃ mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3352: sādhu kurvan mahātmānaṃ pitaraṃ satyavādinām // Ram_2,39.3
GE09ram_02_u:3354: śiṣṭair ācarite samyak śaśvat pretya phalodaye
GE09ram_02_u:3355: rāmo dharme sthitaḥ śreṣṭho na sa śocyaḥ kadācana // Ram_2,39.4
GE09ram_02_u:3358: dayāvān sarvabhūteṣu lābhas tasya mahātmanaḥ // Ram_2,39.5
GE09ram_02_u:3360: araṇyavāse yad duḥkhaṃ jānatī vai sukhocitā
GE09ram_02_u:3363: kīrtibhūtāṃ patākāṃ yo loke bhrāmayati prabhuḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3364: damasatyavrataparaḥ kiṃ na prāptas tavātmajaḥ // Ram_2,39.7
GE09ram_02_u:3366: vyaktaṃ rāmasya vijñāya śaucaṃ māhātmyam uttamam
GE09ram_02_u:3367: na gātram aṃśubhiḥ sūryaḥ saṃtāpayitum arhati // Ram_2,39.8
GE09ram_02_u:3373: raśmibhiḥ saṃspṛśañ śītaiś candramā hlādayiṣyati // Ram_2,39.10
GE09ram_02_u:3375: dadau cāstrāṇi divyāni yasmai brahmā mahaujase
GE09ram_02_u:3376: dānavendraṃ hataṃ dṛṣṭvā timidhvajasutaṃ raṇe // Ram_2,39.11
GE09ram_02_u:3378: pṛthivyā saha vaidehyā śriyā ca puruṣarṣabhaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3379: kṣipraṃ tisṛbhir etābhiḥ saha rāmo 'bhiṣekṣyate // Ram_2,39.12
GE09ram_02_u:3381: duḥkhajaṃ visṛjanty asraṃ niṣkrāmantam udīkṣya yam
GE09ram_02_u:3382: samutsrakṣyasi netrābhyāṃ kṣipram ānandajaṃ payaḥ // Ram_2,39.13
GE09ram_02_u:3385: mudāśru mokṣyase kṣipraṃ meghalekheva vārṣikī // Ram_2,39.14
GE09ram_02_u:3387: putras te varadaḥ kṣipram ayodhyāṃ punar āgataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3390: niśamya tal lakṣmaṇamātṛvākyaṃ rāmasya mātur naradevapatnyāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3391: sadyaḥ śarīre vinanāśa śokaḥ śaradgato megha ivālpatoyaḥ // Ram_2,39.16
GE09ram_02_u:3394: anujagmuḥ prayāntaṃ taṃ vanavāsāya mānavāḥ // Ram_2,40.1
GE09ram_02_u:3396: nivartite 'pi ca balāt suhṛdvarge ca rājani
GE09ram_02_u:3397: naiva te saṃnyavartanta rāmasyānugatā ratham // Ram_2,40.2
GE09ram_02_u:3400: babhūva guṇasampannaḥ pūrṇacandra iva priyaḥ // Ram_2,40.3
GE09ram_02_u:3402: sa yācyamānaḥ kākutsthaḥ svābhiḥ prakṛtibhis tadā
GE09ram_02_u:3403: kurvāṇaḥ pitaraṃ satyaṃ vanam evānvapadyata // Ram_2,40.4
GE09ram_02_u:3406: uvāca rāmaḥ snehena tāḥ prajāḥ svāḥ prajā iva // Ram_2,40.5
GE09ram_02_u:3408: yā prītir bahumānaś ca mayy ayodhyānivāsinām
GE09ram_02_u:3409: matpriyārthaṃ viśeṣeṇa bharate sā niveśyatām // Ram_2,40.6
GE09ram_02_u:3412: kariṣyati yathāvad vaḥ priyāṇi ca hitāni ca // Ram_2,40.7
GE09ram_02_u:3415: anurūpaḥ sa vo bhartā bhaviṣyati bhayāpahaḥ // Ram_2,40.8
GE09ram_02_u:3417: sa hi rājaguṇair yukto yuvarājaḥ samīkṣitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3418: api cāpi mayā śiṣṭaiḥ kāryaṃ vo bhartṛśāsanam // Ram_2,40.9
GE09ram_02_u:3420: na ca tapyed yathā cāsau vanavāsaṃ gate mayi
GE09ram_02_u:3421: mahārājas tathā kāryo mama priyacikīrṣayā // Ram_2,40.10
GE09ram_02_u:3424: tathā tathā prakṛtayo rāmaṃ patim akāmayan // Ram_2,40.11
GE09ram_02_u:3426: bāṣpeṇa pihitaṃ dīnaṃ rāmaḥ saumitriṇā saha
GE09ram_02_u:3427: cakarṣeva guṇair baddhvā janaṃ punar ivāsanam // Ram_2,40.12
GE09ram_02_u:3429: te dvijās trividhaṃ vṛddhā jñānena vayasaujasā
GE09ram_02_u:3430: vayaḥprakampaśiraso dūrād ūcur idaṃ vacaḥ // Ram_2,40.13
GE09ram_02_u:3432: vahanto javanā rāmaṃ bho bho jātyās turaṃgamāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3433: nivartadhvaṃ na gantavyaṃ hitā bhavata bhartari
GE09ram_02_u:3434: upavāhyas tu vo bhartā nāpavāhyaḥ purād vanam // Ram_2,40.14
GE09ram_02_u:3436: evam ārtapralāpāṃs tān vṛddhān pralapato dvijān
GE09ram_02_u:3437: avekṣya sahasā rāmo rathād avatatāra ha // Ram_2,40.15
GE09ram_02_u:3442: dvijātīṃs tu padātīṃs tān rāmaś cāritravatsalaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3443: na śaśāka ghṛṇācakṣuḥ parimoktuṃ rathena saḥ // Ram_2,40.17
GE09ram_02_u:3445: gacchantam eva taṃ dṛṣṭvā rāmaṃ saṃbhrāntamānasāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3446: ūcuḥ paramasaṃtaptā rāmaṃ vākyam idaṃ dvijāḥ // Ram_2,40.18
GE09ram_02_u:3448: brāhmaṇyaṃ kṛtsnam etat tvāṃ brahmaṇyam anugacchati
GE09ram_02_u:3449: dvijaskandhādhirūḍhās tvām agnayo 'py anuyānty amī // Ram_2,40.19
GE09ram_02_u:3455: ebhiś chāyāṃ kariṣyāmaḥ svaiś chattrair vājapeyikaiḥ // Ram_2,40.21
GE09ram_02_u:3457: yā hi naḥ satataṃ buddhir vedamantrānusāriṇī
GE09ram_02_u:3458: tvatkṛte sā kṛtā vatsa vanavāsānusāriṇī // Ram_2,40.22
GE09ram_02_u:3460: hṛdayeṣv avatiṣṭhante vedā ye naḥ paraṃ dhanam
GE09ram_02_u:3461: vatsyanty api gṛheṣv eva dārāś cāritrarakṣitāḥ // Ram_2,40.23
GE09ram_02_u:3463: na punar niścayaḥ kāryas tvadgatau sukṛtā matiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3464: tvayi dharmavyapekṣe tu kiṃ syād dharmam avekṣitum // Ram_2,40.24
GE09ram_02_u:3469: bahūnāṃ vitatā yajñā dvijānāṃ ya ihāgatāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3470: teṣāṃ samāptir āyattā tava vatsa nivartane // Ram_2,40.26
GE09ram_02_u:3473: yācamāneṣu teṣu tvaṃ bhaktiṃ bhakteṣu darśaya // Ram_2,40.27
GE09ram_02_u:3482: dadṛśe tamasā tatra vārayantīva rāghavam // Ram_2,40.30
GE09ram_02_u:3484: tatas tu tamasā tīraṃ ramyam āśritya rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3485: sītām udvīkṣya saumitrim idaṃ vacanam abravīt // Ram_2,41.1
GE09ram_02_u:3487: iyam adya niśā pūrvā saumitre prasthitā vanam
GE09ram_02_u:3488: vanavāsasya bhadraṃ te sa notkaṇṭhitum arhasi // Ram_2,41.2
GE09ram_02_u:3493: adyāyodhyā tu nagarī rājadhānī pitur mama
GE09ram_02_u:3494: sastrīpuṃsā gatān asmāñ śociṣyati na saṃśayaḥ // Ram_2,41.4
GE09ram_02_u:3496: bharataḥ khalu dharmātmā pitaraṃ mātaraṃ ca me
GE09ram_02_u:3500: nānuśocāmi pitaraṃ mātaraṃ cāpi lakṣmaṇa // Ram_2,41.6
GE09ram_02_u:3502: tvayā kāryaṃ naravyāghra mām anuvrajatā kṛtam
GE09ram_02_u:3503: anveṣṭavyā hi vaidehyā rakṣaṇārthe sahāyatā // Ram_2,41.7
GE09ram_02_u:3505: adbhir eva tu saumitre vatsyāmy adya niśām imām
GE09ram_02_u:3506: etaddhi rocate mahyaṃ vanye 'pi vividhe sati // Ram_2,41.8
GE09ram_02_u:3508: evam uktvā tu saumitraṃ sumantram api rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3509: apramattas tvam aśveṣu bhava saumyety uvāca ha // Ram_2,41.9
GE09ram_02_u:3514: upāsyatu śivāṃ saṃdhyāṃ dṛṣṭvā rātrim upasthitām
GE09ram_02_u:3515: rāmasya śayanaṃ cakre sūtaḥ saumitriṇā saha // Ram_2,41.11
GE09ram_02_u:3517: tāṃ śayyāṃ tamasātīre vīkṣya vṛkṣadalaiḥ kṛtām
GE09ram_02_u:3518: rāmaḥ saumitriṇā sārdhaṃ sabhāryaḥ saṃviveśa ha // Ram_2,41.12
GE09ram_02_u:3520: sabhāryaṃ saṃprasuptaṃ taṃ bhrātaraṃ vīkṣya lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3521: kathayāmāsa sūtāya rāmasya vividhān guṇān // Ram_2,41.13
GE09ram_02_u:3523: jāgrato hy eva tāṃ rātriṃ saumitrer udito raviḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3524: sūtasya tamasātīre rāmasya bruvato guṇān // Ram_2,41.14
GE09ram_02_u:3527: avasat tatra tāṃ rātriṃ rāmaḥ prakṛtibhiḥ saha // Ram_2,41.15
GE09ram_02_u:3529: utthāya tu mahātejāḥ prakṛtīs tā niśāmya ca
GE09ram_02_u:3530: abravīd bhrātaraṃ rāmo lakṣmaṇaṃ puṇyalakṣaṇam // Ram_2,41.16
GE09ram_02_u:3533: vṛkṣamūleṣu saṃsuptān paśya lakṣmaṇa sāmpratam // Ram_2,41.17
GE09ram_02_u:3536: api prāṇān asiṣyanti na tu tyakṣyanti niścayam // Ram_2,41.18
GE09ram_02_u:3538: yāvad eva tu saṃsuptās tāvad eva vayaṃ laghu
GE09ram_02_u:3539: ratham āruhya gacchāmaḥ panthānam akutobhayam // Ram_2,41.19
GE09ram_02_u:3542: svapeyur anuraktā māṃ vṛkṣamūlāni saṃśritāḥ // Ram_2,41.20
GE09ram_02_u:3544: paurā hy ātmakṛtād duḥkhād vipramocyā nṛpātmajaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3545: na tu khalv ātmanā yojyā duḥkhena puravāsinaḥ // Ram_2,41.21
GE09ram_02_u:3547: abravīl lakṣmaṇo rāmaṃ sākṣād dharmam iva sthitam
GE09ram_02_u:3548: rocate me mahāprājña kṣipram āruhyatām iti // Ram_2,41.22
GE09ram_02_u:3550: sūtas tataḥ saṃtvaritaḥ syandanaṃ tair hayottamaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3553: mohanārthaṃ tu paurāṇāṃ sūtaṃ rāmo 'bravīd vacaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3554: udaṅmukhaḥ prayāhi tvaṃ ratham āsthāya sārathe // Ram_2,41.24
GE09ram_02_u:3556: muhūrtaṃ tvaritaṃ gatvā nirvartaya rathaṃ punaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3557: yathā na vidyuḥ paurā māṃ tathā kuru samāhitaḥ // Ram_2,41.25
GE09ram_02_u:3559: rāmasya vacanaṃ śrutvā tathā cakre sa sārathiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3560: pratyāgamya ca rāmasya syandanaṃ pratyavedayat // Ram_2,41.26
GE09ram_02_u:3563: śīghragām ākulāvartāṃ tamasām ataran nadīm // Ram_2,41.27
GE09ram_02_u:3565: sa saṃtīrya mahābāhuḥ śrīmāñ śivam akaṇṭakam
GE09ram_02_u:3568: prabhātāyāṃ tu śarvaryāṃ paurās te rāghavaṃ vinā
GE09ram_02_u:3572: ālokam api rāmasya na paśyanti sma duḥkhitāḥ // Ram_2,41.30
GE09ram_02_u:3574: tato mārgānusāreṇa gatvā kiṃcit kṣaṇaṃ punaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3578: kim idaṃ kiṃ kariṣyāmo daivenopahatā iti // Ram_2,41.32
GE09ram_02_u:3581: ayodhyām agaman sarve purīṃ vyathitasajjanām // Ram_2,41.33
GE09ram_02_u:3586: svaṃ svaṃ nilayam āgamya putradāraiḥ samāvṛtāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3587: aśrūṇi mumucuḥ sarve bāṣpeṇa pihitānanāḥ // Ram_2,42.2
GE09ram_02_u:3589: na cāhṛṣyan na cāmodan vaṇijo na prasārayan
GE09ram_02_u:3590: na cāśobhanta paṇyāni nāpacan gṛhamedhinaḥ // Ram_2,42.3
GE09ram_02_u:3592: naṣṭaṃ dṛṣṭvā nābhyanandan vipulaṃ vā dhanāgamam
GE09ram_02_u:3593: putraṃ prathamajaṃ labdhvā jananī nābhyanandata // Ram_2,42.4
GE09ram_02_u:3595: gṛhe gṛhe rudantyaś ca bhartāraṃ gṛham āgatam
GE09ram_02_u:3596: vyagarhayanta duḥkhārtā vāgbhis totrair iva dvipān // Ram_2,42.5
GE09ram_02_u:3598: kiṃ nu teṣāṃ gṛhaiḥ kāryaṃ kiṃ dāraiḥ kiṃ dhanena vā
GE09ram_02_u:3599: putrair vā kiṃ sukhair vāpi ye na paśyanti rāghavam // Ram_2,42.6
GE09ram_02_u:3601: ekaḥ satpuruṣo loke lakṣmaṇaḥ saha sītayā
GE09ram_02_u:3602: yo 'nugacchati kākutsthaṃ rāmaṃ paricaran vane // Ram_2,42.7
GE09ram_02_u:3604: āpagāḥ kṛtapuṇyās tāḥ padminyaś ca sarāṃsi ca
GE09ram_02_u:3605: yeṣu snāsyati kākutstho vigāhya salilaṃ śuci // Ram_2,42.8
GE09ram_02_u:3608: āpagāś ca mahānūpāḥ sānumantaś ca parvatāḥ // Ram_2,42.9
GE09ram_02_u:3610: kānanaṃ vāpi śailaṃ vā yaṃ rāmo 'bhigamiṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:3611: priyātithim iva prāptaṃ nainaṃ śakṣyanty anarcitum // Ram_2,42.10
GE09ram_02_u:3614: akāle cāpi mukhyāni puṣpāṇi ca phalāni ca
GE09ram_02_u:3615: darśayiṣyanty anukrośād girayo rāmam āgatam // Ram_2,42.11
GE09ram_02_u:3617: vidarśayanto vividhān bhūyaś citrāṃś ca nirjharān
GE09ram_02_u:3620: yatra rāmo bhayaṃ nātra nāsti tatra parābhavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3621: sa hi śūro mahābāhuḥ putro daśarathasya ca // Ram_2,42.13
GE09ram_02_u:3623: purā bhavati no dūrād anugacchāma rāghavam
GE09ram_02_u:3625: sa hi nātho janasyāsya sa gatiḥ sa parāyaṇam // Ram_2,42.14
GE09ram_02_u:3627: vayaṃ paricariṣyāmaḥ sītāṃ yūyaṃ tu rāghavam
GE09ram_02_u:3628: iti paurastriyo bhartṝn duḥkhārtās tat tad abruvan // Ram_2,42.15
GE09ram_02_u:3636: kaikeyyā yadi ced rājyaṃ syād adharmyam anāthavat
GE09ram_02_u:3637: na hi no jīvitenārthaḥ kutaḥ putraiḥ kuto dhanaiḥ // Ram_2,42.18
GE09ram_02_u:3639: yayā putraś ca bhartā ca tyaktāv aiśvaryakāraṇāt
GE09ram_02_u:3640: kaṃ sā parihared anyaṃ kaikeyī kulapāṃsanī // Ram_2,42.19
GE09ram_02_u:3642: kaikeyyā na vayaṃ rājye bhṛtakā nivasema hi
GE09ram_02_u:3643: jīvantyā jātu jīvantyaḥ putrair api śapāmahe // Ram_2,42.20
GE09ram_02_u:3646: kas tāṃ prāpya sukhaṃ jīved adharmyāṃ duṣṭacāriṇīm // Ram_2,42.21
GE09ram_02_u:3648: na hi pravrajite rāme jīviṣyati mahīpatiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3649: mṛte daśarathe vyaktaṃ vilopas tadanantaram // Ram_2,42.22
GE09ram_02_u:3652: rāghavaṃ vānugacchadhvam aśrutiṃ vāpi gacchata // Ram_2,42.23
GE09ram_02_u:3655: bharate saṃnisṛṣṭāḥ smaḥ saunike paśavo yathā // Ram_2,42.24
GE09ram_02_u:3657: tās tathā vilapantyas tu nagare nāgarastriyaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3658: cukruśur bhṛśasaṃtaptā mṛtyor iva bhayāgame // Ram_2,42.25
GE09ram_02_u:3660: tathā striyo rāmanimittam āturā yathā sute bhrātari vā vivāsite
GE09ram_02_u:3661: vilapya dīnā rurudur vicetasaḥ sutair hi tāsām adhiko hi so 'bhavat // Ram_2,42.26
GE09ram_02_u:3664: jagāma puruṣavyāghraḥ pitur ājñām anusmaran // Ram_2,43.1
GE09ram_02_u:3666: tathaiva gacchatas tasya vyapāyād rajanī śivā
GE09ram_02_u:3667: upāsya sa śivāṃ saṃdhyāṃ viṣayāntaṃ vyagāhata // Ram_2,43.2
GE09ram_02_u:3669: grāmān vikṛṣṭasīmāṃs tān puṣpitāni vanāni ca
GE09ram_02_u:3670: paśyann atiyayau śīghraṃ śarair iva hayottamaiḥ // Ram_2,43.3
GE09ram_02_u:3673: rājānaṃ dhig daśarathaṃ kāmasya vaśam āgatam // Ram_2,43.4
GE09ram_02_u:3676: tīkṣṇā saṃbhinnamaryādā tīkṣṇe karmaṇi vartate // Ram_2,43.5
GE09ram_02_u:3678: yā putram īdṛśaṃ rājñaḥ pravāsayati dhārmikam
GE09ram_02_u:3682: śṛṇvann atiyayau vīraḥ kosalān kosaleśvaraḥ // Ram_2,43.7
GE09ram_02_u:3687: gatvā tu suciraṃ kālaṃ tataḥ śītajalāṃ nadīm
GE09ram_02_u:3690: gomatīṃ cāpy atikramya rāghavaḥ śīghragair hayaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3693: sa mahīṃ manunā rājñā dattām ikṣvākave purā
GE09ram_02_u:3694: sphītāṃ rāṣṭrāvṛtāṃ rāmo vaidehīm anvadarśayat // Ram_2,43.11
GE09ram_02_u:3696: sūta ity eva cābhāṣya sārathiṃ tam abhīkṣṇaśaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3699: kadāhaṃ punar āgamya sarayvāḥ puṣpite vane
GE09ram_02_u:3700: mṛgayāṃ paryaṭiṣyāmi mātrā pitrā ca saṃgataḥ // Ram_2,43.13
GE09ram_02_u:3703: ratir hy eṣātulā loke rājarṣigaṇasaṃmatā // Ram_2,43.14
GE09ram_02_u:3705: sa tam adhvānam aikṣvākaḥ sūtaṃ madhurayā girā
GE09ram_02_u:3706: taṃ tam artham abhipretya yayau vākyam udīrayan // Ram_2,43.15
GE09ram_02_u:3712: dadarśa rāghavo gaṅgāṃ puṇyām ṛṣiniṣevitām // Ram_2,44.2
GE09ram_02_u:3715: śiśumāraiś ca nakraiś ca bhujaṃgaiś ca niṣevitām // Ram_2,44.3
GE09ram_02_u:3718: sumantram abravīt sūtam ihaivādya vasāmahe // Ram_2,44.4
GE09ram_02_u:3723: lakṣaṇaś ca sumantraś ca bāḍham ity eva rāghavam
GE09ram_02_u:3724: uktvā tam iṅgudīvṛkṣaṃ tadopayayatur hayaiḥ // Ram_2,44.6
GE09ram_02_u:3727: rathād avātarat tasmāt sabhāryaḥ sahalakṣmaṇaḥ // Ram_2,44.7
GE09ram_02_u:3732: tatra rājā guho nāma rāmasyātmasamaḥ sakhā
GE09ram_02_u:3733: niṣādajātyo balavān sthapatiś ceti viśrutaḥ // Ram_2,44.9
GE09ram_02_u:3735: sa śrutvā puruṣavyāghraṃ rāmaṃ viṣayam āgatam
GE09ram_02_u:3736: vṛddhaiḥ parivṛto 'mātyair jñātibhiś cāpy upāgataḥ // Ram_2,44.10
GE09ram_02_u:3739: saha saumitriṇā rāmaḥ samāgacchad guhena saḥ // Ram_2,44.11
GE09ram_02_u:3741: tam ārtaḥ sampariṣvajya guho rāghavam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:3742: yathāyodhyā tathedaṃ te rāma kiṃ karavāṇi te // Ram_2,44.12
GE09ram_02_u:3745: arghyaṃ copānayat kṣipraṃ vākyaṃ cedam uvāca ha // Ram_2,44.13
GE09ram_02_u:3747: svāgataṃ te mahābāho taveyam akhilā mahī
GE09ram_02_u:3748: vayaṃ preṣyā bhavān bhartā sādhu rājyaṃ praśādhi naḥ // Ram_2,44.14
GE09ram_02_u:3750: bhakṣyaṃ bhojyaṃ ca peyaṃ ca lehyaṃ cedam upasthitam
GE09ram_02_u:3751: śayanāni ca mukhyāni vājināṃ khādanaṃ ca te // Ram_2,44.15
GE09ram_02_u:3753: guham eva bruvāṇaṃ taṃ rāghavaḥ pratyuvāca ha
GE09ram_02_u:3754: arcitāś caiva hṛṣṭāś ca bhavatā sarvathā vayam // Ram_2,44.16
GE09ram_02_u:3757: bhujābhyāṃ sādhuvṛttābhyāṃ pīḍayan vākyam abravīt // Ram_2,44.17
GE09ram_02_u:3759: diṣṭyā tvāṃ guha paśyāmi arogaṃ saha bāndhavaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3760: api te kuśalaṃ rāṣṭre mitreṣu ca dhaneṣu ca // Ram_2,44.18
GE09ram_02_u:3762: yat tv idaṃ bhavatā kiṃcit prītyā samupakalpitam
GE09ram_02_u:3763: sarvaṃ tad anujānāmi na hi varte pratigrahe // Ram_2,44.19
GE09ram_02_u:3766: viddhi praṇihitaṃ dharme tāpasaṃ vanagocaram // Ram_2,44.20
GE09ram_02_u:3771: ete hi dayitā rājñaḥ pitur daśarathasya me
GE09ram_02_u:3772: etaiḥ suvihitair aśvair bhaviṣyāmy aham arcitaḥ // Ram_2,44.22
GE09ram_02_u:3774: aśvānāṃ pratipānaṃ ca khādanaṃ caiva so 'nvaśāt
GE09ram_02_u:3775: guhas tatraiva puruṣāṃs tvaritaṃ dīyatām iti // Ram_2,44.23
GE09ram_02_u:3778: jalam evādade bhojyaṃ lakṣmaṇenāhṛtaṃ svayam // Ram_2,44.24
GE09ram_02_u:3780: tasya bhūmau śayānasya pādau prakṣālya lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3781: sabhāryasya tato 'bhyetya tasthau vṛkṣam upāśritaḥ // Ram_2,44.25
GE09ram_02_u:3784: anvajāgrat tato rāmam apramatto dhanurdharaḥ // Ram_2,44.26
GE09ram_02_u:3786: tathā śayānasya tato 'sya dhīmato yaśasvino dāśarather mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3787: adṛṣṭaduḥkhasya sukhocitasya sā tadā vyatīyāya cireṇa śarvarī // Ram_2,44.27
GE09ram_02_u:3789: taṃ jāgratam adambhena bhrātur arthāya lakṣmaṇam
GE09ram_02_u:3790: guhaḥ saṃtāpasaṃtapto rāghavaṃ vākyam abravīt // Ram_2,45.1
GE09ram_02_u:3792: iyaṃ tāta sukhā śayyā tvadartham upakalpitā
GE09ram_02_u:3793: pratyāśvasihi sādhv asyāṃ rājaputra yathāsukham // Ram_2,45.2
GE09ram_02_u:3795: ucito 'yaṃ janaḥ sarvaḥ kleśānāṃ tvaṃ sukhocitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3796: guptyarthaṃ jāgariṣyāmaḥ kākutsthasya vayaṃ niśām // Ram_2,45.3
GE09ram_02_u:3798: na hi rāmāt priyataro mamāsti bhuvi kaścana
GE09ram_02_u:3799: bravīmy etad ahaṃ satyaṃ satyenaiva ca te śape // Ram_2,45.4
GE09ram_02_u:3801: asya prasādād āśaṃse loke 'smin sumahad yaśaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3802: dharmāvāptiṃ ca vipulām arthāvāptiṃ ca kevalām // Ram_2,45.5
GE09ram_02_u:3804: so 'haṃ priyasakhaṃ rāmaṃ śayānaṃ saha sītayā
GE09ram_02_u:3805: rakṣiṣyāmi dhanuṣpāṇiḥ sarvato jñātibhiḥ saha // Ram_2,45.6
GE09ram_02_u:3807: na hi me 'viditaṃ kiṃcid vane 'smiṃś carataḥ sadā
GE09ram_02_u:3808: caturaṅgaṃ hy api balaṃ sumahat prasahemahi // Ram_2,45.7
GE09ram_02_u:3811: nātra bhītā vayaṃ sarve dharmam evānupaśyatā // Ram_2,45.8
GE09ram_02_u:3813: kathaṃ dāśarathau bhūmau śayāne saha sītayā
GE09ram_02_u:3814: śakyā nidrā mayā labdhuṃ jīvitaṃ vā sukhāni vā // Ram_2,45.9
GE09ram_02_u:3816: yo na devāsuraiḥ sarvaiḥ śakyaḥ prasahituṃ yudhi
GE09ram_02_u:3817: taṃ paśya sukhasaṃviṣṭaṃ tṛṇeṣu saha sītayā // Ram_2,45.10
GE09ram_02_u:3819: yo mantratapasā labdho vividhaiś ca pariśramaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3822: asmin pravrajito rājā na ciraṃ vartayiṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:3823: vidhavā medinī nūnaṃ kṣipram eva bhaviṣyati // Ram_2,45.12
GE09ram_02_u:3828: kausalyā caiva rājā ca tathaiva jananī mama
GE09ram_02_u:3829: nāśaṃse yadi jīvanti sarve te śarvarīm imām // Ram_2,45.14
GE09ram_02_u:3831: jīved api hi me mātā śatrughnasyānvavekṣayā
GE09ram_02_u:3832: tad duḥkhaṃ yat tu kausalyā vīrasūr vinaśiṣyati // Ram_2,45.15
GE09ram_02_u:3838: rājye rāmam anikṣipya pitā me vinaśiṣyati // Ram_2,45.17
GE09ram_02_u:3840: siddhārthāḥ pitaraṃ vṛttaṃ tasmin kāle hy upasthite
GE09ram_02_u:3850: sukhitā vicariṣyanti rājadhānīṃ pitur mama // Ram_2,45.21
GE09ram_02_u:3858: tathā hi satyaṃ bruvati prajāhite narendraputre gurusauhṛdād guhaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3859: mumoca bāṣpaṃ vyasanābhipīḍito jvarāturo nāga iva vyathāturaḥ // Ram_2,45.24
GE09ram_02_u:3862: uvāca rāmaḥ saumitriṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ śubhalakṣaṇam // Ram_2,46.1
GE09ram_02_u:3865: asau sukṛṣṇo vihagaḥ kokilas tāta kūjati // Ram_2,46.2
GE09ram_02_u:3867: barhiṇānāṃ ca nirghoṣaḥ śrūyate nadatāṃ vane
GE09ram_02_u:3868: tarāma jāhnavīṃ saumya śīghragāṃ sāgaraṃgamām // Ram_2,46.3
GE09ram_02_u:3871: guham āmantrya sūtaṃ ca so 'tiṣṭhad bhrātur agrataḥ // Ram_2,46.4
GE09ram_02_u:3873: tataḥ kalāpān saṃnahya khaḍgau baddhvā ca dhanvinau
GE09ram_02_u:3874: jagmatur yena tau gaṅgāṃ sītayā saha rāghavau // Ram_2,46.5
GE09ram_02_u:3876: rāmam eva tu dharmajñam upagamya vinītavat
GE09ram_02_u:3877: kim ahaṃ karavāṇīti sūtaḥ prāñjalir abravīt // Ram_2,46.6
GE09ram_02_u:3880: yānaṃ vihāya padbhyāṃ tu gamiṣyāmo mahāvanam // Ram_2,46.7
GE09ram_02_u:3882: ātmānaṃ tv abhyanujñātam avekṣyārtaḥ sa sārathiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3883: sumantraḥ puruṣavyāghram aikṣvākam idam abravīt // Ram_2,46.8
GE09ram_02_u:3886: tava sabhrātṛbhāryasya vāsaḥ prākṛtavad vane // Ram_2,46.9
GE09ram_02_u:3888: na manye brahmacarye 'sti svadhīte vā phalodayaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3889: mārdavārjavayor vāpi tvāṃ ced vyasanam āgatam // Ram_2,46.10
GE09ram_02_u:3891: saha rāghava vaidehyā bhrātrā caiva vane vasan
GE09ram_02_u:3892: tvaṃ gatiṃ prāpsyase vīra trīṃl lokāṃs tu jayann iva // Ram_2,46.11
GE09ram_02_u:3894: vayaṃ khalu hatā rāma ye tayāpy upavañcitāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3895: kaikeyyā vaśam eṣyāmaḥ pāpāyā duḥkhabhāginaḥ // Ram_2,46.12
GE09ram_02_u:3897: iti bruvann ātmasamaṃ sumantraḥ sārathis tadā
GE09ram_02_u:3898: dṛṣṭvā dūragataṃ rāmaṃ duḥkhārto rurude ciram // Ram_2,46.13
GE09ram_02_u:3900: tatas tu vigate bāṣpe sūtaṃ spṛṣṭodakaṃ śucim
GE09ram_02_u:3901: rāmas tu madhuraṃ vākyaṃ punaḥ punar uvāca tam // Ram_2,46.14
GE09ram_02_u:3904: yathā daśaratho rājā māṃ na śocet tathā kuru // Ram_2,46.15
GE09ram_02_u:3907: kāmabhārāvasannaś ca tasmād etad bravīmi te // Ram_2,46.16
GE09ram_02_u:3909: yad yad ājñāpayet kiṃcit sa mahātmā mahīpatiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3910: kaikeyyāḥ priyakāmārthaṃ kāryaṃ tad avikāṅkṣayā // Ram_2,46.17
GE09ram_02_u:3913: yad eṣāṃ sarvakṛtyeṣu mano na pratihanyate // Ram_2,46.18
GE09ram_02_u:3915: tad yathā sa mahārājo nālīkam adhigacchati
GE09ram_02_u:3916: na ca tāmyati duḥkhena sumantra kuru tat tathā // Ram_2,46.19
GE09ram_02_u:3919: brūyās tvam abhivādyaiva mama hetor idaṃ vacaḥ // Ram_2,46.20
GE09ram_02_u:3921: naivāham anuśocāmi lakṣmaṇo na ca maithilī
GE09ram_02_u:3922: ayodhyāyāś cyutāś ceti vane vatsyāmaheti vā // Ram_2,46.21
GE09ram_02_u:3925: lakṣmaṇaṃ māṃ ca sītāṃ ca drakṣyasi kṣipram āgatān // Ram_2,46.22
GE09ram_02_u:3927: evam uktvā tu rājānaṃ mātaraṃ ca sumantra me
GE09ram_02_u:3928: anyāś ca devīḥ sahitāḥ kaikeyīṃ ca punaḥ punaḥ // Ram_2,46.23
GE09ram_02_u:3931: sītāyā mama cāryasya vacanāl lakṣmaṇasya ca // Ram_2,46.24
GE09ram_02_u:3933: brūyāś ca hi mahārājaṃ bharataṃ kṣipram ānaya
GE09ram_02_u:3934: āgataś cāpi bharataḥ sthāpyo nṛpamate pade // Ram_2,46.25
GE09ram_02_u:3937: asmatsaṃtāpajaṃ duḥkhaṃ na tvām abhibhaviṣyati // Ram_2,46.26
GE09ram_02_u:3939: bharataś cāpi vaktavyo yathā rājani vartase
GE09ram_02_u:3940: tathā mātṛṣu vartethāḥ sarvāsv evāviśeṣataḥ // Ram_2,46.27
GE09ram_02_u:3942: yathā ca tava kaikeyī sumitrā cāviśeṣataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3943: tathaiva devī kausalyā mama mātā viśeṣataḥ // Ram_2,46.28
GE09ram_02_u:3946: tat sarvaṃ vacanaṃ śrutvā snehāt kākutstham abravīt // Ram_2,46.29
GE09ram_02_u:3948: yad ahaṃ nopacāreṇa brūyāṃ snehād aviklavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3949: bhaktimān iti tat tāvad vākyaṃ tvaṃ kṣantum arhasi // Ram_2,46.30
GE09ram_02_u:3951: kathaṃ hi tvadvihīno 'haṃ pratiyāsyāmi tāṃ purīm
GE09ram_02_u:3952: tava tāta viyogena putraśokākulām iva // Ram_2,46.31
GE09ram_02_u:3954: sarāmam api tāvan me rathaṃ dṛṣṭvā tadā janaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3955: vinā rāmaṃ rathaṃ dṛṣṭvā vidīryetāpi sā purī // Ram_2,46.32
GE09ram_02_u:3957: dainyaṃ hi nagarī gacched dṛṣṭvā śūnyam imaṃ ratham
GE09ram_02_u:3958: sūtāvaśeṣaṃ svaṃ sainyaṃ hatavīram ivāhave // Ram_2,46.33
GE09ram_02_u:3961: cintayantyo 'dya nūnaṃ tvāṃ nirāhārāḥ kṛtāḥ prajāḥ // Ram_2,46.34
GE09ram_02_u:3963: ārtanādo hi yaḥ paurair muktas tadvipravāsane
GE09ram_02_u:3964: rathasthaṃ māṃ niśāmyaiva kuryuḥ śataguṇaṃ tataḥ // Ram_2,46.35
GE09ram_02_u:3966: ahaṃ kiṃ cāpi vakṣyāmi devīṃ tava suto mayā
GE09ram_02_u:3967: nīto 'sau mātulakulaṃ saṃtāpaṃ mā kṛthā iti // Ram_2,46.36
GE09ram_02_u:3969: asatyam api naivāhaṃ brūyāṃ vacanam īdṛśam
GE09ram_02_u:3970: katham apriyam evāhaṃ brūyāṃ satyam idaṃ vacaḥ // Ram_2,46.37
GE09ram_02_u:3973: kathaṃ rathaṃ tvayā hīnaṃ pravakṣyanti hayottamāḥ // Ram_2,46.38
GE09ram_02_u:3975: yadi me yācamānasya tyāgam eva kariṣyasi
GE09ram_02_u:3976: saratho 'gniṃ pravekṣyāmi tyaktamātra iha tvayā // Ram_2,46.39
GE09ram_02_u:3979: rathena pratibādhiṣye tāni sattvāni rāghava // Ram_2,46.40
GE09ram_02_u:3981: tvatkṛte na mayā prāptaṃ rathacaryākṛtaṃ sukham
GE09ram_02_u:3985: prītyābhihitam icchāmi bhava me patyanantaraḥ // Ram_2,46.42
GE09ram_02_u:3987: tava śuśrūṣaṇaṃ mūrdhnā kariṣyāmi vane vasan
GE09ram_02_u:3988: ayodhyāṃ devalokaṃ vā sarvathā prajahāmy aham // Ram_2,46.43
GE09ram_02_u:3990: na hi śakyā praveṣṭuṃ sā mayāyodhyā tvayā vinā
GE09ram_02_u:3993: ime cāpi hayā vīra yadi te vanavāsinaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3994: paricaryāṃ kariṣyanti prāpsyanti paramāṃ gatim // Ram_2,46.45
GE09ram_02_u:3996: vanavāse kṣayaṃ prāpte mamaiṣa hi manorathaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:3997: yad anena rathenaiva tvāṃ vaheyaṃ purīṃ punaḥ // Ram_2,46.46
GE09ram_02_u:3999: caturdaśa hi varṣāṇi sahitasya tvayā vane
GE09ram_02_u:4000: kṣaṇabhūtāni yāsyanti śataśas tu tato 'nyathā // Ram_2,46.47
GE09ram_02_u:4003: bhaktaṃ bhṛtyaṃ sthitaṃ sthityāṃ tvaṃ na māṃ hātum arhasi // Ram_2,46.48
GE09ram_02_u:4005: evaṃ bahuvidhaṃ dīnaṃ yācamānaṃ punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4006: rāmo bhṛtyānukampī tu sumantram idam abravīt // Ram_2,46.49
GE09ram_02_u:4008: jānāmi paramāṃ bhaktiṃ mayi te bhartṛvatsala
GE09ram_02_u:4009: śṛṇu cāpi yadarthaṃ tvāṃ preṣayāmi purīm itaḥ // Ram_2,46.50
GE09ram_02_u:4011: nagarīṃ tvāṃ gataṃ dṛṣṭvā jananī me yavīyasī
GE09ram_02_u:4012: kaikeyī pratyayaṃ gacched iti rāmo vanaṃ gataḥ // Ram_2,46.51
GE09ram_02_u:4014: parituṣṭā hi sā devī vanavāsaṃ gate mayi
GE09ram_02_u:4017: eṣa me prathamaḥ kalpo yad ambā me yavīyasī
GE09ram_02_u:4020: mama priyārthaṃ rājñaś ca sarathas tvaṃ purīṃ vraja
GE09ram_02_u:4021: saṃdiṣṭaś cāsi yānarthāṃs tāṃs tān brūyās tathātathā // Ram_2,46.54
GE09ram_02_u:4023: ity uktvā vacanaṃ sūtaṃ sāntvayitvā punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4024: guhaṃ vacanam aklībaṃ rāmo hetumad abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:4025: jaṭāḥ kṛtvā gamiṣyāmi nyagrodhakṣīram ānaya // Ram_2,46.55
GE09ram_02_u:4027: tat kṣīraṃ rājaputrāya guhaḥ kṣipram upāharat
GE09ram_02_u:4028: lakṣmaṇasyātmanaś caiva rāmas tenākaroj jaṭāḥ // Ram_2,46.56
GE09ram_02_u:4034: vratam ādiṣṭavān rāmaḥ sahāyaṃ guham abravīt // Ram_2,46.58
GE09ram_02_u:4036: apramatto bale kośe durge janapade tathā
GE09ram_02_u:4037: bhavethā guha rājyaṃ hi durārakṣatamaṃ matam // Ram_2,46.59
GE09ram_02_u:4040: jagāma tūrṇam avyagraḥ sabhāryaḥ sahalakṣmaṇaḥ // Ram_2,46.60
GE09ram_02_u:4042: sa tu dṛṣṭvā nadītīre nāvam ikṣvākunandanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4043: titīrṣuḥ śīghragāṃ gaṅgām idaṃ lakṣmaṇam abravīt // Ram_2,46.61
GE09ram_02_u:4045: āroha tvaṃ naravyāghra sthitāṃ nāvam imāṃ śanaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4048: sa bhrātuḥ śāsanaṃ śrutvā sarvam apratikūlayan
GE09ram_02_u:4049: āropya maithilīṃ pūrvam ārurohātmavāṃs tataḥ // Ram_2,46.63
GE09ram_02_u:4052: tato niṣādādhipatir guho jñātīn acodayat // Ram_2,46.64
GE09ram_02_u:4054: anujñāya sumantraṃ ca sabalaṃ caiva taṃ guham
GE09ram_02_u:4055: āsthāya nāvaṃ rāmas tu codayāmāsa nāvikān // Ram_2,46.65
GE09ram_02_u:4057: tatas taiś coditā sā nauḥ karṇadhārasamāhitā
GE09ram_02_u:4060: madhyaṃ tu samanuprāpya bhāgīrathyās tv aninditā
GE09ram_02_u:4061: vaidehī prāñjalir bhūtvā tāṃ nadīm idam abravīt // Ram_2,46.67
GE09ram_02_u:4064: nideśaṃ pālayatv enaṃ gaṅge tvadabhirakṣitaḥ // Ram_2,46.68
GE09ram_02_u:4066: caturdaśa hi varṣāṇi samagrāṇy uṣya kānane
GE09ram_02_u:4067: bhrātrā saha mayā caiva punaḥ pratyāgamiṣyati // Ram_2,46.69
GE09ram_02_u:4069: tatas tvāṃ devi subhage kṣemeṇa punar āgatā
GE09ram_02_u:4072: tvaṃ hi tripathagā devi brahmalokaṃ samīkṣase
GE09ram_02_u:4075: sā tvāṃ devi namasyāmi praśaṃsāmi ca śobhane
GE09ram_02_u:4076: prāptarājye naravyāghre śivena punar āgate // Ram_2,46.72
GE09ram_02_u:4078: gavāṃ śatasahasrāṇi vastrāṇy annaṃ ca peśalam
GE09ram_02_u:4081: tathā saṃbhāṣamāṇā sā sītā gaṅgām aninditā
GE09ram_02_u:4082: dakṣiṇā dakṣiṇaṃ tīraṃ kṣipram evābhyupāgamat // Ram_2,46.74
GE09ram_02_u:4084: tīraṃ tu samanuprāpya nāvaṃ hitvā nararṣabhaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4085: prātiṣṭhata saha bhrātrā vaidehyā ca paraṃtapaḥ // Ram_2,46.75
GE09ram_02_u:4088: agrato gaccha saumitre sītā tvām anugacchatu // Ram_2,46.76
GE09ram_02_u:4090: pṛṣṭhato 'haṃ gamiṣyāmi tvāṃ ca sītāṃ ca pālayan
GE09ram_02_u:4091: adya duḥkhaṃ tu vaidehī vanavāsasya vetsyati // Ram_2,46.77
GE09ram_02_u:4093: gataṃ tu gaṅgāparapāram āśu rāmaṃ sumantraḥ pratataṃ nirīkṣya
GE09ram_02_u:4094: adhvaprakarṣād vinivṛttadṛṣṭir mumoca bāṣpaṃ vyathitas tapasvī // Ram_2,46.78
GE09ram_02_u:4096: tau tatra hatvā caturo mahāmṛgān varāham ṛśyaṃ pṛṣataṃ mahārurum
GE09ram_02_u:4097: ādāya medhyaṃ tvaritaṃ bubhukṣitau vāsāya kāle yayatur vanaspatim // Ram_2,46.79
GE09ram_02_u:4099: sa taṃ vṛkṣaṃ samāsādya saṃdhyām anvāsya paścimām
GE09ram_02_u:4100: rāmo ramayatāṃ śreṣṭha iti hovāca lakṣmaṇam // Ram_2,47.1
GE09ram_02_u:4102: adyeyaṃ prathamā rātrir yātā janapadād bahiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4103: yā sumantreṇa rahitā tāṃ notkaṇṭhitum arhasi // Ram_2,47.2
GE09ram_02_u:4106: yogakṣemo hi sītāyā vartate lakṣmaṇāvayoḥ // Ram_2,47.3
GE09ram_02_u:4109: upāvartāmahe bhūmāv āstīrya svayam ārjitaiḥ // Ram_2,47.4
GE09ram_02_u:4112: imāḥ saumitraye rāmo vyājahāra kathāḥ śubhāḥ // Ram_2,47.5
GE09ram_02_u:4114: dhruvam adya mahārājo duḥkhaṃ svapiti lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_02_u:4115: kṛtakāmā tu kaikeyī tuṣṭā bhavitum arhati // Ram_2,47.6
GE09ram_02_u:4117: sā hi devī mahārājaṃ kaikeyī rājyakāraṇāt
GE09ram_02_u:4118: api na cyāvayet prāṇān dṛṣṭvā bharatam āgatam // Ram_2,47.7
GE09ram_02_u:4120: anāthaś caiva vṛddhaś ca mayā caiva vinākṛtaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4121: kiṃ kariṣyati kāmātmā kaikeyyā vaśam āgataḥ // Ram_2,47.8
GE09ram_02_u:4123: idaṃ vyasanam ālokya rājñaś ca mativibhramam
GE09ram_02_u:4124: kāma evārdhadharmābhyāṃ garīyān iti me matiḥ // Ram_2,47.9
GE09ram_02_u:4126: ko hy avidvān api pumān pramadāyāḥ kṛte tyajet
GE09ram_02_u:4127: chandānuvartinaṃ putraṃ tāto mām iva lakṣmaṇa // Ram_2,47.10
GE09ram_02_u:4129: sukhī bata sabhāryaś ca bharataḥ kekayīsutaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4130: muditān kosalān eko yo bhokṣyaty adhirājavat // Ram_2,47.11
GE09ram_02_u:4132: sa hi sarvasya rājyasya mukham ekaṃ bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:4133: tāte ca vayasātīte mayi cāraṇyam āśrite // Ram_2,47.12
GE09ram_02_u:4136: evam āpadyate kṣipraṃ rājā daśaratho yathā // Ram_2,47.13
GE09ram_02_u:4139: kaikeyī saumya samprāptā rājyāya bharatasya ca // Ram_2,47.14
GE09ram_02_u:4142: kausalyāṃ ca sumitrāṃ ca samprabādheta matkṛte // Ram_2,47.15
GE09ram_02_u:4144: mā sma matkāraṇād devī sumitrā duḥkham āvaset
GE09ram_02_u:4145: ayodhyām ita eva tvaṃ kāle praviśa lakṣmaṇa // Ram_2,47.16
GE09ram_02_u:4147: aham eko gamiṣyāmi sītayā saha daṇḍakān
GE09ram_02_u:4148: anāthāyā hi nāthas tvaṃ kausalyāyā bhaviṣyasi // Ram_2,47.17
GE09ram_02_u:4150: kṣudrakarmā hi kaikeyī dveṣād anyāyyam ācaret
GE09ram_02_u:4151: paridadyā hi dharmajñe bharate mama mātaram // Ram_2,47.18
GE09ram_02_u:4153: nūnaṃ jātyantare kasmin striyaḥ putrair viyojitāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4154: jananyā mama saumitre tad apy etad upasthitam // Ram_2,47.19
GE09ram_02_u:4157: viprāyujyata kausalyā phalakāle dhig astu mām // Ram_2,47.20
GE09ram_02_u:4159: mā sma sīmantinī kācij janayet putram īdṛśam
GE09ram_02_u:4160: saumitre yo 'ham ambāyā dadmi śokam anantakam // Ram_2,47.21
GE09ram_02_u:4162: manye prītiviśiṣṭā sā matto lakṣmaṇa śārikā
GE09ram_02_u:4163: yasyās tac chrūyate vākyaṃ śuka pādam arer daśa // Ram_2,47.22
GE09ram_02_u:4166: putreṇa kim aputrāyā mayā kāryam ariṃdama // Ram_2,47.23
GE09ram_02_u:4168: alpabhāgyā hi me mātā kausalyā rahitā mayā
GE09ram_02_u:4171: eko hy aham ayodhyāṃ ca pṛthivīṃ cāpi lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_02_u:4172: tareyam iṣubhiḥ kruddho nanu vīryam akāraṇam // Ram_2,47.25
GE09ram_02_u:4175: tena lakṣmaṇa nādyāham ātmānam abhiṣecaye // Ram_2,47.26
GE09ram_02_u:4177: etad anyac ca karuṇaṃ vilapya vijane bahu
GE09ram_02_u:4178: aśrupūrṇamukho rāmo niśi tūṣṇīm upāviśat // Ram_2,47.27
GE09ram_02_u:4181: samudram iva nirvegam āśvāsayata lakṣmaṇaḥ // Ram_2,47.28
GE09ram_02_u:4183: dhruvam adya purī rāma ayodhyāyudhināṃ vara
GE09ram_02_u:4184: niṣprabhā tvayi niṣkrānte gatacandreva śarvarī // Ram_2,47.29
GE09ram_02_u:4186: naitad aupayikaṃ rāma yad idaṃ paritapyase
GE09ram_02_u:4187: viṣādayasi sītāṃ ca māṃ caiva puruṣarṣabha // Ram_2,47.30
GE09ram_02_u:4189: na ca sītā tvayā hīnā na cāham api rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:4190: muhūrtam api jīvāvo jalān matsyāv ivoddhṛtau // Ram_2,47.31
GE09ram_02_u:4192: na hi tātaṃ na śatrughnaṃ na sumitrāṃ paraṃtapa
GE09ram_02_u:4193: draṣṭum iccheyam adyāhaṃ svargaṃ vāpi tvayā vinā // Ram_2,47.32
GE09ram_02_u:4195: sa lakṣmaṇasyottamapuṣkalaṃ vaco niśamya caivaṃ vanavāsam ādarāt
GE09ram_02_u:4196: samāḥ samastā vidadhe paraṃtapaḥ prapadya dharmaṃ sucirāya rāghavaḥ // Ram_2,47.33
GE09ram_02_u:4198: te tu tasmin mahāvṛkṣa uṣitvā rajanīṃ śivām
GE09ram_02_u:4199: vimale 'bhyudite sūrye tasmād deśāt pratasthire // Ram_2,48.1
GE09ram_02_u:4202: jagmus taṃ deśam uddiśya vigāhya sumahad vanam // Ram_2,48.2
GE09ram_02_u:4204: te bhūmim āgān vividhān deśāṃś cāpi manoramān
GE09ram_02_u:4205: adṛṣṭapūrvān paśyantas tatra tatra yaśasvinaḥ // Ram_2,48.3
GE09ram_02_u:4207: yathākṣemeṇa gacchan sa paśyaṃś ca vividhān drumān
GE09ram_02_u:4208: nivṛttamātre divase rāmaḥ saumitrim abravīt // Ram_2,48.4
GE09ram_02_u:4210: prayāgam abhitaḥ paśya saumitre dhūmam unnatam
GE09ram_02_u:4211: agner bhagavataḥ ketuṃ manye saṃnihito muniḥ // Ram_2,48.5
GE09ram_02_u:4213: nūnaṃ prāptāḥ sma sambhedaṃ gaṅgāyamunayor vayam
GE09ram_02_u:4214: tathā hi śrūyate śabdo vāriṇo vārighaṭṭitaḥ // Ram_2,48.6
GE09ram_02_u:4217: bharadvājāśrame caite dṛśyante vividhā drumāḥ // Ram_2,48.7
GE09ram_02_u:4219: dhanvinau tau sukhaṃ gatvā lambamāne divākare
GE09ram_02_u:4220: gaṅgāyamunayoḥ saṃdhau prāpatur nilayaṃ muneḥ // Ram_2,48.8
GE09ram_02_u:4222: rāmas tv āśramam āsādya trāsayan mṛgapakṣiṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4223: gatvā muhūrtam adhvānaṃ bharadvājam upāgamat // Ram_2,48.9
GE09ram_02_u:4225: tatas tv āśramam āsādya muner darśanakāṅkṣiṇau
GE09ram_02_u:4229: rāmaḥ saumitriṇā sārdhaṃ sītayā cābhyavādayat // Ram_2,48.11
GE09ram_02_u:4235: māṃ cānuyātā vijanaṃ tapovanam aninditā // Ram_2,48.13
GE09ram_02_u:4237: pitrā pravrājyamānaṃ māṃ saumitrir anujaḥ priyaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4238: ayam anvagamad bhrātā vanam eva dṛḍhavrataḥ // Ram_2,48.14
GE09ram_02_u:4244: upānayata dharmātmā gām arghyam udakaṃ tataḥ // Ram_2,48.16
GE09ram_02_u:4247: rāmam āgatam abhyarcya svāgatenāha taṃ muniḥ // Ram_2,48.17
GE09ram_02_u:4249: pratigṛhya ca tām arcām upaviṣṭaṃ sarāghavam
GE09ram_02_u:4250: bharadvājo 'bravīd vākyaṃ dharmayuktam idaṃ tadā // Ram_2,48.18
GE09ram_02_u:4252: cirasya khalu kākutstha paśyāmi tvām ihāgatam
GE09ram_02_u:4253: śrutaṃ tava mayā cedaṃ vivāsanam akāraṇam // Ram_2,48.19
GE09ram_02_u:4256: puṇyaś ca ramaṇīyaś ca vasatv iha bhavān sukham // Ram_2,48.20
GE09ram_02_u:4258: evam uktas tu vacanaṃ bharadvājena rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4259: pratyuvāca śubhaṃ vākyaṃ rāmaḥ sarvahite rataḥ // Ram_2,48.21
GE09ram_02_u:4262: āgamiṣyati vaidehīṃ māṃ cāpi prekṣako janaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4263: anena kāraṇenāham iha vāsaṃ na rocaye // Ram_2,48.22
GE09ram_02_u:4266: ramate yatra vaidehī sukhārhā janakātmajā // Ram_2,48.23
GE09ram_02_u:4268: etac chrutvā śubhaṃ vākyaṃ bharadvājo mahāmuniḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4269: rāghavasya tato vākyam arthagrāhakam abravīt // Ram_2,48.24
GE09ram_02_u:4271: daśakrośa itas tāta girir yasmin nivatsyasi
GE09ram_02_u:4278: kalyāṇāni samādhatte na pāpe kurute manaḥ // Ram_2,48.27
GE09ram_02_u:4280: ṛṣayas tatra bahavo vihṛtya śaradāṃ śatam
GE09ram_02_u:4281: tapasā divam ārūḍhāḥ kapālaśirasā saha // Ram_2,48.28
GE09ram_02_u:4283: praviviktam ahaṃ manye taṃ vāsaṃ bhavataḥ sukham
GE09ram_02_u:4284: iha vā vanavāsāya vasa rāma mayā saha // Ram_2,48.29
GE09ram_02_u:4286: sa rāmaṃ sarvakāmais taṃ bharadvājaḥ priyātithim
GE09ram_02_u:4287: sabhāryaṃ saha ca bhrātrā pratijagrāha dharmavit // Ram_2,48.30
GE09ram_02_u:4289: tasya prayāge rāmasya taṃ maharṣim upeyuṣaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4290: prapannā rajanī puṇyā citrāḥ kathayataḥ kathāḥ // Ram_2,48.31
GE09ram_02_u:4296: uṣitāḥ smeha vasatim anujānātu no bhavān // Ram_2,48.33
GE09ram_02_u:4298: rātryāṃ tu tasyāṃ vyuṣṭāyāṃ bharadvājo 'bravīd idam
GE09ram_02_u:4302: vicaranti vanānteṣu tāni drakṣyasi rāghava // Ram_2,48.35
GE09ram_02_u:4305: mṛgaiś ca mattair bahubhiś ca kuñjaraiḥ suramyam āsādya samāvasāśramam // Ram_2,48.36
GE09ram_02_u:4308: maharṣim abhivādyātha jagmatus taṃ giriṃ prati // Ram_2,49.1
GE09ram_02_u:4310: prasthitāṃś caiva tān prekṣya pitā putrān ivānvagāt
GE09ram_02_u:4311: tataḥ pracakrame vaktuṃ vacanaṃ sa mahāmuniḥ // Ram_2,49.2
GE09ram_02_u:4314: tatra yūyaṃ plavaṃ kṛtvā taratāṃśumatīṃ nadīm // Ram_2,49.3
GE09ram_02_u:4317: vivṛddhaṃ bahubhir vṛkṣaiḥ śyāmaṃ siddhopasevitam // Ram_2,49.4
GE09ram_02_u:4319: krośamātraṃ tato gatvā nīlaṃ drakṣyatha kānanam
GE09ram_02_u:4320: palāśabadarīmiśraṃ rāma vaṃśaiś ca yāmunaiḥ // Ram_2,49.5
GE09ram_02_u:4322: sa panthāś citrakūṭasya gataḥ subahuśo mayā
GE09ram_02_u:4324: iti panthānam āvedya maharṣiḥ sa nyavartata // Ram_2,49.6
GE09ram_02_u:4326: upāvṛtte munau tasmin rāmo lakṣmaṇam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:4327: kṛtapuṇyāḥ sma saumitre munir yan no 'nukampate // Ram_2,49.7
GE09ram_02_u:4330: sītām evāgrataḥ kṛtvā kālindīṃ jagmatur nadīm // Ram_2,49.8
GE09ram_02_u:4333: cakāra lakṣmaṇaś chittvā sītāyāḥ sukham āsanam // Ram_2,49.9
GE09ram_02_u:4335: tatra śriyam ivācintyāṃ rāmo dāśarathiḥ priyām
GE09ram_02_u:4336: īṣat saṃlajjamānāṃ tām adhyāropayata plavam // Ram_2,49.10
GE09ram_02_u:4339: tīrajair bahubhir vṛkṣaiḥ saṃterur yamunāṃ nadīm // Ram_2,49.11
GE09ram_02_u:4341: te tīrṇāḥ plavam utsṛjya prasthāya yamunāvanāt
GE09ram_02_u:4342: śyāmaṃ nyagrodham āseduḥ śītalaṃ haritacchadam // Ram_2,49.12
GE09ram_02_u:4344: kausalyāṃ caiva paśyeyaṃ sumitrāṃ ca yaśasvinīm
GE09ram_02_u:4345: iti sītāñjaliṃ kṛtvā paryagacchad vanaspatim // Ram_2,49.13
GE09ram_02_u:4348: bahūn medhyān mṛgān hatvā ceratur yamunāvane // Ram_2,49.14
GE09ram_02_u:4350: vihṛtya te barhiṇapūganādite śubhe vane vāraṇavānarāyute
GE09ram_02_u:4351: samaṃ nadīvapram upetya saṃmataṃ nivāsam ājagmur adīnadarśanāḥ // Ram_2,49.15
GE09ram_02_u:4356: saumitre śṛṇu vanyānāṃ valgu vyāharatāṃ svanam
GE09ram_02_u:4359: sa suptaḥ samaye bhrātrā lakṣmaṇaḥ pratibodhitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4360: jahau nidrāṃ ca tandrīṃ ca prasaktaṃ ca pathi śramam // Ram_2,50.3
GE09ram_02_u:4362: tata utthāya te sarve spṛṣṭvā nadyāḥ śivaṃ jalam
GE09ram_02_u:4363: panthānam ṛṣiṇoddiṣṭaṃ citrakūṭasya taṃ yayuḥ // Ram_2,50.4
GE09ram_02_u:4365: tataḥ samprasthitaḥ kāle rāmaḥ saumitriṇā saha
GE09ram_02_u:4366: sītāṃ kamalapattrākṣīm idaṃ vacanam abravīt // Ram_2,50.5
GE09ram_02_u:4368: ādīptān iva vaidehi sarvataḥ puṣpitān nagān
GE09ram_02_u:4369: svaiḥ puṣpaiḥ kiṃśukān paśya mālinaḥ śiśirātyaye // Ram_2,50.6
GE09ram_02_u:4372: phalapattrair avanatān nūnaṃ śakṣyāmi jīvitum // Ram_2,50.7
GE09ram_02_u:4375: madhūni madhukārībhiḥ saṃbhṛtāni nage nage // Ram_2,50.8
GE09ram_02_u:4377: eṣa krośati natyūhas taṃ śikhī pratikūjati
GE09ram_02_u:4381: citrakūṭam imaṃ paśya pravṛddhaśikharaṃ girim // Ram_2,50.10
GE09ram_02_u:4383: tatas tau pādacāreṇa gacchantau saha sītayā
GE09ram_02_u:4384: ramyam āsedatuḥ śailaṃ citrakūṭaṃ manoramam // Ram_2,50.11
GE09ram_02_u:4387: ayaṃ vāso bhavet tāvad atra saumya ramemahi // Ram_2,50.12
GE09ram_02_u:4389: lakṣmaṇānaya dārūṇi dṛḍhāni ca varāṇi ca
GE09ram_02_u:4390: kuruṣvāvasathaṃ saumya vāse me 'bhirataṃ manaḥ // Ram_2,50.13
GE09ram_02_u:4392: tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā saumitrir vividhān drumān
GE09ram_02_u:4393: ājahāra tataś cakre parṇaśālām ariṃdamaḥ // Ram_2,50.14
GE09ram_02_u:4396: aiṇeyaṃ māṃsam āhṛtya śālāṃ yakṣyāmahe vayam // Ram_2,50.15
GE09ram_02_u:4398: sa lakṣmaṇaḥ kṛṣṇamṛgaṃ hatvā medhyaṃ pratāpavān
GE09ram_02_u:4399: atha cikṣepa saumitriḥ samiddhe jātavedasi // Ram_2,50.16
GE09ram_02_u:4401: taṃ tu pakvaṃ samājñāya niṣṭaptaṃ chinnaśoṇitam
GE09ram_02_u:4402: lakṣmaṇaḥ puruṣavyāghram atha rāghavam abravīt // Ram_2,50.17
GE09ram_02_u:4404: ayaṃ kṛṣṇaḥ samāptāṅgaḥ śṛtaḥ kṛṣṇamṛgo yathā
GE09ram_02_u:4405: devatā devasaṃkāśa yajasva kuśalo hy asi // Ram_2,50.18
GE09ram_02_u:4407: rāmaḥ snātvā tu niyato guṇavāñ japyakovidaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4408: pāpasaṃśamanaṃ rāmaś cakāra balim uttamam // Ram_2,50.19
GE09ram_02_u:4410: tāṃ vṛkṣaparṇacchadanāṃ manojñāṃ yathāpradeśaṃ sukṛtāṃ nivātām
GE09ram_02_u:4411: vāsāya sarve viviśuḥ sametāḥ sabhāṃ yathā devagaṇāḥ sudharmām // Ram_2,50.20
GE09ram_02_u:4414: vanottame vyālamṛgānunādite tathā vijahruḥ susukhaṃ jitendriyāḥ // Ram_2,50.21
GE09ram_02_u:4416: suramyam āsādya tu citrakūṭaṃ nadīṃ ca tāṃ mālyavatīṃ sutīrthām
GE09ram_02_u:4417: nananda hṛṣṭo mṛgapakṣijuṣṭāṃ jahau ca duḥkhaṃ puravipravāsāt // Ram_2,50.22
GE09ram_02_u:4420: rāme dakṣiṇakūlasthe jagāma svagṛhaṃ guhaḥ // Ram_2,51.1
GE09ram_02_u:4423: ayodhyām eva nagarīṃ prayayau gāḍhadurmanāḥ // Ram_2,51.2
GE09ram_02_u:4425: sa vanāni sugandhīni saritaś ca sarāṃsi ca
GE09ram_02_u:4426: paśyann atiyayau śīghraṃ grāmāṇi nagarāṇi ca // Ram_2,51.3
GE09ram_02_u:4429: ayodhyāṃ samanuprāpya nirānandāṃ dadarśa ha // Ram_2,51.4
GE09ram_02_u:4431: sa śūnyām iva niḥśabdāṃ dṛṣṭvā paramadurmanāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4434: kaccin na sagajā sāśvā sajanā sajanādhipā
GE09ram_02_u:4436: iti cintāparaḥ sūtas tvaritaḥ praviveśa ha // Ram_2,51.6
GE09ram_02_u:4439: kva rāma iti pṛcchantaḥ sūtam abhyadravan narāḥ // Ram_2,51.7
GE09ram_02_u:4441: teṣāṃ śaśaṃsa gaṅgāyām aham āpṛcchya rāghavam
GE09ram_02_u:4444: te tīrṇā iti vijñāya bāṣpapūrṇamukhā janāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4445: aho dhig iti niḥśvasya hā rāmeti ca cukruśuḥ // Ram_2,51.9
GE09ram_02_u:4447: śuśrāva ca vacas teṣāṃ vṛndaṃ vṛndaṃ ca tiṣṭhatām
GE09ram_02_u:4448: hatāḥ sma khalu ye neha paśyāma iti rāghavam // Ram_2,51.10
GE09ram_02_u:4451: na drakṣyāmaḥ punar jātu dhārmikaṃ rāmam antarā // Ram_2,51.11
