GE09ram_02_u:4453: kiṃ samarthaṃ janasyāsya kiṃ priyaṃ kiṃ sukhāvaham
GE09ram_02_u:4454: iti rāmeṇa nagaraṃ pitṛvat paripālitam // Ram_2,51.12
GE09ram_02_u:4460: yatra rājā daśarathas tad evopayayau gṛham // Ram_2,51.14
GE09ram_02_u:4462: so 'vatīrya rathāc chīghraṃ rājaveśma praviśya ca
GE09ram_02_u:4468: saha rāmeṇa niryāto vinā rāmam ihāgataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4469: sūtaḥ kiṃ nāma kausalyāṃ śocantīṃ prativakṣyati // Ram_2,51.17
GE09ram_02_u:4471: yathā ca manye durjīvam evaṃ na sukaraṃ dhruvam
GE09ram_02_u:4472: ācchidya putre niryāte kausalyā yatra jīvati // Ram_2,51.18
GE09ram_02_u:4474: satyarūpaṃ tu tadvākyaṃ rājñaḥ strīṇāṃ niśāmayan
GE09ram_02_u:4475: pradīptam iva śokena viveśa sahasā gṛham // Ram_2,51.19
GE09ram_02_u:4477: sa praviśyāṣṭamīṃ kakṣyāṃ rājānaṃ dīnam āturam
GE09ram_02_u:4480: abhigamya tam āsīnaṃ narendram abhivādya ca
GE09ram_02_u:4483: sa tūṣṇīm eva tac chrutvā rājā vibhrāntacetanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4487: uddhṛtya bāhū cukrośa nṛpatau patite kṣitau // Ram_2,51.23
GE09ram_02_u:4489: sumitrayā tu sahitā kausalyā patitaṃ patim
GE09ram_02_u:4490: utthāpayāmāsa tadā vacanaṃ cedam abravīt // Ram_2,51.24
GE09ram_02_u:4493: vanavāsād anuprāptaṃ kasmān na pratibhāṣase // Ram_2,51.25
GE09ram_02_u:4496: uttiṣṭha sukṛtaṃ te 'stu śoke na syāt sahāyatā // Ram_2,51.26
GE09ram_02_u:4498: deva yasyā bhayād rāmaṃ nānupṛcchasi sārathim
GE09ram_02_u:4499: neha tiṣṭhati kaikeyī viśrabdhaṃ pratibhāṣyatām // Ram_2,51.27
GE09ram_02_u:4504: evaṃ vilapatīṃ dṛṣṭvā kausalyāṃ patitāṃ bhuvi
GE09ram_02_u:4505: patiṃ cāvekṣya tāḥ sarvāḥ sasvaraṃ ruruduḥ striyaḥ // Ram_2,51.29
GE09ram_02_u:4507: tatas tam antaḥpuranādam utthitaṃ samīkṣya vṛddhās taruṇāś ca mānavāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4508: striyaś ca sarvā ruruduḥ samantataḥ puraṃ tadāsīt punar eva saṃkulam // Ram_2,51.30
GE09ram_02_u:4510: pratyāśvasto yadā rājā mohāt pratyāgataḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4514: viniḥśvasantaṃ dhyāyantam asvastham iva kuñjaram // Ram_2,52.2
GE09ram_02_u:4516: rājā tu rajasā sūtaṃ dhvastāṅgaṃ samupasthitam
GE09ram_02_u:4519: kva nu vatsyati dharmātmā vṛkṣamūlam upāśritaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4521: bhūmipālātmajo bhūmau śete katham anāthavat // Ram_2,52.4
GE09ram_02_u:4524: sa vatsyati kathaṃ rāmo vijanaṃ vanam āśritaḥ // Ram_2,52.5
GE09ram_02_u:4527: kathaṃ kumārau vaidehyā sārdhaṃ vanam upasthitau // Ram_2,52.6
GE09ram_02_u:4530: rājaputrau kathaṃ pādair avaruhya rathād gatau // Ram_2,52.7
GE09ram_02_u:4532: siddhārthaḥ khalu sūta tvaṃ yena dṛṣṭau mamātmajau
GE09ram_02_u:4533: vanāntaṃ praviśantau tāv aśvināv iva mandaram // Ram_2,52.8
GE09ram_02_u:4535: kim uvāca vaco rāmaḥ kim uvāca ca lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4536: sumantra vanam āsādya kim uvāca ca maithilī
GE09ram_02_u:4537: āsitaṃ śayitaṃ bhuktaṃ sūta rāmasya kīrtaya // Ram_2,52.9
GE09ram_02_u:4543: añjaliṃ rāghavaḥ kṛtvā śirasābhipraṇamya ca // Ram_2,52.11
GE09ram_02_u:4546: śirasā vandanīyasya vandyau pādau mahātmanaḥ // Ram_2,52.12
GE09ram_02_u:4548: sarvam antaḥpuraṃ vācyaṃ sūta madvacanāt tvayā
GE09ram_02_u:4551: mātā ca mama kausalyā kuśalaṃ cābhivādanam
GE09ram_02_u:4552: devi devasya pādau ca devavat paripālaya // Ram_2,52.14
GE09ram_02_u:4554: bharataḥ kuśalaṃ vācyo vācyo madvacanena ca
GE09ram_02_u:4555: sarvāsv eva yathānyāyaṃ vṛttiṃ vartasva mātṛṣu // Ram_2,52.15
GE09ram_02_u:4560: ity evaṃ māṃ mahārāja bruvann eva mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4561: rāmo rājīvatāmrākṣo bhṛśam aśrūṇy avartayat // Ram_2,52.17
GE09ram_02_u:4563: lakṣmaṇas tu susaṃkruddho niḥśvasan vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:4568: rāmasya tu parityāge na hetum upalakṣaye // Ram_2,52.19
GE09ram_02_u:4574: bhrātā bhartā ca bandhuś ca pitā ca mama rāghavaḥ // Ram_2,52.21
GE09ram_02_u:4583: tena duḥkhena rudatī naiva māṃ kiṃcid abravīt // Ram_2,52.24
GE09ram_02_u:4586: mumoca sahasā bāṣpaṃ māṃ prayāntam udīkṣya sā // Ram_2,52.25
GE09ram_02_u:4589: tathaiva sītā rudatī tapasvinī nirīkṣate rājarathaṃ tathaiva mām // Ram_2,52.26
GE09ram_02_u:4591: mama tv aśvā nivṛttasya na prāvartanta vartmani
GE09ram_02_u:4592: uṣṇam aśru vimuñcanto rāme samprasthite vanam // Ram_2,53.1
GE09ram_02_u:4595: prasthito ratham āsthāya tad duḥkham api dhārayan // Ram_2,53.2
GE09ram_02_u:4597: guhena sārdhaṃ tatraiva sthito 'smi divasān bahūn
GE09ram_02_u:4598: āśayā yadi māṃ rāmaḥ punaḥ śabdāpayed iti // Ram_2,53.3
GE09ram_02_u:4603: na ca sarpanti sattvāni vyālā na prasaranti ca
GE09ram_02_u:4604: rāmaśokābhibhūtaṃ tan niṣkūjam abhavad vanam // Ram_2,53.5
GE09ram_02_u:4609: jalajāni ca puṣpāṇi mālyāni sthalajāni ca
GE09ram_02_u:4610: nādya bhānty alpagandhīni phalāni ca yathā puram // Ram_2,53.7
GE09ram_02_u:4612: praviśantam ayodhyāṃ māṃ na kaścid abhinandati
GE09ram_02_u:4613: narā rāmam apaśyanto niḥśvasanti muhur muhuḥ // Ram_2,53.8
GE09ram_02_u:4615: harmyair vimānaiḥ prāsādair avekṣya ratham āgatam
GE09ram_02_u:4619: anyonyam abhivīkṣante vyaktam ārtatarāḥ striyaḥ // Ram_2,53.10
GE09ram_02_u:4622: aham ārtatayā kaṃcid viśeṣaṃ nopalakṣaye // Ram_2,53.11
GE09ram_02_u:4628: kausalyā putrahīneva ayodhyā pratibhāti mā // Ram_2,53.13
GE09ram_02_u:4631: bāṣpopahatayā rājā taṃ sūtam idam abravīt // Ram_2,53.14
GE09ram_02_u:4634: mayā na mantrakuśalair vṛddhaiḥ saha samarthitam // Ram_2,53.15
GE09ram_02_u:4636: na suhṛdbhir na cāmātyair mantrayitvā na naigamaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4637: mayāyam arthaḥ sammohāt strīhetoḥ sahasā kṛtaḥ // Ram_2,53.16
GE09ram_02_u:4639: bhavitavyatayā nūnam idaṃ vā vyasanaṃ mahat
GE09ram_02_u:4640: kulasyāsya vināśāya prāptaṃ sūta yadṛcchayā // Ram_2,53.17
GE09ram_02_u:4642: sūta yady asti te kiṃcin mayāpi sukṛtaṃ kṛtam
GE09ram_02_u:4643: tvaṃ prāpayāśu māṃ rāmaṃ prāṇāḥ saṃtvarayanti mām // Ram_2,53.18
GE09ram_02_u:4645: yad yad yāpi mamaivājñā nivartayatu rāghavam
GE09ram_02_u:4646: na śakṣyāmi vinā rāmaṃ muhūrtam api jīvitum // Ram_2,53.19
GE09ram_02_u:4648: atha vāpi mahābāhur gato dūraṃ bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:4649: mām eva ratham āropya śīghraṃ rāmāya darśaya // Ram_2,53.20
GE09ram_02_u:4652: yadi jīvāmi sādhv enaṃ paśyeyaṃ saha sītayā // Ram_2,53.21
GE09ram_02_u:4655: rāmaṃ yadi na paśyāmi gamiṣyāmi yamakṣayam // Ram_2,53.22
GE09ram_02_u:4657: ato nu kiṃ duḥkhataraṃ yo 'ham ikṣvākunandanam
GE09ram_02_u:4658: imām avasthām āpanno neha paśyāmi rāghavam // Ram_2,53.23
GE09ram_02_u:4660: hā rāma rāmānuja hā hā vaidehi tapasvini
GE09ram_02_u:4661: na māṃ jānīta duḥkhena mriyamāṇam anāthavat
GE09ram_02_u:4662: dustaro jīvatā devi mayāyaṃ śokasāgaraḥ // Ram_2,53.24
GE09ram_02_u:4664: aśobhanaṃ yo 'ham ihādya rāghavaṃ didṛkṣamāṇo na labhe salakṣmaṇam
GE09ram_02_u:4665: itīva rājā vilapan mahāyaśāḥ papāta tūrṇaṃ śayane sa mūrchitaḥ // Ram_2,53.25
GE09ram_02_u:4667: iti vilapati pārthive pranaṣṭe karuṇataraṃ dviguṇaṃ ca rāmahetoḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4668: vacanam anuniśamya tasya devī bhayam agamat punar eva rāmamātā // Ram_2,53.26
GE09ram_02_u:4671: dharaṇyāṃ gatasattveva kausalyā sūtam abravīt // Ram_2,54.1
GE09ram_02_u:4673: naya māṃ yatra kākutsthaḥ sītā yatra ca lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4674: tān vinā kṣaṇam apy atra jīvituṃ notsahe hy aham // Ram_2,54.2
GE09ram_02_u:4676: nivartaya rathaṃ śīghraṃ daṇḍakān naya mām api
GE09ram_02_u:4677: atha tān nānugacchāmi gamiṣyāmi yamakṣayam // Ram_2,54.3
GE09ram_02_u:4680: idam āśvāsayan devīṃ sūtaḥ prāñjalir abravīt // Ram_2,54.4
GE09ram_02_u:4682: tyaja śokaṃ ca mohaṃ ca sambhramaṃ duḥkhajaṃ tathā
GE09ram_02_u:4683: vyavadhūya ca saṃtāpaṃ vane vatsyati rāghavaḥ // Ram_2,54.5
GE09ram_02_u:4685: lakṣmaṇaś cāpi rāmasya pādau paricaran vane
GE09ram_02_u:4688: vijane 'pi vane sītā vāsaṃ prāpya gṛheṣv iva
GE09ram_02_u:4691: nāsyā dainyaṃ kṛtaṃ kiṃcit susūkṣmam api lakṣaye
GE09ram_02_u:4692: uciteva pravāsānāṃ vaidehī pratibhāti mā // Ram_2,54.8
GE09ram_02_u:4694: nagaropavanaṃ gatvā yathā sma ramate purā
GE09ram_02_u:4695: tathaiva ramate sītā nirjaneṣu vaneṣv api // Ram_2,54.9
GE09ram_02_u:4698: rāmā rāme hy adhīnātmā vijane 'pi vane satī // Ram_2,54.10
GE09ram_02_u:4700: tadgataṃ hṛdayaṃ hy asyās tadadhīnaṃ ca jīvitam
GE09ram_02_u:4701: ayodhyāpi bhavet tasyā rāmahīnā tathā vanam // Ram_2,54.11
GE09ram_02_u:4703: pathi pṛcchati vaidehī grāmāṃś ca nagarāṇi ca
GE09ram_02_u:4704: gatiṃ dṛṣṭvā nadīnāṃ ca pādapān vividhān api // Ram_2,54.12
GE09ram_02_u:4707: na hi gacchati vaidehyāś candrāṃśusadṛśī prabhā // Ram_2,54.13
GE09ram_02_u:4710: vadanaṃ tadvadānyāyā vaidehyā na vikampate // Ram_2,54.14
GE09ram_02_u:4716: idānīm api vaidehī tadrāgā nyastabhūṣaṇā // Ram_2,54.16
GE09ram_02_u:4718: gajaṃ vā vīkṣya siṃhaṃ vā vyāghraṃ vā vanam āśritā
GE09ram_02_u:4719: nāhārayati saṃtrāsaṃ bāhū rāmasya saṃśritā // Ram_2,54.17
GE09ram_02_u:4721: na śocyās te na cātmā te śocyo nāpi janādhipaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4722: idaṃ hi caritaṃ loke pratiṣṭhāsyati śāśvatam // Ram_2,54.18
GE09ram_02_u:4724: vidhūya śokaṃ parihṛṣṭamānasā maharṣiyāte pathi suvyavasthitāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4725: vane ratā vanyaphalāśanāḥ pituḥ śubhāṃ pratijñāṃ paripālayanti te // Ram_2,54.19
GE09ram_02_u:4728: na caiva devī virarāma kūjitāt priyeti putreti ca rāghaveti ca // Ram_2,54.20
GE09ram_02_u:4730: vanaṃ gate dharmapare rāme ramayatāṃ vare
GE09ram_02_u:4731: kausalyā rudatī svārtā bhartāram idam abravīt // Ram_2,55.1
GE09ram_02_u:4733: yadyapi triṣu lokeṣu prathitaṃ te mahad yaśaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4734: sānukrośo vadānyaś ca priyavādī ca rāghavaḥ // Ram_2,55.2
GE09ram_02_u:4736: kathaṃ naravaraśreṣṭha putrau tau saha sītayā
GE09ram_02_u:4737: duḥkhitau sukhasaṃvṛddhau vane duḥkhaṃ sahiṣyataḥ // Ram_2,55.3
GE09ram_02_u:4739: sā nūnaṃ taruṇī śyāmā sukumārī sukhocitā
GE09ram_02_u:4740: katham uṣṇaṃ ca śītaṃ ca maithilī prasahiṣyate // Ram_2,55.4
GE09ram_02_u:4743: vanyaṃ naivāram āhāraṃ kathaṃ sītopabhokṣyate // Ram_2,55.5
GE09ram_02_u:4746: kathaṃ kravyādasiṃhānāṃ śabdaṃ śroṣyaty aśobhanam // Ram_2,55.6
GE09ram_02_u:4752: kadā drakṣyāmi rāmasya vadanaṃ puṣkarekṣaṇam // Ram_2,55.8
GE09ram_02_u:4754: vajrasāramayaṃ nūnaṃ hṛdayaṃ me na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4755: apaśyantyā na taṃ yad vai phalatīdaṃ sahasradhā // Ram_2,55.9
GE09ram_02_u:4757: yadi pañcadaśe varṣe rāghavaḥ punar eṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:4758: jahyād rājyaṃ ca kośaṃ ca bharatenopabhokṣyate // Ram_2,55.10
GE09ram_02_u:4760: evaṃ kanīyasā bhrātrā bhuktaṃ rājyaṃ viśāṃ pate
GE09ram_02_u:4761: bhrātā jyeṣṭho variṣṭhaś ca kimarthaṃ nāvamaṃsyate // Ram_2,55.11
GE09ram_02_u:4763: na pareṇāhṛtaṃ bhakṣyaṃ vyāghraḥ khāditum icchati
GE09ram_02_u:4764: evam eva naravyāghraḥ paralīḍhaṃ na maṃsyate // Ram_2,55.12
GE09ram_02_u:4766: havir ājyaṃ puroḍāśāḥ kuśā yūpāś ca khādirāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4767: naitāni yātayāmāni kurvanti punar adhvare // Ram_2,55.13
GE09ram_02_u:4769: tathā hy āttam idaṃ rājyaṃ hṛtasārāṃ surām iva
GE09ram_02_u:4770: nābhimantum alaṃ rāmo naṣṭasomam ivādhvaram // Ram_2,55.14
GE09ram_02_u:4773: balavān iva śārdūlo vāladher abhimarśanam // Ram_2,55.15
GE09ram_02_u:4776: svayam eva hataḥ pitrā jalajenātmajo yathā // Ram_2,55.16
GE09ram_02_u:4779: yadi te dharmanirate tvayā putre vivāsite // Ram_2,55.17
GE09ram_02_u:4781: gatir ekā patir nāryā dvitīyā gatir ātmajaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4782: tṛtīyā jñātayo rājaṃś caturthī neha vidyate // Ram_2,55.18
GE09ram_02_u:4784: tatra tvaṃ caiva me nāsti rāmaś ca vanam āśritaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4785: na vanaṃ gantum icchāmi sarvathā hi hatā tvayā // Ram_2,55.19
GE09ram_02_u:4787: hataṃ tvayā rājyam idaṃ sarāṣṭraṃ hatas tathātmā saha mantribhiś ca
GE09ram_02_u:4788: hatā saputrāsmi hatāś ca paurāḥ sutaś ca bhāryā ca tava prahṛṣṭau // Ram_2,55.20
GE09ram_02_u:4790: imāṃ giraṃ dāruṇaśabdasaṃśritāṃ niśamya rājāpi mumoha duḥkhitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4791: tataḥ sa śokaṃ praviveśa pārthivaḥ svaduṣkṛtaṃ cāpi punas tadāsmarat // Ram_2,55.21
GE09ram_02_u:4793: evaṃ tu kruddhayā rājā rāmamātrā saśokayā
GE09ram_02_u:4794: śrāvitaḥ paruṣaṃ vākyaṃ cintayāmāsa duḥkhitaḥ // Ram_2,56.1
GE09ram_02_u:4797: yad anena kṛtaṃ pūrvam ajñānāc chabdavedhinā // Ram_2,56.2
GE09ram_02_u:4799: amanās tena śokena rāmaśokena ca prabhuḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4800: dahyamānas tu śokābhyāṃ kausalyām āha bhūpatiḥ // Ram_2,56.3
GE09ram_02_u:4803: vatsalā cānṛśaṃsā ca tvaṃ hi nityaṃ pareṣv api // Ram_2,56.4
GE09ram_02_u:4805: bhartā tu khalu nārīṇāṃ guṇavān nirguṇo 'pi vā
GE09ram_02_u:4806: dharmaṃ vimṛśamānānāṃ pratyakṣaṃ devi daivatam // Ram_2,56.5
GE09ram_02_u:4809: nārhase vipriyaṃ vaktuṃ duḥkhitāpi suduḥkhitam // Ram_2,56.6
GE09ram_02_u:4811: tad vākyaṃ karuṇaṃ rājñaḥ śrutvā dīnasya bhāṣitam
GE09ram_02_u:4812: kausalyā vyasṛjad bāṣpaṃ praṇālīva navodakam // Ram_2,56.7
GE09ram_02_u:4814: sa mūrdhni baddhvā rudatī rājñaḥ padmam ivāñjalim
GE09ram_02_u:4815: sambhramād abravīt trastā tvaramāṇākṣaraṃ vacaḥ // Ram_2,56.8
GE09ram_02_u:4817: prasīda śirasā yāce bhūmau nipatitāsmi te
GE09ram_02_u:4818: yācitāsmi hatā deva hantavyāhaṃ na hi tvayā // Ram_2,56.9
GE09ram_02_u:4820: naiṣā hi sā strī bhavati ślāghanīyena dhīmatā
GE09ram_02_u:4821: ubhayor lokayor vīra patyā yā saṃprasādyate // Ram_2,56.10
GE09ram_02_u:4823: jānāmi dharmaṃ dharmajña tvāṃ jāne satyavādinam
GE09ram_02_u:4824: putraśokārtayā tat tu mayā kim api bhāṣitam // Ram_2,56.11
GE09ram_02_u:4826: śoko nāśayate dhairyaṃ śoko nāśayate śrutam
GE09ram_02_u:4827: śoko nāśayate sarvaṃ nāsti śokasamo ripuḥ // Ram_2,56.12
GE09ram_02_u:4830: soḍhum āpatitaḥ śokaḥ susūkṣmo 'pi na śakyate // Ram_2,56.13
GE09ram_02_u:4835: taṃ hi cintayamānāyāḥ śoko 'yaṃ hṛdi vardhate
GE09ram_02_u:4836: adīnām iva vegena samudrasalilaṃ mahat // Ram_2,56.15
GE09ram_02_u:4838: evaṃ hi kathayantyās tu kausalyāyāḥ śubhaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4839: mandaraśmir abhūt suryo rajanī cābhyavartata // Ram_2,56.16
GE09ram_02_u:4841: atha prahlādito vākyair devyā kausalyayā nṛpaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4842: śokena ca samākrānto nidrāyā vaśam eyivān // Ram_2,56.17
GE09ram_02_u:4845: atha rājā daśarathaḥ sa cintām abhyapadyata // Ram_2,57.1
GE09ram_02_u:4848: āviveśopasargas taṃ tamaḥ sūryam ivāsuram // Ram_2,57.2
GE09ram_02_u:4850: sa rājā rajanīṃ ṣaṣṭhīṃ rāme pravrajite vanam
GE09ram_02_u:4852: kausalyāṃ putraśokārtām idaṃ vacanam abravīt // Ram_2,57.3
GE09ram_02_u:4854: yad ācarati kalyāṇi śubhaṃ vā yadi vāśubham
GE09ram_02_u:4855: tad eva labhate bhadre kartā karmajam ātmanaḥ // Ram_2,57.4
GE09ram_02_u:4858: doṣaṃ vā yo na jānāti sa bāla iti hocyate // Ram_2,57.5
GE09ram_02_u:4860: kaścid āmravaṇaṃ chittvā palāśāṃś ca niṣiñcati
GE09ram_02_u:4861: puṣpaṃ dṛṣṭvā phale gṛdhnuḥ sa śocati phalāgame // Ram_2,57.6
GE09ram_02_u:4863: so 'ham āmravaṇaṃ chittvā palāśāṃś ca nyaṣecayam
GE09ram_02_u:4864: rāmaṃ phalāgame tyaktvā paścāc chocāmi durmatiḥ // Ram_2,57.7
GE09ram_02_u:4867: kumāraḥ śabdavedhīti mayā pāpam idaṃ kṛtam
GE09ram_02_u:4868: tad idaṃ me 'nusaṃprāptaṃ devi duḥkhaṃ svayaṃ kṛtam // Ram_2,57.8
GE09ram_02_u:4870: sammohād iha bālena yathā syād bhakṣitaṃ viṣam
GE09ram_02_u:4871: evaṃ mamāpy avijñātaṃ śabdavedhyamayaṃ phalam // Ram_2,57.9
GE09ram_02_u:4873: devy anūḍhā tvam abhavo yuvarājo bhavāmy aham
GE09ram_02_u:4876: upāsya hi rasān bhaumāṃs taptvā ca jagad aṃśubhiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4877: paretācaritāṃ bhīmāṃ ravir āviśate diśam // Ram_2,57.11
GE09ram_02_u:4879: uṣṇam antardadhe sadyaḥ snigdhā dadṛśire ghanāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4885: tasminn atisukhe kāle dhanuṣmān iṣumān rathī
GE09ram_02_u:4888: nipāne mahiṣaṃ rātrau gajaṃ vābhyāgataṃ nadīm
GE09ram_02_u:4889: anyaṃ vā śvāpadaṃ kaṃcij jighāṃsur ajitendriyaḥ // Ram_2,57.15
GE09ram_02_u:4891: athāndhakāre tv aśrauṣaṃ jale kumbhasya pūryataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4892: acakṣur viṣaye ghoṣaṃ vāraṇasyeva nardataḥ // Ram_2,57.16
GE09ram_02_u:4895: amuñcaṃ niśitaṃ bāṇam aham āśīviṣopamam // Ram_2,57.17
GE09ram_02_u:4897: tatra vāg uṣasi vyaktā prādurāsīd vanaukasaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4898: hā heti patatas toye vāg abhūt tatra mānuṣī
GE09ram_02_u:4899: katham asmadvidhe śastraṃ nipatet tu tapasvini // Ram_2,57.18
GE09ram_02_u:4902: iṣuṇābhihataḥ kena kasya vā kiṃ kṛtaṃ mayā // Ram_2,57.19
GE09ram_02_u:4904: ṛṣer hi nyastadaṇḍasya vane vanyena jīvataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4905: kathaṃ nu śastreṇa vadho madvidhasya vidhīyate // Ram_2,57.20
GE09ram_02_u:4908: ko vadhena mamārthī syāt kiṃ vāsyāpakṛtaṃ mayā // Ram_2,57.21
GE09ram_02_u:4911: na kaścit sādhu manyeta yathaiva gurutalpagam // Ram_2,57.22
GE09ram_02_u:4914: mātaraṃ pitaraṃ cobhāv anuśocāmi madvidhe // Ram_2,57.23
GE09ram_02_u:4916: tad etan mithunaṃ vṛddhaṃ cirakālabhṛtaṃ mayā
GE09ram_02_u:4917: mayi pañcatvam āpanne kāṃ vṛttiṃ vartayiṣyati // Ram_2,57.24
GE09ram_02_u:4919: vṛddhau ca mātāpitarāv ahaṃ caikeṣuṇā hataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4920: kena sma nihatāḥ sarve subālenākṛtātmanā // Ram_2,57.25
GE09ram_02_u:4922: tāṃ giraṃ karuṇāṃ śrutvā mama dharmānukāṅkṣiṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4923: karābhyāṃ saśaraṃ cāpaṃ vyathitasyāpatad bhuvi // Ram_2,57.26
GE09ram_02_u:4925: taṃ deśam aham āgamya dīnasattvaḥ sudurmanāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4926: apaśyam iṣuṇā tīre sarayvās tāpasaṃ hatam // Ram_2,57.27
GE09ram_02_u:4928: sa mām udvīkṣya netrābhyāṃ trastam asvasthacetasam
GE09ram_02_u:4929: ity uvāca vacaḥ krūraṃ didhakṣann iva tejasā // Ram_2,57.28
GE09ram_02_u:4931: kiṃ tavāpakṛtaṃ rājan vane nivasatā mayā
GE09ram_02_u:4932: jihīrṣur ambho gurvarthaṃ yad ahaṃ tāḍitas tvayā // Ram_2,57.29
GE09ram_02_u:4934: ekena khalu bāṇena marmaṇy abhihate mayi
GE09ram_02_u:4935: dvāv andhau nihatau vṛddhau mātā janayitā ca me // Ram_2,57.30
GE09ram_02_u:4937: tau nūnaṃ durbalāv andhau matpratīkṣau pipāsitau
GE09ram_02_u:4938: ciram āśākṛtāṃ tṛṣṇāṃ kaṣṭāṃ saṃdhārayiṣyataḥ // Ram_2,57.31
GE09ram_02_u:4940: na nūnaṃ tapaso vāsti phalayogaḥ śrutasya vā
GE09ram_02_u:4941: pitā yan māṃ na jānāti śayānaṃ patitaṃ bhuvi // Ram_2,57.32
GE09ram_02_u:4943: jānann api ca kiṃ kuryād aśaktir aparikramaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4944: bhidyamānam ivāśaktas trātum anyo nago nagam // Ram_2,57.33
GE09ram_02_u:4946: pitus tvam eva me gatvā śīghram ācakṣva rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:4947: na tvām anudahet kruddho vanaṃ vahnir ivaidhitaḥ // Ram_2,57.34
GE09ram_02_u:4949: iyam ekapadī rājan yato me pitur āśramaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4950: taṃ prasādaya gatvā tvaṃ na tvāṃ sa kupitaḥ śapet // Ram_2,57.35
GE09ram_02_u:4952: viśalyaṃ kuru māṃ rājan marma me niśitaḥ śaraḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4953: ruṇaddhi mṛdu sotsedhaṃ tīram amburayo yathā // Ram_2,57.36
GE09ram_02_u:4955: na dvijātir ahaṃ rājan mā bhūt te manaso vyathā
GE09ram_02_u:4956: śūdrāyām asmi vaiśyena jāto janapadādhipa // Ram_2,57.37
GE09ram_02_u:4959: tasya tv ānamyamānasya taṃ bāṇam aham uddharam // Ram_2,57.38
GE09ram_02_u:4961: jalārdragātraṃ tu vilapya kṛcchrān marmavraṇaṃ saṃtatam ucchvasantam
GE09ram_02_u:4962: tataḥ sarayvāṃ tam ahaṃ śayānaṃ samīkṣya bhadre subhṛśaṃ viṣaṇṇaḥ // Ram_2,57.39
GE09ram_02_u:4964: tad ajñānān mahat pāpaṃ kṛtvā saṃkulitendriyaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:4965: ekas tv acintayaṃ buddhyā kathaṃ nu sukṛtaṃ bhavet // Ram_2,58.1
GE09ram_02_u:4967: tatas taṃ ghaṭam ādāya pūrṇaṃ paramavāriṇā
GE09ram_02_u:4968: āśramaṃ tam ahaṃ prāpya yathākhyātapathaṃ gataḥ // Ram_2,58.2
GE09ram_02_u:4971: apaśyaṃ tasya pitarau lūnapakṣāv iva dvijau // Ram_2,58.3
GE09ram_02_u:4974: tām āśāṃ matkṛte hīnāv udāsīnāv anāthavat // Ram_2,58.4
GE09ram_02_u:4976: padaśabdaṃ tu me śrutvā munir vākyam abhāṣata
GE09ram_02_u:4977: kiṃ cirāyasi me putra pānīyaṃ kṣipram ānaya // Ram_2,58.5
GE09ram_02_u:4979: yannimittam idaṃ tāta salile krīḍitaṃ tvayā
GE09ram_02_u:4980: utkaṇṭhitā te māteyaṃ praviśa kṣipram āśramam // Ram_2,58.6
GE09ram_02_u:4982: yad vyalīkaṃ kṛtaṃ putra mātrā te yadi vā mayā
GE09ram_02_u:4983: na tan manasi kartavyaṃ tvayā tāta tapasvinā // Ram_2,58.7
GE09ram_02_u:4985: tvaṃ gatis tv agatīnāṃ ca cakṣus tvaṃ hīnacakṣuṣām
GE09ram_02_u:4986: samāsaktās tvayi prāṇāḥ kiṃcin nau nābhibhāṣase // Ram_2,58.8
GE09ram_02_u:4988: munim avyaktayā vācā tam ahaṃ sajjamānayā
GE09ram_02_u:4989: hīnavyañjanayā prekṣya bhīto bhīta ivābruvam // Ram_2,58.9
GE09ram_02_u:4992: ācacakṣe tv ahaṃ tasmai putravyasanajaṃ bhayam // Ram_2,58.10
GE09ram_02_u:4995: sajjanāvamataṃ duḥkham idaṃ prāptaṃ svakarmajam // Ram_2,58.11
GE09ram_02_u:4998: jighāṃsuḥ śvāpadaṃ kiṃcin nipāne vāgataṃ gajam // Ram_2,58.12
GE09ram_02_u:5000: tatra śruto mayā śabdo jale kumbhasya pūryataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5001: dvipo 'yam iti matvā hi bāṇenābhihato mayā // Ram_2,58.13
GE09ram_02_u:5003: gatvā nadyās tatas tīram apaśyam iṣuṇā hṛdi
GE09ram_02_u:5004: vinirbhinnaṃ gataprāṇaṃ śayānaṃ bhuvi tāpasam // Ram_2,58.14
GE09ram_02_u:5007: visṛṣṭo 'mbhasi nārācas tena te nihataḥ sutaḥ // Ram_2,58.15
GE09ram_02_u:5009: sa coddhṛtena bāṇena tatraiva svargam āsthitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5010: bhagavantāv ubhau śocann andhāv iti vilapya ca // Ram_2,58.16
GE09ram_02_u:5013: śeṣam evaṃgate yat syāt tat prasīdatu me muniḥ // Ram_2,58.17
GE09ram_02_u:5015: sa tac chrutvā vacaḥ krūraṃ niḥśvasañ śokakarśitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5016: mām uvāca mahātejāḥ kṛtāñjalim upasthitam // Ram_2,58.18
GE09ram_02_u:5018: yady etad aśubhaṃ karma na sma me kathayeḥ svayam
GE09ram_02_u:5019: phalen mūrdhā sma te rājan sadyaḥ śatasahasradhā // Ram_2,58.19
GE09ram_02_u:5022: jñānapūrvaṃ kṛtaḥ sthānāc cyāvayed api vajriṇam // Ram_2,58.20
GE09ram_02_u:5024: ajñānāddhi kṛtaṃ yasmād idaṃ tenaiva jīvasi
GE09ram_02_u:5025: api hy adya kulaṃ na syād rāghavāṇāṃ kuto bhavān // Ram_2,58.21
GE09ram_02_u:5027: naya nau nṛpa taṃ deśam iti māṃ cābhyabhāṣata
GE09ram_02_u:5028: adya taṃ draṣṭum icchāvaḥ putraṃ paścimadarśanam // Ram_2,58.22
GE09ram_02_u:5031: śayānaṃ bhuvi niḥsaṃjñaṃ dharmarājavaśaṃ gatam // Ram_2,58.23
GE09ram_02_u:5033: athāham ekas taṃ deśaṃ nītvā tau bhṛśaduḥkhitau
GE09ram_02_u:5034: asparśayam ahaṃ putraṃ taṃ muniṃ saha bhāryayā // Ram_2,58.24
GE09ram_02_u:5036: tau putram ātmanaḥ spṛṣṭvā tam āsādya tapasvinau
GE09ram_02_u:5037: nipetatuḥ śarīre 'sya pitā cāsyedam abravīt // Ram_2,58.25
GE09ram_02_u:5039: na nv ahaṃ te priyaḥ putra mātaraṃ paśya dhārmika
GE09ram_02_u:5040: kiṃ nu nāliṅgase putra sukumāra vaco vada // Ram_2,58.26
GE09ram_02_u:5043: adhīyānasya madhuraṃ śāstraṃ vānyad viśeṣataḥ // Ram_2,58.27
GE09ram_02_u:5045: ko māṃ saṃdhyām upāsyaiva snātvā hutahutāśanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5048: kandamūlaphalaṃ hṛtvā ko māṃ priyam ivātithim
GE09ram_02_u:5051: imām andhāṃ ca vṛddhāṃ ca mātaraṃ te tapasvinīm
GE09ram_02_u:5052: kathaṃ putra bhariṣyāmi kṛpaṇāṃ putragardhinīm // Ram_2,58.30
GE09ram_02_u:5054: tiṣṭha mā mā gamaḥ putra yamasya sadanaṃ prati
GE09ram_02_u:5055: śvo mayā saha gantāsi jananyā ca samedhitaḥ // Ram_2,58.31
GE09ram_02_u:5057: ubhāv api ca śokārtāv anāthau kṛpaṇau vane
GE09ram_02_u:5058: kṣipram eva gamiṣyāvas tvayā hīnau yamakṣayam // Ram_2,58.32
GE09ram_02_u:5060: tato vaivasvataṃ dṛṣṭvā taṃ pravakṣyāmi bhāratīm
GE09ram_02_u:5061: kṣamatāṃ dharmarājo me bibhṛyāt pitarāv ayam // Ram_2,58.33
GE09ram_02_u:5064: tena satyena gacchāśu ye lokāḥ śastrayodhinām // Ram_2,58.34
GE09ram_02_u:5066: yānti śūrā gatiṃ yāṃ ca saṃgrāmeṣv anivartinaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5067: hatās tv abhimukhāḥ putra gatiṃ tāṃ paramāṃ vraja // Ram_2,58.35
GE09ram_02_u:5069: yāṃ gatiṃ sagaraḥ śaibyo dilīpo janamejayaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5070: nahuṣo dhundhumāraś ca prāptās tāṃ gaccha putraka // Ram_2,58.36
GE09ram_02_u:5072: yā gatiḥ sarvasādhūnāṃ svādhyāyāt tapasā ca yā
GE09ram_02_u:5076: dehanyāsakṛtāṃ yā ca tāṃ gatiṃ gaccha putraka
GE09ram_02_u:5077: na hi tv asmin kule jāto gacchaty akuśalāṃ gatim // Ram_2,58.38
GE09ram_02_u:5080: tato 'smai kartum udakaṃ pravṛttaḥ saha bhāryayā // Ram_2,58.39
GE09ram_02_u:5082: sa tu divyena rūpeṇa muniputraḥ svakarmabhiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5083: āśvāsya ca muhūrtaṃ tu pitarau vākyam abravīt // Ram_2,58.40
GE09ram_02_u:5085: sthānam asmi mahat prāpto bhavatoḥ paricāraṇāt
GE09ram_02_u:5086: bhavantāv api ca kṣipraṃ mama mūlam upaiṣyataḥ // Ram_2,58.41
GE09ram_02_u:5088: evam uktvā tu divyena vimānena vapuṣmatā
GE09ram_02_u:5089: āruroha divaṃ kṣipraṃ muniputro jitendriyaḥ // Ram_2,58.42
GE09ram_02_u:5091: sa kṛtvā tūdakaṃ tūrṇaṃ tāpasaḥ saha bhāryayā
GE09ram_02_u:5092: mām uvāca mahātejāḥ kṛtāñjalim upasthitam // Ram_2,58.43
GE09ram_02_u:5094: adyaiva jahi māṃ rājan maraṇe nāsti me vyathā
GE09ram_02_u:5095: yac chareṇaikaputraṃ māṃ tvam akārṣīr aputrakam // Ram_2,58.44
GE09ram_02_u:5097: tvayā tu yad avijñānān nihato me sutaḥ śuciḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5098: tena tvām abhiśapsyāmi suduḥkham atidāruṇam // Ram_2,58.45
GE09ram_02_u:5100: putravyasanajaṃ duḥkhaṃ yad etan mama sāmpratam
GE09ram_02_u:5101: evaṃ tvaṃ putraśokena rājan kālaṃ kariṣyasi // Ram_2,58.46
GE09ram_02_u:5103: tasmān mām āgataṃ bhadre tasyodārasya tadvacaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5104: yad ahaṃ putraśokena saṃtyakṣyāmy adya jīvitam // Ram_2,58.47
GE09ram_02_u:5106: yadi māṃ saṃspṛśed rāmaḥ sakṛd adyālabheta vā
GE09ram_02_u:5107: na tan me sadṛśaṃ devi yan mayā rāghave kṛtam // Ram_2,58.48
GE09ram_02_u:5109: cakṣuṣā tvāṃ na paśyāmi smṛtir mama vilupyate
GE09ram_02_u:5110: dūtā vaivasvatasyaite kausalye tvarayanti mām // Ram_2,58.49
GE09ram_02_u:5112: atas tu kiṃ duḥkhataraṃ yad ahaṃ jīvitakṣaye
GE09ram_02_u:5113: na hi paśyāmi dharmajñaṃ rāmaṃ satyaparākramam // Ram_2,58.50
GE09ram_02_u:5115: na te manuṣyā devās te ye cāruśubhakuṇḍalam
GE09ram_02_u:5116: mukhaṃ drakṣyanti rāmasya varṣe pañcadaśe punaḥ // Ram_2,58.51
GE09ram_02_u:5119: dhanyā drakṣyanti rāmasya tārādhipanibhaṃ mukham // Ram_2,58.52
GE09ram_02_u:5122: sugandhi mama nāthasya dhanyā drakṣyanti tanmukham // Ram_2,58.53
GE09ram_02_u:5125: drakṣyanti sukhino rāmaṃ śukraṃ mārgagataṃ yathā // Ram_2,58.54
GE09ram_02_u:5127: ayam ātmabhavaḥ śoko mām anātham acetanam
GE09ram_02_u:5128: saṃsādayati vegena yathā kūlaṃ nadīrayaḥ // Ram_2,58.55
GE09ram_02_u:5131: rājā daśarathaḥ śocañ jīvitāntam upāgamat // Ram_2,58.56
GE09ram_02_u:5133: tathā tu dīnaṃ kathayan narādhipaḥ priyasya putrasya vivāsanāturaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5134: gate 'rdharātre bhṛśaduḥkhapīḍitas tadā jahau prāṇam udāradarśanaḥ // Ram_2,58.57
GE09ram_02_u:5146: upaninyus tathāpy anyāḥ kumārībahulāḥ striyaḥ // Ram_2,59.4
GE09ram_02_u:5149: tāḥ striyas tu samāgamya bhartāraṃ pratyabodhayan // Ram_2,59.5
GE09ram_02_u:5151: tā vepathuparītāś ca rājñaḥ prāṇeṣu śaṅkitāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5154: atha saṃvepamānānāṃ strīṇāṃ dṛṣṭvā ca pārthivam
GE09ram_02_u:5155: yat tad āśaṅkitaṃ pāpaṃ tasya jajñe viniścayaḥ // Ram_2,59.7
GE09ram_02_u:5157: tataḥ pracukruśur dīnāḥ sasvaraṃ tā varāṅganāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5161: kausalyā ca sumitrā ca tyaktanidre babhūvatuḥ // Ram_2,59.9
GE09ram_02_u:5163: kausalyā ca sumitrā ca dṛṣṭvā spṛṣṭvā ca pārthivam
GE09ram_02_u:5164: hā nātheti parikruśya petatur dharaṇītale // Ram_2,59.10
GE09ram_02_u:5167: na babhrāja rajodhvastā tāreva gaganacyutā // Ram_2,59.11
GE09ram_02_u:5173: babhūva naradevasya sadma diṣṭāntam īyuṣaḥ // Ram_2,59.13
GE09ram_02_u:5175: atītam ājñāya tu pārthivarṣabhaṃ yaśasvinaṃ saṃparivārya patnayaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5176: bhṛśaṃ rudantyaḥ karuṇaṃ suduḥkhitāḥ pragṛhya bāhū vyalapann anāthavat // Ram_2,59.14
GE09ram_02_u:5178: tam agnim iva saṃśāntam ambuhīnam ivārṇavam
GE09ram_02_u:5179: hataprabham ivādityaṃ svargasthaṃ prekṣya bhūmipam // Ram_2,60.1
GE09ram_02_u:5182: upagṛhya śiro rājñaḥ kaikeyīṃ pratyabhāṣata // Ram_2,60.2
GE09ram_02_u:5184: sakāmā bhava kaikeyi bhuṅkṣva rājyam akaṇṭakam
GE09ram_02_u:5185: tyaktvā rājānam ekāgrā nṛśaṃse duṣṭacāriṇi // Ram_2,60.3
GE09ram_02_u:5187: vihāya māṃ gato rāmo bhartā ca svargato mama
GE09ram_02_u:5188: vipathe sārthahīneva nāhaṃ jīvitum utsahe // Ram_2,60.4
GE09ram_02_u:5190: bhartāraṃ taṃ parityajya kā strī daivatam ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5191: icchej jīvitum anyatra kaikeyyās tyaktadharmaṇaḥ // Ram_2,60.5
GE09ram_02_u:5193: na lubdho budhyate doṣān kiṃ pākam iva bhakṣayan
GE09ram_02_u:5194: kubjānimittaṃ kaikeyyā rāghavāṇāṃ kulaṃ hatam // Ram_2,60.6
GE09ram_02_u:5197: sabhāryaṃ janakaḥ śrutvā paritapsyaty ahaṃ yathā // Ram_2,60.7
GE09ram_02_u:5204: niśamya nūnaṃ saṃtrastā rāghavaṃ saṃśrayiṣyati // Ram_2,60.9
GE09ram_02_u:5207: so 'pi śokasamāviṣṭo nanu tyakṣyati jīvitam // Ram_2,60.10
GE09ram_02_u:5213: rājñaḥ sarvāṇy athādiṣṭāś cakruḥ karmāṇy anantaram // Ram_2,60.12
GE09ram_02_u:5215: na tu saṃkālanaṃ rājño vinā putreṇa mantriṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5216: sarvajñāḥ kartum īṣus te tato rakṣanti bhūmipam // Ram_2,60.13
GE09ram_02_u:5218: tailadroṇyāṃ tu sacivaiḥ śāyitaṃ taṃ narādhipam
GE09ram_02_u:5219: hā mṛto 'yam iti jñātvā striyas tāḥ paryadevayan // Ram_2,60.14
GE09ram_02_u:5225: purī nārājatāyodhyā hīnā rājñā mahātmanā // Ram_2,60.16
GE09ram_02_u:5230: gataprabhā dyaur iva bhāskaraṃ vinā vyapetanakṣatragaṇeva śarvarī
GE09ram_02_u:5231: purī babhāse rahitā mahātmanā na cāsrakaṇṭhākulamārgacatvarā // Ram_2,60.18
GE09ram_02_u:5233: narāś ca nāryaś ca sametya saṃghaśo vigarhamāṇā bharatasya mātaram
GE09ram_02_u:5234: tadā nagaryāṃ naradevasaṃkṣaye babhūvur ārtā na ca śarma lebhire // Ram_2,60.19
GE09ram_02_u:5237: sametya rājakartāraḥ sabhām īyur dvijātayaḥ // Ram_2,61.1
GE09ram_02_u:5240: kātyāyano gautamaś ca jābāliś ca mahāyaśāḥ // Ram_2,61.2
GE09ram_02_u:5242: ete dvijāḥ sahāmātyaiḥ pṛthag vācam udīrayan
GE09ram_02_u:5245: atītā śarvarī duḥkhaṃ yā no varṣaśatopamā
GE09ram_02_u:5246: asmin pañcatvam āpanne putraśokena pārthive // Ram_2,61.4
GE09ram_02_u:5248: svargataś ca mahārājo rāmaś cāraṇyam āśritaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5249: lakṣmaṇaś cāpi tejasvī rāmeṇaiva gataḥ saha // Ram_2,61.5
GE09ram_02_u:5255: arājakaṃ hi no rāṣṭraṃ na vināśam avāpnuyāt // Ram_2,61.7
GE09ram_02_u:5258: abhivarṣati parjanyo mahīṃ divyena vāriṇā // Ram_2,61.8
GE09ram_02_u:5261: nārājake pituḥ putro bhāryā vā vartate vaśe // Ram_2,61.9
GE09ram_02_u:5263: arājake dhanaṃ nāsti nāsti bhāryāpy arājake
GE09ram_02_u:5264: idam atyāhitaṃ cānyat kutaḥ satyam arājake // Ram_2,61.10
GE09ram_02_u:5267: udyānāni ca ramyāṇi hṛṣṭāḥ puṇyagṛhāṇi ca // Ram_2,61.11
GE09ram_02_u:5270: sattrāṇy anvāsate dāntā brāhmaṇāḥ saṃśitavratāḥ // Ram_2,61.12
GE09ram_02_u:5273: utsavāś ca samājāś ca vardhante rāṣṭravardhanāḥ // Ram_2,61.13
GE09ram_02_u:5279: narā niryānty araṇyāni nārībhiḥ saha kāminaḥ // Ram_2,61.15
GE09ram_02_u:5288: bhāvayann ātmanātmānaṃ yatra sāyaṃgṛho muniḥ // Ram_2,61.18
GE09ram_02_u:5291: na cāpy arājake senā śatrūn viṣahate yudhi // Ram_2,61.19
GE09ram_02_u:5293: yathā hy anudakā nadyo yathā vāpy atṛṇaṃ vanam
GE09ram_02_u:5294: agopālā yathā gāvas tathā rāṣṭram arājakam // Ram_2,61.20
GE09ram_02_u:5297: matsyā iva narā nityaṃ bhakṣayanti parasparam // Ram_2,61.21
GE09ram_02_u:5302: aho tama ivedaṃ syān na prajñāyeta kiṃcana
GE09ram_02_u:5303: rājā cen na bhavel loke vibhajan sādhvasādhunī // Ram_2,61.23
GE09ram_02_u:5305: jīvaty api mahārāje tavaiva vacanaṃ vayam
GE09ram_02_u:5306: nātikramāmahe sarve velāṃ prāpyeva sāgaraḥ // Ram_2,61.24
GE09ram_02_u:5308: sa naḥ samīkṣya dvijavaryavṛttaṃ nṛpaṃ vinā rājyam araṇyabhūtam
GE09ram_02_u:5309: kumāram ikṣvākusutaṃ vadānyaṃ tvam eva rājānam ihābhiṣiñca // Ram_2,61.25
GE09ram_02_u:5311: teṣāṃ tadvacanaṃ śrutvā vasiṣṭhaḥ pratyuvāca ha
GE09ram_02_u:5312: mitrāmātyagaṇān sarvān brāhmaṇāṃs tān idaṃ vacaḥ // Ram_2,62.1
GE09ram_02_u:5314: yad asau mātulakule pure rājagṛhe sukhī
GE09ram_02_u:5315: bharato vasati bhrātrā śatrughnena samanvitaḥ // Ram_2,62.2
GE09ram_02_u:5317: tac chīghraṃ javanā dūtā gacchantu tvaritair hayaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5318: ānetuṃ bhrātarau vīrau kiṃ samīkṣāmahe vayam // Ram_2,62.3
GE09ram_02_u:5320: gacchantv iti tataḥ sarve vasiṣṭhaṃ vākyam abruvan
GE09ram_02_u:5321: teṣāṃ tadvacanaṃ śrutvā vasiṣṭho vākyam abravīt // Ram_2,62.4
GE09ram_02_u:5324: śrūyatām itikartavyaṃ sarvān eva bravīmi vaḥ // Ram_2,62.5
GE09ram_02_u:5326: puraṃ rājagṛhaṃ gatvā śīghraṃ śīghrajavair hayaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5327: tyaktaśokair idaṃ vācyaḥ śāsanād bharato mama // Ram_2,62.6
GE09ram_02_u:5329: purohitas tvāṃ kuśalaṃ prāha sarve ca mantriṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5330: tvaramāṇaś ca niryāhi kṛtyam ātyayikaṃ tvayā // Ram_2,62.7
GE09ram_02_u:5332: mā cāsmai proṣitaṃ rāmaṃ mā cāsmai pitaraṃ mṛtam
GE09ram_02_u:5333: bhavantaḥ śaṃsiṣur gatvā rāghavāṇām imaṃ kṣayam // Ram_2,62.8
GE09ram_02_u:5335: kauśeyāni ca vastrāṇi bhūṣaṇāni varāṇi ca
GE09ram_02_u:5336: kṣipram ādāya rājñaś ca bharatasya ca gacchata
GE09ram_02_u:5339: te hastinapure gaṅgāṃ tīrtvā pratyaṅmukhā yayuḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5346: abhigamyābhivādyaṃ taṃ kuliṅgāṃ prāviśan purīm // Ram_2,62.12
GE09ram_02_u:5349: yayur madhyena vāhlīkān sudāmānaṃ ca parvatam
GE09ram_02_u:5350: viṣṇoḥ padaṃ prekṣamāṇā vipāśāṃ cāpi śālmalīm // Ram_2,62.13
GE09ram_02_u:5352: te śrāntavāhanā dūtā vikṛṣṭena satā pathā
GE09ram_02_u:5353: girivrajaṃ puravaraṃ śīghram āsedur añjasā // Ram_2,62.14
GE09ram_02_u:5355: bhartuḥ priyārthaṃ kularakṣaṇārthaṃ bhartuś ca vaṃśasya parigrahārtham
GE09ram_02_u:5356: aheḍamānās tvarayā sma dūtā rātryāṃ tu te tat puram eva yātāḥ // Ram_2,62.15
GE09ram_02_u:5358: yām eva rātriṃ te dūtāḥ praviśanti sma tāṃ purīm
GE09ram_02_u:5359: bharatenāpi tāṃ rātriṃ svapno dṛṣṭo 'yam apriyaḥ // Ram_2,63.1
GE09ram_02_u:5361: vyuṣṭām eva tu tāṃ rātriṃ dṛṣṭvā taṃ svapnam apriyam
GE09ram_02_u:5365: āyāsaṃ hi vineṣyantaḥ sabhāyāṃ cakrire kathāḥ // Ram_2,63.3
GE09ram_02_u:5367: vādayanti tathā śāntiṃ lāsayanty api cāpare
GE09ram_02_u:5368: nāṭakāny apare prāhur hāsyāni vividhāni ca // Ram_2,63.4
GE09ram_02_u:5370: sa tair mahātmā bharataḥ sakhibhiḥ priyavādibhiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5371: goṣṭhīhāsyāni kurvadbhir na prāhṛṣyata rāghavaḥ // Ram_2,63.5
GE09ram_02_u:5373: tam abravīt priyasakho bharataṃ sakhibhir vṛtam
GE09ram_02_u:5374: suhṛdbhiḥ paryupāsīnaḥ kiṃ sakhe nānumodase // Ram_2,63.6
GE09ram_02_u:5376: evaṃ bruvāṇaṃ suhṛdaṃ bharataḥ pratyuvāca ha
GE09ram_02_u:5377: śṛṇu tvaṃ yannimittaṃ me dainyam etad upāgatam // Ram_2,63.7
GE09ram_02_u:5382: plavamānaś ca me dṛṣṭaḥ sa tasmin gomayahrade
GE09ram_02_u:5383: pibann añjalinā tailaṃ hasann iva muhur muhuḥ // Ram_2,63.9
GE09ram_02_u:5385: tatas tilodanaṃ bhuktvā punaḥ punar adhaḥśirāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5388: svapne 'pi sāgaraṃ śuṣkaṃ candraṃ ca patitaṃ bhuvi
GE09ram_02_u:5389: sahasā cāpi saṃśāntaṃ jvalitaṃ jātavedasam // Ram_2,63.11
GE09ram_02_u:5391: avadīrṇāṃ ca pṛthivīṃ śuṣkāṃś ca vividhān drumān
GE09ram_02_u:5392: ahaṃ paśyāmi vidhvastān sadhūmāṃś caiva parvatān // Ram_2,63.12
GE09ram_02_u:5395: prahasanti sma rājānaṃ pramadāḥ kṛṣṇapiṅgalāḥ // Ram_2,63.13
GE09ram_02_u:5400: evam etan mayā dṛṣṭam imāṃ rātriṃ bhayāvahām
GE09ram_02_u:5401: ahaṃ rāmo 'tha vā rājā lakṣmaṇo vā mariṣyati // Ram_2,63.15
GE09ram_02_u:5403: naro yānena yaḥ svapne kharayuktena yāti hi
GE09ram_02_u:5405: etannimittaṃ dīno 'haṃ tan na vaḥ pratipūjaye // Ram_2,63.16
GE09ram_02_u:5407: śuṣyatīva ca me kaṇṭho na svastham iva me manaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5408: jugupsann iva cātmānaṃ na ca paśyāmi kāraṇam // Ram_2,63.17
GE09ram_02_u:5410: imāṃ hi duḥsvapnagatiṃ niśāmya tām anekarūpām avitarkitāṃ purā
GE09ram_02_u:5411: bhayaṃ mahat taddhṛdayān na yāti me vicintya rājānam acintyadarśanam // Ram_2,63.18
GE09ram_02_u:5413: bharate bruvati svapnaṃ dūtās te klāntavāhanāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5416: samāgamya tu rājñā ca rājaputreṇa cārcitāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5417: rājñaḥ pādau gṛhītvā tu tam ūcur bharataṃ vacaḥ // Ram_2,64.2
GE09ram_02_u:5419: purohitas tvā kuśalaṃ prāha sarve ca mantriṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5420: tvaramāṇaś ca niryāhi kṛtyam ātyayikaṃ tvayā // Ram_2,64.3
GE09ram_02_u:5422: atra viṃśatikoṭyas tu nṛpater mātulasya te
GE09ram_02_u:5423: daśakoṭyas tu sampūrṇās tathaiva ca nṛpātmaja // Ram_2,64.4
GE09ram_02_u:5425: pratigṛhya ca tat sarvaṃ svanuraktaḥ suhṛjjane
GE09ram_02_u:5426: dūtān uvāca bharataḥ kāmaiḥ sampratipūjya tān // Ram_2,64.5
GE09ram_02_u:5428: kaccit sukuśalī rājā pitā daśaratho mama
GE09ram_02_u:5429: kaccic cārogatā rāme lakṣmaṇe vā mahātmani // Ram_2,64.6
GE09ram_02_u:5432: arogā cāpi kausalyā mātā rāmasya dhīmataḥ // Ram_2,64.7
GE09ram_02_u:5434: kaccit sumitrā dharmajñā jananī lakṣmaṇasya yā
GE09ram_02_u:5435: śatrughnasya ca vīrasya sārogā cāpi madhyamā // Ram_2,64.8
GE09ram_02_u:5438: arogā cāpi kaikeyī mātā me kim uvāca ha // Ram_2,64.9
GE09ram_02_u:5440: evam uktās tu te dūtā bharatena mahātmanā
GE09ram_02_u:5441: ūcuḥ sampraśritaṃ vākyam idaṃ taṃ bharataṃ tadā
GE09ram_02_u:5442: kuśalās te naravyāghra yeṣāṃ kuśalam icchasi // Ram_2,64.10
GE09ram_02_u:5444: bharataś cāpi tān dūtān evam ukto 'bhyabhāṣata
GE09ram_02_u:5445: āpṛcche 'haṃ mahārājaṃ dūtāḥ saṃtvarayanti mām // Ram_2,64.11
GE09ram_02_u:5447: evam uktvā tu tān dūtān bharataḥ pārthivātmajaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5448: dūtaiḥ saṃcodito vākyaṃ mātāmaham uvāca ha // Ram_2,64.12
GE09ram_02_u:5451: punar apy aham eṣyāmi yadā me tvaṃ smariṣyasi // Ram_2,64.13
GE09ram_02_u:5453: bharatenaivam uktas tu nṛpo mātāmahas tadā
GE09ram_02_u:5454: tam uvāca śubhaṃ vākyaṃ śirasy āghrāya rāghavam // Ram_2,64.14
GE09ram_02_u:5456: gaccha tātānujāne tvāṃ kaikeyī suprajās tvayā
GE09ram_02_u:5457: mātaraṃ kuśalaṃ brūyāḥ pitaraṃ ca paraṃtapa // Ram_2,64.15
GE09ram_02_u:5459: purohitaṃ ca kuśalaṃ ye cānye dvijasattamāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5460: tau ca tāta maheṣvāsau bhrātarau rāmalakṣmaṇau // Ram_2,64.16
GE09ram_02_u:5462: tasmai hastyuttamāṃś citrān kambalān ajināni ca
GE09ram_02_u:5463: abhisatkṛtya kaikeyo bharatāya dhanaṃ dadau // Ram_2,64.17
GE09ram_02_u:5466: satkṛtya kaikeyī putraṃ kekayo dhanam ādiśat // Ram_2,64.18
GE09ram_02_u:5472: kharāñ śīghrān susaṃyuktān mātulo 'smai dhanaṃ dadau // Ram_2,64.20
GE09ram_02_u:5475: daṃṣṭrāyudhān mahākāyāñ śunaś copāyanaṃ dadau // Ram_2,64.21
GE09ram_02_u:5477: sa mātāmaham āpṛcchya mātulaṃ ca yudhājitam
GE09ram_02_u:5478: ratham āruhya bharataḥ śatrughnasahito yayau // Ram_2,64.22
GE09ram_02_u:5481: uṣṭrago'śvakharair bhṛtyā bharataṃ yāntam anvayuḥ // Ram_2,64.23
GE09ram_02_u:5483: balena gupto bharato mahātmā sahāryakasyātmasamair amātyaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5484: ādāya śatrughnam apetaśatrur gṛhād yayau siddha ivendralokāt // Ram_2,64.24
GE09ram_02_u:5488: śatadrūm atarac chrīmān nadīm ikṣvākunandanaḥ // Ram_2,65.1
GE09ram_02_u:5491: śilām ākurvatīṃ tīrtvā āgneyaṃ śalyakartanam // Ram_2,65.2
GE09ram_02_u:5494: atyayāt sa mahāśailān vanaṃ caitrarathaṃ prati // Ram_2,65.3
GE09ram_02_u:5497: yamunāṃ prāpya saṃtīrṇo balam āśvāsayat tadā // Ram_2,65.4
GE09ram_02_u:5499: śītīkṛtya tu gātrāṇi klāntān āśvāsya vājinaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5500: tatra snātvā ca pītvā ca prāyād ādāya codakam // Ram_2,65.5
GE09ram_02_u:5503: bhadro bhadreṇa yānena mārutaḥ kham ivātyayāt // Ram_2,65.6
GE09ram_02_u:5506: varūthaṃ ca yayau ramyaṃ grāmaṃ daśarathātmajaḥ // Ram_2,65.7
GE09ram_02_u:5508: tatra ramye vane vāsaṃ kṛtvāsau prāṅmukho yayau
GE09ram_02_u:5509: udyānam ujjihānāyāḥ priyakā yatra pādapāḥ // Ram_2,65.8
GE09ram_02_u:5511: sālāṃs tu priyakān prāpya śīghrān āsthāya vājinaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5512: anujñāpyātha bharato vāhinīṃ tvarito yayau // Ram_2,65.9
GE09ram_02_u:5514: vāsaṃ kṛtvā sarvatīrthe tīrtvā cottānikāṃ nadīm
GE09ram_02_u:5515: anyā nadīś ca vividhāḥ pārvatīyais turaṃgamaiḥ // Ram_2,65.10
GE09ram_02_u:5518: tatāra ca naravyāghro lauhitye sa kapīvatīm
GE09ram_02_u:5519: ekasāle sthāṇumatīṃ vinate gomatīṃ nadīm // Ram_2,65.11
GE09ram_02_u:5525: ayodhyāṃ manunā rājñā nirmitāṃ sa dadarśa ha // Ram_2,65.13
GE09ram_02_u:5528: ayodhyām agrato dṛṣṭvā rathe sārathim abravīt // Ram_2,65.14
GE09ram_02_u:5531: ayodhyā dṛśyate dūrāt sārathe pāṇḍumṛttikā // Ram_2,65.15
GE09ram_02_u:5536: ayodhyāyāṃ purā śabdaḥ śrūyate tumulo mahān
GE09ram_02_u:5537: samantān naranārīṇāṃ tam adya na śṛṇomy aham // Ram_2,65.17
GE09ram_02_u:5543: araṇyabhūteva purī sārathe pratibhāti me // Ram_2,65.19
GE09ram_02_u:5545: na hy atra yānair dṛśyante na gajair na ca vājibhiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5546: niryānto vābhiyānto vā naramukhyā yathāpuram // Ram_2,65.20
GE09ram_02_u:5548: aniṣṭāni ca pāpāni paśyāmi vividhāni ca
GE09ram_02_u:5549: nimittāny amanojñāni tena sīdati me manaḥ // Ram_2,65.21
GE09ram_02_u:5552: dvāḥsthair utthāya vijayaṃ pṛṣṭas taiḥ sahito yayau // Ram_2,65.22
GE09ram_02_u:5554: sa tv anekāgrahṛdayo dvāḥsthaṃ pratyarcya taṃ janam
GE09ram_02_u:5555: sūtam aśvapateḥ klāntam abravīt tatra rāghavaḥ // Ram_2,65.23
GE09ram_02_u:5557: śrutā no yādṛśāḥ pūrvaṃ nṛpatīnāṃ vināśane
GE09ram_02_u:5558: ākārās tān ahaṃ sarvān iha paśyāmi sārathe // Ram_2,65.24
GE09ram_02_u:5561: sastrīpuṃsaṃ ca paśyāmi janam utkaṇṭhitaṃ pure // Ram_2,65.25
GE09ram_02_u:5563: ity evam uktvā bharataḥ sūtaṃ taṃ dīnamānasaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5564: tāny aniṣṭāny ayodhyāyāṃ prekṣya rājagṛhaṃ yayau
GE09ram_02_u:5567: dṛṣṭvā purīm indrapurīprakāśāṃ duḥkhena sampūrṇataro babhūva
GE09ram_02_u:5568: bahūni paśyan manaso 'priyāṇi yāny anyadā nāsya pure babhūvuḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5569: avākśirā dīnamanā na hṛṣṭaḥ pitur mahātmā praviveśa veśma // Ram_2,65.27
GE09ram_02_u:5571: apaśyaṃs tu tatas tatra pitaraṃ pitur ālaye
GE09ram_02_u:5572: jagāma bharato draṣṭuṃ mātaraṃ mātur ālaye // Ram_2,66.1
GE09ram_02_u:5574: anuprāptaṃ tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā kaikeyī proṣitaṃ sutam
GE09ram_02_u:5575: utpapāta tadā hṛṣṭā tyaktvā sauvarṇamānasam // Ram_2,66.2
GE09ram_02_u:5578: bharataḥ prekṣya jagrāha jananyāś caraṇau śubhau // Ram_2,66.3
GE09ram_02_u:5581: aṅke bharatam āropya praṣṭuṃ samupacakrame // Ram_2,66.4
GE09ram_02_u:5584: api nādhvaśramaḥ śīghraṃ rathenāpatatas tava // Ram_2,66.5
GE09ram_02_u:5586: āryakas te sukuśalī yudhājin mātulas tava
GE09ram_02_u:5587: pravāsāc ca sukhaṃ putra sarvaṃ me vaktum arhasi // Ram_2,66.6
GE09ram_02_u:5589: evaṃ pṛṣṭas tu kaikeyyā priyaṃ pārthivanandanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5590: ācaṣṭa bharataḥ sarvaṃ mātre rājīvalocanaḥ // Ram_2,66.7
GE09ram_02_u:5593: ambāyāḥ kuśalī tāto yudhājin mātulaś ca me // Ram_2,66.8
GE09ram_02_u:5595: yan me dhanaṃ ca ratnaṃ ca dadau rājā paraṃtapaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5596: pariśrāntaṃ pathy abhavat tato 'haṃ pūrvam āgataḥ // Ram_2,66.9
GE09ram_02_u:5599: yad ahaṃ praṣṭum icchāmi tad ambā vaktum arhati // Ram_2,66.10
GE09ram_02_u:5602: na cāyam ikṣvākujanaḥ prahṛṣṭaḥ pratibhāti me // Ram_2,66.11
GE09ram_02_u:5605: tam ahaṃ nādya paśyāmi draṣṭum icchann ihāgataḥ // Ram_2,66.12
GE09ram_02_u:5607: pitur grahīṣye caraṇau taṃ mamākhyāhi pṛcchataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5608: āhosvid amba jyeṣṭhāyāḥ kausalyāyā niveśane // Ram_2,66.13
GE09ram_02_u:5610: taṃ pratyuvāca kaikeyī priyavad ghoram apriyam
GE09ram_02_u:5612: yā gatiḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ tāṃ gatiṃ te pitā gataḥ // Ram_2,66.14
GE09ram_02_u:5614: tac chrutvā bharato vākyaṃ dharmābhijanavāñ śuciḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5620: etat suruciraṃ bhāti pitur me śayanaṃ purā
GE09ram_02_u:5621: tad idaṃ na vibhāty adya vihīnaṃ tena dhīmatā // Ram_2,66.17
GE09ram_02_u:5623: tam ārtaṃ devasaṃkāśaṃ samīkṣya patitaṃ bhuvi
GE09ram_02_u:5624: utthāpayitvā śokārtaṃ vacanaṃ cedam abravīt // Ram_2,66.18
GE09ram_02_u:5627: tvadvidhā na hi śocanti santaḥ sadasi saṃmatāḥ // Ram_2,66.19
GE09ram_02_u:5629: sa ruditvā ciraṃ kālaṃ bhūmau viparivṛtya ca
GE09ram_02_u:5630: jananīṃ pratyuvācedaṃ śokair bahubhir āvṛtaḥ // Ram_2,66.20
GE09ram_02_u:5632: abhiṣekṣyati rāmaṃ tu rājā yajñaṃ nu yakṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:5633: ity ahaṃ kṛtasaṃkalpo hṛṣṭo yātrām ayāsiṣam // Ram_2,66.21
GE09ram_02_u:5635: tad idaṃ hy anyathā bhūtaṃ vyavadīrṇaṃ mano mama
GE09ram_02_u:5636: pitaraṃ yo na paśyāmi nityaṃ priyahite ratam // Ram_2,66.22
GE09ram_02_u:5638: amba kenātyagād rājā vyādhinā mayy anāgate
GE09ram_02_u:5639: dhanyā rāmādayaḥ sarve yaiḥ pitā saṃskṛtaḥ svayam // Ram_2,66.23
GE09ram_02_u:5641: na nūnaṃ māṃ mahārājaḥ prāptaṃ jānāti kīrtimān
GE09ram_02_u:5642: upajighreddhi māṃ mūrdhni tātaḥ saṃnamya satvaram // Ram_2,66.24
GE09ram_02_u:5645: yena māṃ rajasā dhvastam abhīkṣṇaṃ parimārjati // Ram_2,66.25
GE09ram_02_u:5647: yo me bhrātā pitā bandhur yasya dāso 'smi dhīmataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5648: tasya māṃ śīghram ākhyāhi rāmasyākliṣṭakarmaṇaḥ // Ram_2,66.26
GE09ram_02_u:5650: pitā hi bhavati jyeṣṭho dharmam āryasya jānataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5651: tasya pādau grahīṣyāmi sa hīdānīṃ gatir mama // Ram_2,66.27
GE09ram_02_u:5653: ārye kim abravīd rājā pitā me satyavikramaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5654: paścimaṃ sādhusaṃdeśam icchāmi śrotum ātmanaḥ // Ram_2,66.28
GE09ram_02_u:5656: iti pṛṣṭā yathātattvaṃ kaikeyī vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:5657: rāmeti rājā vilapan hā sīte lakṣmaṇeti ca
GE09ram_02_u:5658: sa mahātmā paraṃ lokaṃ gato gatimatāṃ varaḥ // Ram_2,66.29
GE09ram_02_u:5660: imāṃ tu paścimāṃ vācaṃ vyājahāra pitā tava
GE09ram_02_u:5663: siddhārthās tu narā rāmam āgataṃ sītayā saha
GE09ram_02_u:5664: lakṣmaṇaṃ ca mahābāhuṃ drakṣyanti punar āgatam // Ram_2,66.31
GE09ram_02_u:5667: viṣaṇṇavadano bhūtvā bhūyaḥ papraccha mātaram // Ram_2,66.32
GE09ram_02_u:5670: lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā sītayā ca samaṃ gataḥ // Ram_2,66.33
GE09ram_02_u:5673: mātāsya yugapad vākyaṃ vipriyaṃ priyaśaṅkayā // Ram_2,66.34
GE09ram_02_u:5675: sa hi rājasutaḥ putra cīravāsā mahāvanam
GE09ram_02_u:5676: daṇḍakān saha vaidehyā lakṣmaṇānucaro gataḥ // Ram_2,66.35
GE09ram_02_u:5678: tac chrutvā bharatas trasto bhrātuś cāritraśaṅkayā
GE09ram_02_u:5679: svasya vaṃśasya māhātmyāt praṣṭuṃ samupacakrame // Ram_2,66.36
GE09ram_02_u:5681: kaccin na brāhmaṇadhanaṃ hṛtaṃ rāmeṇa kasyacit
GE09ram_02_u:5682: kaccin nāḍhyo daridro vā tenāpāpo vihiṃsitaḥ // Ram_2,66.37
GE09ram_02_u:5685: kasmāt sa daṇḍakāraṇye bhrūṇaheva vivāsitaḥ // Ram_2,66.38
GE09ram_02_u:5687: athāsya capalā mātā tat svakarma yathātatham
GE09ram_02_u:5690: na brāhmaṇadhanaṃ kiṃcid dhṛtaṃ rāmeṇa kasyacit
GE09ram_02_u:5691: kaścin nāḍhyo daridro vā tenāpāpo vihiṃsitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5692: na rāmaḥ paradārāṃś ca cakṣurbhyām api paśyati // Ram_2,66.40
GE09ram_02_u:5695: yācitas te pitā rājyaṃ rāmasya ca vivāsanam // Ram_2,66.41
GE09ram_02_u:5697: sa svavṛttiṃ samāsthāya pitā te tat tathākarot
GE09ram_02_u:5698: rāmaś ca sahasaumitriḥ preṣitaḥ saha sītayā // Ram_2,66.42
GE09ram_02_u:5700: tam apaśyan priyaṃ putraṃ mahīpālo mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5703: tvayā tv idānīṃ dharmajña rājatvam avalambyatām
GE09ram_02_u:5704: tvatkṛte hi mayā sarvam idam evaṃvidhaṃ kṛtam // Ram_2,66.44
GE09ram_02_u:5706: tat putra śīghraṃ vidhinā vidhijñair vasiṣṭhamukhyaiḥ sahito dvijendraiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5707: saṃkālya rājānam adīnasattvam ātmānam urvyām abhiṣecayasva // Ram_2,66.45
GE09ram_02_u:5709: śrutvā tu pitaraṃ vṛttaṃ bhrātarau ca vivāsitau
GE09ram_02_u:5710: bharato duḥkhasaṃtapta idaṃ vacanam abravīt // Ram_2,67.1
GE09ram_02_u:5712: kiṃ nu kāryaṃ hatasyeha mama rājyena śocataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5713: vihīnasyātha pitrā ca bhrātrā pitṛsamena ca // Ram_2,67.2
GE09ram_02_u:5715: duḥkhe me duḥkham akaror vraṇe kṣāram ivādadhāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5716: rājānaṃ pretabhāvasthaṃ kṛtvā rāmaṃ ca tāpasam // Ram_2,67.3
GE09ram_02_u:5719: aṅgāram upagūhya sma pitā me nāvabuddhavān // Ram_2,67.4
GE09ram_02_u:5722: duṣkaraṃ yadi jīvetāṃ prāpya tvāṃ jananīṃ mama // Ram_2,67.5
GE09ram_02_u:5724: nanu tv āryo 'pi dharmātmā tvayi vṛttim anuttamām
GE09ram_02_u:5725: vartate guruvṛttijño yathā mātari vartate // Ram_2,67.6
GE09ram_02_u:5727: tathā jyeṣṭhā hi me mātā kausalyā dīrghadarśinī
GE09ram_02_u:5728: tvayi dharmaṃ samāsthāya bhaginyām iva vartate // Ram_2,67.7
GE09ram_02_u:5731: prasthāpya vanavāsāya kathaṃ pāpe na śocasi // Ram_2,67.8
GE09ram_02_u:5734: pravrājya cīravasanaṃ kiṃ nu paśyasi kāraṇam // Ram_2,67.9
GE09ram_02_u:5736: lubdhāyā vidito manye na te 'haṃ rāghavaṃ prati
GE09ram_02_u:5737: tathā hy anartho rājyārthaṃ tvayā nīto mahān ayam // Ram_2,67.10
GE09ram_02_u:5740: kena śaktiprabhāvena rājyaṃ rakṣitum utsahe // Ram_2,67.11
GE09ram_02_u:5742: taṃ hi nityaṃ mahārājo balavantaṃ mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5743: apāśrito 'bhūd dharmātmā merur meruvanaṃ yathā // Ram_2,67.12
GE09ram_02_u:5746: damyo dhuram ivāsādya saheyaṃ kena caujasā // Ram_2,67.13
GE09ram_02_u:5748: atha vā me bhavec chaktir yogair buddhibalena vā
GE09ram_02_u:5749: sakāmāṃ na kariṣyāmi tvām ahaṃ putragardhinīm
GE09ram_02_u:5752: ity evam uktvā bharato mahātmā priyetarair vākyagaṇais tudaṃs tām
GE09ram_02_u:5753: śokāturaś cāpi nanāda bhūyaḥ siṃho yathā parvatagahvarasthaḥ // Ram_2,67.15
GE09ram_02_u:5755: tāṃ tathā garhayitvā tu mātaraṃ bharatas tadā
GE09ram_02_u:5756: roṣeṇa mahatāviṣṭaḥ punar evābravīd vacaḥ // Ram_2,68.1
GE09ram_02_u:5759: parityaktā ca dharmeṇa mā mṛtaṃ rudatī bhava // Ram_2,68.2
GE09ram_02_u:5761: kiṃ nu te 'dūṣayad rājā rāmo vā bhṛśadhārmikaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5762: yayor mṛtyur vivāsaś ca tvatkṛte tulyam āgatau // Ram_2,68.3
GE09ram_02_u:5765: kaikeyi narakaṃ gaccha mā ca bhartuḥ salokatām // Ram_2,68.4
GE09ram_02_u:5767: yat tvayā hīdṛśaṃ pāpaṃ kṛtaṃ ghoreṇa karmaṇā
GE09ram_02_u:5768: sarvalokapriyaṃ hitvā mamāpy āpāditaṃ bhayam // Ram_2,68.5
GE09ram_02_u:5770: tvatkṛte me pitā vṛtto rāmaś cāraṇyam āśritaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5771: ayaśo jīvaloke ca tvayāhaṃ pratipāditaḥ // Ram_2,68.6
GE09ram_02_u:5774: na te 'ham abhibhāṣyo 'smi durvṛtte patighātini // Ram_2,68.7
GE09ram_02_u:5776: kausalyā ca sumitrā ca yāś cānyā mama mātaraḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5777: duḥkhena mahatāviṣṭās tvāṃ prāpya kuladūṣiṇīm // Ram_2,68.8
GE09ram_02_u:5779: na tvam aśvapateḥ kanyā dharmarājasya dhīmataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5780: rākṣasī tatra jātāsi kulapradhvaṃsinī pituḥ // Ram_2,68.9
GE09ram_02_u:5782: yat tvayā dhārmiko rāmo nityaṃ satyaparāyaṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5783: vanaṃ prasthāpito duḥkhāt pitā ca tridivaṃ gataḥ // Ram_2,68.10
GE09ram_02_u:5785: yatpradhānāsi tat pāpaṃ mayi pitrā vinākṛte
GE09ram_02_u:5786: bhrātṛbhyāṃ ca parityakte sarvalokasya cāpriye // Ram_2,68.11
GE09ram_02_u:5789: kṛtvā kaṃ prāpsyase tv adya lokaṃ nirayagāminī // Ram_2,68.12
GE09ram_02_u:5795: tasmāt priyataro mātuḥ priyatvān na tu bāndhavaḥ // Ram_2,68.14
GE09ram_02_u:5800: tāv ardhadivase śrāntau dṛṣṭvā putrau mahītale
GE09ram_02_u:5804: bindavaḥ patitā gātre sūkṣmāḥ surabhigandhinaḥ // Ram_2,68.17
GE09ram_02_u:5807: indraḥ prāñjalir udvignaḥ surarājo 'bravīd vacaḥ // Ram_2,68.18
GE09ram_02_u:5809: bhayaṃ kaccin na cāsmāsu kutaścid vidyate mahat
GE09ram_02_u:5810: kutonimittaḥ śokas te brūhi sarvahitaiṣiṇi // Ram_2,68.19
GE09ram_02_u:5812: evam uktā tu surabhiḥ surarājena dhīmatā
GE09ram_02_u:5813: pratyuvāca tato dhīrā vākyaṃ vākyaviśāradā // Ram_2,68.20
GE09ram_02_u:5815: śāntaṃ pāpaṃ na vaḥ kiṃcit kutaścid amarādhipa
GE09ram_02_u:5816: ahaṃ tu magnau śocāmi svaputrau viṣame sthitau // Ram_2,68.21
GE09ram_02_u:5821: mama kāyāt prasūtau hi duḥkhitau bhārapīḍitau
GE09ram_02_u:5822: yau dṛṣṭvā paritapye 'haṃ nāsti putrasamaḥ priyaḥ // Ram_2,68.23
GE09ram_02_u:5825: kiṃ punar yā vinā rāmaṃ kausalyā vartayiṣyati // Ram_2,68.24
GE09ram_02_u:5827: ekaputrā ca sādhvī ca vivatseyaṃ tvayā kṛtā
GE09ram_02_u:5828: tasmāt tvaṃ satataṃ duḥkhaṃ pretya ceha ca lapsyase // Ram_2,68.25
GE09ram_02_u:5830: ahaṃ hy apacitiṃ bhrātuḥ pituś ca sakalām imām
GE09ram_02_u:5831: vardhanaṃ yaśasaś cāpi kariṣyāmi na saṃśayaḥ // Ram_2,68.26
GE09ram_02_u:5834: svayam eva pravekṣyāmi vanaṃ muniniṣevitam // Ram_2,68.27
GE09ram_02_u:5837: papāta bhuvi saṃkruddho niḥśvasann iva pannagaḥ // Ram_2,68.28
GE09ram_02_u:5840: babhūva bhūmau patito nṛpātmajaḥ śacīpateḥ ketur ivotsavakṣaye // Ram_2,68.29
GE09ram_02_u:5843: kausalyā śabdam ājñāya sumitrām idam abravīt // Ram_2,69.1
GE09ram_02_u:5846: tam ahaṃ draṣṭum icchāmi bharataṃ dīrghadarśinam // Ram_2,69.2
GE09ram_02_u:5848: evam uktvā sumitrāṃ sā vivarṇā malināmbarā
GE09ram_02_u:5849: pratasthe bharato yatra vepamānā vicetanā // Ram_2,69.3
GE09ram_02_u:5851: sa tu rāmānujaś cāpi śatrughnasahitas tadā
GE09ram_02_u:5852: pratasthe bharato yatra kausalyāyā niveśanam // Ram_2,69.4
GE09ram_02_u:5858: idaṃ te rājyakāmasya rājyaṃ prāptam akaṇṭakam
GE09ram_02_u:5859: samprāptaṃ bata kaikeyyā śīghraṃ krūreṇa karmaṇā // Ram_2,69.6
GE09ram_02_u:5862: kaikeyī kaṃ guṇaṃ tatra paśyati krūradarśinī // Ram_2,69.7
GE09ram_02_u:5864: kṣipraṃ mām api kaikeyī prasthāpayitum arhati
GE09ram_02_u:5865: hiraṇyanābho yatrāste suto me sumahāyaśāḥ // Ram_2,69.8
GE09ram_02_u:5867: atha vā svayam evāhaṃ sumitrānucarā sukham
GE09ram_02_u:5868: agnihotraṃ puraskṛtya prasthāsye yatra rāghavaḥ // Ram_2,69.9
GE09ram_02_u:5870: kāmaṃ vā svayam evādya tatra māṃ netum arhasi
GE09ram_02_u:5871: yatrāsau puruṣavyāghras tapyate me tapaḥ sutaḥ // Ram_2,69.10
GE09ram_02_u:5876: evaṃ vilapamānāṃ tāṃ bharataḥ prāñjalis tadā
GE09ram_02_u:5877: kausalyāṃ pratyuvācedaṃ śokair bahubhir āvṛtām // Ram_2,69.12
GE09ram_02_u:5879: ārye kasmād ajānantaṃ garhase mām akilbiṣam
GE09ram_02_u:5880: vipulāṃ ca mama prītiṃ sthirāṃ jānāsi rāghave // Ram_2,69.13
GE09ram_02_u:5882: kṛtā śāstrānugā buddhir mā bhūt tasya kadācana
GE09ram_02_u:5883: satyasaṃdhaḥ satāṃ śreṣṭho yasyāryo 'numate gataḥ // Ram_2,69.14
GE09ram_02_u:5885: praiṣyaṃ pāpīyasāṃ yātu sūryaṃ ca prati mehatu
GE09ram_02_u:5886: hantu pādena gāṃ suptāṃ yasyāryo 'numate gataḥ // Ram_2,69.15
GE09ram_02_u:5888: kārayitvā mahat karma bhartā bhṛtyam anarthakam
GE09ram_02_u:5889: adharmo yo 'sya so 'syās tu yasyāryo 'numate gataḥ // Ram_2,69.16
GE09ram_02_u:5892: tatas tu druhyatāṃ pāpaṃ yasyāryo 'numate gataḥ // Ram_2,69.17
GE09ram_02_u:5895: adharmo yo 'sya so 'syāstu yasyāryo 'numate gataḥ // Ram_2,69.18
GE09ram_02_u:5897: saṃśrutya ca tapasvibhyaḥ sattre vai yajñadakṣiṇām
GE09ram_02_u:5898: tāṃ vipralapatāṃ pāpaṃ yasyāryo 'numate gataḥ // Ram_2,69.19
GE09ram_02_u:5901: mā sma kārṣīt satāṃ dharmaṃ yasyāryo 'numate gataḥ // Ram_2,69.20
GE09ram_02_u:5904: sa nāśayatu duṣṭātmā yasyāryo 'numate gataḥ // Ram_2,69.21
GE09ram_02_u:5906: pāyasaṃ kṛsaraṃ chāgaṃ vṛthā so 'śnātu nirghṛṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5907: gurūṃś cāpy avajānātu yasyāryo 'numate gataḥ // Ram_2,69.22
GE09ram_02_u:5909: putrair dāraiś ca bhṛtyaiś ca svagṛhe parivāritaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5910: sa eko mṛṣṭam aśnātu yasyāryo 'numate gataḥ // Ram_2,69.23
GE09ram_02_u:5913: bhṛtyatyāge ca yat pāpaṃ tat pāpaṃ pratipadyatām // Ram_2,69.24
GE09ram_02_u:5915: ubhe saṃdhye śayānasya yat pāpaṃ parikalpyate
GE09ram_02_u:5916: tac ca pāpaṃ bhavet tasya yasyāryo 'numate gataḥ // Ram_2,69.25
GE09ram_02_u:5918: yad agnidāyake pāpaṃ yat pāpaṃ gurutalpage
GE09ram_02_u:5919: mitradrohe ca yat pāpaṃ tat pāpaṃ pratipadyatām // Ram_2,69.26
GE09ram_02_u:5921: devatānāṃ pitṝṇāṃ ca mātāpitros tathaiva ca
GE09ram_02_u:5922: mā sma kārṣīt sa śuśrūṣāṃ yasyāryo 'numate gataḥ // Ram_2,69.27
GE09ram_02_u:5924: satāṃ lokāt satāṃ kīrtyāḥ sajjuṣṭāt karmaṇas tathā
GE09ram_02_u:5925: bhraśyatu kṣipram adyaiva yasyāryo 'numate gataḥ // Ram_2,69.28
GE09ram_02_u:5928: evam āśvāsayann eva duḥkhārto nipapāta ha // Ram_2,69.29
GE09ram_02_u:5930: tathā tu śapathaiḥ kaṣṭaiḥ śapamānam acetanam
GE09ram_02_u:5931: bharataṃ śokasaṃtaptaṃ kausalyā vākyam abravīt // Ram_2,69.30
GE09ram_02_u:5933: mama duḥkham idaṃ putra bhūyaḥ samupajāyate
GE09ram_02_u:5934: śapathaiḥ śapamāno hi prāṇān uparuṇatsi me // Ram_2,69.31
GE09ram_02_u:5936: diṣṭyā na calito dharmād ātmā te sahalakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5937: vatsa satyapratijño me satāṃ lokān avāpsyasi // Ram_2,69.32
GE09ram_02_u:5940: mohāc ca śokasaṃrodhād babhūva lulitaṃ manaḥ // Ram_2,69.33
GE09ram_02_u:5943: muhur muhur niḥśvasataś ca dīrghaṃ sā tasya śokena jagāma rātriḥ // Ram_2,69.34
GE09ram_02_u:5946: uvāca vadatāṃ śreṣṭho vasiṣṭhaḥ śreṣṭhavāg ṛṣiḥ // Ram_2,70.1
GE09ram_02_u:5948: alaṃ śokena bhadraṃ te rājaputra mahāyaśaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5949: prāptakālaṃ narapateḥ kuru saṃyānam uttaram // Ram_2,70.2
GE09ram_02_u:5951: vasiṣṭhasya vacaḥ śrutvā bharato dhāraṇāṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5954: uddhṛtaṃ tailasaṃkledāt sa tu bhūmau niveśitam
GE09ram_02_u:5958: tato daśarathaṃ putro vilalāpa suduḥkhitaḥ // Ram_2,70.5
GE09ram_02_u:5960: kiṃ te vyavasitaṃ rājan proṣite mayy anāgate
GE09ram_02_u:5961: vivāsya rāmaṃ dharmajñaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ ca mahābalam // Ram_2,70.6
GE09ram_02_u:5963: kva yāsyasi mahārāja hitvemaṃ duḥkhitaṃ janam
GE09ram_02_u:5966: yogakṣemaṃ tu te rājan ko 'smin kalpayitā pure
GE09ram_02_u:5967: tvayi prayāte svas tāta rāme ca vanam āśrite // Ram_2,70.8
GE09ram_02_u:5969: vidhavā pṛthivī rājaṃs tvayā hīnā na rājate
GE09ram_02_u:5970: hīnacandreva rajanī nagarī pratibhāti mām // Ram_2,70.9
GE09ram_02_u:5973: abravīd vacanaṃ bhūyo vasiṣṭhas tu mahān ṛṣiḥ // Ram_2,70.10
GE09ram_02_u:5976: tāny avyagraṃ mahābāho kriyantām avicāritam // Ram_2,70.11
GE09ram_02_u:5981: ye tv agrato narendrasya agnyagārād bahiṣkṛtāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5982: ṛtvigbhir yājakaiś caiva te hriyante yathāvidhi // Ram_2,70.13
GE09ram_02_u:5985: bāṣpakaṇṭhā vimanasas tam ūhuḥ paricārakāḥ // Ram_2,70.14
GE09ram_02_u:5987: hiraṇyaṃ ca suvarṇaṃ ca vāsāṃsi vividhāni ca
GE09ram_02_u:5988: prakiranto janā mārgaṃ nṛpater agrato yayuḥ // Ram_2,70.15
GE09ram_02_u:5991: devadārūṇi cāhṛtya citāṃ cakrus tathāpare // Ram_2,70.16
GE09ram_02_u:5993: gandhān uccāvacāṃś cānyāṃs tatra dattvātha bhūmipam
GE09ram_02_u:5994: tataḥ saṃveśayāmāsuś citāmadhye tam ṛtvijaḥ // Ram_2,70.17
GE09ram_02_u:5996: tathā hutāśanaṃ hutvā jepus tasya tadartvijaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:5997: jaguś ca te yathāśāstraṃ tatra sāmāni sāmagāḥ // Ram_2,70.18
GE09ram_02_u:5999: śibikābhiś ca yānaiś ca yathārhaṃ tasya yoṣitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6000: nagarān niryayus tatra vṛddhaiḥ parivṛtās tadā // Ram_2,70.19
GE09ram_02_u:6002: prasavyaṃ cāpi taṃ cakrur ṛtvijo 'gnicitaṃ nṛpam
GE09ram_02_u:6003: striyaś ca śokasaṃtaptāḥ kausalyāpramukhās tadā // Ram_2,70.20
GE09ram_02_u:6005: krauñcīnām iva nārīṇāṃ ninādas tatra śuśruve
GE09ram_02_u:6006: ārtānāṃ karuṇaṃ kāle krośantīnāṃ sahasraśaḥ // Ram_2,70.21
GE09ram_02_u:6008: tato rudantyo vivaśā vilapya ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6011: kṛtodakaṃ te bharatena sārdhaṃ nṛpāṅganā mantripurohitāś ca
GE09ram_02_u:6012: puraṃ praviśyāśruparītanetrā bhūmau daśāhaṃ vyanayanta duḥkham // Ram_2,70.23
GE09ram_02_u:6017: brāhmaṇebhyo dadau ratnaṃ dhanam annaṃ ca puṣkalam
GE09ram_02_u:6018: bāstikaṃ bahuśuklaṃ ca gāś cāpi śataśas tathā // Ram_2,71.2
GE09ram_02_u:6020: dāsīdāsaṃ ca yānaṃ ca veśmāni sumahānti ca
GE09ram_02_u:6021: brāhmaṇebhyo dadau putro rājñas tasyaurdhvadaihikam // Ram_2,71.3
GE09ram_02_u:6027: citāmūle pitur vākyam idam āha suduḥkhitaḥ // Ram_2,71.5
GE09ram_02_u:6029: tāta yasmin nisṛṣṭo 'haṃ tvayā bhrātari rāghave
GE09ram_02_u:6030: tasmin vanaṃ pravrajite śūnye tyakto 'smy ahaṃ tvayā // Ram_2,71.6
GE09ram_02_u:6033: tām ambāṃ tāta kausalyāṃ tyaktvā tvaṃ kva gato nṛpa // Ram_2,71.7
GE09ram_02_u:6036: pituḥ śarīranirvāṇaṃ niṣṭanan viṣasāda ha // Ram_2,71.8
GE09ram_02_u:6038: sa tu dṛṣṭvā rudan dīnaḥ papāta dharaṇītale
GE09ram_02_u:6039: utthāpyamānaḥ śakrasya yantradhvaja iva cyutaḥ // Ram_2,71.9
GE09ram_02_u:6042: antakāle nipatitaṃ yayātim ṛṣayo yathā // Ram_2,71.10
GE09ram_02_u:6045: visaṃjño nyapatad bhūmau bhūmipālam anusmaran // Ram_2,71.11
GE09ram_02_u:6048: smṛtvā pitur guṇāṅgāni tāni tāni tadā tadā // Ram_2,71.12
GE09ram_02_u:6053: sukumāraṃ ca bālaṃ ca satataṃ lālitaṃ tvayā
GE09ram_02_u:6054: kva tāta bharataṃ hitvā vilapantaṃ gato bhavān // Ram_2,71.14
GE09ram_02_u:6056: nanu bhojyeṣu pāneṣu vastreṣv ābharaṇeṣu ca
GE09ram_02_u:6057: pravārayasi naḥ sarvāṃs tan naḥ ko 'dya kariṣyati // Ram_2,71.15
GE09ram_02_u:6060: vihīnā yā tvayā rājñā dharmajñena mahātmanā // Ram_2,71.16
GE09ram_02_u:6062: pitari svargam āpanne rāme cāraṇyam āśrite
GE09ram_02_u:6063: kiṃ me jīvitasāmarthyaṃ pravekṣyāmi hutāśanam // Ram_2,71.17
GE09ram_02_u:6065: hīno bhrātrā ca pitrā ca śūnyām ikṣvākupālitām
GE09ram_02_u:6066: ayodhyāṃ na pravekṣyāmi pravekṣyāmi tapovanam // Ram_2,71.18
GE09ram_02_u:6068: tayor vilapitaṃ śrutvā vyasanaṃ cānvavekṣya tat
GE09ram_02_u:6069: bhṛśam ārtatarā bhūyaḥ sarva evānugāminaḥ // Ram_2,71.19
GE09ram_02_u:6071: tato viṣaṇṇau śrāntau ca śatrughnabharatāv ubhau
GE09ram_02_u:6074: tataḥ prakṛtimān vaidyaḥ pitur eṣāṃ purohitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6075: vasiṣṭho bharataṃ vākyam utthāpya tam uvāca ha // Ram_2,71.21
GE09ram_02_u:6078: teṣu cāparihāryeṣu naivaṃ bhavitum arhati // Ram_2,71.22
GE09ram_02_u:6087: amātyās tvarayanti sma tanayau cāparāḥ kriyāḥ // Ram_2,71.25
GE09ram_02_u:6090: bharataṃ śokasaṃtaptam idaṃ vacanam abravīt // Ram_2,72.1
GE09ram_02_u:6092: gatir yaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ duḥkhe kiṃ punar ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6093: sa rāmaḥ sattvasampannaḥ striyā pravrājito vanam // Ram_2,72.2
GE09ram_02_u:6095: balavān vīryasampanno lakṣmaṇo nāma yo 'py asau
GE09ram_02_u:6096: kiṃ na mocayate rāmaṃ kṛtvāpi pitṛnigraham // Ram_2,72.3
GE09ram_02_u:6098: pūrvam eva tu nigrāhyaḥ samavekṣya nayānayau
GE09ram_02_u:6099: utpathaṃ yaḥ samārūḍho nāryā rājā vaśaṃ gataḥ // Ram_2,72.4
GE09ram_02_u:6107: tāṃ samīkṣya tadā dvāḥstho bhṛśaṃ pāpasya kāriṇīm
GE09ram_02_u:6110: yasyāḥ kṛte vane rāmo nyastadehaś ca vaḥ pitā
GE09ram_02_u:6111: seyaṃ pāpā nṛśaṃsā ca tasyāḥ kuru yathāmati // Ram_2,72.8
GE09ram_02_u:6113: śatrughnaś ca tad ājñāya vacanaṃ bhṛśaduḥkhitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6114: antaḥpuracarān sarvān ity uvāca dhṛtavrataḥ // Ram_2,72.9
GE09ram_02_u:6116: tīvram utpāditaṃ duḥkhaṃ bhrātṝṇāṃ me tathā pituḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6117: yayā seyaṃ nṛśaṃsasya karmaṇaḥ phalam aśnutām // Ram_2,72.10
GE09ram_02_u:6120: gṛhītā balavat kubjā sā tadgṛham anādayat // Ram_2,72.11
GE09ram_02_u:6123: kruddham ājñāya śatrughnaṃ vyapalāyata sarvaśaḥ // Ram_2,72.12
GE09ram_02_u:6126: yathāyaṃ samupakrānto niḥśeṣaṃ naḥ kariṣyati // Ram_2,72.13
GE09ram_02_u:6128: sānukrośāṃ vadānyāṃ ca dharmajñāṃ ca yaśasvinīm
GE09ram_02_u:6129: kausalyāṃ śaraṇaṃ yāmaḥ sā hi no 'stu dhruvā gatiḥ // Ram_2,72.14
GE09ram_02_u:6131: sa ca roṣeṇa tāmrākṣaḥ śatrughnaḥ śatrutāpanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6132: vicakarṣa tadā kubjāṃ krośantīṃ pṛthivītale // Ram_2,72.15
GE09ram_02_u:6134: tasyā hy ākṛṣyamāṇāyā mantharāyās tatas tataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6135: citraṃ bahuvidhaṃ bhāṇḍaṃ pṛthivyāṃ tad vyaśīryata // Ram_2,72.16
GE09ram_02_u:6138: aśobhata tadā bhūyaḥ śāradaṃ gaganaṃ yathā // Ram_2,72.17
GE09ram_02_u:6140: sa balī balavat krodhād gṛhītvā puruṣarṣabhaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6141: kaikeyīm abhinirbhartsya babhāṣe paruṣaṃ vacaḥ // Ram_2,72.18
GE09ram_02_u:6143: tair vākyaiḥ paruṣair duḥkhaiḥ kaikeyī bhṛśaduḥkhitā
GE09ram_02_u:6146: tāṃ prekṣya bharataḥ kruddhaṃ śatrughnam idam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:6147: avadhyāḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ pramadāḥ kṣamyatām iti // Ram_2,72.20
GE09ram_02_u:6149: hanyām aham imāṃ pāpāṃ kaikeyīṃ duṣṭacāriṇīm
GE09ram_02_u:6150: yadi māṃ dhārmiko rāmo nāsūyen mātṛghātakam // Ram_2,72.21
GE09ram_02_u:6152: imām api hatāṃ kubjāṃ yadi jānāti rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6153: tvāṃ ca māṃ caiva dharmātmā nābhibhāṣiṣyate dhruvam // Ram_2,72.22
GE09ram_02_u:6156: nyavartata tato roṣāt tāṃ mumoca ca mantharām // Ram_2,72.23
GE09ram_02_u:6158: sā pādamūle kaikeyyā mantharā nipapāta ha
GE09ram_02_u:6159: niḥśvasantī suduḥkhārtā kṛpaṇaṃ vilalāpa ca // Ram_2,72.24
GE09ram_02_u:6162: śanaiḥ samāśvāsayad ārtarūpāṃ krauñcīṃ vilagnām iva vīkṣamāṇām // Ram_2,72.25
GE09ram_02_u:6165: sametya rājakartāro bharataṃ vākyam abruvan // Ram_2,73.1
GE09ram_02_u:6167: gato daśarathaḥ svargaṃ yo no gurutaro guruḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6168: rāmaṃ pravrājya vai jyeṣṭhaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ ca mahābalam // Ram_2,73.2
GE09ram_02_u:6170: tvam adya bhava no rājā rājaputra mahāyaśaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6171: saṃgatyā nāparādhnoti rājyam etad anāyakam // Ram_2,73.3
GE09ram_02_u:6174: pratīkṣate tvāṃ svajanaḥ śreṇayaś ca nṛpātmaja // Ram_2,73.4
GE09ram_02_u:6177: abhiṣecaya cātmānaṃ pāhi cāsmān nararṣabha // Ram_2,73.5
GE09ram_02_u:6180: bharatas taṃ janaṃ sarvaṃ pratyuvāca dhṛtavrataḥ // Ram_2,73.6
GE09ram_02_u:6182: jyeṣṭhasya rājatā nityam ucitā hi kulasya naḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6183: naivaṃ bhavanto māṃ vaktum arhanti kuśalā janāḥ // Ram_2,73.7
GE09ram_02_u:6185: rāmaḥ pūrvo hi no bhrātā bhaviṣyati mahīpatiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6186: ahaṃ tv araṇye vatsyāmi varṣāṇi nava pañca ca // Ram_2,73.8
GE09ram_02_u:6189: ānayiṣyāmy ahaṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ bhrātaraṃ rāghavaṃ vanāt // Ram_2,73.9
GE09ram_02_u:6192: puraskṛtya gamiṣyāmi rāmahetor vanaṃ prati // Ram_2,73.10
GE09ram_02_u:6195: āneṣyāmi tu vai rāmaṃ havyavāham ivādhvarāt // Ram_2,73.11
GE09ram_02_u:6197: na sakāmāṃ kariṣyāmi svām imāṃ mātṛgandhinīm
GE09ram_02_u:6198: vane vatsyāmy ahaṃ durge rāmo rājā bhaviṣyati // Ram_2,73.12
GE09ram_02_u:6200: kriyatāṃ śilpibhiḥ panthāḥ samāni viṣamāṇi ca
GE09ram_02_u:6204: pratyuvāca janaḥ sarvaḥ śrīmadvākyam anuttamam // Ram_2,73.14
GE09ram_02_u:6206: evaṃ te bhāṣamāṇasya padmā śrīr upatiṣṭhatām
GE09ram_02_u:6207: yas tvaṃ jyeṣṭhe nṛpasute pṛthivīṃ dātum icchasi // Ram_2,73.15
GE09ram_02_u:6209: anuttamaṃ tad vacanaṃ nṛpātmaja prabhāṣitaṃ saṃśravaṇe niśamya ca
GE09ram_02_u:6210: praharṣajās taṃ prati bāṣpabindavo nipetur āryānananetrasambhavāḥ // Ram_2,73.16
GE09ram_02_u:6212: ūcus te vacanam idaṃ niśamya hṛṣṭāḥ sāmātyāḥ sapariṣado viyātaśokāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6213: panthānaṃ naravarabhaktimāñ janaś ca vyādiṣṭas tava vacanāc ca śilpivargaḥ // Ram_2,73.17
GE09ram_02_u:6216: svakarmābhiratāḥ śūrāḥ khanakā yantrakās tathā // Ram_2,74.1
GE09ram_02_u:6219: tathā vardhakayaś caiva mārgiṇo vṛkṣatakṣakāḥ // Ram_2,74.2
GE09ram_02_u:6222: samarthā ye ca draṣṭāraḥ puratas te pratasthire // Ram_2,74.3
GE09ram_02_u:6224: sa tu harṣāt tam uddeśaṃ janaugho vipulaḥ prayān
GE09ram_02_u:6230: latāvallīś ca gulmāṃś ca sthāṇūn aśmana eva ca
GE09ram_02_u:6231: janās te cakrire mārgaṃ chindanto vividhān drumān // Ram_2,74.6
GE09ram_02_u:6233: avṛkṣeṣu ca deśeṣu kecid vṛkṣān aropayan
GE09ram_02_u:6234: kecit kuṭhāraiṣ ṭaṅkaiś ca dātraiś chindan kvacit kvacit // Ram_2,74.7
GE09ram_02_u:6237: vidhamanti sma durgāṇi sthalāni ca tatas tataḥ // Ram_2,74.8
GE09ram_02_u:6240: nimnabhāgāṃs tathā kecit samāṃś cakruḥ samantataḥ // Ram_2,74.9
GE09ram_02_u:6242: babandhur bandhanīyāṃś ca kṣodyān saṃcukṣudus tadā
GE09ram_02_u:6243: bibhidur bhedanīyāṃś ca tāṃs tān deśān narās tadā // Ram_2,74.10
GE09ram_02_u:6253: bahv aśobhata senāyāḥ panthāḥ svargapathopamaḥ // Ram_2,74.13
GE09ram_02_u:6258: yo niveśas tv abhipreto bharatasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6259: bhūyas taṃ śobhayāmāsur bhūṣābhir bhūṣaṇopamam // Ram_2,74.15
GE09ram_02_u:6271: samucchritair niveśās te babhuḥ śakrapuropamāḥ // Ram_2,74.19
GE09ram_02_u:6276: sacandratārāgaṇamaṇḍitaṃ yathā nabhaḥ kṣapāyām amalaṃ virājate
GE09ram_02_u:6277: narendramārgaḥ sa tathā vyarājata krameṇa ramyaḥ śubhaśilpinirmitaḥ // Ram_2,74.21
GE09ram_02_u:6283: dadhmuḥ śaṅkhāṃś ca śataśo vādyāṃś coccāvacasvarān // Ram_2,75.2
GE09ram_02_u:6285: sa tūryaghoṣaḥ sumahān divam āpūrayann iva
GE09ram_02_u:6286: bharataṃ śokasaṃtaptaṃ bhūyaḥ śokair arandhrayat // Ram_2,75.3
GE09ram_02_u:6288: tataḥ prabuddho bharatas taṃ ghoṣaṃ saṃnivartya ca
GE09ram_02_u:6289: nāhaṃ rājeti cāpy uktvā śatrughnam idam abravīt // Ram_2,75.4
GE09ram_02_u:6292: visṛjya mayi duḥkhāni rājā daśaratho gataḥ // Ram_2,75.5
GE09ram_02_u:6295: paribhramati rājaśrīr naur ivākarṇikā jale // Ram_2,75.6
GE09ram_02_u:6297: ity evaṃ bharataṃ prekṣya vilapantaṃ vicetanam
GE09ram_02_u:6298: kṛpaṇaṃ ruruduḥ sarvāḥ sasvaraṃ yoṣitas tadā // Ram_2,75.7
GE09ram_02_u:6304: sudharmām iva dharmātmā sagaṇaḥ pratyapadyata // Ram_2,75.9
GE09ram_02_u:6307: adhyāsta sarvavedajño dūtān anuśaśāsa ca // Ram_2,75.10
GE09ram_02_u:6310: kṣipram ānayatāvyagrāḥ kṛtyam ātyayikaṃ hi naḥ // Ram_2,75.11
GE09ram_02_u:6313: rathair aśvair gajaiś cāpi janānām upagacchatām // Ram_2,75.12
GE09ram_02_u:6316: pratyanandan prakṛtayo yathā daśarathaṃ tathā // Ram_2,75.13
GE09ram_02_u:6319: daśarathasutaśobhitā sabhā sadaśaratheva babhau yathā purā // Ram_2,75.14
GE09ram_02_u:6322: dadarśa buddhisampannaḥ pūrṇacandrāṃ niśām iva // Ram_2,76.1
GE09ram_02_u:6327: rājñas tu prakṛtīḥ sarvāḥ samagrāḥ prekṣya dharmavit
GE09ram_02_u:6328: idaṃ purohito vākyaṃ bharataṃ mṛdu cābravīt // Ram_2,76.3
GE09ram_02_u:6330: tāta rājā daśarathaḥ svargato dharmam ācaran
GE09ram_02_u:6331: dhanadhānyavatīṃ sphītāṃ pradāya pṛthivīṃ tava // Ram_2,76.4
GE09ram_02_u:6333: rāmas tathā satyadhṛtiḥ satāṃ dharmam anusmaran
GE09ram_02_u:6334: nājahāt pitur ādeśaṃ śaśī jyotsnām ivoditaḥ // Ram_2,76.5
GE09ram_02_u:6336: pitrā bhrātrā ca te dattaṃ rājyaṃ nihatakaṇṭakam
GE09ram_02_u:6337: tad bhuṅkṣva muditāmātyaḥ kṣipram evābhiṣecaya // Ram_2,76.6
GE09ram_02_u:6339: udīcyāś ca pratīcyāś ca dākṣiṇātyāś ca kevalāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6340: koṭyāparāntāḥ sāmudrā ratnāny abhiharantu te // Ram_2,76.7
GE09ram_02_u:6343: jagāma manasā rāmaṃ dharmajño dharmakāṅkṣayā // Ram_2,76.8
GE09ram_02_u:6346: vilalāpa sabhāmadhye jagarhe ca purohitam // Ram_2,76.9
GE09ram_02_u:6349: dharme prayatamānasya ko rājyaṃ madvidho haret // Ram_2,76.10
GE09ram_02_u:6352: rājyaṃ cāhaṃ ca rāmasya dharmaṃ vaktum ihārhasi // Ram_2,76.11
GE09ram_02_u:6355: labdhum arhati kākutstho rājyaṃ daśaratho yathā // Ram_2,76.12
GE09ram_02_u:6357: anāryajuṣṭam asvargyaṃ kuryāṃ pāpam ahaṃ yadi
GE09ram_02_u:6358: ikṣvākūṇām ahaṃ loke bhaveyaṃ kulapāṃsanaḥ // Ram_2,76.13
GE09ram_02_u:6360: yaddhi mātrā kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ nāhaṃ tad abhirocaye
GE09ram_02_u:6363: rāmam evānugacchāmi sa rājā dvipadāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6364: trayāṇām api lokānāṃ rāghavo rājyam arhati // Ram_2,76.15
GE09ram_02_u:6366: tad vākyaṃ dharmasaṃyuktaṃ śrutvā sarve sabhāsadaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6367: harṣān mumucur aśrūṇi rāme nihitacetasaḥ // Ram_2,76.16
GE09ram_02_u:6369: yadi tv āryaṃ na śakṣyāmi vinivartayituṃ vanāt
GE09ram_02_u:6370: vane tatraiva vatsyāmi yathāryo lakṣmaṇas tathā // Ram_2,76.17
GE09ram_02_u:6375: evam uktvā tu dharmātmā bharato bhrātṛvatsalaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6378: tūrṇam utthāya gaccha tvaṃ sumantra mama śāsanāt
GE09ram_02_u:6379: yātrām ājñāpaya kṣipraṃ balaṃ caiva samānaya // Ram_2,76.20
GE09ram_02_u:6381: evam uktaḥ sumantras tu bharatena mahātmanā
GE09ram_02_u:6382: prahṛṣṭaḥ so 'diśat sarvaṃ yathā saṃdiṣṭam iṣṭavat // Ram_2,76.21
GE09ram_02_u:6384: tāḥ prahṛṣṭāḥ prakṛtayo balādhyakṣā balasya ca
GE09ram_02_u:6385: śrutvā yātrāṃ samājñaptāṃ rāghavasya nivartane // Ram_2,76.22
GE09ram_02_u:6387: tato yodhāṅganāḥ sarvā bhartṝn sarvān gṛhe gṛhe
GE09ram_02_u:6388: yātrāgamanam ājñāya tvarayanti sma harṣitāḥ // Ram_2,76.23
GE09ram_02_u:6390: te hayair gorathaiḥ śīghraiḥ syandanaiś ca manojavaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6391: saha yodhair balādhyakṣā balaṃ sarvam acodayan // Ram_2,76.24
GE09ram_02_u:6393: sajjaṃ tu tad balaṃ dṛṣṭvā bharato gurusaṃnidhau
GE09ram_02_u:6394: rathaṃ me tvarayasveti sumantraṃ pārśvato 'bravīt // Ram_2,76.25
GE09ram_02_u:6397: rathaṃ gṛhītvā prayayau yuktaṃ paramavājibhiḥ // Ram_2,76.26
GE09ram_02_u:6399: sa rāghavaḥ satyadhṛtiḥ pratāpavān bruvan suyuktaṃ dṛḍhasatyavikramaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6400: guruṃ mahāraṇyagataṃ yaśasvinaṃ prasādayiṣyan bharato 'bravīt tadā // Ram_2,76.27
GE09ram_02_u:6402: tūrṇaṃ samutthāya sumantra gaccha balasya yogāya balapradhānān
GE09ram_02_u:6403: ānetum icchāmi hi taṃ vanasthaṃ prasādya rāmaṃ jagato hitāya // Ram_2,76.28
GE09ram_02_u:6405: sa sūtaputro bharatena samyag ājñāpitaḥ saṃparipūrṇakāmaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6406: śaśāsa sarvān prakṛtipradhānān balasya mukhyāṃś ca suhṛjjanaṃ ca // Ram_2,76.29
GE09ram_02_u:6408: tataḥ samutthāya kule kule te rājanyavaiśyā vṛṣalāś ca viprāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6409: ayūyujann uṣṭrarathān kharāṃś ca nāgān hayāṃś caiva kulaprasūtān // Ram_2,76.30
GE09ram_02_u:6415: adhiruhya hayair yuktān rathān sūryarathopamān // Ram_2,77.2
GE09ram_02_u:6421: anvayur bharataṃ yāntaṃ rājaputraṃ yaśasvinam // Ram_2,77.4
GE09ram_02_u:6424: anvayur bharataṃ yāntaṃ rājaputraṃ yaśasvinam // Ram_2,77.5
GE09ram_02_u:6426: kaikeyī ca sumitrā ca kausalyā ca yaśasvinī
GE09ram_02_u:6430: tasyaiva ca kathāś citrāḥ kurvāṇā hṛṣṭamānasāḥ // Ram_2,77.7
GE09ram_02_u:6433: kadā drakṣyāmahe rāmaṃ jagataḥ śokanāśanam // Ram_2,77.8
GE09ram_02_u:6435: dṛṣṭa eva hi naḥ śokam apaneṣyati rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6436: tamaḥ sarvasya lokasya samudyann iva bhāskaraḥ // Ram_2,77.9
GE09ram_02_u:6438: ity evaṃ kathayantas te samprahṛṣṭāḥ kathāḥ śubhāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6439: pariṣvajānāś cānyonyaṃ yayur nāgarikās tadā // Ram_2,77.10
GE09ram_02_u:6441: ye ca tatrāpare sarve saṃmatā ye ca naigamāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6442: rāmaṃ prati yayur hṛṣṭāḥ sarvāḥ prakṛtayas tadā // Ram_2,77.11
GE09ram_02_u:6444: maṇikārāś ca ye kecit kumbhakārāś ca śobhanāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6445: sūtrakarmakṛtaś caiva ye ca śastropajīvinaḥ // Ram_2,77.12
GE09ram_02_u:6451: snāpakācchādakā vaidyā dhūpakāḥ śauṇḍikās tathā // Ram_2,77.14
GE09ram_02_u:6454: śailūṣāś ca saha strībhir yānti kaivartakās tathā // Ram_2,77.15
GE09ram_02_u:6457: gorathair bharataṃ yāntam anujagmuḥ sahasraśaḥ // Ram_2,77.16
GE09ram_02_u:6460: sarve te vividhair yānaiḥ śanair bharatam anvayuḥ // Ram_2,77.17
GE09ram_02_u:6465: nirīkṣyānugatāṃ senāṃ tāṃ ca gaṅgāṃ śivodakām
GE09ram_02_u:6466: bharataḥ sacivān sarvān abravīd vākyakovidaḥ // Ram_2,77.19
GE09ram_02_u:6469: viśrāntāḥ pratariṣyāmaḥ śva idānīṃ mahānadīm // Ram_2,77.20
GE09ram_02_u:6471: dātuṃ ca tāvad icchāmi svar gatasya mahīpateḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6475: nyaveśayaṃs tāṃś chandena svena svena pṛthakpṛthak // Ram_2,77.22
GE09ram_02_u:6477: niveśya gaṅgām anu tāṃ mahānadīṃ camūṃ vidhānaiḥ paribarhaśobhinīm
GE09ram_02_u:6478: uvāsa rāmasya tadā mahātmano vicintayāno bharato nivartanam // Ram_2,77.23
GE09ram_02_u:6480: tato niviṣṭāṃ dhvajinīṃ gaṅgām anvāśritāṃ nadīm
GE09ram_02_u:6486: sa eṣa hi mahākāyaḥ kovidāradhvajo rathe
GE09ram_02_u:6487: bandhayiṣyati vā dāśān atha vāsmān vadhiṣyati // Ram_2,78.3
GE09ram_02_u:6489: atha dāśarathiṃ rāmaṃ pitrā rājyād vivāsitam
GE09ram_02_u:6492: bhartā caiva sakhā caiva rāmo dāśarathir mama
GE09ram_02_u:6495: tiṣṭhantu sarvadāśāś ca gaṅgām anvāśritā nadīm
GE09ram_02_u:6498: nāvāṃ śatānāṃ pañcānāṃ kaivartānāṃ śataṃ śatam
GE09ram_02_u:6499: saṃnaddhānāṃ tathā yūnāṃ tiṣṭhantv ity abhyacodayat // Ram_2,78.7
GE09ram_02_u:6501: yadā tuṣṭas tu bharato rāmasyeha bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:6502: seyaṃ svastimayī senā gaṅgām adya tariṣyati // Ram_2,78.8
GE09ram_02_u:6507: tam āyāntaṃ tu samprekṣya sūtaputraḥ pratāpavān
GE09ram_02_u:6511: kuśalo daṇḍakāraṇye vṛddho bhrātuś ca te sakhā // Ram_2,78.11
GE09ram_02_u:6513: tasmāt paśyatu kākutstha tvāṃ niṣādādhipo guhaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6514: asaṃśayaṃ vijānīte yatra tau rāmalakṣmaṇau // Ram_2,78.12
GE09ram_02_u:6516: etat tu vacanaṃ śrutvā sumantrād bharataḥ śubham
GE09ram_02_u:6517: uvāca vacanaṃ śīghraṃ guhaḥ paśyatu mām iti // Ram_2,78.13
GE09ram_02_u:6520: āgamya bharataṃ prahvo guho vacanam abravīt // Ram_2,78.14
GE09ram_02_u:6522: niṣkuṭaś caiva deśo 'yaṃ vañcitāś cāpi te vayam
GE09ram_02_u:6523: nivedayāmas te sarve svake dāśakule vasa // Ram_2,78.15
GE09ram_02_u:6525: asti mūlaṃ phalaṃ caiva niṣādaiḥ samupāhṛtam
GE09ram_02_u:6526: ārdraṃ ca māṃsaṃ śuṣkaṃ ca vanyaṃ coccāvacaṃ mahat // Ram_2,78.16
GE09ram_02_u:6529: arcito vividhaiḥ kāmaiḥ śvaḥ sasainyo gamiṣyasi // Ram_2,78.17
GE09ram_02_u:6531: evam uktas tu bharato niṣādādhipatiṃ guham
GE09ram_02_u:6534: ūrjitaḥ khalu te kāmaḥ kṛto mama guroḥ sakhe
GE09ram_02_u:6535: yo me tvam īdṛśīṃ senām eko 'bhyarcitum icchasi // Ram_2,79.2
GE09ram_02_u:6537: ity uktvā tu mahātejā guhaṃ vacanam uttamam
GE09ram_02_u:6538: abravīd bharataḥ śrīmān niṣādādhipatiṃ punaḥ // Ram_2,79.3
GE09ram_02_u:6541: gahano 'yaṃ bhṛśaṃ deśo gaṅgānūpo duratyayaḥ // Ram_2,79.4
GE09ram_02_u:6544: abravīt prāñjalir vākyaṃ guho gahanagocaraḥ // Ram_2,79.5
GE09ram_02_u:6550: iyaṃ te mahatī senā śaṅkāṃ janayatīva me // Ram_2,79.7
GE09ram_02_u:6552: tam evam abhibhāṣantam ākāśa iva nirmalaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6553: bharataḥ ślakṣṇayā vācā guhaṃ vacanam abravīt // Ram_2,79.8
GE09ram_02_u:6555: mā bhūt sa kālo yat kaṣṭaṃ na māṃ śaṅkitum arhasi
GE09ram_02_u:6556: rāghavaḥ sa hi me bhrātā jyeṣṭhaḥ pitṛsamo mama // Ram_2,79.9
GE09ram_02_u:6559: buddhir anyā na te kāryā guha satyaṃ bravīmi te // Ram_2,79.10
GE09ram_02_u:6562: punar evābravīd vākyaṃ bharataṃ prati harṣitaḥ // Ram_2,79.11
GE09ram_02_u:6564: dhanyas tvaṃ na tvayā tulyaṃ paśyāmi jagatītale
GE09ram_02_u:6565: ayatnād āgataṃ rājyaṃ yas tvaṃ tyaktum ihecchasi // Ram_2,79.12
GE09ram_02_u:6567: śāśvatī khalu te kīrtir lokān anucariṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:6568: yas tvaṃ kṛcchragataṃ rāmaṃ pratyānayitum icchasi // Ram_2,79.13
GE09ram_02_u:6571: babhau naṣṭaprabhaḥ sūryo rajanī cābhyavartata // Ram_2,79.14
GE09ram_02_u:6573: saṃniveśya sa tāṃ senāṃ guhena paritoṣitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6574: śatrughnena saha śrīmāñ śayanaṃ punar āgamat // Ram_2,79.15
GE09ram_02_u:6577: upasthito hy anarhasya dharmaprekṣasya tādṛśaḥ // Ram_2,79.16
GE09ram_02_u:6583: yathā sūryāṃśusaṃtapto himavān prasruto himam // Ram_2,79.18
GE09ram_02_u:6591: guhena sārdhaṃ bharataḥ samāgato mahānubhāvaḥ sajanaḥ samāhitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6592: sudurmanās taṃ bharataṃ tadā punar guhaḥ samāśvāsayad agrajaṃ prati // Ram_2,79.21
GE09ram_02_u:6598: bhrātṛguptyartham atyantam ahaṃ lakṣmaṇam abruvam // Ram_2,80.2
GE09ram_02_u:6600: iyaṃ tāta sukhā śayyā tvadartham upakalpitā
GE09ram_02_u:6603: ucito 'yaṃ janaḥ sarvo duḥkhānāṃ tvaṃ sukhocitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6604: dharmātmaṃs tasya guptyarthaṃ jāgariṣyāmahe vayam // Ram_2,80.4
GE09ram_02_u:6606: na hi rāmāt priyataro mamāsti bhuvi kaścana
GE09ram_02_u:6607: motsuko bhūr bravīmy etad apy asatyaṃ tavāgrataḥ // Ram_2,80.5
GE09ram_02_u:6609: asya prasādād āśaṃse loke 'smin sumahad yaśaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6610: dharmāvāptiṃ ca vipulām arthāvāptiṃ ca kevalām // Ram_2,80.6
GE09ram_02_u:6612: so 'haṃ priyasakhaṃ rāmaṃ śayānaṃ saha sītayā
GE09ram_02_u:6613: rakṣiṣyāmi dhanuṣpāṇiḥ sarvaiḥ svair jñātibhiḥ saha // Ram_2,80.7
GE09ram_02_u:6615: na hi me 'viditaṃ kiṃcid vane 'smiṃś carataḥ sadā
GE09ram_02_u:6616: caturaṅgaṃ hy api balaṃ prasahema vayaṃ yudhi // Ram_2,80.8
GE09ram_02_u:6619: anunītā vayaṃ sarve dharmam evānupaśyatā // Ram_2,80.9
GE09ram_02_u:6621: kathaṃ dāśarathau bhūmau śayāne saha sītayā
GE09ram_02_u:6622: śakyā nidrā mayā labdhuṃ jīvitaṃ vā sukhāni vā // Ram_2,80.10
GE09ram_02_u:6624: yo na devāsuraiḥ sarvaiḥ śakyaḥ prasahituṃ yudhi
GE09ram_02_u:6625: taṃ paśya guha saṃviṣṭaṃ tṛṇeṣu saha sītayā // Ram_2,80.11
GE09ram_02_u:6627: mahatā tapasā labdho vividhaiś ca pariśramaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6630: asmin pravrājite rājā na ciraṃ vartayiṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:6631: vidhavā medinī nūnaṃ kṣipram eva bhaviṣyati // Ram_2,80.13
GE09ram_02_u:6636: kausalyā caiva rājā ca tathaiva jananī mama
GE09ram_02_u:6637: nāśaṃse yadi te sarve jīveyuḥ śarvarīm imām // Ram_2,80.15
GE09ram_02_u:6639: jīved api hi me mātā śatrughnasyānvavekṣayā
GE09ram_02_u:6640: duḥkhitā yā tu kausalyā vīrasūr vinaśiṣyati // Ram_2,80.16
GE09ram_02_u:6643: rājye rāmam anikṣipya pitā me vinaśiṣyati // Ram_2,80.17
GE09ram_02_u:6645: siddhārthāḥ pitaraṃ vṛttaṃ tasmin kāle hy upasthite
GE09ram_02_u:6655: sukhitā vicariṣyanti rājadhānīṃ pitur mama // Ram_2,80.21
GE09ram_02_u:6658: nivṛtte samaye hy asmin sukhitāḥ praviśemahi // Ram_2,80.22
GE09ram_02_u:6663: prabhāte vimale sūrye kārayitvā jaṭā ubhau
GE09ram_02_u:6664: asmin bhāgīrathītīre sukhaṃ saṃtāritau mayā // Ram_2,80.24
GE09ram_02_u:6667: vareṣucāpāsidharau paraṃtapau vyavekṣamāṇau saha sītayā gatau // Ram_2,80.25
GE09ram_02_u:6669: guhasya vacanaṃ śrutvā bharato bhṛśam apriyam
GE09ram_02_u:6670: dhyānaṃ jagāma tatraiva yatra tac chrutam apriyam // Ram_2,81.1
GE09ram_02_u:6676: papāta sahasā totrair hṛdi viddha iva dvipaḥ // Ram_2,81.3
GE09ram_02_u:6681: tataḥ sarvāḥ samāpetur mātaro bharatasya tāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6684: tāś ca taṃ patitaṃ bhūmau rudantyaḥ paryavārayan
GE09ram_02_u:6685: kausalyā tv anusṛtyainaṃ durmanāḥ pariṣasvaje // Ram_2,81.6
GE09ram_02_u:6687: vatsalā svaṃ yathā vatsam upagūhya tapasvinī
GE09ram_02_u:6690: putra vyādhir na te kaccic charīraṃ paribādhate
GE09ram_02_u:6691: adya rājakulasyāsya tvadadhīnaṃ hi jīvitam // Ram_2,81.8
GE09ram_02_u:6693: tvāṃ dṛṣṭvā putra jīvāmi rāme sabhrātṛke gate
GE09ram_02_u:6694: vṛtte daśarathe rājñi nātha ekas tvam adya naḥ // Ram_2,81.9
GE09ram_02_u:6696: kaccin na lakṣmaṇe putra śrutaṃ te kiṃcid apriyam
GE09ram_02_u:6697: putra vā hy ekaputrāyāḥ sahabhārye vanaṃ gate // Ram_2,81.10
GE09ram_02_u:6699: sa muhūrtaṃ samāśvasya rudann eva mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6700: kausalyāṃ parisāntvyedaṃ guhaṃ vacanam abravīt // Ram_2,81.11
GE09ram_02_u:6702: bhrātā me kvāvasad rātriṃ kva sītā kva ca lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6703: asvapac chayane kasmin kiṃ bhuktvā guha śaṃsa me // Ram_2,81.12
GE09ram_02_u:6706: yadvidhaṃ pratipede ca rāme priyahite 'tithau // Ram_2,81.13
GE09ram_02_u:6708: annam uccāvacaṃ bhakṣāḥ phalāni vividhāni ca
GE09ram_02_u:6712: na hi tat pratyagṛhṇāt sa kṣatradharmam anusmaran // Ram_2,81.15
GE09ram_02_u:6714: na hy asmābhiḥ pratigrāhyaṃ sakhe deyaṃ tu sarvadā
GE09ram_02_u:6715: iti tena vayaṃ rājann anunītā mahātmanā // Ram_2,81.16
GE09ram_02_u:6718: aupavāsyaṃ tadākārṣīd rāghavaḥ saha sītayā // Ram_2,81.17
GE09ram_02_u:6720: tatas tu jalaśeṣeṇa lakṣmaṇo 'py akarot tadā
GE09ram_02_u:6721: vāgyatās te trayaḥ saṃdhyām upāsata samāhitāḥ // Ram_2,81.18
GE09ram_02_u:6723: saumitris tu tataḥ paścād akarot svāstaraṃ śubham
GE09ram_02_u:6724: svayam ānīya barhīṃṣi kṣipraṃ rāghavakāraṇāt // Ram_2,81.19
GE09ram_02_u:6726: tasmin samāviśad rāmaḥ svāstare saha sītayā
GE09ram_02_u:6727: prakṣālya ca tayoḥ pādāv apacakrāma lakṣmaṇaḥ // Ram_2,81.20
GE09ram_02_u:6729: etat tad iṅgudīmūlam idam eva ca tat tṛṇam
GE09ram_02_u:6730: yasmin rāmaś ca sītā ca rātriṃ tāṃ śayitāv ubhau // Ram_2,81.21
GE09ram_02_u:6732: niyamya pṛṣṭhe tu talāṅgulitravāñ śaraiḥ supūrṇāv iṣudhī paraṃtapaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6733: mahad dhanuḥ sajyam upohya lakṣmaṇo niśām atiṣṭhat parito 'sya kevalam // Ram_2,81.22
GE09ram_02_u:6735: tatas tv ahaṃ cottamabāṇacāpadhṛk sthito 'bhavaṃ tatra sa yatra lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6736: atandribhir jñātibhir āttakārmukair mahendrakalpaṃ paripālayaṃs tadā // Ram_2,81.23
GE09ram_02_u:6738: tac chrutvā nipuṇaṃ sarvaṃ bharataḥ saha mantribhiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6739: iṅgudīmūlam āgamya rāmaśayyām avekṣya tām // Ram_2,82.1
GE09ram_02_u:6741: abravīj jananīḥ sarvā iha tena mahātmanā
