GE09ram_02_u:6742: śarvarī śayitā bhūmāv idam asya vimarditam // Ram_2,82.2
GE09ram_02_u:6745: jāto daśarathenorvyāṃ na rāmaḥ svaptum arhati // Ram_2,82.3
GE09ram_02_u:6748: śayitvā puruṣavyāghraḥ kathaṃ śete mahītale // Ram_2,82.4
GE09ram_02_u:6760: gāthābhir anurūpābhiḥ stutibhiś ca paraṃtapaḥ // Ram_2,82.8
GE09ram_02_u:6762: aśraddheyam idaṃ loke na satyaṃ pratibhāti mā
GE09ram_02_u:6763: muhyate khalu me bhāvaḥ svapno 'yam iti me matiḥ // Ram_2,82.9
GE09ram_02_u:6765: na nūnaṃ daivataṃ kiṃcit kālena balavattaram
GE09ram_02_u:6766: yatra dāśarathī rāmo bhūmāv evaṃ śayīta saḥ // Ram_2,82.10
GE09ram_02_u:6769: dayitā śayitā bhūmau snuṣā daśarathasya ca // Ram_2,82.11
GE09ram_02_u:6771: iyaṃ śayyā mama bhrātur idaṃ hi parivartitam
GE09ram_02_u:6772: sthaṇḍile kaṭhine sarvaṃ gātrair vimṛditaṃ tṛṇam // Ram_2,82.12
GE09ram_02_u:6774: manye sābharaṇā suptā sītāsmiñ śayane tadā
GE09ram_02_u:6775: tatra tatra hi dṛśyante saktāḥ kanakabindavaḥ // Ram_2,82.13
GE09ram_02_u:6778: tathā hy ete prakāśante saktāḥ kauśeyatantavaḥ // Ram_2,82.14
GE09ram_02_u:6780: manye bhartuḥ sukhā śayyā yena bālā tapasvinī
GE09ram_02_u:6781: sukumārī satī duḥkhaṃ na vijānāti maithilī // Ram_2,82.15
GE09ram_02_u:6784: sarvalokapriyas tyaktvā rājyaṃ priyam anuttamam // Ram_2,82.16
GE09ram_02_u:6787: sukhabhāgī ca duḥkhārhaḥ śayito bhuvi rāghavaḥ // Ram_2,82.17
GE09ram_02_u:6789: siddhārthā khalu vaidehī patiṃ yānugatā vanam
GE09ram_02_u:6790: vayaṃ saṃśayitāḥ sarve hīnās tena mahātmanā // Ram_2,82.18
GE09ram_02_u:6793: gate daśarathe svarge rāme cāraṇyam āśrite // Ram_2,82.19
GE09ram_02_u:6795: na ca prārthayate kaścin manasāpi vasuṃdharām
GE09ram_02_u:6802: śatravo nābhimanyante bhakṣān viṣakṛtān iva // Ram_2,82.22
GE09ram_02_u:6804: adya prabhṛti bhūmau tu śayiṣye 'haṃ tṛṇeṣu vā
GE09ram_02_u:6807: tasyārtham uttaraṃ kālaṃ nivatsyāmi sukhaṃ vane
GE09ram_02_u:6808: taṃ pratiśravam āmucya nāsya mithyā bhaviṣyati // Ram_2,82.24
GE09ram_02_u:6811: lakṣmaṇena saha tv āryo ayodhyāṃ pālayiṣyati // Ram_2,82.25
GE09ram_02_u:6814: api me devatāḥ kuryur imaṃ satyaṃ manoratham // Ram_2,82.26
GE09ram_02_u:6816: prasādyamānaḥ śirasā mayā svayaṃ bahuprakāraṃ yadi na prapatsyate
GE09ram_02_u:6817: tato 'nuvatsyāmi cirāya rāghavaṃ vane vasan nārhati mām upekṣitum // Ram_2,82.27
GE09ram_02_u:6819: vyuṣya rātriṃ tu tatraiva gaṅgākūle sa rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6820: bharataḥ kālyam utthāya śatrughnam idam abravīt // Ram_2,83.1
GE09ram_02_u:6823: śīghram ānaya bhadraṃ te tārayiṣyati vāhinīm // Ram_2,83.2
GE09ram_02_u:6826: ity evam abravīd bhrātrā śatrughno 'pi pracoditaḥ // Ram_2,83.3
GE09ram_02_u:6829: āgamya prāñjaliḥ kāle guho bharatam abravīt // Ram_2,83.4
GE09ram_02_u:6832: kaccic ca saha sainyasya tava sarvam anāmayam // Ram_2,83.5
GE09ram_02_u:6834: guhasya tat tu vacanaṃ śrutvā snehād udīritam
GE09ram_02_u:6837: sukhā naḥ śarvarī rājan pūjitāś cāpi te vayam
GE09ram_02_u:6838: gaṅgāṃ tu naubhir bahvībhir dāśāḥ saṃtārayantu naḥ // Ram_2,83.7
GE09ram_02_u:6841: pratipraviśya nagaraṃ taṃ jñātijanam abravīt // Ram_2,83.8
GE09ram_02_u:6843: uttiṣṭhata prabudhyadhvaṃ bhadram astu hi vaḥ sadā
GE09ram_02_u:6847: pañca nāvāṃ śatāny eva samāninyuḥ samantataḥ // Ram_2,83.10
GE09ram_02_u:6853: sanandighoṣāṃ kalyāṇīṃ guho nāvam upāharat // Ram_2,83.12
GE09ram_02_u:6855: tām āruroha bharataḥ śatrughnaś ca mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6856: kausalyā ca sumitrā ca yāś cānyā rājayoṣitaḥ // Ram_2,83.13
GE09ram_02_u:6858: purohitaś ca tat pūrvaṃ gurave brāhmaṇāś ca ye
GE09ram_02_u:6862: bhāṇḍāni cādadānānāṃ ghoṣas tridivam aspṛśat // Ram_2,83.15
GE09ram_02_u:6864: patākinyas tu tā nāvaḥ svayaṃ dāśair adhiṣṭhitāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6865: vahantyo janam ārūḍhaṃ tadā saṃpetur āśugāḥ // Ram_2,83.16
GE09ram_02_u:6867: nārīṇām abhipūrṇās tu kāścit kāścit tu vājinām
GE09ram_02_u:6868: kaścit tatra vahanti sma yānayugyaṃ mahādhanam // Ram_2,83.17
GE09ram_02_u:6870: tāḥ sma gatvā paraṃ tīram avaropya ca taṃ janam
GE09ram_02_u:6874: tarantaḥ sma prakāśante sadhvajā iva parvatāḥ // Ram_2,83.19
GE09ram_02_u:6876: nāvaś cāruruhus tv anye plavais terus tathāpare
GE09ram_02_u:6877: anye kumbhaghaṭais terur anye teruś ca bāhubhiḥ // Ram_2,83.20
GE09ram_02_u:6879: sā puṇyā dhvajinī gaṅgāṃ dāśaiḥ saṃtāritā svayam
GE09ram_02_u:6880: maitre muhūrte prayayau prayāgavanam uttamam // Ram_2,83.21
GE09ram_02_u:6882: āśvāsayitvā ca camūṃ mahātmā niveśayitvā ca yathopajoṣam
GE09ram_02_u:6883: draṣṭuṃ bharadvājam ṛṣipravaryam ṛtvigvṛtaḥ san bharataḥ pratasthe // Ram_2,83.22
GE09ram_02_u:6886: balaṃ sarvam avasthāpya jagāma saha mantribhiḥ // Ram_2,84.1
GE09ram_02_u:6889: vasāno vāsasī kṣaume purodhāya purohitam // Ram_2,84.2
GE09ram_02_u:6892: mantriṇas tān avasthāpya jagāmānu purohitam // Ram_2,84.3
GE09ram_02_u:6895: saṃcacālāsanāt tūrṇaṃ śiṣyān arghyam iti bruvan // Ram_2,84.4
GE09ram_02_u:6898: abudhyata mahātejāḥ sutaṃ daśarathasya tam // Ram_2,84.5
GE09ram_02_u:6900: tābhyām arghyaṃ ca pādyaṃ ca dattvā paścāt phalāni ca
GE09ram_02_u:6901: ānupūrvyāc ca dharmajñaḥ papraccha kuśalaṃ kule // Ram_2,84.6
GE09ram_02_u:6903: ayodhyāyāṃ bale kośe mitreṣv api ca mantriṣu
GE09ram_02_u:6904: jānan daśarathaṃ vṛttaṃ na rājānam udāharat // Ram_2,84.7
GE09ram_02_u:6912: kim ihāgamane kāryaṃ tava rājyaṃ praśāsataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6913: etad ācakṣva me sarvaṃ na hi me śudhyate manaḥ // Ram_2,84.10
GE09ram_02_u:6916: bhrātrā saha sabhāryo yaś ciraṃ pravrājito vanam // Ram_2,84.11
GE09ram_02_u:6919: vanavāsī bhavetīha samāḥ kila caturdaśa // Ram_2,84.12
GE09ram_02_u:6921: kaccin na tasyāpāpasya pāpaṃ kartum ihecchasi
GE09ram_02_u:6922: akaṇṭakaṃ bhoktumanā rājyaṃ tasyānujasya ca // Ram_2,84.13
GE09ram_02_u:6924: evam ukto bharadvājaṃ bharataḥ pratyuvāca ha
GE09ram_02_u:6927: hato 'smi yadi mām evaṃ bhagavān api manyate
GE09ram_02_u:6928: matto na doṣam āśaṅker naivaṃ mām anuśādhi hi // Ram_2,84.15
GE09ram_02_u:6930: na caitad iṣṭaṃ mātā me yad avocan madantare
GE09ram_02_u:6931: nāham etena tuṣṭaś ca na tad vacanam ādade // Ram_2,84.16
GE09ram_02_u:6933: ahaṃ tu taṃ naravyāghram upayātaḥ prasādakaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6934: pratinetum ayodhyāṃ ca pādau tasyābhivanditum // Ram_2,84.17
GE09ram_02_u:6936: tvaṃ mām evaṃ gataṃ matvā prasādaṃ kartum arhasi
GE09ram_02_u:6937: śaṃsa me bhagavan rāmaḥ kva samprati mahīpatiḥ // Ram_2,84.18
GE09ram_02_u:6939: uvāca taṃ bharadvājaḥ prasādād bharataṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6941: guruvṛttir damaś caiva sādhūnāṃ cānuyāyitā // Ram_2,84.19
GE09ram_02_u:6943: jāne caitan manaḥsthaṃ te dṛḍhīkaraṇam astv iti
GE09ram_02_u:6944: apṛcchaṃ tvāṃ tavātyarthaṃ kīrtiṃ samabhivardhayan // Ram_2,84.20
GE09ram_02_u:6946: asau vasati te bhrātā citrakūṭe mahāgirau
GE09ram_02_u:6947: śvas tu gantāsi taṃ deśaṃ vasādya saha mantribhiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6948: etaṃ me kuru suprājña kāmaṃ kāmārthakovida // Ram_2,84.21
GE09ram_02_u:6950: tatas tathety evam udāradarśanaḥ pratītarūpo bharato 'bravīd vacaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6951: cakāra buddhiṃ ca tadā mahāśrame niśānivāsāya narādhipātmajaḥ // Ram_2,84.22
GE09ram_02_u:6953: kṛtabuddhiṃ nivāsāya tathaiva sa munis tadā
GE09ram_02_u:6956: abravīd bharatas tv enaṃ nanv idaṃ bhavatā kṛtam
GE09ram_02_u:6957: pādyam arghyaṃ tathātithyaṃ vane yad upapadyate // Ram_2,85.2
GE09ram_02_u:6960: jāne tvāṃ prītisaṃyuktaṃ tuṣyes tvaṃ yena kenacit // Ram_2,85.3
GE09ram_02_u:6962: senāyās tu tavaitasyāḥ kartum icchāmi bhojanam
GE09ram_02_u:6963: mama prītir yathārūpā tvam arho manujarṣabha // Ram_2,85.4
GE09ram_02_u:6965: kimarthaṃ cāpi nikṣipya dūre balam ihāgataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6971: vājimukhyā manuṣyāś ca mattāś ca varavāraṇāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6972: pracchādya mahatīṃ bhūmiṃ bhagavann anuyānti mām // Ram_2,85.7
GE09ram_02_u:6974: te vṛkṣān udakaṃ bhūmim āśrameṣūṭajāṃs tathā
GE09ram_02_u:6975: na hiṃsyur iti tenāham eka evāgatas tataḥ // Ram_2,85.8
GE09ram_02_u:6978: tathā tu cakre bharataḥ senāyāḥ samupāgamam // Ram_2,85.9
GE09ram_02_u:6983: āhvaye viśvakarmāṇam ahaṃ tvaṣṭāram eva ca
GE09ram_02_u:6984: ātithyaṃ kartum icchāmi tatra me saṃvidhīyatām // Ram_2,85.11
GE09ram_02_u:6986: prāksrotasaś ca yā nadyaḥ pratyaksrotasa eva ca
GE09ram_02_u:6987: pṛthivyām antarikṣe ca samāyāntv adya sarvaśaḥ // Ram_2,85.12
GE09ram_02_u:6989: anyāḥ sravantu maireyaṃ surām anyāḥ suniṣṭhitām
GE09ram_02_u:6993: tathaivāpsaraso devīr gandharvīś cāpi sarvaśaḥ // Ram_2,85.14
GE09ram_02_u:6996: śakraṃ yāś copatiṣṭhanti brahmāṇaṃ yāś ca bhāminīḥ
GE09ram_02_u:6997: sarvās tumburuṇā sārdham āhvaye saparicchadāḥ // Ram_2,85.15
GE09ram_02_u:6999: vanaṃ kuruṣu yad divyaṃ vāso bhūṣaṇapattravat
GE09ram_02_u:7000: divyanārīphalaṃ śaśvat tat kauberam ihaiva tu // Ram_2,85.16
GE09ram_02_u:7002: iha me bhagavān somo vidhattām annam uttamam
GE09ram_02_u:7003: bhakṣyaṃ bhojyaṃ ca coṣyaṃ ca lehyaṃ ca vividhaṃ bahu // Ram_2,85.17
GE09ram_02_u:7006: surādīni ca peyāni māṃsāni vividhāni ca // Ram_2,85.18
GE09ram_02_u:7012: ājagmus tāni sarvāṇi daivatāni pṛthakpṛthak // Ram_2,85.20
GE09ram_02_u:7015: upaspṛśya vavau yuktyā supriyātmā sukhaḥ śivaḥ // Ram_2,85.21
GE09ram_02_u:7018: devadundubhighoṣaś ca dikṣu sarvāsu śuśruve // Ram_2,85.22
GE09ram_02_u:7021: prajagur devagandharvā vīṇāḥ pramumucuḥ svarān // Ram_2,85.23
GE09ram_02_u:7023: sa śabdo dyāṃ ca bhūmiṃ ca prāṇināṃ śravaṇāni ca
GE09ram_02_u:7026: tasminn uparate śabde divye śrotrasukhe nṛṇām
GE09ram_02_u:7027: dadarśa bhārataṃ sainyaṃ vidhānaṃ viśvakarmaṇaḥ // Ram_2,85.25
GE09ram_02_u:7029: babhūva hi samā bhūmiḥ samantāt pañcayojanam
GE09ram_02_u:7032: tasmin bilvāḥ kapitthāś ca panasā bījapūrakāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7033: āmalakyo babhūvuś ca cūtāś ca phalabhūṣaṇāḥ // Ram_2,85.27
GE09ram_02_u:7036: ājagāma nadī divyā tīrajair bahubhir vṛtā // Ram_2,85.28
GE09ram_02_u:7051: veśma tad ratnasampūrṇaṃ bharataḥ kaikayīsutaḥ // Ram_2,85.33
GE09ram_02_u:7053: anujagmuś ca taṃ sarve mantriṇaḥ sapurohitāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7054: babhūvuś ca mudā yuktās taṃ dṛṣṭvā veśmasaṃvidhim // Ram_2,85.34
GE09ram_02_u:7056: tatra rājāsanaṃ divyaṃ vyajanaṃ chattram eva ca
GE09ram_02_u:7057: bharato mantribhiḥ sārdham abhyavartata rājavat // Ram_2,85.35
GE09ram_02_u:7063: tataḥ senāpatiḥ paścāt praśāstā ca niṣedatuḥ // Ram_2,85.37
GE09ram_02_u:7069: ramyāś cāvasathā divyā brahmaṇas tu prasādajāḥ // Ram_2,85.39
GE09ram_02_u:7072: āgur viṃśatisāhasrā brahmaṇā prahitāḥ striyaḥ // Ram_2,85.40
GE09ram_02_u:7077: yābhir gṛhītaḥ puruṣaḥ sonmāda iva lakṣyate
GE09ram_02_u:7084: upānṛtyaṃs tu bharataṃ bharadvājasya śāsanāt // Ram_2,85.44
GE09ram_02_u:7086: yāni mālyāni deveṣu yāni caitrarathe vane
GE09ram_02_u:7087: prayāge tāny adṛśyanta bharadvājasya śāsanāt // Ram_2,85.45
GE09ram_02_u:7090: aśvatthā nartakāś cāsan bharadvājasya tejasā // Ram_2,85.46
GE09ram_02_u:7093: prahṛṣṭās tatra saṃpetuḥ kubjā bhūtvātha vāmanāḥ // Ram_2,85.47
GE09ram_02_u:7095: śiṃśapāmalakī jambūr yāś cānyāḥ kānane latāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7098: surāṃ surāpāḥ pibata pāyasaṃ ca bubhukṣitāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7099: māṃsāni ca sumedhyāni bhakṣyantāṃ yāvad icchatha // Ram_2,85.49
GE09ram_02_u:7102: apy ekam ekaṃ puruṣaṃ pramadāḥ sapta cāṣṭa ca // Ram_2,85.50
GE09ram_02_u:7105: parimṛjya tathā nyāyaṃ pāyayanti varāṅganāḥ // Ram_2,85.51
GE09ram_02_u:7107: hayān gajān kharān uṣṭrāṃs tathaiva surabheḥ sutān
GE09ram_02_u:7108: ikṣūṃś ca madhujālāṃś ca bhojayanti sma vāhanān
GE09ram_02_u:7112: mattapramattamuditā camūḥ sā tatra saṃbabhau // Ram_2,85.53
GE09ram_02_u:7118: kuśalaṃ bharatasyāstu rāmasyāstu tathā sukham // Ram_2,85.55
GE09ram_02_u:7121: anāthās taṃ vidhiṃ labdhvā vācam etām udairayan // Ram_2,85.56
GE09ram_02_u:7123: samprahṛṣṭā vinedus te narās tatra sahasraśaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7126: tato bhuktavatāṃ teṣāṃ tad annam amṛtopamam
GE09ram_02_u:7127: divyān udvīkṣya bhakṣyāṃs tān abhavad bhakṣaṇe matiḥ // Ram_2,85.58
GE09ram_02_u:7129: preṣyāś ceṭyaś ca vadhvaś ca balasthāś cāpi sarvaśaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7130: babhūvus te bhṛśaṃ tṛptāḥ sarve cāhatavāsasaḥ // Ram_2,85.59
GE09ram_02_u:7132: kuñjarāś ca kharoṣṭraś ca go'śvāś ca mṛgapakṣiṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7133: babhūvuḥ subhṛtās tatra nānyo hy anyam akalpayat // Ram_2,85.60
GE09ram_02_u:7136: rajasā dhvastakeśo vā naraḥ kaścid adṛśyata // Ram_2,85.61
GE09ram_02_u:7142: dadṛśur vismitās tatra narā lauhīḥ sahasraśaḥ // Ram_2,85.63
GE09ram_02_u:7145: tāś ca kāmadughā gāvo drumāś cāsan madhuścyutaḥ // Ram_2,85.64
GE09ram_02_u:7151: sthālyaḥ kumbhyaḥ karambhyaś ca dadhipūrṇāḥ susaṃskṛtāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7154: hradāḥ pūrṇā rasālasya dadhnaḥ śvetasya cāpare
GE09ram_02_u:7155: babhūvuḥ pāyasasyānte śarkarāyāś ca saṃcayāḥ // Ram_2,85.67
GE09ram_02_u:7157: kalkāṃś cūrṇakaṣāyāṃś ca snānāni vividhāni ca
GE09ram_02_u:7158: dadṛśur bhājanasthāni tīrtheṣu saritāṃ narāḥ // Ram_2,85.68
GE09ram_02_u:7161: śuklāṃś candanakalkāṃś ca samudgeṣv avatiṣṭhataḥ // Ram_2,85.69
GE09ram_02_u:7163: darpaṇān parimṛṣṭāṃś ca vāsasāṃ cāpi saṃcayān
GE09ram_02_u:7164: pādukopānahāṃ caiva yugmān yatra sahasraśaḥ // Ram_2,85.70
GE09ram_02_u:7166: āñjanīḥ kaṅkatān kūrcāṃś chattrāṇi ca dhanūṃṣi ca
GE09ram_02_u:7167: marmatrāṇāni citrāṇi śayanāny āsanāni ca // Ram_2,85.71
GE09ram_02_u:7170: avagāhya sutīrthāṃś ca hradān sotpalapuṣkarān // Ram_2,85.72
GE09ram_02_u:7173: nirvāpārthaṃ paśūnāṃ te dadṛśus tatra sarvaśaḥ // Ram_2,85.73
GE09ram_02_u:7175: vyasmayanta manuṣyās te svapnakalpaṃ tad adbhutam
GE09ram_02_u:7176: dṛṣṭvātithyaṃ kṛtaṃ tādṛg bharatasya maharṣiṇā // Ram_2,85.74
GE09ram_02_u:7178: ity evaṃ ramamāṇānāṃ devānām iva nandane
GE09ram_02_u:7179: bharadvājāśrame ramye sā rātrir vyatyavartata // Ram_2,85.75
GE09ram_02_u:7181: pratijagmuś ca tā nadyo gandharvāś ca yathāgatam
GE09ram_02_u:7182: bharadvājam anujñāpya tāś ca sarvā varāṅganāḥ // Ram_2,85.76
GE09ram_02_u:7184: tathaiva mattā madirotkaṭā narās tathaiva divyāgurucandanokṣitāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7185: tathaiva divyā vividhāḥ sraguttamāḥ pṛthakprakīrṇā manujaiḥ pramarditāḥ // Ram_2,85.77
GE09ram_02_u:7187: tatas tāṃ rajanīm uṣya bharataḥ saparicchadaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7188: kṛtātithyo bharadvājaṃ kāmād abhijagāma ha // Ram_2,86.1
GE09ram_02_u:7190: tam ṛṣiḥ puruṣavyāghraṃ prekṣya prāñjalim āgatam
GE09ram_02_u:7193: kaccid atra sukhā rātris tavāsmadviṣaye gatā
GE09ram_02_u:7194: samagras te janaḥ kaccid ātithye śaṃsa me 'nagha // Ram_2,86.3
GE09ram_02_u:7200: tarpitaḥ sarvakāmaiś ca sāmātyo balavat tvayā // Ram_2,86.5
GE09ram_02_u:7203: api preṣyān upādāya sarve sma susukhoṣitāḥ // Ram_2,86.6
GE09ram_02_u:7206: samīpaṃ prasthitaṃ bhrātur maitreṇekṣasva cakṣuṣā // Ram_2,86.7
GE09ram_02_u:7209: ācakṣva katamo mārgaḥ kiyān iti ca śaṃsa me // Ram_2,86.8
GE09ram_02_u:7217: uttaraṃ pārśvam āsādya tasya mandākinī nadī
GE09ram_02_u:7220: anantaraṃ tat saritaś citrakūṭaś ca parvataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7221: tayoḥ parṇakuṭī tāta tatra tau vasato dhruvam // Ram_2,86.12
GE09ram_02_u:7225: vāhayasva mahābhāga tato drakṣyasi rāghavam // Ram_2,86.13
GE09ram_02_u:7227: prayāṇam iti ca śrutvā rājarājasya yoṣitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7228: hitvā yānāni yānārhā brāhmaṇaṃ paryavārayan // Ram_2,86.14
GE09ram_02_u:7230: vepamānā kṛśā dīnā saha devyā sumitrayā
GE09ram_02_u:7231: kausalyā tatra jagrāha karābhyāṃ caraṇau muneḥ // Ram_2,86.15
GE09ram_02_u:7234: kaikeyī tasya jagrāha caraṇau savyapatrapā // Ram_2,86.16
GE09ram_02_u:7237: adūrād bharatasyaiva tasthau dīnamanās tadā // Ram_2,86.17
GE09ram_02_u:7240: viśeṣaṃ jñātum icchāmi mātṝṇāṃ tava rāghava // Ram_2,86.18
GE09ram_02_u:7242: evam uktas tu bharato bharadvājena dhārmikaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7243: uvāca prāñjalir bhūtvā vākyaṃ vacanakovidaḥ // Ram_2,86.19
GE09ram_02_u:7246: pitur hi mahiṣīṃ devīṃ devatām iva paśyasi // Ram_2,86.20
GE09ram_02_u:7249: kausalyā suṣuve rāmaṃ dhātāram aditir yathā // Ram_2,86.21
GE09ram_02_u:7251: asyā vāmabhujaṃ śliṣṭā yaiṣā tiṣṭhati durmanāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7254: etasyās tau sutau devyāḥ kumārau devavarṇinau
GE09ram_02_u:7257: yasyāḥ kṛte naravyāghrau jīvanāśam ito gatau
GE09ram_02_u:7258: rājā putravihīnaś ca svargaṃ daśaratho gataḥ // Ram_2,86.24
GE09ram_02_u:7262: yatomūlaṃ hi paśyāmi vyasanaṃ mahad ātmanaḥ // Ram_2,86.25
GE09ram_02_u:7265: sa niśaśvāsa tāmrākṣo nāgaḥ kruddha ivāsakṛt // Ram_2,86.26
GE09ram_02_u:7267: bharadvājo maharṣis taṃ bruvantaṃ bharataṃ tadā
GE09ram_02_u:7268: pratyuvāca mahābuddhir idaṃ vacanam arthavat // Ram_2,86.27
GE09ram_02_u:7271: rāmapravrājanaṃ hy etat sukhodarkaṃ bhaviṣyati // Ram_2,86.28
GE09ram_02_u:7273: abhivādya tu saṃsiddhaḥ kṛtvā cainaṃ pradakṣiṇam
GE09ram_02_u:7274: āmantrya bharataḥ sainyaṃ yujyatām ity acodayat // Ram_2,86.29
GE09ram_02_u:7277: adhyārohat prayāṇārthī bahūn bahuvidho janaḥ // Ram_2,86.30
GE09ram_02_u:7280: jīmūtā iva gharmānte saghoṣāḥ sampratasthire // Ram_2,86.31
GE09ram_02_u:7282: vividhāny api yānāni mahānti ca laghūni ca
GE09ram_02_u:7283: prayayuḥ sumahārhāṇi pādair eva padātayaḥ // Ram_2,86.32
GE09ram_02_u:7289: āsthāya prayayau śrīmān bharataḥ saparicchadaḥ // Ram_2,86.34
GE09ram_02_u:7293: vanāni tu vyatikramya juṣṭāni mṛgapakṣibhiḥ // Ram_2,86.35
GE09ram_02_u:7296: mahad vanaṃ tat pravigāhamānā rarāja senā bharatasya tatra // Ram_2,86.36
GE09ram_02_u:7299: arditā yūthapā mattāḥ sayūthāḥ sampradudruvuḥ // Ram_2,87.1
GE09ram_02_u:7301: ṛkṣāḥ pṛṣatasaṃghāś ca ruravaś ca samantataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7302: dṛśyante vanarājīṣu giriṣv api nadīṣu ca // Ram_2,87.2
GE09ram_02_u:7305: vṛto mahatyā nādinyā senayā caturaṅgayā // Ram_2,87.3
GE09ram_02_u:7308: mahīṃ saṃchādayāmāsa prāvṛṣi dyām ivāmbudaḥ // Ram_2,87.4
GE09ram_02_u:7311: anālakṣyā ciraṃ kālaṃ tasmin kāle babhūva bhūḥ // Ram_2,87.5
GE09ram_02_u:7314: uvāca bharataḥ śrīmān vasiṣṭhaṃ mantriṇāṃ varam // Ram_2,87.6
GE09ram_02_u:7316: yādṛśaṃ lakṣyate rūpaṃ yathā caiva śrutaṃ mayā
GE09ram_02_u:7317: vyaktaṃ prāptāḥ sma taṃ deśaṃ bharadvājo yam abravīt // Ram_2,87.7
GE09ram_02_u:7319: ayaṃ giriś citrakūṭas tathā mandākinī nadī
GE09ram_02_u:7320: etat prakāśate dūrān nīlameghanibhaṃ vanam // Ram_2,87.8
GE09ram_02_u:7326: nīlā ivātapāpāye toyaṃ toyadharā ghanāḥ // Ram_2,87.10
GE09ram_02_u:7329: hayaiḥ samantād ākīrṇaṃ makarair iva sāgaram // Ram_2,87.11
GE09ram_02_u:7335: meghaprakāśaiḥ phalakair dākṣiṇātyā yathā narāḥ // Ram_2,87.13
GE09ram_02_u:7338: ayodhyeva janākīrṇā samprati pratibhāti mā // Ram_2,87.14
GE09ram_02_u:7340: khurair udīrito reṇur divaṃ pracchādya tiṣṭhati
GE09ram_02_u:7341: taṃ vahaty anilaḥ śīghraṃ kurvann iva mama priyam // Ram_2,87.15
GE09ram_02_u:7344: etān saṃpatataḥ śīghraṃ paśya śatrughna kānane // Ram_2,87.16
GE09ram_02_u:7347: etam āviśataḥ śailam adhivāsaṃ patatriṇām // Ram_2,87.17
GE09ram_02_u:7349: atimātram ayaṃ deśo manojñaḥ pratibhāti mā
GE09ram_02_u:7350: tāpasānāṃ nivāso 'yaṃ vyaktaṃ svargapatho yathā // Ram_2,87.18
GE09ram_02_u:7352: mṛgā mṛgībhiḥ sahitā bahavaḥ pṛṣatā vane
GE09ram_02_u:7353: manojñarūpā lakṣyante kusumair iva citritāḥ // Ram_2,87.19
GE09ram_02_u:7355: sādhu sainyāḥ pratiṣṭhantāṃ vicinvantu ca kānanam
GE09ram_02_u:7356: yathā tau puruṣavyāghrau dṛśyete rāmalakṣmaṇau // Ram_2,87.20
GE09ram_02_u:7359: viviśus tad vanaṃ śūrā dhūmaṃ ca dadṛśus tataḥ // Ram_2,87.21
GE09ram_02_u:7361: te samālokya dhūmāgram ūcur bharatam āgatāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7362: nāmanuṣye bhavaty agnir vyaktam atraiva rāghavau // Ram_2,87.22
GE09ram_02_u:7365: anye rāmopamāḥ santi vyaktam atra tapasvinaḥ // Ram_2,87.23
GE09ram_02_u:7367: tac chrutvā bharatas teṣāṃ vacanaṃ sādhusaṃmatam
GE09ram_02_u:7368: sainyān uvāca sarvāṃs tān amitrabalamardanaḥ // Ram_2,87.24
GE09ram_02_u:7370: yattā bhavantas tiṣṭhantu neto gantavyam agrataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7371: aham eva gamiṣyāmi sumantro gurur eva ca // Ram_2,87.25
GE09ram_02_u:7373: evam uktās tataḥ sarve tatra tasthuḥ samantataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7374: bharato yatra dhūmāgraṃ tatra dṛṣṭiṃ samādadhāt // Ram_2,87.26
GE09ram_02_u:7376: vyavasthitā yā bharatena sā camūr nirīkṣamāṇāpi ca dhūmam agrataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7377: babhūva hṛṣṭā nacireṇa jānatī priyasya rāmasya samāgamaṃ tadā // Ram_2,87.27
GE09ram_02_u:7380: vaidehyāḥ priyamākāṅkṣan svaṃ ca cittaṃ vilobhayan // Ram_2,88.1
GE09ram_02_u:7383: bhāryām amarasaṃkāśaḥ śacīm iva puraṃdaraḥ // Ram_2,88.2
GE09ram_02_u:7385: na rājyād bhraṃśanaṃ bhadre na suhṛdbhir vinābhavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7386: mano me bādhate dṛṣṭvā ramaṇīyam imaṃ girim // Ram_2,88.3
GE09ram_02_u:7389: śikharaiḥ kham ivodviddhair dhātumadbhir vibhūṣitam // Ram_2,88.4
GE09ram_02_u:7398: aduṣṭair bhāty ayaṃ śailo bahupakṣisamākulaḥ // Ram_2,88.7
GE09ram_02_u:7407: evamādibhir ākīrṇaḥ śriyaṃ puṣyaty ayaṃ giriḥ // Ram_2,88.10
GE09ram_02_u:7410: kiṃnarān dvaṃdvaśo bhadre ramamāṇān manasvinaḥ // Ram_2,88.11
GE09ram_02_u:7412: śākhāvasaktān khaḍgāṃś ca pravarāṇy ambarāṇi ca
GE09ram_02_u:7415: jalaprapātair udbhedair nisyandaiś ca kvacit kvacit
GE09ram_02_u:7416: sravadbhir bhāty ayaṃ śailaḥ sravan mada iva dvipaḥ // Ram_2,88.13
GE09ram_02_u:7419: ghrāṇatarpaṇam abhyetya kaṃ naraṃ na praharṣayet // Ram_2,88.14
GE09ram_02_u:7422: lakṣmaṇena ca vatsyāmi na māṃ śokaḥ pradhakṣyati // Ram_2,88.15
GE09ram_02_u:7425: vicitraśikhare hy asmin ratavān asmi bhāmini // Ram_2,88.16
GE09ram_02_u:7428: pituś cānṛṇatā dharme bharatasya priyaṃ tathā // Ram_2,88.17
GE09ram_02_u:7430: vaidehi ramase kaccic citrakūṭe mayā saha
GE09ram_02_u:7433: idam evāmṛtaṃ prāhū rājñāṃ rājarṣayaḥ pare
GE09ram_02_u:7434: vanavāsaṃ bhavārthāya pretya me prapitāmahāḥ // Ram_2,88.19
GE09ram_02_u:7440: oṣadhyaḥ svaprabhā lakṣmyā bhrājamānāḥ sahasraśaḥ // Ram_2,88.21
GE09ram_02_u:7443: kecid ekaśilā bhānti parvatasyāsya bhāmini // Ram_2,88.22
GE09ram_02_u:7446: citrakūṭasya kūṭo 'sau dṛśyate sarvataḥ śivaḥ // Ram_2,88.23
GE09ram_02_u:7452: kāmibhir vanite paśya phalāni vividhāni ca // Ram_2,88.25
GE09ram_02_u:7457: imaṃ tu kālaṃ vanite vijahrivāṃs tvayā ca sīte saha lakṣmaṇena ca
GE09ram_02_u:7458: ratiṃ prapatsye kuladharmavardhinīṃ satāṃ pathi svair niyamaiḥ paraiḥ sthitaḥ // Ram_2,88.27
GE09ram_02_u:7461: adarśayac chubhajalāṃ ramyāṃ mandākinīṃ nadīm // Ram_2,89.1
GE09ram_02_u:7467: kusumair upasaṃpannāṃ paśya mandākinīṃ nadīm // Ram_2,89.3
GE09ram_02_u:7470: rājantīṃ rājarājasya nalinīm iva sarvataḥ // Ram_2,89.4
GE09ram_02_u:7473: tīrthāni ramaṇīyāni ratiṃ saṃjanayanti me // Ram_2,89.5
GE09ram_02_u:7476: ṛṣayas tv avagāhante nadīṃ mandākinīṃ priye // Ram_2,89.6
GE09ram_02_u:7482: pādapaiḥ pattrapuṣpāṇi sṛjadbhir abhito nadīm // Ram_2,89.8
GE09ram_02_u:7485: kaccit siddhajanākīrṇāṃ paśya mandākinīṃ nadīm // Ram_2,89.9
GE09ram_02_u:7488: poplūyamānān aparān paśya tvaṃ jalamadhyagān // Ram_2,89.10
GE09ram_02_u:7491: adhirohanti kalyāṇi niṣkūjantaḥ śubhā giraḥ // Ram_2,89.11
GE09ram_02_u:7494: adhikaṃ puravāsāc ca manye ca tava darśanāt // Ram_2,89.12
GE09ram_02_u:7499: sakhīvac ca vigāhasva sīte mandākinīm imām
GE09ram_02_u:7500: kamalāny avamajjantī puṣkarāṇi ca bhāmini // Ram_2,89.14
GE09ram_02_u:7502: tvaṃ paurajanavad vyālān ayodhyām iva parvatam
GE09ram_02_u:7503: manyasva vanite nityaṃ sarayūvad imāṃ nadīm // Ram_2,89.15
GE09ram_02_u:7506: tvaṃ cānukūlā vaidehi prītiṃ janayatho mama // Ram_2,89.16
GE09ram_02_u:7509: nāyodhyāyai na rājyāya spṛhaye 'dya tvayā saha // Ram_2,89.17
GE09ram_02_u:7511: imāṃ hi ramyāṃ gajayūthalolitāṃ nipītatoyāṃ gajasiṃhavānaraiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7512: supuṣpitaiḥ puṣpadharair alaṃkṛtāṃ na so 'sti yaḥ syān na gatakramaḥ sukhī // Ram_2,89.18
GE09ram_02_u:7514: itīva rāmo bahusaṃgataṃ vacaḥ priyāsahāyaḥ saritaṃ prati bruvan
GE09ram_02_u:7515: cacāra ramyaṃ nayanāñjanaprabhaṃ sa citrakūṭaṃ raghuvaṃśavardhanaḥ // Ram_2,89.19
GE09ram_02_u:7518: sainyareṇuś ca śabdaś ca prādurāstāṃ nabhaḥspṛśau // Ram_2,90.1
GE09ram_02_u:7520: etasminn antare trastāḥ śabdena mahatā tataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7521: arditā yūthapā mattāḥ sayūthā dudruvur diśaḥ // Ram_2,90.2
GE09ram_02_u:7523: sa taṃ sainyasamudbhūtaṃ śabdaṃ śuśrava rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7524: tāṃś ca vipradrutān sarvān yūthapān anvavaikṣata // Ram_2,90.3
GE09ram_02_u:7526: tāṃś ca vidravato dṛṣṭvā taṃ ca śrutvā sa niḥsvanam
GE09ram_02_u:7527: uvāca rāmaḥ saumitriṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ dīptatejasam // Ram_2,90.4
GE09ram_02_u:7529: hanta lakṣmaṇa paśyeha sumitrā suprajās tvayā
GE09ram_02_u:7532: rājā vā rājamātro vā mṛgayām aṭate vane
GE09ram_02_u:7533: anyad vā śvāpadaṃ kiṃcit saumitre jñātum arhasi
GE09ram_02_u:7534: sarvam etad yathātattvam acirāj jñātum arhasi // Ram_2,90.6
GE09ram_02_u:7536: sa lakṣmaṇaḥ saṃtvaritaḥ sālam āruhya puṣpitam
GE09ram_02_u:7537: prekṣamāṇo diśaḥ sarvāḥ pūrvāṃ diśam avaikṣata // Ram_2,90.7
GE09ram_02_u:7543: śaśaṃsa senāṃ rāmāya vacanaṃ cedam abravīt // Ram_2,90.9
GE09ram_02_u:7545: agniṃ saṃśamayatv āryaḥ sītā ca bhajatāṃ guhām
GE09ram_02_u:7546: sajyaṃ kuruṣva cāpaṃ ca śarāṃś ca kavacaṃ tathā // Ram_2,90.10
GE09ram_02_u:7548: taṃ rāmaḥ puruṣavyāghro lakṣmaṇaṃ pratyuvāca ha
GE09ram_02_u:7549: aṅgāvekṣasva saumitre kasyaitāṃ manyase camūm // Ram_2,90.11
GE09ram_02_u:7551: evam uktas tu rāmeṇa lakṣmaṇo vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:7552: didhakṣann iva tāṃ senāṃ ruṣitaḥ pāvako yathā // Ram_2,90.12
GE09ram_02_u:7554: sampannaṃ rājyam icchaṃs tu vyaktaṃ prāpyābhiṣecanam
GE09ram_02_u:7555: āvāṃ hantuṃ samabhyeti kaikeyyā bharataḥ sutaḥ // Ram_2,90.13
GE09ram_02_u:7557: eṣa vai sumahāñ śrīmān viṭapī saṃprakāśate
GE09ram_02_u:7560: bhajanty ete yathākāmam aśvān āruhya śīghragān
GE09ram_02_u:7561: ete bhrājanti saṃhṛṣṭā gajān āruhya sādinaḥ // Ram_2,90.15
GE09ram_02_u:7564: api nau vaśam āgacchet kovidāradhvajo raṇe // Ram_2,90.16
GE09ram_02_u:7566: api drakṣyāmi bharataṃ yatkṛte vyasanaṃ mahat
GE09ram_02_u:7567: tvayā rāghava samprāptaṃ sītayā ca mayā tathā // Ram_2,90.17
GE09ram_02_u:7569: yannimittaṃ bhavān rājyāc cyuto rāghava śāśvatāt
GE09ram_02_u:7570: samprāpto 'yam arir vīra bharato vadhya eva me // Ram_2,90.18
GE09ram_02_u:7572: bharatasya vadhe doṣaṃ nāhaṃ paśyāmi rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:7573: pūrvāpakāriṇāṃ tyāge na hy adharmo vidhīyate
GE09ram_02_u:7574: etasmin nihate kṛtsnām anuśādhi vasuṃdharām // Ram_2,90.19
GE09ram_02_u:7576: adya putraṃ hataṃ saṃkhye kaikeyī rājyakāmukā
GE09ram_02_u:7577: mayā paśyet suduḥkhārtā hastibhagnam iva drumam // Ram_2,90.20
GE09ram_02_u:7582: adyemaṃ saṃyataṃ krodham asatkāraṃ ca mānada
GE09ram_02_u:7583: mokṣyāmi śatrusainyeṣu kakṣeṣv iva hutāśanam // Ram_2,90.22
GE09ram_02_u:7589: śvāpadāḥ parikarṣantu narāṃś ca nihatān mayā // Ram_2,90.24
GE09ram_02_u:7592: sasainyaṃ bharataṃ hatvā bhaviṣyāmi na saṃśayaḥ // Ram_2,90.25
GE09ram_02_u:7595: rāmas tu parisāntvyātha vacanaṃ cedam abravīt // Ram_2,91.1
GE09ram_02_u:7597: kim atra dhanuṣā kāryam asinā vā sacarmaṇā
GE09ram_02_u:7598: maheṣvāse mahāprājñe bharate svayam āgate // Ram_2,91.2
GE09ram_02_u:7600: prāptakālaṃ yad eṣo 'smān bharato draṣṭum icchati
GE09ram_02_u:7601: asmāsu manasāpy eṣa nāhitaṃ kiṃcid ācaret // Ram_2,91.3
GE09ram_02_u:7603: vipriyaṃ kṛtapūrvaṃ te bharatena kadā na kim
GE09ram_02_u:7604: īdṛśaṃ vā bhayaṃ te 'dya bharataṃ yo 'tra śaṅkase // Ram_2,91.4
GE09ram_02_u:7606: na hi te niṣṭhuraṃ vācyo bharato nāpriyaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7607: ahaṃ hy apriyam uktaḥ syāṃ bharatasyāpriye kṛte // Ram_2,91.5
GE09ram_02_u:7609: kathaṃ nu putrāḥ pitaraṃ hanyuḥ kasyāṃcid āpadi
GE09ram_02_u:7610: bhrātā vā bhrātaraṃ hanyāt saumitre prāṇam ātmanaḥ // Ram_2,91.6
GE09ram_02_u:7612: yadi rājyasya hetos tvam imāṃ vācaṃ prabhāṣase
GE09ram_02_u:7613: vakṣyāmi bharataṃ dṛṣṭvā rājyam asmai pradīyatām // Ram_2,91.7
GE09ram_02_u:7615: ucyamāno hi bharato mayā lakṣmaṇa tattvataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7616: rājyam asmai prayaccheti bāḍham ity eva vakṣyati // Ram_2,91.8
GE09ram_02_u:7618: tathokto dharmaśīlena bhrātrā tasya hite rataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7619: lakṣmaṇaḥ praviveśeva svāni gātrāṇi lajjayā // Ram_2,91.9
GE09ram_02_u:7621: vrīḍitaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā rāghavaḥ pratyuvāca ha
GE09ram_02_u:7622: eṣa manye mahābāhur ihāsmān draṣṭum āgataḥ // Ram_2,91.10
GE09ram_02_u:7625: imāṃ vāpy eṣa vaidehīm atyantasukhasevinīm // Ram_2,91.11
GE09ram_02_u:7631: nāgaḥ śatruṃjayo nāma vṛddhas tātasya dhīmataḥ // Ram_2,91.13
GE09ram_02_u:7633: avatīrya tu sālāgrāt tasmāt sa samitiṃjayaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7634: lakṣmaṇaḥ prāñjalir bhūtvā tasthau rāmasya pārśvataḥ // Ram_2,91.14
GE09ram_02_u:7636: bharatenātha saṃdiṣṭā sammardo na bhaved iti
GE09ram_02_u:7637: samantāt tasya śailasya senāvāsam akalpayat // Ram_2,91.15
GE09ram_02_u:7642: sā citrakūṭe bharatena senā dharmaṃ puraskṛtya vidhūya darpam
GE09ram_02_u:7643: prasādanārthaṃ raghunandanasya virocate nītimatā praṇītā // Ram_2,91.17
GE09ram_02_u:7645: niveśya senāṃ tu vibhuḥ padbhyāṃ pādavatāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7646: abhigantuṃ sa kākutstham iyeṣa guruvartakam // Ram_2,92.1
GE09ram_02_u:7649: bharato bhrātaraṃ vākyaṃ śatrughnam idam abravīt // Ram_2,92.2
GE09ram_02_u:7651: kṣipraṃ vanam idaṃ saumya narasaṃghaiḥ samantataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7652: lubdhaiś ca sahitair ebhis tvam anveṣitum arhasi // Ram_2,92.3
GE09ram_02_u:7654: yāvan na rāmaṃ drakṣyāmi lakṣmaṇaṃ vā mahābalam
GE09ram_02_u:7655: vaidehīṃ vā mahābhāgāṃ na me śāntir bhaviṣyati // Ram_2,92.4
GE09ram_02_u:7657: yāvan na candrasaṃkāśaṃ drakṣyāmi śubham ānanam
GE09ram_02_u:7658: bhrātuḥ padmapalāśākṣaṃ na me śāntir bhaviṣyati // Ram_2,92.5
GE09ram_02_u:7661: śirasā dhārayiṣyāmi na me śāntir bhaviṣyati // Ram_2,92.6
GE09ram_02_u:7663: yāvan na rājye rājyārhaḥ pitṛpaitāmahe sthitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7664: abhiṣekajalaklinno na me śāntir bhaviṣyati // Ram_2,92.7
GE09ram_02_u:7670: yasmin vasati kākutsthaḥ kubera iva nandane // Ram_2,92.9
GE09ram_02_u:7673: yad adhyāste mahātejā rāmaḥ śastrabhṛtāṃ varaḥ // Ram_2,92.10
GE09ram_02_u:7676: padbhyām eva mahātejāḥ praviveśa mahad vanam // Ram_2,92.11
GE09ram_02_u:7679: puṣpitāgrāṇi madhyena jagāma vadatāṃ varaḥ // Ram_2,92.12
GE09ram_02_u:7681: sa gireś citrakūṭasya sālam āsādya puṣpitam
GE09ram_02_u:7684: taṃ dṛṣṭvā bharataḥ śrīmān mumoda sahabāndhavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7685: atra rāma iti jñātvā gataḥ pāram ivāmbhasaḥ // Ram_2,92.14
GE09ram_02_u:7687: sa citrakūṭe tu girau niśāmya rāmāśramaṃ puṇyajanopapannam
GE09ram_02_u:7688: guhena sārdhaṃ tvarito jagāma punar niveśyaiva camūṃ mahātmā // Ram_2,92.15
GE09ram_02_u:7690: niviṣṭāyāṃ tu senāyām utsuko bharatas tadā
GE09ram_02_u:7691: jagāma bhrātaraṃ draṣṭuṃ śatrughnam anudarśayan // Ram_2,93.1
GE09ram_02_u:7693: ṛṣiṃ vasiṣṭhaṃ saṃdiśya mātṝn me śīghram ānaya
GE09ram_02_u:7694: iti tvaritam agre sa jagāma guruvatsalaḥ // Ram_2,93.2
GE09ram_02_u:7696: sumantras tv api śatrughnam adūrād anvapadyata
GE09ram_02_u:7697: rāmadarśanajas tarṣo bharatasyeva tasya ca // Ram_2,93.3
GE09ram_02_u:7700: bhrātuḥ parṇakuṭīṃ śrīmān uṭajaṃ ca dadarśa ha // Ram_2,93.4
GE09ram_02_u:7702: śālāyās tv agratas tasyā dadarśa bharatas tadā
GE09ram_02_u:7703: kāṣṭhāni cāvabhagnāni puṣpāṇy avacitāni ca // Ram_2,93.5
GE09ram_02_u:7705: dadarśa ca vane tasmin mahataḥ saṃcayān kṛtān
GE09ram_02_u:7706: mṛgāṇāṃ mahiṣāṇāṃ ca karīṣaiḥ śītakāraṇāt // Ram_2,93.6
GE09ram_02_u:7708: gacchan eva mahābāhur dyutimān bharatas tadā
GE09ram_02_u:7709: śatrughnaṃ cābravīd dhṛṣṭas tān amātyāṃś ca sarvaśaḥ // Ram_2,93.7
GE09ram_02_u:7711: manye prāptāḥ sma taṃ deśaṃ bharadvājo yam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:7712: nātidūre hi manye 'haṃ nadīṃ mandākinīm itaḥ // Ram_2,93.8
GE09ram_02_u:7714: uccair baddhāni cīrāṇi lakṣmaṇena bhaved ayam
GE09ram_02_u:7715: abhijñānakṛtaḥ panthā vikāle gantum icchatā // Ram_2,93.9
GE09ram_02_u:7720: yam evādhātum icchanti tāpasāḥ satataṃ vane
GE09ram_02_u:7721: tasyāsau dṛśyate dhūmaḥ saṃkulaḥ kṛṣṇavartmanaḥ // Ram_2,93.11
GE09ram_02_u:7724: āryaṃ drakṣyāmi saṃhṛṣṭo maharṣim iva rāghavam // Ram_2,93.12
GE09ram_02_u:7726: atha gatvā muhūrtaṃ tu citrakūṭaṃ sa rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7727: mandākinīm anuprāptas taṃ janaṃ cedam abravīt // Ram_2,93.13
GE09ram_02_u:7730: janendro nirjanaṃ prāpya dhin me janma sajīvitam // Ram_2,93.14
GE09ram_02_u:7733: sarvān kāmān parityajya vane vasati rāghavaḥ // Ram_2,93.15
GE09ram_02_u:7736: rāmasya nipatiṣyāmi sītāyāś ca punaḥ punaḥ // Ram_2,93.16
GE09ram_02_u:7738: evaṃ sa vilapaṃs tasmin vane daśarathātmajaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7739: dadarśa mahatīṃ puṇyāṃ parṇaśālāṃ manoramām // Ram_2,93.17
GE09ram_02_u:7742: viśālāṃ mṛdubhis tīrṇāṃ kuśair vedim ivādhvare // Ram_2,93.18
GE09ram_02_u:7748: śobhitāṃ dīptavadanaiḥ sarpair bhogavatīm iva // Ram_2,93.20
GE09ram_02_u:7754: arisaṃghair anādhṛṣyāṃ mṛgaiḥ siṃhaguhām iva // Ram_2,93.22
GE09ram_02_u:7757: dadarśa bharatas tatra puṇyāṃ rāmaniveśane // Ram_2,93.23
GE09ram_02_u:7759: nirīkṣya sa muhūrtaṃ tu dadarśa bharato gurum
GE09ram_02_u:7763: dadarśa rāmam āsīnam abhitaḥ pāvakopamam // Ram_2,93.25
GE09ram_02_u:7769: sthaṇḍile darbhasaṃstīrṇe sītayā lakṣmaṇena ca // Ram_2,93.27
GE09ram_02_u:7775: aśaknuvan dhārayituṃ dhairyād vacanam abravīt // Ram_2,93.29
GE09ram_02_u:7777: yaḥ saṃsadi prakṛtibhir bhaved yukta upāsitum
GE09ram_02_u:7778: vanyair mṛgair upāsīnaḥ so 'yam āste mamāgrajaḥ // Ram_2,93.30
GE09ram_02_u:7781: mṛgājine so 'yam iha pravaste dharmam ācaran // Ram_2,93.31
GE09ram_02_u:7783: adhārayad yo vividhāś citrāḥ sumanasas tadā
GE09ram_02_u:7784: so 'yaṃ jaṭābhāram imaṃ sahate rāghavaḥ katham // Ram_2,93.32
GE09ram_02_u:7786: yasya yajñair yathādiṣṭair yukto dharmasya saṃcayaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7790: malena tasyāṅgam idaṃ katham āryasya sevyate // Ram_2,93.34
GE09ram_02_u:7792: mannimittam idaṃ duḥkhaṃ prāpto rāmaḥ sukhocitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7793: dhig jīvitaṃ nṛśaṃsasya mama lokavigarhitam // Ram_2,93.35
GE09ram_02_u:7796: pādāv aprāpya rāmasya papāta bharato rudan // Ram_2,93.36
GE09ram_02_u:7799: uktvāryeti sakṛd dīnaṃ punar novāca kiṃcana // Ram_2,93.37
GE09ram_02_u:7802: āryety evābhisaṃkruśya vyāhartuṃ nāśakat tataḥ // Ram_2,93.38
GE09ram_02_u:7804: śatrughnaś cāpi rāmasya vavande caraṇau rudan
GE09ram_02_u:7805: tāv ubhau sa samāliṅgya rāmo 'py aśrūṇy avartayat // Ram_2,93.39
GE09ram_02_u:7807: tataḥ sumantreṇa guhena caiva samīyatū rājasutāv araṇye
GE09ram_02_u:7808: divākaraś caiva niśākaraś ca yathāmbare śukrabṛhaspatibhyām // Ram_2,93.40
GE09ram_02_u:7810: tān pārthivān vāraṇayūthapābhān samāgatāṃs tatra mahaty araṇye
GE09ram_02_u:7811: vanaukasas te 'pi samīkṣya sarve 'py aśrūṇy amuñcan pravihāya harṣam // Ram_2,93.41
GE09ram_02_u:7813: āghrāya rāmas taṃ mūrdhni pariṣvajya ca rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7814: aṅke bharatam āropya paryapṛcchat samāhitaḥ // Ram_2,94.1
GE09ram_02_u:7816: kva nu te 'bhūt pitā tāta yad araṇyaṃ tvam āgataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7817: na hi tvaṃ jīvatas tasya vanam āgantum arhasi // Ram_2,94.2
GE09ram_02_u:7819: cirasya bata paśyāmi dūrād bharatam āgatam
GE09ram_02_u:7820: duṣpratīkam araṇye 'smin kiṃ tāta vanam āgataḥ // Ram_2,94.3
GE09ram_02_u:7825: sa kaccid brāhmaṇo vidvān dharmanityo mahādyutiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7826: ikṣvākūṇām upādhyāyo yathāvat tāta pūjyate // Ram_2,94.5
GE09ram_02_u:7828: tāta kaccic ca kausalyā sumitrā ca prajāvatī
GE09ram_02_u:7829: sukhinī kaccid āryā ca devī nandati kaikayī // Ram_2,94.6
GE09ram_02_u:7832: anasūyur anudraṣṭā satkṛtas te purohitaḥ // Ram_2,94.7
GE09ram_02_u:7834: kaccid agniṣu te yukto vidhijño matimān ṛjuḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7835: hutaṃ ca hoṣyamāṇaṃ ca kāle vedayate sadā // Ram_2,94.8
GE09ram_02_u:7838: sudhanvānam upādhyāyaṃ kaccit tvaṃ tāta manyase // Ram_2,94.9
GE09ram_02_u:7841: kulīnāś ceṅgitajñāś ca kṛtās te tāta mantriṇaḥ // Ram_2,94.10
GE09ram_02_u:7843: mantro vijayamūlaṃ hi rājñāṃ bhavati rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:7846: kaccin nidrāvaśaṃ naiṣi kaccit kāle vibudhyase
GE09ram_02_u:7849: kaccin mantrayase naikaḥ kaccin na bahubhiḥ saha
GE09ram_02_u:7850: kaccit te mantrito mantro rāṣṭraṃ na paridhāvati // Ram_2,94.13
GE09ram_02_u:7853: kṣipram ārabhase kartuṃ na dīrghayasi rāghava // Ram_2,94.14
GE09ram_02_u:7855: kaccit tu sukṛtāny eva kṛtarūpāṇi vā punaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7856: vidus te sarvakāryāṇi na kartavyāni pārthivāḥ // Ram_2,94.15
GE09ram_02_u:7858: kaccin na tarkair yuktvā vā ye cāpy aparikīrtitāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7859: tvayā vā tava vāmātyair budhyate tāta mantritam // Ram_2,94.16
GE09ram_02_u:7861: kaccit sahasrān mūrkhāṇām ekam icchasi paṇḍitam
GE09ram_02_u:7862: paṇḍito hy arthakṛcchreṣu kuryān niḥśreyasaṃ mahat // Ram_2,94.17
GE09ram_02_u:7864: sahasrāṇy api mūrkhāṇāṃ yady upāste mahīpatiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7865: atha vāpy ayutāny eva nāsti teṣu sahāyatā // Ram_2,94.18
GE09ram_02_u:7867: eko 'py amātyo medhāvī śūro dakṣo vicakṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7868: rājānaṃ rājamātraṃ vā prāpayen mahatīṃ śriyam // Ram_2,94.19
GE09ram_02_u:7870: kaccin mukhyā mahatsv eva madhyameṣu ca madhyamāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7871: jaghanyāś ca jaghanyeṣu bhṛtyāḥ karmasu yojitāḥ // Ram_2,94.20
GE09ram_02_u:7874: śreṣṭhāñ śreṣṭheṣu kaccit tvaṃ niyojayasi karmasu // Ram_2,94.21
GE09ram_02_u:7876: kaccit tvāṃ nāvajānanti yājakāḥ patitaṃ yathā
GE09ram_02_u:7880: śūram aiśvaryakāmaṃ ca yo na hanti sa vadhyate // Ram_2,94.23
GE09ram_02_u:7882: kaccid dhṛṣṭaś ca śūraś ca dhṛtimān matimāñ śuciḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7883: kulīnaś cānuraktaś ca dakṣaḥ senāpatiḥ kṛtaḥ // Ram_2,94.24
GE09ram_02_u:7885: balavantaś ca kaccit te mukhyā yuddhaviśāradāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7886: dṛṣṭāpadānā vikrāntās tvayā satkṛtya mānitāḥ // Ram_2,94.25
GE09ram_02_u:7888: kaccid balasya bhaktaṃ ca vetanaṃ ca yathocitam
GE09ram_02_u:7889: samprāptakālaṃ dātavyaṃ dadāsi na vilambase // Ram_2,94.26
GE09ram_02_u:7892: bhartuḥ kupyanti duṣyanti so 'narthaḥ sumahān smṛtaḥ // Ram_2,94.27
GE09ram_02_u:7895: kaccit prāṇāṃs tavārtheṣu saṃtyajanti samāhitāḥ // Ram_2,94.28
GE09ram_02_u:7898: yathoktavādī dūtas te kṛto bharata paṇḍitaḥ // Ram_2,94.29
GE09ram_02_u:7900: kaccid aṣṭādaśāny eṣu svapakṣe daśa pañca ca
GE09ram_02_u:7901: tribhis tribhir avijñātair vetsi tīrthāni cārakaiḥ // Ram_2,94.30
GE09ram_02_u:7903: kaccid vyapāstān ahitān pratiyātāṃś ca sarvadā
GE09ram_02_u:7906: kaccin na lokāyatikān brāhmaṇāṃs tāta sevase
GE09ram_02_u:7907: anarthakuśalā hy ete bālāḥ paṇḍitamāninaḥ // Ram_2,94.32
GE09ram_02_u:7910: buddhimān vīkṣikīṃ prāpya nirarthaṃ pravadanti te // Ram_2,94.33
GE09ram_02_u:7912: vīrair adhyuṣitāṃ pūrvam asmākaṃ tāta pūrvakaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7916: jitendriyair mahotsāhair vṛtām āryaiḥ sahasraśaḥ // Ram_2,94.35
GE09ram_02_u:7919: kaccit samuditāṃ sphītām ayodhyāṃ parirakṣasi // Ram_2,94.36
GE09ram_02_u:7922: devasthānaiḥ prapābhiś ca taḍāgaiś copaśobhitaḥ // Ram_2,94.37
GE09ram_02_u:7928: kaccij janapadaḥ sphītaḥ sukhaṃ vasati rāghava // Ram_2,94.39
GE09ram_02_u:7931: vārttāyāṃ saṃśritas tāta loko hi sukham edhate // Ram_2,94.40
GE09ram_02_u:7933: teṣāṃ guptiparīhāraiḥ kaccit te bharaṇaṃ kṛtam
GE09ram_02_u:7934: rakṣyā hi rājñā dharmeṇa sarve viṣayavāsinaḥ // Ram_2,94.41
GE09ram_02_u:7936: kaccit striyaḥ sāntvayasi kaccit tāś ca surakṣitāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7937: kaccin na śraddadhāsyāsāṃ kaccid guhyaṃ na bhāṣase // Ram_2,94.42
GE09ram_02_u:7939: kaccin nāgavanaṃ guptaṃ kuñjarāṇāṃ ca tṛpyasi
GE09ram_02_u:7944: yantraiś ca paripūrṇāni tathā śilpidhanurdharaiḥ // Ram_2,94.44
GE09ram_02_u:7946: āyas te vipulaḥ kaccit kaccid alpataro vyayaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7947: apātreṣu na te kaccit kośo gacchati rāghava // Ram_2,94.45
GE09ram_02_u:7950: yodheṣu mitravargeṣu kaccid gacchati te vyayaḥ // Ram_2,94.46
GE09ram_02_u:7953: apṛṣṭaḥ śāstrakuśalair na lobhād badhyate śuciḥ // Ram_2,94.47
GE09ram_02_u:7955: gṛhītaś caiva pṛṣṭaś ca kāle dṛṣṭaḥ sakāraṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7956: kaccin na mucyate coro dhanalobhān nararṣabha // Ram_2,94.48
GE09ram_02_u:7958: vyasane kaccid āḍhyasya durgatasya ca rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:7959: arthaṃ virāgāḥ paśyanti tavāmātyā bahuśrutāḥ // Ram_2,94.49
GE09ram_02_u:7962: tāni putrapaśūn ghnanti prītyartham anuśāsataḥ // Ram_2,94.50
GE09ram_02_u:7964: kaccid vṛddhāṃś ca bālāṃś ca vaidyamukhyāṃś ca rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:7965: dānena manasā vācā tribhir etair bubhūṣase // Ram_2,94.51
GE09ram_02_u:7967: kaccid gurūṃś ca vṛddhāṃś ca tāpasān devatātithīn
GE09ram_02_u:7968: caityāṃś ca sarvān siddhārthān brāhmaṇāṃś ca namasyasi // Ram_2,94.52
GE09ram_02_u:7970: kaccid arthena vā dharmaṃ dharmaṃ dharmeṇa vā punaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:7971: ubhau vā prītilobhena kāmena na vibādhase // Ram_2,94.53
GE09ram_02_u:7973: kaccid arthaṃ ca dharmaṃ ca kāmaṃ ca jayatāṃ vara
GE09ram_02_u:7974: vibhajya kāle kālajña sarvān bharata sevase // Ram_2,94.54
GE09ram_02_u:7986: kaccit tvaṃ varjayasy etān rājadoṣāṃś caturdaśa // Ram_2,94.58
GE09ram_02_u:7988: kaccit svādukṛtaṃ bhojyam eko nāśnāsi rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:7991: rāmasya vacanaṃ śrutvā bharataḥ pratyuvāca ha
GE09ram_02_u:7992: kiṃ me dharmād vihīnasya rājadharmaḥ kariṣyati // Ram_2,95.1
GE09ram_02_u:7995: jyeṣṭhaputre sthite rājan na kanīyān bhaven nṛpaḥ // Ram_2,95.2
GE09ram_02_u:7997: sa samṛddhāṃ mayā sārdham ayodhyāṃ gaccha rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:7998: abhiṣecaya cātmānaṃ kulasyāsya bhavāya naḥ // Ram_2,95.3
GE09ram_02_u:8000: rājānaṃ mānuṣaṃ prāhur devatve saṃmato mama
GE09ram_02_u:8001: yasya dharmārthasahitaṃ vṛttam āhur amānuṣam // Ram_2,95.4
GE09ram_02_u:8003: kekayasthe ca mayi tu tvayi cāraṇyam āśrite
GE09ram_02_u:8004: divam ārya gato rājā yāyajūkaḥ satāṃ mataḥ // Ram_2,95.5
GE09ram_02_u:8007: ahaṃ cāyaṃ ca śatrughnaḥ pūrvam eva kṛtodakau // Ram_2,95.6
GE09ram_02_u:8009: priyeṇa kila dattaṃ hi pitṛlokeṣu rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:8010: akṣayyaṃ bhavatīty āhur bhavāṃś caiva pituḥ priyaḥ // Ram_2,95.7
GE09ram_02_u:8012: tāṃ śrutvā karuṇāṃ vācaṃ pitur maraṇasaṃhitām
GE09ram_02_u:8016: pragṛhya bāhū rāmo vai puṣpitāgro yathā drumaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8017: vane paraśunā kṛttas tathā bhuvi papāta ha // Ram_2,95.9
GE09ram_02_u:8019: tathā hi patitaṃ rāmaṃ jagatyāṃ jagatīpatim
GE09ram_02_u:8023: rudantaḥ saha vaidehyā siṣicuḥ salilena vai // Ram_2,95.11
GE09ram_02_u:8025: sa tu saṃjñāṃ punar labdhvā netrābhyām āsram utsṛjan
GE09ram_02_u:8028: kiṃ nu tasya mayā kāryaṃ durjātena mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8029: yo mṛto mama śokena na mayā cāpi saṃskṛtaḥ // Ram_2,95.13
GE09ram_02_u:8031: aho bharata siddhārtho yena rājā tvayānagha
GE09ram_02_u:8032: śatrugheṇa ca sarveṣu pretakṛtyeṣu satkṛtaḥ // Ram_2,95.14
GE09ram_02_u:8038: ko nu śāsiṣyati punas tāte lokāntaraṃ gate // Ram_2,95.16
GE09ram_02_u:8040: purā prekṣya suvṛttaṃ māṃ pitā yāny āha sāntvayan
GE09ram_02_u:8041: vākyāni tāni śroṣyāmi kutaḥ karṇasukhāny aham // Ram_2,95.17
GE09ram_02_u:8043: evam uktvā sa bharataṃ bhāryām abhyetya rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8046: sīte mṛtas te śvaśuraḥ pitrā hīno 'si lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_02_u:8047: bharato duḥkham ācaṣṭe svargataṃ pṛthivīpatim // Ram_2,95.19
GE09ram_02_u:8049: sāntvayitvā tu tāṃ rāmo rudantīṃ janakātmajām
GE09ram_02_u:8050: uvāca lakṣmaṇaṃ tatra duḥkhito duḥkhitaṃ vacaḥ // Ram_2,95.20
GE09ram_02_u:8055: sītā purastād vrajatu tvam enām abhito vraja
GE09ram_02_u:8056: ahaṃ paścād gamiṣyāmi gatir hy eṣā sudāruṇā // Ram_2,95.22
GE09ram_02_u:8059: mṛdur dāntaś ca śāntaś ca rāme ca dṛḍhabhaktimān // Ram_2,95.23
GE09ram_02_u:8061: sumantras tair nṛpasutaiḥ sārdham āśvāsya rāghavam
GE09ram_02_u:8062: avātārayad ālambya nadīṃ mandākinīṃ śivām // Ram_2,95.24
GE09ram_02_u:8064: te sutīrthāṃ tataḥ kṛcchrād upāgamya yaśasvinaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8065: nadīṃ mandākinīṃ ramyāṃ sadā puṣpitakānanām // Ram_2,95.25
GE09ram_02_u:8068: siṣicus tūdakaṃ rājñe tata etad bhavatv iti // Ram_2,95.26
GE09ram_02_u:8071: diśaṃ yāmyām abhimukho rudan vacanam abravīt // Ram_2,95.27
GE09ram_02_u:8073: etat te rājaśārdūla vimalaṃ toyam akṣayam
GE09ram_02_u:8077: pituś cakāra tejasvī nivāpaṃ bhrātṛbhiḥ saha // Ram_2,95.29
GE09ram_02_u:8080: nyasya rāmaḥ suduḥkhārto rudan vacanam abravīt // Ram_2,95.30
GE09ram_02_u:8082: idaṃ bhuṅkṣva mahārāja prīto yadaśanā vayam
GE09ram_02_u:8083: yadannaḥ puruṣo bhavati tadannās tasya devatāḥ // Ram_2,95.31
GE09ram_02_u:8091: teṣāṃ tu rudatāṃ śabdāt pratiśrutkābhavad girau
GE09ram_02_u:8092: bhrātṝṇāṃ saha vaidehyā siṃhānāṃ nardatām iva // Ram_2,95.34
GE09ram_02_u:8095: abruvaṃś cāpi rāmeṇa bharataḥ saṃgato dhruvam
GE09ram_02_u:8096: teṣām eva mahāñ śabdaḥ śocatāṃ pitaraṃ mṛtam // Ram_2,95.35
GE09ram_02_u:8098: atha vāsān parityajya taṃ sarve 'bhimukhāḥ svanam
GE09ram_02_u:8099: apy ekamanaso jagmur yathāsthānaṃ pradhāvitāḥ // Ram_2,95.36
GE09ram_02_u:8101: hayair anye gajair anye rathair anye svalaṃkṛtaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8102: sukumārās tathaivānye padbhir eva narā yayuḥ // Ram_2,95.37
GE09ram_02_u:8105: draṣṭukāmo janaḥ sarvo jagāma sahasāśramam // Ram_2,95.38
GE09ram_02_u:8107: bhrātṝṇāṃ tvaritās te tu draṣṭukāmāḥ samāgamam
GE09ram_02_u:8111: mumoca tumulaṃ śabdaṃ dyaur ivābhrasamāgame // Ram_2,95.40
GE09ram_02_u:8114: āvāsayanto gandhena jagmur anyad vanaṃ tataḥ // Ram_2,95.41
GE09ram_02_u:8120: tathā puṃskokilāḥ krauñcā visaṃjñā bhejire diśaḥ // Ram_2,95.43
GE09ram_02_u:8122: tena śabdena vitrastair ākāśaṃ pakṣibhir vṛtam
GE09ram_02_u:8123: manuṣyair āvṛtā bhūmir ubhayaṃ prababhau tadā // Ram_2,95.44
GE09ram_02_u:8126: paryaṣvajata dharmajñaḥ pitṛvan mātṛvac ca saḥ // Ram_2,95.45
GE09ram_02_u:8128: sa tatra kāṃścit pariṣasvaje narān narāś ca kecit tu tam abhyavādayan
GE09ram_02_u:8129: cakāra sarvān savayasyabāndhavān yathārham āsādya tadā nṛpātmajaḥ // Ram_2,95.46
GE09ram_02_u:8131: tataḥ sa teṣāṃ rudatāṃ mahātmanāṃ bhuvaṃ ca khaṃ cānuvinādayan svanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8132: guhā girīṇāṃ ca diśaś ca saṃtataṃ mṛdaṅgaghoṣapratimo viśuśruve // Ram_2,95.47
GE09ram_02_u:8134: vasiṣṭhaḥ purataḥ kṛtvā dārān daśarathasya ca
GE09ram_02_u:8137: rājapatnyaś ca gacchantyo mandaṃ mandākinīṃ prati
GE09ram_02_u:8138: dadṛśus tatra tat tīrthaṃ rāmalakṣmaṇasevitam // Ram_2,96.2
GE09ram_02_u:8141: sumitrām abravīd dīnā yāś cānyā rājayoṣitaḥ // Ram_2,96.3
GE09ram_02_u:8144: vane prāk kevalaṃ tīrthaṃ ye te nirviṣayīkṛtāḥ // Ram_2,96.4
GE09ram_02_u:8146: itaḥ sumitre putras te sadā jalam atandritaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8147: svayaṃ harati saumitrir mama putrasya kāraṇāt // Ram_2,96.5
GE09ram_02_u:8152: taṃ bhūmau pitur ārtena nyastaṃ rāmeṇa vīkṣya sā
GE09ram_02_u:8153: uvāca devī kausalyā sarvā daśarathastriyaḥ // Ram_2,96.7
GE09ram_02_u:8156: rāghaveṇa pitur dattaṃ paśyataitad yathāvidhi // Ram_2,96.8
GE09ram_02_u:8159: naitad aupayikaṃ manye bhuktabhogasya bhojanam // Ram_2,96.9
GE09ram_02_u:8162: katham iṅgudīpiṇyākaṃ sa bhuṅkte vasudhādhipaḥ // Ram_2,96.10
GE09ram_02_u:8164: ato duḥkhataraṃ loke na kiṃcit pratibhāti mā
GE09ram_02_u:8165: yatra rāmaḥ pitur dadyād iṅgudīkṣodam ṛddhimān // Ram_2,96.11
GE09ram_02_u:8168: kathaṃ duḥkhena hṛdayaṃ na sphoṭati sahasradhā // Ram_2,96.12
GE09ram_02_u:8170: evam ārtāṃ sapatnyas tā jagmur āśvāsya tāṃ tadā
GE09ram_02_u:8171: dadṛśuś cāśrame rāmaṃ svargāc cyutam ivāmaram // Ram_2,96.13
GE09ram_02_u:8174: ārtā mumucur aśrūṇi sasvaraṃ śokakarśitāḥ // Ram_2,96.14
GE09ram_02_u:8176: tāsāṃ rāmaḥ samutthāya jagrāha caraṇāñ śubhān
GE09ram_02_u:8182: saumitrir api tāḥ sarvā mātṝn samprekṣya duḥkhitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8185: yathā rāme tathā tasmin sarvā vavṛtire striyaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8186: vṛttiṃ daśarathāj jāte lakṣmaṇe śubhalakṣaṇe // Ram_2,96.18
GE09ram_02_u:8189: śvaśrūṇām aśrupūrṇākṣī sā babhūvāgrataḥ sthitā // Ram_2,96.19
GE09ram_02_u:8191: tāṃ pariṣvajya duḥkhārtāṃ mātā duhitaraṃ yathā
GE09ram_02_u:8192: vanavāsakṛśāṃ dīnāṃ kausalyā vākyam abravīt // Ram_2,96.20
GE09ram_02_u:8195: rāmapatnī kathaṃ duḥkhaṃ samprāptā nirjane vane // Ram_2,96.21
GE09ram_02_u:8198: kāñcanaṃ rajasā dhvastaṃ kliṣṭaṃ candram ivāmbudaiḥ // Ram_2,96.22
GE09ram_02_u:8200: mukhaṃ te prekṣya māṃ śoko dahaty agnir ivāśrayam
GE09ram_02_u:8204: pādāv āsādya jagrāha vasiṣṭhasya sa rāghavaḥ // Ram_2,96.24
GE09ram_02_u:8206: purohitasyāgnisamasya tasya vai bṛhaspater indra ivāmarādhipaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8207: pragṛhya pādau susamṛddhatejasaḥ sahaiva tenopaviveśa rāghavaḥ // Ram_2,96.25
GE09ram_02_u:8209: tato jaghanyaṃ sahitaiḥ sa mantribhiḥ purapradhānaiś ca sahaiva sainikaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8210: janena dharmajñatamena dharmavān upopaviṣṭo bharatas tadāgrajam // Ram_2,96.26
GE09ram_02_u:8212: upopaviṣṭas tu tadā sa vīryavāṃs tapasviveṣeṇa samīkṣya rāghavam
GE09ram_02_u:8213: śriyā jvalantaṃ bharataḥ kṛtāñjalir yathā mahendraḥ prayataḥ prajāpatim // Ram_2,96.27
GE09ram_02_u:8215: kim eṣa vākyaṃ bharato 'dya rāghavaṃ praṇamya satkṛtya ca sādhu vakṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:8216: itīva tasyāryajanasya tattvato babhūva kautūhalam uttamaṃ tadā // Ram_2,96.28
GE09ram_02_u:8218: sa rāghavaḥ satyadhṛtiś ca lakṣmaṇo mahānubhāvo bharataś ca dhārmikaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8219: vṛtāḥ suhṛdbhiś ca virejur adhvare yathā sadasyaiḥ sahitās trayo 'gnayaḥ // Ram_2,96.29
GE09ram_02_u:8221: taṃ tu rāmaḥ samāśvāsya bhrātaraṃ guruvatsalam
GE09ram_02_u:8222: lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā praṣṭuṃ samupacakrame // Ram_2,97.1
GE09ram_02_u:8224: kim etad iccheyam ahaṃ śrotuṃ pravyāhṛtaṃ tvayā
GE09ram_02_u:8225: yasmāt tvam āgato deśam imaṃ cīrajaṭājinī // Ram_2,97.2
GE09ram_02_u:8228: hitvā rājyaṃ praviṣṭas tvaṃ tat sarvaṃ vaktum arhasi // Ram_2,97.3
GE09ram_02_u:8231: pragṛhya balavad bhūyaḥ prāñjalir vākyam abravīt // Ram_2,97.4
GE09ram_02_u:8233: āryaṃ tātaḥ parityajya kṛtvā karma suduṣkaram
GE09ram_02_u:8236: striyā niyuktaḥ kaikeyyā mama mātrā paraṃtapa
GE09ram_02_u:8237: cakāra sumahat pāpam idam ātmayaśoharam // Ram_2,97.6
GE09ram_02_u:8240: patiṣyati mahāghore niraye jananī mama // Ram_2,97.7
GE09ram_02_u:8242: tasya me dāsabhūtasya prasādaṃ kartum arhasi
GE09ram_02_u:8243: abhiṣiñcasva cādyaiva rājyena maghavān iva // Ram_2,97.8
GE09ram_02_u:8245: imāḥ prakṛtayaḥ sarvā vidhavā mātaraś ca yāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8246: tvatsakāśam anuprāptāḥ prasādaṃ kartum arhasi // Ram_2,97.9
GE09ram_02_u:8248: tadānupūrvyā yuktaṃ ca yuktaṃ cātmani mānada
GE09ram_02_u:8249: rājyaṃ prāpnuhi dharmeṇa sakāmān suhṛdaḥ kuru // Ram_2,97.10
GE09ram_02_u:8251: bhavatv avidhavā bhūmiḥ samagrā patinā tvayā
GE09ram_02_u:8252: śaśinā vimaleneva śāradī rajanī yathā // Ram_2,97.11
GE09ram_02_u:8254: ebhiś ca sacivaiḥ sārdhaṃ śirasā yācito mayā
GE09ram_02_u:8255: bhrātuḥ śiṣyasya dāsasya prasādaṃ kartum arhasi // Ram_2,97.12
GE09ram_02_u:8257: tad idaṃ śāśvataṃ pitryaṃ sarvaṃ sacivamaṇḍalam
GE09ram_02_u:8261: rāmasya śirasā pādau jagrāha bharataḥ punaḥ // Ram_2,97.14
GE09ram_02_u:8263: taṃ mattam iva mātaṃgaṃ niḥśvasantaṃ punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8264: bhrātaraṃ bharataṃ rāmaḥ pariṣvajyedam abravīt // Ram_2,97.15
GE09ram_02_u:8267: rājyahetoḥ kathaṃ pāpam ācaret tvadvidho janaḥ // Ram_2,97.16
GE09ram_02_u:8269: na doṣaṃ tvayi paśyāmi sūkṣmam apy arisūdana
GE09ram_02_u:8270: na cāpi jananīṃ bālyāt tvaṃ vigarhitum arhasi // Ram_2,97.17
GE09ram_02_u:8273: tāvad dharmabhṛtāṃ śreṣṭha jananyām api gauravam // Ram_2,97.18
GE09ram_02_u:8276: mātāpitṛbhyām ukto 'haṃ katham anyat samācare // Ram_2,97.19
GE09ram_02_u:8282: vyādiśya ca mahātejā divaṃ daśaratho gataḥ // Ram_2,97.21
GE09ram_02_u:8284: sa ca pramāṇaṃ dharmātmā rājā lokagurus tava
GE09ram_02_u:8285: pitrā dattaṃ yathābhāgam upabhoktuṃ tvam arhasi // Ram_2,97.22
GE09ram_02_u:8288: upabhokṣye tv ahaṃ dattaṃ bhāgaṃ pitrā mahātmanā // Ram_2,97.23
GE09ram_02_u:8290: yad abravīn māṃ naralokasatkṛtaḥ pitā mahātmā vibudhādhipopamaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8291: tad eva manye paramātmano hitaṃ na sarvalokeśvarabhāvam avyayam // Ram_2,97.24
GE09ram_02_u:8294: śocatām eva rajanī duḥkhena vyatyavartata // Ram_2,98.1
GE09ram_02_u:8297: mandākinyāṃ hutaṃ japyaṃ kṛtvā rāmam upāgaman // Ram_2,98.2
GE09ram_02_u:8299: tūṣṇīṃ te samupāsīnā na kaścit kiṃcid abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:8300: bharatas tu suhṛnmadhye rāmaṃ vacanam abravīt // Ram_2,98.3
GE09ram_02_u:8302: sāntvitā māmikā mātā dattaṃ rājyam idaṃ mama
GE09ram_02_u:8303: tad dadāmi tavaivāhaṃ bhuṅkṣva rājyam akaṇṭakam // Ram_2,98.4
GE09ram_02_u:8306: durāvāraṃ tvadanyena rājyakhaṇḍam idaṃ mahat // Ram_2,98.5
GE09ram_02_u:8309: anugantuṃ na śaktir me gatiṃ tava mahīpate // Ram_2,98.6
GE09ram_02_u:8311: sujīvaṃ nityaśas tasya yaḥ parair upajīvyate
GE09ram_02_u:8312: rāma tena tu durjīvaṃ yaḥ parān upajīvati // Ram_2,98.7
GE09ram_02_u:8314: yathā tu ropito vṛkṣaḥ puruṣeṇa vivardhitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8317: sa yadā puṣpito bhūtvā phalāni na vidarśayet
GE09ram_02_u:8318: sa tāṃ nānubhavet prītiṃ yasya hetoḥ prabhāvitaḥ // Ram_2,98.9
GE09ram_02_u:8320: eṣopamā mahābāho tvam arthaṃ vettum arhasi
GE09ram_02_u:8321: yadi tvam asmān ṛṣabho bhartā bhṛtyān na śādhi hi // Ram_2,98.10
GE09ram_02_u:8323: śreṇayas tvāṃ mahārāja paśyantv agryāś ca sarvaśaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8324: pratapantam ivādityaṃ rājye sthitam ariṃdamam // Ram_2,98.11
GE09ram_02_u:8329: tasya sādhv ity amanyanta nāgarā vividhā janāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8330: bharatasya vacaḥ śrutvā rāmaṃ pratyanuyācataḥ // Ram_2,98.13
GE09ram_02_u:8332: tam evaṃ duḥkhitaṃ prekṣya vilapantaṃ yaśasvinam
GE09ram_02_u:8333: rāmaḥ kṛtātmā bharataṃ samāśvāsayad ātmavān // Ram_2,98.14
GE09ram_02_u:8336: itaś cetarataś cainaṃ kṛtāntaḥ parikarṣati // Ram_2,98.15
GE09ram_02_u:8339: saṃyogā viprayogāntā maraṇāntaṃ ca jīvitam // Ram_2,98.16
GE09ram_02_u:8341: yathā phalānāṃ pakvānāṃ nānyatra patanād bhayam
GE09ram_02_u:8342: evaṃ narasya jātasya nānyatra maraṇād bhayam // Ram_2,98.17
GE09ram_02_u:8348: āyūṃṣi kṣapayanty āśu grīṣme jalam ivāṃśavaḥ // Ram_2,98.19
GE09ram_02_u:8350: ātmānam anuśoca tvaṃ kim anyam anuśocasi
GE09ram_02_u:8351: āyus te hīyate yasya sthitasya ca gatasya ca // Ram_2,98.20
GE09ram_02_u:8353: sahaiva mṛtyur vrajati saha mṛtyur niṣīdati
GE09ram_02_u:8354: gatvā sudīrgham adhvānaṃ saha mṛtyur nivartate // Ram_2,98.21
GE09ram_02_u:8356: gātreṣu valayaḥ prāptāḥ śvetāś caiva śiroruhāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8357: jarayā puruṣo jīrṇaḥ kiṃ hi kṛtvā prabhāvayet // Ram_2,98.22
GE09ram_02_u:8359: nandanty udita āditye nandanty astam ite ravau
GE09ram_02_u:8362: hṛṣyanty ṛtumukhaṃ dṛṣṭvā navaṃ navam ihāgatam
GE09ram_02_u:8365: yathā kāṣṭhaṃ ca kāṣṭhaṃ ca sameyātāṃ mahārṇave
GE09ram_02_u:8366: sametya ca vyapeyātāṃ kālam āsādya kaṃcana // Ram_2,98.25
GE09ram_02_u:8368: evaṃ bhāryāś ca putrāś ca jñātayaś ca vasūni ca
GE09ram_02_u:8369: sametya vyavadhāvanti dhruvo hy eṣāṃ vinābhavaḥ // Ram_2,98.26
GE09ram_02_u:8371: nātra kaścid yathā bhāvaṃ prāṇī samabhivartate
GE09ram_02_u:8372: tena tasmin na sāmarthyaṃ pretasyāsty anuśocataḥ // Ram_2,98.27
GE09ram_02_u:8374: yathā hi sārthaṃ gacchantaṃ brūyāt kaścit pathi sthitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8375: aham apy āgamiṣyāmi pṛṣṭhato bhavatām iti // Ram_2,98.28
GE09ram_02_u:8377: evaṃ pūrvair gato mārgaḥ pitṛpaitāmaho dhruvaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8378: tam āpannaḥ kathaṃ śoced yasya nāsti vyatikramaḥ // Ram_2,98.29
GE09ram_02_u:8381: ātmā sukhe niyoktavyaḥ sukhabhājaḥ prajāḥ smṛtāḥ // Ram_2,98.30
GE09ram_02_u:8383: dharmātmā sa śubhaiḥ kṛtsnaiḥ kratubhiś cāptadakṣiṇaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8384: dhūtapāpo gataḥ svargaṃ pitā naḥ pṛthivīpatiḥ // Ram_2,98.31
GE09ram_02_u:8387: arthādānāc ca dhārmeṇa pitā nas tridivaṃ gataḥ // Ram_2,98.32
GE09ram_02_u:8389: iṣṭvā bahuvidhair yajñair bhogāṃś cāvāpya puṣkalān
GE09ram_02_u:8390: uttamaṃ cāyur āsādya svar gataḥ pṛthivīpatiḥ // Ram_2,98.33
GE09ram_02_u:8392: sa jīrṇaṃ mānuṣaṃ dehaṃ parityajya pitā hi naḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8395: taṃ tu naivaṃvidhaḥ kaścit prājñaḥ śocitum arhati
GE09ram_02_u:8396: tvadvidho yadvidhaś cāpi śrutavān buddhimattaraḥ // Ram_2,98.35
GE09ram_02_u:8399: varjanīyā hi dhīreṇa sarvāvasthāsu dhīmatā // Ram_2,98.36
GE09ram_02_u:8401: sa svastho bhava mā śoco yātvā cāvasa tāṃ purīm
GE09ram_02_u:8402: tathā pitrā niyukto 'si vaśinā vadatāṃ vara // Ram_2,98.37
GE09ram_02_u:8405: tatraivāhaṃ kariṣyāmi pitur āryasya śāsanam // Ram_2,98.38
GE09ram_02_u:8407: na mayā śāsanaṃ tasya tyaktuṃ nyāyyam ariṃdama
GE09ram_02_u:8408: tat tvayāpi sadā mānyaṃ sa vai bandhuḥ sa naḥ pitā // Ram_2,98.39
GE09ram_02_u:8410: evam uktvā tu virate rāme vacanam arthavat
GE09ram_02_u:8411: uvāca bharataś citraṃ dhārmiko dhārmikaṃ vacaḥ // Ram_2,98.40
GE09ram_02_u:8413: ko hi syād īdṛśo loke yādṛśas tvam ariṃdama
GE09ram_02_u:8414: na tvāṃ pravyathayed duḥkhaṃ prītir vā na praharṣayet // Ram_2,98.41
GE09ram_02_u:8416: saṃmataś cāsi vṛddhānāṃ tāṃś ca pṛcchasi saṃśayān
GE09ram_02_u:8417: yathā mṛtas tathā jīvan yathāsati tathā sati // Ram_2,98.42
GE09ram_02_u:8419: yasyaiṣa buddhilābhaḥ syāt paritapyeta kena saḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8420: sa evaṃ vyasanaṃ prāpya na viṣīditum arhati // Ram_2,98.43
GE09ram_02_u:8423: sarvajñaḥ sarvadarśī ca buddhimāṃś cāsi rāghava // Ram_2,98.44
GE09ram_02_u:8425: na tvām evaṃ guṇair yuktaṃ prabhavābhavakovidam
GE09ram_02_u:8428: proṣite mayi yat pāpaṃ mātrā matkāraṇāt kṛtam
GE09ram_02_u:8429: kṣudrayā tad aniṣṭaṃ me prasīdatu bhavān mama // Ram_2,98.46
GE09ram_02_u:8432: hanmi tīvreṇa daṇḍena daṇḍārhāṃ pāpakāriṇīm // Ram_2,98.47
GE09ram_02_u:8435: jānan dharmam adharmiṣṭhaṃ kuryāṃ karma jugupsitam // Ram_2,98.48
GE09ram_02_u:8437: guruḥ kriyāvān vṛddhaś ca rājā pretaḥ piteti ca
GE09ram_02_u:8438: tātaṃ na parigarheyaṃ daivataṃ ceti saṃsadi // Ram_2,98.49
GE09ram_02_u:8440: ko hi dharmārthayor hīnam īdṛśaṃ karma kilbiṣam
GE09ram_02_u:8441: striyāḥ priyacikīrṣuḥ san kuryād dharmajña dharmavit // Ram_2,98.50
GE09ram_02_u:8444: rājñaivaṃ kurvatā loke pratyakṣā sā śrutiḥ kṛtā // Ram_2,98.51
GE09ram_02_u:8446: sādhvartham abhisaṃdhāya krodhān mohāc ca sāhasāt
GE09ram_02_u:8447: tātasya yad atikrāntaṃ pratyāharatu tad bhavān // Ram_2,98.52
GE09ram_02_u:8449: pitur hi samatikrāntaṃ putro yaḥ sādhu manyate
GE09ram_02_u:8450: tad apatyaṃ mataṃ loke viparītam ato 'nyathā // Ram_2,98.53
GE09ram_02_u:8452: tad apatyaṃ bhavān astu mā bhavān duṣkṛtaṃ pituḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8453: abhipattā kṛtaṃ karma loke dhīravigarhitam // Ram_2,98.54
GE09ram_02_u:8455: kaikeyīṃ māṃ ca tātaṃ ca suhṛdo bāndhavāṃś ca naḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8456: paurajānapadān sarvāṃs trātu sarvam idaṃ bhavān // Ram_2,98.55
GE09ram_02_u:8458: kva cāraṇyaṃ kva ca kṣātraṃ kva jaṭāḥ kva ca pālanam
GE09ram_02_u:8459: īdṛśaṃ vyāhataṃ karma na bhavān kartum arhati // Ram_2,98.56
GE09ram_02_u:8461: atha kleśajam eva tvaṃ dharmaṃ caritum icchasi
GE09ram_02_u:8462: dharmeṇa caturo varṇān pālayan kleśam āpnuhi // Ram_2,98.57
GE09ram_02_u:8464: caturṇām āśramāṇāṃ hi gārhasthyaṃ śreṣṭham āśramam
GE09ram_02_u:8465: āhur dharmajña dharmajñās taṃ kathaṃ tyaktum arhasi // Ram_2,98.58
GE09ram_02_u:8467: śrutena bālaḥ sthānena janmanā bhavato hy aham
GE09ram_02_u:8468: sa kathaṃ pālayiṣyāmi bhūmiṃ bhavati tiṣṭhati // Ram_2,98.59
GE09ram_02_u:8470: hīnabuddhiguṇo bālo hīnaḥ sthānena cāpy aham
GE09ram_02_u:8471: bhavatā ca vinā bhūto na vartayitum utsahe // Ram_2,98.60
GE09ram_02_u:8473: idaṃ nikhilam avyagraṃ pitryaṃ rājyam akaṇṭakam
GE09ram_02_u:8474: anuśādhi svadharmeṇa dharmajña saha bāndhavaiḥ // Ram_2,98.61
GE09ram_02_u:8477: ṛtvijaḥ savasiṣṭhāś ca mantravan mantrakovidāḥ // Ram_2,98.62
GE09ram_02_u:8479: abhiṣiktas tvam asmābhir ayodhyāṃ pālane vraja
GE09ram_02_u:8480: vijitya tarasā lokān marudbhir iva vāsavaḥ // Ram_2,98.63
GE09ram_02_u:8482: ṛṇāni trīṇy apākurvan durhṛdaḥ sādhu nirdahan
GE09ram_02_u:8483: suhṛdas tarpayan kāmais tvam evātrānuśādhi mām // Ram_2,98.64
GE09ram_02_u:8486: adya bhītāḥ pālayantāṃ durhṛdas te diśo daśa // Ram_2,98.65
GE09ram_02_u:8488: ākrośaṃ mama mātuś ca pramṛjya puruṣarṣabha
GE09ram_02_u:8489: adya tatra bhavantaṃ ca pitaraṃ rakṣa kilbiṣāt // Ram_2,98.66
GE09ram_02_u:8492: bāndhaveṣu ca sarveṣu bhūteṣv iva maheśvaraḥ // Ram_2,98.67
GE09ram_02_u:8494: atha vā pṛṣṭhataḥ kṛtvā vanam eva bhavān itaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8495: gamiṣyati gamiṣyāmi bhavatā sārdham apy aham // Ram_2,98.68
GE09ram_02_u:8497: tathāpi rāmo bharatena tāmyatā prasādyamānaḥ śirasā mahīpatiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8498: na caiva cakre gamanāya sattvavān matiṃ pitus tadvacane pratiṣṭhitaḥ // Ram_2,98.69
GE09ram_02_u:8500: tad adbhutaṃ sthairyam avekṣya rāghave samaṃ jano harṣam avāpa duḥkhitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8501: na yāty ayodhyām iti duḥkhito 'bhavat sthirapratijñatvam avekṣya harṣitaḥ // Ram_2,98.70
GE09ram_02_u:8503: tam ṛtvijo naigamayūthavallabhās tathā visaṃjñāśrukalāś ca mātaraḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8504: tathā bruvāṇaṃ bharataṃ pratuṣṭuvuḥ praṇamya rāmaṃ ca yayācire saha // Ram_2,98.71
GE09ram_02_u:8506: punar evaṃ bruvāṇaṃ tu bharataṃ lakṣmaṇāgrajaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8509: upapannam idaṃ vākyaṃ yat tvam evam abhāṣathāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8510: jātaḥ putro daśarathāt kaikeyyāṃ rājasattamāt // Ram_2,99.2
GE09ram_02_u:8512: purā bhrātaḥ pitā naḥ sa mātaraṃ te samudvahan
GE09ram_02_u:8515: devāsure ca saṃgrāme jananyai tava pārthivaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8516: samprahṛṣṭo dadau rājā varam ārādhitaḥ prabhuḥ // Ram_2,99.4
GE09ram_02_u:8518: tataḥ sā saṃpratiśrāvya tava mātā yaśasvinī
GE09ram_02_u:8519: ayācata naraśreṣṭhaṃ dvau varau varavarṇinī // Ram_2,99.5
GE09ram_02_u:8521: tava rājyaṃ naravyāghra mama pravrājanaṃ tathā
GE09ram_02_u:8522: tac ca rājā tathā tasyai niyuktaḥ pradadau varam // Ram_2,99.6
GE09ram_02_u:8524: tena pitrāham apy atra niyuktaḥ puruṣarṣabha
GE09ram_02_u:8525: caturdaśa vane vāsaṃ varṣāṇi varadānikam // Ram_2,99.7
GE09ram_02_u:8527: so 'haṃ vanam idaṃ prāpto nirjanaṃ lakṣmaṇānvitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8528: śītayā cāpratidvandvaḥ satyavāde sthitaḥ pituḥ // Ram_2,99.8
GE09ram_02_u:8530: bhavān api tathety eva pitaraṃ satyavādinam
GE09ram_02_u:8531: kartum arhati rājendraṃ kṣipram evābhiṣecanāt // Ram_2,99.9
GE09ram_02_u:8533: ṛṇān mocaya rājānaṃ matkṛte bharata prabhum
GE09ram_02_u:8534: pitaraṃ trāhi dharmajña mātaraṃ cābhinandaya // Ram_2,99.10
GE09ram_02_u:8536: śrūyate hi purā tāta śrutir gītā yaśasvinī
GE09ram_02_u:8537: gayena yajamānena gayeṣv eva pitṝn prati // Ram_2,99.11
GE09ram_02_u:8539: puṃnāmnā narakād yasmāt pitaraṃ trāyate sutaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8540: tasmāt putra iti proktaḥ pitṝn yat pāti vā sutaḥ // Ram_2,99.12
GE09ram_02_u:8543: teṣāṃ vai samavetānām api kaścid gayāṃ vrajet // Ram_2,99.13
GE09ram_02_u:8546: tasmāt trāhi naraśreṣṭha pitaraṃ narakāt prabho // Ram_2,99.14
GE09ram_02_u:8549: śatrughnasahito vīra saha sarvair dvijātibhiḥ // Ram_2,99.15
GE09ram_02_u:8552: ābhyāṃ tu sahito rājan vaidehyā lakṣmaṇena ca // Ram_2,99.16
GE09ram_02_u:8554: tvaṃ rājā bhava bharata svayaṃ narāṇāṃ vanyānām aham api rājarāṇ mṛgāṇām
GE09ram_02_u:8555: gaccha tvaṃ puravaram adya samprahṛṣṭaḥ saṃhṛṣṭas tv aham api daṇḍakān pravekṣye // Ram_2,99.17
GE09ram_02_u:8557: chāyāṃ te dinakarabhāḥ prabādhamānaṃ varṣatraṃ bharata karotu mūrdhni śītām
GE09ram_02_u:8558: eteṣām aham api kānanadrumāṇāṃ chāyāṃ tām atiśayinīṃ sukhaṃ śrayiṣye // Ram_2,99.18
GE09ram_02_u:8560: śatrughnaḥ kuśalamatis tu te sahāyaḥ saumitrir mama viditaḥ pradhānamitram
GE09ram_02_u:8561: catvāras tanayavarā vayaṃ narendraṃ satyasthaṃ bharata carāma mā viṣādam // Ram_2,99.19
GE09ram_02_u:8564: uvāca rāmaṃ dharmajñaṃ dharmāpetam idaṃ vacaḥ // Ram_2,100.1
GE09ram_02_u:8566: sādhu rāghava mā bhūt te buddhir evaṃ nirarthakā
GE09ram_02_u:8569: kaḥ kasya puruṣo bandhuḥ kim āpyaṃ kasya kenacit
GE09ram_02_u:8570: yad eko jāyate jantur eka eva vinaśyati // Ram_2,100.3
GE09ram_02_u:8572: tasmān mātā pitā ceti rāma sajjeta yo naraḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8573: unmatta iva sa jñeyo nāsti kāciddhi kasyacit // Ram_2,100.4
GE09ram_02_u:8575: yathā grāmāntaraṃ gacchan naraḥ kaścit kvacid vaset
GE09ram_02_u:8576: utsṛjya ca tam āvāsaṃ pratiṣṭhetāpare 'hani // Ram_2,100.5
GE09ram_02_u:8578: evam eva manuṣyāṇāṃ pitā mātā gṛhaṃ vasu
GE09ram_02_u:8579: āvāsamātraṃ kākutstha sajjante nātra sajjanāḥ // Ram_2,100.6
GE09ram_02_u:8581: pitryaṃ rājyaṃ samutsṛjya sa nārhati narottama
GE09ram_02_u:8582: āsthātuṃ kāpathaṃ duḥkhaṃ viṣamaṃ bahukaṇṭakam // Ram_2,100.7
GE09ram_02_u:8585: ekaveṇīdharā hi tvāṃ nagarī sampratīkṣate // Ram_2,100.8
GE09ram_02_u:8588: vihara tvam ayodhyāyāṃ yathā śakras triviṣṭape // Ram_2,100.9
GE09ram_02_u:8590: na te kaścid daśaratas tvaṃ ca tasya na kaścana
GE09ram_02_u:8591: anyo rājā tvam anyaś ca tasmāt kuru yad ucyate // Ram_2,100.10
GE09ram_02_u:8593: gataḥ sa nṛpatis tatra gantavyaṃ yatra tena vai
GE09ram_02_u:8594: pravṛttir eṣā martyānāṃ tvaṃ tu mithyā vihanyase // Ram_2,100.11
GE09ram_02_u:8596: arthadharmaparā ye ye tāṃs tāñ śocāmi netarān
GE09ram_02_u:8597: te hi duḥkham iha prāpya vināśaṃ pretya bhejire // Ram_2,100.12
GE09ram_02_u:8600: annasyopadravaṃ paśya mṛto hi kim aśiṣyati // Ram_2,100.13
GE09ram_02_u:8602: yadi bhuktam ihānyena deham anyasya gacchati
GE09ram_02_u:8603: dadyāt pravasataḥ śrāddhaṃ na tat pathy aśanaṃ bhavet // Ram_2,100.14
GE09ram_02_u:8605: dānasaṃvananā hy ete granthā medhāvibhiḥ kṛtāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8606: yajasva dehi dīkṣasva tapas tapyasva saṃtyaja // Ram_2,100.15
GE09ram_02_u:8608: sa nāsti param ity eva kuru buddhiṃ mahāmate
GE09ram_02_u:8609: pratyakṣaṃ yat tad ātiṣṭha parokṣaṃ pṛṣṭhataḥ kuru // Ram_2,100.16
GE09ram_02_u:8612: rājyaṃ tvaṃ pratigṛhṇīṣva bharatena prasāditaḥ // Ram_2,100.17
GE09ram_02_u:8614: jābāles tu vacaḥ śrutvā rāmaḥ satyātmanāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8615: uvāca parayā yuktyā svabuddhyā cāvipannayā // Ram_2,101.1
GE09ram_02_u:8617: bhavān me priyakāmārthaṃ vacanaṃ yad ihoktavān
GE09ram_02_u:8621: mānaṃ na labhate satsu bhinnacāritradarśanaḥ // Ram_2,101.3
GE09ram_02_u:8624: cāritram eva vyākhyāti śuciṃ vā yadi vāśucim // Ram_2,101.4
GE09ram_02_u:8626: anāryas tv āryasaṃkāśaḥ śaucāddhīnas tathā śuciḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8627: lakṣaṇyavad alakṣaṇyo duḥśīlaḥ śīlavān iva // Ram_2,101.5
GE09ram_02_u:8633: bahu maṃsyati māṃ loke durvṛttaṃ lokadūṣaṇam // Ram_2,101.7
GE09ram_02_u:8635: kasya yāsyāmy ahaṃ vṛttaṃ kena vā svargam āpnuyām
GE09ram_02_u:8638: kāmavṛttas tv ayaṃ lokaḥ kṛtsnaḥ samupavartate
GE09ram_02_u:8639: yadvṛttāḥ santi rājānas tadvṛttāḥ santi hi prajāḥ // Ram_2,101.9
GE09ram_02_u:8642: tasmāt satyātmakaṃ rājyaṃ satye lokaḥ pratiṣṭhitaḥ // Ram_2,101.10
GE09ram_02_u:8644: ṛṣayaś caiva devāś ca satyam eva hi menire
GE09ram_02_u:8645: satyavādī hi loke 'smin paramaṃ gacchati kṣayam // Ram_2,101.11
GE09ram_02_u:8648: dharmaḥ satyaṃ paro loke mūlaṃ svargasya cocyate // Ram_2,101.12
GE09ram_02_u:8650: satyam eveśvaro loke satyaṃ padmā samāśritā
GE09ram_02_u:8651: satyamūlāni sarvāṇi satyān nāsti paraṃ padam // Ram_2,101.13
GE09ram_02_u:8653: dattam iṣṭaṃ hutaṃ caiva taptāni ca tapāṃsi ca
GE09ram_02_u:8654: vedāḥ satyapratiṣṭhānās tasmāt satyaparo bhavet // Ram_2,101.14
GE09ram_02_u:8656: ekaḥ pālayate lokam ekaḥ pālayate kulam
GE09ram_02_u:8657: majjaty eko hi niraya ekaḥ svarge mahīyate // Ram_2,101.15
GE09ram_02_u:8659: so 'haṃ pitur nideśaṃ tu kimarthaṃ nānupālaye
GE09ram_02_u:8662: naiva lobhān na mohād vā na cājñānāt tamo'nvitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8663: setuṃ satyasya bhetsyāmi guroḥ satyapratiśravaḥ // Ram_2,101.17
GE09ram_02_u:8666: naiva devā na pitaraḥ pratīcchantīti naḥ śrutam // Ram_2,101.18
GE09ram_02_u:8668: pratyagātmam imaṃ dharmaṃ satyaṃ paśyāmy ahaṃ svayam
GE09ram_02_u:8671: kṣātraṃ dharmam ahaṃ tyakṣye hy adharmaṃ dharmasaṃhitam
GE09ram_02_u:8672: kṣudrair nṛśaṃsair lubdhaiś ca sevitaṃ pāpakarmabhiḥ // Ram_2,101.20
GE09ram_02_u:8674: kāyena kurute pāpaṃ manasā sampradhārya ca
GE09ram_02_u:8675: anṛtaṃ jihvayā cāha trividhaṃ karma pātakam // Ram_2,101.21
GE09ram_02_u:8677: bhūmiḥ kīrtir yaśo lakṣmīḥ puruṣaṃ prārthayanti hi
GE09ram_02_u:8678: svargasthaṃ cānubadhnanti satyam eva bhajeta tat // Ram_2,101.22
GE09ram_02_u:8680: śreṣṭhaṃ hy anāryam eva syād yad bhavān avadhārya mām
GE09ram_02_u:8681: āha yuktikarair vākyair idaṃ bhadraṃ kuruṣva ha // Ram_2,101.23
GE09ram_02_u:8683: kathaṃ hy ahaṃ pratijñāya vanavāsam imaṃ guroḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8684: bharatasya kariṣyāmi vaco hitvā guror vacaḥ // Ram_2,101.24
GE09ram_02_u:8687: prahṛṣṭamānasā devī kaikeyī cābhavat tadā // Ram_2,101.25
GE09ram_02_u:8690: mūlaiḥ puṣpaiḥ phalaiḥ puṇyaiḥ pitṝn devāṃś ca tarpayan // Ram_2,101.26
GE09ram_02_u:8695: karmabhūmim imāṃ prāpya kartavyaṃ karma yac chubham
GE09ram_02_u:8696: agnir vāyuś ca somaś ca karmaṇāṃ phalabhāginaḥ // Ram_2,101.28
GE09ram_02_u:8698: śataṃ kratūnām āhṛtya devarāṭ tridivaṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8699: tapāṃsy ugrāṇi cāsthāya divaṃ yātā maharṣayaḥ // Ram_2,101.29
GE09ram_02_u:8701: satyaṃ ca dharmaṃ ca parākramaṃ ca bhūtānukampāṃ priyavāditāṃ ca
GE09ram_02_u:8702: dvijātidevātithipūjanaṃ ca panthānam āhus tridivasya santaḥ // Ram_2,101.30
GE09ram_02_u:8704: dharme ratāḥ satpuruṣaiḥ sametās tejasvino dānaguṇapradhānāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8705: ahiṃsakā vītamalāś ca loke bhavanti pūjyā munayaḥ pradhānāḥ // Ram_2,101.31
GE09ram_02_u:8707: kruddham ājñāya rāmaṃ tu vasiṣṭhaḥ pratyuvāca ha
GE09ram_02_u:8709: nivartayitukāmas tu tvām etad vākyam abravīt // Ram_2,102.1
GE09ram_02_u:8712: sarvaṃ salilam evāsīt pṛthivī yatra nirmitā
GE09ram_02_u:8713: tataḥ samabhavad brahmā svayambhūr daivataiḥ saha // Ram_2,102.2
GE09ram_02_u:8715: sa varāhas tato bhūtvā projjahāra vasuṃdharām
GE09ram_02_u:8716: asṛjac ca jagat sarvaṃ saha putraiḥ kṛtātmabhiḥ // Ram_2,102.3
GE09ram_02_u:8719: tasmān marīciḥ saṃjajñe marīceḥ kaśyapaḥ sutaḥ // Ram_2,102.4
GE09ram_02_u:8721: vivasvān kaśyapāj jajñe manur vaivasvataḥ smṛtaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8722: sa tu prajāpatiḥ pūrvam ikṣvākus tu manoḥ sutaḥ // Ram_2,102.5
GE09ram_02_u:8724: yasyeyaṃ prathamaṃ dattā samṛddhā manunā mahī
GE09ram_02_u:8725: tam ikṣvākum ayodhyāyāṃ rājānaṃ viddhi pūrvakam // Ram_2,102.6
GE09ram_02_u:8727: ikṣvākos tu sutaḥ śrīmān kukṣir eveti viśrutaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8728: kukṣer athātmajo vīro vikukṣir udapadyata // Ram_2,102.7
GE09ram_02_u:8730: vikukṣes tu mahātejā bāṇaḥ putraḥ pratāpavān
GE09ram_02_u:8731: bāṇasya tu mahābāhur anaraṇyo mahāyaśāḥ // Ram_2,102.8
GE09ram_02_u:8733: nānāvṛṣṭir babhūvāsmin na durbhikṣaṃ satāṃ vare
GE09ram_02_u:8734: anaraṇye mahārāje taskaro vāpi kaścana // Ram_2,102.9
GE09ram_02_u:8736: anaraṇyān mahābāhuḥ pṛthū rājā babhūva ha
GE09ram_02_u:8738: sa satyavacanād vīraḥ saśarīro divaṃ gataḥ // Ram_2,102.10
GE09ram_02_u:8744: māndhātus tu mahātejāḥ susaṃdhir udapadyata // Ram_2,102.12
GE09ram_02_u:8746: susaṃdher api putrau dvau dhruvasaṃdhiḥ prasenajit
GE09ram_02_u:8747: yaśasvī dhruvasaṃdhes tu bharato ripusūdanaḥ // Ram_2,102.13
GE09ram_02_u:8749: bharatāt tu mahābāhor asito nāma jāyata
GE09ram_02_u:8751: haihayās tālajaṅghāś ca śūrāś ca śaśabindavaḥ // Ram_2,102.14
GE09ram_02_u:8753: tāṃs tu sarvān prativyūhya yuddhe rājā pravāsitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8754: sa ca śailavare ramye babhūvābhirato muniḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8755: dve cāsya bhārye garbhiṇyau babhūvatur iti śrutiḥ // Ram_2,102.15
GE09ram_02_u:8758: tam ṛṣiṃ samupāgamya kālindī tv abhyavādayat // Ram_2,102.16
GE09ram_02_u:8760: sa tām abhyavadad vipro varepsuṃ putrajanmani
GE09ram_02_u:8761: tataḥ sā gṛham āgamya devī putraṃ vyajāyata // Ram_2,102.17
GE09ram_02_u:8763: sapatnyā tu garas tasyai datto garbhajighāṃsayā
GE09ram_02_u:8764: gareṇa saha tenaiva jātaḥ sa sagaro 'bhavat // Ram_2,102.18
GE09ram_02_u:8766: sa rājā sagaro nāma yaḥ samudram akhānayat
GE09ram_02_u:8767: iṣṭvā parvaṇi vegena trāsayantam imāḥ prajāḥ // Ram_2,102.19
GE09ram_02_u:8769: asamañjas tu putro 'bhūt sagarasyeti naḥ śrutam
GE09ram_02_u:8770: jīvann eva sa pitrā tu nirastaḥ pāpakarmakṛt // Ram_2,102.20
GE09ram_02_u:8775: bhagīrathāt kakutsthas tu kākutsthā yena tu smṛtāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8776: kakutsthasya tu putro 'bhūd raghur yena tu rāghavaḥ // Ram_2,102.22
GE09ram_02_u:8778: raghos tu putras tejasvī pravṛddhaḥ puruṣādakaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8779: kalmāṣapādaḥ saudāsa ity evaṃ prathito bhuvi // Ram_2,102.23
GE09ram_02_u:8782: yas tu tad vīryam āsādya sahaseno vyanīnaśat // Ram_2,102.24
GE09ram_02_u:8784: śaṅkhaṇasya tu putro 'bhūc chūraḥ śrīmān sudarśanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8787: śīghragasya maruḥ putro maroḥ putraḥ praśuśrukaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8791: nahuṣasya ca nābhāgaḥ putraḥ paramadhārmikaḥ // Ram_2,102.27
GE09ram_02_u:8793: ajaś ca suvrataś caiva nābhāgasya sutāv ubhau
GE09ram_02_u:8794: ajasya caiva dharmātmā rājā daśarathaḥ sutaḥ // Ram_2,102.28
GE09ram_02_u:8796: tasya jyeṣṭho 'si dāyādo rāma ity abhiviśrutaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8797: tad gṛhāṇa svakaṃ rājyam avekṣasva jagan nṛpa // Ram_2,102.29
GE09ram_02_u:8799: ikṣvākūṇāṃ hi sarveṣāṃ rājā bhavati pūrvajaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8802: sa rāghavāṇāṃ kuladharmam ātmanaḥ sanātanaṃ nādya vihātum arhasi
GE09ram_02_u:8803: prabhūtaratnām anuśādhi medinīṃ prabhūtarāṣṭrāṃ pitṛvan mahāyaśāḥ // Ram_2,102.31
GE09ram_02_u:8805: vasiṣṭhas tu tadā rāmam uktvā rājapurohitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8806: abravīd dharmasaṃyuktaṃ punar evāparaṃ vacaḥ // Ram_2,103.1
GE09ram_02_u:8809: ācāryaś caiva kākutstha pitā mātā ca rāghava // Ram_2,103.2
GE09ram_02_u:8811: pitā hy enaṃ janayati puruṣaṃ puruṣarṣabha
GE09ram_02_u:8812: prajñāṃ dadāti cācāryas tasmāt sa gurur ucyate // Ram_2,103.3
GE09ram_02_u:8814: sa te 'haṃ pitur ācāryas tava caiva paraṃtapa
GE09ram_02_u:8815: mama tvaṃ vacanaṃ kurvan nātivarteḥ satāṃ gatim // Ram_2,103.4
GE09ram_02_u:8817: imā hi te pariṣadaḥ śreṇayaś ca samāgatāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8818: eṣu tāta caran dharmaṃ nātivarteḥ satāṃ gatim // Ram_2,103.5
GE09ram_02_u:8821: asyās tu vacanaṃ kurvan nātivarteḥ satāṃ gatim // Ram_2,103.6
GE09ram_02_u:8826: evaṃ madhuram uktas tu guruṇā rāghavaḥ svayam
GE09ram_02_u:8829: yan mātāpitarau vṛttaṃ tanaye kurutaḥ sadā
GE09ram_02_u:8830: na supratikaraṃ tat tu mātrā pitrā ca yat kṛtam // Ram_2,103.9
GE09ram_02_u:8833: nityaṃ ca priyavādena tathā saṃvardhanena ca // Ram_2,103.10
GE09ram_02_u:8835: sa hi rājā janayitā pitā daśaratho mama
GE09ram_02_u:8836: ājñātaṃ yan mayā tasya na tan mithyā bhaviṣyati // Ram_2,103.11
GE09ram_02_u:8838: evam uktas tu rāmeṇa bharataḥ pratyanantaram
GE09ram_02_u:8841: iha me sthaṇḍile śīghraṃ kuśān āstara sārathe
GE09ram_02_u:8842: āryaṃ pratyupavekṣyāmi yāvan me na prasīdati // Ram_2,103.13
GE09ram_02_u:8845: śeṣye purastāc chālāyā yāvan na pratiyāsyati // Ram_2,103.14
GE09ram_02_u:8847: sa tu rāmam avekṣantaṃ sumantraṃ prekṣya durmanāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8848: kuśottaram upasthāpya bhūmāv evāstarat svayam // Ram_2,103.15
GE09ram_02_u:8851: kiṃ māṃ bharata kurvāṇaṃ tāta pratyupavekṣyasi // Ram_2,103.16
GE09ram_02_u:8853: brāhmaṇo hy ekapārśvena narān roddhum ihārhati
GE09ram_02_u:8854: na tu mūrdhāvasiktānāṃ vidhiḥ pratyupaveśane // Ram_2,103.17
GE09ram_02_u:8857: puravaryām itaḥ kṣipram ayodhyāṃ yāhi rāghava // Ram_2,103.18
GE09ram_02_u:8859: āsīnas tv eva bharataḥ paurajānapadaṃ janam
GE09ram_02_u:8860: uvāca sarvataḥ prekṣya kim āryaṃ nānuśāsatha // Ram_2,103.19
GE09ram_02_u:8862: te tam ūcur mahātmānaṃ paurajānapadā janāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8863: kākutstham abhijānīmaḥ samyag vadati rāghavaḥ // Ram_2,103.20
GE09ram_02_u:8865: eṣo 'pi hi mahābhāgaḥ pitur vacasi tiṣṭhati
GE09ram_02_u:8866: ata eva na śaktāḥ smo vyāvartayitum añjasā // Ram_2,103.21
GE09ram_02_u:8868: teṣām ājñāya vacanaṃ rāmo vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:8869: evaṃ nibodha vacanaṃ suhṛdāṃ dharmacakṣuṣām // Ram_2,103.22
GE09ram_02_u:8871: etac caivobhayaṃ śrutvā samyak saṃpaśya rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:8872: uttiṣṭha tvaṃ mahābāho māṃ ca spṛśa tathodakam // Ram_2,103.23
GE09ram_02_u:8874: athotthāya jalaṃ spṛṣṭvā bharato vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:8875: śṛṇvantu me pariṣado mantriṇaḥ śreṇayas tathā // Ram_2,103.24
GE09ram_02_u:8877: na yāce pitaraṃ rājyaṃ nānuśāsāmi mātaram
GE09ram_02_u:8880: yadi tv avaśyaṃ vastavyaṃ kartavyaṃ ca pitur vacaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8881: aham eva nivatsyāmi caturdaśa vane samāḥ // Ram_2,103.26
GE09ram_02_u:8883: dharmātmā tasya tathyena bhrātur vākyena vismitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8884: uvāca rāmaḥ samprekṣya paurajānapadaṃ janam // Ram_2,103.27
GE09ram_02_u:8886: vikrītam āhitaṃ krītaṃ yat pitrā jīvatā mama
GE09ram_02_u:8887: na tal lopayituṃ śakyaṃ mayā vā bharatena vā // Ram_2,103.28
GE09ram_02_u:8889: upadhir na mayā kāryo vanavāse jugupsitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8890: yuktam uktaṃ ca kaikeyyā pitrā me sukṛtaṃ kṛtam // Ram_2,103.29
GE09ram_02_u:8893: sarvam evātra kalyāṇaṃ satyasaṃdhe mahātmani // Ram_2,103.30
GE09ram_02_u:8896: bhrātrā saha bhaviṣyāmi pṛthivyāḥ patir uttamaḥ // Ram_2,103.31
GE09ram_02_u:8898: vṛto rājā hi kaikeyyā mayā tadvacanaṃ kṛtam
GE09ram_02_u:8899: anṛtān mocayānena pitaraṃ taṃ mahīpatim // Ram_2,103.32
GE09ram_02_u:8902: vismitāḥ saṃgamaṃ prekṣya samavetā maharṣayaḥ // Ram_2,104.1
GE09ram_02_u:8904: antarhitās tv ṛṣigaṇāḥ siddhāś ca paramarṣayaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8905: tau bhrātarau mahātmānau kākutsthau praśaśaṃsire // Ram_2,104.2
GE09ram_02_u:8907: sa dhanyo yasya putrau dvau dharmajñau dharmavikramau
GE09ram_02_u:8908: śrutvā vayaṃ hi sambhāṣām ubhayoḥ spṛhayāmahe // Ram_2,104.3
GE09ram_02_u:8911: bharataṃ rājaśārdūlam ity ūcuḥ saṃgatā vacaḥ // Ram_2,104.4
GE09ram_02_u:8914: grāhyaṃ rāmasya vākyaṃ te pitaraṃ yady avekṣase // Ram_2,104.5
GE09ram_02_u:8916: sadānṛṇam imaṃ rāmaṃ vayam icchāmahe pituḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8917: anṛṇatvāc ca kaikeyyāḥ svargaṃ daśaratho gataḥ // Ram_2,104.6
GE09ram_02_u:8920: rājarṣayaś caiva tathā sarve svāṃ svāṃ gatiṃ gatāḥ // Ram_2,104.7
GE09ram_02_u:8923: rāmaḥ saṃhṛṣṭavadanas tān ṛṣīn abhyapūjayat // Ram_2,104.8
GE09ram_02_u:8925: srastagātras tu bharataḥ sa vācā sajjamānayā
GE09ram_02_u:8926: kṛtāñjalir idaṃ vākyaṃ rāghavaṃ punar abravīt // Ram_2,104.9
GE09ram_02_u:8929: kartum arhasi kākutstha mama mātuś ca yācanām // Ram_2,104.10
GE09ram_02_u:8931: rakṣituṃ sumahad rājyam aham ekas tu notsahe
GE09ram_02_u:8932: paurajānapadāṃś cāpi raktān rañjayituṃ tathā // Ram_2,104.11
GE09ram_02_u:8934: jñātayaś ca hi yodhāś ca mitrāṇi suhṛdaś ca naḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8935: tvām eva pratikāṅkṣante parjanyam iva karṣakāḥ // Ram_2,104.12
GE09ram_02_u:8937: idaṃ rājyaṃ mahāprājña sthāpaya pratipadya hi
GE09ram_02_u:8938: śaktimān asi kākutstha lokasya paripālane // Ram_2,104.13
GE09ram_02_u:8940: ity uktvā nyapatad bhrātuḥ pādayor bharatas tadā
GE09ram_02_u:8941: bhṛśaṃ samprārthayāmāsa rāmam evaṃ priyaṃvadaḥ // Ram_2,104.14
GE09ram_02_u:8943: tam aṅke bhrātaraṃ kṛtvā rāmo vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:8946: āgatā tvām iyaṃ buddhiḥ svajā vainayikī ca yā
GE09ram_02_u:8947: bhṛśam utsahase tāta rakṣituṃ pṛthivīm api // Ram_2,104.16
GE09ram_02_u:8949: amātyaiś ca suhṛdbhiś ca buddhimadbhiś ca mantribhiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8950: sarvakāryāṇi saṃmantrya sumahānty api kāraya // Ram_2,104.17
GE09ram_02_u:8952: lakṣmīś candrād apeyād vā himavān vā himaṃ tyajet
GE09ram_02_u:8953: atīyāt sāgaro velāṃ na pratijñām ahaṃ pituḥ // Ram_2,104.18
GE09ram_02_u:8955: kāmād vā tāta lobhād vā mātrā tubhyam idaṃ kṛtam
GE09ram_02_u:8956: na tan manasi kartavyaṃ vartitavyaṃ ca mātṛvat // Ram_2,104.19
GE09ram_02_u:8962: ete hi sarvalokasya yogakṣemaṃ vidhāsyataḥ // Ram_2,104.21
GE09ram_02_u:8964: so 'dhiruhya naravyāghraḥ pāduke hy avaruhya ca
GE09ram_02_u:8967: sa pāduke te bharataḥ pratāpavān svalaṃkṛte samparigṛhya dharmavit
GE09ram_02_u:8968: pradakṣiṇaṃ caiva cakāra rāghavaṃ cakāra caivottamanāgamūrdhani // Ram_2,104.23
GE09ram_02_u:8970: athānupūrvyāt pratipūjya taṃ janaṃ gurūṃś ca mantriprakṛtīs tathānujau
GE09ram_02_u:8971: vyasarjayad rāghavavaṃśavardhanaḥ sthitaḥ svadharme himavān ivācalaḥ // Ram_2,104.24
GE09ram_02_u:8973: taṃ mātaro bāṣpagṛhītakaṇṭhyo duḥkhena nāmantrayituṃ hi śekuḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8974: sa tv eva mātṝn abhivādya sarvā rudan kuṭīṃ svāṃ praviveśa rāmaḥ // Ram_2,104.25
GE09ram_02_u:8976: tataḥ śirasi kṛtvā tu pāduke bharatas tadā
GE09ram_02_u:8977: āruroha rathaṃ hṛṣṭaḥ śatrughnena samanvitaḥ // Ram_2,105.1
GE09ram_02_u:8979: vasiṣṭho vāmadevaś ca jābāliś ca dṛḍhavrataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:8980: agrataḥ prayayuḥ sarve mantriṇo mantrapūjitāḥ // Ram_2,105.2
GE09ram_02_u:8982: mandākinīṃ nadīṃ ramyāṃ prāṅmukhās te yayus tadā
GE09ram_02_u:8983: pradakṣiṇaṃ ca kurvāṇāś citrakūṭaṃ mahāgirim // Ram_2,105.3
GE09ram_02_u:8986: prayayau tasya pārśvena sasainyo bharatas tadā // Ram_2,105.4
GE09ram_02_u:8989: āśramaṃ yatra sa munir bharadvājaḥ kṛtālayaḥ // Ram_2,105.5
GE09ram_02_u:8991: sa tam āśramam āgamya bharadvājasya buddhimān
GE09ram_02_u:8992: avatīrya rathāt pādau vavande kulanandanaḥ // Ram_2,105.6
GE09ram_02_u:8994: tato hṛṣṭo bharadvājo bharataṃ vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:8995: api kṛtyaṃ kṛtaṃ tāta rāmeṇa ca samāgatam // Ram_2,105.7
GE09ram_02_u:8997: evam uktas tu bharato bharadvājena dhīmatā
GE09ram_02_u:9000: sa yācyamāno guruṇā mayā ca dṛḍhavikramaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9001: rāghavaḥ paramaprīto vasiṣṭhaṃ vākyam abravīt // Ram_2,105.9
GE09ram_02_u:9003: pituḥ pratijñāṃ tām eva pālayiṣyāmi tattvataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9004: caturdaśa hi varṣāṇi yā pratijñā pitur mama // Ram_2,105.10
GE09ram_02_u:9006: evam ukto mahāprājño vasiṣṭhaḥ pratyuvāca ha
GE09ram_02_u:9007: vākyajño vākyakuśalaṃ rāghavaṃ vacanaṃ mahat // Ram_2,105.11
GE09ram_02_u:9012: evam ukto vasiṣṭhena rāghavaḥ prāṅmukhaḥ sthitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9013: pāduke hemavikṛte mama rājyāya te dadau // Ram_2,105.13
GE09ram_02_u:9016: ayodhyām eva gacchāmi gṛhītvā pāduke śubhe // Ram_2,105.14
GE09ram_02_u:9018: etac chrutvā śubhaṃ vākyaṃ bharatasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9019: bharadvājaḥ śubhataraṃ munir vākyam udāharat // Ram_2,105.15
GE09ram_02_u:9022: yad āryaṃ tvayi tiṣṭhet tu nimne vṛṣṭim ivodakam // Ram_2,105.16
GE09ram_02_u:9024: amṛtaḥ sa mahābāhuḥ pitā daśarathas tava
GE09ram_02_u:9025: yasya tvam īdṛśaḥ putro dharmātmā dharmavatsalaḥ // Ram_2,105.17
GE09ram_02_u:9027: tam ṛṣiṃ tu mahātmānam uktavākyaṃ kṛtāñjaliḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9028: āmantrayitum ārebhe caraṇāv upagṛhya ca // Ram_2,105.18
GE09ram_02_u:9030: tataḥ pradakṣiṇaṃ kṛtvā bharadvājaṃ punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9031: bharatas tu yayau śrīmān ayodhyāṃ saha mantribhiḥ // Ram_2,105.19
GE09ram_02_u:9033: yānaiś ca śakaṭaiś caiva hayair nāgaiś ca sā camūḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9036: tatas te yamunāṃ divyāṃ nadīṃ tīrtvormimālinīm
GE09ram_02_u:9037: dadṛśus tāṃ punaḥ sarve gaṅgāṃ śivajalāṃ nadīm // Ram_2,105.21
GE09ram_02_u:9043: bharato duḥkhasaṃtaptaḥ sārathiṃ cedam abravīt // Ram_2,105.23
GE09ram_02_u:9045: sārathe paśya vidhvastā ayodhyā na prakāśate
GE09ram_02_u:9049: ayodhyāṃ bharataḥ kṣipraṃ praviveśa mahāyaśāḥ // Ram_2,106.1
