GE09ram_02_u:9052: timirābhyāhatāṃ kālīm aprakāśāṃ niśām iva // Ram_2,106.2
GE09ram_02_u:9061: havirabhyukṣitāṃ paścāc chikhāṃ vipralayaṃ gatām // Ram_2,106.5
GE09ram_02_u:9064: hatapravīrām āpannāṃ camūm iva mahāhave // Ram_2,106.6
GE09ram_02_u:9069: tyaktāṃ yajñāyudhaiḥ sarvair abhirūpaiś ca yājakaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9070: sutyākāle vinirvṛtte vediṃ gataravām iva // Ram_2,106.8
GE09ram_02_u:9072: goṣṭhamadhye sthitām ārtām acarantīṃ navaṃ tṛṇam
GE09ram_02_u:9073: govṛṣeṇa parityaktāṃ gavāṃ patnīm ivotsukām // Ram_2,106.9
GE09ram_02_u:9076: viyuktāṃ maṇibhir jātyair navāṃ muktāvalīm iva // Ram_2,106.10
GE09ram_02_u:9078: sahasā calitāṃ sthānān mahīṃ puṇyakṣayād gatām
GE09ram_02_u:9079: saṃhṛtadyutivistārāṃ tārām iva divaś cyutām // Ram_2,106.11
GE09ram_02_u:9091: upayuktodakāṃ bhagnāṃ prapāṃ nipatitām iva // Ram_2,106.15
GE09ram_02_u:9094: bhūmau bāṇair viniṣkṛttāṃ patitāṃ jyām ivāyudhāt // Ram_2,106.16
GE09ram_02_u:9097: nikṣiptabhāṇḍām utsṛṣṭāṃ kiśorīm iva durbalām // Ram_2,106.17
GE09ram_02_u:9100: pracchannāṃ nīlajīmūtair bhāskarasya prabhām iva // Ram_2,106.18
GE09ram_02_u:9102: bharatas tu rathasthaḥ sañ śrīmān daśarathātmajaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9103: vāhayantaṃ rathaśreṣṭhaṃ sārathiṃ vākyam abravīt // Ram_2,106.19
GE09ram_02_u:9105: kiṃ nu khalv adya gambhīro mūrchito na niśamyate
GE09ram_02_u:9109: dhūpitāgarugandhaś ca na pravāti samantataḥ // Ram_2,106.21
GE09ram_02_u:9113: nedānīṃ śrūyate puryām asyāṃ rāme vivāsite // Ram_2,106.22
GE09ram_02_u:9116: saṃpatadbhir ayodhyāyāṃ na vibhānti mahāpathāḥ // Ram_2,106.23
GE09ram_02_u:9118: evaṃ bahuvidhaṃ jalpan viveśa vasatiṃ pituḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9119: tena hīnāṃ narendreṇa siṃhahīnāṃ guhām iva // Ram_2,106.24
GE09ram_02_u:9121: tato nikṣipya mātṝn sa ayodhyāyāṃ dṛḍhavrataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9122: bharataḥ śokasaṃtapto gurūn idam athābravīt // Ram_2,107.1
GE09ram_02_u:9125: tatra duḥkham idaṃ sarvaṃ sahiṣye rāghavaṃ vinā // Ram_2,107.2
GE09ram_02_u:9127: gataś ca hi divaṃ rājā vanasthaś ca gurur mama
GE09ram_02_u:9128: rāmaṃ pratīkṣe rājyāya sa hi rājā mahāyaśāḥ // Ram_2,107.3
GE09ram_02_u:9130: etac chrutvā śubhaṃ vākyaṃ bharatasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9131: abruvan mantriṇaḥ sarve vasiṣṭhaś ca purohitaḥ // Ram_2,107.4
GE09ram_02_u:9133: sadṛśaṃ ślāghanīyaṃ ca yad uktaṃ bharata tvayā
GE09ram_02_u:9134: vacanaṃ bhrātṛvātsalyād anurūpaṃ tavaiva tat // Ram_2,107.5
GE09ram_02_u:9137: āryamārgaṃ prapannasya nānumanyeta kaḥ pumān // Ram_2,107.6
GE09ram_02_u:9140: abravīt sārathiṃ vākyaṃ ratho me yujyatām iti // Ram_2,107.7
GE09ram_02_u:9143: āruroha rathaṃ śrīmāñ śatrughnena samanvitaḥ // Ram_2,107.8
GE09ram_02_u:9145: āruhya tu rathaṃ śīghraṃ śatrughnabharatāv ubhau
GE09ram_02_u:9149: prayayuḥ prāṅmukhāḥ sarve nandigrāmo yato 'bhavat // Ram_2,107.10
GE09ram_02_u:9152: prayayau bharate yāte sarve ca puravāsinaḥ // Ram_2,107.11
GE09ram_02_u:9154: rathasthaḥ sa tu dharmātmā bharato bhrātṛvatsalaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9155: nandigrāmaṃ yayau tūrṇaṃ śirasy ādhāya pāduke // Ram_2,107.12
GE09ram_02_u:9157: tatas tu bharataḥ kṣipraṃ nandigrāmaṃ praviśya saḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9158: avatīrya rathāt tūrṇaṃ gurūn idam uvāca ha // Ram_2,107.13
GE09ram_02_u:9160: etad rājyaṃ mama bhrātrā dattaṃ saṃnyāsavat svayam
GE09ram_02_u:9162: tam imaṃ pālayiṣyāmi rāghavāgamanaṃ prati // Ram_2,107.14
GE09ram_02_u:9164: kṣipraṃ saṃyojayitvā tu rāghavasya punaḥ svayam
GE09ram_02_u:9165: caraṇau tau tu rāmasya drakṣyāmi sahapādukau // Ram_2,107.15
GE09ram_02_u:9168: nivedya gurave rājyaṃ bhajiṣye guruvṛttitām // Ram_2,107.16
GE09ram_02_u:9171: rājyaṃ cedam ayodhyāṃ ca dhūtapāpo bhavāmi ca // Ram_2,107.17
GE09ram_02_u:9174: prītir mama yaśaś caiva bhaved rājyāc caturguṇam // Ram_2,107.18
GE09ram_02_u:9176: evaṃ tu vilapan dīno bharataḥ sa mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9177: nandigrāme 'karod rājyaṃ duḥkhito mantribhiḥ saha // Ram_2,107.19
GE09ram_02_u:9180: nandigrāme 'vasad vīraḥ sasainyo bharatas tadā // Ram_2,107.20
GE09ram_02_u:9183: bhrātur vacanakārī ca pratijñāpāragas tadā // Ram_2,107.21
GE09ram_02_u:9186: bharataḥ śāsanaṃ sarvaṃ pādukābhyāṃ nyavedayat // Ram_2,107.22
GE09ram_02_u:9192: rāmam āśritya niratās tān alakṣayad utsukān // Ram_2,108.2
GE09ram_02_u:9194: nayanair bhṛkuṭībhiś ca rāmaṃ nirdiśya śaṅkitāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9195: anyonyam upajalpantaḥ śanaiś cakrur mithaḥ kathāḥ // Ram_2,108.3
GE09ram_02_u:9197: teṣām autsukyam ālakṣya rāmas tv ātmani śaṅkitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9198: kṛtāñjalir uvācedam ṛṣiṃ kulapatiṃ tataḥ // Ram_2,108.4
GE09ram_02_u:9200: na kaccid bhagavan kiṃcit pūrvavṛttam idaṃ mayi
GE09ram_02_u:9201: dṛśyate vikṛtaṃ yena vikriyante tapasvinaḥ // Ram_2,108.5
GE09ram_02_u:9203: pramādāc caritaṃ kaccit kiṃcin nāvarajasya me
GE09ram_02_u:9207: pramadābhyucitāṃ vṛttiṃ sītā yuktaṃ na vartate // Ram_2,108.7
GE09ram_02_u:9209: atharṣir jarayā vṛddhas tapasā ca jarāṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9213: calanaṃ tāta vaidehyās tapasviṣu viśeṣataḥ // Ram_2,108.9
GE09ram_02_u:9215: tvannimittam idaṃ tāvat tāpasān prati vartate
GE09ram_02_u:9216: rakṣobhyas tena saṃvignāḥ kathayanti mithaḥ kathāḥ // Ram_2,108.10
GE09ram_02_u:9221: dhṛṣṭaś ca jitakāśī ca nṛśaṃsaḥ puruṣādakaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9222: avaliptaś ca pāpaś ca tvāṃ ca tāta na mṛṣyate // Ram_2,108.12
GE09ram_02_u:9224: tvaṃ yadā prabhṛti hy asminn āśrame tāta vartase
GE09ram_02_u:9225: tadā prabhṛti rakṣāṃsi viprakurvanti tāpasān // Ram_2,108.13
GE09ram_02_u:9227: darśayanti hi bībhatsaiḥ krūrair bhīṣaṇakair api
GE09ram_02_u:9228: nānā rūpair virūpaiś ca rūpair asukhadarśanaiḥ // Ram_2,108.14
GE09ram_02_u:9231: pratighnanty aparān kṣipram anāryāḥ purataḥ sthitāḥ // Ram_2,108.15
GE09ram_02_u:9233: teṣu teṣv āśramasthāneṣv abuddham avalīya ca
GE09ram_02_u:9237: kalaśāṃś ca pramṛdnanti havane samupasthite // Ram_2,108.17
GE09ram_02_u:9242: tat purā rāma śārīrām upahiṃsāṃ tapasviṣu
GE09ram_02_u:9243: darśayanti hi duṣṭās te tyakṣyāma imam āśramam // Ram_2,108.19
GE09ram_02_u:9246: purāṇāśramam evāhaṃ śrayiṣye sagaṇaḥ punaḥ // Ram_2,108.20
GE09ram_02_u:9248: kharas tvayy api cāyuktaṃ purā tāta pravartate
GE09ram_02_u:9249: sahāsmābhir ito gaccha yadi buddhiḥ pravartate // Ram_2,108.21
GE09ram_02_u:9251: sakalatrasya saṃdeho nityaṃ yat tasya rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:9252: samarthasyāpi hi sato vāso duḥkham ihādya te // Ram_2,108.22
GE09ram_02_u:9254: ity uktavantaṃ rāmas taṃ rājaputras tapasvinam
GE09ram_02_u:9255: na śaśākottarair vākyair avaroddhuṃ samutsukam // Ram_2,108.23
GE09ram_02_u:9258: sa jagāmāśramaṃ tyaktvā kulaiḥ kulapatiḥ saha // Ram_2,108.24
GE09ram_02_u:9260: rāmaḥ saṃsādhya tv ṛṣigaṇam anugamanād deśāt tasmāccit kulapatim abhivādya rṣim
GE09ram_02_u:9261: samyakprītais tair anumata upadiṣṭārthaḥ puṇyaṃ vāsāya svanilayam upasaṃpede // Ram_2,108.25
GE09ram_02_u:9263: āśramaṃ tv ṛṣivirahitaṃ prabhuḥ kṣaṇam api na jahau sa rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9264: rāghavaṃ hi satatam anugatās tāpasāś cārṣicaritadhṛtaguṇāḥ // Ram_2,108.26
GE09ram_02_u:9267: na tatrārocayad vāsaṃ kāraṇair bahubhis tadā // Ram_2,109.1
GE09ram_02_u:9269: iha me bharato dṛṣṭo mātaraś ca sanāgarāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9270: sā ca me smṛtir anveti tān nityam anuśocataḥ // Ram_2,109.2
GE09ram_02_u:9273: hayahastikarīṣaiś ca upamardaḥ kṛto bhṛśam // Ram_2,109.3
GE09ram_02_u:9275: tasmād anyatra gacchāma iti saṃcintya rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9276: prātiṣṭhata sa vaidehyā lakṣmaṇena ca saṃgataḥ // Ram_2,109.4
GE09ram_02_u:9278: so 'trer āśramam āsādya taṃ vavande mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9279: taṃ cāpi bhagavān atriḥ putravat pratyapadyata // Ram_2,109.5
GE09ram_02_u:9281: svayam ātithyam ādiśya sarvam asya susatkṛtam
GE09ram_02_u:9282: saumitriṃ ca mahābhāgāṃ sītāṃ ca samasāntvayat // Ram_2,109.6
GE09ram_02_u:9284: patnīṃ ca samanuprāptāṃ vṛddhām āmantrya satkṛtām
GE09ram_02_u:9291: daśa varṣāṇy anāvṛṣṭyā dagdhe loke nirantaram // Ram_2,109.9
GE09ram_02_u:9293: yayā mūlaphale sṛṣṭe jāhnavī ca pravartitā
GE09ram_02_u:9294: ugreṇa tapasā yuktā niyamaiś cāpy alaṃkṛtā // Ram_2,109.10
GE09ram_02_u:9297: anasūyāvratais tāta pratyūhāś ca nibarhitāḥ // Ram_2,109.11
GE09ram_02_u:9300: daśarātraṃ kṛtvā rātriḥ seyaṃ māteva te 'nagha // Ram_2,109.12
GE09ram_02_u:9303: abhigacchatu vaidehī vṛddhām akrodhanāṃ sadā // Ram_2,109.13
GE09ram_02_u:9305: evaṃ bruvāṇaṃ tam ṛṣiṃ tathety uktvā sa rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9306: sītām uvāca dharmajñām idaṃ vacanam uttamam // Ram_2,109.14
GE09ram_02_u:9308: rājaputri śrutaṃ tv etan muner asya samīritam
GE09ram_02_u:9309: śreyo'rtham ātmanaḥ śīghram abhigaccha tapasvinīm // Ram_2,109.15
GE09ram_02_u:9311: anasūyeti yā loke karmabhiḥ khyātim āgatā
GE09ram_02_u:9312: tāṃ śīghram abhigaccha tvam abhigamyāṃ tapasvinīm // Ram_2,109.16
GE09ram_02_u:9314: sītā tv etad vacaḥ śrutvā rāghavasya hitaiṣiṇī
GE09ram_02_u:9315: tām atripatnīṃ dharmajñām abhicakrāma maithilī // Ram_2,109.17
GE09ram_02_u:9318: satataṃ vepamānāṅgīṃ pravāte kadalī yathā // Ram_2,109.18
GE09ram_02_u:9320: tāṃ tu sītā mahābhāgām anasūyāṃ pativratām
GE09ram_02_u:9321: abhyavādayad avyagrā svaṃ nāma samudāharat // Ram_2,109.19
GE09ram_02_u:9323: abhivādya ca vaidehī tāpasīṃ tām aninditām
GE09ram_02_u:9326: tataḥ sītāṃ mahābhāgāṃ dṛṣṭvā tāṃ dharmacāriṇīm
GE09ram_02_u:9327: sāntvayanty abravīd dhṛṣṭā diṣṭyā dharmam avekṣase // Ram_2,109.21
GE09ram_02_u:9329: tyaktvā jñātijanaṃ sīte mānam ṛddhiṃ ca mānini
GE09ram_02_u:9330: avaruddhaṃ vane rāmaṃ diṣṭyā tvam anugacchasi // Ram_2,109.22
GE09ram_02_u:9332: nagarastho vanastho vā pāpo vā yadi vāśubhaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9333: yāsāṃ strīṇāṃ priyo bhartā tāsāṃ lokā mahodayāḥ // Ram_2,109.23
GE09ram_02_u:9335: duḥśīlaḥ kāmavṛtto vā dhanair vā parivarjitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9336: strīṇām āryasvabhāvānāṃ paramaṃ daivataṃ patiḥ // Ram_2,109.24
GE09ram_02_u:9338: nāto viśiṣṭaṃ paśyāmi bāndhavaṃ vimṛśanty aham
GE09ram_02_u:9339: sarvatra yogyaṃ vaidehi tapaḥ kṛtam ivāvyayam // Ram_2,109.25
GE09ram_02_u:9341: na tv evam avagacchanti guṇadoṣam asatstriyaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9344: prāpnuvanty ayaśaś caiva dharmabhraṃśaṃ ca maithili
GE09ram_02_u:9345: akāryavaśam āpannāḥ striyo yāḥ khalu tadvidhāḥ // Ram_2,109.27
GE09ram_02_u:9348: striyaḥ svarge cariṣyanti yathā puṇyakṛtas tathā // Ram_2,109.28
GE09ram_02_u:9350: sā tv evam uktā vaidehī anasūyānasūyayā
GE09ram_02_u:9351: pratipūjya vaco mandaṃ pravaktum upacakrame // Ram_2,110.1
GE09ram_02_u:9353: naitad āścaryam āryāyā yan māṃ tvam anubhāṣase
GE09ram_02_u:9354: viditaṃ tu mamāpy etad yathā nāryāḥ patir guruḥ // Ram_2,110.2
GE09ram_02_u:9356: yady apy eṣa bhaved bhartā mamārye vṛttavarjitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9357: advaidham upacartavyas tathāpy eṣa mayā bhavet // Ram_2,110.3
GE09ram_02_u:9359: kiṃ punar yo guṇaślāghyaḥ sānukrośo jitendriyaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9362: yāṃ vṛttiṃ vartate rāmaḥ kausalyāyāṃ mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9363: tām eva nṛpanārīṇām anyāsām api vartate // Ram_2,110.5
GE09ram_02_u:9365: sakṛd dṛṣṭāsv api strīṣu nṛpeṇa nṛpavatsalaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9366: mātṛvad vartate vīro mānam utsṛjya dharmavit // Ram_2,110.6
GE09ram_02_u:9368: āgacchantyāś ca vijanaṃ vanam evaṃ bhayāvaham
GE09ram_02_u:9369: samāhitaṃ hi me śvaśrvā hṛdaye yat sthitaṃ mama // Ram_2,110.7
GE09ram_02_u:9371: pāṇipradānakāle ca yat purā tv agnisaṃnidhau
GE09ram_02_u:9372: anuśiṣṭā jananyāsmi vākyaṃ tad api me dhṛtam // Ram_2,110.8
GE09ram_02_u:9374: navīkṛtaṃ tu tat sarvaṃ vākyais te dharmacāriṇi
GE09ram_02_u:9375: patiśuśrūṣaṇān nāryās tapo nānyad vidhīyate // Ram_2,110.9
GE09ram_02_u:9378: tathā vṛttiś ca yātā tvaṃ patiśuśrūṣayā divam // Ram_2,110.10
GE09ram_02_u:9380: variṣṭhā sarvanārīṇām eṣā ca divi devatā
GE09ram_02_u:9381: rohiṇī ca vinā candraṃ muhūrtam api dṛśyate // Ram_2,110.11
GE09ram_02_u:9384: devaloke mahīyante puṇyena svena karmaṇā // Ram_2,110.12
GE09ram_02_u:9387: śirasy āghrāya covāca maithilīṃ harṣayanty uta // Ram_2,110.13
GE09ram_02_u:9389: niyamair vividhair āptaṃ tapo hi mahad asti me
GE09ram_02_u:9390: tat saṃśritya balaṃ sīte chandaye tvāṃ śucivrate // Ram_2,110.14
GE09ram_02_u:9392: upapannaṃ ca yuktaṃ ca vacanaṃ tava maithili
GE09ram_02_u:9393: prītā cāsmy ucitaṃ kiṃ te karavāṇi bravīhi me
GE09ram_02_u:9394: kṛtam ity abravīt sītā tapobalasamanvitām // Ram_2,110.15
GE09ram_02_u:9396: sā tv evam uktā dharmajñā tayā prītatarābhavat
GE09ram_02_u:9397: saphalaṃ ca praharṣaṃ te hanta sīte karomy aham // Ram_2,110.16
GE09ram_02_u:9399: idaṃ divyaṃ varaṃ mālyaṃ vastram ābharaṇāni ca
GE09ram_02_u:9400: aṅgarāgaṃ ca vaidehi mahārham anulepanam // Ram_2,110.17
GE09ram_02_u:9402: mayā dattam idaṃ sīte tava gātrāṇi śobhayet
GE09ram_02_u:9403: anurūpam asaṃkliṣṭaṃ nityam eva bhaviṣyati // Ram_2,110.18
GE09ram_02_u:9406: śobhayiṣyāmi bhartāraṃ yathā śrīr viṣṇum avyayam // Ram_2,110.19
GE09ram_02_u:9408: sā vastram aṅgarāgaṃ ca bhūṣaṇāni srajas tathā
GE09ram_02_u:9411: pratigṛhya ca tat sītā prītidānaṃ yaśasvinī
GE09ram_02_u:9415: vacanaṃ praṣṭum ārebhe kathāṃ kāṃcid anupriyām // Ram_2,110.22
GE09ram_02_u:9417: svayaṃvare kila prāptā tvam anena yaśasvinā
GE09ram_02_u:9418: rāghaveṇeti me sīte kathā śrutim upāgatā // Ram_2,110.23
GE09ram_02_u:9420: tāṃ kathāṃ śrotum icchāmi vistareṇa ca maithili
GE09ram_02_u:9421: yathānubhūtaṃ kārtsnyena tan me tvaṃ vaktum arhasi // Ram_2,110.24
GE09ram_02_u:9423: evam uktā tu sā sītā tāṃ tato dharmacāriṇīm
GE09ram_02_u:9424: śrūyatām iti coktvā vai kathayāmāsa tāṃ kathām // Ram_2,110.25
GE09ram_02_u:9427: kṣatradharmaṇy abhirato nyāyataḥ śāsti medinīm // Ram_2,110.26
GE09ram_02_u:9430: ahaṃ kilotthitā bhittvā jagatīṃ nṛpateḥ sutā // Ram_2,110.27
GE09ram_02_u:9435: anapatyena ca snehād aṅkam āropya ca svayam
GE09ram_02_u:9436: mameyaṃ tanayety uktvā sneho mayi nipātitaḥ // Ram_2,110.29
GE09ram_02_u:9438: antarikṣe ca vāg uktā pratimāmānuṣī kila
GE09ram_02_u:9439: evam etan narapate dharmeṇa tanayā tava // Ram_2,110.30
GE09ram_02_u:9441: tataḥ prahṛṣṭo dharmātmā pitā me mithilādhipaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9442: avāpto vipulām ṛddhiṃ mām avāpya narādhipaḥ // Ram_2,110.31
GE09ram_02_u:9445: tayā saṃbhāvitā cāsmi snigdhayā mātṛsauhṛdāt // Ram_2,110.32
GE09ram_02_u:9447: patisaṃyogasulabhaṃ vayo dṛṣṭvā tu me pitā
GE09ram_02_u:9448: cintām abhyagamad dīno vittanāśād ivādhanaḥ // Ram_2,110.33
GE09ram_02_u:9450: sadṛśāc cāpakṛṣṭāc ca loke kanyāpitā janāt
GE09ram_02_u:9451: pradharṣaṇām avāpnoti śakreṇāpi samo bhuvi // Ram_2,110.34
GE09ram_02_u:9456: ayonijāṃ hi māṃ jñātvā nādhyagacchat sa cintayan
GE09ram_02_u:9457: sadṛśaṃ cānurūpaṃ ca mahīpālaḥ patiṃ mama // Ram_2,110.36
GE09ram_02_u:9459: tasya buddhir iyaṃ jātā cintayānasya saṃtatam
GE09ram_02_u:9460: svayaṃ varaṃ tanūjāyāḥ kariṣyāmīti dhīmataḥ // Ram_2,110.37
GE09ram_02_u:9463: dattaṃ dhanurvaraṃ prītyā tūṇī cākṣayasāyakau // Ram_2,110.38
GE09ram_02_u:9465: asaṃcālyaṃ manuṣyaiś ca yatnenāpi ca gauravāt
GE09ram_02_u:9466: tan na śaktā namayituṃ svapneṣv api narādhipāḥ // Ram_2,110.39
GE09ram_02_u:9468: tad dhanuḥ prāpya me pitrā vyāhṛtaṃ satyavādinā
GE09ram_02_u:9469: samavāye narendrāṇāṃ pūrvam āmantrya pārthivān // Ram_2,110.40
GE09ram_02_u:9471: idaṃ ca dhanur udyamya sajyaṃ yaḥ kurute naraḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9472: tasya me duhitā bhāryā bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ // Ram_2,110.41
GE09ram_02_u:9474: tac ca dṛṣṭvā dhanuḥśreṣṭhaṃ gauravād girisaṃnibham
GE09ram_02_u:9475: abhivādya nṛpā jagmur aśaktās tasya tolane // Ram_2,110.42
GE09ram_02_u:9478: viśvāmitreṇa sahito yajñaṃ draṣṭuṃ samāgataḥ // Ram_2,110.43
GE09ram_02_u:9481: viśvāmitras tu dharmātmā mama pitrā supūjitaḥ // Ram_2,110.44
GE09ram_02_u:9485: ity uktas tena vipreṇa tad dhanuḥ samupānayat // Ram_2,110.45
GE09ram_02_u:9488: jyāṃ samāropya jhaṭiti pūrayāmāsa vīryavān // Ram_2,110.46
GE09ram_02_u:9490: tena pūrayatā vegān madhye bhagnaṃ dvidhā dhanuḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9491: tasya śabdo 'bhavad bhīmaḥ patitasyāśaner iva // Ram_2,110.47
GE09ram_02_u:9494: udyatā dātum udyamya jalabhājanam uttamam // Ram_2,110.48
GE09ram_02_u:9496: dīyamānāṃ na tu tadā pratijagrāha rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9497: avijñāya pituś chandam ayodhyādhipateḥ prabhoḥ // Ram_2,110.49
GE09ram_02_u:9499: tataḥ śvaśuram āmantrya vṛddhaṃ daśarathaṃ nṛpam
GE09ram_02_u:9500: mama pitrā ahaṃ dattā rāmāya viditātmane // Ram_2,110.50
GE09ram_02_u:9503: bhāryārthe lakṣmaṇasyāpi dattā pitrā mama svayam // Ram_2,110.51
GE09ram_02_u:9505: evaṃ dattāsmi rāmāya tadā tasmin svayaṃvare
GE09ram_02_u:9506: anuraktā ca dharmeṇa patiṃ vīryavatāṃ varam // Ram_2,110.52
GE09ram_02_u:9508: anasūyā tu dharmajñā śrutvā tāṃ mahatīṃ kathām
GE09ram_02_u:9509: paryaṣvajata bāhubhyāṃ śirasy āghrāya maithilīm // Ram_2,111.1
GE09ram_02_u:9512: yathā svayaṃvaraṃ vṛttaṃ tat sarvaṃ hi śrutaṃ mayā // Ram_2,111.2
GE09ram_02_u:9514: rame 'haṃ kathayā te tu dṛḍhaṃ madhurabhāṣiṇi
GE09ram_02_u:9515: ravir astaṃ gataḥ śrīmān upohya rajanīṃ śivām // Ram_2,111.3
GE09ram_02_u:9518: saṃdhyākāle nilīnānāṃ nidrārthaṃ śrūyate dhvaniḥ // Ram_2,111.4
GE09ram_02_u:9527: viprakṛṣṭe 'pi ye deśe na prakāśanti vai diśaḥ // Ram_2,111.7
GE09ram_02_u:9530: tapovanamṛgā hy ete veditīrtheṣu śerate // Ram_2,111.8
GE09ram_02_u:9536: kathayantyā hi madhuraṃ tvayāhaṃ paritoṣitā // Ram_2,111.10
GE09ram_02_u:9538: alaṃkuru ca tāvat tvaṃ pratyakṣaṃ mama maithili
GE09ram_02_u:9539: prītiṃ janaya me vatsa divyālaṃkāraśobhinī // Ram_2,111.11
GE09ram_02_u:9542: praṇamya śirasā tasyai rāmaṃ tv abhimukhī yayau // Ram_2,111.12
GE09ram_02_u:9544: tathā tu bhūṣitāṃ sītāṃ dadarśa vadatāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9545: rāghavaḥ prītidānena tapasvinyā jaharṣa ca // Ram_2,111.13
GE09ram_02_u:9547: nyavedayat tataḥ sarvaṃ sītā rāmāya maithilī
GE09ram_02_u:9550: prahṛṣṭas tv abhavad rāmo lakṣmaṇaś ca mahārathaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9551: maithilyāḥ satkriyāṃ dṛṣṭvā mānuṣeṣu sudurlabhām // Ram_2,111.15
GE09ram_02_u:9553: tatas tāṃ śarvarīṃ prītaḥ puṇyāṃ śaśinibhānanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9554: arcitas tāpasaiḥ siddhair uvāsa raghunandanaḥ // Ram_2,111.16
GE09ram_02_u:9559: tāv ūcus te vanacarās tāpasā dharmacāriṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9560: vanasya tasya saṃcāraṃ rākṣasaiḥ samabhiplutam // Ram_2,111.18
GE09ram_02_u:9562: eṣa panthā maharṣīṇāṃ phalāny āharatāṃ vane
GE09ram_02_u:9563: anena tu vanaṃ durgaṃ gantuṃ rāghava te kṣamam // Ram_2,111.19
GE09ram_02_u:9565: itīva taiḥ prāñjalibhis tapasvibhir dvijaiḥ kṛtasvastyayanaḥ paraṃtapaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9566: vanaṃ sabhāryaḥ praviveśa rāghavaḥ salakṣmaṇaḥ sūrya ivābhramaṇḍalam // Ram_2,111.20
GE09ram_02_u:9572: yathā pradīptaṃ durdharṣaṃ gagane sūryamaṇḍalam // Ram_3,1.2
GE09ram_02_u:9575: pūjitaṃ copanṛttaṃ ca nityam apsarasāṃ gaṇaiḥ // Ram_3,1.3
GE09ram_02_u:9578: samidbhis toyakalaśaiḥ phalamūlaiś ca śobhitam // Ram_3,1.4
GE09ram_02_u:9580: āraṇyaiś ca mahāvṛkṣaiḥ puṇyaiḥ svāduphalair vṛtam
GE09ram_02_u:9583: puṣpair vanyaiḥ parikṣiptaṃ padminyā ca sapadmayā
GE09ram_02_u:9587: puṇyaiś ca niyatāhāraiḥ śobhitaṃ paramarṣibhiḥ // Ram_3,1.7
GE09ram_02_u:9593: abhyagacchan mahātejā vijyaṃ kṛtvā mahad dhanuḥ // Ram_3,1.9
GE09ram_02_u:9596: abhyagacchaṃs tadā prītā vaidehīṃ ca yaśasvinīm // Ram_3,1.10
GE09ram_02_u:9598: te taṃ somam ivodyantaṃ dṛṣṭvā vai dharmacāriṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9604: vaidehīṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ rāmaṃ netrair animiṣair iva
GE09ram_02_u:9605: āścaryabhūtān dadṛśuḥ sarve te vanacāriṇaḥ // Ram_3,1.13
GE09ram_02_u:9611: ājahrus te mahābhāgāḥ salilaṃ dharmacāriṇaḥ // Ram_3,1.15
GE09ram_02_u:9613: mūlaṃ puṣpaṃ phalaṃ vanyam āśramaṃ ca mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9617: pūjanīyaś ca mānyaś ca rājā daṇḍadharo guruḥ // Ram_3,1.17
GE09ram_02_u:9620: rājā tasmād varān bhogān bhuṅkte lokanamaskṛtaḥ // Ram_3,1.18
GE09ram_02_u:9623: nagarastho vanastho vā tvaṃ no rājā janeśvaraḥ // Ram_3,1.19
GE09ram_02_u:9626: rakṣitavyās tvayā śaśvad garbhabhūtās tapodhanāḥ // Ram_3,1.20
GE09ram_02_u:9628: evam uktvā phalair mūlaiḥ puṣpair vanyaiś ca rāghavam
GE09ram_02_u:9629: anyaiś ca vividhāhāraiḥ salakṣmaṇam apūjayan // Ram_3,1.21
GE09ram_02_u:9635: āmantrya sa munīn sarvān vanam evānvagāhata // Ram_3,2.1
GE09ram_02_u:9641: lakṣmaṇānugato rāmo vanamadhyaṃ dadarśa ha // Ram_3,2.3
GE09ram_02_u:9647: bībhatsaṃ viṣamaṃ dīrghaṃ vikṛtaṃ ghoradarśanam // Ram_3,2.5
GE09ram_02_u:9652: trīn siṃhāṃś caturo vyāghrān dvau vṛkau pṛṣatān daśa
GE09ram_02_u:9653: saviṣāṇaṃ vasādigdhaṃ gajasya ca śiro mahat // Ram_3,2.7
GE09ram_02_u:9656: sa rāmaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ caiva sītāṃ dṛṣṭvā ca maithilīm // Ram_3,2.8
GE09ram_02_u:9659: sa kṛtvā bhairavaṃ nādaṃ cālayann iva medinīm // Ram_3,2.9
GE09ram_02_u:9665: kathaṃ tāpasayor vāṃ ca vāsaḥ pramadayā saha // Ram_3,2.11
GE09ram_02_u:9668: ahaṃ vanam idaṃ durgaṃ virādho nāma rākṣasaḥ // Ram_3,2.12
GE09ram_02_u:9671: iyaṃ nārī varārohā mama bhāryā bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:9672: yuvayoḥ pāpayoś cāhaṃ pāsyāmi rudhiraṃ mṛdhe // Ram_3,2.13
GE09ram_02_u:9676: sītā prāvepatodvegāt pravāte kadalī yathā // Ram_3,2.14
GE09ram_02_u:9678: tāṃ dṛṣṭvā rāghavaḥ sītāṃ virādhāṅkagatāṃ śubhām
GE09ram_02_u:9679: abravīl lakṣmaṇaṃ vākyaṃ mukhena pariśuṣyatā // Ram_3,2.15
GE09ram_02_u:9685: yad abhipretam asmāsu priyaṃ varavṛtaṃ ca yat
GE09ram_02_u:9686: kaikeyyās tu susaṃvṛttaṃ kṣipram adyaiva lakṣmaṇa // Ram_3,2.17
GE09ram_02_u:9688: yā na tuṣyati rājyena putrārthe dīrghadarśinī
GE09ram_02_u:9690: adyedānīṃ sakāmā sā yā mātā mama madhyamā // Ram_3,2.18
GE09ram_02_u:9692: parasparśāt tu vaidehyā na duḥkhataram asti me
GE09ram_02_u:9693: pitur vināśāt saumitre svarājyaharaṇāt tathā // Ram_3,2.19
GE09ram_02_u:9696: abravīl lakṣmaṇaḥ kruddho ruddho nāga iva śvasan // Ram_3,2.20
GE09ram_02_u:9698: anātha iva bhūtānāṃ nāthas tvaṃ vāsavopamaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9699: mayā preṣyeṇa kākutstha kimarthaṃ paritapyase // Ram_3,2.21
GE09ram_02_u:9702: virādhasya gatāsor hi mahī pāsyati śoṇitam // Ram_3,2.22
GE09ram_02_u:9704: rājyakāme mama krodho bharate yo babhūva ha
GE09ram_02_u:9705: taṃ virādhe vimokṣyāmi vajrī vajram ivācale // Ram_3,2.23
GE09ram_02_u:9707: mama bhujabalavegavegitaḥ patatu śaro 'sya mahān mahorasi
GE09ram_02_u:9708: vyapanayatu tanoś ca jīvitaṃ patatu tataś ca mahīṃ vighūrṇitaḥ // Ram_3,2.24
GE09ram_02_u:9710: athovāca punar vākyaṃ virādhaḥ pūrayan vanam
GE09ram_02_u:9711: ātmānaṃ pṛcchate brūtaṃ kau yuvāṃ kva gamiṣyathaḥ // Ram_3,3.1
GE09ram_02_u:9713: tam uvāca tato rāmo rākṣasaṃ jvalitānanam
GE09ram_02_u:9717: tvāṃ tu veditum icchāvaḥ kas tvaṃ carasi daṇḍakān // Ram_3,3.3
GE09ram_02_u:9719: tam uvāca virādhas tu rāmaṃ satyaparākramam
GE09ram_02_u:9720: hanta vakṣyāmi te rājan nibodha mama rāghava // Ram_3,3.4
GE09ram_02_u:9722: putraḥ kila jayasyāhaṃ mātā mama śatahradā
GE09ram_02_u:9723: virādha iti mām āhuḥ pṛthivyāṃ sarvarākṣasāḥ // Ram_3,3.5
GE09ram_02_u:9725: tapasā cāpi me prāptā brahmaṇo hi prasādajā
GE09ram_02_u:9729: tvaramāṇau pālayethāṃ na vāṃ jīvitam ādade // Ram_3,3.7
GE09ram_02_u:9734: kṣudra dhik tvāṃ tu hīnārthaṃ mṛtyum anveṣase dhruvam
GE09ram_02_u:9735: raṇe samprāpsyase tiṣṭha na me jīvan gamiṣyasi // Ram_3,3.9
GE09ram_02_u:9737: tataḥ sajyaṃ dhanuḥ kṛtvā rāmaḥ suniśitāñ śarān
GE09ram_02_u:9738: suśīghram abhisaṃdhāya rākṣasaṃ nijaghāna ha // Ram_3,3.10
GE09ram_02_u:9750: dvābhyāṃ śarābhyāṃ cicheda rāmaḥ śastrabhṛtāṃ varaḥ // Ram_3,3.14
GE09ram_02_u:9752: tasya raudrasya saumitrir bāhuṃ savyaṃ babhañja ha
GE09ram_02_u:9753: rāmas tu dakṣiṇaṃ bāhuṃ tarasā tasya rakṣasaḥ // Ram_3,3.15
GE09ram_02_u:9757: idaṃ provāca kākutsthaṃ virādhaḥ puruṣarṣabham // Ram_3,3.16
GE09ram_02_u:9759: kausalyā suprajās tāta rāmas tvaṃ vidito mayā
GE09ram_02_u:9760: vaidehī ca mahābhāgā lakṣmaṇaś ca mahāyaśāḥ // Ram_3,3.17
GE09ram_02_u:9762: abhiśāpād ahaṃ ghorāṃ praviṣṭo rākṣasīṃ tanum
GE09ram_02_u:9763: tumburur nāma gandharvaḥ śapto vaiśravaṇena hi // Ram_3,3.18
GE09ram_02_u:9765: prasādyamānaś ca mayā so 'bravīn māṃ mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9766: yadā dāśarathī rāmas tvāṃ vadhiṣyati saṃyuge // Ram_3,3.19
GE09ram_02_u:9768: tadā prakṛtim āpanno bhavān svargaṃ gamiṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:9769: iti vaiśravaṇo rājā rambhāsaktam uvāca ha // Ram_3,3.20
GE09ram_02_u:9773: bhavanaṃ svaṃ gamiṣyāmi svasti vo 'stu paraṃtapa // Ram_3,3.21
GE09ram_02_u:9778: taṃ kṣipram abhigaccha tvaṃ sa te śreyo vidhāsyati
GE09ram_02_u:9779: avaṭe cāpi māṃ rāma nikṣipya kuśalī vraja // Ram_3,3.23
GE09ram_02_u:9782: avaṭe ye nidhīyante teṣāṃ lokāḥ sanātanāḥ // Ram_3,3.24
GE09ram_02_u:9784: evam uktvā tu kākutsthaṃ virādhaḥ śarapīḍitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9788: virādhaṃ prākṣipac chvabhre nadantaṃ bhairavasvanam // Ram_3,3.26
GE09ram_02_u:9790: tatas tu tau kāñcanacitrakārmukau nihatya rakṣaḥ parigṛhya maithilīm
GE09ram_02_u:9791: vijahratus tau muditau mahāvane divi sthitau candradivākarāv iva // Ram_3,3.27
GE09ram_02_u:9793: hatvā tu taṃ bhīmabalaṃ virādhaṃ rākṣasaṃ vane
GE09ram_02_u:9794: tataḥ sītāṃ pariṣvajya samāśvāsya ca vīryavān
GE09ram_02_u:9795: abravīl lakṣmaṇaṃ rāmo bhrātaraṃ dīptatejasam // Ram_3,4.1
GE09ram_02_u:9797: kaṣṭaṃ vanam idaṃ durgaṃ na ca smo vanagocarāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9803: samīpe śarabhaṅgasya dadarśa mahad adbhutam // Ram_3,4.4
GE09ram_02_u:9809: tadvidhair eva bahubhiḥ pūjyamānaṃ mahātmabhiḥ // Ram_3,4.6
GE09ram_02_u:9818: gṛhīte vananārībhyāṃ dhūyamāne ca mūrdhani // Ram_3,4.9
GE09ram_02_u:9821: antarikṣagataṃ devaṃ vāgbhir agryābhir īḍire // Ram_3,4.10
GE09ram_02_u:9823: dṛṣṭvā śatakratuṃ tatra rāmo lakṣmaṇam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:9824: ye hayāḥ puruhūtasya purā śakrasya naḥ śrutāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9825: antarikṣagatā divyās ta ime harayo dhruvam // Ram_3,4.11
GE09ram_02_u:9827: ime ca puruṣavyāghra ye tiṣṭhanty abhito ratham
GE09ram_02_u:9828: śataṃ śataṃ kuṇḍalino yuvānaḥ khaḍgapāṇayaḥ // Ram_3,4.12
GE09ram_02_u:9833: etaddhi kila devānāṃ vayo bhavati nityadā
GE09ram_02_u:9836: ihaiva saha vaidehyā muhūrtaṃ tiṣṭha lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_02_u:9837: yāvaj janāmy ahaṃ vyaktaṃ ka eṣa dyutimān rathe // Ram_3,4.15
GE09ram_02_u:9839: tam evam uktvā saumitrim ihaiva sthīyatām iti
GE09ram_02_u:9843: śarabhaṅgam anujñāpya vibudhān idam abravīt // Ram_3,4.17
GE09ram_02_u:9845: ihopayāty asau rāmo yāvan māṃ nābhibhāṣate
GE09ram_02_u:9846: niṣṭhāṃ nayata tāvat tu tato māṃ draṣṭum arhati // Ram_3,4.18
GE09ram_02_u:9848: jitavantaṃ kṛtārthaṃ ca draṣṭāham acirād imam
GE09ram_02_u:9849: karma hy anena kartavyaṃ mahad anyaiḥ suduṣkaram // Ram_3,4.19
GE09ram_02_u:9851: iti vajrī tam āmantrya mānayitvā ca tāpasam
GE09ram_02_u:9852: rathena hariyuktena yayau divam ariṃdamaḥ // Ram_3,4.20
GE09ram_02_u:9857: tasya pādau ca saṃgṛhya rāmaḥ sītā ca lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9860: tataḥ śakropayānaṃ tu paryapṛcchat sa rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9861: śarabhaṅgaś ca tat sarvaṃ rāghavāya nyavedayat // Ram_3,4.23
GE09ram_02_u:9863: mām eṣa varado rāma brahmalokaṃ ninīṣati
GE09ram_02_u:9864: jitam ugreṇa tapasā duṣprāpam akṛtātmabhiḥ // Ram_3,4.24
GE09ram_02_u:9867: brahmalokaṃ na gacchāmi tvām adṛṣṭvā priyātithim // Ram_3,4.25
GE09ram_02_u:9870: akṣayā naraśārdūla jitā lokā mayā śubhāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9871: brāhmyāś ca nākapṛṣṭhyāś ca pratigṛhṇīṣva māmakān // Ram_3,4.26
GE09ram_02_u:9874: ṛṣiṇā śarabhaṅgena rāghavo vākyam abravīt // Ram_3,4.27
GE09ram_02_u:9877: āvāsaṃ tv aham icchāmi pradiṣṭam iha kānane // Ram_3,4.28
GE09ram_02_u:9880: śarabhaṅgo mahāprājñaḥ punar evābravīd vacaḥ // Ram_3,4.29
GE09ram_02_u:9882: sutīkṣṇam abhigaccha tvaṃ śucau deśe tapasvinam
GE09ram_02_u:9883: ramaṇīye vanoddeśe sa te vāsaṃ vidhāsyati // Ram_3,4.30
GE09ram_02_u:9885: eṣa panthā naravyāghra muhūrtaṃ paśya tāta mām
GE09ram_02_u:9886: yāvaj jahāmi gātrāṇi jīrṇāṃ tvacam ivoragaḥ // Ram_3,4.31
GE09ram_02_u:9888: tato 'gniṃ sa samādhāya hutvā cājyena mantravit
GE09ram_02_u:9891: tasya romāṇi keśāṃś ca dadāhāgnir mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9892: jīrṇāṃ tvacaṃ tathāsthīni yac ca māṃsaṃ ca śoṇitam // Ram_3,4.33
GE09ram_02_u:9897: sa lokān āhitāgnīnām ṛṣīṇāṃ ca mahātmanām
GE09ram_02_u:9898: devānāṃ ca vyatikramya brahmalokaṃ vyarohata // Ram_3,4.35
GE09ram_02_u:9900: sa puṇyakarmā bhuvane dvijarṣabhaḥ pitāmahaṃ sānucaraṃ dadarśa ha
GE09ram_02_u:9901: pitāmahaś cāpi samīkṣya taṃ dvijaṃ nananda susvāgatam ity uvāca ha // Ram_3,4.36
GE09ram_02_u:9907: aśmakuṭṭāś ca bahavaḥ pattrāhārāś ca tāpasāḥ // Ram_3,5.2
GE09ram_02_u:9917: śarabhaṅgāśrame rāmam abhijagmuś ca tāpasāḥ // Ram_3,5.5
GE09ram_02_u:9919: abhigamya ca dharmajñā rāmaṃ dharmabhṛtāṃ varam
GE09ram_02_u:9923: pradhānaś cāsi nāthaś ca devānāṃ maghavān iva // Ram_3,5.7
GE09ram_02_u:9925: viśrutas triṣu lokeṣu yaśasā vikrameṇa ca
GE09ram_02_u:9926: pitṛvratatvaṃ satyaṃ ca tvayi dharmaś ca puṣkalaḥ // Ram_3,5.8
GE09ram_02_u:9929: arthitvān nātha vakṣyāmas tac ca naḥ kṣantum arhasi // Ram_3,5.9
GE09ram_02_u:9931: adharmas tu mahāṃs tāta bhavet tasya mahīpateḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9932: yo hared baliṣaḍbhāgaṃ na ca rakṣati putravat // Ram_3,5.10
GE09ram_02_u:9934: yuñjānaḥ svān iva prāṇān prāṇair iṣṭān sutān iva
GE09ram_02_u:9935: nityayuktaḥ sadā rakṣan sarvān viṣayavāsinaḥ // Ram_3,5.11
GE09ram_02_u:9937: prāpnoti śāśvatīṃ rāma kīrtiṃ sa bahuvārṣikīm
GE09ram_02_u:9938: brahmaṇaḥ sthānam āsādya tatra cāpi mahīyate // Ram_3,5.12
GE09ram_02_u:9940: yat karoti paraṃ dharmaṃ munir mūlaphalāśanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9941: tatra rājñaś caturbhāgaḥ prajā dharmeṇa rakṣataḥ // Ram_3,5.13
GE09ram_02_u:9944: tvan nātho 'nāthavad rāma rākṣasair vadhyate bhṛśam // Ram_3,5.14
GE09ram_02_u:9947: hatānāṃ rākṣasair ghorair bahūnāṃ bahudhā vane // Ram_3,5.15
GE09ram_02_u:9950: citrakūṭālayānāṃ ca kriyate kadanaṃ mahat // Ram_3,5.16
GE09ram_02_u:9952: evaṃ vayaṃ na mṛṣyāmo viprakāraṃ tapasvinām
GE09ram_02_u:9953: kriyamāṇaṃ vane ghoraṃ rakṣobhir bhīmakarmabhiḥ // Ram_3,5.17
GE09ram_02_u:9955: tatas tvāṃ śaraṇārthaṃ ca śaraṇyaṃ samupasthitāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9956: paripālaya no rāma vadhyamānān niśācaraiḥ // Ram_3,5.18
GE09ram_02_u:9958: etac chrutvā tu kākutsthas tāpasānāṃ tapasvinām
GE09ram_02_u:9959: idaṃ provāca dharmātmā sarvān eva tapasvinaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9960: naivam arhatha māṃ vaktum ājñāpyo 'haṃ tapasvinām // Ram_3,5.19
GE09ram_02_u:9963: tasya me 'yaṃ vane vāso bhaviṣyati mahāphalaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9964: tapasvināṃ raṇe śatrūn hantum icchāmi rākṣasān // Ram_3,5.20
GE09ram_02_u:9966: dattvā varaṃ cāpi tapodhanānāṃ dharme dhṛtātmā saha lakṣmaṇena
GE09ram_02_u:9967: tapodhanaiś cāpi sabhājyavṛttaḥ sutīkṣṇam evābhijagāma vīraḥ // Ram_3,5.21
GE09ram_02_u:9969: rāmas tu sahito bhrātrā sītayā ca paraṃtapaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9970: sutīkṣṇasyāśramapadaṃ jagāma saha tair dvijaiḥ // Ram_3,6.1
GE09ram_02_u:9972: sa gatvā dūram adhvānaṃ nadīs tīrtvā bahūdakāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9973: dadarśa vipulaṃ śailaṃ mahāmegham ivonnatam // Ram_3,6.2
GE09ram_02_u:9975: tatas tad ikṣvākuvarau satataṃ vividhair drumaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9976: kānanaṃ tau viviśatuḥ sītayā saha rāghavau // Ram_3,6.3
GE09ram_02_u:9982: rāmaḥ sutīkṣṇaṃ vidhivat tapovṛddham abhāṣata // Ram_3,6.5
GE09ram_02_u:9984: rāmo 'ham asmi bhagavan bhavantaṃ draṣṭum āgataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:9985: tan mābhivada dharmajña maharṣe satyavikrama // Ram_3,6.6
GE09ram_02_u:9987: sa nirīkṣya tato vīraṃ rāmaṃ dharmabhṛtāṃ varam
GE09ram_02_u:9988: samāśliṣya ca bāhubhyām idaṃ vacanam abravīt // Ram_3,6.7
GE09ram_02_u:9990: svāgataṃ khalu te vīra rāma dharmabhṛtāṃ vara
GE09ram_02_u:9991: āśramo 'yaṃ tvayākrāntaḥ sanātha iva sāmpratam // Ram_3,6.8
GE09ram_02_u:9994: devalokam ito vīra dehaṃ tyaktvā mahītale // Ram_3,6.9
GE09ram_02_u:9998: sarvāṃl lokāñ jitān āha mama puṇyena karmaṇā // Ram_3,6.10
GE09ram_02_u:10001: matprasādāt sabhāryas tvaṃ viharasva salakṣmaṇaḥ // Ram_3,6.11
GE09ram_02_u:10004: pratyuvācātmavān rāmo brahmāṇam iva vāsavaḥ // Ram_3,6.12
GE09ram_02_u:10007: āvāsaṃ tv aham icchāmi pradiṣṭam iha kānane // Ram_3,6.13
GE09ram_02_u:10012: evam uktas tu rāmeṇa maharṣir lokaviśrutaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:10013: abravīn madhuraṃ vākyaṃ harṣeṇa mahatāplutaḥ // Ram_3,6.15
GE09ram_02_u:10015: ayam evāśramo rāma guṇavān ramyatām iha
GE09ram_02_u:10021: tac chrutvā vacanaṃ tasya maharṣer lakṣmaṇāgrajaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:10022: uvāca vacanaṃ dhīro vikṛṣya saśaraṃ dhanuḥ // Ram_3,6.18
GE09ram_02_u:10027: bhavāṃs tatrābhiṣajyeta kiṃ syāt kṛcchrataraṃ tataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:10028: etasminn āśrame vāsaṃ ciraṃ tu na samarthaye // Ram_3,6.20
GE09ram_02_u:10030: tam evam uktvā varadaṃ rāmaḥ saṃdhyām upāgamat
GE09ram_02_u:10031: anvāsya paścimāṃ saṃdhyāṃ tatra vāsam akalpayat // Ram_3,6.21
GE09ram_02_u:10033: tataḥ śubhaṃ tāpasabhojyam annaṃ svayaṃ sutīkṣṇaḥ puruṣarṣabhābhyām
GE09ram_02_u:10034: tābhyāṃ susatkṛtya dadau mahātmā saṃdhyānivṛttau rajanīṃ samīkṣya // Ram_3,6.22
GE09ram_02_u:10037: pariṇāmya niśāṃ tatra prabhāte pratyabudhyata // Ram_3,7.1
GE09ram_02_u:10039: utthāya tu yathākālaṃ rāghavaḥ saha sītayā
GE09ram_02_u:10042: atha te 'gniṃ surāṃś caiva vaidehī rāmalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_02_u:10043: kālyaṃ vidhivad abhyarcya tapasviśaraṇe vane // Ram_3,7.3
GE09ram_02_u:10046: sutīkṣṇam abhigamyedaṃ ślakṣṇaṃ vacanam abruvan // Ram_3,7.4
GE09ram_02_u:10048: sukhoṣitāḥ sma bhagavaṃs tvayā pūjyena pūjitāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:10049: āpṛcchāmaḥ prayāsyāmo munayas tvarayanti naḥ // Ram_3,7.5
GE09ram_02_u:10055: dharmanityais tapodāntair viśikhair iva pāvakaiḥ // Ram_3,7.7
GE09ram_02_u:10060: tāvad icchāmahe gantum ity uktvā caraṇau muneḥ
GE09ram_02_u:10061: vavande sahasaumitriḥ sītayā saha rāghavaḥ // Ram_3,7.9
GE09ram_02_u:10064: gāḍham āliṅgya sasneham idaṃ vacanam abravīt // Ram_3,7.10
GE09ram_02_u:10066: ariṣṭaṃ gaccha panthānaṃ rāma saumitriṇā saha
GE09ram_02_u:10070: eṣāṃ tapasvināṃ vīra tapasā bhāvitātmanām // Ram_3,7.12
GE09ram_02_u:10081: gamyatāṃ vatsa saumitre bhavān api ca gacchatu
GE09ram_02_u:10082: āgantavyaṃ ca te dṛṣṭvā punar evāśramaṃ mama // Ram_3,7.16
GE09ram_02_u:10084: evam uktas tathety uktvā kākutsthaḥ sahalakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:10085: pradakṣiṇaṃ muniṃ kṛtvā prasthātum upacakrame // Ram_3,7.17
GE09ram_02_u:10088: dadau sītā tayor bhrātroḥ khaḍgau ca vimalau tataḥ // Ram_3,7.18
GE09ram_02_u:10090: ābadhya ca śubhe tūṇī cāpau cādāya sasvanau
GE09ram_02_u:10091: niṣkrāntāv āśramād gantum ubhau tau rāmalakṣmaṇau // Ram_3,7.19
GE09ram_02_u:10094: vaidehī snigdhayā vācā bhartāram idam abravīt // Ram_3,8.1
GE09ram_02_u:10096: ayaṃ dharmaḥ susūkṣmeṇa vidhinā prāpyate mahān
GE09ram_02_u:10097: nivṛttena ca śakyo 'yaṃ vyasanāt kāmajād iha // Ram_3,8.2
GE09ram_02_u:10099: trīṇy eva vyasanāny atra kāmajāni bhavanty uta
GE09ram_02_u:10101: paradārābhigamanaṃ vinā vairaṃ ca raudratā // Ram_3,8.3
GE09ram_02_u:10103: mithyāvākyaṃ na te bhūtaṃ na bhaviṣyati rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:10106: tac ca sarvaṃ mahābāho śakyaṃ voḍhuṃ jitendriyaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:10107: tava vaśyendriyatvaṃ ca jānāmi śubhadarśana // Ram_3,8.5
GE09ram_02_u:10110: nirvairaṃ kriyate mohāt tac ca te samupasthitam // Ram_3,8.6
GE09ram_02_u:10113: ṛṣīṇāṃ rakṣaṇārthāya vadhaḥ saṃyati rakṣasām // Ram_3,8.7
GE09ram_02_u:10115: etannimittaṃ ca vanaṃ daṇḍakā iti viśrutam
GE09ram_02_u:10116: prasthitas tvaṃ saha bhrātrā dhṛtabāṇaśarāsanaḥ // Ram_3,8.8
GE09ram_02_u:10118: tatas tvāṃ prasthitaṃ dṛṣṭvā mama cintākulaṃ manaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:10119: tvadvṛttaṃ cintayantyā vai bhaven niḥśreyasaṃ hitam // Ram_3,8.9
GE09ram_02_u:10121: na hi me rocate vīra gamanaṃ daṇḍakān prati
GE09ram_02_u:10122: kāraṇaṃ tatra vakṣyāmi vadantyāḥ śrūyatāṃ mama // Ram_3,8.10
GE09ram_02_u:10124: tvaṃ hi bāṇadhanuṣpāṇir bhrātrā saha vanaṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:10125: dṛṣṭvā vanacarān sarvān kaccit kuryāḥ śaravyayam // Ram_3,8.11
GE09ram_02_u:10128: samīpataḥ sthitaṃ tejobalam ucchrayate bhṛśam // Ram_3,8.12
GE09ram_02_u:10130: purā kila mahābāho tapasvī satyavāk śuciḥ
GE09ram_02_u:10131: kasmiṃścid abhavat puṇye vane ratamṛgadvije // Ram_3,8.13
GE09ram_02_u:10133: tasyaiva tapaso vighnaṃ kartum indraḥ śacīpatiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:10137: sa nyāsavidhinā dattaḥ puṇye tapasi tiṣṭhataḥ // Ram_3,8.15
GE09ram_02_u:10140: vane tu vicaraty eva rakṣan pratyayam ātmanaḥ // Ram_3,8.16
GE09ram_02_u:10142: yatra gacchaty upādātuṃ mūlāni ca phalāni ca
GE09ram_02_u:10143: na vinā yāti taṃ khaḍgaṃ nyāsarakṣaṇatatparaḥ // Ram_3,8.17
GE09ram_02_u:10145: nityaṃ śastraṃ parivahan krameṇa sa tapodhanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:10146: cakāra raudrīṃ svāṃ buddhiṃ tyaktvā tapasi niścayam // Ram_3,8.18
GE09ram_02_u:10149: tasya śastrasya saṃvāsāj jagāma narakaṃ muniḥ // Ram_3,8.19
GE09ram_02_u:10151: snehāc ca bahumānāc ca smāraye tvāṃ na śikṣaye
GE09ram_02_u:10152: na kathaṃcana sā kāryā gṛhītadhanuṣā tvayā // Ram_3,8.20
GE09ram_02_u:10154: buddhir vairaṃ vinā hantuṃ rākṣasān daṇḍakāśritān
GE09ram_02_u:10155: aparādhaṃ vinā hantuṃ lokān vīra na kāmaye // Ram_3,8.21
GE09ram_02_u:10158: dhanuṣā kāryam etāvad ārtānām abhirakṣaṇam // Ram_3,8.22
GE09ram_02_u:10160: kva ca śastraṃ kva ca vanaṃ kva ca kṣātraṃ tapaḥ kva ca
GE09ram_02_u:10161: vyāviddham idam asmābhir deśadharmas tu pūjyatām // Ram_3,8.23
GE09ram_02_u:10164: punar gatvā tv ayodhyāyāṃ kṣatradharmaṃ cariṣyasi // Ram_3,8.24
GE09ram_02_u:10166: akṣayā tu bhavet prītiḥ śvaśrūśvaśurayor mama
GE09ram_02_u:10167: yadi rājyaṃ hi saṃnyasya bhaves tvaṃ nirato muniḥ // Ram_3,8.25
GE09ram_02_u:10169: dharmād arthaḥ prabhavati dharmāt prabhavate sukham
GE09ram_02_u:10170: dharmeṇa labhate sarvaṃ dharmasāram idaṃ jagat // Ram_3,8.26
GE09ram_02_u:10172: ātmānaṃ niyamais tais taiḥ karṣayitvā prayatnataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:10173: prāpyate nipuṇair dharmo na sukhāl labhyate sukham // Ram_3,8.27
GE09ram_02_u:10175: nityaṃ śucimatiḥ saumya cara dharmaṃ tapovane
GE09ram_02_u:10176: sarvaṃ hi viditaṃ tubhyaṃ trailokyam api tattvataḥ // Ram_3,8.28
GE09ram_02_u:10178: strīcāpalād etad udāhṛtaṃ me dharmaṃ ca vaktuṃ tava kaḥ samarthaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:10179: vicārya buddhyā tu sahānujena yad rocate tat kuru mācireṇa // Ram_3,8.29
GE09ram_02_u:10181: vākyam etat tu vaidehyā vyāhṛtaṃ bhartṛbhaktayā
GE09ram_02_u:10182: śrutvā dharme sthito rāmaḥ pratyuvācātha maithilīm // Ram_3,9.1
GE09ram_02_u:10184: hitam uktaṃ tvayā devi snigdhayā sadṛśaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:10185: kulaṃ vyapadiśantyā ca dharmajñe janakātmaje // Ram_3,9.2
GE09ram_02_u:10187: kiṃ tu vakṣyāmy ahaṃ devi tvayaivoktam idaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:10188: kṣatriyair dhāryate cāpo nārtaśabdo bhaved iti // Ram_3,9.3
GE09ram_02_u:10191: māṃ sīte svayam āgamya śaraṇyāḥ śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ // Ram_3,9.4
GE09ram_02_u:10194: na labhante sukhaṃ bhītā rākṣasaiḥ krūrakarmabhiḥ // Ram_3,9.5
GE09ram_02_u:10196: kāle kāle ca niratā niyamair vividhair vane
GE09ram_02_u:10200: asmān abhyavapadyeti mām ūcur dvijasattamāḥ // Ram_3,9.7
GE09ram_02_u:10202: mayā tu vacanaṃ śrutvā teṣām evaṃ mukhāc cyutam
GE09ram_02_u:10203: kṛtvā caraṇaśuśrūṣāṃ vākyam etad udāhṛtam // Ram_3,9.8
GE09ram_02_u:10205: prasīdantu bhavanto me hrīr eṣā hi mamātulā
GE09ram_02_u:10207: kiṃ karomīti ca mayā vyāhṛtaṃ dvijasaṃnidhau // Ram_3,9.9
GE09ram_02_u:10209: sarvair eva samāgamya vāg iyaṃ samudāhṛtā
GE09ram_02_u:10211: arditāḥ sma bhṛśaṃ rāma bhavān nas trātum arhati // Ram_3,9.10
GE09ram_02_u:10214: dharṣayanti sma durdharṣā rākṣasāḥ piśitāśanāḥ // Ram_3,9.11
GE09ram_02_u:10217: gatiṃ mṛgayamāṇānāṃ bhavān naḥ paramā gatiḥ // Ram_3,9.12
GE09ram_02_u:10220: cirārjitaṃ tu necchāmas tapaḥ khaṇḍayituṃ vayam // Ram_3,9.13
GE09ram_02_u:10223: tena śāpaṃ na muñcāmo bhakṣyamāṇāś ca rākṣasaiḥ // Ram_3,9.14
GE09ram_02_u:10226: rakṣa nas tvaṃ saha bhrātrā tvannāthā hi vayaṃ vane // Ram_3,9.15
GE09ram_02_u:10228: mayā caitad vacaḥ śrutvā kārtsnyena paripālanam
GE09ram_02_u:10231: saṃśrutya ca na śakṣyāmi jīvamānaḥ pratiśravam
GE09ram_02_u:10232: munīnām anyathā kartuṃ satyam iṣṭaṃ hi me sadā // Ram_3,9.17
GE09ram_02_u:10234: apy ahaṃ jīvitaṃ jahyāṃ tvāṃ vā sīte salakṣmaṇām
GE09ram_02_u:10235: na tu pratijñāṃ saṃśrutya brāhmaṇebhyo viśeṣataḥ // Ram_3,9.18
GE09ram_02_u:10237: tad avaśyaṃ mayā kāryam ṛṣīṇāṃ paripālanam
GE09ram_02_u:10238: anuktenāpi vaidehi pratijñāya tu kiṃ punaḥ // Ram_3,9.19
GE09ram_02_u:10240: mama snehāc ca sauhārdād idam uktaṃ tvayā vacaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:10241: parituṣṭo 'smy ahaṃ sīte na hy aniṣṭo 'nuśiṣyate
GE09ram_02_u:10242: sadṛśaṃ cānurūpaṃ ca kulasya tava śobhane // Ram_3,9.20
GE09ram_02_u:10244: ity evam uktvā vacanaṃ mahātmā sītāṃ priyāṃ maithilarājaputrīm
GE09ram_02_u:10245: rāmo dhanuṣmān saha lakṣmaṇena jagāma ramyāṇi tapovanāni // Ram_3,9.21
GE09ram_02_u:10247: agrataḥ prayayau rāmaḥ sītā madhye sumadhyamā
GE09ram_02_u:10248: pṛṣṭhatas tu dhanuṣpāṇir lakṣmaṇo 'nujagāma ha // Ram_3,10.1
GE09ram_02_u:10250: tau paśyamānau vividhāñ śailaprasthān vanāni ca
GE09ram_02_u:10251: nadīś ca vividhā ramyā jagmatuḥ saha sītayā // Ram_3,10.2
GE09ram_02_u:10254: sarāṃsi ca sapadmāni yutāni jalajaiḥ khagaiḥ // Ram_3,10.3
GE09ram_02_u:10257: mahiṣāṃś ca varāhāṃś ca gajāṃś ca drumavairiṇaḥ // Ram_3,10.4
GE09ram_02_u:10259: te gatvā dūram adhvānaṃ lambamāne divākare
GE09ram_02_u:10260: dadṛśuḥ sahitā ramyaṃ taṭākaṃ yojanāyatam // Ram_3,10.5
GE09ram_02_u:10266: gītavāditranirghoṣo na tu kaścana dṛśyate // Ram_3,10.7
GE09ram_02_u:10268: tataḥ kautūhalād rāmo lakṣmaṇaś ca mahārathaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:10269: muniṃ dharmabhṛtaṃ nāma praṣṭuṃ samupacakrame // Ram_3,10.8
GE09ram_02_u:10271: idam atyadbhutaṃ śrutvā sarveṣāṃ no mahāmune
GE09ram_02_u:10272: kautūhalaṃ mahaj jātaṃ kim idaṃ sādhu kathyatām // Ram_3,10.9
GE09ram_02_u:10274: tenaivam ukto dharmātmā rāghaveṇa munis tadā
GE09ram_02_u:10275: prabhāvaṃ sarasaḥ kṛtsnam ākhyātum upacakrame // Ram_3,10.10
GE09ram_02_u:10278: nirmitaṃ tapasā rāma muninā māṇḍakarṇinā // Ram_3,10.11
GE09ram_02_u:10280: sa hi tepe tapas tīvraṃ māṇḍakarṇir mahāmuniḥ
GE09ram_02_u:10285: asmākaṃ kasyacit sthānam eṣa prārthayate muniḥ // Ram_3,10.13
GE09ram_02_u:10287: tataḥ kartuṃ tapovighnaṃ sarvair devair niyojitāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:10293: tāś caivāpsarasaḥ pañca muneḥ patnītvam āgatāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:10294: taṭāke nirmitaṃ tāsām asminn antarhitaṃ gṛham // Ram_3,10.16
GE09ram_02_u:10297: ramayanti tapoyogān muniṃ yauvanam āsthitam // Ram_3,10.17
GE09ram_02_u:10303: rāghavaḥ pratijagrāha saha bhrātrā mahāyaśāḥ // Ram_3,10.19
GE09ram_02_u:10308: praviśya saha vaidehyā lakṣmaṇena ca rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:10309: tadā tasmin sa kākutsthaḥ śrīmaty āśramamaṇḍale // Ram_3,10.21
GE09ram_02_u:10312: jagāma cāśramāṃs teṣāṃ paryāyeṇa tapasvinām // Ram_3,10.22
GE09ram_02_u:10314: yeṣām uṣitavān pūrvaṃ sakāśe sa mahāstravit
GE09ram_02_u:10315: kvacit paridaśān māsān ekaṃ saṃvatsaraṃ kvacit // Ram_3,10.23
GE09ram_02_u:10317: kvacic ca caturo māsān pañcaṣaṭ cāparān kvacit
GE09ram_02_u:10318: aparatrādhikān māsān adhyardham adhikaṃ kvacit // Ram_3,10.24
GE09ram_02_u:10320: trīn māsān aṣṭamāsāṃś ca rāghavo nyavasat sukham
GE09ram_02_u:10321: tathā saṃvasatas tasya munīnām āśrameṣu vai
GE09ram_02_u:10322: ramataś cānukūlyena yayuḥ saṃvatsarā daśa // Ram_3,10.25
GE09ram_02_u:10324: parisṛtya ca dharmajño rāghavaḥ saha sītayā
GE09ram_02_u:10325: sutīkṣṇasyāśramaṃ śrīmān punar evājagāma ha // Ram_3,10.26
GE09ram_02_u:10327: sa tam āśramam āgamya munibhiḥ pratipūjitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:10328: tatrāpi nyavasad rāmaḥ kaṃcit kālam ariṃdamaḥ // Ram_3,10.27
GE09ram_02_u:10331: upāsīnaḥ sa kākutsthaḥ sutīkṣṇam idam abravīt // Ram_3,10.28
GE09ram_02_u:10334: vasatīti mayā nityaṃ kathāḥ kathayatāṃ śrutam // Ram_3,10.29
GE09ram_02_u:10336: na tu jānāmi taṃ deśaṃ vanasyāsya mahattayā
GE09ram_02_u:10337: kutrāśramapadaṃ puṇyaṃ maharṣes tasya dhīmataḥ // Ram_3,10.30
GE09ram_02_u:10339: prasādāt tatra bhavataḥ sānujaḥ saha sītayā
GE09ram_02_u:10343: yad ahaṃ taṃ munivaraṃ śuśrūṣeyam api svayam // Ram_3,10.32
GE09ram_02_u:10345: iti rāmasya sa muniḥ śrutvā dharmātmano vacaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:10348: aham apy etad eva tvāṃ vaktukāmaḥ salakṣmaṇam
GE09ram_02_u:10349: agastyam abhigaccheti sītayā saha rāghava // Ram_3,10.34
GE09ram_02_u:10351: diṣṭyā tv idānīm arthe 'smin svayam eva bravīṣi mām
GE09ram_02_u:10352: aham ākhyāsi te vatsa yatrāgastyo mahāmuniḥ // Ram_3,10.35
GE09ram_02_u:10354: yojanāny āśramāt tāta yāhi catvāri vai tataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:10355: dakṣiṇena mahāñ śrīmān agastyabhrātur āśramaḥ // Ram_3,10.36
GE09ram_02_u:10363: tatraikāṃ rajanīm uṣya prabhāte rāma gamyatām
GE09ram_02_u:10364: dakṣiṇāṃ diśam āsthāya vanakhaṇḍasya pārśvataḥ // Ram_3,10.39
GE09ram_02_u:10368: raṃsyate tatra vaidehī lakṣmaṇaś ca tvayā saha // Ram_3,10.40
GE09ram_02_u:10371: yadi buddhiḥ kṛtā draṣṭum agastyaṃ taṃ mahāmunim
GE09ram_02_u:10372: adyaiva gamane buddhiṃ rocayasva mahāyaśaḥ // Ram_3,10.41
GE09ram_02_u:10374: iti rāmo muneḥ śrutvā saha bhrātrābhivādya ca
GE09ram_02_u:10375: pratasthe 'gastyam uddiśya sānujaḥ saha sītayā // Ram_3,10.42
GE09ram_02_u:10378: sarāṃsi saritaś caiva pathi mārgavaśānugāḥ // Ram_3,10.43
GE09ram_02_u:10381: idaṃ paramasaṃhṛṣṭo vākyaṃ lakṣmaṇam abravīt // Ram_3,10.44
GE09ram_02_u:10384: agastyasya muner bhrātur dṛśyate puṇyakarmaṇaḥ // Ram_3,10.45
GE09ram_02_u:10386: yathā hīme vanasyāsya jñātāḥ pathi sahasraśaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:10387: saṃnatāḥ phalabhāreṇa puṣpabhāreṇa ca drumāḥ // Ram_3,10.46
GE09ram_02_u:10389: pippalīnāṃ ca pakvānāṃ vanād asmād upāgataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:10392: tatra tatra ca dṛśyante saṃkṣiptāḥ kāṣṭhasaṃcayāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:10393: lūnāś ca pathi dṛśyante darbhā vaiḍūryavarcasaḥ // Ram_3,10.48
GE09ram_02_u:10399: puṣpopahāraṃ kurvanti kusumaiḥ svayam ārjitaiḥ // Ram_3,10.50
GE09ram_02_u:10401: tat sutīkṣṇasya vacanaṃ yathā saumya mayā śrutam
GE09ram_02_u:10402: agastyasyāśramo bhrātur nūnam eṣa bhaviṣyati // Ram_3,10.51
GE09ram_02_u:10405: yasya bhrātrā kṛteyaṃ dik śaraṇyā puṇyakarmaṇā // Ram_3,10.52
GE09ram_02_u:10407: ihaikadā kila krūro vātāpir api celvalaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:10408: bhrātarau sahitāv āstāṃ brāhmaṇaghnau mahāsurau // Ram_3,10.53
GE09ram_02_u:10410: dhārayan brāhmaṇaṃ rūpam ilvalaḥ saṃskṛtaṃ vadan
GE09ram_02_u:10411: āmantrayati viprān sa śrāddham uddiśya nirghṛṇaḥ // Ram_3,10.54
GE09ram_02_u:10413: bhrātaraṃ saṃskṛtaṃ bhrātā tatas taṃ meṣarūpiṇam
GE09ram_02_u:10414: tān dvijān bhojayāmāsa śrāddhadṛṣṭena karmaṇā // Ram_3,10.55
GE09ram_02_u:10417: vātāpe niṣkramasveti svareṇa mahatā vadan // Ram_3,10.56
GE09ram_02_u:10419: tato bhrātur vacaḥ śrutvā vātāpir meṣavan nadan
GE09ram_02_u:10420: bhittvā bhittvā śarīrāṇi brāhmaṇānāṃ viniṣpatat // Ram_3,10.57
GE09ram_02_u:10426: anubhūya kila śrāddhe bhakṣitaḥ sa mahāsuraḥ // Ram_3,10.59
GE09ram_02_u:10428: tataḥ sampannam ity uktvā dattvā hastāvasecanam
GE09ram_02_u:10431: taṃ tathā bhāṣamāṇaṃ tu bhrātaraṃ vipraghātinam
GE09ram_02_u:10432: abravīt prahasan dhīmān agastyo munisattamaḥ // Ram_3,10.61
GE09ram_02_u:10434: kuto niṣkramituṃ śaktir mayā jīrṇasya rakṣasaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:10435: bhrātus te meṣarūpasya gatasya yamasādanam // Ram_3,10.62
GE09ram_02_u:10437: atha tasya vacaḥ śrutvā bhrātur nidhanasaṃśritam
GE09ram_02_u:10438: pradharṣayitum ārebhe muniṃ krodhān niśācaraḥ // Ram_3,10.63
GE09ram_02_u:10444: viprānukampayā yena karmedaṃ duṣkaraṃ kṛtam // Ram_3,10.65
GE09ram_02_u:10449: upāsya paścimāṃ saṃdhyāṃ saha bhrātrā yathāvidhi
GE09ram_02_u:10452: samyak pratigṛhītas tu muninā tena rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:10453: nyavasat tāṃ niśām ekāṃ prāśya mūlaphalāni ca // Ram_3,10.68
GE09ram_02_u:10456: bhrātaraṃ tam agastyasya āmantrayata rāghavaḥ // Ram_3,10.69
GE09ram_02_u:10458: abhivādaye tvā bhagavan sukham adhyuṣito niśām
GE09ram_02_u:10459: āmantraye tvāṃ gacchāmi guruṃ te draṣṭum agrajam // Ram_3,10.70
GE09ram_02_u:10462: yathoddiṣṭena mārgeṇa vanaṃ tac cāvalokayan // Ram_3,10.71
GE09ram_02_u:10464: nīvārān panasāṃs tālāṃs timiśān vañjulān dhavān
GE09ram_02_u:10465: ciribilvān madhūkāṃś ca bilvān api ca tindukān // Ram_3,10.72
GE09ram_02_u:10468: dadarśa rāmaḥ śataśas tatra kāntārapādapān // Ram_3,10.73
GE09ram_02_u:10471: mattaiḥ śakunisaṃghaiś ca śataśaḥ pratināditān // Ram_3,10.74
GE09ram_02_u:10476: snigdhapattrā yathā vṛkṣā yathā kṣāntā mṛgadvijāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:10479: agastya iti vikhyāto loke svenaiva karmaṇā
GE09ram_02_u:10486: dakṣiṇā dik kṛtā yena śaraṇyā puṇyakarmaṇā // Ram_3,10.79
GE09ram_02_u:10489: dig iyaṃ dakṣiṇā trāsād dṛśyate nopabhujyate // Ram_3,10.80
GE09ram_02_u:10492: tadā prabhṛti nirvairāḥ praśāntā rajanīcarāḥ // Ram_3,10.81
GE09ram_02_u:10494: nāmnā ceyaṃ bhagavato dakṣiṇā dik pradakṣiṇā
GE09ram_02_u:10495: prathitā triṣu lokeṣu durdharṣā krūrakarmabhiḥ // Ram_3,10.82
GE09ram_02_u:10498: saṃdeśaṃ pālayaṃs tasya vindhyaḥ śailo na vardhate // Ram_3,10.83
GE09ram_02_u:10503: eṣa lokārcitaḥ sādhur hite nityaṃ rataḥ satām
GE09ram_02_u:10504: asmān adhigatān eṣa śreyasā yojayiṣyati // Ram_3,10.85
GE09ram_02_u:10507: śeṣaṃ ca vanavāsasya saumya vatsyāmy ahaṃ prabho // Ram_3,10.86
GE09ram_02_u:10509: atra devāḥ sagandharvāḥ siddhāś ca paramarṣayaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:10512: nātra jīven mṛṣāvādī krūro vā yadi vā śaṭhaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:10513: nṛśaṃsaḥ kāmavṛtto vā munir eṣa tathāvidhaḥ // Ram_3,10.88
GE09ram_02_u:10515: atra devāś ca yakṣāś ca nāgāś ca patagaiḥ saha
GE09ram_02_u:10519: tyaktvā dehān navair dehaiḥ svaryātāḥ paramarṣayaḥ // Ram_3,10.90
GE09ram_02_u:10521: yakṣatvam amaratvaṃ ca rājyāni vividhāni ca
GE09ram_02_u:10522: atra devāḥ prayacchanti bhūtair ārādhitāḥ śubhaiḥ // Ram_3,10.91
GE09ram_02_u:10525: nivedayeha māṃ prāptam ṛṣaye saha sītayā // Ram_3,10.92
GE09ram_02_u:10528: agastyaśiṣyam āsādya vākyam etad uvāca ha // Ram_3,11.1
GE09ram_02_u:10530: rājā daśaratho nāma jyeṣṭhas tasya suto balī
GE09ram_02_u:10531: rāmaḥ prāpto muniṃ draṣṭuṃ bhāryayā saha sītayā // Ram_3,11.2
GE09ram_02_u:10533: lakṣmaṇo nāma tasyāhaṃ bhrātā tv avarajo hitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:10534: anukūlaś ca bhaktaś ca yadi te śrotram āgataḥ // Ram_3,11.3
GE09ram_02_u:10536: te vayaṃ vanam atyugraṃ praviṣṭāḥ pitṛśāsanāt
GE09ram_02_u:10537: draṣṭum icchāmahe sarve bhagavantaṃ nivedyatām // Ram_3,11.4
GE09ram_02_u:10545: putrau daśarathasyemau rāmo lakṣmaṇa eva ca
GE09ram_02_u:10546: praviṣṭāv āśramapadaṃ sītayā saha bhāryayā // Ram_3,11.7
GE09ram_02_u:10549: yad atrānantaraṃ tattvam ājñāpayitum arhasi // Ram_3,11.8
GE09ram_02_u:10551: tataḥ śiṣyād upaśrutya prāptaṃ rāmaṃ salakṣmaṇam
GE09ram_02_u:10552: vaidehīṃ ca mahābhāgām idaṃ vacanam abravīt // Ram_3,11.9
GE09ram_02_u:10554: diṣṭyā rāmaś cirasyādya draṣṭuṃ māṃ samupāgataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:10555: manasā kāṅkṣitaṃ hy asya mayāpy āgamanaṃ prati // Ram_3,11.10
GE09ram_02_u:10558: praveśyatāṃ samīpaṃ me kiṃ cāsau na praveśitaḥ // Ram_3,11.11
GE09ram_02_u:10560: evam uktas tu muninā dharmajñena mahātmanā
GE09ram_02_u:10563: tato niṣkramya saṃbhrāntaḥ śiṣyo lakṣmaṇam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:10564: kvāsau rāmo muniṃ draṣṭum etu praviśatu svayam // Ram_3,11.13
GE09ram_02_u:10567: darśayāmāsa kākutsthaṃ sītāṃ ca janakātmajām // Ram_3,11.14
GE09ram_02_u:10569: taṃ śiṣyaḥ praśritaṃ vākyam agastyavacanaṃ bruvan
GE09ram_02_u:10575: sa tatra brahmaṇaḥ sthānam agneḥ sthānaṃ tathaiva ca
GE09ram_02_u:10576: viṣṇoḥ sthānaṃ mahendrasya sthānaṃ caiva vivasvataḥ // Ram_3,11.17
GE09ram_02_u:10578: somasthānaṃ bhagasthānaṃ sthānaṃ kauberam eva ca
GE09ram_02_u:10579: dhātur vidhātuḥ sthānaṃ ca vāyoḥ sthānaṃ tathaiva ca // Ram_3,11.18
GE09ram_02_u:10581: tataḥ śiṣyaiḥ parivṛto munir apy abhiniṣpatat
GE09ram_02_u:10583: abravīd vacanaṃ vīro lakṣmaṇaṃ lakṣmivardhanam // Ram_3,11.19
GE09ram_02_u:10585: eṣa lakṣmaṇa niṣkrāmaty agastyo bhagavān ṛṣiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:10589: jagrāha paramaprītas tasya pādau paraṃtapaḥ // Ram_3,11.21
GE09ram_02_u:10591: abhivādya tu dharmātmā tasthau rāmaḥ kṛtāñjaliḥ
GE09ram_02_u:10592: sītayā saha vaidehyā tadā rāmaḥ salakṣmaṇaḥ // Ram_3,11.22
GE09ram_02_u:10595: kuśalapraśnam uktvā ca āsyatām iti so 'bravīt // Ram_3,11.23
GE09ram_02_u:10597: agniṃ hutvā pradāyārghyam atithiṃ pratipūjya ca
GE09ram_02_u:10598: vānaprasthena dharmeṇa sa teṣāṃ bhojanaṃ dadau // Ram_3,11.24
GE09ram_02_u:10601: uvāca rāmam āsīnaṃ prāñjaliṃ dharmakovidam // Ram_3,11.25
GE09ram_02_u:10604: duḥsākṣīva pare loke svāni māṃsāni bhakṣayet // Ram_3,11.26
GE09ram_02_u:10607: pūjanīyaś ca mānyaś ca bhavān prāptaḥ priyātithiḥ // Ram_3,11.27
GE09ram_02_u:10609: evam uktvā phalair mūlaiḥ puṣpaiś cānyaiś ca rāghavam
GE09ram_02_u:10610: pūjayitvā yathākāmaṃ punar eva tato 'bravīt // Ram_3,11.28
GE09ram_02_u:10616: datto mama mahendreṇa tūṇī cākṣayasāyakau // Ram_3,11.30
GE09ram_02_u:10618: sampūrṇau niśitair bāṇair jvaladbhir iva pāvakaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:10621: anena dhanuṣā rāma hatvā saṃkhye mahāsurān
GE09ram_02_u:10622: ājahāra śriyaṃ dīptāṃ purā viṣṇur divaukasām // Ram_3,11.32
GE09ram_02_u:10624: tad dhanus tau ca tūṇīrau śaraṃ khaḍgaṃ ca mānada
GE09ram_02_u:10625: jayāya pratigṛhṇīṣva vajraṃ vajradharo yathā // Ram_3,11.33
GE09ram_02_u:10627: evam uktvā mahātejāḥ samastaṃ tad varāyudham
GE09ram_02_u:10628: dattvā rāmāya bhagavān agastyaḥ punar abravīt // Ram_3,11.34
GE09ram_02_u:10630: rāma prīto 'smi bhadraṃ te parituṣṭo 'smi lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_02_u:10631: abhivādayituṃ yan māṃ prāptau sthaḥ saha sītayā // Ram_3,12.1
GE09ram_02_u:10634: vyaktam utkaṇṭhate cāpi maithilī janakātmajā // Ram_3,12.2
GE09ram_02_u:10636: eṣā hi sukumārī ca duḥkhaiś ca na vimānitā
GE09ram_02_u:10639: yathaiṣā ramate rāma iha sītā tathā kuru
GE09ram_02_u:10640: duṣkaraṃ kṛtavaty eṣā vane tvām anugacchatī // Ram_3,12.4
GE09ram_02_u:10642: eṣā hi prakṛtiḥ strīṇām āsṛṣṭe raghunandana
GE09ram_02_u:10643: samastham anurajyante viṣamasthaṃ tyajanti ca // Ram_3,12.5
GE09ram_02_u:10648: iyaṃ tu bhavato bhāryā doṣair etair vivarjitā
GE09ram_02_u:10649: ślāghyā ca vyapadeśyā ca yathā devī hy arundhatī // Ram_3,12.7
GE09ram_02_u:10651: alaṃkṛto 'yaṃ deśaś ca yatra saumitriṇā saha
GE09ram_02_u:10652: vaidehyā cānayā rāma vatsyasi tvam ariṃdama // Ram_3,12.8
GE09ram_02_u:10654: evam uktas tu muninā rāghavaḥ saṃyatāñjaliḥ
GE09ram_02_u:10655: uvāca praśritaṃ vākyam ṛṣiṃ dīptam ivānalam // Ram_3,12.9
GE09ram_02_u:10660: kiṃ tu vyādiśa me deśaṃ sodakaṃ bahukānanam
GE09ram_02_u:10661: yatrāśramapadaṃ kṛtvā vaseyaṃ nirataḥ sukham // Ram_3,12.11
GE09ram_02_u:10664: dhyātvā muhūrtaṃ dharmātmā dhīro dhīrataraṃ vacaḥ // Ram_3,12.12
GE09ram_02_u:10667: deśo bahumṛgaḥ śrīmān pañcavaṭy abhiviśrutaḥ // Ram_3,12.13
GE09ram_02_u:10670: ramasva tvaṃ pitur vākyaṃ yathoktam anupālayan // Ram_3,12.14
GE09ram_02_u:10672: vidito hy eṣa vṛttānto mama sarvas tavānagha
GE09ram_02_u:10673: tapasaś ca prabhāvena snehād daśarathasya ca // Ram_3,12.15
GE09ram_02_u:10675: hṛdayasthaś ca te chando vijñātas tapasā mayā
GE09ram_02_u:10676: iha vāsaṃ pratijñāya mayā saha tapovane // Ram_3,12.16
GE09ram_02_u:10678: ataś ca tvām ahaṃ brūmi gaccha pañcavaṭīm iti
GE09ram_02_u:10679: sa hi ramyo vanoddeśo maithilī tatra raṃsyate // Ram_3,12.17
GE09ram_02_u:10681: sa deśaḥ ślāghanīyaś ca nātidūre ca rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:10682: godāvaryāḥ samīpe ca maithilī tatra raṃsyate // Ram_3,12.18
GE09ram_02_u:10685: viviktaś ca mahābāho puṇyo ramyas tathaiva ca // Ram_3,12.19
GE09ram_02_u:10687: bhavān api sadāraś ca śaktaś ca parirakṣaṇe
GE09ram_02_u:10688: api cātra vasan rāmas tāpasān pālayiṣyasi // Ram_3,12.20
GE09ram_02_u:10690: etad ālakṣyate vīra madhūkānāṃ mahad vanam
GE09ram_02_u:10696: agastyenaivam uktas tu rāmaḥ saumitriṇā saha
GE09ram_02_u:10700: tadāśramāt pañcavaṭīṃ jagmatuḥ saha sītayā // Ram_3,12.24
GE09ram_02_u:10702: gṛhītacāpau tu narādhipātmajau viṣaktatūṇī samareṣv akātarau
GE09ram_02_u:10703: yathopadiṣṭena pathā maharṣiṇā prajagmatuḥ pañcavaṭīṃ samāhitau // Ram_3,12.25
GE09ram_02_u:10708: taṃ dṛṣṭvā tau mahābhāgau vanasthaṃ rāmalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_02_u:10709: menāte rākṣasaṃ pakṣiṃ bruvāṇau ko bhavān iti // Ram_3,13.2
GE09ram_02_u:10711: sa tau madhurayā vācā saumyayā prīṇayann iva
GE09ram_02_u:10712: uvāca vatsa māṃ viddhi vayasyaṃ pitur ātmanaḥ // Ram_3,13.3
GE09ram_02_u:10714: sa taṃ pitṛsakhaṃ buddhvā pūjayāmāsa rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:10715: sa tasya kulam avyagram atha papraccha nāma ca // Ram_3,13.4
GE09ram_02_u:10717: rāmasya vacanaṃ śrutvā kulam ātmānam eva ca
GE09ram_02_u:10721: tān me nigadataḥ sarvān āditaḥ śṛṇu rāghava // Ram_3,13.6
GE09ram_02_u:10724: śeṣaś ca saṃśrayaś caiva bahuputraś ca vīryavān // Ram_3,13.7
GE09ram_02_u:10726: sthāṇur marīcir atriś ca kratuś caiva mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:10727: pulastyaś cāṅgirāś caiva pracetāḥ pulahas tathā // Ram_3,13.8
GE09ram_02_u:10730: kaśyapaś ca mahātejās teṣām āsīc ca paścimaḥ // Ram_3,13.9
GE09ram_02_u:10732: prajāpates tu dakṣasya babhūvur iti naḥ śrutam
GE09ram_02_u:10733: ṣaṣṭir duhitaro rāma yaśasvinyo mahāyaśaḥ // Ram_3,13.10
GE09ram_02_u:10736: aditiṃ ca ditiṃ caiva danum api ca kālakām // Ram_3,13.11
GE09ram_02_u:10738: tāmrāṃ krodhavaśāṃ caiva manuṃ cāpy analām api
GE09ram_02_u:10739: tās tu kanyās tataḥ prītaḥ kaśyapaḥ punar abravīt // Ram_3,13.12
GE09ram_02_u:10742: aditis tanmanā rāma ditiś ca danur eva ca // Ram_3,13.13
GE09ram_02_u:10744: kālakā ca mahābāho śeṣās tv amanaso 'bhavan
GE09ram_02_u:10745: adityāṃ jajñire devās trayastriṃśad ariṃdama // Ram_3,13.14
GE09ram_02_u:10747: ādityā vasavo rudrā aśvinau ca paraṃtapa
GE09ram_02_u:10748: ditis tv ajanayat putrān daityāṃs tāta yaśasvinaḥ // Ram_3,13.15
GE09ram_02_u:10751: danus tv ajanayat putram aśvagrīvam ariṃdama // Ram_3,13.16
GE09ram_02_u:10754: krauñcīṃ bhāsīṃ tathā śyenīṃ dhṛtarāṣṭrīṃ tathā śukīm // Ram_3,13.17
GE09ram_02_u:10757: ulūkāñ janayat krauñcī bhāsī bhāsān vyajāyata // Ram_3,13.18
GE09ram_02_u:10759: śyenī śyenāṃś ca gṛdhrāṃś ca vyajāyata sutejasaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:10760: dhṛtarāṣṭrī tu haṃsāṃś ca kalahaṃsāṃś ca sarvaśaḥ // Ram_3,13.19
GE09ram_02_u:10762: cakravākāṃś ca bhadraṃ te vijajñe sāpi bhāminī
GE09ram_02_u:10763: śukī natāṃ vijajñe tu natāyā vinatā sutā // Ram_3,13.20
GE09ram_02_u:10766: mṛgīṃ ca mṛgamandāṃ ca harīṃ bhadramadām api // Ram_3,13.21
GE09ram_02_u:10768: mātaṃgīm atha śārdūlīṃ śvetāṃ ca surabhīṃ tathā
GE09ram_02_u:10771: apatyaṃ tu mṛgāḥ sarve mṛgyā naravarottama
GE09ram_02_u:10772: ṛkṣāś ca mṛgamandāyāḥ sṛmarāś camarās tathā // Ram_3,13.23
GE09ram_02_u:10774: tatas tv irāvatīṃ nāma jajñe bhadramadā sutām
GE09ram_02_u:10775: tasyās tv airāvataḥ putro lokanātho mahāgajaḥ // Ram_3,13.24
GE09ram_02_u:10777: haryāś ca harayo 'patyaṃ vānarāś ca tapasvinaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:10778: golāṅgūlāṃś ca śārdūlī vyāghrāṃś cājanayat sutān // Ram_3,13.25
GE09ram_02_u:10780: mātaṃgyās tv atha mātaṃgā apatyaṃ manujarṣabha
GE09ram_02_u:10781: diśāgajaṃ tu śvetākṣaṃ śvetā vyajanayat sutam // Ram_3,13.26
GE09ram_02_u:10783: tato duhitarau rāma surabhir devy ajāyata
GE09ram_02_u:10784: rohiṇīṃ nāma bhadraṃ te gandharvīṃ ca yaśasvinīm // Ram_3,13.27
GE09ram_02_u:10786: rohiṇy ajanayad gā vai gandharvī vājinaḥ sutān
GE09ram_02_u:10787: surasājanayan nāgān rāma kadrūś ca pannagān // Ram_3,13.28
GE09ram_02_u:10790: brāhmaṇān kṣatriyān vaiśyāñ śūdrāṃś ca manujarṣabha // Ram_3,13.29
GE09ram_02_u:10792: mukhato brāhmaṇā jātā urasaḥ kṣatriyās tathā
GE09ram_02_u:10793: ūrubhyāṃ jajñire vaiśyāḥ padbhyāṃ śūdrā iti śrutiḥ // Ram_3,13.30
GE09ram_02_u:10796: vinatā ca śukī pautrī kadrūś ca surasā svasā // Ram_3,13.31
GE09ram_02_u:10798: kadrūr nāgaṃ sahasraṃ tu vijajñe dharaṇīdharam
GE09ram_02_u:10799: dvau putrau vinatāyās tu garuḍo 'ruṇa eva ca // Ram_3,13.32
GE09ram_02_u:10801: tasmāj jāto 'ham aruṇāt sampātiś ca mamāgrajaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:10802: jaṭāyur iti māṃ viddhi śyenīputram ariṃdama // Ram_3,13.33
GE09ram_02_u:10805: sītāṃ ca tāta rakṣiṣye tvayi yāte salakṣmaṇe // Ram_3,13.34
GE09ram_02_u:10807: jaṭāyuṣaṃ tu pratipūjya rāghavo mudā pariṣvajya ca saṃnato 'bhavat
GE09ram_02_u:10808: pitur hi śuśrāva sakhitvam ātmavāñ jaṭāyuṣā saṃkathitaṃ punaḥ punaḥ // Ram_3,13.35
GE09ram_02_u:10810: sa tatra sītāṃ paridāya maithilīṃ sahaiva tenātibalena pakṣiṇā
GE09ram_02_u:10811: jagāma tāṃ pañcavaṭīṃ salakṣmaṇo ripūn didhakṣañ śalabhān ivānalaḥ // Ram_3,13.36
GE09ram_02_u:10814: uvāca bhrātaraṃ rāmo lakṣmaṇaṃ dīptatejasam // Ram_3,14.1
GE09ram_02_u:10816: āgatāḥ sma yathoddiṣṭam amuṃ deśaṃ maharṣiṇā
GE09ram_02_u:10819: sarvataś cāryatāṃ dṛṣṭiḥ kānane nipuṇo hy asi
GE09ram_02_u:10820: āśramaḥ katarasmin no deśe bhavati saṃmataḥ // Ram_3,14.3
GE09ram_02_u:10822: ramate yatra vaidehī tvam ahaṃ caiva lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_02_u:10826: saṃnikṛṣṭaṃ ca yatra syāt samitpuṣpakuśodakam // Ram_3,14.5
GE09ram_02_u:10828: evam uktas tu rāmeṇa lakṣmaṇaḥ saṃyatāñjaliḥ
GE09ram_02_u:10829: sītāsamakṣaṃ kākutstham idaṃ vacanam abravīt // Ram_3,14.6
GE09ram_02_u:10831: paravān asmi kākutstha tvayi varṣaśataṃ sthite
GE09ram_02_u:10832: svayaṃ tu rucire deśe kriyatām iti māṃ vada // Ram_3,14.7
GE09ram_02_u:10837: sa taṃ ruciram ākramya deśam āśramakarmaṇi
GE09ram_02_u:10838: hastau gṛhītvā hastena rāmaḥ saumitrim abravīt // Ram_3,14.9
GE09ram_02_u:10840: ayaṃ deśaḥ samaḥ śrīmān puṣpitais tarubhir vṛtaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:10841: ihāśramapadaṃ saumya yathāvat kartum arhasi // Ram_3,14.10
GE09ram_02_u:10844: adūre dṛśyate ramyā padminī padmaśobhitā // Ram_3,14.11
GE09ram_02_u:10847: iyaṃ godāvarī ramyā puṣpitais tarubhir vṛtā // Ram_3,14.12
GE09ram_02_u:10853: dṛśyante girayaḥ saumya phullais tarubhir āvṛtāḥ // Ram_3,14.14
GE09ram_02_u:10855: sauvarṇe rājatais tāmrair deśe deśe ca dhātubhiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:10858: sālais tālais tamālaiś ca kharjūraiḥ panasāmrakaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:10859: nīvārais timiśaiś caiva puṃnāgaiś copaśobhitāḥ // Ram_3,14.16
GE09ram_02_u:10861: cūtair aśokais tilakaiś campakaiḥ ketakair api
GE09ram_02_u:10862: puṣpagulmalatopetais tais tais tarubhir āvṛtāḥ // Ram_3,14.17
GE09ram_02_u:10864: candanaiḥ syandanair nīpaiḥ panasair lakucair api
GE09ram_02_u:10867: idaṃ puṇyam idaṃ medhyam idaṃ bahumṛgadvijam
GE09ram_02_u:10868: iha vatsyāma saumitre sārdham etena pakṣiṇā // Ram_3,14.19
GE09ram_02_u:10870: evam uktas tu rāmeṇa lakṣmaṇaḥ paravīrahā
GE09ram_02_u:10874: sustambhāṃ maskarair dīrghaiḥ kṛtavaṃśāṃ suśobhanām // Ram_3,14.21
GE09ram_02_u:10876: sa gatvā lakṣmaṇaḥ śrīmān nadīṃ godāvarīṃ tadā
GE09ram_02_u:10877: snātvā padmāni cādāya saphalaḥ punar āgataḥ // Ram_3,14.22
GE09ram_02_u:10879: tataḥ puṣpabaliṃ kṛtvā śāntiṃ ca sa yathāvidhi
GE09ram_02_u:10880: darśayāmāsa rāmāya tad āśramapadaṃ kṛtam // Ram_3,14.23
GE09ram_02_u:10882: sa taṃ dṛṣṭvā kṛtaṃ saumyam āśramaṃ saha sītayā
GE09ram_02_u:10883: rāghavaḥ parṇaśālāyāṃ harṣam āhārayat param // Ram_3,14.24
GE09ram_02_u:10886: atisnigdhaṃ ca gāḍhaṃ ca vacanaṃ cedam abravīt // Ram_3,14.25
GE09ram_02_u:10888: prīto 'smi te mahat karma tvayā kṛtam idaṃ prabho
GE09ram_02_u:10889: pradeyo yannimittaṃ te pariṣvaṅgo mayā kṛtaḥ // Ram_3,14.26
GE09ram_02_u:10892: tvayā putreṇa dharmātmā na saṃvṛttaḥ pitā mama // Ram_3,14.27
GE09ram_02_u:10894: evaṃ lakṣmaṇam uktvā tu rāghavo lakṣmivardhanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:10895: tasmin deśe bahuphale nyavasat sa sukhaṃ vaśī // Ram_3,14.28
GE09ram_02_u:10897: kaṃcit kālaṃ sa dharmātmā sītayā lakṣmaṇena ca
GE09ram_02_u:10900: asatas tasya tu sukhaṃ rāghavasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:10901: śaradvyapāye hemanta ṛtur iṣṭaḥ pravartate // Ram_3,15.1
GE09ram_02_u:10904: prayayāv abhiṣekārthaṃ ramyāṃ godāvarīṃ nadīm // Ram_3,15.2
GE09ram_02_u:10906: prahvaḥ kalaśahastas taṃ sītayā saha vīryavān
GE09ram_02_u:10907: pṛṣṭhato 'nuvrajan bhrātā saumitrir idam abravīt // Ram_3,15.3
GE09ram_02_u:10909: ayaṃ sa kālaḥ samprāptaḥ priyo yas te priyaṃvada
GE09ram_02_u:10910: alaṃkṛta ivābhāti yena saṃvatsaraḥ śubhaḥ // Ram_3,15.4
GE09ram_02_u:10922: vihīnatilakeva strī nottarā dik prakāśate // Ram_3,15.8
GE09ram_02_u:10925: yathārthanāmā suvyaktaṃ himavān himavān giriḥ // Ram_3,15.9
GE09ram_02_u:10931: śūnyāraṇyā himadhvastā divasā bhānti sāmpratam // Ram_3,15.11
GE09ram_02_u:10934: śītā vṛddhatarāyāmās triyāmā yānti sāmpratam // Ram_3,15.12
GE09ram_02_u:10937: niḥśvāsāndha ivādarśaś candramā na prakāśate // Ram_3,15.13
GE09ram_02_u:10940: sīteva cātapaśyāmā lakṣyate na tu śobhate // Ram_3,15.14
GE09ram_02_u:10943: pravāti paścimo vāyuḥ kāle dviguṇaśītalaḥ // Ram_3,15.15
GE09ram_02_u:10952: dūram abhyuditaḥ sūryaḥ śaśāṅka iva lakṣyate // Ram_3,15.18
GE09ram_02_u:10955: saṃraktaḥ kiṃcid āpāṇḍur ātapaḥ śobhate kṣitau // Ram_3,15.19
GE09ram_02_u:10961: prasuptā iva lakṣyante vipuṣpā vanarājayaḥ // Ram_3,15.21
GE09ram_02_u:10964: himārdravālukais tīraiḥ sarito bhānti sāmpratam // Ram_3,15.22
GE09ram_02_u:10967: śaityād agāgrastham api prāyeṇa rasavaj jalam // Ram_3,15.23
GE09ram_02_u:10970: nālaśeṣā himadhvastā na bhānti kamalākarāḥ // Ram_3,15.24
GE09ram_02_u:10973: tapaś carati dharmātmā tvadbhaktyā bharataḥ pure // Ram_3,15.25
GE09ram_02_u:10975: tyaktvā rājyaṃ ca mānaṃ ca bhogāṃś ca vividhān bahūn
GE09ram_02_u:10976: tapasvī niyatāhāraḥ śete śīte mahītale // Ram_3,15.26
GE09ram_02_u:10978: so 'pi velām imāṃ nūnam abhiṣekārtham udyataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:10979: vṛtaḥ prakṛtibhir nityaṃ prayāti sarayūṃ nadīm // Ram_3,15.27
GE09ram_02_u:10982: kathaṃ tv apararātreṣu sarayūm avagāhate // Ram_3,15.28
GE09ram_02_u:10985: dharmajñaḥ satyavādī ca hrīniṣedho jitendriyaḥ // Ram_3,15.29
GE09ram_02_u:10988: saṃtyajya vividhān bhogān āryaṃ sarvātmanāśritaḥ // Ram_3,15.30
GE09ram_02_u:10990: jitaḥ svargas tava bhrātrā bharatena mahātmanā
GE09ram_02_u:10991: vanastham api tāpasye yas tvām anuvidhīyate // Ram_3,15.31
GE09ram_02_u:10993: na pitryam anuvartante mātṛkaṃ dvipadā iti
GE09ram_02_u:10996: bhartā daśaratho yasyāḥ sādhuś ca bharataḥ sutaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:10997: kathaṃ nu sāmbā kaikeyī tādṛśī krūradarśinī // Ram_3,15.33
GE09ram_02_u:10999: ity evaṃ lakṣmaṇe vākyaṃ snehād bruvati dhārmike
GE09ram_02_u:11000: parivādaṃ jananyās tam asahan rāghavo 'bravīt // Ram_3,15.34
GE09ram_02_u:11002: na te 'mbā madhyamā tāta garhitavyā kathaṃcana
GE09ram_02_u:11003: tām evekṣvākunāthasya bharatasya kathāṃ kuru // Ram_3,15.35
GE09ram_02_u:11005: niścitāpi hi me buddhir vanavāse dṛḍhavratā
GE09ram_02_u:11008: ity evaṃ vilapaṃs tatra prāpya godāvarīṃ nadīm
GE09ram_02_u:11009: cakre 'bhiṣekaṃ kākutsthaḥ sānujaḥ saha sītayā // Ram_3,15.37
GE09ram_02_u:11011: tarpayitvātha salilais te pitṝn daivatāni ca
GE09ram_02_u:11012: stuvanti smoditaṃ sūryaṃ devatāś ca samāhitāḥ // Ram_3,15.38
GE09ram_02_u:11014: kṛtābhiṣekaḥ sa rarāja rāmaḥ sītādvitīyaḥ saha lakṣmaṇena
GE09ram_02_u:11015: kṛtābhiṣekas tv agarājaputryā rudraḥ sanandī bhagavān iveśaḥ // Ram_3,15.39
GE09ram_02_u:11017: kṛtābhiṣeko rāmas tu sītā saumitrir eva ca
GE09ram_02_u:11018: tasmād godāvarītīrāt tato jagmuḥ svam āśramam // Ram_3,16.1
GE09ram_02_u:11021: kṛtvā paurvāhṇikaṃ karma parṇaśālām upāgamat // Ram_3,16.2
GE09ram_02_u:11023: sa rāmaḥ parṇaśālāyām āsīnaḥ saha sītayā
GE09ram_02_u:11025: lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā cakāra vividhāḥ kathāḥ // Ram_3,16.3
GE09ram_02_u:11028: taṃ deśaṃ rākṣasī kācid ājagāma yadṛcchayā // Ram_3,16.4
GE09ram_02_u:11030: sā tu śūrpaṇakhā nāma daśagrīvasya rakṣasaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:11031: bhaginī rāmam āsādya dadarśa tridaśopamam // Ram_3,16.5
GE09ram_02_u:11043: taruṇaṃ dāruṇā vṛddhā dakṣiṇaṃ vāmabhāṣiṇī // Ram_3,16.9
GE09ram_02_u:11049: āgatas tvam imaṃ deśaṃ kathaṃ rākṣasasevitam // Ram_3,16.11
GE09ram_02_u:11051: evam uktas tu rākṣasyā śūrpaṇakhyā paraṃtapaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:11055: tasyāham agrajaḥ putro rāmo nāma janaiḥ śrutaḥ // Ram_3,16.13
GE09ram_02_u:11057: bhrātāyaṃ lakṣmaṇo nāma yavīyān mām anuvrataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:11058: iyaṃ bhāryā ca vaidehī mama sīteti viśrutā // Ram_3,16.14
GE09ram_02_u:11060: niyogāt tu narendrasya pitur mātuś ca yantritaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:11061: dharmārthaṃ dharmakāṅkṣī ca vanaṃ vastum ihāgataḥ // Ram_3,16.15
GE09ram_02_u:11063: tvāṃ tu veditum icchāmi kathyatāṃ kāsi kasya vā
GE09ram_02_u:11064: iha vā kiṃnimittaṃ tvam āgatā brūhi tattvataḥ // Ram_3,16.16
GE09ram_02_u:11067: śrūyatāṃ rāma vakṣyāmi tattvārthaṃ vacanaṃ mama // Ram_3,16.17
GE09ram_02_u:11072: rāvaṇo nāma me bhrātā rākṣaso rākṣaseśvaraḥ
GE09ram_02_u:11073: pravṛddhanidraś ca sadā kumbhakarṇo mahābalaḥ // Ram_3,16.19
GE09ram_02_u:11075: vibhīṣaṇas tu dharmātmā na tu rākṣasaceṣṭitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:11076: prakhyātavīryau ca raṇe bhrātarau kharadūṣaṇau // Ram_3,16.20
GE09ram_02_u:11078: tān ahaṃ samatikrāntā rāma tvā pūrvadarśanāt
GE09ram_02_u:11080: cirāya bhava bhartā me sītayā kiṃ kariṣyasi // Ram_3,16.21
GE09ram_02_u:11082: vikṛtā ca virūpā ca na seyaṃ sadṛśī tava
GE09ram_02_u:11083: aham evānurūpā te bhāryā rūpeṇa paśya mām // Ram_3,16.22
GE09ram_02_u:11086: anena saha te bhrātrā bhakṣayiṣyāmi mānuṣīm // Ram_3,16.23
GE09ram_02_u:11089: paśyan saha mayā kānta daṇḍakān vicariṣyasi // Ram_3,16.24
GE09ram_02_u:11091: ity evam uktaḥ kākutsthaḥ prahasya madirekṣaṇām
GE09ram_02_u:11092: idaṃ vacanam ārebhe vaktuṃ vākyaviśāradaḥ // Ram_3,16.25
GE09ram_02_u:11095: svacchayā ślakṣṇayā vācā smitapūrvam athābravīt // Ram_3,17.1
GE09ram_02_u:11098: tvadvidhānāṃ tu nārīṇāṃ suduḥkhā sasapatnatā // Ram_3,17.2
GE09ram_02_u:11100: anujas tv eṣa me bhrātā śīlavān priyadarśanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:11101: śrīmān akṛtadāraś ca lakṣmaṇo nāma vīryavān // Ram_3,17.3
GE09ram_02_u:11104: anurūpaś ca te bhartā rūpasyāsya bhaviṣyati // Ram_3,17.4
GE09ram_02_u:11106: enaṃ bhaja viśālākṣi bhartāraṃ bhrātaraṃ mama
GE09ram_02_u:11107: asapatnā varārohe merum arkaprabhā yathā // Ram_3,17.5
GE09ram_02_u:11109: iti rāmeṇa sā proktā rākṣasī kāmamohitā
GE09ram_02_u:11110: visṛjya rāmaṃ sahasā tato lakṣmaṇam abravīt // Ram_3,17.6
GE09ram_02_u:11112: asya rūpasya te yuktā bhāryāhaṃ varavarṇinī
GE09ram_02_u:11113: mayā saha sukhaṃ sarvān daṇḍakān vicariṣyasi // Ram_3,17.7
GE09ram_02_u:11115: evam uktas tu saumitrī rākṣasyā vākyakovidaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:11116: tataḥ śūrpaṇakhīṃ smitvā lakṣmaṇo yuktam abravīt // Ram_3,17.8
GE09ram_02_u:11118: kathaṃ dāsasya me dāsī bhāryā bhavitum icchasi
GE09ram_02_u:11119: so 'ham āryeṇa paravān bhrātrā kamalavarṇini // Ram_3,17.9
GE09ram_02_u:11122: āryasya tvaṃ viśālākṣi bhāryā bhava yavīyasī // Ram_3,17.10
GE09ram_02_u:11125: bhāryāṃ vṛddhāṃ parityajya tvām evaiṣa bhajiṣyati // Ram_3,17.11
GE09ram_02_u:11127: ko hi rūpam idaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ saṃtyajya varavarṇini
GE09ram_02_u:11128: mānuṣeṣu varārohe kuryād bhāvaṃ vicakṣaṇaḥ // Ram_3,17.12
GE09ram_02_u:11131: manyate tad vacaḥ satyaṃ parihāsāvicakṣaṇā // Ram_3,17.13
GE09ram_02_u:11134: sītayā saha durdharṣam abravīt kāmamohitā // Ram_3,17.14
GE09ram_02_u:11137: vṛddhāṃ bhāryām avaṣṭabhya na māṃ tvaṃ bahu manyase // Ram_3,17.15
GE09ram_02_u:11140: tvayā saha cariṣyāmi niḥsapatnā yathāsukham // Ram_3,17.16
GE09ram_02_u:11143: abhyadhāvat susaṃkruddhā maholkā rohiṇīm iva // Ram_3,17.17
GE09ram_02_u:11146: nigṛhya rāmaḥ kupitas tato lakṣmaṇam abravīt // Ram_3,17.18
GE09ram_02_u:11149: na kāryaḥ paśya vaidehīṃ kathaṃcit saumya jīvatīm // Ram_3,17.19
GE09ram_02_u:11154: ity ukto lakṣmaṇas tasyāḥ kruddho rāmasya paśyataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:11155: uddhṛtya khaḍgaṃ cicheda karṇanāsaṃ mahābalaḥ // Ram_3,17.21
GE09ram_02_u:11157: nikṛttakarṇanāsā tu visvaraṃ sā vinadya ca
GE09ram_02_u:11158: yathāgataṃ pradudrāva ghorā śūrpaṇakhā vanam // Ram_3,17.22
GE09ram_02_u:11161: nanāda vividhān nādān yathā prāvṛṣi toyadaḥ // Ram_3,17.23
GE09ram_02_u:11164: pragṛhya bāhū garjantī praviveśa mahāvanam // Ram_3,17.24
GE09ram_02_u:11166: tatas tu sā rākṣasasaṃghasaṃvṛtaṃ kharaṃ janasthānagataṃ virūpitā
GE09ram_02_u:11167: upetya taṃ bhrātaram ugratejasaṃ papāta bhūmau gaganād yathāśaniḥ // Ram_3,17.25
GE09ram_02_u:11169: tataḥ sabhāryaṃ bhayamohamūrchitā salakṣmaṇaṃ rāghavam āgataṃ vanam
GE09ram_02_u:11170: virūpaṇaṃ cātmani śoṇitokṣitā śaśaṃsa sarvaṃ bhaginī kharasya sā // Ram_3,17.26
GE09ram_02_u:11172: tāṃ tathā patitāṃ dṛṣṭvā virūpāṃ śoṇitokṣitām
GE09ram_02_u:11173: bhaginīṃ krodhasaṃtaptaḥ kharaḥ papraccha rākṣasaḥ // Ram_3,18.1
GE09ram_02_u:11176: imām avasthāṃ nītā tvaṃ kenāntakasamā gatā // Ram_3,18.2
GE09ram_02_u:11179: ko 'yam evaṃ mahāvīryas tvāṃ virūpāṃ cakāra ha // Ram_3,18.3
GE09ram_02_u:11181: na hi paśyāmy ahaṃ loke yaḥ kuryān mama vipriyam
GE09ram_02_u:11185: salile kṣīram āsaktaṃ niṣpibann iva sārasaḥ // Ram_3,18.5
GE09ram_02_u:11188: saphenaṃ rudhiraṃ raktaṃ medinī kasya pāsyati // Ram_3,18.6
GE09ram_02_u:11190: kasya pattrarathāḥ kāyān māṃsam utkṛtya saṃgatāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:11191: prahṛṣṭā bhakṣayiṣyanti nihatasya mayā raṇe // Ram_3,18.7
GE09ram_02_u:11193: taṃ na devā na gandharvā na piśācā na rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:11194: mayāpakṛṣṭaṃ kṛpaṇaṃ śaktās trātuṃ mahāhave // Ram_3,18.8
GE09ram_02_u:11196: upalabhya śanaiḥ saṃjñāṃ taṃ me śaṃsitum arhasi
GE09ram_02_u:11197: yena tvaṃ durvinītena vane vikramya nirjitā // Ram_3,18.9
GE09ram_02_u:11199: iti bhrātur vacaḥ śrutvā kruddhasya ca viśeṣataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:11200: tataḥ śūrpaṇakhā vākyaṃ sabāṣpam idam abravīt // Ram_3,18.10
GE09ram_02_u:11206: devau vā mānuṣau vā tau na tarkayitum utsahe // Ram_3,18.12
GE09ram_02_u:11209: dṛṣṭā tatra mayā nārī tayor madhye sumadhyamā // Ram_3,18.13
GE09ram_02_u:11211: tābhyām ubhābhyāṃ sambhūya pramadām adhikṛtya tām
GE09ram_02_u:11212: imām avasthāṃ nītāhaṃ yathānāthāsatī tathā // Ram_3,18.14
GE09ram_02_u:11214: tasyāś cānṛjuvṛttāyās tayoś ca hatayor aham
GE09ram_02_u:11215: saphenaṃ pātum icchāmi rudhiraṃ raṇamūrdhani // Ram_3,18.15
GE09ram_02_u:11217: eṣa me prathamaḥ kāmaḥ kṛtas tāta tvayā bhavet
GE09ram_02_u:11218: tasyās tayoś ca rudhiraṃ pibeyam aham āhave // Ram_3,18.16
GE09ram_02_u:11221: vyādideśa kharaḥ kruddho rākṣasān antakopamān // Ram_3,18.17
GE09ram_02_u:11224: praviṣṭau daṇḍakāraṇyaṃ ghoraṃ pramadayā saha // Ram_3,18.18
GE09ram_02_u:11226: tau hatvā tāṃ ca durvṛttām upāvartitum arhatha
GE09ram_02_u:11227: iyaṃ ca rudhiraṃ teṣāṃ bhaginī mama pāsyati // Ram_3,18.19
GE09ram_02_u:11230: śīghraṃ saṃpadyatāṃ gatvā tau pramathya svatejasā // Ram_3,18.20
GE09ram_02_u:11233: tatra jagmus tayā sārdhaṃ ghanā vāteritā yathā // Ram_3,18.21
GE09ram_02_u:11236: rakṣasām ācacakṣe tau bhrātarau saha sītayā // Ram_3,19.1
GE09ram_02_u:11239: dadṛśuḥ sītayā sārdhaṃ vaidehyā lakṣmaṇena ca // Ram_3,19.2
GE09ram_02_u:11241: tān dṛṣṭvā rāghavaḥ śrīmān āgatāṃ tāṃ ca rākṣasīm
GE09ram_02_u:11242: abravīd bhrātaraṃ rāmo lakṣmaṇaṃ dīptatejasam // Ram_3,19.3
GE09ram_02_u:11245: imān asyā vadhiṣyāmi padavīm āgatān iha // Ram_3,19.4
GE09ram_02_u:11247: vākyam etat tataḥ śrutvā rāmasya viditātmanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:11248: tatheti lakṣmaṇo vākyaṃ rāmasya pratyapūjayat // Ram_3,19.5
GE09ram_02_u:11251: cakāra sajyaṃ dharmātmā tāni rakṣāṃsi cābravīt // Ram_3,19.6
GE09ram_02_u:11254: praviṣṭau sītayā sārdhaṃ duścaraṃ daṇḍakāvanam // Ram_3,19.7
GE09ram_02_u:11260: ṛṣīṇāṃ tu niyogena prāpto 'haṃ saśarāsanaḥ // Ram_3,19.9
GE09ram_02_u:11263: yadi prāṇair ihārtho vo nivartadhvaṃ niśācarāḥ // Ram_3,19.10
GE09ram_02_u:11265: tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā rākṣasās te caturdaśa
GE09ram_02_u:11266: ūcur vācaṃ susaṃkruddhā brahmaghnāḥ śūlapāṇayaḥ // Ram_3,19.11
GE09ram_02_u:11271: krodham utpādya no bhartuḥ kharasya sumahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:11272: tvam eva hāsyase prāṇān adyāsmābhir hato yudhi // Ram_3,19.13
GE09ram_02_u:11274: kā hi te śaktir ekasya bahūnāṃ raṇamūrdhani
GE09ram_02_u:11275: asmākam agrataḥ sthātuṃ kiṃ punar yoddhum āhave // Ram_3,19.14
GE09ram_02_u:11278: prāṇāṃs tyakṣyasi vīryaṃ ca dhanuś ca karapīḍitam // Ram_3,19.15
GE09ram_02_u:11280: ity evam uktvā saṃrabdhā rākṣasās te caturdaśa
GE09ram_02_u:11282: cikṣipus tāni śūlāni rāghavaṃ prati durjayam // Ram_3,19.16
GE09ram_02_u:11285: tāvadbhir eva cicheda śaraiḥ kāñcanabhūṣaṇaiḥ // Ram_3,19.17
GE09ram_02_u:11290: gṛhītvā dhanur āyamya lakṣyān uddiśya rākṣasān
GE09ram_02_u:11291: mumoca rāghavo bāṇān vajrān iva śatakratuḥ // Ram_3,19.19
GE09ram_02_u:11296: te bhittvā rakṣasāṃ vegād vakṣāṃsi rudhirāplutāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:11299: te bhinnahṛdayā bhūmau chinnamūlā iva drumāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:11302: tān bhūmau patitān dṛṣṭvā rākṣasī krodhamūrchitā
GE09ram_02_u:11303: paritrastā punas tatra vyasṛjad bhairavaṃ ravam // Ram_3,19.23
GE09ram_02_u:11305: sā nadantī mahānādaṃ javāc chūrpaṇakhā punaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:11306: upagamya kharaṃ sā tu kiṃcit saṃśuṣkaśoṇitā
GE09ram_02_u:11307: papāta punar evārtā saniryāseva vallarī // Ram_3,19.24
GE09ram_02_u:11309: nipātitān prekṣya raṇe tu rākṣasān pradhāvitā śūrpaṇakhā punas tataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:11310: vadhaṃ ca teṣāṃ nikhilena rakṣasāṃ śaśaṃsa sarvaṃ bhaginī kharasya sā // Ram_3,19.25
GE09ram_02_u:11312: sa punaḥ patitāṃ dṛṣṭvā krodhāc chūrpaṇakhāṃ kharaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:11313: uvāca vyaktayā vācā tām anarthārtham āgatām // Ram_3,20.1
GE09ram_02_u:11315: mayā tv idānīṃ śūrās te rākṣasā rudhirāśanāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:11316: tvatpriyārthaṃ vinirdiṣṭāḥ kimarthaṃ rudyate punaḥ // Ram_3,20.2
GE09ram_02_u:11318: bhaktāś caivānuraktāś ca hitāś ca mama nityaśaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:11319: ghnanto 'pi na nihantavyā na na kuryur vaco mama // Ram_3,20.3
GE09ram_02_u:11321: kim etac chrotum icchāmi kāraṇaṃ yatkṛte punaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:11322: hā nātheti vinardantī sarpavad veṣṭase kṣitau // Ram_3,20.4
GE09ram_02_u:11324: anāthavad vilapasi kiṃ nu nāthe mayi sthite
GE09ram_02_u:11325: uttiṣṭhottiṣṭha mā bhaiṣīr vaiklavyaṃ tyajyatām iha // Ram_3,20.5
GE09ram_02_u:11327: ity evam uktā durdharṣā khareṇa parisāntvitā
GE09ram_02_u:11328: vimṛjya nayane sāsre kharaṃ bhrātaram abravīt // Ram_3,20.6
GE09ram_02_u:11330: preṣitāś ca tvayā śūrā rākṣasās te caturdaśa
GE09ram_02_u:11331: nihantuṃ rāghavaṃ ghorā matpriyārthaṃ salakṣmaṇam // Ram_3,20.7
GE09ram_02_u:11334: samare nihatāḥ sarve sāyakair marmabhedibhiḥ // Ram_3,20.8
GE09ram_02_u:11336: tān bhūmau patitān dṛṣṭvā kṣaṇenaiva mahābalān
GE09ram_02_u:11337: rāmasya ca mahat karma mahāṃs trāso 'bhavan mama // Ram_3,20.9
GE09ram_02_u:11339: sāsmi bhītā samudvignā viṣaṇṇā ca niśācara
GE09ram_02_u:11340: śaraṇaṃ tvāṃ punaḥ prāptā sarvato bhayadarśinī // Ram_3,20.10
GE09ram_02_u:11343: kiṃ māṃ na trāyase magnāṃ vipule śokasāgare // Ram_3,20.11
GE09ram_02_u:11345: ete ca nihatā bhūmau rāmeṇa niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:11346: ye ca me padavīṃ prāptā rākṣasāḥ piśitāśanāḥ // Ram_3,20.12
GE09ram_02_u:11348: mayi te yady anukrośo yadi rakṣaḥsu teṣu ca
GE09ram_02_u:11349: rāmeṇa yadi śaktis te tejo vāsti niśācara
GE09ram_02_u:11352: yadi rāmaṃ mamāmitram adya tvaṃ na vadhiṣyasi
GE09ram_02_u:11353: tava caivāgrataḥ prāṇāṃs tyakṣyāmi nirapatrapā // Ram_3,20.14
GE09ram_02_u:11355: buddhyāham anupaśyāmi na tvaṃ rāmasya saṃyuge
GE09ram_02_u:11356: sthātuṃ pratimukhe śaktaḥ sacāpasya mahāraṇe // Ram_3,20.15
GE09ram_02_u:11359: mānuṣau yan na śaknoṣi hantuṃ tau rāmalakṣmaṇau // Ram_3,20.16
GE09ram_02_u:11362: niḥsattvasyālpavīryasya vāsas te kīdṛśas tv iha // Ram_3,20.17
GE09ram_02_u:11366: bhrātā cāsya mahāvīryo yena cāsmi virūpitā // Ram_3,20.18
GE09ram_02_u:11368: evam ādharṣitaḥ śūraḥ śūrpaṇakhyā kharas tadā
GE09ram_02_u:11369: uvāca rakṣasāṃ madhye kharaḥ kharataraṃ vacaḥ // Ram_3,21.1
GE09ram_02_u:11372: na śakyate dhārayituṃ lavaṇāmbha ivotthitam // Ram_3,21.2
GE09ram_02_u:11374: na rāmaṃ gaṇaye vīryān mānuṣaṃ kṣīṇajīvitam
GE09ram_02_u:11375: ātmā duścaritaiḥ prāṇān hato yo 'dya vimokṣyati // Ram_3,21.3
GE09ram_02_u:11377: bāṣpaḥ saṃhriyatām eṣa sambhramaś ca vimucyatām
GE09ram_02_u:11378: ahaṃ rāmaṃ saha bhrātrā nayāmi yamasādanam // Ram_3,21.4
GE09ram_02_u:11381: rāmasya rudhiraṃ raktam uṣṇaṃ pāsyasi rākṣasi // Ram_3,21.5
GE09ram_02_u:11383: sā prahṛṣṭā vacaḥ śrutvā kharasya vadanāc cyutam
GE09ram_02_u:11384: praśaśaṃsa punar maurkhyād bhrātaraṃ rakṣasāṃ varam // Ram_3,21.6
GE09ram_02_u:11386: tayā paruṣitaḥ pūrvaṃ punar eva praśaṃsitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:11387: abravīd dūṣaṇaṃ nāma kharaḥ senāpatiṃ tadā // Ram_3,21.7
GE09ram_02_u:11396: sarvodyogam udīrṇānāṃ rakṣasāṃ saumya kāraya // Ram_3,21.10
GE09ram_02_u:11398: upasthāpaya me kṣipraṃ rathaṃ saumya dhanūṃṣi ca
GE09ram_02_u:11399: śarāṃś ca citrān khaḍgāṃś ca śaktīś ca vividhāḥ śitāḥ // Ram_3,21.11
GE09ram_02_u:11405: sadaśvaiḥ śabalair yuktam ācacakṣe 'tha dūṣaṇaḥ // Ram_3,21.13
GE09ram_02_u:11410: matsyaiḥ puṣpair drumaiḥ śailaiś candrasūryaiś ca kāñcanaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:11411: māṅgalyaiḥ pakṣisaṃghaiś ca tārābhiś ca samāvṛtam // Ram_3,21.15
GE09ram_02_u:11414: sadaśvayuktaṃ so 'marṣād āruroha rathaṃ kharaḥ // Ram_3,21.16
GE09ram_02_u:11417: tasthuḥ saṃparivāryainaṃ dūṣaṇaṃ ca mahābalam // Ram_3,21.17
GE09ram_02_u:11420: niryātety abravīd dṛṣṭvā rathasthaḥ sarvarākṣasān // Ram_3,21.18
GE09ram_02_u:11425: mudgaraiḥ paṭṭiśaiḥ śūlaiḥ sutīkṣṇaiś ca paraśvadhaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:11426: khaḍgaiś cakraiś ca hastasthair bhrājamānaiś ca tomaraiḥ // Ram_3,21.20
GE09ram_02_u:11428: śaktibhiḥ parighair ghorair atimātraiś ca kārmukaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:11434: tāṃs tv abhidravato dṛṣṭvā rākṣasān bhīmavikramān
GE09ram_02_u:11435: kharasyāpi rathaḥ kiṃcij jagāma tadanantaram // Ram_3,21.23
GE09ram_02_u:11438: kharasya matam ājñāya sārathiḥ samacodayat // Ram_3,21.24
GE09ram_02_u:11440: sa codito rathaḥ śīghraṃ kharasya ripughātinaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:11441: śabdenāpūrayām āsa diśaḥ pratidiśas tathā // Ram_3,21.25
GE09ram_02_u:11443: pravṛddhamanyus tu kharaḥ kharasvano ripor vadhārthaṃ tvarito yathāntakaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:11444: acūcudat sārathim unnadan punar mahābalo megha ivāśmavarṣavān // Ram_3,21.26
GE09ram_02_u:11446: tat prayātaṃ balaṃ ghoram aśivaṃ śoṇitodakam
GE09ram_02_u:11450: same puṣpacite deśe rājamārge yadṛcchayā // Ram_3,22.2
GE09ram_02_u:11456: samākramya mahākāyas tasthau gṛdhraḥ sudāruṇaḥ // Ram_3,22.4
GE09ram_02_u:11459: visvarān vividhāṃś cakrur māṃsādā mṛgapakṣiṇaḥ // Ram_3,22.5
GE09ram_02_u:11461: vyājahruś ca pradīptāyāṃ diśi vai bhairavasvanam
GE09ram_02_u:11462: aśivaṃ yātudhānānāṃ śivā ghorā mahāsvanāḥ // Ram_3,22.6
GE09ram_02_u:11465: ākāśaṃ tad anākāśaṃ cakrur bhīmā balāhakāḥ // Ram_3,22.7
GE09ram_02_u:11468: diśo vā vidiśo vāpi suvyaktaṃ na cakāśire // Ram_3,22.8
GE09ram_02_u:11471: kharasyābhimukhaṃ nedus tadā ghorā mṛgāḥ khagāḥ // Ram_3,22.9
GE09ram_02_u:11477: jagrāha sūryaṃ svarbhānur aparvaṇi mahāgrahaḥ // Ram_3,22.11
GE09ram_02_u:11480: utpetuś ca vinā rātriṃ tārāḥ khadyotasaprabhāḥ // Ram_3,22.12
GE09ram_02_u:11483: tasmin kṣaṇe babhūvuś ca vinā puṣpaphalair drumāḥ // Ram_3,22.13
