GE09ram_02_u:11485: uddhūtaś ca vinā vātaṃ reṇur jaladharāruṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:11486: vīcīkūcīti vāśyanto babhūvus tatra sārikāḥ // Ram_3,22.14
GE09ram_02_u:11492: prākampata bhujaḥ savyaḥ kharaś cāsyāvasajjata // Ram_3,22.16
GE09ram_02_u:11495: lalāṭe ca rujā jātā na ca mohān nyavartata // Ram_3,22.17
GE09ram_02_u:11498: abravīd rākṣasān sarvān prahasan sa kharas tadā // Ram_3,22.18
GE09ram_02_u:11501: na cintayāmy ahaṃ vīryād balavān durbalān iva // Ram_3,22.19
GE09ram_02_u:11503: tārā api śarais tīkṣṇaiḥ pātayeyaṃ nabhastalāt
GE09ram_02_u:11504: mṛtyuṃ maraṇadharmeṇa saṃkruddho yojayāmy aham // Ram_3,22.20
GE09ram_02_u:11506: rāghavaṃ taṃ balotsiktaṃ bhrātaraṃ cāpi lakṣmaṇam
GE09ram_02_u:11507: ahatvā sāyakais tīkṣṇair nopāvartitum utsahe // Ram_3,22.21
GE09ram_02_u:11509: sakāmā bhaginī me 'stu pītvā tu rudhiraṃ tayoḥ
GE09ram_02_u:11510: yannimittaṃ tu rāmasya lakṣmaṇasya viparyayaḥ // Ram_3,22.22
GE09ram_02_u:11512: na kvacit prāptapūrvo me saṃyugeṣu parājayaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:11513: yuṣmākam etat pratyakṣaṃ nānṛtaṃ kathayāmy aham // Ram_3,22.23
GE09ram_02_u:11516: vajrahastaṃ raṇe hanyāṃ kiṃ punas tau ca mānuṣau // Ram_3,22.24
GE09ram_02_u:11518: sā tasya garjitaṃ śrutvā rākṣasasya mahācamūḥ
GE09ram_02_u:11522: ṛṣayo devagandharvāḥ siddhāś ca saha cāraṇaiḥ // Ram_3,22.26
GE09ram_02_u:11525: svasti gobrāhmaṇebhyo 'stu lokānāṃ ye ca saṃmatāḥ // Ram_3,22.27
GE09ram_02_u:11528: cakrahasto yathā yuddhe sarvān asurapuṃgavān // Ram_3,22.28
GE09ram_02_u:11530: etac cānyac ca bahuśo bruvāṇāḥ paramarṣayaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:11531: dadṛśur vāhinīṃ teṣāṃ rākṣasānāṃ gatāyuṣām // Ram_3,22.29
GE09ram_02_u:11533: rathena tu kharo vegāt sainyasyāgrād viniḥsṛtaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:11534: taṃ dṛṣṭvā rākṣasaṃ bhūyo rākṣasāś ca viniḥsṛtāḥ // Ram_3,22.30
GE09ram_02_u:11540: dvādaśaite mahāvīryāḥ pratasthur abhitaḥ kharam // Ram_3,22.32
GE09ram_02_u:11543: catvāra ete senāgryā dūṣaṇaṃ pṛṣṭhato 'nvayuḥ // Ram_3,22.33
GE09ram_02_u:11546: tau rājaputrau sahasābhyupetā mālā grahāṇām iva candrasūryau // Ram_3,22.34
GE09ram_02_u:11549: tān evautpātikān rāmaḥ saha bhrātrā dadarśa ha // Ram_3,23.1
GE09ram_02_u:11552: prajānām ahitān dṛṣṭvā vākyaṃ lakṣmaṇam abravīt // Ram_3,23.2
GE09ram_02_u:11558: vyomni meghā vivartante paruṣā gardabhāruṇāḥ // Ram_3,23.4
GE09ram_02_u:11560: sadhūmāś ca śarāḥ sarve mama yuddhābhinandinaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:11561: rukmapṛṣṭhāni cāpāni viveṣṭante ca lakṣmaṇa // Ram_3,23.5
GE09ram_02_u:11564: agrato no bhayaṃ prāptaṃ saṃśayo jīvitasya ca // Ram_3,23.6
GE09ram_02_u:11566: samprahāras tu sumahān bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:11567: ayam ākhyāti me bāhuḥ sphuramāṇo muhur muhuḥ // Ram_3,23.7
GE09ram_02_u:11569: saṃnikarṣe tu naḥ śūra jayaṃ śatroḥ parājayam
GE09ram_02_u:11570: suprabhaṃ ca prasannaṃ ca tava vaktraṃ hi lakṣyate // Ram_3,23.8
GE09ram_02_u:11572: udyatānāṃ hi yuddhārthaṃ yeṣāṃ bhavati lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:11573: niṣprabhaṃ vadanaṃ teṣāṃ bhavaty āyuḥparikṣayaḥ // Ram_3,23.9
GE09ram_02_u:11579: guhām āśraya śailasya durgāṃ pādapasaṃkulām // Ram_3,23.11
GE09ram_02_u:11581: pratikūlitum icchāmi na hi vākyam idaṃ tvayā
GE09ram_02_u:11582: śāpito mama pādābhyāṃ gamyatāṃ vatsa māciram // Ram_3,23.12
GE09ram_02_u:11584: evam uktas tu rāmeṇa lakṣmaṇaḥ saha sītayā
GE09ram_02_u:11585: śarān ādāya cāpaṃ ca guhāṃ durgāṃ samāśrayat // Ram_3,23.13
GE09ram_02_u:11587: tasmin praviṣṭe tu guhāṃ lakṣmaṇe saha sītayā
GE09ram_02_u:11588: hanta niryuktam ity uktvā rāmaḥ kavacam āviśat // Ram_3,23.14
GE09ram_02_u:11591: babhūva rāmas timire vidhūmo 'gnir ivotthitaḥ // Ram_3,23.15
GE09ram_02_u:11593: sa cāpam udyamya mahac charān ādāya vīryavān
GE09ram_02_u:11594: babhūvāvasthitas tatra jyāsvanaiḥ pūrayan diśaḥ // Ram_3,23.16
GE09ram_02_u:11596: tato devāḥ sagandharvāḥ siddhāś ca saha cāraṇaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:11597: ūcuḥ paramasaṃtrastā guhyakāś ca parasparam // Ram_3,23.17
GE09ram_02_u:11600: ekaś ca rāmo dharmātmā kathaṃ yuddhaṃ bhaviṣyati // Ram_3,23.18
GE09ram_02_u:11606: cāpāni visphārayatāṃ jṛmbhatāṃ cāpy abhīkṣṇaśaḥ // Ram_3,23.20
GE09ram_02_u:11609: teṣāṃ sutumulaḥ śabdaḥ pūrayāmāsa tad vanam // Ram_3,23.21
GE09ram_02_u:11612: dudruvur yatra niḥśabdaṃ pṛṣṭhato nāvalokayan // Ram_3,23.22
GE09ram_02_u:11614: tat tv anīkaṃ mahāvegaṃ rāmaṃ samupasarpata
GE09ram_02_u:11618: dadarśa kharasainyaṃ tad yuddhābhimukham udyatam // Ram_3,23.24
GE09ram_02_u:11620: vitatya ca dhanur bhīmaṃ tūṇyāś coddhṛtya sāyakān
GE09ram_02_u:11621: krodham āhārayat tīvraṃ vadhārthaṃ sarvarakṣasām // Ram_3,23.25
GE09ram_02_u:11623: duṣprekṣyaḥ so 'bhavat kruddho yugāntāgnir iva jvalan
GE09ram_02_u:11624: taṃ dṛṣṭvā tejasāviṣṭaṃ prāvyathan vanadevatāḥ // Ram_3,23.26
GE09ram_02_u:11626: tasya kruddhasya rūpaṃ tu rāmasya dadṛśe tadā
GE09ram_02_u:11627: dakṣasyeva kratuṃ hantum udyatasya pinākinaḥ // Ram_3,23.27
GE09ram_02_u:11630: dadarśāśramam āgamya kharaḥ saha puraḥsaraiḥ // Ram_3,24.1
GE09ram_02_u:11632: taṃ dṛṣṭvā saguṇaṃ cāpam udyamya kharaniḥsvanam
GE09ram_02_u:11633: rāmasyābhimukhaṃ sūtaṃ codyatām ity acodayat // Ram_3,24.2
GE09ram_02_u:11636: yatra rāmo mahābāhur eko dhunvan dhanuḥ sthitaḥ // Ram_3,24.3
GE09ram_02_u:11638: taṃ tu niṣpatitaṃ dṛṣṭvā sarve te rajanīcarāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:11641: sa teṣāṃ yātudhānānāṃ madhye rato gataḥ kharaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:11642: babhūva madhye tārāṇāṃ lohitāṅga ivoditaḥ // Ram_3,24.5
GE09ram_02_u:11644: tatas taṃ bhīmadhanvānaṃ kruddhāḥ sarve niśācarāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:11645: rāmaṃ nānāvidhaiḥ śastrair abhyavarṣanta durjayam // Ram_3,24.6
GE09ram_02_u:11647: mudgarair āyasaiḥ śūlaiḥ prāsaiḥ khaḍgaiḥ paraśvadhaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:11648: rākṣasāḥ samare rāmaṃ nijaghnū roṣatatparāḥ // Ram_3,24.7
GE09ram_02_u:11651: abhyadhāvanta kākutsthaṃ rāmaṃ yuddhe jighāṃsavaḥ // Ram_3,24.8
GE09ram_02_u:11653: te rāme śaravarṣāṇi vyasṛjan rakṣasāṃ guṇāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:11654: śailendram iva dhārābhir varṣamāṇā balāhakāḥ // Ram_3,24.9
GE09ram_02_u:11656: sa taiḥ parivṛto ghorai rāghavo rakṣasāṃ gaṇaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:11657: tithiṣv iva mahādevo vṛtaḥ pāriṣadāṃ gaṇaiḥ // Ram_3,24.10
GE09ram_02_u:11659: tāni muktāni śastrāṇi yātudhānaiḥ sa rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:11660: pratijagrāha viśikhair nadyoghān iva sāgaraḥ // Ram_3,24.11
GE09ram_02_u:11662: sa taiḥ praharaṇair ghorair bhinnagātro na vivyathe
GE09ram_02_u:11663: rāmaḥ pradīptair bahubhir vajrair iva mahācalaḥ // Ram_3,24.12
GE09ram_02_u:11666: babhūva rāmaḥ saṃdhyābhrair divākara ivāvṛtaḥ // Ram_3,24.13
GE09ram_02_u:11669: ekaṃ sahasrair bahubhis tadā dṛṣṭvā samāvṛtam // Ram_3,24.14
GE09ram_02_u:11672: sasarja niśitān bāṇāñ śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ // Ram_3,24.15
GE09ram_02_u:11675: mumoca līlayā rāmaḥ kaṅkapattrān ajihmagān // Ram_3,24.16
GE09ram_02_u:11677: te śarāḥ śatrusainyeṣu muktā rāmeṇa līlayā
GE09ram_02_u:11678: ādadū rakṣasāṃ prāṇān pāśāḥ kālakṛtā iva // Ram_3,24.17
GE09ram_02_u:11680: bhittvā rākṣasadehāṃs tāṃs te śarā rudhirāplutāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:11686: tair dhanūṃṣi dhvajāgrāṇi varmāṇi ca śirāṃsi ca
GE09ram_02_u:11690: bhīmam ārtasvaraṃ cakrur bhidyamānā niśācarāḥ // Ram_3,24.21
GE09ram_02_u:11692: tat sainyaṃ niśitair bāṇair arditaṃ marmabhedibhiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:11693: rāmeṇa na sukhaṃ lebhe śuṣkaṃ vanam ivāgninā // Ram_3,24.22
GE09ram_02_u:11695: kecid bhīmabalāḥ śūrāḥ śūlān khaḍgān paraśvadhān
GE09ram_02_u:11698: tāni bāṇair mahābāhuḥ śastrāṇy āvārya rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:11699: jahāra samare prāṇāṃś cicheda ca śirodharān // Ram_3,24.24
GE09ram_02_u:11701: avaśiṣṭāś ca ye tatra viṣaṇṇāś ca niśācarāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:11704: tān sarvān punar ādāya samāśvāsya ca dūṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:11705: abhyadhāvata kākutsthaṃ kruddho rudram ivāntakaḥ // Ram_3,24.26
GE09ram_02_u:11711: rāmasyāsya mahāghoraṃ punas teṣāṃ ca rakṣasām // Ram_3,24.28
GE09ram_02_u:11713: tad drumāṇāṃ śilānāṃ ca varṣaṃ prāṇaharaṃ mahat
GE09ram_02_u:11716: pratigṛhya ca tad varaṃ nimīlita ivarṣabhaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:11717: rāmaḥ krodhaṃ paraṃ bheje vadhārthaṃ sarvarakṣasām // Ram_3,25.2
GE09ram_02_u:11720: śarair abhyakirat sainyaṃ sarvataḥ sahadūṣaṇam // Ram_3,25.3
GE09ram_02_u:11726: āyasaiḥ śaṅkubhis tīkṣṇaiḥ kīrṇaṃ paravasokṣitam // Ram_3,25.5
GE09ram_02_u:11733: dvābhyāṃ śarābhyāṃ cicheda sahastābharaṇau bhujau // Ram_3,25.7
GE09ram_02_u:11738: sa karābhyāṃ vikīrṇābhyāṃ papāta bhuvi dūṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:11741: dṛṣṭvā taṃ patitaṃ bhūmau dūṣaṇaṃ nihataṃ raṇe
GE09ram_02_u:11742: sādhu sādhv iti kākutsthaṃ sarvabhūtāny apūjayan // Ram_3,25.10
GE09ram_02_u:11746: mahākapālaḥ sthūlākṣaḥ pramāthī ca mahābalaḥ // Ram_3,25.11
GE09ram_02_u:11749: sthūlākṣaḥ paṭṭiśaṃ gṛhya pramāthī ca paraśvadham // Ram_3,25.12
GE09ram_02_u:11751: dṛṣṭvaivāpatatas tāṃs tu rāghavaḥ sāyakaiḥ śitaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:11752: tīkṣṇāgraiḥ pratijagrāha samprāptān atithīn iva // Ram_3,25.13
GE09ram_02_u:11755: asaṃkhyeyais tu bāṇaughaiḥ pramamātha pramāthinam // Ram_3,25.14
GE09ram_02_u:11758: sa papāta hato bhūmau viṭapīva mahādrumaḥ // Ram_3,25.15
GE09ram_02_u:11761: jaghanaśeṣaṃ tejasvī tasya sainyasya sāyakaiḥ // Ram_3,25.16
GE09ram_02_u:11763: te rukmapuṅkhā viśikhāḥ sadhūmā iva pāvakāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:11764: nijaghnus tāni rakṣāṃsi vajrā iva mahādrumān // Ram_3,25.17
GE09ram_02_u:11766: rakṣasāṃ tu śataṃ rāmaḥ śatenaikena karṇinā
GE09ram_02_u:11767: sahasraṃ ca sahasreṇa jaghāna raṇamūrdhani // Ram_3,25.18
GE09ram_02_u:11773: āstīrṇā vasudhā kṛtsnā mahāvediḥ kuśair iva // Ram_3,25.20
GE09ram_02_u:11779: hatāny ekena rāmeṇa mānuṣeṇa padātinā // Ram_3,25.22
GE09ram_02_u:11781: tasya sainyasya sarvasya kharaḥ śeṣo mahārathaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:11782: rākṣasas triśirāś caiva rāmaś ca ripusūdanaḥ // Ram_3,25.23
GE09ram_02_u:11784: tatas tu tad bhīmabalaṃ mahāhave samīkṣya rāmeṇa hataṃ balīyasā
GE09ram_02_u:11785: rathena rāmaṃ mahatā kharas tataḥ samāsasādendra ivodyatāśaniḥ // Ram_3,25.24
GE09ram_02_u:11788: rākṣasas triśirā nāma saṃnipatyedam abravīt // Ram_3,26.1
GE09ram_02_u:11791: paśya rāmaṃ mahābāhuṃ saṃyuge vinipātitam // Ram_3,26.2
GE09ram_02_u:11793: pratijānāmi te satyam āyudhaṃ cāham ālabhe
GE09ram_02_u:11794: yathā rāmaṃ vadhiṣyāmi vadhārhaṃ sarvarakṣasām // Ram_3,26.3
GE09ram_02_u:11796: ahaṃ vāsya raṇe mṛtyur eṣa vā samare mama
GE09ram_02_u:11797: vinivartya raṇotsāhaṃ muhūrtaṃ prāśniko bhava // Ram_3,26.4
GE09ram_02_u:11799: prahṛṣṭo vā hate rāme janasthānaṃ prayāsyasi
GE09ram_02_u:11800: mayi vā nihate rāmaṃ saṃyugāyopayāsyasi // Ram_3,26.5
GE09ram_02_u:11803: gaccha yudhyety anujñāto rāghavābhimukho yayau // Ram_3,26.6
GE09ram_02_u:11806: abhyadravad raṇe rāmaṃ triśṛṅga iva parvataḥ // Ram_3,26.7
GE09ram_02_u:11809: vyasṛjat sadṛśaṃ nādaṃ jalārdrasyeva dundubheḥ // Ram_3,26.8
GE09ram_02_u:11812: dhanuṣā pratijagrāha vidhunvan sāyakāñ śitān // Ram_3,26.9
GE09ram_02_u:11817: tatas triśirasā bāṇair lalāṭe tāḍitas tribhiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:11818: amarṣī kupito rāmaḥ saṃrabdham idam abravīt // Ram_3,26.11
GE09ram_02_u:11821: puṣpair iva śarair yasya lalāṭe 'smi parikṣataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:11824: evam uktvā tu saṃrabdhaḥ śarān āśīviṣopamān
GE09ram_02_u:11828: nyapātayata tejasvī caturas tasya vājinaḥ // Ram_3,26.14
GE09ram_02_u:11831: rāmaś cicheda bāṇena dhvajaṃ cāsya samucchritam // Ram_3,26.15
GE09ram_02_u:11834: bibheda rāmas taṃ bāṇair hṛdaye so 'bhavaj jaḍaḥ // Ram_3,26.16
GE09ram_02_u:11837: śirāṃsy apātayat trīṇi vegavadbhis tribhiḥ śataiḥ // Ram_3,26.17
GE09ram_02_u:11840: nyapatat patitaiḥ pūrvaṃ svaśirobhir niśācaraḥ // Ram_3,26.18
GE09ram_02_u:11843: dravanti sma na tiṣṭhanti vyāghratrastā mṛgā iva // Ram_3,26.19
GE09ram_02_u:11845: tān kharo dravato dṛṣṭvā nivartya ruṣitaḥ svayam
GE09ram_02_u:11846: rāmam evābhidudrāva rāhuś candramasaṃ yathā // Ram_3,26.20
GE09ram_02_u:11848: nihataṃ dūṣaṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā raṇe triśirasā saha
GE09ram_02_u:11849: kharasyāpy abhavat trāso dṛṣṭvā rāmasya vikramam // Ram_3,27.1
GE09ram_02_u:11851: sa dṛṣṭvā rākṣasaṃ sainyam aviṣahyaṃ mahābalam
GE09ram_02_u:11852: hatam ekena rāmeṇa dūṣaṇas triśirā api // Ram_3,27.2
GE09ram_02_u:11854: tad balaṃ hatabhūyiṣṭhaṃ vimanāḥ prekṣya rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:11855: āsasāda kharo rāmaṃ namucir vāsavaṃ yathā // Ram_3,27.3
GE09ram_02_u:11858: kharaś cikṣepa rāmāya kruddhān āśīviṣān iva // Ram_3,27.4
GE09ram_02_u:11861: cacāra samare mārgāñ śarai rathagataḥ kharaḥ // Ram_3,27.5
GE09ram_02_u:11863: sa sarvāś ca diśo bāṇaiḥ pradiśaś ca mahārathaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:11864: pūrayāmāsa taṃ dṛṣṭvā rāmo 'pi sumahad dhanuḥ // Ram_3,27.6
GE09ram_02_u:11867: nabhaś cakārāvivaraṃ parjanya iva vṛṣṭibhiḥ // Ram_3,27.7
GE09ram_02_u:11872: śarajālāvṛtaḥ sūryo na tadā sma prakāśate
GE09ram_02_u:11876: ājaghāna raṇe rāmaṃ totrair iva mahādvipam // Ram_3,27.10
GE09ram_02_u:11882: dṛṣṭvā nodvijate rāmaḥ siṃhaḥ kṣudramṛgaṃ yathā // Ram_3,27.12
GE09ram_02_u:11885: āsasāda raṇe rāmaṃ pataṃga iva pāvakam // Ram_3,27.13
GE09ram_02_u:11888: kharaś cicheda rāmasya darśayan pāṇilāghavam // Ram_3,27.14
GE09ram_02_u:11890: sa punas tv aparān sapta śarān ādāya varmaṇi
GE09ram_02_u:11893: tatas tat prahataṃ bāṇaiḥ kharamuktaiḥ suparvabhiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:11896: sa śarair arpitaḥ kruddhaḥ sarvagātreṣu rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:11897: rarāja samare rāmo vidhūmo 'gnir iva jvalan // Ram_3,27.17
GE09ram_02_u:11900: cakārāntāya sa ripoḥ sajyam anyan mahad dhanuḥ // Ram_3,27.18
GE09ram_02_u:11902: sumahad vaiṣṇavaṃ yat tad atisṛṣṭaṃ maharṣiṇā
GE09ram_02_u:11903: varaṃ tad dhanur udyamya kharaṃ samabhidhāvata // Ram_3,27.19
GE09ram_02_u:11906: cicheda rāmaḥ saṃkruddhaḥ kharasya samare dhvajam // Ram_3,27.20
GE09ram_02_u:11908: sa darśanīyo bahudhā vicchinnaḥ kāñcano dhvajaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:11909: jagāma dharaṇīṃ sūryo devatānām ivājñayā // Ram_3,27.21
GE09ram_02_u:11911: taṃ caturbhiḥ kharaḥ kruddho rāmaṃ gātreṣu mārgaṇaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:11912: vivyādha hṛdi marmajño mātaṃgam iva tomaraiḥ // Ram_3,27.22
GE09ram_02_u:11915: viddho rudhirasiktāṅgo babhūva ruṣito bhṛśam // Ram_3,27.23
GE09ram_02_u:11917: sa dhanur dhanvināṃ śreṣṭhaḥ pragṛhya paramāhave
GE09ram_02_u:11918: mumoca parameṣvāsaḥ ṣaṭ śarān abhilakṣitān // Ram_3,27.24
GE09ram_02_u:11920: śirasy ekena bāṇena dvābhyāṃ bāhvor athārpayat
GE09ram_02_u:11921: tribhiś candrārdhavaktraiś ca vakṣasy abhijaghāna ha // Ram_3,27.25
GE09ram_02_u:11924: jighāṃsū rākṣasaṃ kruddhas trayodaśa śilāśitān // Ram_3,27.26
GE09ram_02_u:11926: tato 'sya yugam ekena caturbhiś caturo hayān
GE09ram_02_u:11927: ṣaṣṭhena ca śiraḥ saṃkhye cicheda kharasāratheḥ // Ram_3,27.27
GE09ram_02_u:11929: tribhis triveṇuṃ balavān dvābhyām akṣaṃ mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:11930: dvādaśena tu bāṇena kharasya saśaraṃ dhanuḥ // Ram_3,27.28*
GE09ram_02_u:11936: gadāpāṇir avaplutya tasthau bhūmau kharas tadā // Ram_3,27.29
GE09ram_02_u:11938: tat karma rāmasya mahārathasya sametya devāś ca maharṣayaś ca
GE09ram_02_u:11939: apūjayan prāñjalayaḥ prahṛṣṭās tadā vimānāgragatāḥ sametāḥ // Ram_3,27.30
GE09ram_02_u:11941: kharaṃ tu virathaṃ rāmo gadāpāṇim avasthitam
GE09ram_02_u:11942: mṛdupūrvaṃ mahātejāḥ paruṣaṃ vākyam abravīt // Ram_3,28.1
GE09ram_02_u:11948: trayāṇām api lokānām īśvaro 'pi na tiṣṭhati // Ram_3,28.3
GE09ram_02_u:11951: tīkṣṇaṃ sarvajano hanti sarpaṃ duṣṭam ivāgatam // Ram_3,28.4
GE09ram_02_u:11953: lobhāt pāpāni kurvāṇaḥ kāmād vā yo na budhyate
GE09ram_02_u:11954: bhraṣṭaḥ paśyati tasyāntaṃ brāhmaṇī karakād iva // Ram_3,28.5
GE09ram_02_u:11957: kiṃ nu hatvā mahābhāgān phalaṃ prāpsyasi rākṣasa // Ram_3,28.6
GE09ram_02_u:11960: aiśvaryaṃ prāpya tiṣṭhanti śīrṇamūlā iva drumāḥ // Ram_3,28.7
GE09ram_02_u:11962: avaśyaṃ labhate kartā phalaṃ pāpasya karmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:11963: ghoraṃ paryāgate kāle drumaḥ puṣpam ivārtavam // Ram_3,28.8
GE09ram_02_u:11965: nacirāt prāpyate loke pāpānāṃ karmaṇāṃ phalam
GE09ram_02_u:11969: aham āsādito rājā prāṇān hantuṃ niśācara // Ram_3,28.10
GE09ram_02_u:11971: adya hi tvāṃ mayā muktāḥ śarāḥ kāñcanabhūṣaṇāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:11972: vidārya nipatiṣyanti valmīkam iva pannagāḥ // Ram_3,28.11
GE09ram_02_u:11975: tān adya nihataḥ saṃkhye sasainyo 'nugamiṣyasi // Ram_3,28.12
GE09ram_02_u:11977: adya tvāṃ nihataṃ bāṇaiḥ paśyantu paramarṣayaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:11978: nirayasthaṃ vimānasthā ye tvayā hiṃsitāḥ purā // Ram_3,28.13
GE09ram_02_u:11980: prahara tvaṃ yathākāmaṃ kuru yatnaṃ kulādhama
GE09ram_02_u:11981: adya te pātayiṣyāmi śiras tālaphalaṃ yathā // Ram_3,28.14
GE09ram_02_u:11983: evam uktas tu rāmeṇa kruddhaḥ saṃraktalocanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:11984: pratyuvāca tato rāmaṃ prahasan krodhamūrchitaḥ // Ram_3,28.15
GE09ram_02_u:11987: ātmanā katham ātmānam apraśasyaṃ praśaṃsasi // Ram_3,28.16
GE09ram_02_u:11989: vikrāntā balavanto vā ye bhavanti nararṣabhāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:11990: kathayanti na te kiṃcit tejasā svena garvitāḥ // Ram_3,28.17
GE09ram_02_u:11993: nirarthakaṃ vikatthante yathā rāma vikatthase // Ram_3,28.18
GE09ram_02_u:11996: mṛtyukāle hi samprāpte svayam aprastave stavam // Ram_3,28.19
GE09ram_02_u:11998: sarvathā tu laghutvaṃ te katthanena vidarśitam
GE09ram_02_u:12001: na tu mām iha tiṣṭhantaṃ paśyasi tvaṃ gadādharam
GE09ram_02_u:12002: dharādharam ivākampyaṃ parvataṃ dhātubhiś citam // Ram_3,28.21
GE09ram_02_u:12004: paryāpto 'haṃ gadāpāṇir hantuṃ prāṇān raṇe tava
GE09ram_02_u:12005: trayāṇām api lokānāṃ pāśahasta ivāntakaḥ // Ram_3,28.22
GE09ram_02_u:12007: kāmaṃ bahv api vaktavyaṃ tvayi vakṣyāmi na tv aham
GE09ram_02_u:12008: astaṃ gaccheddhi savitā yuddhavighnas tato bhavet // Ram_3,28.23
GE09ram_02_u:12011: tvadvināśāt karomy adya teṣām aśrupramārjanam // Ram_3,28.24
GE09ram_02_u:12013: ity uktvā paramakruddhas tāṃ gadāṃ paramāṅgadaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:12014: kharaś cikṣepa rāmāya pradīptām aśaniṃ yathā // Ram_3,28.25
GE09ram_02_u:12017: bhasma vṛkṣāṃś ca gulmāṃś ca kṛtvāgāt tatsamīpataḥ // Ram_3,28.26
GE09ram_02_u:12020: antarikṣagatāṃ rāmaś cicheda bahudhā śaraiḥ // Ram_3,28.27
GE09ram_02_u:12022: sā viśīrṇā śarair bhinnā papāta dharaṇītale
GE09ram_02_u:12025: bhittvā tu tāṃ gadāṃ bāṇai rāghavo dharmavatsalaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:12026: smayamānaḥ kharaṃ vākyaṃ saṃrabdham idam abravīt // Ram_3,29.1
GE09ram_02_u:12029: śaktihīnataro matto vṛthā tvam avagarjasi // Ram_3,29.2
GE09ram_02_u:12035: rākṣasānāṃ karomīti mithyā tad api te vacaḥ // Ram_3,29.4
GE09ram_02_u:12038: prāṇān apahariṣyāmi garutmān amṛtaṃ yathā // Ram_3,29.5
GE09ram_02_u:12041: vidāritasya madbāṇair mahī pāsyati śoṇitam // Ram_3,29.6
GE09ram_02_u:12044: svapsyase gāṃ samāśliṣya durlabhāṃ pramadām iva // Ram_3,29.7
GE09ram_02_u:12047: bhaviṣyanty aśaraṇyānāṃ śaraṇyā daṇḍakā ime // Ram_3,29.8
GE09ram_02_u:12050: nirbhayā vicariṣyanti sarvato munayo vane // Ram_3,29.9
GE09ram_02_u:12056: anurūpakulāḥ patnyo yāsāṃ tvaṃ patir īdṛśaḥ // Ram_3,29.11
GE09ram_02_u:12059: tvatkṛte śaṅkitair agnau munibhiḥ pātyate haviḥ // Ram_3,29.12
GE09ram_02_u:12061: tam evam abhisaṃrabdhaṃ bruvāṇaṃ rāghavaṃ raṇe
GE09ram_02_u:12064: dṛḍhaṃ khalv avalipto 'si bhayeṣv api ca nirbhayaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:12065: vācyāvācyaṃ tato hi tvaṃ mṛtyuvaśyo na budhyase // Ram_3,29.14
GE09ram_02_u:12068: kāryākāryaṃ na jānanti te nirastaṣaḍindriyāḥ // Ram_3,29.15
GE09ram_02_u:12070: evam uktvā tato rāmaṃ saṃrudhya bhrukuṭiṃ tataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:12071: sa dadarśa mahāsālam avidūre niśācaraḥ // Ram_3,29.16
GE09ram_02_u:12074: sa tam utpāṭayāmāsa saṃdṛśya daśanacchadam // Ram_3,29.17
GE09ram_02_u:12077: rāmam uddiśya cikṣepa hatas tvam iti cābravīt // Ram_3,29.18
GE09ram_02_u:12079: tam āpatantaṃ bāṇaughaiś chittvā rāmaḥ pratāpavān
GE09ram_02_u:12080: roṣam āhārayat tīvraṃ nihantuṃ samare kharam // Ram_3,29.19
GE09ram_02_u:12083: nirbibheda sahasreṇa bāṇānāṃ samare kharam // Ram_3,29.20
GE09ram_02_u:12085: tasya bāṇāntarād raktaṃ bahu susrāva phenilam
GE09ram_02_u:12088: vihvalaḥ sa kṛto bāṇaiḥ kharo rāmeṇa saṃyuge
GE09ram_02_u:12089: matto rudhiragandhena tam evābhyadravad drutam // Ram_3,29.22
GE09ram_02_u:12095: kharasya rāmo jagrāha brahmadaṇḍam ivāparam // Ram_3,29.24
GE09ram_02_u:12097: sa tad dattaṃ maghavatā surarājena dhīmatā
GE09ram_02_u:12098: saṃdadhe ca sa dharmātmā mumoca ca kharaṃ prati // Ram_3,29.25
GE09ram_02_u:12101: rāmeṇa dhanur udyamya kharasyorasi cāpatat // Ram_3,29.26
GE09ram_02_u:12103: sa papāta kharo bhūmau dahyamānaḥ śarāgninā
GE09ram_02_u:12106: sa vṛtra iva vajreṇa phenena namucir yathā
GE09ram_02_u:12107: balo vendrāśanihato nipapāta hataḥ kharaḥ // Ram_3,29.28
GE09ram_02_u:12110: sabhājya muditā rāmam idaṃ vacanam abruvan // Ram_3,29.29
GE09ram_02_u:12115: ānītas tvam imaṃ deśam upāyena maharṣibhiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:12116: eṣāṃ vadhārthaṃ krūrāṇāṃ rakṣasāṃ pāpakarmaṇām // Ram_3,29.31
GE09ram_02_u:12118: tad idaṃ naḥ kṛtaṃ kāryaṃ tvayā daśarathātmaja
GE09ram_02_u:12119: sukhaṃ dharmaṃ cariṣyanti daṇḍakeṣu maharṣayaḥ // Ram_3,29.32
GE09ram_02_u:12121: etasminn antare vīro lakṣmaṇaḥ saha sītayā
GE09ram_02_u:12124: tato rāmas tu vijayī pūjyamāno maharṣibhiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:12128: babhūva hṛṣṭā vaidehī bhartāraṃ pariṣasvaje // Ram_3,29.35
GE09ram_02_u:12131: hatāny ekena rāmeṇa rakṣasāṃ bhīmakarmaṇām // Ram_3,30.1
GE09ram_02_u:12133: dūṣaṇaṃ ca kharaṃ caiva hataṃ triśirasaṃ raṇe
GE09ram_02_u:12134: dṛṣṭvā punar mahānādaṃ nanāda jaladopamā // Ram_3,30.2
GE09ram_02_u:12136: sā dṛṣṭvā karma rāmasya kṛtam anyaiḥ suduṣkaram
GE09ram_02_u:12140: upopaviṣṭaṃ sacivair marudbhir iva vāsavam // Ram_3,30.4
GE09ram_02_u:12143: rukmavedigataṃ prājyaṃ jvalantam iva pāvakam // Ram_3,30.5
GE09ram_02_u:12146: ajeyaṃ samare śūraṃ vyāttānanam ivāntakam // Ram_3,30.6
GE09ram_02_u:12158: āhatāṅgaṃ samastaiś ca devapraharaṇais tathā // Ram_3,30.10
GE09ram_02_u:12161: kṣeptāraṃ parvatāgrāṇāṃ surāṇāṃ ca pramardanam // Ram_3,30.11
GE09ram_02_u:12166: purīṃ bhogavatīṃ gatvā parājitya ca vāsukim
GE09ram_02_u:12167: takṣakasya priyāṃ bhāryāṃ parājitya jahāra yaḥ // Ram_3,30.13
GE09ram_02_u:12170: vimānaṃ puṣpakaṃ tasya kāmagaṃ vai jahāra yaḥ // Ram_3,30.14
GE09ram_02_u:12172: vanaṃ caitrarathaṃ divyaṃ nalinīṃ nandanaṃ vanam
GE09ram_02_u:12173: vināśayati yaḥ krodhād devodyānāni vīryavān // Ram_3,30.15
GE09ram_02_u:12179: purā svayambhuve dhīraḥ śirāṃsy upajahāra yaḥ // Ram_3,30.17
GE09ram_02_u:12182: abhayaṃ yasya saṃgrāme mṛtyuto mānuṣād ṛte // Ram_3,30.18
GE09ram_02_u:12185: havirdhāneṣu yaḥ somam upahanti mahābalaḥ // Ram_3,30.19
GE09ram_02_u:12191: rākṣasī bhrātaraṃ krūraṃ sā dadarśa mahābalam
GE09ram_02_u:12196: sudāruṇaṃ vākyam abhītacāriṇī mahātmanā śūrpaṇakhā virūpitā // Ram_3,30.22
GE09ram_02_u:12199: amātyamadhye saṃkruddhā paruṣaṃ vākyam abravīt // Ram_3,31.1
GE09ram_02_u:12202: samutpannaṃ bhayaṃ ghoraṃ boddhavyaṃ nāvabudhyase // Ram_3,31.2
GE09ram_02_u:12205: lubdhaṃ na bahu manyante śmaśānāgnim iva prajāḥ // Ram_3,31.3
GE09ram_02_u:12207: svayaṃ kāryāṇi yaḥ kāle nānutiṣṭhati pārthivaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:12208: sa tu vai saha rājyena taiś ca kāryair vinaśyati // Ram_3,31.4
GE09ram_02_u:12211: varjayanti narā dūrān nadīpaṅkam iva dvipāḥ // Ram_3,31.5
GE09ram_02_u:12213: ye na rakṣanti viṣayam asvādhīnā narādhipāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:12214: te na vṛddhyā prakāśante girayaḥ sāgare yathā // Ram_3,31.6
GE09ram_02_u:12217: ayuktacāraś capalaḥ kathaṃ rājā bhaviṣyasi // Ram_3,31.7
GE09ram_02_u:12219: yeṣāṃ cāraś ca kośaś ca nayaś ca jayatāṃ vara
GE09ram_02_u:12220: asvādhīnā narendrāṇāṃ prākṛtais te janaiḥ samāḥ // Ram_3,31.8
GE09ram_02_u:12222: yasmāt paśyanti dūrasthān sarvān arthān narādhipāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:12223: cāreṇa tasmād ucyante rājāno dīrghacakṣuṣaḥ // Ram_3,31.9
GE09ram_02_u:12225: ayuktacāraṃ manye tvāṃ prākṛtaiḥ sacivair vṛtam
GE09ram_02_u:12226: svajanaṃ ca janasthānaṃ hataṃ yo nāvabudhyase // Ram_3,31.10
GE09ram_02_u:12229: hatāny ekena rāmeṇa kharaś ca sahadūṣaṇaḥ // Ram_3,31.11
GE09ram_02_u:12231: ṛṣīṇām abhayaṃ dattaṃ kṛtakṣemāś ca daṇḍakāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:12234: tvaṃ tu lubdhaḥ pramattaś ca parādhīnaś ca rāvaṇa
GE09ram_02_u:12235: viṣaye sve samutpannaṃ bhayaṃ yo nāvabudhyase // Ram_3,31.13
GE09ram_02_u:12241: krodhanaṃ vyasane hanti svajano 'pi narādhipam // Ram_3,31.15
GE09ram_02_u:12243: nānutiṣṭhati kāryāṇi bhayeṣu na bibheti ca
GE09ram_02_u:12244: kṣipraṃ rājyāc cyuto dīnas tṛṇais tulyo bhaviṣyati // Ram_3,31.16
GE09ram_02_u:12246: śuṣkakāṣṭhair bhavet kāryaṃ loṣṭair api ca pāṃsubhiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:12247: na tu sthānāt paribhraṣṭaiḥ kāryaṃ syād vasudhādhipaiḥ // Ram_3,31.17
GE09ram_02_u:12249: upabhuktaṃ yathā vāsaḥ srajo vā mṛditā yathā
GE09ram_02_u:12250: evaṃ rājyāt paribhraṣṭaḥ samartho 'pi nirarthakaḥ // Ram_3,31.18
GE09ram_02_u:12252: apramattaś ca yo rājā sarvajño vijitendriyaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:12253: kṛtajño dharmaśīlaś ca sa rājā tiṣṭhate ciram // Ram_3,31.19
GE09ram_02_u:12256: vyaktakrodhaprasādaś ca sa rājā pūjyate janaiḥ // Ram_3,31.20
GE09ram_02_u:12258: tvaṃ tu rāvaṇa durbuddhir guṇair etair vivarjitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:12259: yasya te 'viditaś cārai rakṣasāṃ sumahān vadhaḥ // Ram_3,31.21
GE09ram_02_u:12262: ayuktabuddhir guṇadoṣaniścaye vipannarājyo na cirād vipatsyate // Ram_3,31.22
GE09ram_02_u:12264: iti svadoṣān parikīrtitāṃs tayā samīkṣya buddhyā kṣaṇadācareśvaraḥ
GE09ram_02_u:12265: dhanena darpeṇa balena cānvito vicintayāmāsa ciraṃ sa rāvaṇaḥ // Ram_3,31.23
GE09ram_02_u:12267: tataḥ śūrpaṇakhāṃ kruddhāṃ bruvatīṃ paruṣaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:12270: kaś ca rāmaḥ kathaṃvīryaḥ kiṃrūpaḥ kiṃparākramaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:12271: kimarthaṃ daṇḍakāraṇyaṃ praviṣṭaś ca suduścaram // Ram_3,32.2
GE09ram_02_u:12273: āyudhaṃ kiṃ ca rāmasya nihatā yena rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:12274: kharaś ca nihataḥ saṃkhye dūṣaṇas triśirās tathā // Ram_3,32.3
GE09ram_02_u:12277: tato rāmaṃ yathānyāyam ākhyātum upacakrame // Ram_3,32.4
GE09ram_02_u:12283: dīptān kṣipati nārācān sarpān iva mahāviṣān // Ram_3,32.6
GE09ram_02_u:12285: nādadānaṃ śarān ghorān na muñcantaṃ mahābalam
GE09ram_02_u:12286: na kārmukaṃ vikarṣantaṃ rāmaṃ paśyāmi saṃyuge // Ram_3,32.7
GE09ram_02_u:12288: hanyamānaṃ tu tat sainyaṃ paśyāmi śaravṛṣṭibhiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:12289: indreṇevottamaṃ sasyam āhataṃ tv aśmavṛṣṭibhiḥ // Ram_3,32.8
GE09ram_02_u:12292: nihatāni śarais tīkṣṇais tenaikena padātinā // Ram_3,32.9
GE09ram_02_u:12295: ṛṣīṇām abhayaṃ dattaṃ kṛtakṣemāś ca daṇḍakāḥ // Ram_3,32.10
GE09ram_02_u:12301: anuraktaś ca bhaktaś ca lakṣmaṇo nāma vīryavān // Ram_3,32.12
GE09ram_02_u:12303: amarṣī durjayo jetā vikrānto buddhimān balī
GE09ram_02_u:12304: rāmasya dakṣiṇo bāhur nityaṃ prāṇo bahiścaraḥ // Ram_3,32.13
GE09ram_02_u:12307: sītā nāma varārohā vaidehī tanumadhyamā // Ram_3,32.14
GE09ram_02_u:12309: naiva devī na gandharvī na yakṣī na ca kiṃnarī
GE09ram_02_u:12310: tathārūpā mayā nārī dṛṣṭapūrvā mahītale // Ram_3,32.15
GE09ram_02_u:12312: yasya sītā bhaved bhāryā yaṃ ca hṛṣṭā pariṣvajet
GE09ram_02_u:12313: atijīvet sa sarveṣu lokeṣv api puraṃdarāt // Ram_3,32.16
GE09ram_02_u:12316: tavānurūpā bhāryā sā tvaṃ ca tasyās tathā patiḥ // Ram_3,32.17
GE09ram_02_u:12319: bhāryārthe tu tavānetum udyatāhaṃ varānanām // Ram_3,32.18
GE09ram_02_u:12322: manmathasya śarāṇāṃ ca tvaṃ vidheyo bhaviṣyasi // Ram_3,32.19
GE09ram_02_u:12324: yadi tasyām abhiprāyo bhāryārthe tava jāyate
GE09ram_02_u:12325: śīghram uddhriyatāṃ pādo jayārtham iha dakṣiṇaḥ // Ram_3,32.20
GE09ram_02_u:12327: kuru priyaṃ tathā teṣāṃ rakṣasāṃ rākṣaseśvara
GE09ram_02_u:12330: taṃ śarair niśitair hatvā lakṣmaṇaṃ ca mahāratham
GE09ram_02_u:12331: hatanāthāṃ sukhaṃ sītāṃ yathāvad upabhokṣyase // Ram_3,32.22
GE09ram_02_u:12333: rocate yadi te vākyaṃ mamaitad rākṣaseśvara
GE09ram_02_u:12334: kriyatāṃ nirviśaṅkena vacanaṃ mama rāghava // Ram_3,32.23
GE09ram_02_u:12336: niśamya rāmeṇa śarair ajihmagair hatāñ janasthānagatān niśācarān
GE09ram_02_u:12337: kharaṃ ca buddhvā nihataṃ ca dūṣaṇaṃ tvam adya kṛtyaṃ pratipattum arhasi // Ram_3,32.24
GE09ram_02_u:12340: sacivān abhyanujñāya kāryaṃ buddhvā jagāma ha // Ram_3,33.1
GE09ram_02_u:12342: tat kāryam anugamyātha yathāvad upalabhya ca
GE09ram_02_u:12343: doṣāṇāṃ ca guṇānāṃ ca sampradhārya balābalam // Ram_3,33.2
GE09ram_02_u:12345: iti kartavyam ity eva kṛtvā niścayam ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:12346: sthirabuddhis tato ramyāṃ yānaśālāṃ jagāma ha // Ram_3,33.3
GE09ram_02_u:12349: sūtaṃ saṃcodayāmāsa rathaḥ saṃyujyatām iti // Ram_3,33.4
GE09ram_02_u:12376: sālais tālais tamālaiś ca tarubhiś ca supuṣpitaiḥ // Ram_3,33.13
GE09ram_02_u:12379: nāgaiḥ suparṇair gandharvaiḥ kiṃnaraiś ca sahasraśaḥ // Ram_3,33.14
GE09ram_02_u:12381: jitakāmaiś ca siddhaiś ca cāraṇaiś copaśobhitam
GE09ram_02_u:12382: ājair vaikhānasair māṣair vālakhilyair marīcipaiḥ // Ram_3,33.15
GE09ram_02_u:12388: devadānavasaṃghaiś ca caritaṃ tv amṛtāśibhiḥ // Ram_3,33.17
GE09ram_02_u:12400: vanāni paśyan saumyāni ghrāṇatṛptikarāṇi ca // Ram_3,33.21
GE09ram_02_u:12402: agarūṇāṃ ca mukhyānāṃ vanāny upavanāni ca
GE09ram_02_u:12403: takkolānāṃ ca jātyānāṃ phalānāṃ ca sugandhinām // Ram_3,33.22
GE09ram_02_u:12405: puṣpāṇi ca tamālasya gulmāni maricasya ca
GE09ram_02_u:12406: muktānāṃ ca samūhāni śuṣyamāṇāni tīrataḥ // Ram_3,33.23
GE09ram_02_u:12409: kāñcanāni ca śailāni rājatāni ca sarvaśaḥ // Ram_3,33.24
GE09ram_02_u:12415: taṃ samaṃ sarvataḥ snigdhaṃ mṛdusaṃsparśamārutam // Ram_3,33.26
GE09ram_02_u:12418: tatrāpaśyat sa meghābhaṃ nyagrodham ṛṣibhir vṛtam // Ram_3,33.27
GE09ram_02_u:12420: samantād yasya tāḥ śākhāḥ śatayojanam āyatāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:12421: yasya hastinam ādāya mahākāyaṃ ca kacchapam
GE09ram_02_u:12422: bhakṣārthaṃ garuḍaḥ śākhām ājagāma mahābalaḥ // Ram_3,33.28
GE09ram_02_u:12424: tasya tāṃ sahasā śākhāṃ bhāreṇa patagottamaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:12428: ajā babhūvur dhūmrāś ca saṃgatāḥ paramarṣayaḥ // Ram_3,33.30
GE09ram_02_u:12430: teṣāṃ dayārthaṃ garuḍas tāṃ śākhāṃ śatayojanām
GE09ram_02_u:12431: jagāmādāya vegena tau cobhau gajakacchapau // Ram_3,33.31
GE09ram_02_u:12435: praharṣam atulaṃ lebhe mokṣayitvā mahāmunīn // Ram_3,33.32
GE09ram_02_u:12438: amṛtānayanārthaṃ vai cakāra matimān matim // Ram_3,33.33
GE09ram_02_u:12444: nāmnā subhadraṃ nyagrodhaṃ dadarśa dhanadānujaḥ // Ram_3,33.35
GE09ram_02_u:12446: taṃ tu gatvā paraṃ pāraṃ samudrasya nadīpateḥ
GE09ram_02_u:12447: dadarśāśramam ekānte puṇye ramye vanāntare // Ram_3,33.36
GE09ram_02_u:12450: dadarśa niyatāhāraṃ mārīcaṃ nāma rākṣasam // Ram_3,33.37
GE09ram_02_u:12452: sa rāvaṇaḥ samāgamya vidhivat tena rakṣasā
GE09ram_02_u:12453: tataḥ paścād idaṃ vākyam abravīd vākyakovidaḥ // Ram_3,33.38
GE09ram_02_u:12455: mārīca śrūyatāṃ tāta vacanaṃ mama bhāṣataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:12456: ārto 'smi mama cārtasya bhavān hi paramā gatiḥ // Ram_3,34.1
GE09ram_02_u:12458: jānīṣe tvaṃ janasthānaṃ bhrātā yatra kharo mama
GE09ram_02_u:12459: dūṣaṇaś ca mahābāhuḥ svasā śūrpaṇakhā ca me // Ram_3,34.2
GE09ram_02_u:12462: anye ca bahavaḥ śūrā labdhalakṣā niśācarāḥ // Ram_3,34.3
GE09ram_02_u:12465: bādhamānā mahāraṇye munīn ye dharmacāriṇaḥ // Ram_3,34.4
GE09ram_02_u:12470: te tv idānīṃ janasthāne vasamānā mahābalāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:12471: saṃgatāḥ param āyattā rāmeṇa saha saṃyuge // Ram_3,34.6
GE09ram_02_u:12474: anuktvā paruṣaṃ kiṃcic charair vyāpāritaṃ dhanuḥ // Ram_3,34.7
GE09ram_02_u:12477: nihatāni śarais tīkṣṇair mānuṣeṇa padātinā // Ram_3,34.8
GE09ram_02_u:12479: kharaś ca nihataḥ saṃkhye dūṣaṇaś ca nipātitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:12480: hatvā triśirasaṃ cāpi nirbhayā daṇḍakāḥ kṛtāḥ // Ram_3,34.9
GE09ram_02_u:12483: sa hantā tasya sainyasya rāmaḥ kṣatriyapāṃsanaḥ // Ram_3,34.10
GE09ram_02_u:12486: tyaktadharmas tv adharmātmā bhūtānām ahite rataḥ // Ram_3,34.11
GE09ram_02_u:12488: yena vairaṃ vināraṇye sattvam āśritya kevalam
GE09ram_02_u:12492: ānayiṣyāmi vikramya sahāyas tatra me bhava // Ram_3,34.13
GE09ram_02_u:12494: tvayā hy ahaṃ sahāyena pārśvasthena mahābala
GE09ram_02_u:12495: bhrātṛbhiś ca surān yuddhe samagrān nābhicintaye // Ram_3,34.14
GE09ram_02_u:12497: tat sahāyo bhava tvaṃ me samartho hy asi rākṣasa
GE09ram_02_u:12498: vīrye yuddhe ca darpe ca na hy asti sadṛśas tava // Ram_3,34.15
GE09ram_02_u:12501: śṛṇu tat karma sāhāyye yat kāryaṃ vacanān mama // Ram_3,34.16
GE09ram_02_u:12503: sauvarṇas tvaṃ mṛgo bhūtvā citro rajatabindubhiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:12504: āśrame tasya rāmasya sītāyāḥ pramukhe cara // Ram_3,34.17
GE09ram_02_u:12506: tvāṃ tu niḥsaṃśayaṃ sītā dṛṣṭvā tu mṛgarūpiṇam
GE09ram_02_u:12507: gṛhyatām iti bhartāraṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ cābhidhāsyati // Ram_3,34.18
GE09ram_02_u:12509: tatas tayor apāye tu śūnye sītāṃ yathāsukham
GE09ram_02_u:12510: nirābādho hariṣyāmi rāhuś candraprabhām iva // Ram_3,34.19
GE09ram_02_u:12516: śuṣkaṃ samabhavad vaktraṃ paritrasto babhūva ca // Ram_3,34.21
GE09ram_02_u:12519: kṛtāñjalis tattvam uvāca vākyaṃ hitaṃ ca tasmai hitam ātmanaś ca // Ram_3,34.22
GE09ram_02_u:12525: apriyasya ca pathyasya vaktā śrotā ca durlabhaḥ // Ram_3,35.2
GE09ram_02_u:12527: na nūnaṃ budhyase rāmaṃ mahāvīryaṃ guṇonnatam
GE09ram_02_u:12530: api svasti bhavet tāta sarveṣāṃ bhuvi rakṣasām
GE09ram_02_u:12531: api rāmo na saṃkruddhaḥ kuryāl lokam arākṣasam // Ram_3,35.4
GE09ram_02_u:12534: api sītā nimittaṃ ca na bhaved vyasanaṃ mahat // Ram_3,35.5
GE09ram_02_u:12536: api tvām īśvaraṃ prāpya kāmavṛttaṃ niraṅkuśam
GE09ram_02_u:12537: na vinaśyet purī laṅkā tvayā saha sarākṣasā // Ram_3,35.6
GE09ram_02_u:12540: ātmānaṃ svajanaṃ rāṣṭraṃ sa rājā hanti durmatiḥ // Ram_3,35.7
GE09ram_02_u:12542: na ca pitrā parityakto nāmaryādaḥ kathaṃcana
GE09ram_02_u:12543: na lubdho na ca duḥśīlo na ca kṣatriyapāṃsanaḥ // Ram_3,35.8
GE09ram_02_u:12546: na ca tīkṣṇo hi bhūtānāṃ sarveṣāṃ ca hite rataḥ // Ram_3,35.9
GE09ram_02_u:12549: kariṣyāmīti dharmātmā tataḥ pravrajito vanam // Ram_3,35.10
GE09ram_02_u:12552: hitvā rājyaṃ ca bhogāṃś ca praviṣṭo daṇḍakāvanam // Ram_3,35.11
GE09ram_02_u:12554: na rāmaḥ karkaśas tāta nāvidvān nājitendriyaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:12555: anṛtaṃ na śrutaṃ caiva naiva tvaṃ vaktum arhasi // Ram_3,35.12
GE09ram_02_u:12558: rājā sarvasya lokasya devānām iva vāsavaḥ // Ram_3,35.13
GE09ram_02_u:12560: kathaṃ tvaṃ tasya vaidehīṃ rakṣitāṃ svena tejasā
GE09ram_02_u:12561: icchasi prasabhaṃ hartuṃ prabhām iva vivasvataḥ // Ram_3,35.14
GE09ram_02_u:12564: rāmāgniṃ sahasā dīptaṃ na praveṣṭuṃ tvam arhasi // Ram_3,35.15
GE09ram_02_u:12569: rājyaṃ sukhaṃ ca saṃtyajya jīvitaṃ ceṣṭam ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:12572: aprameyaṃ hi tattejo yasya sā janakātmajā
GE09ram_02_u:12573: na tvaṃ samarthas tāṃ hartuṃ rāmacāpāśrayāṃ vane // Ram_3,35.18
GE09ram_02_u:12576: dīptasyeva hutāśasya śikhā sītā sumadhyamā // Ram_3,35.19
GE09ram_02_u:12578: kim udyamaṃ vyartham imaṃ kṛtvā te rākṣasādhipa
GE09ram_02_u:12579: dṛṣṭaś cet tvaṃ raṇe tena tadantaṃ tava jīvitam
GE09ram_02_u:12580: jīvitaṃ ca sukhaṃ caiva rājyaṃ caiva sudurlabham // Ram_3,35.20
GE09ram_02_u:12583: mantrayitvā tu dharmiṣṭhaiḥ kṛtvā niścayam ātmanaḥ // Ram_3,35.21
GE09ram_02_u:12585: doṣāṇāṃ ca guṇānāṃ ca sampradhārya balābalam
GE09ram_02_u:12586: ātmanaś ca balaṃ jñātvā rāghavasya ca tattvataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:12587: hitaṃ hi tava niścitya kṣamaṃ tvaṃ kartum arhasi // Ram_3,35.22
GE09ram_02_u:12589: ahaṃ tu manye tava na kṣamaṃ raṇe samāgamaṃ kosalarājasūnunā
GE09ram_02_u:12590: idaṃ hi bhūyaḥ śṛṇu vākyam uttamaṃ kṣamaṃ ca yuktaṃ ca niśācarādhipa // Ram_3,35.23
GE09ram_02_u:12592: kadācid apy ahaṃ vīryāt paryaṭan pṛthivīm imām
GE09ram_02_u:12600: svayaṃ gatvā daśarathaṃ narendram idam abravīt // Ram_3,36.3
GE09ram_02_u:12602: ayaṃ rakṣatu māṃ rāmaḥ parvakāle samāhitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:12603: mārīcān me bhayaṃ ghoraṃ samutpannaṃ nareśvara // Ram_3,36.4
GE09ram_02_u:12605: ity evam ukto dharmātmā rājā daśarathas tadā
GE09ram_02_u:12609: kāmaṃ tu mama yat sainyaṃ mayā saha gamiṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:12610: vadhiṣyāmi muniśreṣṭha śatruṃ tava yathepsitam // Ram_3,36.6
GE09ram_02_u:12612: ity evam uktaḥ sa munī rājānaṃ punar abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:12613: rāmān nānyad balaṃ loke paryāptaṃ tasya rakṣasaḥ // Ram_3,36.7
GE09ram_02_u:12615: bālo 'py eṣa mahātejāḥ samarthas tasya nigrahe
GE09ram_02_u:12616: gamiṣye rāmam ādāya svasti te 'stu paraṃtapa // Ram_3,36.8
GE09ram_02_u:12618: ity evam uktvā sa munis tam ādāya nṛpātmajam
GE09ram_02_u:12619: jagāma paramaprīto viśvāmitraḥ svam āśramam // Ram_3,36.9
GE09ram_02_u:12621: taṃ tadā daṇḍakāraṇye yajñam uddiśya dīkṣitam
GE09ram_02_u:12622: babhūvāvasthito rāmaś citraṃ visphārayan dhanuḥ // Ram_3,36.10
GE09ram_02_u:12628: adṛśyata tadā rāmo bālacandra ivoditaḥ // Ram_3,36.12
GE09ram_02_u:12631: balī dattavaro darpād ājagāma tadāśramam // Ram_3,36.13
GE09ram_02_u:12634: māṃ tu dṛṣṭvā dhanuḥ sajyam asambhrāntaś cakāra ha // Ram_3,36.14
GE09ram_02_u:12636: avajānann ahaṃ mohād bālo 'yam iti rāghavam
GE09ram_02_u:12637: viśvāmitrasya tāṃ vedim adhyadhāvaṃ kṛtatvaraḥ // Ram_3,36.15
GE09ram_02_u:12639: tena muktas tato bāṇaḥ śitaḥ śatrunibarhaṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:12640: tenāhaṃ tāḍitaḥ kṣiptaḥ samudre śatayojane // Ram_3,36.16
GE09ram_02_u:12644: prāpya saṃjñāṃ cirāt tāta laṅkāṃ prati gataḥ purīm // Ram_3,36.17
GE09ram_02_u:12646: evam asmi tadā muktaḥ sahāyās te nipātitāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:12649: tan mayā vāryamāṇas tvaṃ yadi rāmeṇa vigraham
GE09ram_02_u:12650: kariṣyasy āpadaṃ ghorāṃ kṣipraṃ prāpya naśiṣyasi // Ram_3,36.19
GE09ram_02_u:12653: rakṣasāṃ caiva saṃtāpam anarthaṃ cāhariṣyasi // Ram_3,36.20
GE09ram_02_u:12656: drakṣyasi tvaṃ purīṃ laṅkāṃ vinaṣṭāṃ maithilīkṛte // Ram_3,36.21
GE09ram_02_u:12659: parapāpair vinaśyanti matsyā nāgahrade yathā // Ram_3,36.22
GE09ram_02_u:12662: drakṣyasy abhihatān bhūmau tava doṣāt tu rākṣasān // Ram_3,36.23
GE09ram_02_u:12664: hṛtadārān sadārāṃś ca daśa vidravato diśaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:12665: hataśeṣān aśaraṇān drakṣyasi tvaṃ niśācarān // Ram_3,36.24
GE09ram_02_u:12668: pradagdhabhavanāṃ laṅkāṃ drakṣyasi tvam asaṃśayam // Ram_3,36.25
GE09ram_02_u:12671: bhava svadāranirataḥ svakulaṃ rakṣa rākṣasa // Ram_3,36.26
GE09ram_02_u:12673: mānaṃ vṛddhiṃ ca rājyaṃ ca jīvitaṃ ceṣṭam ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:12674: yadīcchasi ciraṃ bhoktuṃ mā kṛthā rāmavipriyam // Ram_3,36.27
GE09ram_02_u:12676: nivāryamāṇaḥ suhṛdā mayā bhṛśaṃ prasahya sītāṃ yadi dharṣayiṣyasi
GE09ram_02_u:12677: gamiṣyasi kṣīṇabalaḥ sabāndhavo yamakṣayaṃ rāmaśarāttajīvitaḥ // Ram_3,36.28
GE09ram_02_u:12679: evam asmi tadā muktaḥ kathaṃcit tena saṃyuge
GE09ram_02_u:12680: idānīm api yad vṛttaṃ tac chṛṇuṣva yad uttaram // Ram_3,37.1
GE09ram_02_u:12682: rākṣasābhyām ahaṃ dvābhyām anirviṇṇas tathā kṛtaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:12689: atyantaghoro vyacaraṃ tāpasāṃs tān pradharṣayan // Ram_3,37.4
GE09ram_02_u:12692: rudhirāṇi pibaṃs teṣāṃ tathā māṃsāni bhakṣayan // Ram_3,37.5
GE09ram_02_u:12698: āsādayaṃ tadā rāmaṃ tāpasaṃ dharmam āśritam // Ram_3,37.7
GE09ram_02_u:12700: vaidehīṃ ca mahābhāgāṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ ca mahāratham
GE09ram_02_u:12704: tāpaso 'yam iti jñātvā pūrvavairam anusmaran // Ram_3,37.9
GE09ram_02_u:12707: jighāṃsur akṛtaprajñas taṃ prahāram anusmaran // Ram_3,37.10
GE09ram_02_u:12709: tena muktās trayo bāṇāḥ śitāḥ śatrunibarhaṇāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:12713: ājagmuḥ sahitāḥ sarve trayaḥ saṃnataparvaṇaḥ // Ram_3,37.12
GE09ram_02_u:12716: samutkrāntas tato muktas tāv ubhau rākṣasau hatau // Ram_3,37.13
GE09ram_02_u:12718: śareṇa mukto rāmasya kathaṃcit prāpya jīvitam
GE09ram_02_u:12719: iha pravrājito yuktas tāpaso 'haṃ samāhitaḥ // Ram_3,37.14
GE09ram_02_u:12725: rāmabhūtam idaṃ sarvam araṇyaṃ pratibhāti me // Ram_3,37.16
GE09ram_02_u:12727: rāmam eva hi paśyāmi rahite rākṣaseśvara
GE09ram_02_u:12728: dṛṣṭvā svapnagataṃ rāmam udbhramāmi vicetanaḥ // Ram_3,37.17
GE09ram_02_u:12731: ratnāni ca rathāś caiva trāsaṃ saṃjanayanti me // Ram_3,37.18
GE09ram_02_u:12733: ahaṃ tasya prabhāvajño na yuddhaṃ tena te kṣamam
GE09ram_02_u:12734: raṇe rāmeṇa yudhyasva kṣamāṃ vā kuru rākṣasa
GE09ram_02_u:12735: na te rāmakathā kāryā yadi māṃ draṣṭum icchasi // Ram_3,37.19
GE09ram_02_u:12737: idaṃ vaco bandhuhitārthinā mayā yathocyamānaṃ yadi nābhipatsyase
GE09ram_02_u:12738: sabāndhavas tyakṣyasi jīvitaṃ raṇe hato 'dya rāmeṇa śarair ajihmagaiḥ // Ram_3,37.20
GE09ram_02_u:12740: mārīcena tu tad vākyaṃ kṣamaṃ yuktaṃ ca rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:12741: ukto na pratijagrāha martukāma ivauṣadham // Ram_3,38.1
GE09ram_02_u:12744: abravīt paruṣaṃ vākyam ayuktaṃ kālacoditaḥ // Ram_3,38.2
GE09ram_02_u:12746: yat kilaitad ayuktārthaṃ mārīca mayi kathyate
GE09ram_02_u:12747: vākyaṃ niṣphalam atyarthaṃ bījam uptam ivoṣare // Ram_3,38.3
GE09ram_02_u:12749: tvadvākyair na tu māṃ śakyaṃ bhettuṃ rāmasya saṃyuge
GE09ram_02_u:12752: yas tyaktvā suhṛdo rājyaṃ mātaraṃ pitaraṃ tathā
GE09ram_02_u:12753: strīvākyaṃ prākṛtaṃ śrutvā vanam ekapade gataḥ // Ram_3,38.5
GE09ram_02_u:12755: avaśyaṃ tu mayā tasya saṃyuge kharaghātinaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:12756: prāṇaiḥ priyatarā sītā hartavyā tava saṃnidhau // Ram_3,38.6
GE09ram_02_u:12758: evaṃ me niścitā buddhir hṛdi mārīca vartate
GE09ram_02_u:12759: na vyāvartayituṃ śakyā sendrair api surāsuraiḥ // Ram_3,38.7
GE09ram_02_u:12761: doṣaṃ guṇaṃ vā saṃpṛṣṭas tvam evaṃ vaktum arhasi
GE09ram_02_u:12762: apāyaṃ vāpy upāyaṃ vā kāryasyāsya viniścaye // Ram_3,38.8
GE09ram_02_u:12765: udyatāñjalinā rājño ya icched bhūtim ātmanaḥ // Ram_3,38.9
GE09ram_02_u:12767: vākyam apratikūlaṃ tu mṛdupūrvaṃ śubhaṃ hitam
GE09ram_02_u:12768: upacāreṇa yuktaṃ ca vaktavyo vasudhādhipaḥ // Ram_3,38.10
GE09ram_02_u:12770: sāvamardaṃ tu yad vākyaṃ mārīca hitam ucyate
GE09ram_02_u:12771: nābhinandati tad rājā mānārho mānavarjitam // Ram_3,38.11
GE09ram_02_u:12774: agner indrasya somasya yamasya varuṇasya ca
GE09ram_02_u:12775: auṣṇyaṃ tathā vikramaṃ ca saumyaṃ daṇḍaṃ prasannatām // Ram_3,38.12
GE09ram_02_u:12777: tasmāt sarvāsv avasthāsu mānyāḥ pūjyāś ca pārthivāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:12778: tvaṃ tu dharmam avijñāya kevalaṃ moham āsthitaḥ // Ram_3,38.13
GE09ram_02_u:12781: guṇadoṣau na pṛcchāmi kṣamaṃ cātmani rākṣasa
GE09ram_02_u:12782: asmiṃs tu sa bhavān kṛtye sāhāyyaṃ kartum arhasi // Ram_3,38.14
GE09ram_02_u:12784: sauvarṇas tvaṃ mṛgo bhūtvā citro rajatabindubhiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:12785: pralobhayitvā vaidehīṃ yatheṣṭaṃ gantum arhasi // Ram_3,38.15
GE09ram_02_u:12787: tvāṃ tu māyāmṛgaṃ dṛṣṭvā kāñcanaṃ jātavismayā
GE09ram_02_u:12788: ānayainam iti kṣipraṃ rāmaṃ vakṣyati maithilī // Ram_3,38.16
GE09ram_02_u:12790: apakrānte ca kākutsthe lakṣmaṇe ca yathāsukham
GE09ram_02_u:12791: ānayiṣyāmi vaidehīṃ sahasrākṣaḥ śacīm iva // Ram_3,38.17
GE09ram_02_u:12793: evaṃ kṛtvā tv idaṃ kāryaṃ yatheṣṭaṃ gaccha rākṣasa
GE09ram_02_u:12794: rājyasyārdhaṃ pradāsyāmi mārīca tava suvrata // Ram_3,38.18
GE09ram_02_u:12796: gaccha saumya śivaṃ mārgaṃ kāryasyāsya vivṛddhaye
GE09ram_02_u:12797: prāpya sītām ayuddhena vañcayitvā tu rāghavam
GE09ram_02_u:12798: laṅkāṃ prati gamiṣyāmi kṛtakāryaḥ saha tvayā // Ram_3,38.19
GE09ram_02_u:12800: etat kāryam avaśyaṃ me balād api kariṣyasi
GE09ram_02_u:12801: rājño hi pratikūlastho na jātu sukham edhate // Ram_3,38.20
GE09ram_02_u:12803: āsādya taṃ jīvitasaṃśayas te mṛtyur dhruvo hy adya mayā virudhya
GE09ram_02_u:12804: etad yathāvat parigṛhya buddhyā yad atra pathyaṃ kuru tat tathā tvam // Ram_3,38.21
GE09ram_02_u:12807: abravīt paruṣaṃ vākyaṃ mārīco rākṣasādhipam // Ram_3,39.1
GE09ram_02_u:12812: kas tvayā sukhinā rājan nābhinandati pāpakṛt
GE09ram_02_u:12813: kenedam upadiṣṭaṃ te mṛtyudvāram upāyataḥ // Ram_3,39.3
GE09ram_02_u:12816: icchanti tvāṃ vinaśyantam uparuddhaṃ balīyasā // Ram_3,39.4
GE09ram_02_u:12819: yas tvām icchati naśyantaṃ svakṛtena niśācara // Ram_3,39.5
GE09ram_02_u:12821: vadhyāḥ khalu na hanyante sacivās tava rāvaṇa
GE09ram_02_u:12822: ye tvām utpatham ārūḍhaṃ na nigṛhṇanti sarvaśaḥ // Ram_3,39.6
GE09ram_02_u:12824: amātyaiḥ kāmavṛtto hi rājā kāpatham āśritaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:12825: nigrāhyaḥ sarvathā sadbhir na nigrāhyo nigṛhyase // Ram_3,39.7
GE09ram_02_u:12827: dharmam arthaṃ ca kāmaṃ ca yaśaś ca jayatāṃ vara
GE09ram_02_u:12830: viparyaye tu tat sarvaṃ vyarthaṃ bhavati rāvaṇa
GE09ram_02_u:12833: rājamūlo hi dharmaś ca jayaś ca jayatāṃ vara
GE09ram_02_u:12834: tasmāt sarvāsv avasthāsu rakṣitavyo narādhipaḥ // Ram_3,39.10
GE09ram_02_u:12836: rājyaṃ pālayituṃ śakyaṃ na tīkṣṇena niśācara
GE09ram_02_u:12837: na cāpi pratikūlena nāvinītena rākṣasa // Ram_3,39.11
GE09ram_02_u:12839: ye tīkṣṇamantrāḥ sacivā bhajyante saha tena vai
GE09ram_02_u:12840: viṣameṣu rathāḥ śīghraṃ mandasārathayo yathā // Ram_3,39.12
GE09ram_02_u:12846: rakṣyamāṇā na vardhante meṣā gomāyunā yathā // Ram_3,39.14
GE09ram_02_u:12849: yeṣāṃ tvaṃ karkaśo rājā durbuddhir ajitendriyaḥ // Ram_3,39.15
GE09ram_02_u:12851: tad idaṃ kākatālīyaṃ ghoram āsāditaṃ tvayā
GE09ram_02_u:12852: atra kiṃ śobhanaṃ yat tvaṃ sasainyo vinaśiṣyasi // Ram_3,39.16
GE09ram_02_u:12854: māṃ nihatya tu rāmo 'sau nacirāt tvāṃ vadhiṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:12855: anena kṛtakṛtyo 'smi mriye yad ariṇā hataḥ // Ram_3,39.17
GE09ram_02_u:12857: darśanād eva rāmasya hataṃ mām upadhāraya
GE09ram_02_u:12858: ātmānaṃ ca hataṃ viddhi hṛtvā sītāṃ sabāndhavam // Ram_3,39.18
GE09ram_02_u:12860: ānayiṣyāmi cet sītām āśramāt sahito mayā
GE09ram_02_u:12861: naiva tvam asi naivāhaṃ naiva laṅkā na rākṣasāḥ // Ram_3,39.19
GE09ram_02_u:12863: nivāryamāṇas tu mayā hitaiṣiṇā na mṛṣyase vākyam idaṃ niśācara
GE09ram_02_u:12864: paretakalpā hi gatāyuṣo narā hitaṃ na gṛhṇanti suhṛdbhir īritam // Ram_3,39.20
GE09ram_02_u:12866: evam uktvā tu paruṣaṃ mārīco rāvaṇaṃ tataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:12867: gacchāvety abravīd dīno bhayād rātriṃcaraprabhoḥ // Ram_3,40.1
GE09ram_02_u:12870: madvidhodyataśastreṇa vinaṣṭaṃ jīvitaṃ ca me // Ram_3,40.2
GE09ram_02_u:12872: kiṃ tu kartuṃ mayā śakyam evaṃ tvayi durātmani
GE09ram_02_u:12873: eṣa gacchāmy ahaṃ tāta svasti te 'stu niśācara // Ram_3,40.3
GE09ram_02_u:12875: prahṛṣṭas tv abhavat tena vacanena sa rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:12876: pariṣvajya susaṃśliṣṭam idaṃ vacanam abravīt // Ram_3,40.4
GE09ram_02_u:12878: etac chauṇḍīryayuktaṃ te macchabdād iva bhāṣitam
GE09ram_02_u:12879: idānīm asi mārīcaḥ pūrvam anyo niśācaraḥ // Ram_3,40.5
GE09ram_02_u:12882: mayā saha ratho yuktaḥ piśācavadanaiḥ kharaiḥ // Ram_3,40.6
GE09ram_02_u:12884: tato rāvaṇamārīcau vimānam iva taṃ ratham
GE09ram_02_u:12885: āruhya yayatuḥ śīghraṃ tasmād āśramamaṇḍalāt // Ram_3,40.7
GE09ram_02_u:12887: tathaiva tatra paśyantau pattanāni vanāni ca
GE09ram_02_u:12888: girīṃś ca saritaḥ sarvā rāṣṭrāṇi nagarāṇi ca // Ram_3,40.8
GE09ram_02_u:12894: haste gṛhītvā mārīcaṃ rāvaṇo vākyam abravīt // Ram_3,40.10
GE09ram_02_u:12897: kriyatāṃ tat sakhe śīghraṃ yadarthaṃ vayam āgatāḥ // Ram_3,40.11
GE09ram_02_u:12899: sa rāvaṇavacaḥ śrutvā mārīco rākṣasas tadā
GE09ram_02_u:12900: mṛgo bhūtvāśramadvāri rāmasya vicacāra ha // Ram_3,40.12
GE09ram_02_u:12912: kṣaṇena rākṣaso jāto mṛgaḥ paramaśobhanaḥ // Ram_3,40.16
GE09ram_02_u:12914: vanaṃ prajvalayan ramyaṃ rāmāśramapadaṃ ca tat
GE09ram_02_u:12915: manoharaṃ darśanīyaṃ rūpaṃ kṛtvā sa rākṣasaḥ // Ram_3,40.17
GE09ram_02_u:12918: vicaran gacchate samyak śādvalāni samantataḥ // Ram_3,40.18
GE09ram_02_u:12921: viṭapīnāṃ kisalayān bhaṅktvādan vicacāra ha // Ram_3,40.19
GE09ram_02_u:12929: punar gatvā nivṛttaś ca vicacāra mṛgottamaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:12930: gatvā muhūrtaṃ tvarayā punaḥ pratinivartate // Ram_3,40.22
GE09ram_02_u:12932: vikrīḍaṃś ca punar bhūmau punar eva niṣīdati
GE09ram_02_u:12936: sītādarśanam ākāṅkṣan rākṣaso mṛgatāṃ gataḥ // Ram_3,40.24
GE09ram_02_u:12939: samudvīkṣya ca sarve taṃ mṛgā ye 'nye vanecarāḥ // Ram_3,40.25
GE09ram_02_u:12942: rākṣasaḥ so 'pi tān vanyān mṛgān mṛgavadhe rataḥ // Ram_3,40.26
GE09ram_02_u:12945: tasminn eva tataḥ kāle vaidehī śubhalocanā // Ram_3,40.27
GE09ram_02_u:12948: karṇikārān aśokāṃś ca cūtāṃś ca madirekṣaṇā // Ram_3,40.28
GE09ram_02_u:12957: sa ca tāṃ rāmadayitāṃ paśyan māyāmayo mṛgaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:12958: vicacāra tatas tatra dīpayann iva tad vanam // Ram_3,40.31
GE09ram_02_u:12961: vismayaṃ paramaṃ sītā jagāma janakātmajā // Ram_3,40.32
GE09ram_02_u:12963: sā taṃ samprekṣya suśroṇī kusumāni vicinvatī
GE09ram_02_u:12967: bhartāram api cākrandal lakṣmaṇaṃ caiva sāyudham // Ram_3,41.2
GE09ram_02_u:12970: vīkṣamāṇau tu taṃ deśaṃ tadā dadṛśatur mṛgam // Ram_3,41.3
GE09ram_02_u:12972: śaṅkamānas tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā lakṣmaṇo rāmam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:12973: tam evainam ahaṃ manye mārīcaṃ rākṣasaṃ mṛgam // Ram_3,41.4
GE09ram_02_u:12976: anena nihatā rāma rājānaḥ kāmarūpiṇā // Ram_3,41.5
GE09ram_02_u:12981: mṛgo hy evaṃvidho ratnavicitro nāsti rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:12982: jagatyāṃ jagatīnātha māyaiṣā hi na saṃśayaḥ // Ram_3,41.7
GE09ram_02_u:12985: uvāca sītā saṃhṛṣṭā chadmanā hṛtacetanā // Ram_3,41.8
GE09ram_02_u:12988: ānayainaṃ mahābāho krīḍārthaṃ no bhaviṣyati // Ram_3,41.9
GE09ram_02_u:12991: mṛgāś caranti sahitāś camarāḥ sṛmarās tathā // Ram_3,41.10
GE09ram_02_u:12993: ṛkṣāḥ pṛṣatasaṃghāś ca vānarāḥ kiṃnarās tathā
GE09ram_02_u:12996: na cāsya sadṛśo rājan dṛṣṭapūrvo mṛgaḥ purā
GE09ram_02_u:12997: tejasā kṣamayā dīptyā yathāyaṃ mṛgasattamaḥ // Ram_3,41.12
GE09ram_02_u:13000: dyotayan vanam avyagraṃ śobhate śaśisaṃnibhaḥ // Ram_3,41.13
GE09ram_02_u:13002: aho rūpam aho lakṣmīḥ svarasampac ca śobhanā
GE09ram_02_u:13003: mṛgo 'dbhuto vicitro 'sau hṛdayaṃ haratīva me // Ram_3,41.14
GE09ram_02_u:13005: yadi grahaṇam abhyeti jīvann eva mṛgas tava
GE09ram_02_u:13012: mṛgarūpam idaṃ divyaṃ vismayaṃ janayiṣyati // Ram_3,41.17
GE09ram_02_u:13014: jīvan na yadi te 'bhyeti grahaṇaṃ mṛgasattamaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:13015: ajinaṃ naraśārdūla ruciraṃ me bhaviṣyati // Ram_3,41.18
GE09ram_02_u:13018: śaṣpabṛsyāṃ vinītāyām icchāmy aham upāsitum // Ram_3,41.19
GE09ram_02_u:13020: kāmavṛttam idaṃ raudraṃ strīṇām asadṛśaṃ matam
GE09ram_02_u:13021: vapuṣā tv asya sattvasya vismayo janito mama // Ram_3,41.20
GE09ram_02_u:13025: babhūva rāghavasyāpi mano vismayam āgatam // Ram_3,41.21
GE09ram_02_u:13027: evaṃ sītāvacaḥ śrutvā dṛṣṭvā ca mṛgam adbhutam
GE09ram_02_u:13028: uvāca rāghavo hṛṣṭo bhrātaraṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ vacaḥ // Ram_3,41.22
GE09ram_02_u:13030: paśya lakṣmaṇa vaidehyāḥ spṛhāṃ mṛgagatām imām
GE09ram_02_u:13031: rūpaśreṣṭhatayā hy eṣa mṛgo 'dya na bhaviṣyati // Ram_3,41.23
GE09ram_02_u:13034: kutaḥ pṛthivyāṃ saumitre yo 'sya kaścit samo mṛgaḥ // Ram_3,41.24
GE09ram_02_u:13037: śobhante mṛgam āśritya citrāḥ kanakabindubhiḥ // Ram_3,41.25
GE09ram_02_u:13040: jihvāṃ mukhān niḥsarantīṃ meghād iva śatahradām // Ram_3,41.26
GE09ram_02_u:13043: kasya nāmābhirūpo 'sau na mano lobhayen mṛgaḥ // Ram_3,41.27
GE09ram_02_u:13046: nānāratnamayaṃ divyaṃ na mano vismayaṃ vrajet // Ram_3,41.28
GE09ram_02_u:13048: māṃsahetor api mṛgān vihārārthaṃ ca dhanvinaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:13049: ghnanti lakṣmaṇa rājāno mṛgayāyāṃ mahāvane // Ram_3,41.29
GE09ram_02_u:13054: tat sāram akhilaṃ nṝṇāṃ dhanaṃ nicayavardhanam
GE09ram_02_u:13055: manasā cintitaṃ sarvaṃ yathā śukrasya lakṣmaṇa // Ram_3,41.31
GE09ram_02_u:13058: tam artham arthaśāstrajñaḥ prāhur arthyāś ca lakṣmaṇa // Ram_3,41.32
GE09ram_02_u:13061: upavekṣyati vaidehī mayā saha sumadhyamā // Ram_3,41.33
GE09ram_02_u:13063: na kādalī na priyakī na praveṇī na cāvikī
GE09ram_02_u:13064: bhaved etasya sadṛśī sparśaneneti me matiḥ // Ram_3,41.34
GE09ram_02_u:13066: eṣa caiva mṛgaḥ śrīmān yaś ca divyo nabhaścaraḥ
GE09ram_02_u:13067: ubhāv etau mṛgau divyau tārāmṛgamahīmṛgau // Ram_3,41.35
GE09ram_02_u:13069: yadi vāyaṃ tathā yan māṃ bhaved vadasi lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_02_u:13070: māyaiṣā rākṣasasyeti kartavyo 'sya vadho mayā // Ram_3,41.36
GE09ram_02_u:13073: vane vicaratā pūrvaṃ hiṃsitā munipuṃgavāḥ // Ram_3,41.37
GE09ram_02_u:13076: nihatāḥ parameṣvāsās tasmād vadhyas tv ayaṃ mṛgaḥ // Ram_3,41.38
GE09ram_02_u:13079: udarastho dvijān hanti svagarbho 'śvatarīm iva // Ram_3,41.39
GE09ram_02_u:13081: sa kadācic cirāl loke āsasāda mahāmunim
GE09ram_02_u:13082: agastyaṃ tejasā yuktaṃ bhakṣyas tasya babhūva ha // Ram_3,41.40
GE09ram_02_u:13084: samutthāne ca tadrūpaṃ kartukāmaṃ samīkṣya tam
GE09ram_02_u:13085: utsmayitvā tu bhagavān vātāpim idam abravīt // Ram_3,41.41
GE09ram_02_u:13088: jīvaloke dvijaśreṣṭhās tasmād asi jarāṃ gataḥ // Ram_3,41.42
GE09ram_02_u:13090: evaṃ tan na bhaved rakṣo vātāpir iva lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_02_u:13094: iha tvaṃ bhava saṃnaddho yantrito rakṣa maithilīm // Ram_3,41.44
GE09ram_02_u:13096: asyām āyattam asmākaṃ yat kṛtyaṃ raghunandana
GE09ram_02_u:13097: aham enaṃ vadhiṣyāmi grahīṣyāmy athavā mṛgam // Ram_3,41.45
GE09ram_02_u:13099: yāvad gacchāmi saumitre mṛgam ānayituṃ drutam
GE09ram_02_u:13100: paśya lakṣmaṇa vaidehīṃ mṛgatvaci gataspṛhām // Ram_3,41.46
GE09ram_02_u:13102: tvacā pradhānayā hy eṣa mṛgo 'dya na bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:13103: apramattena te bhāvyam āśramasthena sītayā // Ram_3,41.47
GE09ram_02_u:13105: yāvat pṛṣatam ekena sāyakena nihanmy aham
GE09ram_02_u:13106: hatvaitac carma ādāya śīghram eṣyāmi lakṣmaṇa // Ram_3,41.48
GE09ram_02_u:13108: pradakṣiṇenātibalena pakṣiṇā jaṭāyuṣā buddhimatā ca lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_02_u:13109: bhavāpramattaḥ pratigṛhya maithilīṃ pratikṣaṇaṃ sarvata eva śaṅkitaḥ // Ram_3,41.49
GE09ram_02_u:13111: tathā tu taṃ samādiśya bhrātaraṃ raghunandanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:13115: ābadhya ca kalāpau dvau jagāmodagravikramaḥ // Ram_3,42.2
GE09ram_02_u:13117: taṃ vañcayāno rājendram āpatantaṃ nirīkṣya vai
GE09ram_02_u:13120: baddhāsir dhanur ādāya pradudrāva yato mṛgaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:13121: taṃ sa paśyati rūpeṇa dyotamānam ivāgrataḥ // Ram_3,42.4
GE09ram_02_u:13124: ativṛttam iṣoḥ pātāl lobhayānaṃ kadācana // Ram_3,42.5
GE09ram_02_u:13127: daśyamānam adṛśyaṃ ca navoddeśeṣu keṣucit // Ram_3,42.6
GE09ram_02_u:13130: muhūrtād eva dadṛśe muhur dūrāt prakāśate // Ram_3,42.7
GE09ram_02_u:13133: āsīt kruddhas tu kākutstho vivaśas tena mohitaḥ // Ram_3,42.8
GE09ram_02_u:13136: mṛgaiḥ parivṛto vanyair adūrāt pratyadṛśyata // Ram_3,42.9
GE09ram_02_u:13138: dṛṣṭvā rāmo mahātejās taṃ hantuṃ kṛtaniścayaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:13139: saṃdhāya sudṛḍhe cāpe vikṛṣya balavad balī // Ram_3,42.10
GE09ram_02_u:13141: tam eva mṛgam uddiśya jvalantam iva pannagam
GE09ram_02_u:13149: mriyamāṇas tu mārīco jahau tāṃ kṛtrimāṃ tanum // Ram_3,42.13
GE09ram_02_u:13151: samprāptakālam ājñāya cakāra ca tataḥ svaram
GE09ram_02_u:13152: sadṛśaṃ rāghavasyaiva hā sīte lakṣmaṇeti ca // Ram_3,42.14
GE09ram_02_u:13155: mṛgarūpaṃ tu tat tyaktvā rākṣasaṃ rūpam ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:13156: cakre sa sumahākāyo mārīco jīvitaṃ tyajan // Ram_3,42.15
GE09ram_02_u:13161: taṃ dṛṣṭvā patitaṃ bhūmau rākṣasaṃ ghoradarśanam
GE09ram_02_u:13162: jagāma manasā sītāṃ lakṣmaṇasya vacaḥ smaran // Ram_3,42.17
GE09ram_02_u:13164: hā sīte lakṣmaṇety evam ākruśya tu mahāsvaram
GE09ram_02_u:13165: mamāra rākṣasaḥ so 'yaṃ śrutvā sītā kathaṃ bhavet // Ram_3,42.18
GE09ram_02_u:13167: lakṣmaṇaś ca mahābāhuḥ kām avasthāṃ gamiṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:13168: iti saṃcintya dharmātmā rāmo hṛṣṭatanūruhaḥ // Ram_3,42.19
GE09ram_02_u:13170: tatra rāmaṃ bhayaṃ tīvram āviveśa viṣādajam
GE09ram_02_u:13171: rākṣasaṃ mṛgarūpaṃ taṃ hatvā śrutvā ca tatsvaram // Ram_3,42.20
GE09ram_02_u:13173: nihatya pṛṣataṃ cānyaṃ māṃsam ādāya rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:13176: ārtasvaraṃ tu taṃ bhartur vijñāya sadṛśaṃ vane
GE09ram_02_u:13177: uvāca lakṣmaṇaṃ sītā gaccha jānīhi rāghavam // Ram_3,43.1
GE09ram_02_u:13179: na hi me jīvitaṃ sthāne hṛdayaṃ vāvatiṣṭhate
GE09ram_02_u:13180: krośataḥ paramārtasya śrutaḥ śabdo mayā bhṛśam // Ram_3,43.2
GE09ram_02_u:13182: ākrandamānaṃ tu vane bhrātaraṃ trātum arhasi
GE09ram_02_u:13183: taṃ kṣipram abhidhāva tvaṃ bhrātaraṃ śaraṇaiṣiṇam // Ram_3,43.3
GE09ram_02_u:13185: rakṣasāṃ vaśam āpannaṃ siṃhānām iva govṛṣam
GE09ram_02_u:13186: na jagāma tathoktas tu bhrātur ājñāya śāsanam // Ram_3,43.4
GE09ram_02_u:13188: tam uvāca tatas tatra kupitā janakātmajā
GE09ram_02_u:13189: saumitre mitrarūpeṇa bhrātus tvam asi śatruvat // Ram_3,43.5
GE09ram_02_u:13191: yas tvam asyām avasthāyāṃ bhrātaraṃ nābhipadyase
GE09ram_02_u:13192: icchasi tvaṃ vinaśyantaṃ rāmaṃ lakṣmaṇa matkṛte // Ram_3,43.6
GE09ram_02_u:13194: vyasanaṃ te priyaṃ manye sneho bhrātari nāsti te
GE09ram_02_u:13195: tena tiṣṭhasi viśrabdhas tam apaśyan mahādyutim // Ram_3,43.7
GE09ram_02_u:13197: kiṃ hi saṃśayam āpanne tasminn iha mayā bhavet
GE09ram_02_u:13198: kartavyam iha tiṣṭhantyā yat pradhānas tvam āgataḥ // Ram_3,43.8
GE09ram_02_u:13201: abravīl lakṣmaṇas trastāṃ sītāṃ mṛgavadhūm iva // Ram_3,43.9
GE09ram_02_u:13204: rākṣaseṣu piśāceṣu kiṃnareṣu mṛgeṣu ca // Ram_3,43.10
GE09ram_02_u:13206: dānaveṣu ca ghoreṣu na sa vidyeta śobhane
GE09ram_02_u:13207: yo rāmaṃ pratiyudhyeta samare vāsavopamam // Ram_3,43.11
GE09ram_02_u:13209: avadhyaḥ samare rāmo naivaṃ tvaṃ vaktum arhasi
GE09ram_02_u:13210: na tvām asmin vane hātum utsahe rāghavaṃ vinā // Ram_3,43.12
GE09ram_02_u:13212: anivāryaṃ balaṃ tasya balair balavatām api
GE09ram_02_u:13213: tribhir lokaiḥ samudyuktaiḥ seśvaraiḥ sāmarair api // Ram_3,43.13
GE09ram_02_u:13215: hṛdayaṃ nirvṛtaṃ te 'stu saṃtāpas tyajyatām ayam
GE09ram_02_u:13216: āgamiṣyati te bhartā śīghraṃ hatvā mṛgottamam // Ram_3,43.14
GE09ram_02_u:13218: na sa tasya svaro vyaktaṃ na kaścid api daivataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:13219: gandharvanagaraprakhyā māyā sā tasya rakṣasaḥ // Ram_3,43.15
GE09ram_02_u:13222: rāmeṇa tvaṃ varārohe na tvāṃ tyaktum ihotsahe // Ram_3,43.16
GE09ram_02_u:13224: kṛtavairāś ca kalyāṇi vayam etair niśācaraiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:13225: kharasya nidhane devi janasthānavadhaṃ prati // Ram_3,43.17
GE09ram_02_u:13228: hiṃsāvihārā vaidehi na cintayitum arhasi // Ram_3,43.18
GE09ram_02_u:13231: abravīt paruṣaṃ vākyaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ satyavādinam // Ram_3,43.19
GE09ram_02_u:13234: ahaṃ tava priyaṃ manye tenaitāni prabhāṣase // Ram_3,43.20
GE09ram_02_u:13236: naitac citraṃ sapatneṣu pāpaṃ lakṣmaṇa yad bhavet
GE09ram_02_u:13239: suduṣṭas tvaṃ vane rāmam ekam eko 'nugacchasi
GE09ram_02_u:13240: mama hetoḥ praticchannaḥ prayukto bharatena vā // Ram_3,43.22
GE09ram_02_u:13243: upasaṃśritya bhartāraṃ kāmayeyaṃ pṛthag janam // Ram_3,43.23
GE09ram_02_u:13245: samakṣaṃ tava saumitre prāṇāṃs tyakṣye na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:13246: rāmaṃ vinā kṣaṇam api na hi jīvāmi bhūtale // Ram_3,43.24
GE09ram_02_u:13248: ity uktaḥ paruṣaṃ vākyaṃ sītayā romaharṣaṇam
GE09ram_02_u:13249: abravīl lakṣmaṇaḥ sītāṃ prāñjalir vijitendriyaḥ // Ram_3,43.25
GE09ram_02_u:13251: uttaraṃ notsahe vaktuṃ daivataṃ bhavatī mama
GE09ram_02_u:13252: vākyam apratirūpaṃ tu na citraṃ strīṣu maithili // Ram_3,43.26
GE09ram_02_u:13254: svabhāvas tv eṣa nārīṇām eṣu lokeṣu dṛśyate
GE09ram_02_u:13255: vimuktadharmāś capalās tīkṣṇā bhedakarāḥ striyaḥ // Ram_3,43.27
GE09ram_02_u:13258: nyāyavādī yathā vākyam ukto 'haṃ paruṣaṃ tvayā // Ram_3,43.28
GE09ram_02_u:13260: dhik tvām adya praṇaśya tvaṃ yan mām evaṃ viśaṅkase
GE09ram_02_u:13263: gamiṣye yatra kākutsthaḥ svasti te 'stu varānane
GE09ram_02_u:13264: rakṣantu tvāṃ viśālākṣi samagrā vanadevatāḥ // Ram_3,43.30
GE09ram_02_u:13266: nimittāni hi ghorāṇi yāni prādurbhavanti me
GE09ram_02_u:13267: api tvāṃ saha rāmeṇa paśyeyaṃ punar āgataḥ // Ram_3,43.31
GE09ram_02_u:13270: pratyuvāca tato vākyaṃ tīvraṃ bāṣpapariplutā // Ram_3,43.32
GE09ram_02_u:13273: ābandhiṣye 'thavā tyakṣye viṣame deham ātmanaḥ // Ram_3,43.33
GE09ram_02_u:13275: pibāmi vā viṣaṃ tīkṣṇaṃ pravekṣyāmi hutāśanam
GE09ram_02_u:13276: na tv ahaṃ rāghavād anyaṃ padāpi puruṣaṃ spṛśe // Ram_3,43.34
GE09ram_02_u:13279: pāṇibhyāṃ rudatī duḥkhād udaraṃ prajaghāna ha // Ram_3,43.35
GE09ram_02_u:13281: tām ārtarūpāṃ vimanā rudantīṃ saumitrir ālokya viśālanetrām
GE09ram_02_u:13282: āśvāsayāmāsa na caiva bhartus taṃ bhrātaraṃ kiṃcid uvāca sītā // Ram_3,43.36
GE09ram_02_u:13284: tatas tu sītām abhivādya lakṣmaṇaḥ kṛtāñjaliḥ kiṃcid abhipraṇamya
GE09ram_02_u:13285: avekṣamāṇo bahuśaś ca maithilīṃ jagāma rāmasya samīpam ātmavān // Ram_3,43.37
GE09ram_02_u:13287: tayā paruṣam uktas tu kupito rāghavānujaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:13288: sa vikāṅkṣan bhṛśaṃ rāmaṃ pratasthe nacirād iva // Ram_3,44.1
GE09ram_02_u:13298: rahitāṃ sūryacandrābhyāṃ saṃdhyām iva mahattamaḥ // Ram_3,44.4
GE09ram_02_u:13300: tām apaśyat tato bālāṃ rājaputrīṃ yaśasvinīm
GE09ram_02_u:13301: rohiṇīṃ śaśinā hīnāṃ grahavad bhṛśadāruṇaḥ // Ram_3,44.5
GE09ram_02_u:13304: samīkṣya na prakampante na pravāti ca mārutaḥ // Ram_3,44.6
GE09ram_02_u:13306: śīghrasrotāś ca taṃ dṛṣṭvā vīkṣantaṃ raktalocanam
GE09ram_02_u:13307: stimitaṃ gantum ārebhe bhayād godāvarī nadī // Ram_3,44.7
GE09ram_02_u:13309: rāmasya tv antaraṃ prepsur daśagrīvas tadantare
GE09ram_02_u:13310: upatasthe ca vaidehīṃ bhikṣurūpeṇa rāvaṇaḥ // Ram_3,44.8
GE09ram_02_u:13313: abhyavartata vaidehīṃ citrām iva śanaiścaraḥ // Ram_3,44.9
GE09ram_02_u:13315: sa pāpo bhavyarūpeṇa tṛṇaiḥ kūpa ivāvṛtaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:13316: atiṣṭhat prekṣya vaidehīṃ rāmapatnīṃ yaśasvinīm // Ram_3,44.10
GE09ram_02_u:13325: abravīt praśritaṃ vākyaṃ rahite rākṣasādhipaḥ // Ram_3,44.13
GE09ram_02_u:13327: tām uttamāṃ trilokānāṃ padmahīnām iva śriyam
GE09ram_02_u:13328: vibhrājamānāṃ vapuṣā rāvaṇaḥ praśaśaṃsa ha // Ram_3,44.14
GE09ram_02_u:13331: kamalānāṃ śubhāṃ mālāṃ padminīva ca bibhratī // Ram_3,44.15
GE09ram_02_u:13333: hrīḥ śrīḥ kīrtiḥ śubhā lakṣmīr apsarā vā śubhānane
GE09ram_02_u:13334: bhūtir vā tvaṃ varārohe ratir vā svairacāriṇī // Ram_3,44.16
GE09ram_02_u:13336: samāḥ śikhariṇaḥ snigdhāḥ pāṇḍurā daśanās tava
GE09ram_02_u:13337: viśāle vimale netre raktānte kṛṣṇatārake // Ram_3,44.17
GE09ram_02_u:13340: etāv upacitau vṛttau sahitau saṃpragalbhitau // Ram_3,44.18
GE09ram_02_u:13346: mano harasi me rāme nadīkūlam ivāmbhasā // Ram_3,44.20
GE09ram_02_u:13349: naiva devī na gandharvī na yakṣī na ca kiṃnarī // Ram_3,44.21
GE09ram_02_u:13352: iha vāsaś ca kāntāre cittam unmādayanti me // Ram_3,44.22
GE09ram_02_u:13354: sā pratikrāma bhadraṃ te na tvaṃ vastum ihārhasi
GE09ram_02_u:13355: rākṣasānām ayaṃ vāso ghorāṇāṃ kāmarūpiṇām // Ram_3,44.23
GE09ram_02_u:13358: sampannāni sugandhīni yuktāny ācarituṃ tvayā // Ram_3,44.24
GE09ram_02_u:13360: varaṃ mālyaṃ varaṃ pānaṃ varaṃ vastraṃ ca śobhane
GE09ram_02_u:13361: bhartāraṃ ca varaṃ manye tvadyuktam asitekṣaṇe // Ram_3,44.25
GE09ram_02_u:13363: kā tvaṃ bhavasi rudrāṇāṃ marutāṃ vā śucismite
GE09ram_02_u:13364: vasūnāṃ vā varārohe devatā pratibhāsi me // Ram_3,44.26
GE09ram_02_u:13366: neha gacchanti gandharvā na devā na ca kiṃnarāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:13367: rākṣasānām ayaṃ vāsaḥ kathaṃ nu tvam ihāgatā // Ram_3,44.27
GE09ram_02_u:13370: ṛkṣās tarakṣavaḥ kaṅkāḥ kathaṃ tebhyo na bibhyasi // Ram_3,44.28
GE09ram_02_u:13373: katham ekā mahāraṇye na bibheṣi varānane // Ram_3,44.29
GE09ram_02_u:13375: kāsi kasya kutaś ca tvaṃ kiṃnimittaṃ ca daṇḍakān
GE09ram_02_u:13376: ekā carasi kalyāṇi ghorān rākṣasasevitān // Ram_3,44.30
GE09ram_02_u:13379: dvijātiveṣeṇa hi taṃ dṛṣṭvā rāvaṇam āgatam
GE09ram_02_u:13383: abravīt siddham ity eva tadā taṃ saumyadarśanam // Ram_3,44.32
GE09ram_02_u:13385: dvijātiveṣeṇa samīkṣya maithilī tam āgataṃ pātrakusumbhadhāriṇam
GE09ram_02_u:13386: aśakyam udveṣṭum upāyadarśanān nyamantrayad brāhmaṇavad yathāgatam // Ram_3,44.33
GE09ram_02_u:13388: iyaṃ bṛsī brāhmaṇa kāmam āsyatām idaṃ ca pādyaṃ pratigṛhyatām iti
GE09ram_02_u:13389: idaṃ ca siddhaṃ vanajātam uttamaṃ tvadartham avyagram ihopabhujyatām // Ram_3,44.34
GE09ram_02_u:13392: prahasya tasyā haraṇe dhṛtaṃ manaḥ samarpayāmāsa vadhāya rāvaṇaḥ // Ram_3,44.35
GE09ram_02_u:13394: tataḥ suveṣaṃ mṛgayāgataṃ patiṃ pratīkṣamāṇā sahalakṣmaṇaṃ tadā
GE09ram_02_u:13395: nirīkṣamāṇā haritaṃ dadarśa tan mahad vanaṃ naiva tu rāmalakṣmaṇau // Ram_3,44.36
GE09ram_02_u:13397: rāvaṇena tu vaidehī tadā pṛṣṭā jihīrṣuṇā
GE09ram_02_u:13400: brāhmaṇaś cātithiś caiṣa anukto hi śapeta mām
GE09ram_02_u:13401: iti dhyātvā muhūrtaṃ tu sītā vacanam abravīt // Ram_3,45.2
GE09ram_02_u:13404: sītā nāmnāsmi bhadraṃ te rāmabhāryā dvijottama // Ram_3,45.3
GE09ram_02_u:13409: tataḥ saṃvatsarād ūrdhvaṃ samamanyata me patim
GE09ram_02_u:13413: kaikeyī nāma bhartāraṃ mamāryā yācate varam // Ram_3,45.6
GE09ram_02_u:13415: pratigṛhya tu kaikeyī śvaśuraṃ sukṛtena me
GE09ram_02_u:13417: dvāv ayācata bhartāraṃ satyasaṃdhaṃ nṛpottamam // Ram_3,45.7
GE09ram_02_u:13419: nādya bhokṣye na ca svapsye na pāsye 'haṃ kadācana
GE09ram_02_u:13420: eṣa me jīvitasyānto rāmo yady abhiṣicyate // Ram_3,45.8
GE09ram_02_u:13422: iti bruvāṇāṃ kaikeyīṃ śvaśuro me sa mānadaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:13423: ayācatārthair anvarthair na ca yācñāṃ cakāra sā // Ram_3,45.9
GE09ram_02_u:13426: rāmeti prathito loke guṇavān satyavāk śuciḥ
GE09ram_02_u:13429: abhiṣekāya tu pituḥ samīpaṃ rāmam āgatam
GE09ram_02_u:13430: kaikeyī mama bhartāram ity uvāca drutaṃ vacaḥ // Ram_3,45.11
GE09ram_02_u:13432: tava pitrā samājñaptaṃ mamedaṃ śṛṇu rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:13433: bharatāya pradātavyam idaṃ rājyam akaṇṭakam // Ram_3,45.12
GE09ram_02_u:13435: tvayā tu khalu vastavyaṃ nava varṣāṇi pañca ca
GE09ram_02_u:13436: vane pravraja kākutstha pitaraṃ mocayānṛtāt // Ram_3,45.13
GE09ram_02_u:13438: tathety uvāca tāṃ rāmaḥ kaikeyīm akutobhayaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:13439: cakāra tadvacas tasyā mama bhartā dṛḍhavrataḥ // Ram_3,45.14
GE09ram_02_u:13441: dadyān na pratigṛhṇīyāt satyaṃ brūyān na cānṛtam
GE09ram_02_u:13442: etad brāhmaṇa rāmasya vrataṃ dhruvam anuttamam // Ram_3,45.15
GE09ram_02_u:13444: tasya bhrātā tu vaimātro lakṣmaṇo nāma vīryavān
GE09ram_02_u:13447: sa bhrātā lakṣmaṇo nāma dharmacārī dṛḍhavrataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:13448: anvagacchad dhanuṣpāṇiḥ pravrajantaṃ mayā saha // Ram_3,45.17
GE09ram_02_u:13450: te vayaṃ pracyutā rājyāt kaikeyyās tu kṛte trayaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:13451: vicarāma dvijaśreṣṭha vanaṃ gambhīram ojasā // Ram_3,45.18
GE09ram_02_u:13453: samāśvasa muhūrtaṃ tu śakyaṃ vastum iha tvayā
GE09ram_02_u:13454: āgamiṣyati me bhartā vanyam ādāya puṣkalam // Ram_3,45.19
GE09ram_02_u:13456: sa tvaṃ nāma ca gotraṃ ca kulam ācakṣva tattvataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:13457: ekaś ca daṇḍakāraṇye kimarthaṃ carasi dvija // Ram_3,45.20
GE09ram_02_u:13463: ahaṃ sa rāvaṇo nāma sīte rakṣogaṇeśvaraḥ // Ram_3,45.22
GE09ram_02_u:13466: ratiṃ svakeṣu dāreṣu nādhigacchāmy anindite // Ram_3,45.23
GE09ram_02_u:13469: sarvāsām eva bhadraṃ te mamāgramahiṣī bhava // Ram_3,45.24
GE09ram_02_u:13471: laṅkā nāma samudrasya madhye mama mahāpurī
GE09ram_02_u:13474: tatra sīte mayā sārdhaṃ vaneṣu vicariṣyasi
GE09ram_02_u:13478: sīte paricariṣyanti bhāryā bhavasi me yadi // Ram_3,45.27
GE09ram_02_u:13484: mahodadhim ivākṣobhyam ahaṃ rāmam anuvratā // Ram_3,45.29
GE09ram_02_u:13487: nṛsiṃhaṃ siṃhasaṃkāśam ahaṃ rāmam anuvratā // Ram_3,45.30
GE09ram_02_u:13490: pṛthukīrtiṃ mahābāhum ahaṃ rāmam anuvratā // Ram_3,45.31
GE09ram_02_u:13492: tvaṃ punar jambukaḥ siṃhīṃ mām ihecchasi durlabhām
GE09ram_02_u:13493: nāhaṃ śakyā tvayā spraṣṭum ādityasya prabhā yathā // Ram_3,45.32
GE09ram_02_u:13495: pādapān kāñcanān nūnaṃ bahūn paśyasi mandabhāk
GE09ram_02_u:13496: rāghavasya priyāṃ bhāryāṃ yas tvam icchasi rāvaṇa // Ram_3,45.33
GE09ram_02_u:13499: āśīviṣasya vadanād daṃṣṭrām ādātum icchasi // Ram_3,45.34
GE09ram_02_u:13502: kālakūṭaṃ viṣaṃ pītvā svastimān gantum icchasi // Ram_3,45.35
GE09ram_02_u:13504: akṣisūcyā pramṛjasi jihvayā lekṣi ca kṣuram
GE09ram_02_u:13505: rāghavasya priyāṃ bhāryām adhigantuṃ tvam icchasi // Ram_3,45.36
GE09ram_02_u:13507: avasajya śilāṃ kaṇṭhe samudraṃ tartum icchasi
GE09ram_02_u:13509: yo rāmasya priyāṃ bhāryāṃ pradharṣayitum icchasi // Ram_3,45.37
GE09ram_02_u:13512: kalyāṇavṛttāṃ rāmasya yo bhāryāṃ hartum icchasi // Ram_3,45.38
GE09ram_02_u:13515: rāmasya sadṛśīṃ bhāryāṃ yo 'dhigantuṃ tvam icchasi // Ram_3,45.39
GE09ram_02_u:13517: yad antaraṃ siṃhaśṛgālayor vane yad antaraṃ syandanikāsamudrayoḥ
GE09ram_02_u:13518: surāgryasauvīrakayor yad antaraṃ tad antaraṃ dāśarathes tavaiva ca // Ram_3,45.40
GE09ram_02_u:13520: yad antaraṃ kāñcanasīsalohayor yad antaraṃ candanavāripaṅkayoḥ
GE09ram_02_u:13521: yad antaraṃ hastibiḍālayor vane tad antaraṃ dāśarathes tavaiva ca // Ram_3,45.41
GE09ram_02_u:13523: yad antaraṃ vāyasavainateyayor yad antaraṃ madgumayūrayor api
GE09ram_02_u:13524: yad antaraṃ sārasagṛdhrayor vane tad antaraṃ dāśarathes tavaiva ca // Ram_3,45.42
GE09ram_02_u:13527: hṛtāpi te 'haṃ na jarāṃ gamiṣye vajraṃ yathā makṣikayāvagīrṇam // Ram_3,45.43
GE09ram_02_u:13529: itīva tad vākyam aduṣṭabhāvā sudṛṣṭam uktvā rajanīcaraṃ tam
GE09ram_02_u:13530: gātraprakampād vyathitā babhūva vātoddhatā sā kadalīva tanvī // Ram_3,45.44
GE09ram_02_u:13532: tāṃ vepamānām upalakṣya sītāṃ sa rāvaṇo mṛtyusamaprabhāvaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:13533: kulaṃ balaṃ nāma ca karma cātmanaḥ samācacakṣe bhayakāraṇārtham // Ram_3,45.45
GE09ram_02_u:13536: lalāṭe bhrukuṭīṃ kṛtvā rāvaṇaḥ pratyuvāca ha // Ram_3,46.1
GE09ram_02_u:13539: rāvaṇo nāma bhadraṃ te daśagrīvaḥ pratāpavān // Ram_3,46.2
GE09ram_02_u:13542: vidravanti bhayād bhītā mṛtyor iva sadā prajāḥ // Ram_3,46.3
GE09ram_02_u:13545: dvaṃdvam āsāditaḥ krodhād raṇe vikramya nirjitaḥ // Ram_3,46.4
GE09ram_02_u:13550: yasya tat puṣpakaṃ nāma vimānaṃ kāmagaṃ śubham
GE09ram_02_u:13551: vīryād āvarjitaṃ bhadre yena yāmi vihāyasam // Ram_3,46.6
GE09ram_02_u:13556: yatra tiṣṭhāmy ahaṃ tatra māruto vāti śaṅkitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:13557: tīvrāṃśuḥ śiśirāṃśuś ca bhayāt sampadyate raviḥ // Ram_3,46.8
GE09ram_02_u:13560: bhavanti yatra yatrāhaṃ tiṣṭhāmi ca carāmi ca // Ram_3,46.9
GE09ram_02_u:13562: mama pāre samudrasya laṅkā nāma purī śubhā
GE09ram_02_u:13571: tatra tvaṃ vasatī sīte rājaputri mayā saha
GE09ram_02_u:13572: na smariṣyasi nārīṇāṃ mānuṣīṇāṃ manasvini // Ram_3,46.13
GE09ram_02_u:13574: bhuñjānā mānuṣān bhogān divyāṃś ca varavarṇini
GE09ram_02_u:13575: na smariṣyasi rāmasya mānuṣasya gatāyuṣaḥ // Ram_3,46.14
GE09ram_02_u:13577: sthāpayitvā priyaṃ putraṃ rājñā daśarathena yaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:13578: mandavīryaḥ suto jyeṣṭhas tataḥ prasthāpito vanam // Ram_3,46.15
GE09ram_02_u:13584: na manmathaśarāviṣṭaṃ pratyākhyātuṃ tvam arhasi // Ram_3,46.17
GE09ram_02_u:13589: evam uktā tu vaidehī kruddhā saṃraktalocanā
GE09ram_02_u:13590: abravīt paruṣaṃ vākyaṃ rahite rākṣasādhipam // Ram_3,46.19
GE09ram_02_u:13593: bhrātaraṃ vyapadiśya tvam aśubhaṃ kartum icchasi // Ram_3,46.20
GE09ram_02_u:13596: yeṣāṃ tvaṃ karkaśo rājā durbuddhir ajitendriyaḥ // Ram_3,46.21
GE09ram_02_u:13598: apahṛtya śacīṃ bhāryāṃ śakyam indrasya jīvitum
GE09ram_02_u:13599: na tu rāmasya bhāryāṃ mām apanīyāsti jīvitam // Ram_3,46.22
GE09ram_02_u:13601: jīvec ciraṃ vajradharasya hastāc chacīṃ pradhṛṣyāpratirūparūpām
GE09ram_02_u:13602: na mādṛśīṃ rākṣasa dharṣayitvā pītāmṛtasyāpi tavāsti mokṣaḥ // Ram_3,46.23
GE09ram_02_u:13605: haste hastaṃ samāhatya cakāra sumahad vapuḥ // Ram_3,47.1
GE09ram_02_u:13607: sa maithilīṃ punar vākyaṃ babhāṣe ca tato bhṛśam
GE09ram_02_u:13608: nonmattayā śrutau manye mama vīryaparākramau // Ram_3,47.2
GE09ram_02_u:13610: udvaheyaṃ bhujābhyāṃ tu medinīm ambare sthitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:13611: āpibeyaṃ samudraṃ ca mṛtyuṃ hanyāṃ raṇe sthitaḥ // Ram_3,47.3
GE09ram_02_u:13613: arkaṃ rundhyāṃ śarais tīkṣṇair vibhindyāṃ hi mahītalam
GE09ram_02_u:13614: kāmarūpiṇam unmatte paśya māṃ kāmadaṃ patim // Ram_3,47.4
GE09ram_02_u:13617: kruddhasya hariparyante rakte netre babhūvatuḥ // Ram_3,47.5
GE09ram_02_u:13619: sadyaḥ saumyaṃ parityajya bhikṣurūpaṃ sa rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:13620: svaṃ rūpaṃ kālarūpābhaṃ bheje vaiśravaṇānujaḥ // Ram_3,47.6
GE09ram_02_u:13623: daśāsyaḥ kārmukī bāṇī babhūva kṣaṇadācaraḥ // Ram_3,47.7
GE09ram_02_u:13626: pratipede svakaṃ rūpaṃ rāvaṇo rākṣasādhipaḥ // Ram_3,47.8
GE09ram_02_u:13629: raktāmbaradharas tasthau strīratnaṃ prekṣya maithilīm // Ram_3,47.9
GE09ram_02_u:13631: sa tām asitakeśāntāṃ bhāskarasya prabhām iva
GE09ram_02_u:13634: triṣu lokeṣu vikhyātaṃ yadi bhartāram icchasi
GE09ram_02_u:13635: mām āśraya varārohe tavāhaṃ sadṛśaḥ patiḥ // Ram_3,47.11
GE09ram_02_u:13637: māṃ bhajasva cirāya tvam ahaṃ ślāghyas tava priyaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:13638: naiva cāhaṃ kvacid bhadre kariṣye tava vipriyam
GE09ram_02_u:13639: tyajyatāṃ mānuṣo bhāvo mayi bhāvaḥ praṇīyatām // Ram_3,47.12
GE09ram_02_u:13642: kair guṇair anuraktāsi mūḍhe paṇḍitamānini // Ram_3,47.13
GE09ram_02_u:13644: yaḥ striyā vacanād rājyaṃ vihāya sasuhṛjjanam
GE09ram_02_u:13645: asmin vyālānucarite vane vasati durmatiḥ // Ram_3,47.14
GE09ram_02_u:13647: ity uktvā maithilīṃ vākyaṃ priyārhāṃ priyavādinīm
GE09ram_02_u:13648: jagrāha rāvaṇaḥ sītāṃ budhaḥ khe rohiṇīm iva // Ram_3,47.15
GE09ram_02_u:13650: vāmena sītāṃ padmākṣīṃ mūrdhajeṣu kareṇa saḥ
GE09ram_02_u:13651: ūrvos tu dakṣiṇenaiva parijagrāha pāṇinā // Ram_3,47.16
GE09ram_02_u:13656: sa ca māyāmayo divyaḥ kharayuktaḥ kharasvanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:13659: tatas tāṃ paruṣair vākyair abhitarjya mahāsvanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:13660: aṅkenādāya vaidehīṃ ratham āropayat tadā // Ram_3,47.19
GE09ram_02_u:13663: rāmeti sītā duḥkhārtā rāmaṃ dūragataṃ vane // Ram_3,47.20
GE09ram_02_u:13665: tām akāmāṃ sa kāmārtaḥ pannagendravadhūm iva
GE09ram_02_u:13669: bhṛśaṃ cukrośa matteva bhrāntacittā yathāturā // Ram_3,47.22
GE09ram_02_u:13672: hriyamāṇāṃ na jānīṣe rakṣasā kāmarūpiṇā // Ram_3,47.23
GE09ram_02_u:13674: jīvitaṃ sukham arthāṃś ca dharmahetoḥ parityajan
GE09ram_02_u:13675: hriyamāṇām adharmeṇa māṃ rāghava na paśyasi // Ram_3,47.24
GE09ram_02_u:13678: katham evaṃvidhaṃ pāpaṃ na tvaṃ śādhi hi rāvaṇam // Ram_3,47.25
GE09ram_02_u:13681: kālo 'py aṅgī bhavaty atra sasyānām iva paktaye // Ram_3,47.26
GE09ram_02_u:13684: jīvitāntakaraṃ ghoraṃ rāmād vyasanam āpnuhi // Ram_3,47.27
GE09ram_02_u:13686: hantedānīṃ sakāmā tu kaikeyī bāndhavaiḥ saha
GE09ram_02_u:13690: kṣipraṃ rāmāya śaṃsadhvaṃ sītāṃ harati rāvaṇaḥ // Ram_3,47.29
GE09ram_02_u:13693: kṣipraṃ rāmāya śaṃsadhvaṃ sītāṃ harati rāvaṇaḥ // Ram_3,47.30
GE09ram_02_u:13696: kṣipraṃ rāmāya śaṃsadhvaṃ sītāṃ harati rāvaṇaḥ // Ram_3,47.31
GE09ram_02_u:13698: daivatāni ca yānty asmin vane vividhapādape
GE09ram_02_u:13699: namaskaromy ahaṃ tebhyo bhartuḥ śaṃsata māṃ hṛtām // Ram_3,47.32
GE09ram_02_u:13701: yāni kānicid apy atra sattvāni nivasanty uta
GE09ram_02_u:13702: sarvāṇi śaraṇaṃ yāmi mṛgapakṣigaṇān api // Ram_3,47.33
GE09ram_02_u:13710: rāmāya tu yathātattvaṃ jaṭāyo haraṇaṃ mama
GE09ram_02_u:13711: lakṣmaṇāya ca tat sarvam ākhyātavyam aśeṣataḥ // Ram_3,47.36
GE09ram_02_u:13713: taṃ śabdam avasuptasya jaṭāyur atha śuśruve
GE09ram_02_u:13714: niraikṣad rāvaṇaṃ kṣipraṃ vaidehīṃ ca dadarśa saḥ // Ram_3,48.1
GE09ram_02_u:13717: vanaspatigataḥ śrīmān vyājahāra śubhāṃ giram // Ram_3,48.2
GE09ram_02_u:13720: jaṭāyur nāma nāmnāhaṃ gṛdhrarājo mahābalaḥ // Ram_3,48.3
GE09ram_02_u:13723: lokānāṃ ca hite yukto rāmo daśarathātmajaḥ // Ram_3,48.4
GE09ram_02_u:13726: sītā nāma varārohā yāṃ tvaṃ hartum ihecchasi // Ram_3,48.5
GE09ram_02_u:13728: kathaṃ rājā sthito dharme paradārān parāmṛśet
GE09ram_02_u:13732: na tat samācared dhīro yat paro 'sya vigarhayet
GE09ram_02_u:13733: yathātmanas tathānyeṣāṃ dārā rakṣyā vimarśanāt // Ram_3,48.7
GE09ram_02_u:13735: arthaṃ vā yadi vā kāmaṃ śiṣṭāḥ śāstreṣvanāgatam
GE09ram_02_u:13736: vyavasyanty anu rājānaṃ dharmaṃ paulastyanandana // Ram_3,48.8
GE09ram_02_u:13738: rājā dharmaś ca kāmaś ca dravyāṇāṃ cottamo nidhiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:13739: dharmaḥ śubhaṃ vā pāpaṃ vā rājamūlaṃ pravartate // Ram_3,48.9
GE09ram_02_u:13741: pāpasvabhāvaś capalaḥ kathaṃ tvaṃ rakṣasāṃ vara
GE09ram_02_u:13742: aiśvaryam abhisamprāpto vimānam iva duṣkṛtiḥ // Ram_3,48.10
GE09ram_02_u:13744: kāmasvabhāvo yo yasya na sa śakyaḥ pramārjitum
GE09ram_02_u:13745: na hi duṣṭātmanām āryam āvasaty ālaye ciram // Ram_3,48.11
GE09ram_02_u:13747: viṣaye vā pure vā te yadā rāmo mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:13753: atra brūhi yathāsatyaṃ ko rāmasya vyatikramaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:13754: yasya tvaṃ lokanāthasya hṛtvā bhāryāṃ gamiṣyasi // Ram_3,48.14
GE09ram_02_u:13756: kṣipraṃ visṛja vaidehīṃ mā tvā ghoreṇa cakṣuṣā
GE09ram_02_u:13757: dahed dahanabhūtena vṛtram indrāśanir yathā // Ram_3,48.15
GE09ram_02_u:13760: grīvāyāṃ pratimuktaṃ ca kālapāśaṃ na paśyasi // Ram_3,48.16
GE09ram_02_u:13762: sa bhāraḥ saumya bhartavyo yo naraṃ nāvasādayet
GE09ram_02_u:13763: tad annam upabhoktavyaṃ jīryate yad anāmayam // Ram_3,48.17
GE09ram_02_u:13765: yat kṛtvā na bhaved dharmo na kīrtir na yaśo bhuvi
GE09ram_02_u:13766: śarīrasya bhavet khedaḥ kas tat karma samācaret // Ram_3,48.18
GE09ram_02_u:13771: vṛddho 'haṃ tvaṃ yuvā dhanvī sarathaḥ kavacī śarī
GE09ram_02_u:13772: tathāpy ādāya vaidehīṃ kuśalī na gamiṣyasi // Ram_3,48.20
GE09ram_02_u:13774: na śaktas tvaṃ balāddhartuṃ vaidehīṃ mama paśyataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:13775: hetubhir nyāyasaṃyuktair dhruvāṃ vedaśrutim iva // Ram_3,48.21
GE09ram_02_u:13777: yudhyasva yadi śūro 'si muhūrtaṃ tiṣṭha rāvaṇa
GE09ram_02_u:13778: śayiṣyase hato bhūmau yathāpūrvaṃ kharas tathā // Ram_3,48.22
GE09ram_02_u:13781: nacirāc cīravāsās tvāṃ rāmo yudhi vadhiṣyati // Ram_3,48.23
GE09ram_02_u:13783: kiṃ nu śakyaṃ mayā kartuṃ gatau dūraṃ nṛpātmajau
GE09ram_02_u:13784: kṣipraṃ tvaṃ naśyase nīca tayor bhīto na saṃśayaḥ // Ram_3,48.24
GE09ram_02_u:13786: na hi me jīvamānasya nayiṣyasi śubhām imām
GE09ram_02_u:13787: sītāṃ kamalapattrākṣīṃ rāmasya mahiṣīṃ priyām // Ram_3,48.25
GE09ram_02_u:13789: avaśyaṃ tu mayā kāryaṃ priyaṃ tasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:13790: jīvitenāpi rāmasya tathā daśarathasya ca // Ram_3,48.26
GE09ram_02_u:13792: tiṣṭha tiṣṭha daśagrīva muhūrtaṃ paśya rāvaṇa
GE09ram_02_u:13794: vṛntād iva phalaṃ tvāṃ tu pātayeyaṃ rathottamāt // Ram_3,48.27
GE09ram_02_u:13802: sa samprahāras tumulas tayos tasmin mahāvane
GE09ram_02_u:13803: babhūva vātoddhatayor meghayor gagane yathā // Ram_3,49.3
GE09ram_02_u:13815: cakāra bahudhā gātre vraṇān patagasattamaḥ // Ram_3,49.7
GE09ram_02_u:13820: sa tair bāṇair mahāvīryaḥ pūrṇamuktair ajihmagaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:13821: bibheda niśitais tīkṣṇair gṛdhraṃ ghoraiḥ śilīmukhaiḥ // Ram_3,49.9
GE09ram_02_u:13824: acintayitvā bāṇāṃs tān rākṣasaṃ samabhidravat // Ram_3,49.10
GE09ram_02_u:13830: pakṣābhyāṃ ca mahātejā vyadhunot patageśvaraḥ // Ram_3,49.12
GE09ram_02_u:13833: tāṃś cāsya javasampannāñ jaghāna samare balī // Ram_3,49.13
GE09ram_02_u:13837: pūrṇacandrapratīkāśaṃ chattraṃ ca vyajanaiḥ saha // Ram_3,49.14
GE09ram_02_u:13840: aṅkenādāya vaidehīṃ papāta bhuvi rāvaṇaḥ // Ram_3,49.15
GE09ram_02_u:13843: sādhu sādhv iti bhūtāni gṛdhrarājam apūjayan // Ram_3,49.16
GE09ram_02_u:13845: pariśrāntaṃ tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā jarayā pakṣiyūthapam
GE09ram_02_u:13846: utpapāta punar hṛṣṭo maithilīṃ gṛhya rāvaṇaḥ // Ram_3,49.17
GE09ram_02_u:13849: gṛdhrarājaḥ samutpatya jaṭāyur idam abravīt // Ram_3,49.18
GE09ram_02_u:13852: alpabuddhe harasy enāṃ vadhāya khalu rakṣasām // Ram_3,49.19
GE09ram_02_u:13855: viṣapānaṃ pibasy etat pipāsita ivodakam // Ram_3,49.20
GE09ram_02_u:13858: śīghram eva vinaśyanti yathā tvaṃ vinaśiṣyasi // Ram_3,49.21
GE09ram_02_u:13860: baddhas tvaṃ kālapāśena kva gatas tasya mokṣyase
GE09ram_02_u:13861: vadhāya baḍiśaṃ gṛhya sāmiṣaṃ jalajo yathā // Ram_3,49.22
GE09ram_02_u:13863: na hi jātu durādharṣau kākutsthau tava rāvaṇa
GE09ram_02_u:13864: dharṣaṇaṃ cāśramasyāsya kṣamiṣyete tu rāghavau // Ram_3,49.23
GE09ram_02_u:13866: yathā tvayā kṛtaṃ karma bhīruṇā lokagarhitam
GE09ram_02_u:13869: yudhyasva yadi śūro 'si muhūrtaṃ tiṣṭha rāvaṇa
GE09ram_02_u:13870: śayiṣyase hato bhūmau yathā bhrātā kharas tathā // Ram_3,49.25
GE09ram_02_u:13875: pāpānubandho vai yasya karmaṇaḥ ko nu tat pumān
GE09ram_02_u:13876: kurvīta lokādhipatiḥ svayambhūr bhagavān api // Ram_3,49.27
GE09ram_02_u:13878: evam uktvā śubhaṃ vākyaṃ jaṭāyus tasya rakṣasaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:13879: nipapāta bhṛśaṃ pṛṣṭhe daśagrīvasya vīryavān // Ram_3,49.28
GE09ram_02_u:13881: taṃ gṛhītvā nakhais tīkṣṇair virarāda samantataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:13882: adhirūḍho gajāroho yathā syād duṣṭavāraṇam // Ram_3,49.29
GE09ram_02_u:13884: virarāda nakhair asya tuṇḍaṃ pṛṣṭhe samarpayan
GE09ram_02_u:13887: sa tathā gṛdhrarājena kliśyamāno muhur muhuḥ
GE09ram_02_u:13888: amarṣasphuritauṣṭhaḥ san prākampata sa rākṣasaḥ // Ram_3,49.31
GE09ram_02_u:13894: vāmabāhūn daśa tadā vyapāharad ariṃdamaḥ // Ram_3,49.33
GE09ram_02_u:13896: tataḥ kruddho daśagrīvaḥ sītām utsṛjya vīryavān
GE09ram_02_u:13897: muṣṭibhyāṃ caraṇābhyāṃ ca gṛdhrarājam apothayat // Ram_3,49.34
GE09ram_02_u:13900: rākṣasānāṃ ca mukhyasya pakṣiṇāṃ pravarasya ca // Ram_3,49.35
GE09ram_02_u:13903: pakṣau pādau ca pārśvau ca khaḍgam uddhṛtya socchinat // Ram_3,49.36
GE09ram_02_u:13906: nipapāta hato gṛdhro dharaṇyām alpajīvitaḥ // Ram_3,49.37
GE09ram_02_u:13908: taṃ dṛṣṭvā patitaṃ bhūmau kṣatajārdraṃ jaṭāyuṣam
GE09ram_02_u:13909: abhyadhāvata vaidehī svabandhum iva duḥkhitā // Ram_3,49.38
GE09ram_02_u:13912: dadarśa laṅkādhipatiḥ pṛthivyāṃ jaṭāyuṣaṃ śāntam ivāgnidāvam // Ram_3,49.39
GE09ram_02_u:13914: tatas tu taṃ pattrarathaṃ mahītale nipātitaṃ rāvaṇavegamarditam
GE09ram_02_u:13915: punaḥ pariṣvajya śaśiprabhānanā ruroda sītā janakātmajā tadā // Ram_3,49.40
GE09ram_02_u:13918: dadarśa gṛdhraṃ patitaṃ samīpe rāghavāśramāt // Ram_3,50.1
GE09ram_02_u:13920: sā tu tārādhipamukhī rāvaṇena samīkṣya tam
GE09ram_02_u:13926: na nūnaṃ rāma jānāsi mahad vyasanam ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:13927: dhāvanti nūnaṃ kākutstha madarthaṃ mṛgapakṣiṇaḥ // Ram_3,50.4
GE09ram_02_u:13929: trāhi mām adya kākutstha lakṣmaṇeti varāṅganā
GE09ram_02_u:13930: susaṃtrastā samākrandac chṛṇvatāṃ tu yathāntike // Ram_3,50.5
GE09ram_02_u:13935: tāṃ latām iva veṣṭantīm āliṅgantīṃ mahādrumān
GE09ram_02_u:13936: muñca muñceti bahuśaḥ pravadan rākṣasādhipaḥ // Ram_3,50.7
GE09ram_02_u:13938: krośantīṃ rāma rāmeti rāmeṇa rahitāṃ vane
GE09ram_02_u:13942: jagat sarvam amaryādaṃ tamasāndhena saṃvṛtam // Ram_3,50.9
GE09ram_02_u:13944: dṛṣṭvā sītāṃ parāmṛṣṭāṃ dīnāṃ divyena cakṣuṣā
GE09ram_02_u:13945: kṛtaṃ kāryam iti śrīmān vyājahāra pitāmahaḥ // Ram_3,50.10
GE09ram_02_u:13947: prahṛṣṭā vyathitāś cāsan sarve te paramarṣayaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:13950: sa tu tāṃ rāma rāmeti rudantīṃ lakṣmaṇeti ca
GE09ram_02_u:13954: rarāja rājaputrī tu vidyut saudāmanī yathā // Ram_3,50.13
GE09ram_02_u:13956: uddhūtena ca vastreṇa tasyāḥ pītena rāvaṇaḥ
