GE09ram_02_u:13957: adhikaṃ paribabhrāja girir dīpta ivāgninā // Ram_3,50.14
GE09ram_02_u:13963: babhau cādityarāgeṇa tāmram abhram ivātape // Ram_3,50.16
GE09ram_02_u:13965: tasyās tad vimalaṃ vaktram ākāśe rāvaṇāṅkagam
GE09ram_02_u:13966: na rarāja vinā rāmaṃ vinālam iva paṅkajam // Ram_3,50.17
GE09ram_02_u:13968: babhūva jaladaṃ nīlaṃ bhittvā candra ivoditaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:13970: śuklaiḥ suvimalair dantaiḥ prabhāvadbhir alaṃkṛtam // Ram_3,50.18
GE09ram_02_u:13976: śuśubhe na vinā rāmaṃ divā candra ivoditaḥ // Ram_3,50.20
GE09ram_02_u:13979: śuśubhe kāñcanī kāñcī nīlaṃ maṇim ivāśritā // Ram_3,50.21
GE09ram_02_u:13985: babhūva vimalo nīlaḥ saghoṣa iva toyadaḥ // Ram_3,50.23
GE09ram_02_u:14000: prāśobhayata vaidehī gajaṃ kaṣyeva kāñcanī // Ram_3,50.28
GE09ram_02_u:14006: saghoṣāṇy avakīryanta kṣīṇās tārā ivāmbarāt // Ram_3,50.30
GE09ram_02_u:14009: vaidehyā nipatan bhāti gaṅgeva gaganāc cyutā // Ram_3,50.31
GE09ram_02_u:14012: mā bhair iti vidhūtāgrā vyājahrur iva pādapāḥ // Ram_3,50.32
GE09ram_02_u:14015: sakhīm iva gatotsāhāṃ śocantīva sma maithilīm // Ram_3,50.33
GE09ram_02_u:14023: hriyamāṇāṃ tu vaidehīṃ dṛṣṭvā dīno divākaraḥ
GE09ram_02_u:14026: nāsti dharmaḥ kutaḥ satyaṃ nārjavaṃ nānṛśaṃsatā
GE09ram_02_u:14027: yatra rāmasya vaidehīṃ bhāryāṃ harati rāvaṇaḥ // Ram_3,50.37
GE09ram_02_u:14035: vikrośantīṃ dṛḍhaṃ sītāṃ dṛṣṭvā duḥkhaṃ tathā gatām
GE09ram_02_u:14036: tāṃ tu lakṣmaṇa rāmeti krośantīṃ madhurasvarām // Ram_3,50.40
GE09ram_02_u:14042: tatas tu sā cārudatī śucismitā vinākṛtā bandhujanena maithilī
GE09ram_02_u:14043: apaśyatī rāghavalakṣmaṇāv ubhau vivarṇavaktrā bhayabhārapīḍitā // Ram_3,50.42
GE09ram_02_u:14045: kham utpatantaṃ taṃ dṛṣṭvā maithilī janakātmajā
GE09ram_02_u:14046: duḥkhitā paramodvignā bhaye mahati vartinī // Ram_3,51.1
GE09ram_02_u:14049: rudatī karuṇaṃ sītā hriyamāṇedam abravīt // Ram_3,51.2
GE09ram_02_u:14052: jñātvā virahitāṃ yo māṃ corayitvā palāyase // Ram_3,51.3
GE09ram_02_u:14054: tvayaiva nūnaṃ duṣṭātman bhīruṇā hartum icchatā
GE09ram_02_u:14056: yo hi mām udyatas trātuṃ so 'py ayaṃ vinipātitaḥ // Ram_3,51.4
GE09ram_02_u:14058: paramaṃ khalu te vīryaṃ dṛśyate rākṣasādhama
GE09ram_02_u:14059: viśrāvya nāmadheyaṃ hi yuddhe nāsti jitā tvayā // Ram_3,51.5
GE09ram_02_u:14061: īdṛśaṃ garhitaṃ karma kathaṃ kṛtvā na lajjase
GE09ram_02_u:14062: striyāś ca haraṇaṃ nīca rahite ca parasya ca // Ram_3,51.6
GE09ram_02_u:14067: dhik te śauryaṃ ca sattvaṃ ca yat tvayā kathitaṃ tadā
GE09ram_02_u:14068: kulākrośakaraṃ loke dhik te cāritram īdṛśam // Ram_3,51.8
GE09ram_02_u:14070: kiṃ śakyaṃ kartum evaṃ hi yaj javenaiva dhāvasi
GE09ram_02_u:14071: muhūrtam api tiṣṭhasva na jīvan pratiyāsyasi // Ram_3,51.9
GE09ram_02_u:14073: na hi cakṣuḥpathaṃ prāpya tayoḥ pārthivaputrayoḥ
GE09ram_02_u:14074: sasainyo 'pi samarthas tvaṃ muhūrtam api jīvitum // Ram_3,51.10
GE09ram_02_u:14076: na tvaṃ tayoḥ śarasparśaṃ soḍhuṃ śaktaḥ kathaṃcana
GE09ram_02_u:14077: vane prajvalitasyeva sparśam agner vihaṃgamaḥ // Ram_3,51.11
GE09ram_02_u:14079: sādhu kṛtvātmanaḥ pathyaṃ sādhu māṃ muñca rāvaṇa
GE09ram_02_u:14080: matpradharṣaṇaruṣṭo hi bhrātrā saha patir mama
GE09ram_02_u:14081: vidhāsyati vināśāya tvaṃ māṃ yadi na muñcasi // Ram_3,51.12
GE09ram_02_u:14083: yena tvaṃ vyavasāyena balān māṃ hartum icchasi
GE09ram_02_u:14084: vyavasāyaḥ sa te nīca bhaviṣyati nirarthakaḥ // Ram_3,51.13
GE09ram_02_u:14086: na hy ahaṃ tam apaśyantī bhartāraṃ vibudhopamam
GE09ram_02_u:14087: utsahe śatruvaśagā prāṇān dhārayituṃ ciram // Ram_3,51.14
GE09ram_02_u:14089: na nūnaṃ cātmanaḥ śreyaḥ pathyaṃ vā samavekṣase
GE09ram_02_u:14090: mṛtyukāle yathā martyo viparītāni sevate // Ram_3,51.15
GE09ram_02_u:14092: mumūrṣūṇāṃ hi sarveṣāṃ yat pathyaṃ tan na rocate
GE09ram_02_u:14093: paśyāmīva hi kaṇṭhe tvāṃ kālapāśāvapāśitam // Ram_3,51.16
GE09ram_02_u:14095: yathā cāsmin bhayasthāne na bibheṣi daśānana
GE09ram_02_u:14096: vyaktaṃ hiraṇmayān hi tvaṃ saṃpaśyasi mahīruhān // Ram_3,51.17
GE09ram_02_u:14099: khaḍgapattravanaṃ caiva bhīmaṃ paśyasi rāvaṇa // Ram_3,51.18
GE09ram_02_u:14102: drakṣyase śālmalīṃ tīkṣṇām āyasaiḥ kaṇṭakaiś citām // Ram_3,51.19
GE09ram_02_u:14104: na hi tvam īdṛśaṃ kṛtvā tasyālīkaṃ mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:14105: dharituṃ śakṣyasi ciraṃ viṣaṃ pītveva nirghṛṇaḥ // Ram_3,51.20
GE09ram_02_u:14108: kva gato lapsyase śarma bhartur mama mahātmanaḥ // Ram_3,51.21
GE09ram_02_u:14111: rākṣasā nihatā yena sahasrāṇi caturdaśa // Ram_3,51.22
GE09ram_02_u:14113: sa kathaṃ rāghavo vīraḥ sarvāstrakuśalo balī
GE09ram_02_u:14114: na tvāṃ hanyāc charais tīkṣṇair iṣṭabhāryāpahāriṇam // Ram_3,51.23
GE09ram_02_u:14116: etac cānyac ca paruṣaṃ vaidehī rāvaṇāṅkagā
GE09ram_02_u:14119: tathā bhṛśārtāṃ bahu caiva bhāṣiṇīṃ vilalāpa pūrvaṃ karuṇaṃ ca bhāminīm
GE09ram_02_u:14120: jahāra pāpas taruṇīṃ viveṣṭatīṃ nṛpātmajām āgatagātravepathum // Ram_3,51.25
GE09ram_02_u:14122: hriyamāṇā tu vaidehī kaṃcin nātham apaśyatī
GE09ram_02_u:14127: mumoca yadi rāmāya śaṃseyur iti maithilī // Ram_3,52.2
GE09ram_02_u:14130: sambhramāt tu daśagrīvas tat karma na ca buddhavān // Ram_3,52.3
GE09ram_02_u:14132: piṅgākṣās tāṃ viśālākṣīṃ netrair animiṣair iva
GE09ram_02_u:14133: vikrośantīṃ tadā sītāṃ dadṛśur vānararṣabhāḥ // Ram_3,52.4
GE09ram_02_u:14135: sa ca pampām atikramya laṅkām abhimukhaḥ purīm
GE09ram_02_u:14136: jagāma rudatīṃ gṛhya maithilīṃ rākṣaseśvaraḥ // Ram_3,52.5
GE09ram_02_u:14138: tāṃ jahāra susaṃhṛṣṭo rāvaṇo mṛtyum ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:14141: vanāni saritaḥ śailān sarāṃsi ca vihāyasā
GE09ram_02_u:14142: sa kṣipraṃ samatīyāya śaraś cāpād iva cyutaḥ // Ram_3,52.7
GE09ram_02_u:14145: saritāṃ śaraṇaṃ gatvā samatīyāya sāgaram // Ram_3,52.8
GE09ram_02_u:14151: etadanto daśagrīva iti siddhās tadābruvan // Ram_3,52.10
GE09ram_02_u:14153: sa tu sītāṃ viveṣṭantīm aṅkenādāya rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:14154: praviveśa purīṃ laṅkāṃ rūpiṇīṃ mṛtyum ātmanaḥ // Ram_3,52.11
GE09ram_02_u:14160: nidadhe rāvaṇaḥ sītāṃ mayo māyām ivāsurīm // Ram_3,52.13
GE09ram_02_u:14163: yathā naināṃ pumān strī vā sītāṃ paśyaty asaṃmataḥ // Ram_3,52.14
GE09ram_02_u:14166: yad yad icchet tad evāsyā deyaṃ macchandato yathā // Ram_3,52.15
GE09ram_02_u:14168: yā ca vakṣyati vaidehīṃ vacanaṃ kiṃcid apriyam
GE09ram_02_u:14169: ajñānād yadi vā jñānān na tasyā jīvitaṃ priyam // Ram_3,52.16
GE09ram_02_u:14171: tathoktvā rākṣasīs tās tu rākṣasendraḥ pratāpavān
GE09ram_02_u:14172: niṣkramyāntaḥpurāt tasmāt kiṃ kṛtyam iti cintayan
GE09ram_02_u:14175: sa tān dṛṣṭvā mahāvīryo varadānena mohitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:14176: uvācaitān idaṃ vākyaṃ praśasya balavīryataḥ // Ram_3,52.18
GE09ram_02_u:14182: pauruṣaṃ balam āśritya trāsam utsṛjya dūrataḥ // Ram_3,52.20
GE09ram_02_u:14184: balaṃ hi sumahad yan me janasthāne niveśitam
GE09ram_02_u:14185: sadūṣaṇakharaṃ yuddhe hataṃ tad rāmasāyakaiḥ // Ram_3,52.21
GE09ram_02_u:14188: vairaṃ ca sumahajjātaṃ rāmaṃ prati sudāruṇam // Ram_3,52.22
GE09ram_02_u:14190: niryātayitum icchāmi tac ca vairam ahaṃ ripoḥ
GE09ram_02_u:14191: na hi lapsyāmy ahaṃ nidrām ahatvā saṃyuge ripum // Ram_3,52.23
GE09ram_02_u:14193: taṃ tv idānīm ahaṃ hatvā kharadūṣaṇaghātinam
GE09ram_02_u:14194: rāmaṃ śarmopalapsyāmi dhanaṃ labdhveva nirdhanaḥ // Ram_3,52.24
GE09ram_02_u:14196: janasthāne vasadbhis tu bhavadbhī rāmam āśritā
GE09ram_02_u:14197: pravṛttir upanetavyā kiṃ karotīti tattvataḥ // Ram_3,52.25
GE09ram_02_u:14199: apramādāc ca gantavyaṃ sarvair eva niśācaraiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:14200: kartavyaś ca sadā yatno rāghavasya vadhaṃ prati // Ram_3,52.26
GE09ram_02_u:14203: ataś cāsmiñ janasthāne mayā yūyaṃ niyojitāḥ // Ram_3,52.27
GE09ram_02_u:14205: tataḥ priyaṃ vākyam upetya rākṣasā mahārtham aṣṭāv abhivādya rāvaṇam
GE09ram_02_u:14206: vihāya laṅkāṃ sahitāḥ pratasthire yato janasthānam alakṣyadarśanāḥ // Ram_3,52.28
GE09ram_02_u:14208: tatas tu sītām upalabhya rāvaṇaḥ susamprahṛṣṭaḥ parigṛhya maithilīm
GE09ram_02_u:14209: prasajya rāmeṇa ca vairam uttamaṃ babhūva mohān muditaḥ sa rākṣasaḥ // Ram_3,52.29
GE09ram_02_u:14215: praviveśa gṛhaṃ ramyaṃ sītāṃ draṣṭum abhitvaran // Ram_3,53.2
GE09ram_02_u:14217: sa praviśya tu tadveśma rāvaṇo rākṣasādhipaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:14221: vāyuvegair ivākrāntāṃ majjantīṃ nāvam arṇave // Ram_3,53.4
GE09ram_02_u:14224: adhomukhamukhīṃ dīnām abhyetya ca niśācaraḥ // Ram_3,53.5
GE09ram_02_u:14226: tāṃ tu śokavaśāṃ dīnām avaśāṃ rākṣasādhipaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:14227: sa balād darśayāmāsa gṛhaṃ devagṛhopamam // Ram_3,53.6
GE09ram_02_u:14232: kāñcanais tāpanīyaiś ca sphāṭikai rājatais tathā
GE09ram_02_u:14236: sopānaṃ kāñcanaṃ citram āruroha tayā saha // Ram_3,53.9
GE09ram_02_u:14247: darśayitvā tu vaidehīṃ kṛtsnaṃ tad bhavanottamam
GE09ram_02_u:14248: uvāca vākyaṃ pāpātmā rāvaṇo janakātmajām // Ram_3,53.13
GE09ram_02_u:14251: varjayitvā jarāvṛddhān bālāṃś ca rajanīcarān // Ram_3,53.14
GE09ram_02_u:14253: teṣāṃ prabhur ahaṃ sīte sarveṣāṃ bhīmakarmaṇām
GE09ram_02_u:14254: sahasram ekam ekasya mama kāryapuraḥsaram // Ram_3,53.15
GE09ram_02_u:14256: yad idaṃ rājyatantraṃ me tvayi sarvaṃ pratiṣṭhitam
GE09ram_02_u:14257: jīvitaṃ ca viśālākṣi tvaṃ me prāṇair garīyasī // Ram_3,53.16
GE09ram_02_u:14260: tāsāṃ tvam īśvarī sīte mama bhāryā bhava priye // Ram_3,53.17
GE09ram_02_u:14262: sādhu kiṃ te 'nyayā buddhyā rocayasva vaco mama
GE09ram_02_u:14263: bhajasva mābhitaptasya prasādaṃ kartum arhasi // Ram_3,53.18
GE09ram_02_u:14266: neyaṃ dharṣayituṃ śakyā sendrair api surāsuraiḥ // Ram_3,53.19
GE09ram_02_u:14268: na deveṣu na yakṣeṣu na gandharveṣu narṣiṣu
GE09ram_02_u:14269: ahaṃ paśyāmi lokeṣu yo me vīryasamo bhavet // Ram_3,53.20
GE09ram_02_u:14274: bhajasva sīte mām eva bhartāhaṃ sadṛśas tava
GE09ram_02_u:14275: yauvanaṃ hy adhruvaṃ bhīru ramasveha mayā saha // Ram_3,53.22
GE09ram_02_u:14277: darśane mā kṛthā buddhiṃ rāghavasya varānane
GE09ram_02_u:14278: kāsya śaktir ihāgantum api sīte manorathaiḥ // Ram_3,53.23
GE09ram_02_u:14280: na śakyo vāyur ākāśe pāśair baddhaṃ mahājavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:14281: dīpyamānasya vāpy agner grahītuṃ vimalāṃ śikhām // Ram_3,53.24
GE09ram_02_u:14283: trayāṇām api lokānāṃ na taṃ paśyāmi śobhane
GE09ram_02_u:14284: vikrameṇa nayed yas tvāṃ madbāhuparipālitām // Ram_3,53.25
GE09ram_02_u:14286: laṅkāyāṃ sumahad rājyam idaṃ tvam anupālaya
GE09ram_02_u:14287: abhiṣekodakaklinnā tuṣṭā ca ramayasva mām // Ram_3,53.26
GE09ram_02_u:14289: duṣkṛtaṃ yat purā karma vanavāsena tad gatam
GE09ram_02_u:14290: yaś ca te sukṛto dharmas tasyeha phalam āpnuhi // Ram_3,53.27
GE09ram_02_u:14293: bhūṣaṇāni ca mukhyāni tāni seva mayā saha // Ram_3,53.28
GE09ram_02_u:14295: puṣpakaṃ nāma suśroṇi bhrātur vaiśravaṇasya me
GE09ram_02_u:14296: vimānaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ ca tad vimānaṃ manojavam // Ram_3,53.29
GE09ram_02_u:14298: tatra sīte mayā sārdhaṃ viharasva yathāsukham
GE09ram_02_u:14301: śokārtaṃ tu varārohe na bhrājati varānane
GE09ram_02_u:14302: alaṃ vrīḍena vaidehi dharmalopakṛtena te // Ram_3,53.31
GE09ram_02_u:14305: etau pādau mayā snigdhau śirobhiḥ paripīḍitau // Ram_3,53.32
GE09ram_02_u:14307: prasādaṃ kuru me kṣipraṃ vaśyo dāso 'ham asmi te
GE09ram_02_u:14308: nemāḥ śūnyā mayā vācaḥ śuṣyamāṇena bhāṣitāḥ // Ram_3,53.33
GE09ram_02_u:14310: na cāpi rāvaṇaḥ kāṃcin mūrdhnā strīṃ praṇameta ha
GE09ram_02_u:14311: evam uktvā daśagrīvo maithilīṃ janakātmajām // Ram_3,53.34
GE09ram_02_u:14314: sā tathoktā tu vaidehī nirbhayā śokakarṣitā
GE09ram_02_u:14315: tṛṇam antarataḥ kṛtvā rāvaṇaṃ pratyabhāṣata // Ram_3,54.1
GE09ram_02_u:14318: satyasaṃdhaḥ parijñāto yasya putraḥ sa rāghavaḥ // Ram_3,54.2
GE09ram_02_u:14320: rāmo nāma sa dharmātmā triṣu lokeṣu viśrutaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:14321: dīrghabāhur viśālākṣo daivataṃ sa patir mama // Ram_3,54.3
GE09ram_02_u:14324: lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā yas te prāṇān hariṣyati // Ram_3,54.4
GE09ram_02_u:14326: pratyakṣaṃ yady ahaṃ tasya tvayā syāṃ dharṣitā balāt
GE09ram_02_u:14327: śayitā tvaṃ hataḥ saṃkhye janasthāne yathā kharaḥ // Ram_3,54.5
GE09ram_02_u:14329: ya ete rākṣasāḥ proktā ghorarūpā mahābalāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:14330: rāghave nirviṣāḥ sarve suparṇe pannagā yathā // Ram_3,54.6
GE09ram_02_u:14335: asurair vā surair vā tvaṃ yady avadho 'si rāvaṇa
GE09ram_02_u:14336: utpādya sumahad vairaṃ jīvaṃs tasya na mokṣyase // Ram_3,54.8
GE09ram_02_u:14339: paśor yūpagatasyeva jīvitaṃ tava durlabham // Ram_3,54.9
GE09ram_02_u:14341: yadi paśyet sa rāmas tvāṃ roṣadīptena cakṣuṣā
GE09ram_02_u:14342: rakṣas tvam adya nirdagdho gaccheḥ sadyaḥ parābhavam // Ram_3,54.10
GE09ram_02_u:14344: yaś candraṃ nabhaso bhūmau pātayen nāśayeta vā
GE09ram_02_u:14345: sāgaraṃ śoṣayed vāpi sa sītāṃ mocayed iha // Ram_3,54.11
GE09ram_02_u:14350: na te pāpam idaṃ karma sukhodarkaṃ bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:14351: yāhaṃ nītā vinā bhāvaṃ patipārśvāt tvayā vanāt // Ram_3,54.13
GE09ram_02_u:14353: sa hi daivatasaṃyukto mama bhartā mahādyutiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:14354: nirbhayo vīryam āśritya śūnye vasati daṇḍake // Ram_3,54.14
GE09ram_02_u:14356: sa te darpaṃ balaṃ vīryam utsekaṃ ca tathāvidham
GE09ram_02_u:14360: tadā kārye pramādyanti narāḥ kālavaśaṃ gatāḥ // Ram_3,54.16
GE09ram_02_u:14362: māṃ pradhṛṣya sa te kālaḥ prāpto 'yaṃ rākṣasādhama
GE09ram_02_u:14363: ātmano rākṣasānāṃ ca vadhāyāntaḥpurasya ca // Ram_3,54.17
GE09ram_02_u:14368: idaṃ śarīraṃ niḥsaṃjñaṃ bandha vā ghātayasva vā
GE09ram_02_u:14369: nedaṃ śarīraṃ rakṣyaṃ me jīvitaṃ vāpi rākṣasa
GE09ram_02_u:14370: na hi śakṣyāmy upakrośaṃ pṛthivyāṃ dātum ātmanaḥ // Ram_3,54.19
GE09ram_02_u:14372: evam uktvā tu vaidehī krodhāt suparuṣaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:14373: rāvaṇaṃ maithilī tatra punar novāca kiṃcana // Ram_3,54.20
GE09ram_02_u:14376: pratyuvāca tataḥ sītāṃ bhayasaṃdarśanaṃ vacaḥ // Ram_3,54.21
GE09ram_02_u:14378: śṛṇu maithili madvākyaṃ māsān dvādaśa bhāmini
GE09ram_02_u:14380: tatas tvāṃ prātarāśārthaṃ sūdāś chetsyanti leśaśaḥ // Ram_3,54.22
GE09ram_02_u:14382: ity uktvā paruṣaṃ vākyaṃ rāvaṇaḥ śatrurāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:14383: rākṣasīś ca tataḥ kruddha idaṃ vacanam abravīt // Ram_3,54.23
GE09ram_02_u:14385: śīghram evaṃ hi rākṣasyo vikṛtā ghoradarśanāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:14388: vacanād eva tās tasya vikṛtā ghoradarśanāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:14391: sa tāḥ provāca rājā tu rāvaṇo ghoradarśanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:14392: pracālya caraṇotkarṣair dārayann iva medinīm // Ram_3,54.26
GE09ram_02_u:14395: tatreyaṃ rakṣyatāṃ gūḍham yuṣmābhiḥ parivāritā // Ram_3,54.27
GE09ram_02_u:14397: tatraināṃ tarjanair ghoraiḥ punaḥ sāntvaiś ca maithilīm
GE09ram_02_u:14398: ānayadhvaṃ vaśaṃ sarvā vanyāṃ gajavadhūm iva // Ram_3,54.28
GE09ram_02_u:14401: aśokavanikāṃ jagmur maithilīṃ parigṛhya tām // Ram_3,54.29
GE09ram_02_u:14407: rākṣasīvaśam āpannā vyāghrīṇāṃ hariṇī yathā // Ram_3,54.31
GE09ram_02_u:14409: na vindate tatra tu śarma maithilī virūpanetrābhir atīva tarjitā
GE09ram_02_u:14410: patiṃ smarantī dayitaṃ ca devaraṃ vicetanābhūd bhayaśokapīḍitā // Ram_3,54.32
GE09ram_02_u:14413: nihatya rāmo mārīcaṃ tūrṇaṃ pathi nyavartata // Ram_3,55.1
GE09ram_02_u:14418: sa tasya svaram ājñāya dāruṇaṃ romaharṣaṇam
GE09ram_02_u:14421: aśubhaṃ bata manye 'haṃ gomāyur vāśyate yathā
GE09ram_02_u:14422: svasti syād api vaidehyā rākṣasair bhakṣaṇaṃ vinā // Ram_3,55.4
GE09ram_02_u:14424: mārīcena tu vijñāya svaram ālakṣya māmakam
GE09ram_02_u:14425: vikruṣṭaṃ mṛgarūpeṇa lakṣmaṇaḥ śṛṇuyād yadi // Ram_3,55.5
GE09ram_02_u:14427: sa saumitriḥ svaraṃ śrutvā tāṃ ca hitvātha maithilīm
GE09ram_02_u:14428: tayaiva prahitaḥ kṣipraṃ matsakāśam ihaiṣyati // Ram_3,55.6
GE09ram_02_u:14430: rākṣasaiḥ sahitair nūnaṃ sītāyā īpsito vadhaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:14431: kāñcanaś ca mṛgo bhūtvā vyapanīyāśramāt tu mām // Ram_3,55.7
GE09ram_02_u:14433: dūraṃ nītvā tu mārīco rākṣaso 'bhūc charāhataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:14434: hā lakṣmaṇa hato 'smīti yad vākyaṃ vyājahāra ha // Ram_3,55.8
GE09ram_02_u:14436: api svasti bhaved dvābhyāṃ rahitābhyāṃ mayā vane
GE09ram_02_u:14438: nimittāni ca ghorāṇi dṛśyante 'dya bahūni ca // Ram_3,55.9
GE09ram_02_u:14440: ity evaṃ cintayan rāmaḥ śrutvā gomāyuniḥsvanam
GE09ram_02_u:14445: savyaṃ kṛtvā mahātmānaṃ ghorāṃś ca sasṛjuḥ svarān // Ram_3,55.11
GE09ram_02_u:14448: tato lakṣmaṇam āyāntaṃ dadarśa vigataprabham // Ram_3,55.12
GE09ram_02_u:14451: viṣaṇṇaḥ sa viṣaṇṇena duḥkhito duḥkhabhāginā // Ram_3,55.13
GE09ram_02_u:14453: saṃjagarhe 'tha taṃ bhrātā jyeṣṭho lakṣmaṇam āgatam
GE09ram_02_u:14454: vihāya sītāṃ vijane vane rākṣasasevite // Ram_3,55.14
GE09ram_02_u:14456: gṛhītvā ca karaṃ savyaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ raghunandanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:14457: uvāca madhurodarkam idaṃ paruṣam ārtavat // Ram_3,55.15
GE09ram_02_u:14459: aho lakṣmaṇa garhyaṃ te kṛtaṃ yat tvaṃ vihāya tām
GE09ram_02_u:14460: sītām ihāgataḥ saumya kaccit svasti bhaved iti // Ram_3,55.16
GE09ram_02_u:14462: na me 'sti saṃśayo vīra sarvathā janakātmajā
GE09ram_02_u:14463: vinaṣṭā bhakṣitā vāpi rākṣasair vanacāribhiḥ // Ram_3,55.17
GE09ram_02_u:14465: aśubhāny eva bhūyiṣṭhaṃ yathā prādurbhavanti me
GE09ram_02_u:14466: api lakṣmaṇa sītāyāḥ sāmagryaṃ prāpnuyāvahe // Ram_3,55.18
GE09ram_02_u:14468: idaṃ hi rakṣo mṛgasaṃnikāśaṃ pralobhya māṃ dūram anuprayātam
GE09ram_02_u:14469: hataṃ kathaṃcin mahatā śrameṇa sa rākṣaso 'bhūn mriyamāṇa eva // Ram_3,55.19
GE09ram_02_u:14471: manaś ca me dīnam ihāprahṛṣṭaṃ cakṣuś ca savyaṃ kurute vikāram
GE09ram_02_u:14472: asaṃśayaṃ lakṣmaṇa nāsti sītā hṛtā mṛtā vā pathi vartate vā // Ram_3,55.20
GE09ram_02_u:14474: sa dṛṣṭvā lakṣmaṇaṃ dīnaṃ śūnye daśarathātmajaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:14475: paryapṛcchata dharmātmā vaidehīm āgataṃ vinā // Ram_3,56.1
GE09ram_02_u:14477: prasthitaṃ daṇḍakāraṇyaṃ yā mām anujagāma ha
GE09ram_02_u:14478: kva sā lakṣmaṇa vaidehī yāṃ hitvā tvam ihāgataḥ // Ram_3,56.2
GE09ram_02_u:14481: kva sā duḥkhasahāyā me vaidehī tanumadhyamā // Ram_3,56.3
GE09ram_02_u:14483: yāṃ vinā notsahe vīra muhūrtam api jīvitum
GE09ram_02_u:14484: kva sā prāṇasahāyā me sītā surasutopamā // Ram_3,56.4
GE09ram_02_u:14486: patitvam amarāṇāṃ vā pṛthivyāś cāpi lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_02_u:14487: vinā tāṃ tapanīyābhāṃ neccheyaṃ janakātmajām // Ram_3,56.5
GE09ram_02_u:14489: kaccij jīvati vaidehī prāṇaiḥ priyatarā mama
GE09ram_02_u:14490: kaccit pravrājanaṃ saumya na me mithyā bhaviṣyati // Ram_3,56.6
GE09ram_02_u:14492: sītānimittaṃ saumitre mṛte mayi gate tvayi
GE09ram_02_u:14493: kaccit sakāmā sukhitā kaikeyī sā bhaviṣyati // Ram_3,56.7
GE09ram_02_u:14496: upasthāsyati kausalyā kaccit saumya na kaikayīm // Ram_3,56.8
GE09ram_02_u:14498: yadi jīvati vaidehī gamiṣyāmy āśramaṃ punaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:14499: suvṛttā yadi vṛttā sā prāṇāṃs tyakṣyāmi lakṣmaṇa // Ram_3,56.9
GE09ram_02_u:14502: punaḥ prahasitā sītā vinaśiṣyāmi lakṣmaṇa // Ram_3,56.10
GE09ram_02_u:14504: brūhi lakṣmaṇa vaidehī yadi jīvati vā na vā
GE09ram_02_u:14505: tvayi pramatte rakṣobhir bhakṣitā vā tapasvinī // Ram_3,56.11
GE09ram_02_u:14507: sukumārī ca bālā ca nityaṃ cāduḥkhadarśinī
GE09ram_02_u:14508: madviyogena vaidehī vyaktaṃ śocati durmanāḥ // Ram_3,56.12
GE09ram_02_u:14511: vadatā lakṣmaṇety uccais tavāpi janitaṃ bhayam // Ram_3,56.13
GE09ram_02_u:14513: śrutaś ca śaṅke vaidehyā sa svaraḥ sadṛśo mama
GE09ram_02_u:14514: trastayā preṣitas tvaṃ ca draṣṭuṃ māṃ śīghram āgataḥ // Ram_3,56.14
GE09ram_02_u:14516: sarvathā tu kṛtaṃ kaṣṭaṃ sītām utsṛjatā vane
GE09ram_02_u:14517: pratikartuṃ nṛśaṃsānāṃ rakṣasāṃ dattam antaram // Ram_3,56.15
GE09ram_02_u:14520: taiḥ sītā nihatā ghorair bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ // Ram_3,56.16
GE09ram_02_u:14523: kiṃ tv idānīṃ kariṣyāmi śaṅke prāptavyam īdṛśam // Ram_3,56.17
GE09ram_02_u:14525: iti sītāṃ varārohāṃ cintayann eva rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:14528: vigarhamāṇo 'nujam ārtarūpaṃ kṣudhā śramāc caiva pipāsayā ca
GE09ram_02_u:14529: viniḥśvasañ śuṣkamukho viṣaṇṇaḥ pratiśrayaṃ prāpya samīkṣya śūnyam // Ram_3,56.19
GE09ram_02_u:14531: svam āśramaṃ saṃpravigāhya vīro vihāradeśān anusṛtya kāṃścit
GE09ram_02_u:14532: etat tad ity eva nivāsabhūmau prahṛṣṭaromā vyathito babhūva // Ram_3,56.20
GE09ram_02_u:14535: paripapraccha saumitriṃ rāmo duḥkhārditaḥ punaḥ // Ram_3,57.1
GE09ram_02_u:14537: tam uvāca kimarthaṃ tvam āgato 'pāsya maithilīm
GE09ram_02_u:14538: yadā sā tava viśvāsād vane virahitā mayā // Ram_3,57.2
GE09ram_02_u:14540: dṛṣṭvaivābhyāgataṃ tvāṃ me maithilīṃ tyajya lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_02_u:14541: śaṅkamānaṃ mahat pāpaṃ yat satyaṃ vyathitaṃ manaḥ // Ram_3,57.3
GE09ram_02_u:14543: sphurate nayanaṃ savyaṃ bāhuś ca hṛdayaṃ ca me
GE09ram_02_u:14544: dṛṣṭvā lakṣmaṇa dūre tvāṃ sītāvirahitaṃ pathi // Ram_3,57.4
GE09ram_02_u:14546: evam uktas tu saumitrir lakṣmaṇaḥ śubhalakṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:14547: bhūyo duḥkhasamāviṣṭo duḥkhitaṃ rāmam abravīt // Ram_3,57.5
GE09ram_02_u:14549: na svayaṃ kāmakāreṇa tāṃ tyaktvāham ihāgataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:14552: āryeṇeva parikruṣṭaṃ hā sīte lakṣmaṇeti ca
GE09ram_02_u:14553: paritrāhīti yad vākyaṃ maithilyās tac chrutiṃ gatam // Ram_3,57.7
GE09ram_02_u:14555: sā tam ārtasvaraṃ śrutvā tava snehena maithilī
GE09ram_02_u:14556: gaccha gaccheti mām āha rudantī bhayavihvalā // Ram_3,57.8
GE09ram_02_u:14559: pratyuktā maithilī vākyam idaṃ tvatpratyayānvitam // Ram_3,57.9
GE09ram_02_u:14561: na tat paśyāmy ahaṃ rakṣo yad asya bhayam āvahet
GE09ram_02_u:14562: nirvṛtā bhava nāsty etat kenāpy evam udāhṛtam // Ram_3,57.10
GE09ram_02_u:14564: vigarhitaṃ ca nīcaṃ ca katham āryo 'bhidhāsyati
GE09ram_02_u:14565: trāhīti vacanaṃ sīte yas trāyet tridaśān api // Ram_3,57.11
GE09ram_02_u:14567: kiṃnimittaṃ tu kenāpi bhrātur ālambya me svaram
GE09ram_02_u:14568: visvaraṃ vyāhṛtaṃ vākyaṃ lakṣmaṇa trāhi mām iti
GE09ram_02_u:14569: na bhavatyā vyathā kāryā kunārījanasevitā // Ram_3,57.12
GE09ram_02_u:14571: alaṃ vaiklavyam ālambya svasthā bhava nirutsukā
GE09ram_02_u:14572: na cāsti triṣu lokeṣu pumān yo rāghavaṃ raṇe
GE09ram_02_u:14573: jāto vā jāyamāno vā saṃyuge yaḥ parājayet // Ram_3,57.13
GE09ram_02_u:14576: uvācāśrūṇi muñcantī dāruṇaṃ mām idaṃ vacaḥ // Ram_3,57.14
GE09ram_02_u:14578: bhāvo mayi tavātyarthaṃ pāpa eva niveśitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:14579: vinaṣṭe bhrātari prāpte na ca tvaṃ mām avāpsyasi // Ram_3,57.15
GE09ram_02_u:14582: krośantaṃ hi yathātyarthaṃ nainam abhyavapadyase // Ram_3,57.16
GE09ram_02_u:14587: evam ukto hi vaidehyā saṃrabdho raktalocanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:14591: abravīd duṣkṛtaṃ saumya tāṃ vinā yat tvam āgataḥ // Ram_3,57.19
GE09ram_02_u:14593: jānann api samarthaṃ māṃ rakṣasāṃ vinivāraṇe
GE09ram_02_u:14594: anena krodhavākyena maithilyā niḥsṛto bhavān // Ram_3,57.20
GE09ram_02_u:14596: na hi te parituṣyāmi tyaktvā yad yāsi maithilīm
GE09ram_02_u:14597: kruddhāyāḥ paruṣaṃ śrutvā striyā yat tvam ihāgataḥ // Ram_3,57.21
GE09ram_02_u:14599: sarvathā tv apanītaṃ te sītayā yat pracoditaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:14600: krodhasya vaśam āgamya nākaroḥ śāsanaṃ mama // Ram_3,57.22
GE09ram_02_u:14602: asau hi rākṣasaḥ śete śareṇābhihato mayā
GE09ram_02_u:14605: vikṛṣya cāpaṃ paridhāya sāyakaṃ salīlabāṇena ca tāḍito mayā
GE09ram_02_u:14606: mārgīṃ tanuṃ tyajya ca viklavasvaro babhūva keyūradharaḥ sa rākṣasaḥ // Ram_3,57.24
GE09ram_02_u:14608: śarāhatenaiva tadārtayā girā svaraṃ mamālambya sudūrasaṃśravam
GE09ram_02_u:14609: udāhṛtaṃ tad vacanaṃ sudāruṇaṃ tvam āgato yena vihāya maithilīm // Ram_3,57.25
GE09ram_02_u:14612: prāsphurac cāskhalad rāmo vepathuś cāsya jāyate // Ram_3,58.1
GE09ram_02_u:14615: api kṣemaṃ tu sītāyā iti vai vyājahāra ha // Ram_3,58.2
GE09ram_02_u:14623: dadarśa parṇaśālāṃ ca rahitāṃ sītayā tadā
GE09ram_02_u:14624: śriyā virahitāṃ dhvastāṃ hemante padminīm iva // Ram_3,58.5
GE09ram_02_u:14630: dṛṣṭvā śūnyoṭajasthānaṃ vilalāpa punaḥ punaḥ // Ram_3,58.7
GE09ram_02_u:14632: hṛtā mṛtā vā naṣṭā vā bhakṣitā vā bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:14633: nilīnāpy atha vā bhīrur atha vā vanam āśritā // Ram_3,58.8
GE09ram_02_u:14635: gatā vicetuṃ puṣpāṇi phalāny api ca vā punaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:14636: atha vā padminīṃ yātā jalārthaṃ vā nadīṃ gatā // Ram_3,58.9
GE09ram_02_u:14638: yatnān mṛgayamāṇas tu nāsasāda vane priyām
GE09ram_02_u:14639: śokaraktekṣaṇaḥ śokād unmatta iva lakṣyate // Ram_3,58.10
GE09ram_02_u:14641: vṛkṣād vṛkṣaṃ pradhāvan sa girīṃś cāpi nadīn nadīm
GE09ram_02_u:14644: asti kaccit tvayā dṛṣṭā sā kadambapriyā priyā
GE09ram_02_u:14645: kadamba yadi jānīṣe śaṃsa sītāṃ śubhānanām // Ram_3,58.12
GE09ram_02_u:14648: śaṃsasva yadi vā dṛṣṭā bilva bilvopamastanī // Ram_3,58.13
GE09ram_02_u:14650: atha vārjuna śaṃsa tvaṃ priyāṃ tām arjunapriyām
GE09ram_02_u:14651: janakasya sutā bhīrur yadi jīvati vā na vā // Ram_3,58.14
GE09ram_02_u:14653: kakubhaḥ kakubhoruṃ tāṃ vyaktaṃ jānāti maithilīm
GE09ram_02_u:14654: latāpallavapuṣpāḍhyo bhāti hy eṣa vanaspatiḥ // Ram_3,58.15
GE09ram_02_u:14656: bhramarair upagītaś ca yathā drumavaro hy ayam
GE09ram_02_u:14657: eṣa vyaktaṃ vijānāti tilakas tilakapriyām // Ram_3,58.16
GE09ram_02_u:14660: tvannāmānaṃ kuru kṣipraṃ priyāsaṃdarśanena mām // Ram_3,58.17
GE09ram_02_u:14663: kathayasva varārohāṃ kāruṇyaṃ yadi te mayi // Ram_3,58.18
GE09ram_02_u:14665: yadi dṛṣṭā tvayā sītā jambu jāmbūnadaprabhā
GE09ram_02_u:14666: priyāṃ yadi vijānīṣe niḥśaṅkaṃ kathayasva me // Ram_3,58.19
GE09ram_02_u:14668: atha vā mṛgaśāvākṣīṃ mṛga jānāsi maithilīm
GE09ram_02_u:14669: mṛgaviprekṣaṇī kāntā mṛgībhiḥ sahitā bhavet // Ram_3,58.20
GE09ram_02_u:14671: gaja sā gajanāsorur yadi dṛṣṭā tvayā bhavet
GE09ram_02_u:14672: tāṃ manye viditāṃ tubhyam ākhyāhi varavāraṇa // Ram_3,58.21
GE09ram_02_u:14674: śārdūla yadi sā dṛṣṭā priyā candranibhānanā
GE09ram_02_u:14675: maithilī mama viśrabdhaḥ kathayasva na te bhayam // Ram_3,58.22
GE09ram_02_u:14677: kiṃ dhāvasi priye nūnaṃ dṛṣṭāsi kamalekṣaṇe
GE09ram_02_u:14678: vṛkṣeṇācchādya cātmānaṃ kiṃ māṃ na pratibhāṣase // Ram_3,58.23
GE09ram_02_u:14680: tiṣṭha tiṣṭha varārohe na te 'sti karuṇā mayi
GE09ram_02_u:14681: nātyarthaṃ hāsyaśīlāsi kimarthaṃ mām upekṣase // Ram_3,58.24
GE09ram_02_u:14684: dhāvanty api mayā dṛṣṭā tiṣṭha yady asti sauhṛdam // Ram_3,58.25
GE09ram_02_u:14686: naiva sā nūnam atha vā hiṃsitā cāruhāsinī
GE09ram_02_u:14687: kṛcchraṃ prāptaṃ hi māṃ nūnaṃ yathopekṣitum arhati // Ram_3,58.26
GE09ram_02_u:14689: vyaktaṃ sā bhakṣitā bālā rākṣasaiḥ piśitāśanaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:14690: vibhajyāṅgāni sarvāṇi mayā virahitā priyā // Ram_3,58.27
GE09ram_02_u:14692: nūnaṃ tac chubhadantauṣṭhaṃ mukhaṃ niṣprabhatāṃ gatam
GE09ram_02_u:14693: sā hi campakavarṇābhā grīvā graiveyaśobhitā // Ram_3,58.28
GE09ram_02_u:14695: komalā vilapantyās tu kāntāyā bhakṣitā śubhā
GE09ram_02_u:14696: nūnaṃ vikṣipyamāṇau tau bāhū pallavakomalau // Ram_3,58.29
GE09ram_02_u:14699: mayā virahitā bālā rakṣasāṃ bhakṣaṇāya vai // Ram_3,58.30
GE09ram_02_u:14702: hā lakṣmaṇa mahābāho paśyasi tvaṃ priyāṃ kvacit // Ram_3,58.31
GE09ram_02_u:14704: hā priye kva gatā bhadre hā sīteti punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:14705: ity evaṃ vilapan rāmaḥ paridhāvan vanād vanam // Ram_3,58.32
GE09ram_02_u:14707: kvacid udbhramate vegāt kvacid vibhramate balāt
GE09ram_02_u:14710: sa vanāni nadīḥ śailān giriprasravaṇāni ca
GE09ram_02_u:14711: kānanāni ca vegena bhramaty aparisaṃsthitaḥ // Ram_3,58.34
GE09ram_02_u:14713: tathā sa gatvā vipulaṃ mahad vanaṃ parītya sarvaṃ tv atha maithilīṃ prati
GE09ram_02_u:14714: aniṣṭhitāśaḥ sa cakāra mārgaṇe punaḥ priyāyāḥ paramaṃ pariśramam // Ram_3,58.35
GE09ram_02_u:14717: rahitāṃ parṇaśālāṃ ca vidhvastāny āsanāni ca // Ram_3,59.1
GE09ram_02_u:14719: adṛṣṭvā tatra vaidehīṃ saṃnirīkṣya ca sarvaśaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:14720: uvāca rāmaḥ prākruśya pragṛhya rucirau bhujau // Ram_3,59.2
GE09ram_02_u:14722: kva nu lakṣmaṇa vaidehī kaṃ vā deśam ito gatā
GE09ram_02_u:14723: kenāhṛtā vā saumitre bhakṣitā kena vā priyā // Ram_3,59.3
GE09ram_02_u:14725: vṛkṣeṇācchādya yadi māṃ sīte hasitum icchasi
GE09ram_02_u:14726: alaṃ te hasitenādya māṃ bhajasva suduḥkhitam // Ram_3,59.4
GE09ram_02_u:14728: yaiḥ saha krīḍase sīte viśvastair mṛgapotakaiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:14729: ete hīnās tvayā saumye dhyāyanty asrāvilekṣaṇāḥ // Ram_3,59.5
GE09ram_02_u:14732: paraloke mahārājo nūnaṃ drakṣyati me pitā // Ram_3,59.6
GE09ram_02_u:14734: kathaṃ pratijñāṃ saṃśrutya mayā tvam abhiyojitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:14735: apūrayitvā taṃ kālaṃ matsakāśam ihāgataḥ // Ram_3,59.7
GE09ram_02_u:14737: kāmavṛttam anāryaṃ māṃ mṛṣāvādinam eva ca
GE09ram_02_u:14738: dhik tvām iti pare loke vyaktaṃ vakṣyati me pitā // Ram_3,59.8
GE09ram_02_u:14741: mām ihotsṛjya karuṇaṃ kīrtir naram ivānṛjum // Ram_3,59.9
GE09ram_02_u:14743: kva gacchasi varārohe mām utsṛjya sumadhyame
GE09ram_02_u:14744: tvayā virahitaś cāhaṃ mokṣye jīvitam ātmanaḥ // Ram_3,59.10
GE09ram_02_u:14747: na dadarśa suduḥkhārto rāghavo janakātmajām // Ram_3,59.11
GE09ram_02_u:14750: paṅkam āsādya vipulaṃ sīdantam iva kuñjaram
GE09ram_02_u:14751: lakṣmaṇo rāmam atyartham uvāca hitakāmyayā // Ram_3,59.12
GE09ram_02_u:14753: mā viṣādaṃ mahābāho kuru yatnaṃ mayā saha
GE09ram_02_u:14754: idaṃ ca hi vanaṃ śūra bahukandaraśobhitam // Ram_3,59.13
GE09ram_02_u:14757: sā vanaṃ vā praviṣṭā syān nalinīṃ vā supuṣpitām // Ram_3,59.14
GE09ram_02_u:14760: vitrāsayitukāmā vā līnā syāt kānane kvacit
GE09ram_02_u:14761: jijñāsamānā vaidehī tvāṃ māṃ ca puruṣarṣabha // Ram_3,59.15
GE09ram_02_u:14763: tasyā hy anveṣaṇe śrīman kṣipram eva yatāvahe
GE09ram_02_u:14764: vanaṃ sarvaṃ vicinuvo yatra sā janakātmajā
GE09ram_02_u:14765: manyase yadi kākutstha mā sma śoke manaḥ kṛthāḥ // Ram_3,59.16
GE09ram_02_u:14767: evam uktas tu sauhārdāl lakṣmaṇena samāhitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:14769: tau vanāni girīṃś caiva saritaś ca sarāṃsi ca // Ram_3,59.17
GE09ram_02_u:14772: tasya śailasya sānūni guhāś ca śikharāṇi ca // Ram_3,59.18
GE09ram_02_u:14775: vicitya sarvataḥ śailaṃ rāmo lakṣmaṇam abravīt // Ram_3,59.19
GE09ram_02_u:14777: neha paśyāmi saumitre vaidehīṃ parvate śubhe
GE09ram_02_u:14778: tato duḥkhābhisaṃtapto lakṣmaṇo vākyam abravīt // Ram_3,59.20
GE09ram_02_u:14781: prāpsyasi tvaṃ mahāprājña maithilīṃ janakātmajām // Ram_3,59.21
GE09ram_02_u:14783: yathā viṣṇur mahābāhur baliṃ baddhvā mahīm imām
GE09ram_02_u:14784: evam uktas tu vīreṇa lakṣmaṇena sa rāghavaḥ // Ram_3,59.22
GE09ram_02_u:14787: vanaṃ sarvaṃ suvicitaṃ padminyaḥ phullapaṅkajāḥ // Ram_3,59.23
GE09ram_02_u:14790: na hi paśyāmi vaidehīṃ prāṇebhyo 'pi garīyasīm // Ram_3,59.24
GE09ram_02_u:14798: bahuśaḥ sa tu niḥśvasya rāmo rājīvalocanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:14799: hā priyeti vicukrośa bahuśo bāṣpagadgadaḥ // Ram_3,59.27
GE09ram_02_u:14805: apaśyaṃs tāṃ priyāṃ sītāṃ prākrośat sa punaḥ punaḥ // Ram_3,59.29
GE09ram_02_u:14807: sa dīno dīnayā vācā lakṣmaṇaṃ vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:14808: śīghraṃ lakṣmaṇa jānīhi gatvā godāvarīṃ nadīm
GE09ram_02_u:14809: api godāvarīṃ sītā padmāny ānayituṃ gatā // Ram_3,60.1
GE09ram_02_u:14811: evam uktas tu rāmeṇa lakṣmaṇaḥ punar eva hi
GE09ram_02_u:14812: nadīṃ godāvarīṃ ramyāṃ jagāma laghuvikramaḥ // Ram_3,60.2
GE09ram_02_u:14814: tāṃ lakṣmaṇas tīrthavatīṃ vicitvā rāmam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:14815: naināṃ paśyāmi tīrtheṣu krośato na śṛṇoti me // Ram_3,60.3
GE09ram_02_u:14817: kaṃ nu sā deśam āpannā vaidehī kleśanāśinī
GE09ram_02_u:14818: na hi taṃ vedmi vai rāma yatra sā tanumadhyamā // Ram_3,60.4
GE09ram_02_u:14821: rāmaḥ samabhicakrāma svayaṃ godāvarīṃ nadīm // Ram_3,60.5
GE09ram_02_u:14823: sa tām upasthito rāmaḥ kva sītety evam abravīt // Ram_3,60.6
GE09ram_02_u:14826: na tāṃ śaśaṃsū rāmāya tathā godāvarī nadī // Ram_3,60.7
GE09ram_02_u:14828: tataḥ pracoditā bhūtaiḥ śaṃsāsmai tāṃ priyām iti
GE09ram_02_u:14829: na ca sābhyavadat sītāṃ pṛṣṭā rāmeṇa śocitā // Ram_3,60.8
GE09ram_02_u:14831: rāvaṇasya ca tad rūpaṃ karmāṇi ca durātmanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:14832: dhyātvā bhayāt tu vaidehīṃ sā nadī na śaśaṃsa tām // Ram_3,60.9
GE09ram_02_u:14834: nirāśas tu tayā nadyā sītāyā darśane kṛtaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:14837: kiṃ nu lakṣmaṇa vakṣyāmi sametya janakaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:14838: mātaraṃ caiva vaidehyā vinā tām aham apriyam // Ram_3,60.11
GE09ram_02_u:14840: yā me rājyavihīnasya vane vanyena jīvataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:14841: sarvaṃ vyapanayacchokam vaidehī kva nu sā gatā // Ram_3,60.12
GE09ram_02_u:14844: manye dīrghā bhaviṣyanti rātrayo mama jāgrataḥ // Ram_3,60.13
GE09ram_02_u:14847: sarvāṇy anucariṣyāmi yadi sītā hi dṛśyate // Ram_3,60.14
GE09ram_02_u:14849: evaṃ sambhāṣamāṇau tāv anyonyaṃ bhrātarāv ubhau
GE09ram_02_u:14852: tāṃ puṣpavṛṣṭiṃ patitāṃ dṛṣṭvā rāmo mahītale
GE09ram_02_u:14853: uvāca lakṣmaṇaṃ vīro duḥkhito duḥkhitaṃ vacaḥ // Ram_3,60.16
GE09ram_02_u:14856: apinaddhāni vaidehyā mayā dattāni kānane // Ram_3,60.17
GE09ram_02_u:14859: kruddho 'bravīd giriṃ tatra siṃhaḥ kṣudramṛgaṃ yathā // Ram_3,60.18
GE09ram_02_u:14861: tāṃ hemavarṇāṃ hemābhāṃ sītāṃ darśaya parvata
GE09ram_02_u:14862: yāvat sānūni sarvāṇi na te vidhvaṃsayāmy aham // Ram_3,60.19
GE09ram_02_u:14867: imāṃ vā saritaṃ cādya śoṣayiṣyāmi lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_02_u:14868: yadi nākhyāti me sītām adya candranibhānanām // Ram_3,60.21
GE09ram_02_u:14870: evaṃ sa ruṣito rāmo didhakṣann iva cakṣuṣā
GE09ram_02_u:14871: dadarśa bhūmau niṣkrāntaṃ rākṣasasya padaṃ mahat // Ram_3,60.22
GE09ram_02_u:14873: sa samīkṣya parikrāntaṃ sītāyā rākṣasasya ca
GE09ram_02_u:14874: saṃbhrāntahṛdayo rāmaḥ śaśaṃsa bhrātaraṃ priyam // Ram_3,60.23
GE09ram_02_u:14877: bhūṣaṇānāṃ hi saumitre mālyāni vividhāni ca // Ram_3,60.24
GE09ram_02_u:14880: āvṛtaṃ paśya saumitre sarvato dharaṇītalam // Ram_3,60.25
GE09ram_02_u:14883: bhittvā bhittvā vibhaktā vā bhakṣitā vā bhaviṣyati // Ram_3,60.26
GE09ram_02_u:14886: babhūva yuddhaṃ saumitre ghoraṃ rākṣasayor iha // Ram_3,60.27
GE09ram_02_u:14889: dharaṇyāṃ patitaṃ saumya kasya bhagnaṃ mahad dhanuḥ // Ram_3,60.28
GE09ram_02_u:14892: viśīrṇaṃ patitaṃ bhūmau kavacaṃ kasya kāñcanam // Ram_3,60.29
GE09ram_02_u:14895: bhagnadaṇḍam idaṃ kasya bhūmau saumya nipātitam // Ram_3,60.30
GE09ram_02_u:14898: bhīmarūpā mahākāyāḥ kasya vā nihatā raṇe // Ram_3,60.31
GE09ram_02_u:14901: apaviddhaś ca bhagnaś ca kasya sāṃgrāmiko rathaḥ // Ram_3,60.32
GE09ram_02_u:14909: hṛtā mṛtā vā sītā hi bhakṣitā vā tapasvinī
GE09ram_02_u:14910: na dharmas trāyate sītāṃ hriyamāṇāṃ mahāvane // Ram_3,60.35
GE09ram_02_u:14912: bhakṣitāyāṃ hi vaidehyāṃ hṛtāyām api lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_02_u:14913: ke hi loke priyaṃ kartuṃ śaktāḥ saumya mameśvarāḥ // Ram_3,60.36
GE09ram_02_u:14919: nirvīrya iti manyante nūnaṃ māṃ tridaśeśvarāḥ // Ram_3,60.38
GE09ram_02_u:14921: māṃ prāpya hi guṇo doṣaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ paśya lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_02_u:14923: saṃhṛtyaiva śaśijyotsnāṃ mahān sūrya ivoditaḥ // Ram_3,60.39
GE09ram_02_u:14925: naiva yakṣā na gandharvā na piśācā na rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:14926: kiṃnarā vā manuṣyā vā sukhaṃ prāpsyanti lakṣmaṇa // Ram_3,60.40
GE09ram_02_u:14929: niḥsampātaṃ kariṣyāmi hy adya trailokyacāriṇām // Ram_3,60.41
GE09ram_02_u:14937: na tāṃ kuśalinīṃ sītāṃ pradāsyanti mameśvarāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:14938: asmin muhūrte saumitre mama drakṣyanti vikramam // Ram_3,60.44
GE09ram_02_u:14941: mama cāpaguṇān muktair bāṇajālair nirantaram // Ram_3,60.45
GE09ram_02_u:14944: samākulam amaryādaṃ jagat paśyādya lakṣmaṇa // Ram_3,60.46
GE09ram_02_u:14950: drakṣyanty adya vimuktānām amarṣād dūragāminām // Ram_3,60.48
GE09ram_02_u:14952: naiva devā na daiteyā na piśācā na rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:14953: bhaviṣyanti mama krodhāt trailokye vipraṇāśite // Ram_3,60.49
GE09ram_02_u:14957: nirmaryādān imāṃl lokān kariṣyāmy adya sāyakaiḥ // Ram_3,60.50
GE09ram_02_u:14959: yathā jarā yathā mṛtyur yathā kālo yathā vidhiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:14961: tathāhaṃ krodhasaṃyukto na nivāryo 'smy asaṃśayam // Ram_3,60.51
GE09ram_02_u:14963: pureva me cārudatīm aninditāṃ diśanti sītāṃ yadi nādya maithilīm
GE09ram_02_u:14964: sadevagandharvamanuṣyapannagaṃ jagat saśailaṃ parivartayāmy aham // Ram_3,60.52
GE09ram_02_u:14967: lokānām abhave yuktaṃ saṃvartakam ivānalam // Ram_3,61.1
GE09ram_02_u:14969: vīkṣamāṇaṃ dhanuḥ sajyaṃ niḥśvasantaṃ muhur muhuḥ
GE09ram_02_u:14970: hantukāmaṃ paśuṃ rudraṃ kruddhaṃ dakṣakratau yathā // Ram_3,61.2
GE09ram_02_u:14972: adṛṣṭapūrvaṃ saṃkruddhaṃ dṛṣṭvā rāmaṃ sa lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:14973: abravīt prāñjalir vākyaṃ mukhena pariśuṣyatā // Ram_3,61.3
GE09ram_02_u:14975: purā bhūtvā mṛdur dāntaḥ sarvabhūtahite rataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:14976: na krodhavaśam āpannaḥ prakṛtiṃ hātum arhasi // Ram_3,61.4
GE09ram_02_u:14978: candre lakṣmīḥ prabhā sūrye gatir vāyau bhuvi kṣamā
GE09ram_02_u:14979: etac ca niyataṃ sarvaṃ tvayi cānuttamaṃ yaśaḥ // Ram_3,61.5
GE09ram_02_u:14981: na tu jānāmi kasyāyaṃ bhagnaḥ sāṃgrāmiko rathaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:14982: kena vā kasya vā hetoḥ sāyudhaḥ saparicchadaḥ // Ram_3,61.6
GE09ram_02_u:14987: ekasya tu vimardo 'yaṃ na dvayor vadatāṃ vara
GE09ram_02_u:14988: na hi vṛttaṃ hi paśyāmi balasya mahataḥ padam // Ram_3,61.8
GE09ram_02_u:14990: naikasya tu kṛte lokān vināśayitum arhasi
GE09ram_02_u:14991: yuktadaṇḍā hi mṛdavaḥ praśāntā vasudhādhipāḥ // Ram_3,61.9
GE09ram_02_u:14993: sadā tvaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ śaraṇyaḥ paramā gatiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:14994: ko nu dārapraṇāśaṃ te sādhu manyeta rāghava // Ram_3,61.10
GE09ram_02_u:14997: nālaṃ te vipriyaṃ kartuṃ dīkṣitasyeva sādhavaḥ // Ram_3,61.11
GE09ram_02_u:14999: yena rājan hṛtā sītā tam anveṣitum arhasi
GE09ram_02_u:15002: samudraṃ ca viceṣyāmaḥ parvatāṃś ca vanāni ca
GE09ram_02_u:15003: guhāś ca vividhā ghorā nalinīḥ pārvatīś ca ha // Ram_3,61.13
GE09ram_02_u:15008: na cet sāmnā pradāsyanti patnīṃ te tridaśeśvarāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:15009: kosalendra tataḥ paścāt prāptakālaṃ kariṣyasi // Ram_3,61.15
GE09ram_02_u:15011: śīlena sāmnā vinayena sītāṃ nayena na prāpsyasi cen narendra
GE09ram_02_u:15012: tataḥ samutsādaya hemapuṅkhair mahendravajrapratimaiḥ śaraughaiḥ // Ram_3,61.16
GE09ram_02_u:15017: tataḥ saumitrir āśvāsya muhūrtād iva lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:15020: mahatā tapasā rāma mahatā cāpi karmaṇā
GE09ram_02_u:15023: tava caiva guṇair baddhas tvadviyogān mahīpatiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:15024: rājā devatvam āpanno bharatasya yathā śrutam // Ram_3,62.4
GE09ram_02_u:15026: yadi duḥkham idaṃ prāptaṃ kākutstha na sahiṣyase
GE09ram_02_u:15027: prākṛtaś cālpasattvaś ca itaraḥ kaḥ sahiṣyati // Ram_3,62.5
GE09ram_02_u:15029: duḥkhito hi bhavāṃl lokāṃs tejasā yadi dhakṣyate
GE09ram_02_u:15030: ārtāḥ prajā naravyāghra kva nu yāsyanti nirvṛtim // Ram_3,62.6
GE09ram_02_u:15033: gataḥ śakreṇa sālokyam anayas taṃ samaspṛśat // Ram_3,62.7
GE09ram_02_u:15035: maharṣayo vasiṣṭhas tu yaḥ pitur naḥ purohitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:15036: ahnā putraśataṃ jajñe tathaivāsya punar hatam // Ram_3,62.8
GE09ram_02_u:15038: yā ceyaṃ jagato mātā devī lokanamaskṛtā
GE09ram_02_u:15039: asyāś ca calanaṃ bhūmer dṛśyate satyasaṃśrava // Ram_3,62.9
GE09ram_02_u:15041: yau cemau jagatāṃ netre yatra sarvaṃ pratiṣṭhitam
GE09ram_02_u:15044: sumahānty api bhūtāni devāś ca puruṣarṣabha
GE09ram_02_u:15045: na daivasya pramuñcanti sarvabhūtāni dehinaḥ // Ram_3,62.11
GE09ram_02_u:15048: śrūyete naraśārdūla na tvaṃ vyathitum arhasi // Ram_3,62.12
GE09ram_02_u:15050: naṣṭāyām api vaidehyāṃ hṛtāyām api cānagha
GE09ram_02_u:15051: śocituṃ nārhase vīra yathānyaḥ prākṛtas tathā // Ram_3,62.13
GE09ram_02_u:15053: tvadvidhā hi na śocanti satataṃ satyadarśinaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:15057: buddhyā yuktā mahāprājñā vijānanti śubhāśubhe // Ram_3,62.15
GE09ram_02_u:15060: nāntareṇa kriyāṃ teṣāṃ phalam iṣṭaṃ pravartate // Ram_3,62.16
GE09ram_02_u:15062: mām eva hi purā vīra tvam eva bahuśo 'nvaśāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:15063: anuśiṣyāddhi ko nu tvām api sākṣād bṛhaspatiḥ // Ram_3,62.17
GE09ram_02_u:15065: buddhiś ca te mahāprājña devair api duranvayā
GE09ram_02_u:15066: śokenābhiprasuptaṃ te jñānaṃ saṃbodhayāmy aham // Ram_3,62.18
GE09ram_02_u:15068: divyaṃ ca mānuṣaṃ caivam ātmanaś ca parākramam
GE09ram_02_u:15072: tam eva tu ripuṃ pāpaṃ vijñāyoddhartum arhasi // Ram_3,62.20
GE09ram_02_u:15078: avaṣṭabhya dhanuś citraṃ rāmo lakṣmaṇam abravīt // Ram_3,63.2
GE09ram_02_u:15080: kiṃ kariṣyāvahe vatsa kva vā gacchāva lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_02_u:15081: kenopāyena paśyeyaṃ sītām iti vicintaya // Ram_3,63.3
GE09ram_02_u:15083: taṃ tathā paritāpārtaṃ lakṣmaṇo rāmam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:15084: idam eva janasthānaṃ tvam anveṣitum arhasi // Ram_3,63.4
GE09ram_02_u:15087: santīha giridurgāṇi nirdarāḥ kandarāṇi ca // Ram_3,63.5
GE09ram_02_u:15090: āvāsāḥ kiṃnarāṇāṃ ca gandharvabhavanāni ca // Ram_3,63.6
GE09ram_02_u:15092: tāni yukto mayā sārdhaṃ tvam anveṣitum arhasi
GE09ram_02_u:15096: ity uktas tad vanaṃ sarvaṃ vicacāra salakṣmaṇaḥ // Ram_3,63.8
GE09ram_02_u:15098: kruddho rāmaḥ śaraṃ ghoraṃ saṃdhāya dhanuṣi kṣuram
GE09ram_02_u:15102: taṃ dṛṣṭvā giriśṛṅgābhaṃ rāmo lakṣmaṇam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:15103: anena sītā vaidehī bhakṣitā nātra saṃśayaḥ // Ram_3,63.10
GE09ram_02_u:15105: gṛdhrarūpam idaṃ vyaktaṃ rakṣo bhramati kānanam
GE09ram_02_u:15107: enaṃ vadhiṣye dīptāgrair ghorair bāṇair ajihmagaiḥ // Ram_3,63.11
GE09ram_02_u:15109: ity uktvābhyapatad gṛdhraṃ saṃdhāya dhanuṣi kṣuram
GE09ram_02_u:15110: kruddho rāmaḥ samudrāntāṃ cālayann iva medinīm // Ram_3,63.12
GE09ram_02_u:15112: taṃ dīnadīnayā vācā saphenaṃ rudhiraṃ vaman
GE09ram_02_u:15113: abhyabhāṣata pakṣī tu rāmaṃ daśarathātmajam // Ram_3,63.13
GE09ram_02_u:15116: sā devī mama ca prāṇā rāvaṇenobhayaṃ hṛtam // Ram_3,63.14
GE09ram_02_u:15118: tvayā virahitā devī lakṣmaṇena ca rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:15119: hriyamāṇā mayā dṛṣṭā rāvaṇena balīyasā // Ram_3,63.15
GE09ram_02_u:15121: sītām abhyavapanno 'haṃ rāvaṇaś ca raṇe mayā
GE09ram_02_u:15124: etad asya dhanur bhagnam etad asya śarāvaram
GE09ram_02_u:15125: ayam asya raṇe rāma bhagnaḥ sāṃgrāmiko rathaḥ // Ram_3,63.17
GE09ram_02_u:15127: pariśrāntasya me pakṣau chittvā khaḍgena rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:15129: rakṣasā nihataṃ pūrvaṃ na māṃ hantuṃ tvam arhasi // Ram_3,63.18
GE09ram_02_u:15131: rāmas tasya tu vijñāya sītāsaktāṃ priyāṃ kathām
GE09ram_02_u:15135: samīkṣya duḥkhito rāmaḥ saumitrim idam abravīt // Ram_3,63.20
GE09ram_02_u:15137: rājyād bhraṃśo vane vāsaḥ sītā naṣṭā hato dvijaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:15138: īdṛśīyaṃ mamālakṣmīr nirdahed api pāvakam // Ram_3,63.21
GE09ram_02_u:15140: sampūrṇam api ced adya pratareyaṃ mahodadhim
GE09ram_02_u:15141: so 'pi nūnaṃ mamālakṣmyā viśuṣyet saritāṃ patiḥ // Ram_3,63.22
GE09ram_02_u:15144: yeneyaṃ mahatī prāptā mayā vyasanavāgurā // Ram_3,63.23
GE09ram_02_u:15147: śete vinihato bhūmau mama bhāgyaviparyayāt // Ram_3,63.24
GE09ram_02_u:15149: ity evam uktvā bahuśo rāghavaḥ sahalakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:15150: jaṭāyuṣaṃ ca pasparśa pitṛsnehaṃ nidarśayan // Ram_3,63.25
GE09ram_02_u:15152: nikṛttapakṣaṃ rudhirāvasiktaṃ taṃ gṛdhrarājaṃ parirabhya rāmaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:15153: kva maithili prāṇasamā mameti vimucya vācaṃ nipapāta bhūmau // Ram_3,63.26
GE09ram_02_u:15155: rāmaḥ prekṣya tu taṃ gṛdhraṃ bhuvi raudreṇa pātitam
GE09ram_02_u:15156: saumitriṃ mitrasampannam idaṃ vacanam abravīt // Ram_3,64.1
GE09ram_02_u:15159: rākṣasena hataḥ saṃkhye prāṇāṃs tyajati dustyajān // Ram_3,64.2
GE09ram_02_u:15161: ayam asya śarīre 'smin prāṇo lakṣmaṇa vidyate
GE09ram_02_u:15164: jaṭāyo yadi śaknoṣi vākyaṃ vyāharituṃ punaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:15165: sītām ākhyāhi bhadraṃ te vadham ākhyāhi cātmanaḥ // Ram_3,64.4
GE09ram_02_u:15167: kiṃnimitto 'harat sītāṃ rāvaṇas tasya kiṃ mayā
GE09ram_02_u:15168: aparāddhaṃ tu yaṃ dṛṣṭvā rāvaṇena hṛtā priyā // Ram_3,64.5
GE09ram_02_u:15170: kathaṃ tac candrasaṃkāśaṃ mukham āsīn manoharam
GE09ram_02_u:15171: sītayā kāni coktāni tasmin kāle dvijottama // Ram_3,64.6
GE09ram_02_u:15173: kathaṃvīryaḥ kathaṃrūpaḥ kiṃkarmā sa ca rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:15174: kva cāsya bhavanaṃ tāta brūhi me paripṛcchataḥ // Ram_3,64.7
GE09ram_02_u:15177: vācātisannayā rāmaṃ jaṭāyur idam abravīt // Ram_3,64.8
GE09ram_02_u:15182: pariśrāntasya me tāta pakṣau chittvā niśācaraḥ
GE09ram_02_u:15183: sītām ādāya vaidehīṃ prayāto dakṣiṇāmukhaḥ // Ram_3,64.10
GE09ram_02_u:15185: uparudhyanti me prāṇā dṛṣṭir bhramati rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:15188: yena yāti muhūrtena sītām ādāya rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:15189: vipraṇaṣṭaṃ dhanaṃ kṣipraṃ tatsvāmī pratipadyate // Ram_3,64.12
GE09ram_02_u:15191: vindo nāma muhūrto 'sau sa ca kākutstha nābudhat
GE09ram_02_u:15192: jhaṣavad baḍiśaṃ gṛhya kṣipram eva vinaśyati // Ram_3,64.13
GE09ram_02_u:15194: na ca tvayā vyathā kāryā janakasya sutāṃ prati
GE09ram_02_u:15195: vaidehyā raṃsyase kṣipraṃ hatvā taṃ rākṣasaṃ raṇe // Ram_3,64.14
GE09ram_02_u:15198: āsyāt susrāva rudhiraṃ mriyamāṇasya sāmiṣam // Ram_3,64.15
GE09ram_02_u:15200: putro viśravasaḥ sākṣād bhrātā vaiśravaṇasya ca
GE09ram_02_u:15201: ity uktvā durlabhān prāṇān mumoca patageśvaraḥ // Ram_3,64.16
GE09ram_02_u:15204: tyaktvā śarīraṃ gṛdhrasya jagmuḥ prāṇā vihāyasam // Ram_3,64.17
GE09ram_02_u:15206: sa nikṣipya śiro bhūmau prasārya caraṇau tadā
GE09ram_02_u:15207: vikṣipya ca śarīraṃ svaṃ papāta dharaṇītale // Ram_3,64.18
GE09ram_02_u:15209: taṃ gṛdhraṃ prekṣya tāmrākṣaṃ gatāsum acalopamam
GE09ram_02_u:15210: rāmaḥ subahubhir duḥkhair dīnaḥ saumitrim abravīt // Ram_3,64.19
GE09ram_02_u:15212: bahūni rakṣasāṃ vāse varṣāṇi vasatā sukham
GE09ram_02_u:15213: anena daṇḍakāraṇye vicīrṇam iha pakṣiṇā // Ram_3,64.20
GE09ram_02_u:15216: so 'yam adya hataḥ śete kālo hi duratikramaḥ // Ram_3,64.21
GE09ram_02_u:15218: paśya lakṣmaṇa gṛdhro 'yam upakārī hataś ca me
GE09ram_02_u:15219: sītām abhyavapan no vai rāvaṇena balīyasā // Ram_3,64.22
GE09ram_02_u:15222: mama hetor ayaṃ prāṇān mumoca patageśvaraḥ // Ram_3,64.23
GE09ram_02_u:15225: śūrāḥ śaraṇyāḥ saumitre tiryagyonigateṣv api // Ram_3,64.24
GE09ram_02_u:15227: sītāharaṇajaṃ duḥkhaṃ na me saumya tathāgatam
GE09ram_02_u:15228: yathā vināśo gṛdhrasya matkṛte ca paraṃtapa // Ram_3,64.25
GE09ram_02_u:15230: rājā daśarathaḥ śrīmān yathā mama mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:15231: pūjanīyaś ca mānyaś ca tathāyaṃ patageśvaraḥ // Ram_3,64.26
GE09ram_02_u:15234: gṛdhrarājaṃ didhakṣāmi matkṛte nidhanaṃ gatam // Ram_3,64.27
GE09ram_02_u:15237: imaṃ dhakṣyāmi saumitre hataṃ raudreṇa rakṣasā // Ram_3,64.28
GE09ram_02_u:15239: yā gatir yajñaśīlānām āhitāgneś ca yā gatiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:15240: aparāvartināṃ yā ca yā ca bhūmipradāyinām // Ram_3,64.29
GE09ram_02_u:15242: mayā tvaṃ samanujñāto gaccha lokān anuttamān
GE09ram_02_u:15243: gṛdhrarāja mahāsattva saṃskṛtaś ca mayā vraja // Ram_3,64.30
GE09ram_02_u:15245: evam uktvā citāṃ dīptām āropya patageśvaram
GE09ram_02_u:15246: dadāha rāmo dharmātmā svabandhum iva duḥkhitaḥ // Ram_3,64.31
GE09ram_02_u:15248: rāmo 'tha sahasaumitrir vanaṃ yātvā sa vīryavān
GE09ram_02_u:15249: sthūlān hatvā mahārohīn anu tastāra taṃ dvijam // Ram_3,64.32
GE09ram_02_u:15252: śakunāya dadau rāmo ramye haritaśādvale // Ram_3,64.33
GE09ram_02_u:15254: yat tat pretasya martyasya kathayanti dvijātayaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:15255: tat svargagamanaṃ tasya kṣipraṃ rāmo jajāpa ha // Ram_3,64.34
GE09ram_02_u:15258: udakaṃ cakratus tasmai gṛdhrarājāya tāv ubhau // Ram_3,64.35
GE09ram_02_u:15260: sa gṛdhrarājaḥ kṛtavān yaśaskaraṃ suduṣkaraṃ karma raṇe nipātitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:15261: maharṣikalpena ca saṃskṛtas tadā jagāma puṇyāṃ gatim ātmanaḥ śubhām // Ram_3,64.36
GE09ram_02_u:15263: kṛtvaivam udakaṃ tasmai prasthitau rāghavau tadā
GE09ram_02_u:15264: avekṣantau vane sītāṃ paścimāṃ jagmatur diśam // Ram_3,65.1
GE09ram_02_u:15269: gulmair vṛkṣaiś ca bahubhir latābhiś ca praveṣṭitam
GE09ram_02_u:15270: āvṛtaṃ sarvato durgaṃ gahanaṃ ghoradarśanam // Ram_3,65.3
GE09ram_02_u:15272: vyatikramya tu vegena gṛhītvā dakṣiṇāṃ diśam
GE09ram_02_u:15273: subhīmaṃ tan mahāraṇyaṃ vyatiyātau mahābalau // Ram_3,65.4
GE09ram_02_u:15275: tataḥ paraṃ janasthānāt trikrośaṃ gamya rāghavau
GE09ram_02_u:15276: krauñcāraṇyaṃ viviśatur gahanaṃ tau mahaujasau // Ram_3,65.5
GE09ram_02_u:15279: nānāvarṇaiḥ śubhaiḥ puṣpair mṛgapakṣigaṇair yutam // Ram_3,65.6
GE09ram_02_u:15281: didṛkṣamāṇau vaidehīṃ tad vanaṃ tau vicikyatuḥ
GE09ram_02_u:15284: lakṣmaṇas tu mahātejāḥ sattvavāñ śīlavāñ śuciḥ
GE09ram_02_u:15285: abravīt prāñjalir vākyaṃ bhrātaraṃ dīptatejasam // Ram_3,65.8
GE09ram_02_u:15287: spandate me dṛḍhaṃ bāhur udvignam iva me manaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:15288: prāyaśaś cāpy aniṣṭāni nimittāny upalakṣaye // Ram_3,65.9
GE09ram_02_u:15290: tasmāt sajjībhavārya tvaṃ kuruṣva vacanaṃ hitam
GE09ram_02_u:15291: mamaiva hi nimittāni sadyaḥ śaṃsanti sambhramam // Ram_3,65.10
GE09ram_02_u:15294: āvayor vijayaṃ yuddhe śaṃsann iva vinardati // Ram_3,65.11
GE09ram_02_u:15296: tayor anveṣator evaṃ sarvaṃ tad vanam ojasā
GE09ram_02_u:15297: saṃjajñe vipulaḥ śabdaḥ prabhañjann iva tad vanam // Ram_3,65.12
GE09ram_02_u:15300: vanasya tasya śabdo 'bhūd divam āpūrayann iva // Ram_3,65.13
GE09ram_02_u:15302: taṃ śabdaṃ kāṅkṣamāṇas tu rāmaḥ kakṣe sahānujaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:15305: āsedatus tatas tatra tāv ubhau pramukhe sthitam
GE09ram_02_u:15306: vivṛddham aśirogrīvaṃ kabandham udare mukham // Ram_3,65.15
GE09ram_02_u:15317: ghorau bhujau vikurvāṇam ubhau yojanam āyatau
GE09ram_02_u:15318: karābhyāṃ vividhān gṛhya ṛkṣān pakṣigaṇān mṛgān // Ram_3,65.19
GE09ram_02_u:15321: sthitam āvṛtya panthānaṃ tayor bhrātroḥ prapannayoḥ // Ram_3,65.20
GE09ram_02_u:15324: mahāntaṃ dāruṇaṃ bhīmaṃ kabandhaṃ bhujasaṃvṛtam // Ram_3,65.21
GE09ram_02_u:15326: sa mahābāhur atyarthaṃ prasārya vipulau bhujau
GE09ram_02_u:15327: jagrāha sahitāv eva rāghavau pīḍayan balāt // Ram_3,65.22
GE09ram_02_u:15330: bhrātarau vivaśaṃ prāptau kṛṣyamāṇau mahābalau // Ram_3,65.23
GE09ram_02_u:15335: ghoraṃ deśam imaṃ prāptau mama bhakṣāv upasthitau
GE09ram_02_u:15336: vadataṃ kāryam iha vāṃ kimarthaṃ cāgatau yuvām // Ram_3,65.25
GE09ram_02_u:15340: mamāsyam anusaṃprāptau durlabhaṃ jīvitaṃ punaḥ // Ram_3,65.26
GE09ram_02_u:15343: uvāca lakṣmaṇaṃ rāmo mukhena pariśuṣyatā // Ram_3,65.27
GE09ram_02_u:15346: vyasanaṃ jīvitāntāya prāptam aprāpya tāṃ priyām // Ram_3,65.28
GE09ram_02_u:15349: tvāṃ ca māṃ ca naravyāghra vyasanaiḥ paśya mohitau
GE09ram_02_u:15352: śūrāś ca balavantaś ca kṛtāstrāś ca raṇājire
GE09ram_02_u:15355: iti bruvāṇo dṛḍhasatyavikramo mahāyaśā dāśarathiḥ pratāpavān
GE09ram_02_u:15356: avekṣya saumitrim udagravikramaṃ sthirāṃ tadā svāṃ matim ātmanākarot // Ram_3,65.31
GE09ram_02_u:15358: tau tu tatra sthitau dṛṣṭvā bhrātarau rāmalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_02_u:15361: tiṣṭhataḥ kiṃ nu māṃ dṛṣṭvā kṣudhārtaṃ kṣatriyarṣabhau
GE09ram_02_u:15362: āhārārthaṃ tu saṃdiṣṭau daivena gatacetasau // Ram_3,66.2
GE09ram_02_u:15364: tac chrutvā lakṣmaṇo vākyaṃ prāptakālaṃ hitaṃ tadā
GE09ram_02_u:15367: tvāṃ ca māṃ ca purā tūrṇam ādatte rākṣasādhamaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:15368: tasmād asibhyām asyāśu bāhū chindāvahai gurū // Ram_3,66.4
GE09ram_02_u:15370: tatas tau deśakālajñau khaḍgābhyām eva rāghavau
GE09ram_02_u:15373: dakṣiṇo dakṣiṇaṃ bāhum asaktam asinā tataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:15374: cicheda rāmo vegena savyaṃ vīras tu lakṣmaṇaḥ // Ram_3,66.6
GE09ram_02_u:15377: khaṃ ca gāṃ ca diśaś caiva nādayañ jalado yathā // Ram_3,66.7
GE09ram_02_u:15380: dīnaḥ papraccha tau vīrau kau yuvām iti dānavaḥ // Ram_3,66.8
GE09ram_02_u:15383: śaśaṃsa tasya kākutsthaṃ kabandhasya mahābalaḥ // Ram_3,66.9
GE09ram_02_u:15385: ayam ikṣvākudāyādo rāmo nāma janaiḥ śrutaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:15386: asyaivāvarajaṃ viddhi bhrātaraṃ māṃ ca lakṣmaṇam // Ram_3,66.10
GE09ram_02_u:15389: rakṣasāpahṛtā bhāryā yām icchantāv ihāgatau // Ram_3,66.11
GE09ram_02_u:15391: tvaṃ tu ko vā kimarthaṃ vā kabandha sadṛśo vane
GE09ram_02_u:15394: evam uktaḥ kabandhas tu lakṣmaṇenottaraṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:15395: uvāca paramaprītas tad indravacanaṃ smaran // Ram_3,66.13
GE09ram_02_u:15397: svāgataṃ vāṃ naravyāghrau diṣṭyā paśyāmi cāpy aham
GE09ram_02_u:15398: diṣṭyā cemau nikṛttau me yuvābhyāṃ bāhubandhanau // Ram_3,66.14
GE09ram_02_u:15400: virūpaṃ yac ca me rūpaṃ prāptaṃ hy avinayād yathā
GE09ram_02_u:15401: tan me śṛṇu naravyāghra tattvataḥ śaṃsatas tava // Ram_3,66.15
GE09ram_02_u:15404: rūpam āsīn mamācintyaṃ triṣu lokeṣu viśrutam
GE09ram_02_u:15405: yathā somasya śakrasya sūryasya ca yathā vapuḥ // Ram_3,67.1
GE09ram_02_u:15407: so 'haṃ rūpam idaṃ kṛtvā lokavitrāsanaṃ mahat
GE09ram_02_u:15408: ṛṣīn vanagatān rāma trāsayāmi tatas tataḥ // Ram_3,67.2
GE09ram_02_u:15410: tataḥ sthūlaśirā nāma maharṣiḥ kopito mayā
GE09ram_02_u:15411: saṃcinvan vividhaṃ vanyaṃ rūpeṇānena dharṣitaḥ // Ram_3,67.3
GE09ram_02_u:15414: etad eva nṛśaṃsaṃ te rūpam astu vigarhitam // Ram_3,67.4
GE09ram_02_u:15416: sa mayā yācitaḥ kruddhaḥ śāpasyānto bhaved iti
GE09ram_02_u:15419: yadā chittvā bhujau rāmas tvāṃ dahed vijane vane
GE09ram_02_u:15420: tadā tvaṃ prāpsyase rūpaṃ svam eva vipulaṃ śubham // Ram_3,67.6
GE09ram_02_u:15422: śriyā virājitaṃ putraṃ danos tvaṃ viddhi lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_02_u:15423: indrakopād idaṃ rūpaṃ prāptam evaṃ raṇājire // Ram_3,67.7
GE09ram_02_u:15426: dīrgham āyuḥ sa me prādāt tato māṃ vibhramo 'spṛśat // Ram_3,67.8
GE09ram_02_u:15428: dīrgham āyur mayā prāptaṃ kiṃ me śakraḥ kariṣyati
GE09ram_02_u:15429: ity evaṃ buddhim āsthāya raṇe śakram adharṣayam // Ram_3,67.9
GE09ram_02_u:15432: sakthinī ca śiraś caiva śarīre saṃpraveśitam // Ram_3,67.10
GE09ram_02_u:15434: sa mayā yācyamānaḥ sann ānayad yamasādanam
GE09ram_02_u:15435: pitāmahavacaḥ satyaṃ tad astv iti mamābravīt // Ram_3,67.11
GE09ram_02_u:15438: vajreṇābhihataḥ kālaṃ sudīrgham api jīvitum // Ram_3,67.12
GE09ram_02_u:15440: evam uktas tu me śakro bāhū yojanam āyatau
GE09ram_02_u:15441: prādād āsyaṃ ca me kukṣau tīkṣṇadaṃṣṭram akalpayat // Ram_3,67.13
GE09ram_02_u:15446: sa tu mām abravīd indro yadā rāmaḥ salakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:15447: chetsyate samare bāhū tadā svargaṃ gamiṣyasi // Ram_3,67.15
GE09ram_02_u:15449: sa tvaṃ rāmo 'si bhadraṃ te nāham anyena rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:15450: śakyo hantuṃ yathātattvam evam uktaṃ maharṣiṇā // Ram_3,67.16
GE09ram_02_u:15455: evam uktas tu dharmātmā danunā tena rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:15458: rāvaṇena hṛtā sītā mama bhāryā yaśasvinī
GE09ram_02_u:15459: niṣkrāntasya janasthānāt saha bhrātrā yathāsukham // Ram_3,67.19
GE09ram_02_u:15461: nāmamātraṃ tu jānāmi na rūpaṃ tasya rakṣasaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:15462: nivāsaṃ vā prabhāvaṃ vā vayaṃ tasya na vidmahe // Ram_3,67.20
GE09ram_02_u:15465: kāruṇyaṃ sadṛśaṃ kartum upakāre ca vartatām // Ram_3,67.21
GE09ram_02_u:15467: kāṣṭhāny ānīya śuṣkāṇi kāle bhagnāni kuñjaraiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:15468: bhakṣyāmas tvāṃ vayaṃ vīra śvabhre mahati kalpite // Ram_3,67.22
GE09ram_02_u:15470: sa tvaṃ sītāṃ samācakṣva yena vā yatra vā hṛtā
GE09ram_02_u:15471: kuru kalyāṇam atyarthaṃ yadi jānāsi tattvataḥ // Ram_3,67.23
GE09ram_02_u:15473: evam uktas tu rāmeṇa vākyaṃ danur anuttamam
GE09ram_02_u:15474: provāca kuśalo vaktuṃ vaktāram api rāghavam // Ram_3,67.24
GE09ram_02_u:15476: divyam asti na me jñānaṃ nābhijānāmi maithilīm
GE09ram_02_u:15477: yas tāṃ jñāsyati taṃ vakṣye dagdhaḥ svaṃ rūpam āsthitaḥ // Ram_3,67.25
GE09ram_02_u:15479: adagdhasya hi vijñātuṃ śaktir asti na me prabho
GE09ram_02_u:15480: rākṣasaṃ taṃ mahāvīryaṃ sītā yena hṛtā tava // Ram_3,67.26
GE09ram_02_u:15482: vijñānaṃ hi mahad bhraṣṭaṃ śāpadoṣeṇa rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:15483: svakṛtena mayā prāptaṃ rūpaṃ lokavigarhitam // Ram_3,67.27
GE09ram_02_u:15485: kiṃ tu yāvan na yāty astaṃ savitā śrāntavāhanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:15486: tāvan mām avaṭe kṣiptvā daha rāma yathāvidhi // Ram_3,67.28
GE09ram_02_u:15489: vakṣyāmi tam ahaṃ vīra yas taṃ jñāsyati rākṣasam // Ram_3,67.29
GE09ram_02_u:15491: tena sakhyaṃ ca kartavyaṃ nyāyyavṛttena rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:15492: kalpayiṣyati te prītaḥ sāhāyyaṃ laghuvikramaḥ // Ram_3,67.30
GE09ram_02_u:15494: na hi tasyāsty avijñātaṃ triṣu lokeṣu rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:15495: sarvān parisṛto lokān purā vai kāraṇāntare // Ram_3,67.31
GE09ram_02_u:15497: evam uktau tu tau vīrau kabandhena nareśvarau
GE09ram_02_u:15501: citām ādīpayāmāsa sā prajajvāla sarvataḥ // Ram_3,68.2
GE09ram_02_u:15504: medasā pacyamānasya mandaṃ dahati pāvakaḥ // Ram_3,68.3
GE09ram_02_u:15506: sa vidhūya citām āśu vidhūmo 'gnir ivotthitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:15507: araje vāsasī bibhran mālāṃ divyāṃ mahābalaḥ // Ram_3,68.4
GE09ram_02_u:15513: prabhayā ca mahātejā diśo daśa virājayan // Ram_3,68.6
GE09ram_02_u:15516: śṛṇu rāghava tattvena yathā sīmām avāpsyasi // Ram_3,68.7
GE09ram_02_u:15518: rāma ṣaḍ yuktayo loke yābhiḥ sarvaṃ vimṛśyate
GE09ram_02_u:15522: yat kṛte vyasanaṃ prāptaṃ tvayā dārapradharṣaṇam // Ram_3,68.9
GE09ram_02_u:15524: tad avaśyaṃ tvayā kāryaḥ sa suhṛt suhṛdāṃ vara
GE09ram_02_u:15525: akṛtvā na hi te siddhim ahaṃ paśyāmi cintayan // Ram_3,68.10
GE09ram_02_u:15527: śrūyatāṃ rāma vakṣyāmi sugrīvo nāma vānaraḥ
GE09ram_02_u:15528: bhrātrā nirastaḥ kruddhena vālinā śakrasūnunā // Ram_3,68.11
GE09ram_02_u:15531: nivasaty ātmavān vīraś caturbhiḥ saha vānaraiḥ // Ram_3,68.12
GE09ram_02_u:15533: vayasyaṃ taṃ kuru kṣipram ito gatvādya rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:15536: na ca te so 'vamantavyaḥ sugrīvo vānarādhipaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:15537: kṛtajñaḥ kāmarūpī ca sahāyārthī ca vīryavān // Ram_3,68.14
GE09ram_02_u:15539: śaktau hy adya yuvāṃ kartuṃ kāryaṃ tasya cikīrṣitam
GE09ram_02_u:15540: kṛtārtho vākṛtārtho vā kṛtyaṃ tava kariṣyati // Ram_3,68.15
GE09ram_02_u:15542: sa ṛkṣarajasaḥ putraḥ pampām aṭati śaṅkitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:15546: kuru rāghava satyena vayasyaṃ vanacāriṇam // Ram_3,68.17
GE09ram_02_u:15548: sa hi sthānāni sarvāṇi kārtsnyena kapikuñjaraḥ
GE09ram_02_u:15551: na tasyāviditaṃ loke kiṃcid asti hi rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:15552: yāvat sūryaḥ pratapati sahasrāṃśur ariṃdama // Ram_3,68.19
GE09ram_02_u:15554: sa nadīr vipulāñ śailān giridurgāṇi kandarān
GE09ram_02_u:15555: anviṣya vānaraiḥ sārdhaṃ patnīṃ te 'dhigamiṣyati // Ram_3,68.20
GE09ram_02_u:15558: diśo vicetuṃ tāṃ sītāṃ tvadviyogena śocatīm // Ram_3,68.21
GE09ram_02_u:15560: sa meruśṛṅgāgragatām aninditāṃ praviśya pātālatale 'pi vāśritām
GE09ram_02_u:15561: plavaṃgamānāṃ pravaras tava priyāṃ nihatya rakṣāṃsi punaḥ pradāsyati // Ram_3,68.22
GE09ram_02_u:15564: vākyam anvartham arthajñaḥ kabandhaḥ punar abravīt // Ram_3,69.1
GE09ram_02_u:15566: eṣa rāma śivaḥ panthā yatraite puṣpitā drumāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:15567: pratīcīṃ diśam āśritya prakāśante manoramāḥ // Ram_3,69.2
GE09ram_02_u:15570: aśvatthāḥ karṇikārāś ca cūtāś cānye ca pādapāḥ // Ram_3,69.3
GE09ram_02_u:15572: tān āruhyāthavā bhūmau pātayitvā ca tān balāt
GE09ram_02_u:15575: caṅkramantau varān deśāñ śailāc chailaṃ vanād vanam
GE09ram_02_u:15576: tataḥ puṣkariṇīṃ vīrau pampāṃ nāma gamiṣyathaḥ // Ram_3,69.5
GE09ram_02_u:15581: tatra haṃsāḥ plavāḥ krauñcāḥ kurarāś caiva rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:15585: ghṛtapiṇḍopamān sthūlāṃs tān dvijān bhakṣayiṣyathaḥ // Ram_3,69.8
GE09ram_02_u:15587: rohitān vakratuṇḍāṃś ca nalamīnāṃś ca rāghava
GE09ram_02_u:15588: pampāyām iṣubhir matsyāṃs tatra rāma varān hatān // Ram_3,69.9
GE09ram_02_u:15591: tava bhaktyā samāyukto lakṣmaṇaḥ sampradāsyati // Ram_3,69.10
GE09ram_02_u:15593: bhṛśaṃ te khādato matsyān pampāyāḥ puṣpasaṃcaye
GE09ram_02_u:15594: padmagandhi śivaṃ vāri sukhaśītam anāmayam // Ram_3,69.11
GE09ram_02_u:15600: apāṃ lobhād upāvṛttān vṛṣabhān iva nardataḥ
GE09ram_02_u:15601: rūpānvitāṃś ca pampāyāṃ drakṣyasi tvaṃ narottama // Ram_3,69.13
GE09ram_02_u:15604: śītodakaṃ ca pampāyāṃ dṛṣṭvā śokaṃ vihāsyasi // Ram_3,69.14
GE09ram_02_u:15607: utpalāni ca phullāni paṅkajāni ca rāghava // Ram_3,69.15
GE09ram_02_u:15609: na tāni kaścin mālyāni tatrāropayitā naraḥ
GE09ram_02_u:15613: ye prapetur mahīṃ tūrṇaṃ śarīrāt svedabindavaḥ // Ram_3,69.17
GE09ram_02_u:15615: tāni mālyāni jātāni munīnāṃ tapasā tadā
GE09ram_02_u:15619: śramaṇī śabarī nāma kākutstha cirajīvinī // Ram_3,69.19
GE09ram_02_u:15621: tvāṃ tu dharme sthitā nityaṃ sarvabhūtanamaskṛtam
GE09ram_02_u:15622: dṛṣṭvā devopamaṃ rāma svargalokaṃ gamiṣyati // Ram_3,69.20
GE09ram_02_u:15624: tatas tad rāma pampāyās tīram āśritya paścimam
GE09ram_02_u:15625: āśramasthānam atulaṃ guhyaṃ kākutstha paśyasi // Ram_3,69.21
GE09ram_02_u:15627: na tatrākramituṃ nāgāḥ śaknuvanti tam āśramam
GE09ram_02_u:15628: ṛṣes tasya mataṃgasya vidhānāt tac ca kānanam // Ram_3,69.22
GE09ram_02_u:15635: udāro brahmaṇā caiva pūrvakāle vinirmitaḥ // Ram_3,69.24
GE09ram_02_u:15637: śayānaḥ puruṣo rāma tasya śailasya mūrdhani
GE09ram_02_u:15638: yat svapne labhate vittaṃ tat prabuddho 'dhigacchati // Ram_3,69.25
GE09ram_02_u:15641: tatraiva praharanty enaṃ suptam ādāya rākṣasāḥ // Ram_3,69.26
GE09ram_02_u:15647: pracaranti pṛthak kīrṇā meghavarṇās tarasvinaḥ // Ram_3,69.28
GE09ram_02_u:15649: te tatra pītvā pānīyaṃ vimalaṃ śītam avyayam
GE09ram_02_u:15652: rāma tasya tu śailasya mahatī śobhate guhā
GE09ram_02_u:15653: śilāpidhānā kākutstha duḥkhaṃ cāsyāḥ praveśanam // Ram_3,69.30
GE09ram_02_u:15655: tasyā guhāyāḥ prāgdvāre mahāñ śītodako hradaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:15658: tasyāṃ vasati sugrīvaś caturbhiḥ saha vānaraiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:15661: kabandhas tv anuśāsyaivaṃ tāv ubhau rāmalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_02_u:15662: sragvī bhāskaravarṇābhaḥ khe vyarocata vīryavān // Ram_3,69.33
GE09ram_02_u:15664: taṃ tu khasthaṃ mahābhāgaṃ kabandhaṃ rāmalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_02_u:15665: prasthitau tvaṃ vrajasveti vākyam ūcatur antikāt // Ram_3,69.34
GE09ram_02_u:15667: gamyatāṃ kāryasiddhyartham iti tāv abravīc ca saḥ
GE09ram_02_u:15668: suprītau tāv anujñāpya kabandhaḥ prasthitas tadā // Ram_3,69.35
GE09ram_02_u:15670: sa tat kabandhaḥ pratipadya rūpaṃ vṛtaḥ śriyā bhāskaratulyadehaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:15671: nidarśayan rāmam avekṣya khasthaḥ sakhyaṃ kuruṣveti tadābhyuvāca // Ram_3,69.36
GE09ram_02_u:15673: tau kabandhena taṃ mārgaṃ pampāyā darśitaṃ vane
GE09ram_02_u:15674: ātasthatur diśaṃ gṛhya pratīcīṃ nṛvarātmajau // Ram_3,70.1
GE09ram_02_u:15677: vīkṣantau jagmatur draṣṭuṃ sugrīvaṃ rāmalakṣmaṇau // Ram_3,70.2
GE09ram_02_u:15679: kṛtvā ca śailapṛṣṭhe tu tau vāsaṃ raghunandanau
GE09ram_02_u:15680: pampāyāḥ paścimaṃ tīraṃ rāghavāv upatasthatuḥ // Ram_3,70.3
GE09ram_02_u:15682: tau puṣkariṇyāḥ pampāyās tīram āsādya paścimam
GE09ram_02_u:15683: apaśyatāṃ tatas tatra śabaryā ramyam āśramam // Ram_3,70.4
GE09ram_02_u:15685: tau tam āśramam āsādya drumair bahubhir āvṛtam
GE09ram_02_u:15688: tau tu dṛṣṭvā tadā siddhā samutthāya kṛtāñjaliḥ
GE09ram_02_u:15689: pādau jagrāha rāmasya lakṣmaṇasya ca dhīmataḥ // Ram_3,70.6
GE09ram_02_u:15691: tām uvāca tato rāmaḥ śramaṇīṃ saṃśitavratām
GE09ram_02_u:15692: kaccit te nirjitā vighnāḥ kaccit te vardhate tapaḥ // Ram_3,70.7
GE09ram_02_u:15694: kaccit te niyataḥ kopa āhāraś ca tapodhane
GE09ram_02_u:15695: kaccit te niyamāḥ prāptāḥ kaccit te manasaḥ sukham
GE09ram_02_u:15696: kaccit te guruśuśrūṣā saphalā cārubhāṣiṇi // Ram_3,70.8
GE09ram_02_u:15698: rāmeṇa tāpasī pṛṣṭā sā siddhā siddhasaṃmatā
GE09ram_02_u:15699: śaśaṃsa śabarī vṛddhā rāmāya pratyupasthitā // Ram_3,70.9
GE09ram_02_u:15702: itas te divam ārūḍhā yān ahaṃ paryacāriṣam // Ram_3,70.10
GE09ram_02_u:15704: taiś cāham uktā dharmajñair mahābhāgair maharṣibhiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:15705: āgamiṣyati te rāmaḥ supuṇyam imam āśramam // Ram_3,70.11
GE09ram_02_u:15708: taṃ ca dṛṣṭvā varāṃl lokān akṣayāṃs tvaṃ gamiṣyasi // Ram_3,70.12
GE09ram_02_u:15710: mayā tu vividhaṃ vanyaṃ saṃcitaṃ puruṣarṣabha
GE09ram_02_u:15713: evam uktaḥ sa dharmātmā śabaryā śabarīm idam
GE09ram_02_u:15714: rāghavaḥ prāha vijāne tāṃ nityam abahiṣkṛtām // Ram_3,70.14
GE09ram_02_u:15716: danoḥ sakāśāt tattvena prabhāvaṃ te mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:15717: śrutaṃ pratyakṣam icchāmi saṃdraṣṭuṃ yadi manyase // Ram_3,70.15
GE09ram_02_u:15719: etat tu vacanaṃ śrutvā rāmavaktrād viniḥsṛtam
GE09ram_02_u:15720: śabarī darśayāmāsa tāv ubhau tad vanaṃ mahat // Ram_3,70.16
GE09ram_02_u:15723: mataṃgavanam ity eva viśrutaṃ raghunandana // Ram_3,70.17
GE09ram_02_u:15725: iha te bhāvitātmāno guravo me mahādyute
GE09ram_02_u:15728: iyaṃ pratyaksthalī vedī yatra te me susatkṛtāḥ
GE09ram_02_u:15729: puṣpopahāraṃ kurvanti śramād udvepibhiḥ karaiḥ // Ram_3,70.19
GE09ram_02_u:15732: dyotayanti diśaḥ sarvāḥ śriyā vedyo 'tulaprabhāḥ // Ram_3,70.20
GE09ram_02_u:15735: cintite 'bhyāgatān paśya sametān sapta sāgarān // Ram_3,70.21
GE09ram_02_u:15737: kṛtābhiṣekais tair nyastā valkalāḥ pādapeṣv iha
GE09ram_02_u:15738: adyāpi na viśuṣyanti pradeśe raghunandana // Ram_3,70.22
GE09ram_02_u:15740: kṛtsnaṃ vanam idaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ śrotavyaṃ ca śrutaṃ tvayā
GE09ram_02_u:15741: tad icchāmy abhyanujñātā tyaktum etat kalevaram // Ram_3,70.23
GE09ram_02_u:15743: teṣām icchāmy ahaṃ gantuṃ samīpaṃ bhāvitātmanām
GE09ram_02_u:15744: munīnām āśramo yeṣām ahaṃ ca paricāriṇī // Ram_3,70.24
GE09ram_02_u:15746: dharmiṣṭhaṃ tu vacaḥ śrutvā rāghavaḥ sahalakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:15750: jvalatpāvakasaṃkāśā svargam eva jagāma sā // Ram_3,70.26
GE09ram_02_u:15753: tat puṇyaṃ śabarī sthānaṃ jagāmātmasamādhinā // Ram_3,70.27
GE09ram_02_u:15755: divaṃ tu tasyāṃ yātāyāṃ śabaryāṃ svena karmaṇā
GE09ram_02_u:15756: lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā cintayāmāsa rāghavaḥ // Ram_3,71.1
GE09ram_02_u:15758: cintayitvā tu dharmātmā prabhāvaṃ taṃ mahātmanām
GE09ram_02_u:15764: saptānāṃ ca samudrāṇām eṣu tīrtheṣu lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_02_u:15765: upaspṛṣṭaṃ ca vidhivat pitaraś cāpi tarpitāḥ // Ram_3,71.4
GE09ram_02_u:15767: pranaṣṭam aśubhaṃ yat tat kalyāṇaṃ samupasthitam
GE09ram_02_u:15768: tena tv etat prahṛṣṭaṃ me mano lakṣmaṇa samprati // Ram_3,71.5
GE09ram_02_u:15771: tad āgaccha gamiṣyāvaḥ pampāṃ tāṃ priyadarśanām // Ram_3,71.6
GE09ram_02_u:15775: nityaṃ vālibhayāt trastaś caturbhiḥ saha vānaraiḥ // Ram_3,71.77 //
GE09ram_02_u:15777: abhitvare ca taṃ draṣṭuṃ sugrīvaṃ vānararṣabham
GE09ram_02_u:15778: tadadhīnaṃ hi me saumya sītāyāḥ parimārgaṇam // Ram_3,71.8
GE09ram_02_u:15780: iti bruvāṇaṃ taṃ rāmaṃ saumitrir idam abravīt
GE09ram_02_u:15781: gacchāvas tvaritaṃ tatra mamāpi tvarate manaḥ // Ram_3,71.9
GE09ram_02_u:15783: āśramāt tu tatas tasmān niṣkramya sa viśāṃ patiḥ
GE09ram_02_u:15784: ājagāma tataḥ pampāṃ lakṣmaṇena sahābhibhūḥ // Ram_3,71.10
GE09ram_02_u:15788: etaiś cānyaiś ca vividhair nāditaṃ tad vanaṃ mahat // Ram_3,71.11
GE09ram_02_u:15790: sa rāmo vividhān vṛkṣān sarāṃsi vividhāni ca
GE09ram_02_u:15791: paśyan kāmābhisaṃtapto jagāma paramaṃ hradam // Ram_3,71.12
GE09ram_02_u:15793: sa tām āsādya vai rāmo dūrād udakavāhinīm
GE09ram_02_u:15797: viveśa nalinīṃ pampāṃ paṅkajaiś ca samāvṛtām // Ram_3,71.14
GE09ram_02_u:15810: nīlāṃ kuvalayoddhātair bahuvarṇāṃ kuthām iva // Ram_3,71.18
GE09ram_02_u:15815: sa tāṃ dṛṣṭvā tataḥ pampāṃ rāmaḥ saumitriṇā saha
GE09ram_02_u:15816: vilalāpa ca tejasvī kāmād daśarathātmajaḥ // Ram_3,71.20
GE09ram_02_u:15818: tilakair bījapūraiś ca vaṭaiḥ śukladrumais tathā
GE09ram_02_u:15819: puṣpitaiḥ karavīraiś ca puṃnāgaiś ca supuṣpitaiḥ // Ram_3,71.21
GE09ram_02_u:15823: anyaiś ca vividhair vṛkṣaiḥ pramadevopaśobhitām // Ram_3,71.22
GE09ram_02_u:15825: asyās tīre tu pūrvoktaḥ parvato dhātumaṇḍitaḥ
GE09ram_02_u:15829: adhyāste taṃ mahāvīryaḥ sugrīva iti viśrutaḥ // Ram_3,71.24
GE09ram_02_u:15832: ity uvāca punar vākyaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ satyavikramam // Ram_3,71.25
GE09ram_02_u:15834: tato mahad vartma ca dūrasaṃkramaṃ krameṇa gatvā pravilokayan vanam
